column2: Abraham Aisaak vaa apa, Aisaak Jakop vaa apa, Jakop Judah leh anaovaa anpa.
Che Judah Tamar soh Peres leh Jerah vaa anpa, Peres Hejaron vaa apa, Hejaron Raam vaa apa,
Raam Aminadep vaa apa, Aminadep Nason vaa apa, Nason Salmon vaa apa,
che Salmon Rahap soh Boas vaa anpa, Boas Ruth soh Obet vaa anpa, Obet Jesi vaa apa,
che Jesi Devit kurungvaa apa.
Devit Uriah vaa akmeinata Solomon vaa apa,
che Solomon Rehoboam vaa apa, Rehoboam Abia vaa apa, Abia Asa vaa apa,
che Asa Jehosaphet vaa apa, Jehosaphet Joram vaa apa, Joram Ujiah vaa apa,
che Ujiah Jotham vaa apa, Jotham Ahas vaa apa, Ahas Hejekiah vaa apa,
che Hejekiah Manaseh vaa apa, Manaseh Amos vaa apa, Amos Josiah vaa apa.
Che Josiah Jekoniah leh amah anaovaa anpa, mahlai Babilon na suura anphurhpei.
Che Babilon na suura anphurhnua: Jekoniah Saltiel vaa apa, Saltiel Jerubabel vaa apa,
che Jerubabel Abihut vaa apa, Abihut Eliakim vaa apa, Eliakim Ajor vaa apa,
che Ajor Jadok vaa apa, Jadok Akim vaa apa,
Eliud Eliajar vaa apa, Eliajar Mathan vaa apa, Mathan Jakop vaa apa,
che Jakop Meri amsal Joseph vaa apa, anmahnata Khrista antih Jisu kha poksa.

Chunna mah ringnatluun Abraham nata Devit phah anaamte i ringnatluun somlei manli, che Devit nata Babilon na suura anphurh phah i ringnatluun somlei manli; che Babilon na suura anphurhnata Misaiah phah i ringnatluun somlei manli.
Amah amsal Joseph vah akchimlamseh mii khat veia amah in atlannoh miikaara madangnoh a inrukte amdahnatu amdonpei.

Mahchunanga tlohtsangta anchaang suung, Akpu vaa ringroi inkhat in akmanga mamuh a akuunga ason, “Devit vaa asa kupa Joseph, Meri ta nikmei maveia lou trihnohro, alamva amah in akpooi naoi Li Akseeng tingna;
amah in kupasa inkhat apoktu, che nangin amahvaa akming Jisu niongtu, alamva amah in amiieita anlehnata akaltuei.
“Mah naamte i Akpu trong akson ringraan in asonkha atlungnatu veisa, mah chuvah:
“Anve akseeng rungaak inkhat in nao inpooia kupasa inkhat apoktu,
“che anmah in amahvaa akming Immanuel an ongtu.”
(Mahchu arthava, “Ringpu in inihta inimrui.”)
Joseph in a ihnata inthoua Akpu vaa ringroin amahkuunga jathang amlankha amjuihpei, che amah in Meri ta akmei veia alohpei.
Chuta Meri in asa kupa apoknohmiil amahta inchunpinoh, amah in naota akming Jisu aongpei.
“Judiei kurung pokkha ramnasame? Alamva kannih in amahvaa arsita kulkung tonga kanmuh, churella amahta amthruun thlengsung.”
Herot kurung in mahchuta atheihlai, aril inhalsa, Jerusalem am mii annaamtekho anril inhalsei.
Che akthloi thiimpu leh Ringjih lulok akveimii naamteta onga mahchunna Khrista pokchu ramna umeta aruiei.
Anmah in akuunga anson, “Judia vaa Bethlehem a poktu, alamva ringraan in nga tloh a amijihpei:
“Judia ram asuungna, O Bethlehem, nangva Judia rampuui
“ankaara andihrem nohche;
“alamva kei kimii Israel ta
“khuhnatu rampuui inkhat nikuungnata inthruhtu.”
Chunna Herot in aksing mii eita inrukte onga aruiei, che jaknang laitalla arsi in nanimmuh umeta ankuungnata arompei;
che “Naochu nannih in thratea seh a jonve, che nannih in nantuukche keikho trong kamphahve, chuleva keikho mahchu seh a kithruunnatu” tih a amah in Bethlehem tonga amseh ei.
Anmah in kurung trongchuta antheihche sehsei, che anve Kulkung nata anmuh arsi in nao apokna ajatalla angeihnohmiil anmah anmaa a sehsa.
Anmah in arsichuta anmuhlai khalmo tlanna anroomthoksei.
Che anmah in innsuunga luut anao in Meri soh amchu anmuh, che inluk a naota amithruunpei. Cheva, andoon adoonta mahoonga, ra–ao, amrimtui haalna leh amrimtui thaota akuunga ankatpei.
Che Herot in amnatonga inlengnoh natu anmanga mathrit a ammuh ei, che anmah in aktleilam juih a anramtinga inlengsei.

Pekva anmah in anlenglai, anve, Akpu vaa ringroi in Joseph ta akmanga mamuh a ason, “Inthouro, naoleh anuta phurh a Ijip ah tlaanrosa, che keiin inlengrosa ta nikuungah kisonnohmiil mah khanna amve, alamva Herot in naoita ammaangnatu ajonsampei.”
Chunna Joseph in khulouh ah inthoua naoleh anuta phurh a Ijip ah sehsa.
Che Herot in athihnohsot mahchunna amsei. Mah i Akpu in ringraan ta amsonkha atlungna veisa, mah chuvah: “Ijip nata kei kisa kupata kiongpei.”

Aksing mii in keita kanleemna peiang ta Herot in aromlai, khalmo amlung inhaangsa, cheva aksing mii ankuungnata amah in atheihna lai aknujuih a Bethlehem suungleh akom apangah ak am nao kum innihnata athlangna anaamte raalmii mathlah a ramkir a amthat peiei.
Chunna ringraan Jeremiah in asonkha atlungnasa, mah chuvah:
“Ramah in asuunga aril sok a traptruuia onghou kitheih, Rachel in amah asaturel trap, amahta maneem janohsa, alamva naoeikha amnohsei.”
“Inthourosa, naoleh anuta phurh a Israel ramma inlengrosa, alamva naota thatnatu akjon miikha thikirsei.”
Cheva Joseph in inthoua naoleh anuta phurh a Israel ramma inlengsa.
Chuta Arkhelas in apa Herot angut a Judia rampuui veisa ta atheih in ram achunna luutva intrisa. Che akmanga mathrit a asontaningva amah in Kalili vaa ramsiin tonga inpeella sehsa.
Cunna amah in Najareth khuuboomma amsa alamva ringraan in ansonkha atlungna veisa, mahchuva, “Amahta Najareth na mii tih a an ongtu.”
“Nanril thlengve, alamva ringram kurung huunnakha innaisa.”
Mah i ringraan Isaiah in asonmii khasa, mah chuvah nga tloh a ason,
“Raprilla an ong houkhava:
“Akpu turel lam machaangve,
“amah alam mathluunve.”
Ipek John in amah anaamma savun khapat inraak, uuksa amul puunrei asilh: che amah in raprilna khuuining leh khaota asaak.
Cheva Jerusalem leh Judia apumtena che Jordon aveelna mii annaam in amahkuunga thlengsei,
Che anmah anlehta phoonga Jordon avaa a amah in alupei.
Chunna nanril thlenga akthra akrah inrahchu veivesa,
‘Kannihvaa kan pa Abraham am’ tih a nannih in madonnohve, alamva Ringpu in mah lung innata Abraham vaa atute masuuk achek tih a nankuungah kisonchou.
Ipektalkho thingi akjungah reii aha tlasamma am, chunna akrah thranoh thing anaamteta tangkirra meia alontu.
“Nannih nanril nanthlengrella, keiin kiluppeichou, chuta kei kiknua akthlengsam amahvah keichunga atuui am, keivah amah akehkhraang choikho kimtik amnoh; amah invah Li Akseeng leh meia naniluptu.
Amah akut ah mathrahna kulei am, che amah aruimunna amthrahche kihuta atomsuungah abuntu, chuta aksiva thinohluunga intruunga amna meikhura athlaaktu.”
Mahchuta John in indah a alouson, “Keidomta nangin naklup tupot angta, keikuungah thleng sacheme?”
Chunna Jisu in akuungah amsang, “Pekva ajana veisaso, alamva akchimlamseh naamteta mathlungna veia mah i inih turelnasa.” Cheva John in aloujapei.
Che Jisu in inlup a, tuiinata anthruh dolhsoh, kak hanga ringram inhoongsa che Ringpu vaa Li in ukthru nanga trumsa, che achunga kvaara amuhpei;
che ringramnata hou inkhat in ason, “Mah i keiin kirilvol Kisa kupasa, amahkuunga kiril pelsang.”
Jisu in suun sopli leh khulouh sopli saak in ahel, mahchuche aknua amah in traamsa.
Amdoi in amahkuunga thlenga ason, “Nganginta Ringpu vaa Asa kupa chele, mah lungita tol aveinatu jathang malanro.”
Chuta Jisu in amsang, “Mah i injih a am, mii in tol apaalla ringnohtu, chuta Ringpu vaa anarnata anthruh trongkhanna ringtuei.”

amahkuunga ason, “Nanginta Ringpu vaa Asa kupa chele, maannata injaamro; alamva mah i injih a am, ‘Amah ringroita nangturel madonna amthlahnatu jathang amlatu, che anmah ankut roudoh a nangta nakdomtuei, chuleva nang nikehkha lunga inrotnohtu.’ ”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Veikhatla mah i injih a am, ‘Nangvaa Ringpu Akpu ta madoinohro.’ ”
Veikhatla, Seitan in amahta khalmo inkaang muul inkhat a aphurhpei, cheva tukleiram kurung huunna leh anmah paarthra anaamteta akuunga ammuhpei.
Che amahkuunga ason, “Nanginta keita intolhtlep a kamthruun cheleva, mah naamte i nangkuunga kamlankir uche.”
Mahchunna Jisu in akuunga ason, “Seitan sehrosa! alamva mah i injih a amsa,
“ ‘Nangvaa Ringpu Akputa mathruunro
“ ‘che amahruta rou tlohro.’ ”
Amah in Najareth amthlahche Kaparnaum a seh a tuiiboom akom Jebulun leh Naphtali ramma amsa.
Chunna ringraan Isaiah in asonkha atlungna veisa, mah chuvah:
“Jebulun vaa ram, Naphtali vaa ram, tuiiboom akomma, Jordon vanna Kalili na Jental,
inthim kaara ak am mii in akthloirem akvaarkha anmuhpei, che akthivaa aniim ak am mii turella akvaarkha suuksa.”
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Keijuihve, che keiin nannihta mii akman kamvei uchou.”
Kak hang achunna anmah torota anmahche Jisu ta anjuihpei.
Mah chunnata amah in asehlai, aktlei unao innih, Jebedi asa kupa Jems leh anao John mulisuunga anpa Jebedi soh inruuia anmah torota phoh a am amuh ei, che Jisu in anmahta aongei.
Kak hang achunna anmah in muli leh anpata mah a Jisu ta anjuihpei.
Chunna Jisu akming Siria ram apumtea inthangsa, che natna rii alam jikcha ah akna aklah aknang, khousaar asuur, surpitum mahche apangnem akthi mii eita amthrat ei.
Che Kalili ram, Dekapolis ram, Jerusalem ram, mahche Judea ram leh Jordon avaraalna mii khalmo tamin Jisu aknuta anjuih.
Cheva amah in ankuunga matheih amthronpei:
“Doipha eikha inruruh miikhasei, alamva anmah in thaleiram anphahtu.
“Doiphah eikha rilvoltheih miikhasei, alamva anmah in Ringpu rilvol anphahtu.
“Doiphah eikha leh oi akthlenmii khasei, alamva anmahta Ringpu vaa asa ih a aongtuei.
Roomthok a tlan veive, alamva ringramma nannih nankhaan khalmo liin, oinanga nannih nanmaa a anmah in ringraan eita anchutei.”
Tunangkhat inkho mitton ataarche luktoong makhumma sinohme, chuta ataarna chunga ithongche innsuung apumtea amvaar.
Mahchunanga, nannihva akvaarkha aktlei miikuung akho vaarso, chunna anmah in nannihva akthrata muh a ringramma am nanpa in paarthratna veiso.”
“Moses trongsuur nohle Ringpu trong akson ringraan antrongta ammaang thleng tih a kamdonnohve, keiva ammaang thlengnoh ang, chuta amthlung thlengsang.
Alamva, ringram mahche thalei amaang nohmiil Moses trongsuurnata tikta ansun nohle thretta ankai alip anaamte atlungnohmiil maangnoh tuta keiin nannihta taktak a kisonchou.

Mairella tunangkhat in trongthuun akaarnata andihrem inkhatta khoia mahchunang mii ninga amtheih amahta ringram kurung huunna a andihrem tih a aongusa. Chuta tunangkhat in majuih a miita matheihle ringramna amahta anrolrem tih a aongusa.
Nannih in akchimlamseh nanveiche Moses trongsuur lulok leh Pharisi ei akchimlamseh ta ralnoh chouleva nannih in ringramma luutnohluung uchouta kisonchou.”
“Nangin mii thatnohve chuta tunangkhat in mii thatle pichaarnia amahvah thihnaringna veitu ta leithingnata anson nantheihpei.
Chulata tunangkhat in auh anaota biklam tihleva jama pichaara thihnaringna veitu tlasa, che tunangkhatta mongo tihleva repnanga thihnaringna aphahtuta nankuunga kisonpeichou.
Chunna nangin thiilla nikatphu kutthol nithlenlai niuhnao khat in nikuunga ajanoh intheihchele,
nikattuphu kuttholkha thiilkuung amaia nimahche inlengmanna niuhnaosoh injamanro. Che thlenga nang kuttholkha katro.
Niandah miisoh inruuia lamma nansehlai intha a inchamve, chunohleva amah in nangta pichaarpu kuunga namthruhtu. Chuleva pichaar Akpu in nangta jama ankuunga masilla simma niluutna veitu.
Keiin nankuunga tak a kitihchou, nannih in achena namilan tuphu baobeh nansiin nohmiil mah khannata inthruhnoh uchou.”
“Nannih in miimei miisa laalnohve tih i leithingnata nantheihpei.
Chuta tunangkhat in kumei khatta dia anleva arilsuunga amahmii khasoh inlaalthlou atlohpei.
Chunna nikchangna mit in nangta aleh ah nakthlakle kholla lonro, alamva nitak apumteta repnangah nakthlakpi ngutva nitakna akhol inkhat amnoh in nichuungna veitu.
Che nikchang kut in nangta aleh ah nakthlakle, tanna lonro, alamva nitak pumte repnanga nakthlakpi ngutva nitakna akhol inkhat amnoh in nangtu nichuungna veitu.”
Chuta kumei kupa laalthlou nanoh a tunangkhat akmei inthrekpi miiva akral amsal amvei, che tunangkhat in anthrekpi kumeita changvaangle kumei laalthlou atlohpeita nankuunga kisonchou.”
Chunna keiin nannihta kisonchou, suita tlohnoh luungve thranoh, ringramkho sonna tlohnohve, alamva Ringpu amna,
thaleikho sonna tlohnohve, alamva amah akehchuunna, Jirulalem slakho sonna tlohnohve, alamva anrol kurung ankhuuboom.
Nikang matuh a suita tlohnohve, alamva nangin sam akmol khatrukho mangou nohle mavom cheknohche.
Chuta nangin ‘Oi’ nitihkha ‘Oisa’ che nangin ‘Ah’ nitihkha ‘Ah veisa’ alamva maannata akralkhava akthranoh tingnasa.”
“ ‘Mit khatvaa angut mit inkhat, ha inkhatvaa angut aha inkhat’ tih i nantheihpei.
Chuta akthranoh miita roujanoh veta kisonchou, chunna tunangkhat in nikchangtongna nimaipi a nakbeengle khattingkho inheia roudohro.
Tunangkhat in nangta atuulmuk ah thlenna nilungluut ansuulta lou dile nilukphaikho malanro.
Che tunangkhat in nangta mel inkhat senoh janoh naktihle innih tihpi melkho sehpiro.
Nangkuunga naknih miita malanro, che amah in nang ningnata apujale inlenga masiinnohro.”
Chuta keiinva niandah miita ringvolro, namtommii khata doi malanro, nangta nantirh miita akthra tlohro, che nangta nak antheihnoh a nakchutmii turelva ngenveta kisonchou.
Chuleva ringramma am nanpa vaa asa veiuchou, alamva amah in akthra leh thranoh anchunga kini amsuuk, che akchimlamseh leh akchimlamseh noh anchunga khu amsuur.
Alamva nangta nakringvol miikhopta ringvolchele jaknang khaan niphahtu amme? Baobeh thrai mii inkho mah chunanga tlohnoh eime?
Che nannih in nan uh nannaota mathruun chouleva aktlei miikuung avah akral jaknangthlou nantloh usa? Baobeh thrai miiluung inkho oinanga tlonoh eime?
Chunna ringramma ak am nanpa in athrat nangjimma nannih inkho akthra veive.”
“Churella nangin daan nitlohlai sinakok leh sorok ah khuung daarnang inpaova mii in paarthra namiveinatu akthra veisin mii nanga tlohnohve, keiin nannihta tak a kitihchou, anmah ankhaan amsa.
Chuta nangin daan nitlohlai nikchang kut in atlohkha jangmeta nikveina kut in romnohso.
Chunna nangin daan nitlohkha inruktea nitloh veiso, che inruktea akmuh nanpa in indanglonga khaan nanimphahtu.”
Chuta nangin ningenlai khumsuunga luutro che inn nikhaarche achikna khumma am nipakuunga ngenro, che inruktea nakmuh nipa in indanglonga khaan namphahtu.
“Chuta nangin ningenlai Ringpu romnoh Jental ei nanga sulla inleng lenga sonnohve; alamva anmah in ansontrong jikcha mii in antheihnatu angen.
Churella anmah nanga veinohve, alamva nang nidarkaarkha ningennoh maa a nanpa in aromkir.
Chunna oinanga ngenve: Ringramma am kan pa, nang nikming akseeng veiso.
Niram huunna thlengso, ringramna nangna nimdonkha thaleichung akho veiso.
Akni akninatu tol mi in kanimlanro.
Che kannih kanleiman antoleita kan ip nanga, leiman kantool kani ipro.
Che madoina a kantlaknoh natu kaniseh piro, chuta akthranoh nata kanithlokro, alamva nang niram kurung huunna leh nituui, che napaarthra ache amnoh. Amen.
Chuta nangin chimnoh aklaal miita ipnohchele ringramna nanpa inkho nani ipnohtu.”

“Mahchuche nangin buh nihellai akthra veisin mii nanga aklah nimeelta mamuh veinohro, alamva anmah in anmai amihuui, chunna buh kanhel tih a mii kuungah amiromna amivei, keiin nannihta atak a kitihchou, anmah ankhaanva amsa.
Chuta nannih in buh nanhellai nanmai phih a nankang thao teive.
Chuleva buh kanhel tih i mii kuungah mamuhnoh uchou, chuta inrukte akmuh nanpa in indanglonga khaan nanimphahtu.”
Chuta veithra in saa a pat aramnanoh, che inruin khoia amiruknanoh ringramma nannihtu akvei lal hansihve.
Alamva nannih nanlal amna a nanrilkho amtu.”
Chuta nanmit in thranohle nantak apumtekho inthimchettu, inthimchet i jikchahphah liinsame!”
Marvaanna va ta anve, anmah in linkho linnoh ei, luhkho luhnoh ei, tom akho mahuunga sihnoh ei, chuta ringramna nanpa in ajokei. Anmah chungva nannih in ralla amuveinoh choume?
Tunangkhat in alah khanna ankaangnatu kiilkhat thun achekme?
Chuleva jarella nannih in puunrei rella lahchoume? Louna reita nannih in madonve anmah in thloukho tlohnoh ei, inchekho incheknoh ei.
Chuta nannihta kitihchou, Solomon in apaarthratna anaamte reipaar inkhatnanga inliingnoh.
Akirua amloteio, mi inva mah i tungva avah taploimeia inhaal tuphao Ringpu in vachah thra mapungsale, nannihvah ralthloia amah in puunrei nanimsilhnoh ume?
Churel nannih in khota isaak ume? Che khota i iin ume? Chunohle khota isilh ume? tih a lah tlohnohve.
Mah poot anaamte ita aktlei jaat in anjon, alamva poot anaamte darkaar tih a ringramna nanpa in arom.
Chuta nannih in matsahremma ringram kurung huunna leh amahvaa akchimlamsehta jonmaanve che mah poot anaamte i nanidaaktu.
“Chunna tungvahna turella insuul tlohnohve alamva tungvahnatu vei avah tungvahnatu rouamsa. Akni aknitu lahna khanna inkhopna veiso.”
Alamva nannih in pichaar nantloh khananga nannihkho nanitlohtu, che nannih in nan olna chaang akhanna nannihta inlengah nanioltu.
Che nang nimit ah thinglip amva madonnoh chea, chuta jarelna niuhnao mit ah thinglip inniimta nianme?
Nang nimit ah thinglip ammangche khatloh a niuhnao mitna thinglip anniimta loutang nitihme?
Akthra veisin miieio! Matsah a nang nimitna thinglipkha loumanro, che niuhnao mitna thinglip iniimkha nilohnatu seenga nimuhtu.
“Akseeng pootta uiiting malannohve chunohle ra–aopiita vok kuungah loonnohve ankeh a chuunna ankhoihtu che inheia invuivia nanithreltu.”
Alamva, aknih mii in anphah, akjon miikhan antuuk, che inkhaar akbeengmii khata amhoongtu.
Nankaara tunangkhat in asa kupa in tol anihta lung amlan ume?
Chunohle naoin nga anihta muruul amlan ume?
Mahchunanga akthranoh apavei choulakho naoningvah akthra kutthol malanta romchoule ringramma am nanpa in aknimii kuunga jikcha ralthloia akthra pootchei nanimlan ume:
Churella nannih in miita nankuunga namitlohja khananga nannih inkho mii kuungah tlohve, alamva mah i Moses trongsuur khatkho ringraan antrong khasa.”
Alamva ansiik kolon khatkho sehna ansiik lam khava ringna vei, che mii steta luut uningei.”
Anmah akrah ah nanromtu, mii in kulingrui nata nganglirah che kuling thingnata thotthing akrah nanritme?
Mahchunanga akthra thingin akrah thra inrah. Chuta akthranoh thingin akrah thranoh inrah.
Akthra thingkhat in thranoh akrah inrahnoh, chunohle akthranoh thingin akrah thra inrahnoh.
Akrah thra inrahnoh thing anaamte phuura meikaara tanna alon.
Churella nannih in akrahnata nanromtu.”
Mahni chunna mii aktam in keining antihtu, ‘Akpu, Akpu, nang nikminga trong akphoong, nang nikminga khousaar amnom che nang nikminga salungkhouna thlou jikcha aktloh miinoh sungme?’
Mahlai chunna keiin indanglonga kison uchou, tlohphunoh aktloh eio, keimah vesa, keiin naniromnoh luungang!”
Che khusuur thliraang thlenga raanna innchunga marat a tuii liinsa, chuta innvah puurnoh alamva innkha lungpii chungah amngirh.
Pekva tungangkhat in kisonita arungeihche aktlohnoh khavah kmongmii nanga philchunga inn aktloh khasa.
Che khusuur thliraang athlengin raanna innchunga marat a tuii liinsa, chunna innkha puursa, mahche tlikkirra inriilsa.”
Alamva amah in ringjih lulokei nangnoh a akchek amneh mii khat veia anmahata amtheih ei.
Jisu in muul inkhatnata atrumlai mii khalmo tam in aknu anjuih.
Che anve, reichii kop mii khat in thlenga Jisu ta mathruunna ason, “Akpu, nangin nimdon veileva keita namthrat chektung.”
Chunna Jisu in akut jamma apalche amahta ason, “Keiin kamdon: thra veirosa.” Che kak hang achunna reichii kopkha thrasa.
Che Jisu in akuunga ason, “Anro, nangin tukhat kuungkho tongnohro: chuta inlenga thiimpu ankuunga nitak mamuhro, che Moses trongthuun nujuih a nithratna kutthol kat a matheih eiro.”
“Akpu, kei roijuih inkhat apangnem thia inchek cheknoh a intolh a am.”
Che Jisu in amahkuunga ason, “Keiin thlenga kamthrattu.”
Raalmii reijapuui in amsang, “Akpu, nangin keiinna nithlengnatu keivah matik chanoh ang. Chuta trong inkhatru nison in kei roijuih in thratu.

Alamva keikho akchek amneh inkhatva athlanga ammangche raalmii in kei kithlanga ammei. Chunna keiin raalmii in khat kuunga ‘Sehro’ ta kison in amah in seh. Aktlei in khat kuunga ‘Varo’ kitih in amah in vaa, kei roijuih inkhatta ‘Mah i tlohro’ kitih in amah in atloh.”
Jisu in mahchuta atheihlai salungkhousa, che amah akjuih ankuunga asonei, “Keiin nannihta atak a kisonchou, mainang malot aja i Israel ankaar akho tuuknoh ang.
Keiin nannihta kitihchou, mah chuvah kulkung leh kulrel nata miitam thlengtuei, che Abraham, Aisaak leh Jakob in kurung huunna ah inbokjou tuei.
Chuta kurung huunna asaeiva apaal anthimna a alontuei. Mahchunna traptruuia anha amikettu.”
Mahchuche Jisu in raalmii reijapuuita ason, “Inlengrosa, nangin nimlot kharella nangkuungah tlung veisaso.” Che mahlaital pung achunna amah roijuihchu thrasa.
Che Jisu in akut apal invah atlun in amahpei. Chunnata inthoua anmahta rou atloh ei.
Khulouhram aphah in khousaar chuung miitam Jisu kuung anthlen. Che amah in trongkhat sonna khousaarta amnommei, che akna miitamta amthratei.
Amah in inih marnop, natna satna anaamte alohpeita ringraan Isaiah in asonkha tlungsa.
Cheva ringjih lulok inkhat in thlenga ason, “Lulok, nangin niseh nilonna anaamte khanna keikho nakjuihtang.”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Uiiramuiivaa ankhur am, marvaanna vakho anbu am, chuta miivaa Asa kupava amah akang asihnatukho amnoh.”
Chunna aroi inkhat in akuunga ason, “Akpu, keiin akthi kipata matsah a seh a phuummaantang.”
Chuta Jisu in amahkuunga ason, “Keijuihro, akthi khavah akthi in phuumeiso.”
Che kak hang achunna tuiiboom chunga aktrang khusuur thliraang amthronpei, cheva mulichu tuiisolh in aphahpei, chuta Jisu vah inna amsa.
Chunna amah aroi in akuunga thlenga amahta mathoua antih, “Akpu, kanikalro! Thisamsung.”
Chuta ankuunga asonei, “Malot trangnoh eio, jarelna intrichoume?” Che Jisu in inthoua thlileh tuiiboomta asaal. Cheva daichritsa.
Che salungkhoua antihpei, “Thlileh tuiiboom inkho asonta amijuih i jakangmii meio?”
Cheva kak hanga anmah in kchirra onga antih, “Ringpu Asa kupa Jisu, kannih kuunga jangtlohtang nitihme? Kanlahnatu lai athlengnoh maa a kannihta kanimlah tangta onna thlengcheme?”
Anmah ankuungnata ste inlabeb a vokjaam anthlai saa a ammei.
Chunna khousaar in Jisu kuunga ngenna anson, “Nangin kanimnom chele vokjaam ankuunga kanluutnatu kanijaro.”
Chunna Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Vaave”. Mahlai anmah in mii ningnata inthruh a vokjaam ankaara luutsei, che kak hanga vokjaam in tuiipiia tlaanna anjungche tuiia inlaak a thisei.
Vokjaam akselmii in intha tlaanna aksuuk thlouleh khousaar asuurmi atak a aksuukthlouta khuuboomma luut a antongpei.
Che anve, khuuboomna mii eiin Jisu ta intuukpinatu sehsei. Cheva anmah in Jisu ta anmuh in anramnata mathlah a asehnatu annoolpei.
Che anve, anmah in apangnem thi mii inkhat, tuklaia matolh a anthlen; anmah in amilotta Jisu in amuhkhan apangnem thimiita Jisu in ason, “Kisakupa, niril malumro; nang nilehkha ki ip peiche.”
Cheva anve, ringjih lulok arouin anmahseeng seengta insonsei, “Mahmii kupa in Ringpu ta usitnoh a trongsa.”
Chuta Jisu in anmah anrilta aromma asonei, “Jarelna nanrilsuunga thranoh namidonme?
Alamva ‘Nang nileh ki ip peiche,’ nohle ‘Inthoua sehro’ ta sonni jaknangin aklaime?
Chuta miivaa Asa kupa in thaleichunga aleh ip achekna tuui amtik nanromnatu — apangnem thimiita Jisu in ason, ‘Inthouro, nantolhnakha choia ni inna inlengrosa.’ ”
Cheva amah in anthohche a inna inlengsa.
Mahchuta miitamin anmuh inva, intrisei, mahche Ringpu ta paar amithratpei.
Chunna Pharisi in mahchuta anmuhlai, amah aroikuunga anson, “Jarelna nannih lulok in roithrai mii eisoh che ale am mii jikchaeisoh buh asaakjoume?”
Chuta Jisu in mahchuta atheih a, anmahta asonei, “Aknanoh mii turel doktar darkaarnoh, chuta akna mii turelva darkaar.
Mah artha i jangasonname seh a romve, ‘Keiin rilvolta kikdit, inkat pootta dinoh ang.’ Alamva keiin akchimlamseh miita ak ong thlengnoh ang, chuta alehchel miita ak ong thlengang.”
Chunna Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Changrisoh inruuijoua an amsootvah changri aruul in lah ajame? Chuta anmah ankuungnata changri alohnatu akni thlengumang, mahlai buh anhel umang.
Tunangkhat inkho amlui puunta akthar puunkirra rouphohnoh ei, alamva anphohna khata dokleva anthritnakha thloia inlonga inthrittu.

Chunohle mii in akthar tuiibuhta amlui savunthongah suunga anlousihme; chuleva tuiibuh sihna savun thongkha koia tuiibuh inleitu, che savunthong khakho maang; chuta anmah in akthar tuiibuhvah savunthong akthar a ansih che annih a thra veitu.”
Chunna Jisu in inthloua amahta ajuihpei, che aroi inkho amahta anjuihpei.
Cheva anve, kum somleinih thii luunga am kumei khat in amah aknua thlenga Jisu apuunpaarta apalpei;
alamva “Keiin apuun paarruta pal angle, thrakhem tung,” ta arilsuunga amdon.
Jisu in inheia kumei khata amuh in akuunga ason, “Rungaak o, niril malumro; nangin namlot kharella nangta namthratpei.” Cheva kak hanga kumeikha thrakhemsa.
Che Jisu in rampuui a inna athlengin, pasi aktumleh miitam inlomma dir dirta am amuh ei,
amah in ason, “Amahta chaive; alamva amah kumei i thinoh chuta inning.” Chunna anmah in Jisu ta aminuihpei.
Chuta miitam inlomta apaalla amithruhche, amah in asuunga luut a kumeisa kutta amtuh, cheva kumeisakha inthousa.
Cheva mah aksuukha mah khanna am ramsiin apumtea seh a antongpei.
Chunna Jisu in innsuungah aluutlai, mitcho in akuungah thlengsei, che Jisu in asonei, “Keiin nannihta kimthrat uchouta namilotme?” Anmah in Jisu kuunga anson, “Oi Jisu.”
Chunna Jisu in anmitta palla asonei, “Nannih in namilot nujuih a nankuunga tlung veiso.”
Chunna anmit inhoongsei che Jisu in ankuunga mathrit a asonei, “Anve, tukhat kuungkho mah i tongnohve.”
Chuta anmah in ohkhannata anthrushoh ram apumtea mahkhata sonna Jisu ta amithangpei.
Che khousaar chuta Jisu in amnom invah, trong theinoh mii in atrong suuksa; cheva miitamin salungkhou seia antihpei, “Israel suunga oinang muhnoh mangme.”
Chuta Pharisi invah, “Khousaar akpuui kurung apaalla amah in khousaarta amnomchekning,” tih a anson.
Amah in miitamta amuh in, anmahta arilvol hangsei, alamva akseel amnoh sadam nanga anmah in inthek invorhtlamsei.
Chunna aroita asonei, “Saang invaat tuphuva khalmo tam amsa, chuta akvaattu miivah steru ningsei;
alamchunna amah asa ang luhna ah thloutlohtu mii amthlahnatu saangluh Akpu kuungah nannih in ngenve.”
Aroi somleinih anmingvah: matsah a Pitar an ong Simon, che amah anao Andriu; Jebidi asa kupa Jems khatkho amah anao John;
Philip mahche Bartholomi; Thomas che roithrai Methiu; Alphias asa kupa Jems, Thadias;
Kanan na Simon, mahche Jisu akjuur Judas Iskariot sei.
chuta mah chuchungva akmaang Sadam Israel ankuunga luutve.
Che nannih in seh a, ‘Ringram huunnakha naisa,’ ta sonna raanve.
Akna mathratve, reichii mathratve, akthi maringve, khousaar manomve. Nannih in khangvaalla nanphah, khangvaalla inpeve.
Nannih in ra–ao slakho, harngou slakho, kuri slakho skhaoa baobeh thunnohve,
nannih in namiruuitu thong nohle, lungluut innih, nohle kekhraang, nohle, sungrolh phurhnohve; alamva thloutloh mii in asaaktuphu aphahkha matikchasa.
Nannih in khuupii nohle khuusuung nanluutlai, matikcha tutu eimeta jonve, che nanseh nohsot mah khanna amve.
Che nannih in innsuung nanluut laia, mathruun eive.
Innsuung khata matikcha eile, nankuungna leh oi kha anchunga phah eiso; chuta matik chanoh eile, nannih leh oi kha nankuunga inlengso.
Che tungangkhat in nannihta nanilounoh a nantrongta lounoh eile, nannih in khuu khannata nohle khuupii khannata nanthruhlai nankehna phil mathiimma mahve.
Keiin tak a kisonchou, pichaarniva mahkhanang khuupii khachunga Sodom leh Komorah ram in ralla adouchek veitu.”
Chuta miita jih a anve, alamva anmah in nannihta jama kaara nanimlantu che anmah in sinakok ah nanihaitu.
Che keiturel nannihta Jental ankuungah sakhi veinatu rampuui mahche kurung anmaikuungah kaia nanithlentu.

Chuta anmah in kaia nanithlenlaia nannih in khatloh a trong tu ungme nohle jangtrongta kanson umeta lah tlohnohve; alamva mahlaital pung achunna nannih in khatloh a trong uchoume nankuungah nanimlantu;
alamva nannih in trongnoh uchou, chuta nan Pa vaa Li in nanimtrongtu.
Pekva unao khat in unao khatta, che apa in asata thihnatu antlohtu, chela ansa in annu anpata janoh a thihnatu antlohtu;
che keiturel nannihta miinaam in nantirh tuei. Chuta tunangkhat in achena phah akdou mii khata akaltu.
Chuta anmah in khuupii suungah nanichutlai aktleia tlaanve; alamva keiin nannihta atak a kisonchou, miivaa Asa kupa in athlengnoh maa a nannih in Israel ankhupiita matangnoh uchou.
aroi inkhat in amah lulok nanga mahche roijuih khat in amah akpunangah amkhan chanasa. Inn akputa anmah in Beljabul ta ongeile, innsuunga ak am miiva jikcha phah thranoh a an ong usame!”
Keiin inthim kaara nankuung kison naamte akvaar kaara trongve; che namikuura nantheihkha innbuung chunga raanve.
Che nannih nanruungva akthatchek chuta nanliva that cheknoh miita trihnohve; mahchunga li leh nanruungta repnangah ammaangchek amahta trihve.
Usak innihta baobeh inkhaturel nanjurhnome? Mah khannata nanpa in amdonnoh avah inkhatrukho tukleia tlanohtu.
Chuta nankangna sam anaamte khakho ateenpei.
Alamchunna intri tlohnohve, nannihvah vasakchung aman chaalchou.”
Chuta tunangkhat in miimai kuunga Khrista ta indahmii khavah keiinkho ringramma am Pa maikuunga indahtung.”
Alamva mii khat in apaso, asakumei inkhat in anusoh, che amou khat in anisoh injanohnatu thlengsang.
Che amah innsuungna mii in a innsuungna miiluungta jekna veitu.
Anu nohle apata keichunga ringvol mii khavah keitu veia matik chanoh, che asa kupa nohle asa kumeita keichunga ringvol miikhakho keitu veia matik chanoh.
Che amah thingkharhta lounoh a kiknu akjuih mii khavah keitu veia matik chanoh.
Amah achaanta inkal akphah mii in maangtu, keirella amah achaan akmaang miikhan inkal aphahtu.”

Ringraan inkhatta ringraan inkhatvaa akminga aklou miikha ringraan inkhatvaa khaan aphahtu. Che akchimlamseh mii khat in akchimlamseh miikhatvaa akmingah aklou miikha akchimlamseh miikhatvaa khaan aphahtu.
Che keiin nannihta atak a kisonchou, tunangkhat in andih kaarna inkhatta amah aroisa tih a tuiidai chapla inkhatru malanle amah akhaan khak maangnohtu.”
che anmah in akuungah anson, “Nangi akthlengsam mii khacheme chunoh a aktleita kanloungaak umangme?”
Jisu in ankuungah amsangei, “Aksuukthlou nannih in nantheihta mahche nanmuhta seh a John kuungah tongve:
mah chuvah mitcho in muh anphahpei, che kehtlik in seh anchekpei, reichii kop in thrasei che makuur akpangin atheihpei, akthi mii in ringsei mahche anrankuunga akthra trong anraanpei.
Che keita keivatnoh miikha doiphah veisa.”
Chunnata anmah in ansehlai miitam ankuungah Jisu in John rella son amthronpei: “Nannih in jangta ak an raprilla sehchoume?
Raphalta thliraang in aklok khatame? Nannih in jangta ak an sehchoume? Lungluut ansuul aksilh miikhatame? Anve, lungluut insuul aksilh miiva kurung koolla amsei.
Nannih in jangta ak an sehchoume? Ringraan inkhattame? Oi, ringraan inkhatchunga akthloita keiin nankuungah kisonpeichou.
Alamva mahmii irella injih a amsa, ‘Anve, nanmaikunga keiin trongraanta kimthlah, amah in nannih nanlam amchaangtu.’
Keiin nannihta tak a kisonchou, kumei in apok kaarnata aklup John chung ralla anrol tukhatkho inthruhnohmang, chuta ringram kurung huunna a andihrem mii khanna amahchungah ralla inrol.
Che aklup John nata pekphah i ringram kurung huunna ah, klah knangin sip a, che inthat insunna namma phahnatu antloh.
Alamva ringraan leh trongsuur in anson naamte aklup John phah a ansonpei.
Chunna nannih in maita roujareita madonchoule mah i akthlengsam Elijah khasa.
Tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso.
Mah chuvah nannih turel pasi kantum chuta nannih in laamnohchou; nannih turel klahsung chuta nannihva sinthruui noh sachou.
Alamva John in thlenga saakho saanoh, iinkho iinnoh, chunna nannih in, ‘Atak a khousaar chuungsa ta nanson.’
Miivaa Asa kupa in saa iinna thlengsa, che anmah in ansonlamang, ‘Anve, anvonpii injaa, tuiibuh inruii, roi akthrai eisoh mahche aleh ammiivaa anpaisa.’ Chuta lousingin amah athlouta amchim.”

Korajin, nangturel lahna veisanoh! Bethsaida, nangturel lahna veisanoh! Alamva salungkhouna thlou nankuungah kitlohkhata Tur leh Sodom nata anmah in bulapuun silh a mahche meivut inbah a mahlai khanna anril anthleng tupotta.
Chuta keiin nannihta kisonchou, pichaarniva nannih khachunga Tur leh Sodom in ralla andouchek veitu.
Che Kaparnaum nangvah ringram phah indomnoh ucheme? Nangta repnang phah a indok uche. Alamva salungkhouna thlou nankuungah kitlohkhata Sodom a tloh angleva mi in phah a Sodom am tupotta.
Chuta keiin kisonchou mah chuvah pichaarni avah Sodom ram in nannih khachunga ralla andouchek veitu.
Oi ajapei Pa, nang nikuungah akthrachu veiso.
Mah naamte i Pa in keikuungah namsilang. Chunna Pa noh a tukhat inkho Asa kupata romnoh ei, che Asa kupa noh a tukhat inkho Pa ta romnoh ei, churella Asa kupa in Apata miikuungah phoong akdit.
Thlou tranga aktloh mahche pootrik akroon naamte keikuungah thlengve, che keiin nannihta inngai kamphah uchou.
Kei rukol nantak ah roonve, che keikuungnata keitamve, alamva keiva kiril tap ang che kiril inneemmang, nannih nanli a inngai nanphahtu.
Alamva kei rukolva aklai che kipootva akjaang.”
Chuta Pharisi in mahchuta anmuh in akuungah anson, “Anro, nang niroi in tlohphunoh Sabat nia antlohpei.”
Chunna Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Devit in mahche amah in anruuipi mii in antraamlai jangthlouta antlohme:
che khatloh a amah in Ringpu inna aluutche thiimpu noh a mahche amah in anruuipi mii inkho saa janoh tol asaakkha nannih in paanohchoume?
Chunohle Sabat niah thiimpu in Ringpu mathruunna thlaamma Sabat nita sakmang amivei maraal amnoh tih a nannih in trongsuur paanohchoume?
Chuta keiin nannihta kitihchou, mah chuvah amah amun inna Ringpu mathruunna thlaamchunga akliin inkhat amsa.
‘Keiin rilvoltheihta kikdit, inkat pootta dinoh ang’ mah ita artha romchouleva, nannih in amaraal amnoh miita malaalnoh uchouta.
Alamva miivaa Asa kupa in Sabat nivaa akpu.”
Che anve, akut inkhattong thi mii khat rouam, anmah in Jisu ta anrui, “Sabat niah akna mathrat ajame?” Mah i Jisu ta amraal jonnatu anson.
Chunna amah in ankuungah asonei, “Nannih nankaarna khatin Sadam khat asih, chuta Sabat niah khurra tlasa, mahchuta kaia aklounohtu tu amchoume?
Mii in sadamchunga khalmo amanchaal nohchoume? Chunnava Sabat nia akthra thlou tlohphu.”
Cheva Jisu in akutthi kupa khata ason, “Nikutkha jamro.” Cheva akutta ajam jn inkhatna khananga thrasa.
Cheva Pharisi in apaalla inthruh a Jisu ta janoh a khatloh immaang umeta intelsei.
che amahta mii amiromnoh natu anmahta matrit a asonei,
Mah i ringraan Isaiah in asonkha atlungnau veisa:
“Anve keiin kichar roijuih, kei kikli in kipelna kirilvol. Amahchungah kei kikli kisihtu, amah in Jental anchunga akchim aphoongtu.
Amah in housuuk a inna ongnohtu, che tukhat inkho lamma ahou rungainoh tuei;
Amah inchek a akchimta amsehnohmiil raphal khalekho tliknohtu, che annaal ruina meikhu thatnohtu,
Che amah akming Jental jatih in amituurna veitu.”
Chunna miinaam in salungkhou seia ansonpei, “Mahmii i Devit vaa Asa kupa meio?”
Chuta Pharisi in mahchuta antheih a anson, “Mahmii in khousaarta manomnoh, chuta khousaarei aklok Biljebul apaalla anmahta amnomei.”
Chuta anmah in amidonta Jisu in aromma ankuungah asonei, “Kurung huunna naamte anroua injanoh a inthrek suukei; che anroua injanoh a inthrek khuuboom nohle inn naamte anroua ngir cheknohtu;
Seitan in Seitanta manomle, anmah in anroua injanoh a inthrektuei; chuleva khatloh a amah kurung huunna in ngir achekume?
Che keiin khousaarta Biljebul appaalla manom angle, nannih nansa kupava tunang apaalla aminomtu? Alamchunna anmah in nannihtu pichaar akpu vei tuei.
Chuta keiin Ringpu vaa Li apaalla khousaarta manom angle, Ringpu kurung huunnakha nankuungah thlengsa.
Chunohle amah in aktrang mii khata makaangnoh maan avah, khatloh a amah inna luut a poot eita sut a lou achekume? Amah khata amkaang maanche innkhanna poot eita sut achektu.
Tunangkhat keisoh inruuinoh mii khavah keita keijanohsa, che keisoh anchunnoh mii khanna akthek.
Churella keiin nannihta kisonchou, miivaa anlehta mahche aleh alah a trongva ki iptu. Chuta Li ta janoh a alehlah aktrong miivaa ipnohtung.
Tunangkhat in miivaa Asa kupata janoh a aktrong khava in iptu, chuta Li Akseengta janoh a aktrong miikhava ipek ringnatluun leh akthlengsam ringnatluun akho in ipnohtu.”
Ruulsokvaa atute eio! Nannihva thranoh choua khatloh akthra trong nanchek ume?
Akthra mii in arilla athra asihkhata amthruh, thranoh mii in arilla thranoh amkhoolkhata amthruh.
Chuta keiin nannihta kisonchou, mah chuvah mii in cheksilnoh a trong anaamte pichaarniah amlantu.
Alamva nang nitrongin nangta namchimtu, mahche nannih nantrong in nannihta nanimlaaltu.”
Chuta Jisu in amsangei, “Akthranoh leh miimei miisa laal ringnatluun in daang anjon, chuta ringraan Jonah daangnoh a daang amnoh.
Alamva Jonah in suun inthum che khulouh inthum akliin nga vonsuungah am. Mahchunanga miivaa Asa kupa in suun inthum che khulouh inthum tuklei rilsuunga amtu.
Nineveh na mii in mah ringnatluun na mii eisoh pichaarniah inthruh tuei che anmah amiraal amilantu alamva Jonah in trong araanlai anmah in ril anthleng. Che anve, Jonah chungah akliin mii khat amsa.

Akhuna kurungpii in mah ringnatluun na mii eisoh pichaarnia inthruhtuei che amiraal amilantu alamva amah in thaleiram akiingnata Solomon lousing rungeihnatu thlengsa. Chunna Solomon chungah akliin mii khat amsa.”
Chunna amah in ason, ‘Keiin kanthruhna inna veikhat inlengtang.’ Che amah in anlenglai, innkha tlenga inthiira thratea louam antuukpipei.

Chunna inlenga amahchunga akthranoh li sirihsoh inruuia thlengsa, che anmah in luut a amsei; mahchu aknua mahmiichu matsahna chunga ralla thranoh veisa. Chunna mah thranoh ringnatluun ikho maisoh intrimma veitu.”
Chuta tumekhat in Jisu ta ason, “Anro, nang ninu mahche ninao eiin nangta naktrongpinatu apaalla ngirra amsei.”
Chuta Jisu in amsang, “Kei kinu mahche kinaochu tuseime?”
Cheva Jisu in aroi ankuungah akut khoh a asonei, “Onna ak am ei i kinu mahche kinaosei!
Alamva tungangkhat in ringramma am Pa in amdon aktloh miikha kei kinao, kisar mahche kinusei.”
Che miitam in akuungah inlomma inchunsei, chunna amah in muli inkhat suunga luut a inboksa; che miitamvah tuiiboom apaalla ngirra amsei.
Che amah in pandam jikcha tloh a ankuungah sonei, “Mii khat in chi avorhnatu sehsa.
Che chi avorh in chi arouva lamkomma tla, cheva va in thlenga anchunpei.
Arouin lungkaara tla, mahchunna philtam amnoh a intha moongei alamva tukleisuungah tluumma luutnoh,
chuta kini in ansat in kaangsei; alamva akjung amnoh a chaarsei.
Che arouin kuling kaara tlaei, che kuling in moonga ahipkirpei.
Chuta aktleiva akthra leipiia tla a akrah khalmo inrahsei, che arouin ahuum inkhat ah ahuum reija, arouin sopruk, che arouin sopthum inrah.
Tunangkhat in aroungeihnatu amkuur a am miikhan rungaiso.”
Jisu in amsangei, “Ringram huunna anthuptrong nanromnatu nankuungah mah i kamlanpeichou, chuta anmah ankuung avah malannoh angei.
Alamva tunangkhat tam aksihkuungah kimlan mahche amah in ralthloia asih, chuta tunangkhat aksihnoh kuunga malannoh ang, chunna amah kuungah ak am khakho kilohtu.
Churella ankuungah pandam veia trongsang. Alamva anmah in muhre rea muhnoh ei, theih rerea rungainoh ei, che lou theihnoh ei.
Ringraan Isaiah in asonkha anmah ankuungah tlungsa mah chuvah: ‘Nannih in tak a rungaivah nanrungeihtu chuta lou theihnoh uchou, che muhvah nanmuhtu chuta romnoh uchou.
Alamva amah anril i kitalsei, amikuur trangsei, che anmah anmit insiinsei, anmah anmit in muh ah, amikuur in rungaia anrilla amiluutche inhei tupotei. Chuleva anmahta keiin kamthrat tupotei.’
Alamva keiin nannihta atak a kisonchou, mah chuvah ringraan mahche akchimlamseh in nannih in nanmuh ita muh andit chuta muh phahnohsei, che nanrungeih ita rungai andit chuta rungai cheknohsei.”
Tunangkhat in kurung huunna trongta arungeih in rom acheknoh invah, akthranoh khatin thlenga arilsuunga avorhta sut a atlaanpei; mah chi akphah i lamkomma aktla chikhasa.
Chuta lungkaara aktla chi in trong arungeihche intha a roomthoksoh inruuia arouloh;
chulata akjung thuuk a tlanoh, churel kakruta adouning, alamva klah knang mahche trong irella inchut jikcha athlenglai amahningvah intha a aningdongna veisa.
Pekva kuling kaara chi aktla in trong atheihche tukleiramma ringnaleh doon khaalna rilkhanna trongkhata akrah marahnohsa.
Chuta akthra leipiia aktla chikhanna trongkhata arungeihche arom. Chunna athloua akrah inrah arouin reija, arouin sopruk, mahche arounin sopthum amsuuk.”
chuta mii in an ihsuunga amah jekna in thlenga kihukaara inlouchi vorh a amahche inlengsa.
Chuta chi in moonga anrollai, inloukho indangsa.
Chunna lou Akpu vaa roijuih in amah kuungah thlenga ason, ‘Lulok, nanglouva akthra chita vorhnoh cheme? Che khatloh a inlouchita moongseime?’
Amahta ason, ‘Mah i jekna mii khat in atlohpei.’ Chunna amah roijuih in akuungah ason, ‘Chuleva kannih in seh a inlouta phoia matlonnatu nakson ungme?’
Chuta amah in asonei, ‘Ah, inlou nanphoi namitlonlai kihukho jaoa inphoitu.’
Chi luhnohmiil moongeiso! Chiluh aphahlai akvaat aksirmiita kisontuei, matsah a inlouta matlonna meia nanhaalnatu akhuh a kaanve, chuta kihuva kei tomsuunga bunve.”
Mah i chi anaamte kaara andihrem, chuta amoong laiva aktlei inlouchung inrolh che thing veisa, mahche marvaanna va in thlenga abaak ah anbu antloh.”
Mah i ringraan in asonkhata atlungnatu relnasa, mah chuvah: “Keiin pandameita kisonnatu kbao aangtung. Tukleiram amthron lainata mathup a asih eita keiin kisontu.”
Cheva Jisu in miitamta mathlah a inn khat ah luutsa. Che aroi in amahkuunga thlenga anson, “Louna inlou pandamkha invuia kanimtheihro.”
Anmahta amsangei, “Akthra chita akvorhkha miivaa Asa kupasa;
louin tukleiramsa, che akthra chi in kurung huunnavaa asa kupasei; inlouin akthranohvaa asa kupasei,
inlouchi akvorhkha seitansa; akvaat aksir in tukleiramtu achenasa, mahche akvaat akluh in ringroisei.
Chunna inlouta matlonna meiah haal khananga nga tloh a chupkha achena ah veitu.
Miivaa Asa kupa in amah ringroita amthlahtuei, che aleh ah tlaakna khatkho thranoh aktloh eita amah kurung huunna amunnata amtlontuei,
che anmahta kthih amnoh meimunna anthlaktuei; mahchunna traptruuia anha amikettu.
Che akcimlamseh miiva anmah anpa kurung huunna ramma kini nanga intle usei. Tunkhat arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso.”
“Ringram huunna i lou inkhat ah inthup a am, mah chuvah tunangkhat in aktuukche veikhat mathup a asih lalnangsa; che amah in aroomthok rella seh a adoon naamte ajurhche lou inkhat aklei.
“Veikhatlakho, ringram huunnava kthra mukta inkhat jonna akjuur miinangsa,
Amah in amantam muktakhat aktuukche seh a adoon naamte juura achuungnatu amlatmii nangsa.
toroin asiplai ngaman mii in tuiipaalla toro kaia inbok a akthrata pupok suungah anthun chuta akthranohvah anlon.
Chunna chup achenakho nga tloh a veitu, ringroi in thlenga akthranoh eita akchimlamseh ankaar nata athrektuei.”
Che anmahta meimunna athlaaktuei, mah amunkhanna anmah in traptruuia anha amikettu.
Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Mah anaamte i nannih in bahab tlasachoume?” Anmah in akuungah anson, “Oi, Akpu.”
Chunna Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Ohchurella ringram huunna rella akrom ringjih lulok anaamte innpu inkhat in amah lal akthar leh amlui amthruh nangsa.”
che Jisu in amah ramboomma athlenglai, anmah sinakok ah anmahta amtheih ei, chunna anmah in salungkhoua anson, “Mahmii in ramna lousing leh akchek amneh thlouta aphahmeio?”
Mahmii i thingchal inkhatvaa asa kupa nohme? Anuin Meri nohme? Che anao in Jems, Joses, Simon mahche Judas noh eime?
che asar naamtein inihsoh inruuijounoh eime? Chunnava mahmii in ramnata anaamte i aphahmeio?
Chunna amahta ril amisokpei. Chuta Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Ringraan inkhatta amah ramboom tak in mahche ataploikung mii in injahnoh ei,
anmah in amilotnoh kharella mah khanna salungkhouna thlou tlohnohsa.”
che amah roijuihta asonei, “Mahmii i aklup John khasa; amah in thinata ringsa, alamchunna salungkhouna thlou tlohnatu tuui naamte amah kuungah amsa.”
Alamva Herod in anao Philip akmei Herodia rella John ta suura makaanga simma asih.
Alamva John in akuunga ason, “Nangin amahta nikmei veia niloh i janoh.”
Churella amah in John ta ringraan mii khat veia ateen.
Chuta Herot in apokna akni ahoonglaia, Herodia vaa asakumei in anmaikuungah laam che Herot ta ampelpei.
Chunna amah in anihchu kamlantuta Herot in akuunga trongchetsoh inruuia suita atlohpei.
Chunna amah in anu cherol nujuih a ason, “Tarpeng in khat chungah aklup John vaa akang kamlanro.”
Cheva kurung aril tlannohsa; chusalakho amah in suita atlohpei taningva mahche rapkheina akthlengei rella mahchuta akuunga malannatu jathang atlohpei;
Che sim suungah am John vaa ariing tannatu mii amthlahpei.
Che John akangta tarpeng khat chungah thlenna rungaaksa kuungah amilanpei che mahchuta anukuungah athlenpei.
Cheva John aroi in thlenga amah aruungta anlohche anphumpei, che Jisu kuungah seh a antongpei.
Che Jisu in asehlai miitam amuh ei; chunna anmahrel Jisu in arilvol hangsei che anmah annat ansatna amthratei.
Khulouhram aphah in aroi in thlenga akuungah anson, “Maiva miihou miila intheihlouna amun, pekva thilsa; anmah in khuu khuua luut a ansaaktuphu anleinatu mathlah eirosa.”
Chuta Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Anmah in ansehnatu darkaar amnoh, anmah kuungah ansaaktuphu malaneive.”
Chunna anmah in Jisu ta anson, “Inih tol ranga leh nga innihruta onna amning.”
Jisu in “Mahchuta maanna keithlenve” ta asonei.

Cheva amah in miitamta meiphul chunga maboknatu jathang amlanei; Jisu in tol ranga leh nga innihta alohche ringramma ahan an, amah in doi amlan mahche khoia aroita amlanei, che aroiin miitam ankuunga ansempei.
Chunna annaamte in saa a anvon invahsa. Che anmah in anlei andihdah amitlonin luktoong somleinih sip.
Mah aksaa eichu kumei maksi leh nao teenpinnoh a akpul rangavak ei.
Che miitamta Jisu in amlenglai, amah in muul in khat chungah ngennatu kalsa. Che khulouhram aphah in amunchunna akrouningsa,
chuta mahsuungah mulivah tuiiboom alaia tuiisolh inlek a asihpei, alamva thliraangsoh intuuksa.
Che khulouh nivaartum pung inthum atlaklaia Jisu in ankuungah tuiiboom chung akeh ah seh a thleng.
Chuta tuiiboom chunga seh a thleng anmuh in anril lah a anson, “Mah i kukthlasa, che anmah in trih a ongsei.”
Chuta Jisu in kak hang ankuunga asonei, “Nanril matrangve, keisang; intrinohve.”
Che Pitar in amah kuungah amsang, “Akpu, nangcheleva, tuiichunga seh a nikuungah kivaanatu jathang kamlanro.”
Chunna Jisu in ason, “Varo.” Che Pitar in mulinata trumma Jisu kuung avanatu tuiichungah sehsa.
Chuta amah in thliraang amuh in intrisa, cheva tuiia anphuumsam invah onga ason, “Akpu keikalro!”
Che kak hanga Jisu in akut ajamche matuh a ason, “Malot a inleu nango, jarella niril intluunnoh cheme?”
Che anmah in mulisuung anluutlai thlikho inngaisa.
Cheva mulisuunga ak am in Jisu kuungah thlenga mathruunna anson “Atak a nangvah Ringpu vaa Asa kupache.”
Che amunchunna mii in Jisu ta anromma anmah in anramma ak amiita trong amithuunpei mahche akna naamte amah kuungah anthlen.
Che anmah in Jisu apuunta anpalnatu amah kuungah anngen. Che amah apuunrei akpaleita amah in amthratei.
“Jarelna nang niroi eiin anpa anpu in ansehna thlou ankhoihme? Alamva anmah in tol ansaaklai ankut silnoh ei.”
Chuta Jisu in ankuungah amsangei, “Sehna thlouin alamveia jarelna Ringpu vaa trongthuun nankhoihme?
Alamva Ringpu trongthuun in son, ‘Nannu nanpata injahve,’ che ‘Tunangkhat in anu nohle apata phool tlohle, mahmii khavah thiso.’
Chuta nannih in nanson, ‘Tunangkhat in anu nohle apata, kei ningnata akchuung nanphahphuta Ringpu kuungah kakatpei tihleva amah in apa injahna darkaar amnohsa.’
Nga tloh a nannih in sehnathlou khanna Ringpu trongta jakhatkho maveinohchou.
Akthra veisin eio! Ringraan Isaiah in nannih turel thratea aphoongpei:
‘Mahmii eiin annar avah keita kanjonang, chuta anril avah kikuungnata inlasei;
Che anmah in miivaa trongsuurta amitheih che keita sulla kamithruunang.’ ”
Chunna Jisu in miitamta onga asonei, “Rungaia bahab tlave:
narra akluut trongin miita sakmang maveinoh, chuta narnata anthruh khanna miita sakmang amvei.”
Chunna amah aroiin akuungah thlenga anson, “Mah nison ita antheih lai Pharisi anril ansok i niromnohme?”
Chuta amah in amsangei, “Ringramma am Pa in alinnoh thing anaamte aktangtu.
Nga am eiso; anmahvah mitchoin aching mitchosei, chunna mitcho in mitchota lamchingleva khurra tlatuei.”
Chunna Pitar in amah kuungah ason, “Mah pandam i kankuunga invuia kanisonro.”
Chunna Jisu in asonei, “Nannihkho pekphah mah i bahap tlanoh mangchoume?
Bao suungah akluut naamte vonpiiah luut, che ruungnata inthruh tih a romnoh mangchoume?
Chuta baonata anthruhpot anaamte rilsuungnata thlengning, che mii in sakmang amivei.
Alamva rilsuungnata akthranoh miithat, kumei kupa laal, miimei miisa laal, inru inraan, chimnoh a sakhi malan, miirilh miiloonna trong.
Miita sakmang amvei i mah anaamte isa, chuta kut silnoh a saa invah miita sakmang maveinoh.”
Che anve, Kanaan na kumei khat in thlenga onga Jisu kuungah ason, “O Akpu, Devit vaa Asa kupa, Keita niril kamvolro, alamva kisakumei khousaar chuunga khalmo akchutpei.”
Chuta Jisu in trong inkhatkho masangnohsa. Che aroiin thlenga akuungah ngenna anson, “Kumei i mathlahrosa, alamva iknungah ong onga amsa.”
Amah in amsangei, “Israel innsuunga akmaang Sadam khoptua keita kamthlah ang.”
Chuta kumei in thlenga amthruunche ason, “Akpu, kamjoomro.”
Che amah in amsang, “Naoei tolta louva uii ankuungah lon thranoh.”
Che kumei in ason, “Oi Akpu, uiiluung inkho anmah akpu tebornata aktla akningta ansaak.”
Chunna Jisu in kumei kuungah amsang, “Kumeio, nangin namlot i khalmoa liin! Nangin nikditkha nangkuungah tlung veiso.” Cheva kak hanga asa kumeita thrasa.
Chunna miitam kehtlik, mitcho, trongtheihnoh, mipuhnoh aktlei jikcha akehkungah thlenna amitlolh mahche Jisu in amthratei,
chunna trongtheihnoh in trong suuksei, mipuhnoh in mipuhsei, kehtlik in sehsei, che mitcho in muh anphahchuta anmuh in Israel vaa Ringpu ta paar amithratpei.
Chunna aroiin akuungah anson, “Vachah miitam ita anvahnatu mah rapril in ramna tol iktuuk ume?”
Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih tol jikcha nansih mangme?” Che anmah in anson, “Tol sirih leh nga andih ste am.”
Che miitamta tukleia maboknatu jathang amlanei.
Che amah in tol sirih leh ngata loua Ringpu ampaakche khoia aroita amlanei, che aroiin miitamta amilanpei.
Che annaamte in invah a ansaakche, anmah in akirkaar amichun luktoong sirih sip a amilei.
Mah aksaa eichu kumei maksi leh nao teenpinoh a mii akpul manlivak ei.
Che Jisu in miitamta amthlah eiche muli inkhat a chuunga Makadan ramma sehsa.
Jisu in ankuungah amsangei, “Khulouhram aphah in nannih in nanson, ‘Kini in aangsa; nihoongi thrasa.’
Che ‘Juktiinga nihoongi thranoh alamva marvaan in aang che olthem am.’ Akthra veisin eio! Nannih in marvaan ni ahoongva anna rom nanchek, chuta nannih in daangvaa lai mahche ahoongva romnohchou.
Akthranoh leh miimei miisa laal ringnatluun in daang nanjon, chuta ringraan Jonah daangnoh a daang nanimlan nohtung.” Che anmahta mah a sehsa.
Chunna Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Pharisi leh Sadukiis ancholkha cheksilve,”
cheva anmahseeng seeng intella insonsei “Alamva inih in tolkho choinohsame.”
Chuta Jisu in mahchu aromma ankuunga asonei, “Ah, malot ah trangnoh eio, jarella nannih seengta intella amchoume, alamva nannih in tol thlennoh choume?
Nannih in tol ranga a mii akpul ranga mahche luktoong jikchah nanhomme bahaptla intheihnoh choume?
Chunohle tol sirih ah mii akpul manli, che anrol luktoong jikchah nanhomme bahaptla intheihnoh choume?
Keiin tol rella trongnoh ang tihvah khatloh a nannih in nanromme? Chuta nannih in Pharisi mahche Sadukii ei cholta cheksil tupotchou.”
Chunna Jisu in anmahta chol jao tolta sonnoh chuta Pharisi mahche Sadukiis amtheihnata asonta bahab tlasei.
Chunna anmah in anson, “Mii arouin aklup John, arouin Elijah, che aktlei in Jeremiah nohle ringraan ankaarna inkhatche nantih ei.”
Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Chuta nannih invah keita tunangme nantih angme?”
Cheva Simon Pitar in amsang, “Nangva akring Ringpu vaa Asa kupa Khrista che.”
Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Simon Bar Jona! Doiphahkha nangche, alamva ruung leh thii in nangta nakphoongnoh, chuta ringramma am Pa in nangta nakphoongpei.
Che keiinkho nangta kisonche, mah chuvah nangvah Pitar che, chunna kei khakla i mah lungpii chungin kimthrungtu, che akthivaa tuui in nangta nakcheknohtu.
Keiin ringram huunna chapi kamlan uche, chunna nangin thaleichungah nikhitkha ringram akho inkhittu, nangin thaleichungah nak annohkha ringram akho veitu.”
Chunnata Jisu i Khrista sa tih a tunangkhat ankuung akho anmah in ansonnoh natu aroita akchaak ei.
Chunna Pitar in Jisu ta athleipiche amahta saalla son amthronpei, mahchuva, “Akpu, mahchunang nikuungah veinohtu, nikuungnata inla veiso.”
Chuta Jisu in Pitar kuungah anheiche ason, “Seitan, kikuung nata inheirosa! Nangin keita nakvat ang, alamva nangva Ringpu tingnanohche, chuta miitu veia nimdon.”
Alamva tunangkhat in amah achaan ankaljale mahkha maangtu, chuta keirella amah achaan mathlah miikhan aringna aktuuktu.
Alamva mii khat in tukleiram apumte aphahche amah achaanta maangle, amakuunga jangachuungnah amme? Nohle mii khat in amah achaanta jaknangsoh amthleng ume?
Alamva miivaa Asa kupa in Apavaa paarthra a amah ringroisoh inruuia thlengtu che amah in mii eita amah amah athlou nujuih a khaan amlantu.
Keiin nankuungah tak a kisonchou, onna akngirmii arouin miivaa Asa kupa in amah ringram kurung huunna a athlenglai anmuhnohsot thikha matemnoh tuei.”
Che anmah maikuunga amah ameel tleisa, Jisu vaa amai kini nanga intle che apuunrei in kvaar nanga inngousa
Che anve, Moses leh Elaiah in Jisu soh inruuia tronga am anmuh.
Cheva Pitar in Jisu kuungah ason, “Akpu inih in onna iam thratu, nangin jacheleva, onna thiil inthum seemtang, inkhat in nangtu, inkhat in Moses tu che inkhat in Elaiah tu.”

Amah in atrongsuung, anve, antle sumphai in anmahta amlihpei, che kak hanga sumphai kaarnata hou inkhat in thlenga ason, “Mah i keiin khalmo kirilvol Kisakupa, amah kuungah keiin pelsang, amah in ason rungaive.”
Che aroiin mahchuta antheih lai, anmai makhup a khalmo intrisei.
Chuta Jisu in thlenga anmahta palla asonei, “Inthouve, intrinohve.”
Che anmah in inthoua an anlai Jisu noh a tukhatkho muhnohsei.
Anmah in muulnata antrumsuunga Jisu in trong asonei, “Miivaa Asa kupa in thinata aringnosoot mah ahamuh i tukhat kuungkho sonnnohve.”
Che aroi in Jisu ta anrui, “Chuleva Jarella ringjih lulok in Elaiah matsah a thlengtu antihme?”
Amah in amsangei, “Elaiah in matsah a thlengtu, mahche poot anaamte amlengtu;

chuta keiin nankuungah kitihchou, mah chuvah Elaiah va thlengchesa, anmah in amahta louromnoh ei, chuta anmah in antlohja akuungah antloh. Chunanga miivaa Asa kupakho anmah ankut a klah knang aphahtu tla.”
Chunna Jisu in aklup John rella trongsa tih a aroiin anrompei.
“Akpu, kisa kupata niril mavolro, alamva amahta surpitumma klahsa; che amah in injomma mei leh tuiikaara luut.
Chunna keiin amahta nang niroi ankuungah kithlen, chuta anmah in mathrat cheknohsei.”
Chunna Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Ah, malot amnoh chimnoh akseh ringnatluun nannihsoh jikcha soot a keiin am umang angme? Amahta keikuungah keithlenve.”
Cheva Jisu in khousaarta asaal, mahche amah ningnata inthruhsa, che mah laitalla naochu thrasa.
Chunna Jisu kuungah aroiin inrukte thlenga anson, “Jarelna kannih in khousaarta manom cheknoh ungme?”

Amah in ankuungah asonei, “Nannih in namilotnoh relna. Alamva keiin nannihta tak a kitihchou, nannih in intrammu tuihru malotchoule muultumta nantihtu, ‘Onnata ousonna inlenro’ che mahchu inlentu, che nankuungah veinohtu jakhatkho amnohtu.
Chuta mainangi huh hella ngennoh avah tikniakho veinohtu.”
che anmah in anthattu, mahche nithum tihpia amah in ringtu.” Ohchuna anrilsok a klahsei.
Anmah in Kaparnaum a anthlenglai, Ringpu mathruunna thlaamma sekel aher akthrai in Pitar kuungah thlenga ason, “Nannih lulok in roithaang malannohme?”

Amah in ason “Oi, athaang.” Che amah in innsuung aluutlai Jisu in akuungah ason, “Simon nangin jangta nimdonme? Thaleiramna kurung eiin tuningnata roithaang anlohme? Anmah ansakuung name chunohle aktlei ningnata anlohme?”
Pitar in Jisu kuunga ason, “Rapkheimii ankuungnata amithaang.” Chunna Jisu in akuungah ason, “Chunohleva ansakupava khangvalmii veisei.

Chusalakho inih in anmahta thlouvat eveinoh nahtu tuiiboomma seh a kuui thaangro, che matsah nikai ngakha abao ma aanga nianlai nangin baobeh apumkhat niktuuktu, mahchu loua nangleh keiturel ankuunga malanro.”
Chunna Jisu in andihnao khatta anmah ankaara onga ambok,
che asonei, “Keiin nankuungah tak a kitihchou, nannih in nao nanga inlenga nanveinohmiil, nannih in ringram kurung huunna ah luut janohluung uchou.
Churella tunangkhat in andihnao nanga atak ah inruruh amahkhavah ringram kurung huunna ah anrolremsa.
Tunangkhat in keiminga mainang andihnao khatta roulouleh amah in keita keilohpei.”
Miita madoia aleh ah akthlak tukleiram i lahnasa ah! Alamva madoi i thlengnoh janoh.

Nang nikut nohle nikeh in aleh ah nakthlakle mahkha tanna nang ningnata lonro, nikut innih nohle nikeh innih in nangta athih amnoh meikaara nakthlaktu ngutva, nikut tua nohle nikeh tua ringna ah niluut in nangtu akthra veitu.
Che nimit in nangta aleh ah nakthlakle, nang ningnata kholla lonro; nimit innih in repnanga nangta nakthlak ngutva, nimit inkhatru amma ringna ah niluut in nangtu akthratna veitu.”
Alamva miivaa Asa kupa in akmaang khata kalnatu thlengsa.
Nannih in jangta namidonme? Mii inkhat in Sadam reija asih, che ankaar nata inkhat maangsa, amah in sopkulei kuta amahche akmaang khatta muulla seh a jonnoh ume?
Keiin nannihta atak a kitihchou, mah chuvah amah in invainoh a ak am sadam sopkulei ku khachunga inkhat aktuukhan thloiralla aroomthokna veinoh ume?
Chunanaga andih naoei ankaar nata inkhat maangkha ringramma am Pa in amdon veinoh.”
Chuta amah inta nitrong rungainohle, nangsoh inruuia mii inkhat nohle innihnata akralla thlengpiro. Chuleva nangin nisontrong anaamtekha innih nohle inthumma mangirhnatu sakhi veitu.
Che amah inta antrong rungai indahle khakla ah sonro, chuta amah in khakla akho nitrongta rungai indahle; niuhnaokha Jental leh roi akthrai mii nanga veisaso.”
Veikhatlakho nankuungah kisonchou, mah chuvah nannih in jangmekhat thaleichunga mii innih in inja a ngenchoule, ringramma am Pa in ankuunga am veitu.
Alamva keimingah mii innih nohle inthum nanchunna khannna keikho ankaara amsang.”
Jisu in akuungah ason, “Keiin nikuungah veisrihru naktihnoh ang, chuta sirih kha sopsrih phaoa kitihche.”
Amah in hmapulna teen amthronlai, talen akpulsom intool mii khat akuungah anthlen;
amah in siin acheknohrel Akpu in roijuihta amah akmei, asa ei mahche adoon akhaal naamte juura asiinnatu jathang amlan.
Chunna roijuih in amaikuungah akhuk makamma antolhche ason, ‘Akpu, kakru thoa keingaakro, anaamte naksiin kirtang.’
Chunna roijuih akpuin amahta aringvol hanga amthlahpei.
Chuta amah roijuihtal khanna seh a, amah denari reija antool aruul roijuih mii khat kuungah thlengsa mahmii chuta suura aruking raak a atih, ‘Nangin nantool baobehkha keisiinrosa.’
Che aruul roijuih in akehkungah intolh a amthruunche atih, ‘Kakru thoa keingaakro, keiin anaamte naksiin kirtang.’
Chuta amah in indah a, asehche aleiman antool naamte asiinnohsot amahta sim a asihpei.
Chunna aruul roijuih eiin aksuuk chuta anmuh in khalmo anril asokpeia aksuuk naamte akpu kuungah thlenga antongpei.
Chunna Akpu in amahta aongche ason, ‘Akthranoh roijuih, nangin kikuungah ningenrel keiin leiman nantol anaamte ki ipche.
Keiin nangta kiringvol nanga nangkho niruul roijuihta niringvol phunohme?’
Che amah akpu in amlung inhaanga amah in leiman antol asiinnoh miil aminang natu ankuungah amsilpei.
Chunna nannih in nan uh nannaota ril luut a ipnoh choule, ringramna Pa inkho mah khananga nanitlohtu.”
che miitam in amah aknuta anjuih, che ohkhanna anmahta amthratei.
Pharisi inkho amahta chaang anna veia anrui, “Mii khat in jangmekhat rella akmei inthrekpi i trongsuur in ajame?”
Che matsahrem akseem Akpu amah in kupa khatkho kumei aseemta Jisu in ankuungah amsangei.
Che mahchunang relna “Kupa inkhat in anuleh apa mathlah a akmeisoh amjoutu che anmah anruung innihkhata inkhat vei tuei” tih i nannih in paanohchoume?
Chunnava anmah in mii innihnohsei, chuta ruungkhat veisei. “Oirella Ringpu in amchunkha tukhat inkho threknohso.”
Anmah in Jisu kuunga anson, “Chuleva jarella Moses in inthrekna anjih rai malanna mathlahveta trongthuun amlanme?”
Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih nanril atrangrella Moses in nanmeisoh inthrek amja, chuta matsahrem avah ngata veinoh.

Che keiin nannihta kisonchou: tunangkhat in akmei miisoh leengnohta anthrekpiche, aktlei inkhatta changvaang miikha miimei laalthlou atlohche anthrekpi kumeita changvaang khakho miimei laalthlou atloh.”
Jisu aroiin akuungah ason, “Kupa inkhat in akmeisoh mahchunang veile changvaangnoh in thra.”

Alamva anmah in annu vonsuung nata aksarh inseemma akpok ammei, che mii in aksarh inseemkho ammei, che ringram kurung huunna turel anmah anruungin aksarh akseemkho ammei. Mah ita akromchek mii khanna mah i louso.”
Chuta Jisu in ason, “Andihnao eikha kikuungah thlengeiso, anmahta khaamnoh eive, alamva ringram kurung huunakha anmahnang anta.”
Che amah in anchungah kut asihche mah chunnata sehsa.
Chunna Jisu in akuunga ason, “Jarelna keita akthra tih a nak ong angme? Ringpu noh a tukhatkho akthra amnoh. Chuta nangin ringna phah dichele trongthuunkha majuihro.”
Amah in Jisu ta ason “Jaknangme?” Jisu in ason, “Nangin mii thatnohro, nangin miimei miisa laalnohro, nangin inrunohro, nangin chimnoh sakhi malannohro,
nangin ninu napata injahro, che nanthringpi miita nitaknanga ringvolro.”
Intlangsa in Jisu ta ason, “Mah naamte ivah nao kivei lainata juih a thlengsang; pek kimjuihtu akvaat jangam mangme?”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Nangin ralla akthra dichele, nangin nidoon naamte juura anranriing mii kuungah malanro, che thlenga kiknu keijuihro, nang nilal ringramma louamtu.”
Chuta intlangsa in mah asonchuta atheihlai aril lah a inlengsa. Alamva amahvah khalmo doonkhaal mii.
Che veikhatlakho kisonchou, akdoon mii khat in ringram kurung huunna ah luutchunga vaksa inkhat in kukthrimpo ah luut in aklai.”
Jisu aroiin mahchuta antheih lai khalmo salungkhoua anson, “Chuleva tunang in inkal achekume?”
Chuta Jisu in anmahta antlinga asonei, “Miikuung avah mah i veinohtu thlou, chuta Ringpu avah bilam naamte veikir.”

Churel Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Keiin nannihta atak a kitihchou, mah chuvah akthar tukleiramma miivaa Asa kupa in amahvaa paarthra phompiiah anboklai, kiknu keijuih nannih in phompii somlei innih ah inbok a Israel sakhei somlei innihta pichaar nantlohtu.
Che keiturel a inn, alou, auh anao, anu apa, akmei asa, khatkho aram amuul amthlah mii in reija ah reija chaang anphahtu, che ache amnoh ringna anphahtu.
Chuta tukhat matsah mii in juktooltu, che juktool mii in matsahtu.”
Amah in thlou aktlohtu miisoh nikhat kutlang baobeh injana hoonga amah in ngangli billa amseh ei.
Che amah in pung kuvak atlaklai keithiil munna seh a jakhatkho tlohnoh a ngirra am amuh ei.
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Nannihkho ngangli billa sehve che thlou tlohve chunna nanphahtu phukha kamlan uchou” chunna anmah in sehsei.
Veikhatla amah in pung somleinih leh pung inthumvak akho amah in seh a juktiingna nanga atloh.
Che pung rangavak jakhatkho tlonoh a talla ngirra am ankuungah asonei, “Nannih in jakhatkho tlonoh a jarella nikhat suuntla ngirra amchoume?”
Anmah in akuungah asonei, “Alamva tukhat inkho kannihta thlou tlohnatu kanisonnoh ei.” Amah in ankuunga asonei, “Nannihkho ngangli billa sehve, che thlou tlohve nanphahtuphu kamlan uchou.”
Chunna khulouhram aphahlai nganglibil akpuin amrel akputa ason, “Thlou aktlohmii onga juktoolnata matsah phah nikhat antlohman malaneiro.
Che pung rangavak ah akthleng mii in nikhat kutlangna baobeh anphah.
Chuta matsah a akthleng miiva thloia anphahphu, chuta aktleisoh intrimma baobeh anphah.
Che anmah in mahchuta anphahlai, ram akpu kuunga insoa antih,
Juktoolla akthleng mii in pung inkhatruta antlohning, che nangin anmahta nikhat antlohna amanleh kini insa kanimrat akdou kannihsoh nimtrim.
Chunna ankaarna inkhatta amah in ason, Ruul o, keiin nankuunga chimnoh tlohnoh ang, nangleh keiin nikhat kutlang manna injanoh meme?
Nangta jikchahme loua inlengrosa, nikuunga kimlan nanga juktoolna miikho malan kikdit.
Kitak in dia madonna kitloh i janohme? Chunohle kiril athratrelna nimit intaangsme?
Chunna juktool in matsahtu mahche matsah in juktooltu, alamva mii khalmo tam aong, chuta steruta achartu.”
“Anve inih in Jerulalem a seh ume; che miivaa Asa kupata akthloi thiimpu mahche ringjih lulok ankut a amilantu, che amahta thatnatu amilantu,
Che amahta aminuihnatu, ankhonnatu mahche thingkharh ah thatnatu Jental ankut ah amilantu, che nithum tihpia amah in veikhat kiringtu.”

Che Jisu in akuungah ason, “Nangin jangnikdtime?” Amah in Jisu kuungah ason, “Mah kisakupa innih i nang kurung huunna ah inkhat in nikchangtonga che inkhat in nikveitonga inboknatu jathang malaneiro.”

Chuta Jisu in amsang, “Nangin jangta ninihme tihkho romnohche, keiin ki iinnasam chapla nannih in iin nanchek ume?” Che keiin kinlupna a nannih in inlup nanphahchek ume? Anmah in “Kanchektu” ta amisang.
Chunna Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Nannih in kei chaplata nan iintu, chuta kikchangtong leh kikveitonga nanboknatu amlanva keitanoh. Chuta maiva Pa in amchaang anmahninga amlantu.”
Chunna aroi som in mahchuta antheih lai unao innih anchunga amailung inhaangsa.
Chuta Jisu in anmahta aongche asonei, “Nannih in nanrom mah chuvah aktlei Jental rampuui eiin miichunga akpu veia paallei, che anmah anchunga aktloh akhal eiin liinna anlenna.
Nannih nankaar avah mahchunang veinoh. Chuta nannih nankaara tunangkhat in akliin vei dile amah khanna nannihtu roijuih hukveiso,
che nankaara tunangkhat in akliin aveija khanna nannihtu roijuih hukvei tuei.
Miivaa Asa kupa in keita rou keitlohveta thlengnoh, chuta miita routlohnatu mahche miita thloknatu amah chaanta mathlah thlengsa.”
Che anve, mitcho mii innih in lamkomma inbok a amsei, Jisu in lam vanna sehta antheih in onga antih, “Devit vaa Asa kupa o! Kannihta kanirilvolro!”
Miitam in anmahta rim amveta ansaalei, chuta anmah in ral ralla onga antih, “Devit vaa Asa kupa Akpu o! Kannihta kanirilvolro!”
Jisu in anngeihche anmahta asonei, “Keita nannih turel jangnamitlohja angme?”
Anmah in Jisu kuungah antih, “Akpu, kanmit kanimmuhro.”
Mahchunna anmahta arilvolsei, che anmah anmitta apalpei. Che kak hang anmit muh anphahpei, cheva amah aknuta anjuihpei.
“Nannih nanmaa a am khuusonna vaave che kak hanga nannih in samong apuileh atesoh inruuia khit a ansih nantuuktu, mahchuta majak a keikuung thlenve.
Che tukhat in nannihta jarelname nanitihle, ‘Akpu in darkaar am’ tihve, che kak hanga amah in nanimlantu.
Mah anaamte i ringraan in asonkha atlungnasa, mah chuvah nga tloh a ason,
Jaion vaa asakumei kuungah sonve, ‘Anro, nang kurung in nikuungah thlengsa, amahvah inruruh mahche samong chunga chuung, samong ate inkhat, samong apui inkhat ah.’ ”
Jisu in aroita amtheihna nujuih a anmah in seh a antlohpei;
anmah in samong aruulta anthlenche achunga puun anthah, che Jisu in achunga chuungsa.
Che miitam in anmah anpuunrei lamma anrouthah, mii arouin thingbaak tuk a lamma anrouthah
Cheva miitam in amah amaa a che aknu akjuih in onga antih, “Devit vaa Asa kupa ah Hosana! Akpu minga akthleng miikha doiphah khasa! Ankaang remma Hosana.”
Che Jisu in Jerusalem a alutlai, khuuboomna miinaam in derder tih a ansonpei, “Mahmii i tume?”
Chunna miitam in anson, “Mahmii i Kalili vaa Najareth na ringraan Jisu khare.”
Che Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Mah i injih a amsa, ‘Kei innvah ngenna inn tih a in ongtu’ chuta nannih in inru inraanvaa anbu namiveipei.”
Cheva mathruunna thlaamsuunga mitcho mahche kehtlik in Jisu kuungah thlengsei che anmahta amthratpei.
Chuta akthloi thiimpu mahche ringjih lulok eiin Jisu in atlohthlou khanna salungkhou seia “Hosana, Devit vaa Asa kupa!” tih anao in an ong anmuh in amilung inhaanga akuungah ason,
“Anmah in ansonni nitheihme?” Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Oi, kitheih, Anjih in ason, nangta nandomnatu andihnao mahche chuh in annarra thradek a nandomnatu namchaang,” tih i nannih in paanohchoume?
Cheva Jisu in anmahta mah a khuuboom nata Bethani a sehsa, che mahchunna riiksa.
Juktiinga Jisu in khuuboomma anlenglai avon traamsa
Che lamkomma thotthing inkhat amuh a akuunga avaa in aburnoh a jakhatkho tuuknohsa. Chunna thotthingta ason, “Veikhat inlenga nangin inrahnoh luungrosa!” Kak hanga thotthing in chaarsa.
Aroi in mahchuta anmuh in salungkhoua anson, “Khatloh a thotthing in khalmo intha a achaar sameio?”

Chunna Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Keiin nannihta atak a kitihchou, nannih in malot a nanrilla chingna amnohchoule, thotthinga mainang nantlohchek khop noh a, chuta nannih in muul ita inlongbulh a tuiiboomma tlarota nanson inkho veitu.
Che nannih in malot a nanngen anaamte nannih in nanphahtu.”
Chuta Jisu in ankuungah amsangei, “Kei inkho nankuungah naniruitang, mahchuta kamsangchoule jarella keiin mah akchek amneh thloui kitlohme kison uchou.

Aklup John kha ramname? Ringram tingname chunoh a mii tingname?” Cheva anmah sengseeng intella insonsei, “Inih in ringram tingna” tihmale amah in initihtu, “Chunohle nannih in jarelna amahta malotnoh choume?”
Chuta inih in “mii tingna” tihlamele miitamta trihme, alamva mii naamtein John ta ringraan inkhat antih.
Chunna anmah in Jisu ta anson, “Kannih in romnoh ung.” Che Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Keikho jaknang kichek kimneh a mah anaamte i kitlohme nanison nohtung.”
Amah in amsang, ‘Kei sehnohtung,’ chuta kak amche aril athlengpeia sehsa.
Chela asa kupa innih tihpi kuungah thlenga ason, ‘che amah in amsang,’ oi, ‘sehtung, lulok’ chuta amah in sehnohsa.

Anmah innih kaara jaknangin anpa in amdon atlohme?” Amah in ason, “Matsahna in atloh.” Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Keiin atak a kitihchou, mah chuvah roithraiei mahche kochanoh kumei eiin matsah a ringram huunna a luutuei.
Alamva John in akchimlamseh veia nankuungah athlengche nannih in malotnohchou, chuta roithrai mahche kochanoh kumei eiin amahta amilot; che nannih in mahchuta nanmuhlai nanril thlenga malotnohchou.”
Pekva nganglirah luhnatu lai aphah in, anluhpeira ta aroita nganglibil lampaarsaa miikuungah amthlahpei.
Chunna lampaarsa eiin aroita suura inkhatta ankhon, inkhatta anthat, che aktlei inkhatta lunga anden.
Matsahnachung ralla amah in aroi khatlakho amthlah, che anmah in matsahna nanga amah kuungah anloutlohpei.
Chunna achena avah asa kupata anmah in injah tuei ta ankuungah amthlah.
Chuta nganglibil lampaar aksaa eiin asa kupata anmuhlai, anmah sengseenga insonsei, ‘Mah i amah pipata thlengsa, inih in amahta ithatche achangphu sutreio.’
Che amahta ansuurpei, che nganglibil apaalla aminomche anthatpei.
‘Chunna nganglibil Akpu in athlenglai, nganglibil lampaar aksaa mii eita amah in kha atloh tueime?’
Anmah in anson, ‘Amah in akthranoh miichut eita amramtuei, che amah ngangli bilta aktlei miiting mathlah a nganglirah luhlai akrah amah kuungah amlantu miikuungah amsaaltu.’ ”
Churella nannihta kisonchou, ringram huunnakha nankuungnata inloutu che akrah anrahtu jaat in khat kuunga kimlentu.
Che tunangkhat in mah lung achunga anloom miiva invuitu, chuta mah lungin tunangkhat in chuunga tlaleva, uphulnanga invuinektu.”
Akthloi thiimpu mahche Pharisi eiin Jisu vaa pandam antheih lai, anmah rella trongsa tih a amrompei.
Chuta anmah in Jisu ta namma suurnatu antlohta, anmah in miitamta trihsei, alamva anmah in Jisu ta ringraan inkhatsa ta anloh.
“Ringram kurung huunnakha kurung khat in asa kupa changvaangnatu amchaang nangsa.
Che changvaang anjaonantu mii akouh eita ongveta amah in aroita amthlah ei, chuta anmah in thleng indahsei.
Anro, keiin siilchal leh sa annou kithatpei, che khulouhram buhdoon saaknatu kamchaangpei, che bilam chesang, changvaang thlengveta sonna an ongnatu veikhatlakho amah roijuihta amthlah ei.
Chuta anmah in inleua anloh mahche ansehjana ah arouin anlouva, arouin anthlou aktleiah sehsei.
Che roijuih anleita anmah in suur mathrit a anthat.
Mahchuta kurung in atheihlai, amlung inhaangsa, che amah in raalmii mathlah a mii eikhata mamaangkirra amiramche ankhuuboomta meia anhaalpei.
Chunna amah roijuih eita asonei, changvaangnatu athlourang chesa, chuta ikouh miiva matik chanohsei.
Churella nannih in lamsuh lamsuh ah sehve, che nannih in nantuuk nantuukmii eita changvaangna ah kouh eive.
Mahchunna amah roijuih in lamsuh lamsuh a sehsei, che anmah in antuukmii naamte akthra mahche thranohta amichunkirpei, che changvaangna thlaampiia akthleng mii in sipsei.
“Chuta kurung in akthleng miita annatu aluutlai, changvaangna puunrei aksilhnoh mii khat amuhpei;
chunna amah kuungah ason, ‘Ruul o, changvaangna puunrei jaonoh a nangin khatloh a onna luutsacheme?’ Cheva amah in amsangna romnohsa.
Cheva kurung in amah roijuihta asonei, ‘Akut akeh makaangve che amahta phurh a apaal anthimna a loonve, mahchunna aha maket a traptruui veitu.’
Alamva miitam aong, chuta steruta acharning.”

Che anmah anroita Herot amiisoh inruuia Jisu kuunga mathlah a anson, “Lulok, kannih in nangva akchim cheta kanrom, che Ringpu vaa akchimlamta chimma namtheih, chuche tukhatkho nangin thousanohche, alamva nangin keimii miimii annohche.”
Chunna nangin kanisonro jangta nimdonme? “Mah chuvah Keisaar kuungah roithaang malanni tlohphume chunoh a tlohphunohme?”
Chuta Jisu in anmah anthratnohta aromma asonei, “Akthra veisin nannih in jarella keita chaang nan an angme?
Roithaangna baobehkha kammuhve.” Chunna anmah in nikhat kutlangna baobeh inkhat amimuhpei.
Che amah in ankuungah ansonei, “Mahkha tunangmii asak leh akmingme?”
Anmah in anson, “Keisaar ta” che amah in asonei, “Chuleva, Keisaar taale Keisaar kuunga che Ringpu taale Ringpu kuungah malanve.”
Anmah in ohchuta antheih in, salungkhousei, che Jisu ta anmahche inlengsei.
“Lulok, Moses in ason, ‘Mii inkhat in inn apaalche asa amnoh a thile, anmah unaoin akmeita changvaangso, che anmah unao turella ansa anphahnatu’ tih a ason.
Anmah unao sirih kannihsoh ammei, anparem in changvaangche asa amnoh a thisa, amah akmeivah amah unao eisoh amjouei.
Mahchunanga innih tihpi leh inthumtihpi mahche sirih tihpi phah nga tloh a suuksa.
Anaamte i aknua kumeikho thisa.
Chunnava thinata anringlai kumeikha anmah mii sirih suunga tunang akmei vei ume? Alamva annaamte in amahta anlohpei.”
Chuta Jisu in ankuungah amsangei, “Nannih chimnosachou, alamva nannih in ringjihkho Ringpu vaa atuuikho romnohsachou.
Alamva thinata anringlai anmah in changvaangnoh tuei chekho changvaanga inpenoh tuei, chuta anmahva ringramma am ringroi veiusei.
Chuta thinata ring rella Ringpu in nanisonkha paanohchoume?
Mah chuvah Keiva Abraham vaa Ringpu, Aisaak vaa Ringpu che Jakop vaa Ringpu sang. Amahva akthivaa Ringpu noh chuta akringvaa Ringpu.”
Miitam in mahchuta antheih in, amah in amtheih khanna salungkhousei.
Cheva anmah ankaarna ukil inkhat in Jisu ta chaang anna arui,
“Lulok, trongsuur suunga jaknangin akliinrem trongthuunme?”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Nangin nang Akpu Ringpu ta niril pumte, nikli pumte mahche nimdon pumtesoh inruuia rilvolro.”
Oh inna matsahrem mahche akliinrem trongthuunsa.
Che innih tihpiva, “Nangin nantongpi miita nitaktal nanga rilvolro.
Mah trongthuun innih in trongsuur mahche ringraan in anson anaamte inthrungsa.”
“Nannih in Khrista relna jangnamidonme? Amah i tunang asame?” Anmah in akuunga anson, “Devit vaa Asa kupa.”
Amah in asonei, “Chuleva khatloh a Devit in Li vaa Akpu tih a aongume?”
“Akpu in kei Akpu ta ason, kikut kikchangtonga inbokro, nang jeknaeita nikeh majathuuia nisihnohmiil.”
Devit in amahta “Akpu tih a ongleva khatloh a asa kupa vei ume?”
Che amahni khannata tunangkhat inkho amahkuunga karaanga trong ruinohsei.
Che Jisu in miitam leh aroi ankuungah asonei,
“Ringjih lulok mahche Pharisi eiin Moses anbokna a inbokei;
Churella nannih in athlou veia nantlohnatu anmah in nanisonkha ngaak a tlohve, chuta anmah in antlohthlou nujuih avah tlohnohve, alamva anmah in trongvah anraan, chuta athlouvah tlohnoh ei.
Alamva anmah in akrikpoot anphurh cheknoh lep a miidarchunga anthong. Chuta anmah antak inva ankut majung inkhat inkho puur indah ei.
Chuta anmah anthlou naamteva mii in anmuhnatu antloh. Anmah in ringjih trongta ankutbaang leh amichalla amijih mahche anluut insuul areia amikai.
Anmah in aktuirem buhdoonna leh sinakok ah akthrarem inbokna a inbokvah andit.
Keithiil munna mii in anmahta mathruunna, lulok lulokta ankuunga ongi andit.
Chuta nannihtalva mii in lulokta naniongnoh eiso, alamva nannih lulokva Khrista inkhatning che nannih naamte unaochou.
Thaleichungah tukhatkho pa ta ongnohve, alamva nan Pa inkhatning, amahvaa ringramma am.
Nannihta akpu tih akho mii in naniongnohso, alamva nannihtu Akpu Khrista khalekning.
Tunangkhat nankaara anrolrem mii khanna nannihtu roijuih veitu;
che tunangkhat in anroua indom mii khata amniimtu che tunangkhat inruruh miikha akdomtu.”

Ringjih lulok leh Pharisi akthra veisin nannihtu vei avah lahnasa a! Alamva nannih in trulmeinu ei inn louta namma nansut, che malot miiung nantihnatu soot nanngen. Churella nannih in akliinrem maraal nanphahtu.

Ringjih lulok leh Pharisi akthra veisin nannihtu vei avah lahnasa a! Alamva nannih in tunangkhatta mathlengnatu tuiiboom mahche apaalla sehtlam hou, che amah in anthlenglai nannih in amahta nangchunga chuum innih ralla repnangvaa asa kupa namivei.
Kmong mitcho eio! Alamva ra–ao leh ra–aota amseeng mathruunna thlaamsoh jaknangin anrolme?
Che nannih in nanson, ‘Tunangkhat in thiilkuungta sonna suita tlohle, mahchu jakhatnoh; chuta tukhat in thiilkuungah am kuttholta sonna tlohleva, amah trongchet in amahta akaanpei.’
Mitcho miieio! Alamva kutthol leh kuttholta amseeng thiilkuung i jakanang in anrolme?
Chunna tunangkhat in thiilkuungta sonna suita aktloh in thiilkuung mahche achunga bilam ak am naamteta sonna suita atlohpei;
che tunangkhat in mathruunna thlaamta sonna suita tlohleva, mahchuta che asuunga ak am anaamte jaoa suita atlohpei.
Che tunangkhat in ringramta sonna suita tlohleva, Ringpu khatkho mahchunga inbok a amkho sonna suita athohpei.
Mitcho lamchingeio, barthlepva nannih in naminomche uuksava namiduul!
Mitcho Pharisi eio! Matsah a kam leh pukaan asuungtongkha tlenmanve, mahchuche apaal tongkho tleng aja.
Chunna nannihkho apaaltongva mii kuungah akchimlamseh nangchou, chuta asuung avah akthra veisin leh kochanoh a sipchou.”
Nanson lamang, ‘Inih in ipa ipu an amlaia louam meleva, inih in anmahsoh ringraan anthii mathlaakkha injaonoh utame.’
Nga tloh a nannih in ringraan akthatsungta nanroua sakhi namilan.
Nannih in nanpa nanpuvaa an olnakha masipve.
Muruul eio, ruulsok asa eio, khatloh a repnanga luutsamnata inlit nanchek ume?

Alamva keiin nankuungah ringraan leh aksing mii leh ringjih lulok eita kamthlah ei, nannih in arouva thingkharh a jamma nanthatsam, che arouin nannih sinakok ah naminangtu che khuupii khuupii a nanchuttu,
Chunna nannih in nanthat akseeng munleh thiilkuung akaara akchim Abel thiinata Barakhi vaa asa Jekhariah thii thaleichunga aktla akchim thiinaamte nankuungah tlatu.
Tak a nankuungah kisonchou, mah ringnatluun anchunga tlatu.”
Anve, nannih nan innkha akroua chikkeng usa.
Alamva keiin kisonchou, ‘Akpu minga akthleng eikha doiphah vei tuei,’ ta nansonnohmiil nannih in inlenga keimuhnoh usachou.”
Chuta amah in ankuungah amsangei, “Nannih in anaamte nanmuh, muhnohrei choume? Tak a nankuungah kisonchou, lung khatin lungkhat chungah inthonga inmahnoh usa, anaamte inpilkirtu.”
Che Jisu in ankuungah amsangei, “Tukhat inkho chimnohting naniseh pinanohtu cheksilve.
Alamva ‘Kei i Khrista sang ta kikminga khalmo thlengtuei,’ che mii aktamta invaia nanisehpitu.
Che nannih in raal khatkho raalhou nantheihtu; romve mah chuvah nannih in inchoinohve; tihva mah i suuktutla, chuta achenavah nohmang.
Alamva jatih khat in jatih khat chungah che kurungram khatin kurungram khatchunga innah insuul suuktu, aram aramma saakchaal che runaangnu thou suuktu.
Anaamte i sapok in klah amthronnasa.
Mahlai mii aktam in malot inlengtuei, che khatleh khat inloontuei, mahche khatleh khat intirh suuktuei.
Chuche akchimnoh ringraan khalmo inthruh ah mii khalmo invaia ansehpituei.
Che thranoh in araltu miiringvol inlengtu.
Chuta achena phah a akdou mii khata akaltu.
Chuche amah kurung huunnavaa akthra trongraan i jaat anaamte ah sakhi veinatu tukleiram pumtea inraantu; mahche achenakha thlengtu.”
“Chunna ringraan Dainel kuungah amson intirhsa chimmnoh buurthlou in akseeng munna ngir nanmuhlai (akpaa in romeiso).
Mahlai Judia a am mii inkho muulla tlaaneiso,
innbunga am mii inkho innsuungah pootlou trumnoh eiso;
chela nao anpooileh naosonrooi anmah turelvah khalmo lahnasa a!
Che nao anpooileh naosonrooi anmah turelvah khalmo lahnasa a!
Nannih in nantlaankha phalbi nohle inngeihni ah antuuk nanohtu ngenve.
