Alamva mahlai tukleiram amthron lainata ipekphahkho lousuuknoh, che vaknuakho suuknoh tupot, trihkhop a klah knang suuktu.
Che mah aknieikha machomnoh leva, akringmii tukhatkho inkal phahnoh tuei; chuta acharche mii turelva aknieikha amchom usa.
Chunna anve onna chunohle mah khanna Khrista amsa ta tukhat in nanisonle, mahchu malotnohve.
Alamva Khrista khatkho ringraan veisin khalmo inthruhtuei che jaleva acharche miiluungkho invaia sehpinatu akliin daang leh salungkhouna khalmo amimuhtu.
Anve, nankuungah matsahbeb a kisonpeichou.
Chunna anmah in nankuungah ‘Anve, amahva raprilla amsa’ tih a nanisonle sehnohve.
Alamva nisuuknata khu inthla in nitlaktonga kvaar nanmuhnanga miivaa Asa kupa in athlengkho mahchunang veitu.
Akthi ruung amna a barmupii inlomma amtuei.”

Chunna marvaanna miivaa Asa kupava daangkha anmuhtu, che tukleiramna jaat anaamte in sinthruui tuei, che miivaa Asa kupa in amah atuuileh akliin paarthrasoh inruuia marvaan sumphai chungah thlengkha anmuhtu;
che amah ringroita pik ul anring ahousoh inruuia acharmiita ringroi eiin marvaan adongna khatnata adongna khat phah a, tukleiram akiing manli nata anmitlontu.”
“Thotting nata para romve: Thotthing in abaak innoua abur asuunsamlai, thralpii innaisata nanrom.
Chunanga, anaamte i nannih inkho nanmuhlai, Akpu in phalkuung phahsamma innaisata nanrom.
Marvaan khatkho thaleiva maang umang, chuta kei trongva tiknikho mangnoh luungtu.
Aknileh Pung tukhat Inkho romnoh.”
Noah laia aksuuk khananga, miivaa Asa kupa in athlenglai akho veitu.
Alamva tuiiliin akni aphahnoh maa a saa iinna, changvaanga che chang mavaanga Noah in mulisuunga aluutnohmiil ammei,
che tuiiliin thlengta romnoh a annaamteta tuii in atlaannanga miivaa Asa kupa in athlengkho mahchunanga veitu.
Chunna louva mii innih amtuei; inkhatva alohtu che khatva amahtu.
Kumei innih in buhsuk a amtuei; inkhatva alohtu che khatva amahtu.
Jih trangve, alamva nannihvaa Akpu in tik a thlengume romnohchou.
Chuta mah i romve, inn Akpu in jaknang khulouh a inruin thlengtu tih romle amah in loujih a che amah innta makhoinoh uta.
Alamva nannihkho inchaanga amve che nannih in namidonnoh pungkhan miivaa Asa kupa in thlengtu.”
Amah Akpu in athlenglai routloh a ak am roijuihkha doiphah veisa.
Tak a nankuungah kisonchou mahchunanga miikuungah amah Akpu in adoon akhaal naamte amsiltu.
Chuta akthranoh roijuih in akroua insontu, ‘Kei Akpu in thilla thlengtu’,
che amahsoh rou atlohpijou eita khon amithronpei, che tuiibuh inruiieisoh ansaak an iinjou,
roijuih khanna amdonnoh aknileh aromnoh punga amah Akpu in thlengtu,
mahche amahta innih suuk a atantu, che akthra veisin eisoh asihjoutu, mahchunna sinthruuia anha amikettu.”
Rungaak rangava kmongei chuta rangavah ksingei.
Alamva kmong rangava anmah mitton anchoilai, thaova maruuinohsei;
chuta aksing rangava anmah mitton soh inruuia thao abuura amiruui.
Changri in athil inva annaam mitchua inkirsei.
Chuta khulouh jaanjaia onga, ‘Anve, changri! Intuukpi natu inthruhvesa.’
Mahlai rungaak in inthoua anmah mittonta antaarpei.
Che kmong rangain ksing ranga ankuunga anson, ‘Nannih nanthao ste kanimlanve, alamva kannih mitton thisamsei.’
Chuta ksing rangain amisang, ‘Kannihkho che nannih turelkho inkhopnoh aja, akjuurkuungah seh a nannih turella leive.’
Che aklei ansehnua, changrikha thlengsa, thlouraang akcheva amahsoh inruuia changvaangbuh doonna ah luutsei, che innkho ankhaarpei.
Mahchu aknua aktlei rungaak inkho thlenga anson, ‘Akpu, akpu, inn kanimhoongro.’
Chuta amah in amsangpei, ‘Tak a keiin kisonchou, keiin naniromnoh ang.’
Alamva jih trangve, nannih in aknikho apungkho romnohchou.”
Amah roijuih inkhatkuungah talen ranga amlan, aktleikhat kuungah innih, mahche aktleikhat kuungah inkhat amlanei, anmah anmah in anchektu chaanga amlannei. Che amah atakva aklah ramma sehsa.
Talen ranga akphah in kak hanga seh a amlat in, ranganata ranga amchuungpei.
Mahchunanga talen innih akphah inkho innihnata innih amchuungpei.
Chuta talen inkhat akphahva seh a tuklei achohche, amah Akpu vaa baobehta amthupei.
Pekva lai khalmo asotnua roijuih ei akpu athlenglai, anmahsoh inruuia baobeh anmilatna akseh akthleng an anjoupei.
Che talen ranga akphah in akuunga luut a akchuung talen rangasoh thlenna ason, ‘Akpu, nangin talen ranga namlan ang; anro keiin talen ranga kamchuungpei.’
Amah Akpu in akuungah ason, ‘thra nitlohpei, akthra khatkho malot aja roijuih; nangva thlou andih a malot aja taningcheva, nangta thlou akliinna kampuih uche; nang akpu vaa aroomthokna a luutrosa.’
Che talen innih akphah inkho akuungah luut a amah in amchuung talen innihkho thlenna ason, ‘Akpu, nangin talen innih namlan ang, anro, keiin talen innih kamchuungpei.’
Amah Akpu in akuungah asonpei, ‘Thra nitlohpei akthra khatkho malot aja taningcheva, nangta thlou akliinna kampuih uche; nang akpu vaa aroomthokna a luutrosa.’
Talen inkhat akphah inlakho akuunga luut a ason, ‘Akpu, nangva linnoh a niluh mahche, vornoh a amtlonche, karaang miicheta kiromche;
chunna keiin naktrih anga seh a nang talenta tuklei choua tukleisuungah kimthup. Nangtakha oire.’
Chuta amah Akpu in akuungah amsang, ‘Thranoh che aktal roijuih! Keiin linnoh a kiluh, che vornoh a kamtlon tih a nirompei?
Chunna kei baobehkha baobeh amlattheih ankuungah namlan uta, mahche kithlenglai keitakha akchuungsoh kphah uta.
Chunna akuungnah talenkha loua talen som ak amkuungah malanve.
Alamva ak am ankuungah ralla kimlantu, che thloia an amna veitu, chuta tukhat ak amnoh akuungah amah in asihkhakho kilohtu.
Che akanana amnoh roijuih iva apaal anthimna kaa a lonve, mahchunna sinthruui ah anmah anha amikettu.’ ”
Jatih naamte in amah kuungah inchuntuei, sadamkem in keelnata sadam athreknanga, anaamte khatleh khat athrektuei,
che sadam in amah akchanga, chuta keel in amah akveitonga asihtuei.
Chunna kurung in akchangtong ak ameita asontuei, ‘Thlengve, Pa adoi akphah eio, tukleiram amthron lainata nannih turel machaanga asih kurung arami changvesa;
alamva keiin kitraamlai saakphu namilanang, keiin tuii kraallai iinphu namilanang, keiin rapkhei kiveilai nanlousoongang,
keiin athlaia kiamlai nannih in puun namilanang, keiin kinat kisatlai nannih in saakphu namisaak ang, keiin simma kiamlai nannih in kikuungah thlengchou.’
Chunna akchimlamseh in akuungah anmisangtu, ‘Akpu, tik a traam kanmuhchea saakphu kamisaakcheme, chunoh a tik a tuii niraallai iinphu kamilancheme?
Che tik a rapkhei veia kanmuhchea kanlousoong cheme, chunohle athlaia niamlai puun kamilancheme?
Che tik a ninat nisatlai chunoh a simma niamlai kannih in kanmuhchea nikuungah thlengsungme?’
Che kurung in ankuungah amsangtuei, ‘Atak a nankuungah kisonchou, kei kiuh kinao antool antaangrem inkhatta nannih in vachah nantloh i nannih in mahkha keita nantloh ang.’
Chunna akveitong ak am ankuungah asontuei, ‘Phool akphah eio, kikuungnata insenga repnanga che amah ringroi turella amchaang ache amnoh meia sehve;
alamva kitraamlai saak iin kamlannohchou, tuii kraallai iinphu kamlannohchou,
rapkheia kiamlai keilousoong nohchou, athlaia kiamlai puun kamlannohchou, kinat kisatlai mahche simma kiamlai keita keian thlengnohchou;’
mahlaia anmah inkho anloumasangtu, ‘Akpu, nitraamlai, tuii niraallai, rapkhei veia niamlai, athlaia niamlai, ninat nisatlai, chunohle sim a niamlai tik a kanmuhchea nangta rou naktlohnoh sungme.’
Chunna ankuungah amsangtuei, ‘Keiin nankuungah tak a kisonchou, khalmo antool antaangrem inkhatta rou nantlohnoh i nannih in mahkha keita rou keitlohnohchou.’
Che anmah in ache amnoh tanti a sehtuei, chuta akchimlamseh eiva ache amnoh ringna a sehtuei.”
“Nannih in nanrom mah chuvah nijannih aknua laalna buhdoon i thlengusa, che miivaa Asa kupata thingkharh ah mathlunatu amilantu.”
Mahche Kaipha tih a an ong thiimpu aklok kurungkool a akthloi thiimpu miivaa anparuul in inboomsei,
Che Jisu ta inruk a suura mathlunatu inboomma intelsei.
Chuta anmah in anson, “Miikaara derderta asuuknoh natu buhdoon suunga tlohnohrei.”
Jisu in buh asaaklai kumei khat in aman khalmo chaal amrimtui thaobeel khat thlenna akuungah thlengsa, mahchu akangchunga apoihpei.
Chuta aroiin mahchuta anmuh in anmilung inhaanga anson, “Mah i jarelna ampaam peime?
Alamva mah thao i aman khalmo tamma ajurhche, inranring kuungah malan ajata.”
Mahchuta Jisu in aromma, ankuungah asonei, “Jarelna kumei ita namilahme? Alamva amah in akthra thlouta keikuungah atlohpei.
Alamva nannihva anran anringsoh injomma amjouchou; chuta nannihva keisoh injomma amjounoh uchou.
Mah thao i kei kiruungchunga suunga keita kanphuumnatu athlourang turelna amah in atlohpei.
Keiin nankuungah tak a kisonchou, tukleiram apumtea mah akthra trongi raannatu amun naamtea amah kumei in atlohthlou i amahta intheihna veia insontu.”
asonpei, “Keiin amahta nankuungah nanimlan angleva keikuungah jangnanpek tungme?” Cheva anmah in akuungah harngou baobeh sopthum amilanpei.
Che mah chunnata Jisu ta malannatu amah in taancha aphahnatu amjonpei.
Amah in ason, “Khuuboomma luut choulaia mii khat kuungah sonve, ‘Lulok in ason, keitu lai innaisa, nang inna kei kiroisoh laalna buhdoon kansaaknatu.’ ”
Che Jisu in ankuungah amtheih nujuih a, aroiin laalna buhdoonkha tlohnatu amichaangpei.
che anmah in ansaaksuunga, anmahta asonei, “Keiin nankuungah tak a kisonchou, nankaarna inkhat in keita lonna nanjurhtung.”
Che anmah in anril khalmo lahsei, che anmah in khatleh khat inrui amithronpei, “Akpu, mahchu keisangme?”
Amah in amsangei, “Tarpenga keisoh kut akpuurjou miital khanna keita kamlantung.
Miivaa Asa kupa rella injih nujuih a seh, chuta miivaa Asa kupata amlan miikhava lahnasa! Amah miikhan poknoh leva ralla thra uta.”
Amahta akjuur Judas in amsang, “Akpu, keisangme?” Amah in akuungah ason, “Nangin nisonluungpei.”
Mahche kuchaita loua ampaakche, mahchuta ankuunga malanna asonei, “Nannaam mah i loua iinve,
alamva mah i mii chahchah anlehta ipnatu akluung trongirhnavaa kei kithiisa.
Keiin nankuungah kitihchou, kipavaa kurung ramma nannihsoh inruuia akthar iinphu i iinjounatu amah aknikha athlengnohmiil, mah nganglirah atuii i keiva veikhat iinnoh usang.”
Chuta keita kamringche aknua, nannih nanmaa a keiin Kalili a lousehtung.”
Pitar in akuungah ason, “Anmah annaamte in nangrella vaisi vei seilakho, keiva tiknikho kivaisi suuknohtung.”
Jisu in akuungah ason, “Keiin nikuungah tak a kisonche; mi in khulouh aarkhong in ankhuungnoh amaa a, nangin keita veithumkhek kandah uche.”
Pitar in akuungah ason, “Keiin nangsoh inruuia thijou samelakho, keiinva nangta nandahnohtung.” Mahchunanga aroi annaam inkho ansonpei.
Che amahsoh inruuijoua Pitar leh Jebidi asa kupa innihta asehpiei, cheva aril lah a inlaang amthronpei.
Mahlai anmah kuunga asonei, “Kei kikli i thih ajaphah a khalmo klahsang; onna louamve, keisoh inruuia doujouve.”
Che amaatonga ste avache akhuptlop a intolh a angenpei, “Pa o mah i vei ajaleva kei kuungnata kuchai i keilourosa; chuta keiin kimdon veinoh a, nangin nimdon veiso.”
Che aroi ankuungah athlenglai anmahva inna louam aphah ei, che Pitar kuungah ason, “Nannih in keisoh inruuia pungkhatruva doucheknoh choume?
Nannih in madoina a nanluutnoh natu doutrangve; li inva amdonta ruung inva marnopsachou.”
Khatla veinih tihpitu veia seh a angenla, “Pa o, keiin mah kuchainata iinnoh angkleva, mah i ralcheknohtung, nangin nimdon veiso.”
Che veikhatla athlengin anmah in inna louam antuukpiei, alamva anmahva khalmo an ihmu thonoh a anmit klahsei.
Chela khatla anmahta amah eiche seh a matsah angenna trongsoh intrimma, veithum tihpi veia angen.
Cheva aroi ankuungah thlenga asonei, “Nannih pekphah inna ammang choume? Anve, pungi innaisa, miivaa Asa kupata aleh am ankut ah ajurhpei.
Inthouvesa, seh raseio, anve, keita kamlansam miikha inihkuung innaisa.”
Pekva amahta akjuurin anmah kuungah daangkhat malanna asonei; “Keiin abing kimchohsam mii khasa, amahta suurve.”
Kak hanga amah in Jisu kuungah ason, “Akpu kimthruunche!” Che amah abingta amchohpei.
Jisu in amah kuungah ason, “Ruullo, onna jangtlohtu thlengcheme?” Mahlaia thlenga anmah ankuttal in Jisu ta ansuurpei.
Cheva anve, Jisu soh inruui ankaarna khatin chemsei akjuukche, thiimpu aklok roijuihta atuk inva amkuurta apheklokpei.
Mahlai Jisu in amah kuungah ason, “Nang chemseikha akhumsuungah thunro, alamva chemchoi mii in chemma maangtuei.
Ringraan lijan somleinih ralla kikomma pektal mathlahnatu keiin Pa kuungah nihcheknoh tuta nimdonme?
Mahchuta mainanga tlohmeleva ringjih in mah i nga tloh a suuktuta asonkha khatloh a tlungume.”

Mah pungtal chunna Jisu in miitamta asonei, “Inruraan aksuinanga chemsei mahche sungsoh inruuia keita keisuureita thleng sachoume? Anirel Ringpu mathruunna thlaamma matheih a inbok a kiamlaiva keisuurnoh choua,
chuta mah naamte i ringraanei ringjihta atlungnatu suuksa.” Cheva aroi naamtein amahta mathlah a tlaankirsei.
Chuta Pitar invah Thiimpu aklok innmai phah Jisu ta inlabep a aknu ajuih mahche asuung luut a khakha suuk umeta annatu amah in santri eisoh inbok a akbirh.
Pek akthloi Thiimpu leh jama annaamtea Jisu ta thatnatu chimnoh sakhi anjonpei,
chuta chimnoh sakhi khalmo thlengslakho, anmah in jakhatkho tuuk cheknoh ei, Juktoolla mii innih in thlenga,
“Keiin Ringpu mathruunna thlaam i kikthritche, nijanthum suunga tloh kichektu” tih a amah mii in ason.
Che Thiimpu aklok in inthoua amah kuungah ason, “Nangin jakhatkho masangnoh ucheme? Nang nichunga anmah in sakhi anmailan i jarelname?”
Chuta Jisu invah rimta amsa. Mahche Thiimpu aklok in amah kuungah ansonla, “Ringpu Asa kupa Khrista kha nangche, nangnohche nisonnatu akring Ringpu minga suitasoh inruuia trong kiruiche.”
Jisu in amah kuungah ason, “Nangin nisonluungpei, chuta keiin nikuungah kisonche, mah i aknua miivaa Asa kupa in amtik liin akchangah inbok mahche ringram sumphai chungah thleng nannih in nanmuhtu.”
Mahlai Thiimpu aklok in anluut insuulta akthritche atih, “Amah in Ringpu usitnoh a trongsa. Maiche aktlei sakhi darkaar ammangme? Amah in Ringpu ta usitnoh a trongkha nantheihpei.
Nannihva kha namidonme?” Anmah in amisang, “Amah i thituru.”
Cheva amah amaia amichil, anhai che arouin anbeeng.
Mahche antih, “Khrista o, tunang in nanhaime kaniphoongro?”
Pek Pitar in innmaia inbok a am. Mahcheva rungaak khat in thlenga amahkuunga ason, “Nangkho Kalili na Jisu soh inruuijou miinoh cheme?”
Chuta anmah kuungah indah a ason “Mah nisonkha jangnitihname romnoh ang khame?”
Mahche innmuk ah anthruhlai aktlei rungaak khatin amahta amuh a mah khanna ak am ankuunga asonei, “Mahmii i Najareth na Jisu soh inruuijou khare.”
Chunna amah in suita tloh a “Keiin mahmii i romnohluung ang” tiha indahsa.
Kak amche amahta akrom eiin thlenga amah kuungah anson, “Tak a nangkho anmah ankaarnahche, alamva nang niroolhou in inromche.”
Mahlai chunna, “Mahmii i keiva romnohluung ang” tih a akroua phool inpea che suita tloh a inso amthronpei. Mah laitalla aarkhong in inkhuungsa.
Mahcheva “Aarkhong in ankhuungnoh amaa a, nangin keita veithumkhek kandah uche” ta Jisu in amahkuunga ason trongkha Pitar in intheihsa. Mahcheva apaalla inthruh a aril sok a trapsa.
amahta ankhitche rampuui kuungah anmilanpei.
“Keiin amaraal amnoh thiita kimlaalli alehsang.” Anmah in anson, “Mahkha kanthlou ammangme? Mahkha nitak nikroua romrosa.”
Cheva Ringpu mathruunna thlaamma amah in harngou inbaobehta lonna amahche inthruhsa; mahche seh a rui inthoia thisa.
Chuta akthloi Thiimpu in baobehta anlohche anson “Mah i akseeng baobeh sihna thlaamma sihmele trongsuur in jaonoh, alamva mah i miithii aman.”
Chunna anmah in intella, rapkheimii phuumnatu beel loupuk tih a amah baobeh chunna ramchuta anleipei.
Ohchurella mah loupukchu pekphah thiivaa loupuk antihpei.
Churella Israel ste in mah chuvah aman ngirhna chaang nujuih a, harngou sopthumta anlohpei,
“Che Akpu in keita alam kamtheih nanga anmah in beel loupuk amanturella mahchuta amilanpei” ta ringraan Jeremiah in asonkha mahlaichun atlungna veisa.
Khattingla akthloi Thiimpu leh anparuul eiin amahta lonna antronglai atakin jakkatkho masangnohsa.
Mahlai Pilat in amahta ason, “Anmah in nichungah sakhi khalmo amilanni theihnoh cheme?”
Chuta amah in akuungah jakhatkho masangnoh luungsa, mahchunna rampuui in khalmo salungkhousa.
Buhdoon niah miitam in andit nujuih a rampuui in mii khatkhat simnata mathlah i tloh a thleng.
Mahlai thranoh tloh ah akmingseh Barabbas an ong mii khat simma thunna ansih.
Miitam inchunlai Pilat in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih turella tunangta mathlahro nantih angme, Barabbas tameh chunoh a Khrista an ong Jisu tameh?”
Alamva amahta ak andah eiin keikuungah anthlenpeita amah in arom.
Amah in phompii ah anboklai, amah akmei tingnata trong thlenga, “Akchimlamseh mii i achungah nangin jakhatkho tlohnohro, alamva mahmii irella khulouh kikmanga khalmo klah kphah.”
Akthloi Thiimpu mahche anparuulei inva Barabbas ta mathlahnatu nihkanga Jisu ta thatnatu miitamta amisoh.
Rampuui in ankuungah asonei, “Anmah innih kaara tuta mathlahro nantih angme?” Che anmah in anson, “Barabbas ta.”
Pilat in anmah kuungah asonei, “Chuleva Khrista an ong Jisu i keiin kha kitloh ume” Annaam in anson, “Amahta thingkharh a mathluro.”
Che anmah kuungah asonei, “Jarelnasame, amah in jaknang thranohthlou atlohpeime?” Chuta anmah in “Amahta thingkharh ah mathluro” ta thloithloi a ongsei.

Nga tloh a Pilat in thloui mapaang janohsa, chuta mahchu ngut a ralladom housuuk aveinanigta amuhpeia tuii loua miitam anmaikuungah akut aksilche asonei, “Mah miivaa athii irella kei kamraal jakhatkho amnoh; mah i nannih nanthlouning.”
Miitam in amisang, “Amah athii kannih kanchunga che kansa antakchunga tlaso.”
Cheva Pilat in Barabbas ta anmah turella amthlahpei, che Jisu ta tranga marat a thingkharh ah mathlunatu anmah kuungah amsilei.
Cheva amah apuunsilhta anlohche in aang puunta amisilhpei.
Mahche kuling lukhumkhat sak a akangah amikhum, che akut akchanga raphalsung khat amichoih. Che amah kuungah ankhuk makamma inkhup a che manuih a anson, “Judiei kurung, nangta kimithruunche!”
Che amahta machilla, sunga akanga anhai.
Anmah in aminuihche asilhpuunta liimma, amah apuunsilh saakta amisilhpei, mahche thingkharh ah mathlunatu anphurhpei.
Mahche Kolkotha amunna anthleng in (mahchu arthava luisipmun),
anmah in masingkhasoh inpool nangli atuiita a iinnatu amilan, chuta mahchu amtem in iinnohsa.
Mahche thingkharh ah amahta mathlua, anmah in rasi anna Akpu apuunta ankaara insemsei;
che anmah in ohchunna inbok a Akpu ta ngaak a amsei.
Che akangchunga amahta lonna trong injihkha antaarpei, mahchuva, “Mah i Jisu, Judiei Kurung khare.”
Mahlai chunna amahsoh inruuia inruraan mii innih, inkhat in akchangtonga, che inkhat in akveitonga thingkharh ah thirkit hemma anjampei.
Amahta vanna akseh akloon eiin ankang lek lek a injakna veia manuih a,
anson, “Ringpu mathruunna thlaamta thrit a nijanthum suunga akseemsam nang, nikroua inkalro khame! Nangin Ringpu vaa Asa kupa chele, thingkharh nata trumro khame.”
Mahchunanga akthloi thiimpuei ringjih lulok khatkho anparuul eisoh amahta manuih a anson,
“Aktlei miiva akalche; atak anrouva inkahlcheknoh, amahvah Israel kurung; pek amah in thingkharh nata trumso, chunna inih in amahta malotrei,
amah in Ringpu ta amlot; Ringpu in amahta innarhle, ipek amahta kalso; alamva amah in anson, ‘Keiva Ringpu asa kupa ang.’ ”
Che amahsoh inruuijouva thingkharh ah thirkit hemma anjamjou inruraan inkho mahchunga innangtronga manuih a trongsei.
Che pungku atlaktumma Jisu in arool inkaanga ongsa, “Eli, Eli, lama sabakhthani” Mahchuva, “Kei Ringpu o, kei Ringpu o, keita jarella namthlah peiangme?”
Che amahta ak an, akmuh mii in mahchuta antheih in ansonpei, “Amah in Elijah ta aong.”
Cheva kak hanga anmah ankaarna khat in tlaanna spankhat loua, mahchu tuiibuh akthuur a aphuumche raphalsung apaara khit a amahta am iinnatu amlan.
Chuta aktlei in anson, “Inngairo, Elijah in thlenga amahta akalume anrei.”
Cheva Jisu in veikhatla ahou inkaanga aongche amah ali amthlahpei.
Chunna anve, Ringpu mathruunna thlaam akseeng munna injaarpuun achungnata athlangphah innih suuk a inthrelsa; thaleikho inloksa, che lungkho koisei,
Rusuunkho inhoongsei, che ak inche akseeng anruungkho inthousei,
mahche Akpu in rusuunnata aringnua amah in rusuunnata inthruh a akseeng khuuboomma luut a miikuungah atakta ammuh ei.
Raalmii reijapuui leh amahsoh inruuia Jisu ta akngaak raalmii eiin, runaangnu thou khatkho mah aksuukthlouta anmuh in, khalmo intrisei, cheva atihpei, “Tak a mahmii i Ringpu vaa Asa kupasa!”
anmah ankaar a Makadalini Meri, Jems leh Joseph annu Meri, che Jebidi asa kupa vaa annuei.
Amah in Pilat kuungah seh a Jisu aruungta anihpei. Mahlai Pilat in mahchuta malannatu jathang amlanpei.
Mahche Joseph in Jisu aruungchuta loua akthra bulapuunna tuumma,
amah in lungpiita viit a aseem amah atasaak akthra rusuunna mahchuta asihpei; mahche rusuun akhaar a lung inrolkhat amdolhche amahpei.
Makadalini Meri mahche aktlei Meri in rusuun amaatalla inbok a ammei.
Tungvah nanga, mah chuvah thlouraangni aknua, akthloi thiimpu leh Pharisi eiin Pilat kuungah inchunna,
anson, “Lulok, amah miileemtheih kupa in aringlai, ‘Nithum aknua keiin rusuunnata veikhat ringtung’ ta asonkha kannih in intheih ung.

Mah churella nithumphah a rusuunta ngaaknatu jathang malanro, chunohleva amah aroiin thlenga amah aruungta amiriukche ‘Amah in kthinata ringsang’ ta miikuungah tong aja; mahche matsahna miileemtheih khachunga juktoolna miileemtheih in ralla thranoh vei aja.”
Pilat in anmah kuunga asonei, “Akngaaktu raalmii louve; seh a nannih in ansoinoh natu thra seella ngaakve.”
Mahchunna anmah in seh a akngaaktu raalmii eisoh lungta chum namma rusuunta thra a amingaakpei.
Mahche anve, runaangnu tranga thousa, alamva Akpu vaa ringroi khatin ringramnata trumma lungta amlatche, achunga inboksa.
Amah ameelva kini inthlanang, che apuunrei in hurnanga inngou.
Che rusuun akngaak in amahta trihseia inchuunsei cheva akthi miinangsei.
Chuta ringroiin kumei kuungah asonei, “Intrinohve, mah chuvah thingkharh ah anthat Jisu ta nanjon ta keiin kirom.
Amahvah onna amnohsa, alamva amah in ason khananga thinata ringsa. Thlenga ansihna amun i anve.

Pek intha seh a amah aroi ankuunga sonvesa mah chuvah Akpu vah thinata ringsa, mahche anve, nannih nanmaa a amah in Kalili ah lousehsa; nannih in mahkhan ameelta nanmuhtu. Anve, keiin nankuungah kisonpeichou.”
Mahchunna anmah in intrisoh khalmo roomthoksoh inruuia innotslamma rusuunta anmahche amah aroi ankuunga ansonnatu tlaansei.
Cheva anve, Jisu in anmahta intuukpia asonei, “Doiphah veive,” cheva amahninga thlenga akehta matuh a amithruunpei.
Mah laitalla Jisu in ankuungah asonei, “Intrinohve; seh choulaia kiuh kinaoin Kalili ah ansehnatu soneive, mah khanna keita kanmuhtung.”
Chuche anmah in anparuul eisoh inboomjoua trong intelsei, raalmii ankuunga baobeh tam malannatu
anrouva intelsei, “Amah aroi in thlenga khulouh kan ihsuunga amirukpei,” ta mii kuungah sonve.
Che mah i rampuui in theihle amah aril mathlanna nannihta klah knang nanimphahnoh natu kantlohtu.
Nga tloh anmah in baobehta anlohche, ankuungah amitheih khananga antlohpei; che mah i Judi ankaara mi in phah ansonmang.
Cheva amahta anmuh in amithruunpei; chuta arou invah chingnasei.
Cheva Jisu in ankuungah thlenga asonei, “Ringram mahche thaleia am amtik amneh naamte keikuungah kamlan peiang.
Churella nannih in seh choulaia jaat naamteta aroi seemve che anmahta Apavaa, Asa Kupa vaa, mahche Li Akseengvaa miinga lup eive.
Keiin trongthuun pumte kamlanchoukha, anmah in amijuihnatu matheih eive, che anve, juk achenohmiil phah a keiin nannihta lai amrel kanruuipi uchou.”
Ringpu Asa kupa, Jisu Khrista vaa Akthra Trong amthronna.
“Anro, keiin trongraanta nang nimaa a kimthlah,
“amah in nilam amchaangtu;
“raprilla inkhat in ong ahouchuva;
“Akpu alam machaangve,
“amah in asehnalam mathluunve.”
Che Judia ram anaamte mahche Jerusalem na mii naamte in amah kuungah thlenga, anmah anlehta anphoong, Jordan avaa a anmahta alupei.
Ipek John in uuksa amulvaa puunta asilh, che savun inraakna khapat anaamta akraak, che khaoleh raprilna khuuiningta asaak.
Che amah in raanna ason, “Kei kiknua akthleng amah in keichunga akchek amneh keiral, amah akehkhraang arui keiin inluk a majak keiva kimtik amnoh.
Keiin nannihta tuiia kiluppeichou, chuta amah invah nannihta Li Akseenga naniluptu?”
Che tuiinata anthruhsoh, kak hanga ringram inhoong amuhpei che Li in ukthru nanga amahchunga trumsa;
cheva ringramnata hou inkhat thlengsa, “Nangi keiin kamchaal Kisa kupache; nangkuunga keiin khalmo pelsang.”
Che amahta Seitan in amdoi a raprilla nijan sopli rapril sasoh inruuia amjou, che ringroiin amahta rou antloh.
asonei, “Lai i tlungsa, che Ringram kurung huunna i innaisa; nanril thleng choulaia, akthra trongta malotve.”
cheva Jisu in anmahta asonei, “Kei kiknu keijuihve che nannihta miisuur kamvei uchou.”
Kak hanga anmah torota anmahche aknu anjuihpei
Che ste asehche, amah in Jebedi asa kupa Jems che amah anao John in toro phoh a mulisuunga louam amuh ei.
Mahchun kak hanga anmahta aongei; che anmah in anpa Jebedita baobeh akthrulh roijuih eisoh mulisuungah anmahche, amah aknuta anjuihpei.
Che amah in amtheih khanna anmahvah salungkhousei, alamva ringjih lulok nangnoh a, aktloh akhal mii nanga anmahta amtheih ei.
Kak hanga anmah Sinakok ah akseengnoh li in anruuipi mii khat am;
cheva amah in ongsa, “Najareth na Jisu, kannihsoh jangnitlohjame? Kannihta mamaangnatu thlengcheme? Nang tucheme keiin kirom, Ringpu Akseengche.”
Chuta Jisu in amahta saalla ason, “Rimta amro, che amah ningnata inthruh rosa!”
Cheva akseengnoh li in amahta dir dirta amchuunche rool inkaanga onga amah ningnata inthruh rosa.

Che anmah naamtein salungkhousei, cheva anmah senga seeng inruia insonsei, “Mah i jangsame? Akthar matheihnasa! Akchek amnehkho jaoa amah in akseengnoh li eita jathang atloh ei, che amah in asonta amijuih.”
Che kak hanga Kalili velna ram anaam amun naamtea amah akming inthangsa.
Ipek Simon api atlunna intolh a am, che intha a amah turella akuungah anson,
cheva amah in thlenga akut matuh a, amahta amthohpei, chunna atlunkha thrasa, che anmahta rou atloh ei.
Che khuuboomna miinaam in innkhaar kuungah inboomsei.
Mahchunna alam tam natna rii aknaeita amah in amthratei, che khousaarta amnommei; che khousaar in antrongnatu majanoh, alamva anmah in amahta anrom.
Mahchunna Simon leh amah in anruuipijou in amah aknuta anthrulh,
cheva amahta antuukpiche akuungah anson, “Kannaam in nangta kanjonche.”
Che amah in ankuungah asonei, “Inihsoh innai khuupii khuupii a sehreio, mahchunna keiin Akthra Trong kiraannatu, alamva mairella keiin thlengsang.”
Che amah in Kalili ram naamte seh a anmah Sinakok Jikcha a Akthra Trong araan che khousaar amnomei.
Amahta arilvol hanga akut jamma amahta apalche akuungah ason, “Keiin kijapei, nang seengrosa.”
Mahchunna kak hanga reichii in amahta amahpei, che atakkho seengsa.
Cheva amah in atrongnoh natu tranga asonche intha amsehpei,

amah kuungah ason, “Anro nangin tukhat kuunga jakhatkho sonnohro; chuta sehchelaia nitaktalta thiimpu ankuungah mamuhro, che nangta namseengpei tihrella Moses trongthuun nujuih miikuungah chim tih a namromnatu inkatphukha katro.”

Chuta amah in seh a amah kharelna inthupthip amnoh a, maphorhnatu trong amthronpei, mahchunna Jisu in indanglonga khuupii a veikhat luut cheknohsa, chuta apaalla amsa; che amun naamtena mii in amah kuungah thlengsei.
Nikhat ninih aknua amah in Kaparnaum ah anlengin amah atakva inna amta antongpei.
Miitam boomsei, chunna anmah turella ohchunna khumkho sangnohsa, inkhaar apaal luungkho sangnohsa; che amah in ankuungah akthra trongta araanei.
Mii manli in tuklaia apangnem thi miikhatta puuia anthlen,
cheva mii tammal rella amah kuungah thlen cheknoh seia, anmah in amah amnachung inbungta ankekche mahoa, apangnem thi mii in antolhna tuklaita amithlakpei.
Chuna anmah in amilotkhata Jisu in amuh a apangnem thi miikuungah ason, “Kisakupa, nang nileh eita ki ip peiche.”
Ipek ringjih lulok ste in mah khanna inbok a, anrilsuunga inruiisei,
“Mahmii in jarella ngatrong meio? Amah in Ringpu ta usitnoh a trongsa! Tunang in alehta ip achekme chuta Ringpu khop in acheknoh ningme?”
Che kak hanga akroua ankaara trong inruieita Jisu vaa li in arompeia ankuunga asonei, “Jarella nannih nanrilla mainanga inruichoume?”
Apangnem thimiita, “Nang nilehkha ki ippeita son chunoh a; inthoua nang nantolhnata loua sehrota sonni, jaknangin aklaibebme?”
Chuta miivaa Asa kupa in alehta ipnatu tukleiramma achek am tih a namrom cheknatu amah in apangnem thimiita ason–
“Keiin nangta kisonche, inthoua nantolhnakha loua ni inna inlengrosa.”
Che amah in inthoua antolhnakha kak hanga alohche mii annaamta mah a sehsa; machunna anmah naamtein salungkhou seia Ringpu ta paar mathrat a antih, “Inih in mainangjim loumuhnoh luung mangme!”
Amah in veikhatla tuiiboom apaalla sehsa; che miinaam in amah kuungah inlomsei, mahche anmahta amtheih ei.
Che amah in aseh in, roi teenna phrangki thlaamma inbok a am Alphias asa kupa Levi ta amuh in ason, “Kiknu keijuihro.” Mahchunna inthoua amah aknuta ajuihpei.
Amah in teborra buh asaaknatu anboklai, roi akthrai eileh alehchel mii khatkho amah roijuih eiin Jisu soh inbokjousei, alamva amah aknujuihva miitam ei.
Mahche Pharisi vaa ringjih lulok eiin, amah in alehchel mii eisoh che roithrai eisoh ansaakjou anmuh in aroikuunga anson, “Jarella roithrai mahche alehchel mii eisoh asaakjoume?”
Mahchuta Jisu in atheih a ankuunga asonei, “Aruung akthra miiningva maipa kananoh, chuta aknaei turella kana; keiin akchimlamseh eita ak ong thlengnoh ang chuta alehchelei turella thlengsang.”
Mahchun Jisu in asonei, “Changri in changvaang akthleng rapkhei eisoh an amjoulai anmah in buhel anchek ume? Changri in anmahsoh an amlaisoot anmah in buhel cheknoh ei.
Mah aknichu thlengumang, changrita anmah kuungnata aphurhlai, che mah aknichunna anmah in buh anhel umang.
Tukhat inkho amlui puunna akthar puunkirra louphohnoh ei, phoh eile, phohna munkha, tihva amluinata akthar aphohna in akaia ralladom thranoh a inthrit.

Mahche tukhat inkho amlui savun thongta akthar nganglirah atuii lousuungnoh ei, suungeile, nganglirah atuii in savun thongta amphuuktu, chunna nganglirah atuiikho savun thongkho maangtu, chuta akthar nganglirah atuii i akthar savun thonga anlousuungning.”
Mahchunna Pharisi in amahta anson, “Anro, Sabat niah tlohphunoh thlouta niroi in antloh i jarelname?”
Che anmahta asonei, “Davit in atlohkha paanohchoume, andarkaar amlai che antraamlai anmah in jangthlouta antlohme.
Abiathar in aklok thiimpu aveilaia, amah in Ringpu inna khatloh a luutme, mahche thiimpu noh a saa janoh ankat tolta ansaak, che amah in anruuipikho amlannei.”
Che anmahta asonei, “Sabat i mii turella aseem, mii in Sabat turelna noh.
Chunna miivaa Asa kupa i Sabatni tukho akpu sa.”
Chunna amahta amilaalnatu sabat niah amahta amthrat umeta anngaak.
Che akut thimiita ason, “Tingvaro.”
Mahche anmah ankuungah asonei, “Sabat niah akthra tloh chunohleh thranoh tloh, chaanta kal chunohleh that i tlohphume tlohphunohme?” Chuta anmah in rimta amsei.
Cheva amah in amlung inhaanga anmahta invella aneiche, anril antrangrella mii khata ason, “Nikutkha jamro.” Amah in ajampei, cheva akutkha thrasa.
Pharisi in inthruhsei, che amahta khatloh a immaang umeta kak hanga Herodia eisoh intelsei.
Jerusalem nata Idumia Jordan araalnata, che Tair leh Sidon na miitam in amah in atlohthlou khata antheih a amah kuungah thlengsei.
Che amah in aroita muli khat amahturel amichaang natu asonei, alamva mii tammalsei, chunohleva anmah in anlom usa;
alamva amah in miitamta amthratei, chunna natna rii akna annaam in amahta palnatuta akuungah anlompei.
Che akseengnoh li akluut mii in Akpu ta anmuh in amah kuungah inriilla ongsei, “Nangi Ringpu Asa kupache.”
Mahchunna miikuungah kamromnoh veta anmahta tranga asonei.
Amahsoh inruuipi jounatu, che trongraan mathlahnatu,
che khousaar manom ancheknatu, akchek amnehvaa lii an amnatu mah somleinihta acharei,
Pitar ta Simon tih akho an ong;
Jebedi asa kupa Jems che Jems anao John amah in Boanerkes takho aong, mah chuvah kini inthlavaa asa kupa;
Andriu, Philip, Bartholomi, Methiu, Thomas, Alphias asa kupa Jems, Thadias, Kana na Simon,
che amahta akjuur Judas Iskariot isei.
Che inna inlengsa;
mahchuche miitam in veikhat thlenglasei, chunna anmah in saa iinkho cheknohsei.
Che amah taploikuungin mahchuta antheih inva anmah in ansuurnatu inthruhsei, alamva mii in antihpei, “Amah in anroua insengsa”
Che Jerusalem nata akthleng ringjih lulok eiin anson, “Amah atak i Biljebul soh inruuisa, che khousaar aklok akliia amah in khousaarta amnompei.”
Che anmahta akuungah aongeiche pandam malanna asonei, “Khatloh a seitan in seitanta amnomchek ume?
Kurung khat in paalta akroua injanoh a inthrek baak suukleva, amah innsuungkha paal cheknohtu.
Che innsuung khatin akroua injanoh a inthrek baak suukleva, amah innsuungkha paal cheknohtu.
Che Seitan in ataksaakta injanoh a inthrek baak suukleva amah in paal cheknoh, chuta amahtu achena thlengsa.
Chuta tukhat inkho akraang mii inna luut a, akraang mii khata matsah a makaangnoh avah amah apootchei sut cheknoh tuei, amkaangche aknua sut anchek umang.
chuta tukhat in Li Akseengta thranoh indah a trongle, tiknikho in ipnohtu, chuta ache amnoh alehvaa amraal am”
Alamva anmah in ason, “Amah atak ah akseengnoh li amsa.”
Che miitam in amahta lomma inbok a amsei; che anmah in akuungah anson, “Nangnu leh ninao eiin apaalla nakjonna amsei.”
Chunna amah in amsang, “Kei kinu mahche kiuh knaochu tuseime?”
Che akomma inlomma anbokeita invella anche asonei, “Kei kinu mahche kei kiuh kinaova onna amsei!
Tunangkhat Ringpu amdon aktloh miikha kei kinao, kisar mahche kinusei.”
Che amah in pandam veia tam amtheih ei, che amah in matheih a asonei:
“Rungaive! Chivorh mii khat in avorhnatu inthruhsa.
Amah in chita avorh in, chi arouva lamkomma tla, cheva va in thlenga mahchu anchunpei.
Che arouin lung amnachunga tla, mahchun philtam amnoh taningvah intha a moong, mahchu philtam thuuknoh;
che kini ahanglaia akjung chom taningvah inhuuisa.
Chi arouin kuling kaara tla, che kuling inkaanga ahippei, che inrahnohsa.
Che chi arouin tuklei athratna ah tla a adoon thra inthruhsa, che thra moonga sopthumvak, soprukvak mahche reijavak akrah ralla inrahsa.”
Che amah in ason, “Tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan, rungaiso.”
Che amah in ankuungah asonei, “Ringpu vaa kurung huunna anrukta nankuungah kamlanpeichou, chuta apaalla ak am eiva bilam pandamma insonsa;
chunna anmah in atak a muhvah aja chuta romnoh tuei, che anmah in atak a rungaiva aja chuta lou theihnoh tuei; anmah in veikhat inhei tuei, che in iptuei.”
Chivorh mii in trongta avorh
Che lamkomma aktlakha anmahsei, trong anrungeihta seitanin kak hanga thlenga che ankuungah am trongkhata alohpei.
Che mahchunanga lungchungah akvorh eikho, trongchu antheihlaiva, kak hanga roomthoksoh inruuia anloh;
che anmah antak a akjung amnoh a, chuta kakruta moongning, trong irella klah knang nohle chut in athleng laia kak hanga anmah in inriilsei.
Che aktlei in kuling kaara avorhkhasei; anmahva trong arungai khasei,
chuta tukleiram turel insuulsei, che doonkhaal tinga roomthoksei, che aktlei akthloi akditing luutsei che inhalsei a akrah amnoh veisei.
Chuta arouva tuklei athratna ah avorhkhasei anmahva trong anrungeihche aklou khasei mahche sopthumvak, soprukvak che reijavak inrahsei.”
Alamva inthuptu jakhatkho amnoh, indangtupot seengning, inruktu jakhatkho amnoh, akvaara thlengtupot seengning.
Tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso.”
Che amah in ankuungah asonei, “Nannih in nantheihchu thratea louve; nannih in olla namilanna chaang khanna olla nanphahtu che thloia nankuungah nanimlantu.
Alamva tam ak am ningah ralla amlantu che ak amnoh ningva amah in asihkhakho alohtu.”
che khulouh ah intolh a mahche suunna inthoutu, che chi in akekche moongtu, amah in khatloh a moongme romnohtu.
Thalei in akroua amthruhning, matsahremma adoon, che inmuum, mahchuche inmuumnata akrah apum vei.
Chuta akrahkhan aminlaiva, kak hanga amah in tokoia avaat, alamva chiluh thlengsa.”
Mah i intram amunang, kuleichungah ivorhlaiva, thaleichung ak am chi anaamtechung andihrem;
mahchu ivorhlaiva kmoonga liinsa che inlou naamtechung ralla akliinrem vei, che abaak in liinna inbaak, mahchun marvaanna va in amah aliah anbuh anseem.”
Amah in ankuungah trong veia pandam tam asonei, anmah inkho rungai anchek;
amah in ankuungah pandamnoh a routrongnoh, chuta aroi ankuungah ajea amah in bilam anaam amtheih ei.
Che miitamta amah eiche, anmah in amahta mulisuunga anphurhpei, matsahna nanga aktlei mulikho anmahsoh inruuijoua sehsei.
Che aktrang khuleh thli karaangsa, che tuiisolh in mulita amratpei, mahchun mulisuungah tuii luut amthronpei.
Chuta amahvah thikhemma insa; che anmah in amithohche akuungah anson, “Lulok, kannihva maangsamsung nangin kanimdonnoh sacheme?”
Che amah in anthohche thlita akhaampei, che tuiiboomta ason, “Nangninga leh oi am veiso!” che thliraangchu ingaisa, daichritsa.
Amah in ankuungah asonei, “Nannih in jarelna intrichoume? Nannihva namilot amnohme?”
Che anmahva intria thonohsei, che khatleh khat insonsei, “Amah i jaknangmii meio? Thlileh tuiiboom inkho atrongta amijuih i!”
che amah in mulinata anthruhlai akseengnoh li luutmii khat in rusuunnata inthruh amah in antuukpi.
Amahva rusuunkaara am; che amahta thirrui akho ankhitta cheknohsei;
alamva amahta inleng inlenga thirhang leh thirrui akho ankhit, chuta thirruikha angem ngemma pot a akthek, che thirhangkho akir kirra akhoih, che tukhat inkho amahta madam cheknatu anlii amnohsei.
Khulouh suun rusuunkaara che muulchungah lai amrel amah in ongtlamma am, che akroua lunga inchuk inchuk a am.
Amah in Jisu ta saraalla aheimuh in tlaanna amahta amthruunpei;
che amah in arool inkaanga onga ason, “Akthloirem Ringpu vaa Asa kupa Jisu keita jangniktlohja angme? Ringpu ming sonna kitihche keita kamlahnohro.”
Alamva amah in akuungah ason, “Akseengnoh linang miikhannata inthruhro!”
Che Jisu in amahta arui, “Nikming tume?” Amah in amsang, “Kei kikmingva miitam; alamva kannihva tammung.”
Che ramboom khannata anmahta masehnoh natu amah in anoollei.
Mahchunna muul ajaara vok loomkhat athlaisa a ammei;
che anmah in akuungah anoolpei, “Kannihta vokjaam kaara kanluutnatu kanimthlahro.”
Che amah in ajapei, che akseengnoh li in inthruhseia vokjaam khanna luutsei; che vokvah akpul innihvak ei, antrumna a inlaak a tuiiboomma tlasei che tuiia luut a thisei.
Vokjaamta aksel in tlaanna khuuboom leh ramboomma ansonpei. Che jangthlouta suukmetea an annatu anmah in thlengsei.
Che anmah in Jisu kuungah thlengsei, miitam in anruuipi khousaar chuung miikhan aril chimma puunreikho silh a inbok a am anmuhpei, che anmah in intrisei.
Che akmuh eiin khousaar in anruuipi miile vokjaamkha khatloh a suukmeta antongpei
Che anmah in Jisu ta amah amunni mathlah a anmahso inthringpi ramma asehnatu annoolpei
Anmah in mulisuungah aluut suunga, khousaar in anruuipi mii in amahsoh anruuia asehnatu asonpei.
Chuta amah in indahsa, che akuungah ason, “Inna inlengro, mah chuvah Akpu in nangturel jikcha atlohthloukha che nangta veichahphah namlungsikha, niruul nipai ankuungah sonro.”
Che amah in seh a Jisu in amah kuungah jikchahphah a thlou keitlohme tihkha Dekapolis a trong amthronpei, mahchuta akmuh miinaam in salungkhousei.
Cheva akming Jairas an ong, sinakok inkhat akpuuichu thlengsa; che amahta amuh in, amah in akehkungah intolhsa.
Che akuunga inruruh a ason, “kei kisakumei naoi i thisamma amsa. Thlengro che nikutkha akuunga jamro, chunna thra aja, che ringtu.”
Cheva amahsoh inruuia sehsa.
Che khalmo miitam in amahta anjuihpei che anlompei.
Che kum somleinih thiiluung kumei khat mahchun rouam.
Che maipa tam ankut ah khalmo klah kanang aphah, amah in asih anaam akatkirpei, che thra cheknohsa chuta ralladom asokna veisa.
Amah in Jisu rella antong atheih, che miitam in amah aknuta anjuihpei, che apuunta apal.
Alamva amah in ason, “Keiin amah puunruta palsanglakho, keita kamthrattung.”
Che kak hanga thiitam luungchu inngaisa; che amah in natna riinata thra sang ta amah aruungin antheihpeita.
Che Jisu in akuungnata tuui inthruhsa ta arom invah kak hanga miitamting inheia ason, “Tunang in kei puunta apalme?”
Che amah aroiin akuungah anson, “Miitam invella inkholh i nangkho nimuhche nisonlamang, ‘Tunang in keipal angme?’ ”
Tunang in keipalmeta amah in invella a anpei.
Chuta kumei in, keikuungah jangta atlohme tihkha aromin, kumei in trih a inchuunna amaikuungah thlenga intolhsa, che akuungah akchim anaamte atongpei.
Che amah in akuungah ason, “Kisa kumeio, nangin namlot kharella nangta namthratpei, leh oia sehrosa, che nang ninatna riikha thrasaso.”
Amah in tronga a amsuunga, rampuui inn khannata mii arouin thlenga ansonpei, “Nang nisa kumeikha thisa. Jarelna lulokta ralla namnok mangme?”
Chuta anmah in asonta lounoh, Jisu in sinakok akpuui kuunga ason, “Intrinohro, malot paningro.”
Che Pitar leh Jems mahche Jems anao John khop noh a tukhat in keita keijuihnohve.
Anmah in sinakok akpuui innkhanna anthleng laiva, amah in tranga ongsa.
Mah khanna aluutche, ankuunga asonei, “Jarelna nannih in tranga onga traptruui choume? Naoi thinoh chuta inning.”
Che amahta aminuihpei. Chuta amah in annaamta apaalla amthruh ei, che nao apa leh anu mahche amah in anruuipi eita akhaampei, che nao amna ah luutsei.
Akut a amtuhche akuungah ason, “Nao kumei, keiin nangta kisonche, inthouro.”
Che kak hanga anmah in salungkhoua sipsei.
Che amah in ankuungah klukanga asonei, tukhat in mah i rom janohtu, che amah kuungah saakphu ste malanveta asonei.

Che amah in sabat nia sinakok ah matheih amthronpei; che amah trongta aktheih ei in salungkhoua anroua insonsei, “Ramnata mah vachah i alohme? Jaknang lousingta aphahmeio? Jaknang salungkhouna thlouta akut a ammeio?
Mah i thingchal mii Meri asa kupa, Jems leh Joses mahche Judas leh Simon vaa an uhte khatkho amah asarva inihsoh inruuijou mii khanohme?” Cheva amlung amihaangpei.
Che Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Amah ramboom khop noh a, amah unao pasa ankaar akho, mahche ataploikuung khop noh a, ringraan inkho amahta injahnohsei.”
Cheva amah in salungkhouna thlou mah khanna tlohnohsa, akna mii arouta anchunga akut jamma amthratei.
Che anmah in amilotnoh khanna alamveia salungkhousa. Che amah in khuu khuua matheih a sehsa.
Che sungrolh inkhat khopta, tolkho, thongkho, khapatkho, baobehkho nannih in rapkheitla nansehna a jakhatkho phurh janoh tuta amah in akchaak ei;
chuta kekhraangva chuungve che lungluut innih maruuinohve.
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Amun khatta mathlah a nansehnohmiil, nannih in nantlungna innkhan amve
Che amun aktleitlei a nannihta nanisoongnoh eile, mahche nantrongta rungaidah eile, nannih in amunkhata nanmahlaia, nankehna uphulkha mathiimma mahve alamva trongirhna in anmahta indahna veitu.”
Chunna anmah in sehsei mahchuche miita rilthlengnatu trong anraanpei.
Che anmah in khousaar tam aminom, khatkho akna miita thao antei in anmah in thraei.
Chuta aktlei in anson, “Mah i Elijah.” Chela aktlei in anson, “Mah i Ringraan inkhat, amlui ringraan inkhat nangjim.”
Chuta Herot in mahchu atheihlai amah in ason, “Keiin akang kitan John ta ringsa.”
Alamva Herot in mii mathlah a John ta amsuur, anao Philip akmei Herodia relna makaanga simma asih; alamva amahta apaalpi.
Alamva John in akuunga ason, “Nangin ninao akmeita niloh i trongsuur in janoh.”
Che Herodia in akuunga atlohthlou rella indahsa, che athatja hangta that cheknohsa.
Alamva Herot in John ta trihsa, amah in John i akchim mahche akseeng mii ta arom, che amah in kalla asihpei, amah in akuungnata arungeih laiva, amah in khalmo inchoisa; che aroomthok nanga arungeih.
Chuta Herot apokni a amah in kurung koolna mii, che phrangkiei, mahche Kalili na aklokeita buh doonnatu taancha thlengsa.

Alamva Herodia asakumei in luut a laamsa, amah in Herot leh Rapkheina akthleng mii eita anril ampelpei; che kurung in kumei kuunga ason, “Jangmekhat slakho nangin nikditchu keinih chele, keiin kamlan uche.”
Che amah in akuunga trongchet amlanpei, “Jangmekhat slakho nangin keinih chele, kamlan uche, kei kuruung huunna tangkhai slakho kamlan uche.”
Che amah in apaalla inthruhsa, che anukuunga atihpei, “Jaknang pootta kinih usame?” Che anuin akuunga ason, “Aklup John vaa akang.”
Che amah in innot a kak hanga kurung kuunga luutsa, che aruipei, “Keiin nikuunga kinihche mah chuvah intha a aklup John vaa akangta tarpeng chunga sih a kamlanro.”
Che kuruungchu kaa ralla kilaalpeita insiirsa, chuta amah trongchet leh rapkheina mii anthleng in alamveia amah trongchu akuunga khoi indahsa.
Che kak hanga kuruung in amah akngaak raalmiita amthlahpei che aklup John akangta thlennatu jathang amlanpei. Amah in sehsa che simnata akangchu atanpei.
Che amah akangchu tarpeng chunga athlenpei, che kumeikuunga amlanpei; che kumei in anukuunga amlanpei.
Aroi in mahchuta antheih in, anmah in thlengseia aruungchu anlohpei, che rusuunna anphuumpei.
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Nanroua houla intheihnanoh amunna seh a lai kak inngaivesa.” Alamva aktam in seh ei thlengei, che anmah in buh ansaakna tukho sangnohsei.
Che anmah in mulia antak anroua houla intheihnoh na a sehsei.
Ipekva miitam in anmah ansehnachu anmuhpei, che anmahta anrompei, cheva anmah in khuupii khuupiinata tlaanna sehsei, che anmahchung matsah a loutlungsei.
Amah in tuiipaal annaisoh miitam inlomma amuhpei, che amah in ankuunga arilvol hangsei, alamva anmahva sadamkem amnoh sadam nangjimsei; che amah in ankuunga khalmo tam matheih amthronpei.
Che mahchu athil inva, aroi in thlenga akuunga ason, “Mah amun i houla intheihlou che pungi ipekva thilsa;
mathlah eirosa anmah ramboomma che khuu khuu avella ansehche antaktu saakphu ste slakho leia ansaaknatu.”
Chuta amah in ankuunga amsangei, “Saakphu ste ankuunga malaneive.” Che anmah in akuunga asonei, “Kannih in seh a denari reijanih chaangna tol kanleiche ansaaknatu ankuunga kamilan usame?”
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Tol jikcha jaomang choume? Seh choulaia anve.” Che anmah in antuuklaia asonei, “Tol ranga leh nga innih.”
Cheva anmah in loom loom veia meiphulchung inboknatu annaamta jathang amlanpei.
Chunna anmah in loom loom veia reija, che sopnga veia inboksei.
Che tol ranga leh nga innihkha alohche amah in ringramting intouva anche, doi amlanpei, mahche tolkha akhoihche miinaam kuunga semnatu aroikuung amlanpei.
Che annaam in ansaakche anvon invahsei.
Che anmah in anvui anvi luktoong somleinih amitlonpei, che ngakho injaosa.
Che tol aksaa eichu akpul ranga ei.
Che anmahta amthlahche aknua, amah in muulchunga ngennatu kalsa.
Che khulouhram athleng inva, mulichu tuiiboom alaia amsa, che amah akroua tuiikomma amningsa.

Che amah in saraalla insuulla ansehchu amuh ei, alamva thli in anmahtonga amratpei, che khulouh anna manlivak aktlaklaia, tuiiboom chunga seh a amah in ankuunga thlengsa. Anmahta ralla mahtangei ta amdon.
Chuta anmah in tuiiboom chunga seh a thleng anmuh in kukthlata thleng inaita amidonpei, che trap a ongsei;
alamva annaam in amahta anmuh in intrisei, chuta kak hanga amah in ankuunga asonei, “Nanril liinve, keisang; intrinohve.”
Che anmahsoh inruuia muli chuungsei cheva thliraangkho inngaisa. Cheva anmah in salungkhou khemsei,
alamva anmah in tol relna bahap tlanoh eichuta anmah anril trangei.
Che anmah in mulinata anthruhsoh, kak hanga mii in amahta anrompei,
che intongpi ramtonga tlaansei che aknaeita thlen amithronpei.
Che amah in athlengna makheia, khuu khuua, khuuboom khuuboomma, nohle ramboom ramboomma mahche keithiil keithiilla aknaeita amthratei, che amahta intuukpia amah apuunrei slakho akpaleita amthratei.
aroi arouin ankut buura ansaak mah chuvah ankut silnoh eita anmah in anmuhpei,
(Alamva Pharisi, leh Judi annaamva ankut ansilnohmiil anmah in saanoh ei puthou pithou in antloh nonota anna;
che anmah in keithiil nata anthlengche, antakta amiseengnoh miil anmah in saanoh innoh ei; mahche anmah in aktlei antlohthlou jikchakho anjuih am, kam leh beel che pithrai kuchaikho anchaam.)
Pharisi leh ringjih lulok in akuunga anrui, “Jarella nang niroi in puthou pithou in antloh nujuih a ringnoh eime, che khatloh a ankut buura ansaakme?”
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Isaiah ringraan in thratea nannih in akthra nanveisinta amjihnanga nanisonpei, mahmii ei in annar avah keita kanjah ei, chuta anril avah kei kuungnata inlasei;
nannih in veinohtupot ah keita kamthruunna amchou, mii in matheihna nanga namitheih nohme?
Nannih in Ringpu trongthuunta namithlahche mii in antloh nonota matuh a amchou?”
Che amah in ankuunga asonei? “Nannih in Ringpu trongthuunta nandah natu akthra lam nantlohpei, nantlohthlou nonota tlohna turella!
Alamva Moses in ason, ‘Nannu leh nanpata injahve; che anu apata thranoh aktrong amahkha, inlitnoh a thitu;’
chuta nannih in nanson, ‘Mii khat in apa nohle anuta; jangmekhat slakho nangin kikuunga kanana niktuk in Korban’ (mah chuvah Ringpu kuunga malan) ta sonleva,
amah in apa nohle anuta jangmekhat tlohkhal majanoh usa,
nga tloh a Ringpu atrongta thou sanohchou nannih in nantloh nonota tloh a nan amrella. Che aktlei jikchakho nantloh.”
Che veikhatla mii eita amahkuunga onga asonei, “Keirungaive, nannaamtea che loutheihve:
miivaa apaalna jangkhat inkho atak a aluutche amahta mabuur cheknoh; chuta miivaa asuungnata anthruhkhop in amahta ambuurning.”
“Tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso.”
Che mii eita amthlahche innsuunga aluutlaia, aroi eiin pandam irelna akuunga anrui.
Che amah in ankuunga ason ei, “Mahchu nannih nannaam in loutheinoh sachoume? Nannih in muhnohchou mah chuvah jangmekhat slakho apaalnata mii ninga akluut in amahta abuur cheknoh,
mahchu luutleva malungnanoh chuta avonpiina, mahchu phao ume?” (Nga tloh a saakphu anaam kseeng amah in asonpei.)
Che amah in asonei, “Mii kuungnata anthruh in amahta ambuurpei.
Alamva asuung tongna, miivaa malungnata anthruh thranoh ril kumei kupa inlaal, inru, miithat, miimei miisa laal,
karaam, ril seengnoh, machinthi, ralla karaam, amah ata amveijahang, miirilh miison, in orh, kmong.
Mah thranoh anaam i asuung tongnata inthruh, che mah naamte in miita ambuur.”
Chuta kak hanga seengnoh li amruui nao kumeiva anuin, amah relna atheihpei, cheva thlenga akehkungah intolhsa.
Ipekva kumeichu Kriik jatih, apok lainata Sairophonisia na mii. Che khousaarta asakumei ningnata amnomnatu anoolpei.
Chunna kumei kuunga ason, “Naoei in matsah a invahmaan eiso, alamva naoin ansaaktuphu tolta loua uiikuunga loonna malanvah chimnoh.”
Chuta amah in akuunga amsang, “Oi, Akpu; naoin ansaakna tebor thuuia aktlakho uii in ansaak.”
Che kumei kuunga ason, “Alamva mahchu nisonche nang nilamting sehrosa; khousaar in nisa kumeita aloumahpei.”
Chunna amah in inna inlengsa, che naochu kuktholla intolh a am antuukpipei, mahche khousaar in aloumahpei.
Che makuurpang trong suuknoh kupa khatta amahkuunga anthlen; che amah achunga akut ajamnatu anson.
Che miitam kaarnata ajea alohche, akut majungin amkuurta apalche machilla amleita apal.
Che amah in ringramta intouva anna, tranga in onga akuunga ason, “Iphatha,” mahchuva, “Inhoongrosa.”
Che amah amkuurchu inhoongsa, amah amleikho inthruhsa, che amah in khleng khlengta trongsa.
Che anmah in tukhat kuungkho antongnoh natu tranga asonei, chuta anmah in ral ralla ril malut a amiphorpei.
Che anmah in ol cheknohna chaanga salungkhousei, che anroua insonsei, “Amah in anaamte amthratpei; amah in makuur akpangeikho mahoonga amtheih chekpei, che antrong aksuuknohkho amtrongchek peiei.”
“Keiin miitamta kirilvol hangsei, alamva anmah in keisoh inruuia an amna ipek nithum aphahpei, che jakhatkho ansaaktu amnohsa;
che keiin anmahta traamma an inna mathlah sangeile, lamma dem asaaktuei; anmah in ram klahnata thlengsei.”
Che aroi in amisang, “Khatloh a mii vachah tam ita tunang in mah chaarram in tol amsaakchek tueime?”
Che amah in ankuunga aruiei, “Tol jikcha injaochoume?” Anmah in amisang, “Sirih.”
Che amah in miitamta meiphul chunga maboknatu jathang amlanpei; che tol sirihta alohche ampaak, mahchuhta khoia semnatu aroita amlanei, che anseempei.
Che anmah in nga indih ste injaoei; che doi amlanpei, mahchukho ansemnatu jathang amlanei.
Anmah in ansaakche invahsei, che anlei invuivi amichun in, luktoong sirih sip a inleisa.
Mahchu mii akpul manlivak ei.
Cheva anmahta amthlahpei ei; che kak hanga amah in muli achuungche aroieiso inruuia Dalmanutha ramsiinna sehsei.
Che amah in aril lah a ason, “Jarelna mah ringnatluun in daang anjonme? Atak a nankuunga keiin kisonchou, mah ringnatluunta daang malannohtung.”
Cheva anmahta amahpeiei, mahche veikhat mulia akalche aktleitonga sehsa.
Ipekva anmah in tol theihlou a maruuinohsei; mulisuunga tol khalekta ansih ningsa.
Chunna ansoi amnohnatu ankuunga, asonei. “Pharisi leh Herot vaa anchol kharelna cheksilve.”
Mahchurella anmah in khatleh khat intella insonsei, “Inih in tol amnohsa.”
Che mahchuta arompeia, Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Tol amnohsata akchimrel jarella intelchoume? Pekphah romnoh mangchoume nohle lou theihnoh mangchoume? Nanrilkha trangsme?
Nanmit amrerea muhnoh sachou che namikuur amrerea rungainoh sachoume?
Keiin tol rangata khoia mii akpul rangata kamsaakchou, luktoong jikcha sip a anvuivi namitlonme?” Anmah in anson, “Somleinih.”
Che tol sirih in mii akpul manlia, nannih in luktoong jikcha sip a anvuivi nanchunme? Anmah in akuunga anson, “Sirih.”
Che asonei, “Nannih in lou theihnoh mangchoume?”
Amah in mitchota akut a kaia, khuu apaalla anthruhpi, che amah in amit a amchilche achunga akut sih a amahkuunga arui, “Nangin jangta nimuhme?”
Che amah in intoua anche ason, “Keiin mii kimuh; chuta anmahva thing inloinangei.”
Che veikhatla amitchunga akut asihche amah in incheknoh a a an invah thrakhemsa, che anaamte seenga amuhpei.
Che amahta a inna amthlahpei, akuunga ason, “Nangin khuusuunga luutnohro.”
Che anmah in akuunga anson, “Aklup John; che aktlei in Elaijah; mahche aktleila in ringraan ankaarna inkhatcheta nansonei.”
Che amah in ankuunga aruiei, “Chuta nannih inva keita tume nantih angme?” Pitar in amsang, “Nangva Khrista che.”
Cheva amahrella tukhat kuungakho son janoh tuta tranga asonei.
Mah i seenga ason, chunna Pitar in amahta athleia phurh a saal amthron.
Chuta aroita inheia a aneiche, amah in Pitar ta saalla ason, “Kei kiknunga inmahro, Seitan! Alamva nangva Ringpu tongnanohche, chuta mii tongnache.”
Alamva tukhat in amah chaanta ankaljale maangtu; che tukhat in amah chaanta kei turella che akthra trong rella maangle inkaltu.
Alamva mii khat in tukleiram anaamte changslakho amah chaanta maangleva achuungnatu jangamme?
Alamva mii khat in amah achaan ngut a inlenga jangpootta apekchek ume?

Alamva tukhat in kei mahche kei kitrong rella miimei miisa laal khatkho alehsip ringnatluun inna injakleva amah in Apaso inruuia akseeng ringroi eisoh paarthra aveilaia, amah in miivaa Asa kupa kuungakho injak aphahtu.”
amah puunreichu intlelitsa, inngoubengsa, thaleina puunsuk tukhat inkho mainanga mangou cheknoh tuei
Che ankuunga Elaijah leh Moses thlengsa; che anmah in Jisu soh trongjousei.
Pitar in Jisu ninga ason, “Lulok inih in onna iam thra, thlaam inthum seemrei, inkhat in nangtu che inkhat in Moses tu mahche inkhat in Elaijahtu.”
Alamva amah in jangkisonme romnoh, alamva anmah in ralla intrisei.
Che sumphai in anchunga abahpei, “Mah i keiin kirilvol Kisakupa amah in ason rungaive.”
Che kak hanga invella an an in tukhatkho muhnohsei chuta Jisu akrouta anmuhningsa.
Chunna aksuuk kharella anmah in anroua anrilla ansihpei, thinata ringi jangta asonnameta inruisei.
Che anmah in akuunga anrui, “Jarella ringjih lulok in Elaijah matsah a thlengtu antihme?”
Che anmahta asonei, “Poot naamte amlengnatu Elaijah in thlengtu; che miivaa Asa kupa rella khatloh a amjihme, amah in klah knang khalmo aphahtu che injahna amnohluunga aminang tupotme?
Chuta keiin kisonchou mah chuvah Elaijah kha thlengsa, amahrella anjih khananga, anmah in akuunga anrilpella antlohjakha antlohpei.”
Che kak hanga miitam in amahta anmuhlaia, khalmoa salungkhousei, che tlaanna amahta anlousoongpei.
Che amah in ankuunga aruiei, “Jangta nannih in anmahsoh intelchoume?”
Che miitam kaarna inkhat in amsang, “Lulok, kisakupa nikuunga kithlengpi, alamva trong suuknoh li in amahta asuurpei;

che mah li in asuurlaia, amah in kuleia inriil inriilsa; che amchilkha inthruh mahche ahakho amket amket che mah chukhopnoh a akehkut kaia khalmo klahsa; chunna mah ita manomnatu niroi ankuunga kison in cheknohsei.”
Chunna amah in ankuunga amsangei, “Ah, malot amnoh ringnatluun, jikcha soot a keiin nannihsoh inruuia kdou umangme? Naokha kikuunga keithlenve.”
Che anmah in nao kupakha amahkuunga anthlenpei; che li in amahta amuh in, kak hanga inlat inlitsa, abaoa amchilkho suuksa.
Che Jisu in apakuung aruipei, “Jikcha soot a mainanga suuksame?” Chunna amah in atih, “Nao aveilainata.
Che amah in injomma meikaar mahche tuiisuunga chong chong, amahta mamaangnatu aksuul; chuta nangin nichek namnehta tlohchek cheleva, kannihta kanirilvolro che kanimjoomro.”
Chunna Jisu in akuunga ason, “Nangin chekcheleva; poot annamte amlot miikuung avah veikir.”
Kak hanga nao apa in trap a onga ason, “Keiin kamlot; malot a inleuh sanglakho kamjoomro.”

Che miitam inlomma tlaanna anthleng amuh in, Jisu in seengnoh lita saalla ason, “Nang trong suuknoh mahche makuurpang li, keiin jathang nikuunga kamlanche, amahkuung nata inthruhro, che veikhat inlenga luutnohro.”
Cheva naoin onga atrapche aknua amahta trihkhopna veia akchutpei, mahcheva inthruhsa, che nao kupakha akthi ruungnangsa; chunna aktam in antihpei, “Amah i thisa.”
Chuta Jisu in akutta akaiche amthohpei, cheva inthousa.
Che amah in innsuunga aluutlai, aroi in inruktea anruipei, “Jarelna kannihva manom cheknoh ungme?”
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Mainangi jakhat inkho manom cheknohtu chuta ngen in.”
alamva aroita matheih a ankuunga asonei, “Miivaa Asa kupakha miikut a amilantu, che anmah in anthattu; anthatche, nithum aknua amah in veikhat ringtu.”
Chuta amah in asonkha lou theihnohsei, che anmah in akuunga ruikho trihsei.
Chuta anmah in rimta amsei; alamva khatleh khat in tunang in akliinrem umeta lamma intelsei.
Che anmah in inboksei che somleinihta aongpei; chunna anmah kuunga asonei, “Tukhat in matsahremtang tihle, annaamte ankaar a juktoolremtu che annaamtevaa roijuih veitu.”
Che amah in nao inkhatta alohche anmah akaar a asih, akutbaanga akonche, ankuunga ason ei,
“Tukhat in mah nao nanga kikminga louchoule keita nanloh ang; che tukhat in keita keilou choule, keita keilounohchou chuta keita kamthlah amahta nanlohpei.”
Chuta Jisu in asonei, “Amahta khaamnohve; alamva akliin thlouta kikminga atlohche sootnohveia aknua kikuunga thranoh trongtu tukhatkho amnoh.
Alamva tukhat in inihta indahnoh eile anmahvah inihtasei.
Alamva atak a keiin nankuunga kisonchou, mah chuvah nannihva Khrista ming akphurh miichouta tukhat in tuii chaplakhat nan iinnatu nanimlanle, amah atlohmankha tiknikho maangnohtu.”
Che nang nikut in nangta aleh a nakthlakleva, mahkha tanmotro, athih amnoh mei, repnanga nikut innih inruuia nitlakngutva nikut tua nangin akringa niluut in ralla thratu.
Mah khanna aklungin thinohluung che meikho thinohluung.
Che nang nikeh in nangta aleh ah nakthlakleva, mahkha tanmotro; repnanga nikeh innih inruuia nitlakngutva nangin nikeh tua akringa niluut in ralla thratu.
Mah khanna aklungin thinohluung che meikho thinohluung.
Che nang nimit in nangta aleh a namthlakleva, mahkha kholro; nimit innih inruuia repnang nitlakngutva nimit khalekru a Ringpu vaa kurung huunna niluut in raalla nangtu thratu.
Mah khanna aklungin thinohluung che meikho thinohluung.
Alamva mii naamteta mei in machih am alnanga am al umang.
Machih i thra, chuta machih in a alta maangleva, khatloh a nangin nim al umangme? Nankaar a machih ma amve, che inkhatleh khat leh oi veive.”
Che Pharisi in thlenga amahta chaang anna arui, “Trongsuur nujuih a kupakhat in akmei inthrekpi ajame?”
Amah in ankuunga amsangei, “Moses in nankuunga jaknang trongthuun amlanme?”
Anmah in amisang, “Kupakhat in rai majih a kumei inthrekpi Moses in ajapei, che amahta amnomtu.”
Chuta Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih nanril in atrangrelna mah trongthuun i amjih.
Chuta aseem amthron lainata, ‘Ringpu in kumei kupa aseempei.’
‘Mah in alamveia kupakhat in anuleh apa mathlah a kumeisoh inchuntu,
che anmah innih in ruung khalek veiusei.’ Chunna anmah in innih veijnoh a chuta ruung khalek veiusei.
Chunna Ringpu in alamveia amchun ei i, mii in threknoh eiso.”
Che aroi in mairella innsuunga veikhat akuunga anrui.
Che ankuunga asonei, “Tukhat in akmeita anthrekpiche aktlei kumei khatta changvaang leva, kumei laalthlou atlohpei;
Che kumei inkho amsalta anthrekpiche aktlei kupata changvaang leva, amah inkho kupa laalthlou atlohpei.”
Chuta Jisu in mahchu amuh in amlunghaangsa, che ankuunga asonei, “Nao eikha keikuunga thlengeiso, anmahta khaamnoh eive; alamva Ringpu vaa kurung huunnakha mah naonang antasa.
Atak a, keiin nankuunga kisonchou, tukhat in naokhat nangjimma Ringpu kurung huunnata lounoh choulevah mahchun luutnoh uchou.”
Che naoeita akutbaanga akoneiche anchunga akut jamma doi amlanei.
Che Jisu in akuunga ason, “Jarella keita akthrata nak ong angme? Tukhatkho akthra amnoh chuta Ringpu khopning.
Nangin trongthuunkha nirom; ‘Inthatnohve, miimei miisa laalnohve, Inrunohve, Akchimnoh sakhi a ngirnohve, malei seinohve, nannu nanpata injahve.’ ”
Che amah in akuunga ason, “Lulok, keiin nao kivei lainata mah anaamte i kimjuih kirpei.”

Che Jisu in akuunga a an in arilvol hangsa, che akuunga ason, “Nangin inkhat namvaatmang; seh a nangin nidoon naamtekha juurro, che anrankuunga malaneiro, che nangin ringramma doonkhaal veiuche; che thlenga kiknu keijuihro.”
Mahchu ason in amai inthimsa, che amah in marhuuia inlengsa; alamva amahva andoon ankhaal tam asih.
Che Jisu in invella a anche aroi ankuunga asonei, “Akdoonei in Ringpu kurung huunna ah luuttupot ei i khalmoa klu!”
Che amah in atrong chunna aroi in salungkhousei, chuta veikhatla Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Naoeio, mah i jikcha phah a klume Ringpu kurung huunna a luut i!
Akdoon mii in Ringpu kurung huunna ah aluuttu ngutva kukthrimpoa uuksa in aluut in aklaitu.”
Che anmah in thloia salungkhousei, che akuunga anson, “Chuleva tunang in achaan inkal aphahchek tupotme?”
Jisu in anmahta a anche asonei, “Miiningva mahchu veinohtu, chuta Ringpu ningva mahchunoh; alamva poot anaamte Ringpu ningva veikir.”
Pitar in Jisu kuung ason amthronpei, “Anro, kannih in anaamte kanmahkirpei che nangta kanjuihpeiche.”
Jisu in asonei, “Atak a keiin nankuunga kitihchou, akthra trong rella che keiturel tukhat in a inn alou nohle auh anao nohle asar ajuur nohle anu apa nohle asa anao nohle aram amuul mathlahnoh leva,
ipek chup in tukhat in, a inn alou che auh anao che asar ajuur che asa anao che aram amuulchung klah knang athlenglai loutho cheknohle, athlengsam ache amnoh punsi a saruk reijavak phahnohtu.
Che aktam matsah in juktooltu che juktool in matsahtu.”

Anmahta asonei, “Anve, inih in Jerusalem ting hangrasei; che miivaa Asa kupakha akthloi thiimpu leh ringjih lulok ankuunga amilantu, che anmah in amahta thatnatu amilaaltu, mahche Jental kuunga amilan usa;
che amahta amirattu, anthattu; mahchuche nithum aknua amah in veikhat ringtu.”
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih turella jangthlouta namitlohja sangme?”
Che anmah in anson, “Nangin paarthra niveilaia, inkhat in nikchangtonga che inkhat in nikveitonga, inboknatu kanijaro.”
Chuta Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in jangthlouta nanruiangme tihkho romnohchou, keiin ki iinna chapla a nannih in iin nanchek ume, nohle keiin tuii kinlupna khanna nannih in inlup nanchek ume?”
Che anmah in akuunga anson, “Kanchektu.” Che Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Keiin ki iinna chapla a nannihkho nan iintu; che keiin kinlupna akhanna nannihkho inlup uchou;
chuta kikveitong nohle kikchangtong inbokva keiin kamlantu phunoh, chuta maiva anmah turelna machaangche a asih antasa.”
Che som in mahchuta antheih lai, Jems leh John ankuunga saal amithronpei.
Che Jisu in anmahta akuunga aongeiche atih ei, “Nannih in mahchu nanrom tukhat in Jental akpuchunga paaltangta paallei, che anmah akliin mii in akchek amneh thlou anchuunga antloh.
Chuta mahchu nankaar avah veinohtu; chuta tukhat in anrol aveijale nannih roijuih veitu,
che tukhat in nankaar a matsahremtang tihle nannaamtu roijuih roithaang veitu.
Alamva miivaa Asa kupa in amahta rou antlohnatu thlengnoh chuta amah in miita rou atlohnatu, che amah punsita malanna miita thloknatu thlengsa.”
Che amah in Najareth na Jisu tih a atheih in, trap a ongsa che ason, “Davit vaa Asa kupa, Jisu, keita niril kamvolro!”
Che amah in rimta a amnatu ansaalpei; chuta ral ralla ongsa, “Devit vaa Asa kupa, keita niril kamlvolro!”
Che Jisu in inngaia ason, “Amahta ongve.” Che anmah in mitchota an ongpei; che akuunga anson, “Niril lahnohro; inthouro, amah in nangta nak onga am.”
Che apuunta alonche chongsa che Jisu kuunga thlengsa.
Che Jisu in akuunga ason, “Keiin nang turella jangnimtlohja angme?” Mitcho in akuunga ason, “Lulok, keiin kimuhjasa.”
Che Jisu in akuunga ason, “Sehrosa; nangin namlotrella nangta namthratpei.” Che kak hanga amah in amuhpei che lamma amahta ajuihveipei.
che ankuunga asonei, “Nanmaa a am khuukhan nannih in sehve, che kak hanga nannih in nanluut laia samong aruulkhat inkhit a am nantuuktu, mahchu tukhat inkho huuinanoh mangei, majak choulaia thlenve.
Tukhat in nankuunga, mah i jarella nantlohme? ta nanirui eile, ‘Akpu in darkaar che intha amlenglatu ta masangve.’ ”
Che anmah in sehsei, che samong aruulchu lamkomma am thongkunga inkhit a amta anmah in antuukpei; che anmah in amijakpei.
Mahchunna tunangkhat ngirra am in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in jangtlohnatu, samong aruulkha namijakme?”
Che anmah inkho Jisu in ason khananga ankuunga ansonpei; che anmah in anjapei.
Che anmah in samong aruulkha Jisu kuung anthlenpei, che anmah in anpuun anrei achunga anthahpei; mahchuche achunga chuungsa.
Che aktam in anpuun anrei lamchunga anthah, mahche aktlei in lounata thingbur antukche anthah.
Che amah amaa a akseh leh akjuih in tranga ongsei, “Hosana! Akpu minga akthleng amahkha doiphahsa!
Inih Pa Devit va kurung huunna akthlengsam i doiphahsa! Ankaang remma hosana!”
Che saraalla thotthing inkhat abur jaova moong amuhpei, che amah in inrah tunaita a an, amah in a an inva, jakhatkho tuuknohsa aburnoh a, alamva mahchu thotthing anrahna manjangnuram nohmang.
Che amah in mahchuta ason, “Tukhat inkho veikhat inlenga nikrah naksaanoh eiso.” Cheva aroi in mahchuta antheihpei.
che amah in tukhatkho mathruunna thlaamsuunga jakhatkho thlen majanoh.
Che amah in ankuunga matheih a atih, “Kei inni jaat naamtetu ngenna inn tih a in ongtuta injih a amnohme? Chuta nannih in mah i inru inraanva akon namiveipei.”
Che akthloi thiimpu leh ringjih lulok in mahchuta antheihpei che amahta mamaangnatu lam anjonpei; anmah in amahta trihsei, alamva amah in amtheihna khanna mii in salungkhousei.
Che khulouhram aphah in anmah in khuuboom nata inthruhsei.
Che Pitar in intheihsa, mahche akuunga ason, “Lulok, anro! Nangin phool nitloh thotthingkha inhuuisa.”
Che Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Ringpu ta malotve.

Tak a keiin nankuunga kitihchou, tukhat in mah muulta, ‘Inlongbulhro che tuiiboom suunga tlarota sonchoule, che arilla chingna amnoh luungle, amah inta malotle ason anaam veikirtu, che akuunga mahchu veitu.’
Churella keiin nankuunga kisonchou, nannih in bilam ngenna nihchoule, mahchu kphahpeita malotve; che mahchu nanta veitu.
Che nannih in ngirra nanngenrel, tukhat kuunga nanjanoh amle ipve; chunna ringram ak am Pa inkho nanleh eikha a iptu.
Chuta nannih inta ipnohchoule ringramma am nanpa inkho nannih nanlehta nani ipnohtu.”
che amah in akuunga asonei, “Jangnichek nimneh amrella mah i nitlohme, nohle mah achek amneh i nitlohnatu tunang in nangta namlanme?”
Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Keiin trongkhat naniruitang; kamsangve, mahche keiin mah i jangnang kichek kimneh ah kitlohme kison uchou.
John in alupkha ringram name nohle mii tingname? Kamsangve.”
Che anmah in khatleh khat inngeia amsei, “Inih in ringram tingna tihmaleva amah in asontu, ‘Jarella amahta malotnoh choume?’
Chuta inih in, ‘Mii tingna tih a ison ume?’ Chulata amah in miita trihsei, alamva John va akchim ringraan ta aktam in anrompei.”
Chunna Jisu kuunga amisangpei, “Kannih in romnoh ung.” Che Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Kei inkho mah i jaknang akchek amneh ah kitlohme nanisonnoh usang.”
Laichu aphah inva, amah in lampaar aksaa ankuungnata akrah ste aphahnatu amah roijuihta amthlah ei;
che anmah in ansuurche ankhonpei, che anmahta aruuk a amilengpei.
Veikhatla amah in ankuunga aktlei roijuih amthlahla, che anmah in akanga amiratche aminuihpei.
Che amah in aktleita amthlahlaei, che anmah in anthatpei, arouta ankhon che arouta anthatpei.
Amah in arilvol asa kupakhat asihmang; achena a amah in ankuunga amthlah, ‘Anmah in kisa kupata injah tuei ta amdon.’
Chuta lampaar aksaa in khatleh khat insonsei, ‘Mah i pipasa; thlengve, amahta thatreio, che amah in achang khaankha inih ita veitu.’
Che amahta ansuurche anthatpei, che nganglibil apaalla anlonpei.
Mahchu nganglibil Akpu in kha atloh tueime? Amah in thlengtu che lampaar aksaaeita ammaang tuei, mahche ngangli bilkha aktleikuunga amlantu.
Nannih in mah ringjih i paanohchoume; ‘Inntloh mii in andahtal lungta akiinga kukchopii louveisa.
Mahchu Akpu in atloh, che mahchu nanmit in salungkhou same?’ ”

Che anmah in anthlengche akuunga anson, “Lulok, kannih in nangi chimche ta kanrom, mahche nangin tukhatkho thousanohche; alamva miivaa inkaang phomkho injahnoh luungche, chuta Ringpu lam akchimta namtheihning. Keisaar kuunga roi malanni trongsuura tlohphume nohle tlohphunohme?”

Kannih in kamilan ume, chunohleh malannohtu ungme? Chuta anmah in akthra anveisinkha aromma, amah in ankuunga asonei, “Jarella keita chaang nan an angme? Baobeh apumkhat keithlenve, che keiin mahchu antang.”
Che anmah in baobeh apumkhat anthlenpei. Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Onna injih i tunangsoh intrimme che tumingme?” Anmah in akuunga anson, “Keisaar.”
Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Keisaar kuunga malanphukha Keisaar kuunga malanve, che Ringpu kuunga malanphukha Ringpu kuunga malanve.” Che anmah in akuunga salungkhousei.
“Lulok, Moses in kannih turella amjihpei mah chuvah kupakhat in athiche akmeita mahle, chuta asa amnohle, amah unaoin akmeichu lou aja, che auh anao turella asa apokche koolkem aja.
Unao kupa sirih ammei; matsahrem in akmei aneihpei, che amah in athi inva asa amnohsa;
che innih tihpi in amahta alohpei, che thisa, asa amnohsa; che inthum tihpikho mahchusoh intrimma suuksa;
Che sirih tihpi inkho asa amnohsa juktoolremva kumei khakho thisa.
Thinata anring laiva mahchu tunang akmei vei ume? Alamva sirih in anmei amiveipei.”
Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in Ringpu atuuikho ringjihkho romnohchou, mairella nannih in inlaalnoh choume?
Alamva anmah in thinata anring laiva, innpaal nohle changvaanga malanchu amnoh usa, chuta ringramna ringroi nangjim usei.
Che akthinata ringi, Moses nirik ah nannih in paanohchoume, inbang kaarna tronghou kharella, khatloh a Ringpu in akuunga asonme, keivah Abraham vaa Ringpu ang?
Amahvah akthivaa Ringpu noh, chuta akring turella; nannih in khalmo nanlaalpei.”
Jisu in amsang, “Matsahrem chuva, rugaive, Israel o; inihvaa Akpu Ringpu i Khalekning;
che nangin niril apumte, niruungvaa nikli apumte, nimdon apumte, mahche niklii apumtein nang Akpu Ringpu ta rilvolro;
innih tihpi in maisa, nangin nantongpita nitaktal nanga rilvolro, mah ichunga ralla trongthuun kliin aktlei amnohsa.”
Che ringjih lulok in akuunga ason, “Nang chimsache, Lulok; nangin chimma nisonpei, mah chuvah amahvah khalekning, aktlei jakhatkho amnoh chuta amahning;

che amahta malung apumtein, anaamte bahaptla a akloutheih ril apumtein, mahche ikli apumtein amahta rilvol mahche intongpi miita khalek veia rilvolro, mah naamtein meia haalla inkat apumte chunga akralremsa.”
Che amah in ksinga amsangpei ta Jisu in aromma, amahkuunga ason, “Nangin Ringpu vaa kurung huunna khannata inlahnoh sache.” Mahchu aknua tukhat inkho intrinoh luunga akuunga trongrui cheknohsei.
Devit ataktal in, akseeng li a chuunga sonna amdangpei,
“ ‘Kei Akpu in Akpu ninga asonpei,
“ ‘kei kikchangtonga nanboksoot,
“ ‘nang nak andah eita nikehthuuia keiin kisihtu.’
“Devit ataktal inkho amahta Akpu ta aong; chunna khatloh a amahta amah asa kupa vei ume?”
Che miitam in inlomma roomthoksoh inruuia amahta anrungeihpei.
Che amah in matheih a a atih ei, “Ringjih lulok eita cheksilve, anmahta keithilla mii in injah a amithruunnatu lungluut insuul silh a seh andit
che sinakok ah akthrarem inbokna phomma che injahna aja buhdoonna phomma inbok andit,
anmah in trulmeinu an innta ansutche sootkhak a akngen veisinnei. Anmah in ralla klah kanang anphatu.”
Che anran trulmeinu inkhat in thlengsa, amah in kuri baobeh apum innih amlan, mahchu pulla lupakhat.
Che amah in aroita aongeiche ankuunga asonei, “Atak a, keiin nankuunga kisonchou, mah anran trulmeinuin poot akat i annaamte in ankatchunga amah in ralla akatpei.
Alamva anmahva andoonpot suungnata ste louva ankatning chuta amahvah adoonpoot aringna apumteta amlanpei.”
Che Jisu in akuunga ason, “Nangin mah liinna anseem inni nimuh eime? Lung inkhat in inkhatchunga khalekho inthoongnoh a athlanga inpilkir umang.”
“Kanisonro mahchu tik a suuk ume, che mah thlou naamte atlungna tupot i jaknang daang ah inromna vei ume?”
Chunna Jisu in ankuunga son amthronpei, “Tukhat inkho nannihta inhea nanimruui noh natu cheksilve.
Kei i amah khasang tih a kikminga miitam thlengtuei, mah i antihtu, che anmah in inhea miitam nanimruuitu.
Che nannih in raal khatkho raalhou nantheih laia, nanril malah a inchoinohve, mah i inlitnoh a thlengtu, chuta achenavah nohmang.

Alamva ramboom khatleh ramboom khat in andah tuei, che kurung huunna khatleh kurung huunna khat in andah tuei; amun aje jea runaangnu thoutu, mahche buhchaal suuktu; chuta naopok in klah kanang aphahnanga mah naamte i suuk usa.
Che Akthra Trongi ramboom anaamtea matsah a inlitnoh a inraantu.

Che anmah in nannihta chaang naniannatu mahche nanimlannatu nanithlenlaia, nannih in jangkison umeta matsah a inhalnohve; chuta mah pungchun nankuunga nanimlankha trong paningve, alamva mahlaichun nannih in trongnoh uchou, chuta Li Akseeng in trongtu.
Che unaoin unaota mahche apa in asata thihnatu amlantu, che ansa in annu anpachunga andah tuei che anmah in inthat tuei;
Mii naamtein keiming rella nannihta nantirh tuei, chuta tukhat in achena phah a akdouchek mii in inkal aphahtu.”
“Che kmaang krem trihkhop ngirhnaphunoh amunta nannih in nanmuh laia (akpaa in louthei eiso). Chuche Judia a ak am ei in muulla tlaaneiso;
innchunga ak am in trumnoh eiso, jangmekhat slakho louva atlaannatu innsungakho luutnoh eiso;
louvah ak am inkho puunrei lohnatu inlengnoh eiso.
Che mahlaichun nao inpooi mahche naoroiei turelva lahnasa a!
Mah i phalbia asuuknoh natu ngenve.
Alamva Ringpu in tukleiram seem amthron lainata pekphah aksuuknoh klah knang suuktu, che aknu avah suukho suuknoh usa.
Che Akpu in aknikhata machomnoh leva, tukhatkho inkal cheknohtu; chuta amah in charra akdommii iturella, amah in aknichu amchomtu.
Chunna tukhat in nankuunga, ‘Anve, onna Khrista am!’ nohle, ‘Anve, ohkhanna amah amsa!’ Nannih in mahchu malotnohve.
Chimnoh Khrista leh chimnoh ringraan thlengtuei che daang leh salungkhouna jikcha nanimmuhtuei, jaleva achar miiluungta chimnohtinga aphurhtu.
Chuta cheksilve, keiin thlou anaamte matsah a kisonpeichou.”
che ringramna arsi in triltuei, mahche ringramna atuui inloktu.
Chunna nannih in miivaa Asa kupa in paarthra leh akliin tuuisoh inruuia sumphaia thleng nanmuhtu.
Chunna amah in ringroi amthlahtu, thliraang akiing manli nata, thalei adongna khatnata ringram achena phah a amah in acharmiita amchuntu.”
“Thotthingata para veia nanromnatu nanimtheihkha romve: abaak in intha a annouche abur suun, mahchun nannih in suurjai naisa ta nanrom.
Mahchunanga, thlou anaamte i suuk nanmuh laia, amah i innaia phalkuunga amsa ta nannih in nanrom.
Atak a, keiin kisonchou, thlou annamte i matsah a asuuknohmiil mah ringnatluun i maangnoh umangtu.
Ringram leh thaleiva maangtu, chuta kei kitrongva tikniakho maangnoh luungtu.”
Cheksilve, heithriil theihve; alamva nannih in laichu tik a thlengtu romnoh uchou.
Mah i kupakhat in rapkheitla ah seh nangjim, amah in inn amthlahltumma roijuihta angut masilla, anmah anthlou nujuih a, che thong angaakta heithriiltheih anveinatu jathang amlanei.
Heithriilla amve, alamva khulouhramma, nohle jaanjaia, nohle aar ankhuung laia, nohle juktiinga nohle innpuin tik a thlengtu nannih in romnoh uchou
Chunohleva amah in kak hanga athlenglai nannihta inkhemma am nanituuktu.
Che keiin nannaamta kisonchou: heithriil theihve.”
alamva anmah in anson, “Buhdoon suunga tlohnohrei, alamva mii in dirdir tihtuei.”
Chuta arouin amilung inhaanga khatleh khat insonsei, “Jarella mah amanchaal inteiphu thaota ampaampeime?
Alamva mah inteiphu thao i dinari reija inthum akralla ajurhche anran anriingta malanleva” ta anmah in kumeita anrilhpei.
Chuta Jisu in asonei, “Amahta akroua mahve; jarelna nannih in amahta namilahme? Amah in akthra thlouta kikuunga atlohpei.
Alamva anran anriingva nannihsoh injomma amjou tuei, che nannih in anmah kuunga akthra nantlohja laia nantlohtu; chuta nannihva keisoh injomma amnoh uchou.
Amah in achekpot keikuunga atlohpei; keita kanhuihnoh maa a amah in kiruungta thao poih a keinuulpei.
Che atak a keiin nankuunga kisonchou, tukleiram apumtea Akthra Trong ita anraan anraanna a, amah in atlohthlou ita intheihna veia anson usa.”
Che mahchu antheih in anroomthoksa, che baobeh malannatu trongchet anlohpei, che amah in ajurhnatu reipakthra amjonpei.
Amah in aroi ankaarna innihta amthlah ei, che ankuunga asonei, “Khuuboom suunga sehve, che tuiipul tonga kupakhat nantuukpitu; amahta juihve,
amah in aluutna innpuninga sonve, ‘Lulok in ason, kei rapkhei khumchu khome, ramma keiin kiroi eisoh khuldoon buh kisaak ume?’
Che amah in maseenga amchaangche achungnung khumkhat nanimmuhtu; mahchun inihturel thlouraang tlohve.”
Che aroi eiin inthruh a che khuuboomma sehsei, che amah in ankuunga asonnanga antuukpipei; che mahchunna khuldoon buhdoonnatu thlouraang antlohpei.
Che anmah in tebor a ansaaklaia, Jisu in asonei, “Atak a, keiin nankuunga kitihchou, nankaarna inkhat in keita keijurhtung, mah chuvah keisoh jouta aksaa mii khanna.”
Che anmah in marhuui amithronpei, chuche amahkuunga inkhat khat a antihpei, “Mahchu keisangme?”
Amah in ankuunga asonei, “Mahchu somleinih nankaarna inkhat, amah in tol alohnatu kama keisoh jouta akut apuurtu.
Alamva miivaa Asa kupa in amah turelna injihche khananga sehtu, chuta miiva Asa kupata akjuur amahkhava lahnasa! Amah turelva anpoknoh in ralla thratuta.”
Che amah in chapla alohpei, mahchuta ampaakcheva amah in ankuunga amlanei, mahche annaamte in mahchu an iinpei.
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Mah i kei trongirhnavaa thiisa, miitam turella akluungsa.
Atak a, keiin nankuunga kisonchou, keiin veikhat inlenga ngangli atuii i iinnoh usang Ringpu kurung huunna aknia akthar veia ki innohmiil.”
Che anmah in laa tlohjoua chorophol muulla sehsei.
Chuta keita kamringangche aknua, nannih nanmaa Kalili ah keiin lousehtung.”
Pitar in akuunga ason, “Anmah annaamte in nangta nakmah a seh seilakho, keiva tiknikho nakmahnohtung.”
Che Jisu in akuunga ason, “Atak a, keiin nikuunga kisonche, mi in khulouh talla, aarkhong in veinih ankhuungnoh maa a, nangin keita veithumkhek kandah a inleem uche.”
Chuta amah in karaang kanga ason, “Keiin nangsoh thijoutung, keiin nangta nandahnoh luungtung.” Che mahchunanga annaamte inkho intrimbenga ansonpei.
Che amah in Pitar leh Jems mahche John ta anruuipiei, che amah aril klah leh insuk inhal amthronpei,
che amah in aroi ankuunga asonei, “Kei kikli i khalmo thisamma klahsang; onna louamve, che heithriilve.”
Che ste inlah ah asehche, amah in tukleia intolh a angenpei, mah i vei ajaleva, amah akuungnata pungi masehro.
Che amah in ason, “Abba, Pa, poot anaamte nikuunga veikir; mah kammi keiningnata louro; chuta keiin kamdon veinoh a nangin nimdon veiso.”
Che amah in athlenglaia anmahva inna louamsei, che amah in Pitar kuunga ason, “Simon, in mangcheme? Nangin pung khatrukho innoh a doucheknoh cheme?
Nannih in madoina a nantlaknoh natu doutrangve che ngenve; li inva amdon chuta ruung invah marnopsa.”
Che veikhatla amah in ngennatu sehsa, intrimbeng trongta sonna angen.
Che amah in veikhat athlenglaikho anmah in inna louamsei, alamva an ihmuh hanga anmit khalmo klahsei; che anmah in akuunga khatloh a amisangtu tihkho romnohsei.
