Che amah in ankuunga veithum tihpi thlengsa; che ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in pekphah inna inngaia ammang choume? Ajapei, apungkha thlengsa; miivaa Asa kupakha alehvaa ankut a anjurh usa.
Inthouvesa seh raseio, anve, keijuurtu miikha inihkuunga innaisa.”
Ipek akjuurmii in ankuunga daang malanna atih ei, “Keiin kamchohmiikha Amahkhasa; Amahta suurchoulaia thra sella phurhvesa.”
Che amah in athlengsoh kak hanga Jisu kuunga avache atihpei “Lulok!” cheva amahta amchohpei.
Che anmah in akutkhit a ansuurpei.
Chuta ankaar a akngir inkhat in chem akjuukche akthloi thiimpu vaa roijuih inkhatta amkuur apheklokpei.
Che Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Inru miita aksuursam nanga, chemthal khatkho sungsoh inruuia keita keisuur thleng sachoume?
Aknirel keiin nannihsoh inruuia mathruunna thlaamma nannihta nanimtheih a ammang, che mahlai nannih in keisuurnohchou, chuta ringjih trongkha athlungna veisa.”
Che annaamte in amahta mathlah a tlaankirsei.
Che intlangsa khat in amahta ajuihpei, jakhatkho injaonoh chuta bulaapuunna aruungta inthlomning; che anmah in ansuurpei,
chuta bulaapuun alonche athlaia tlaansa.
Che Pitar in amahta inlabeb a ajuih, akthloi thiimpu innmuk phah a; che amah in mei oh a akngaak raalmii eisoh inbok a am.
Ipekva akthloi thiimpu mahche jama annaam in Jisu ta anthatna turella sakhi anjonpei, chuta anmah in jakhatkho tuuknohsei.
Alamva aktam in amahrella chimnoh a sakhi amilanpei, che anmah sakhichu inchunnohsei.
Che arouin ngirra amah turella chimnoh sakhi malanna anson,
amah in ason kantheih, “Keiin mah mathruunna thlaam kut a anseem ita kikthrit kirche nithum suunga aktleikhat kiseemtu, mah chuvah kut ah seemnohtung.”
Chunna anmah sakhi luungkho intrimnohsei.
Che akthloi thiimpu in alaitalla angirhche Jisu ta arui, “Nangin namsangtu amnohsame? Nangta nakjanoh a mii in sakhi amilanni khasame?”
Chuta amah in jakhatkho masangnoh a rimta amsa, veikhatla akthloi thiimpu in akuunga anrui, “Doiphah Asa kupa Khrista kha nangcheme?”
Che Jisu in ason, “Keisang; che nannih in miivaa Asa kupakha tuuivaa akchangtong kut a inbok che ringramna raalmiisoh inruuia thleng nanmuhtu.”
Che akthloi thiimpu in alungluutta akthritche atihpei, “Jarella mairella sakhi malannatu darkaar ammangme?
Amah in Ringpu ta usitnoh a trong nantheihpei. Nannih in nanngirhnava khasame?” Che annaamte in indah a amahta thatnatu ngirsei.
Che arouin amahta amichil, amai amikhum, che amahta marat amithronpei mahche akuunga anson, “Kanisonro!” Che amahta akngaak raalmii in suura anbengpei.
che amah in a an inva Pitar mei oh a am amuh a akuunga ason, “Nangkho Najareth na Jisu soh inruui miinoh cheme.”
Chuta amah in indah a ason, “Nangin nisonni keiin romkhonoh ang che louthleihnoh ang,” che amah in kolol kuunga inthruhsa.
Che roijuih kumei in amahta amuhlapei, che akngir ankuunga veikhatla son amthronlapei, “Mah kupa i ankaarna inkhat.”
Chuta amah in veikhat indahlasa. Che akomma akngir ei in veikhatla Pitar ninga anson, “Nangi inlitnoh a ankaarna inkhatche; alamva nangi Kalili na mii che,”
Chuta amah in akroua phool inpesa che trongchet malanna, “Nannih in nantrongna mah kupa i keiin romnohluung ang.”

Che kak hanga aarkhong in veinihtipi inkhuungsa, Jisu in Pitar kuunga asonta intheihkirsa, “Aarkhong in veinih ankhuungnoh amaa a nangin keita veithumkhek kandah uche.” Che amah in aril sok a ankhupche marhuuisa.
Che Pilat in akuunga arui, “Nangi Judi eikuruung cheme?” Chunna amah in akuunga amsang, “Nangin nisonpei.”
Che akthloi thiimpu ei in amahta janoh a maraal khalmo amithlak.
Che Pilat in veikhat aruilapei, “Nangin namsangtu amnohsame? Anro, anmah in nangta nakjanoh a nichunga maraal jikcha namthlak ei.”
Chuta Jisu in masangnoh luungsa, mahchunna Pilat in salungkhousa.
Ipekva ujouhoong amipaangrel mii in annih nujuih a simma am mii khat amithlahtrang.
Ramboomta akjanoh, simma am miithat miisun ankaarna akming Barabbas kupakhat am.
Che miitam in anthlengche Pilat in atlohnanga ankuunga atlohnatu trongrui amthronpei.
Che amah in ankuunga amsangei, “Nannih turella Judi ei kurungta mathlahnatu nannih angme?”
Alamva akthloi thiimpu in kallak eia amahkuunga amisilta amah in arom.
Chuta anmah turella Barabbas ta mathlahnatu akthloi thiimpu ei in miitamta anchok ei.
Che Pilat in veikhat ankuunga asonei, “Chunna nannih in Judi eikuruungta nan ong mii akuunga keiin jangkitloh ume?”
Che anmah in veikhat tranga onga, “Amahta mathluve.”
Che Pilat in ankuunga ason, “Jarella, jaknang thranoh atloh relname?” Chuta anmah in “Amahta mathluve” ta ral ralla ongsei
Cheva Pilat in miitamta anpelna turella, Barabbas ta mathlah a; Jisu ta maratnatu che mathlunatu anmahta amlanpei ei.
Amahta bukal amchu lungluut amisilh, che akanga kuling lukhum amikhum.
Che amahta injah amithronpei, “Soot ringso, Judi ei kurung!”
Che anmah in akanga sungah marat amithronpei, amaia amichil, ankhuk makamma amahta injah amimuh.
Anmah in aminuihche, bukal amchu lungluutta anliimche amah ataksak lungluutta amisilhlapei, cheva amahta mathlunatu anphurhpei.
Che anmah in Kolkotha ah amahta anthlengpipei (Mahchu arthava kangruh amun).
Che anmah in tuiibuh leh amrimtui thao mairh mapoolla akuunga amilan; chuta amah in mahchu iinnohsa.
Che amahta amithlupei, che anmah in rasi chaang anna veia amah puunreita tutu in chang umeta anromnatu ankaar a insemsei.
Amahta amithlu laichun pung inthum tlasa.
Che amahta janoh a majih a antaarva, “Judi ei Kurung” ta anpa.
Che anmah in inrumii innih amahsoh inruuia amithlupei, inkhat in akchangtonga mahche khat in akveitonga.
Ringjih in asonkha atlungnasa mahchuva, “Amahta alehchel ankaar a ateenpipei.”
Che amahta vanna akseh ei in akuunga manuih a, che ankang lek a anson, “Khasa! Nangin mathruunna thlaamta nikthritche nithumma kitlohtuta nisontamo,
nikroua inkalrosa, che thingkharh nata trumrosa!”
Cheva akthloi thiimpu leh ringjih lulok eiin khatleh khat in amahta manuih a anson, “Amah in aktleiva akalche; akrou avah inkal cheknohsa.
Khrista, Israel va kurung, thingkharh nata ipektalla trumrosa, mahche kannihkho nakmuh a namlot tasung.”
Che pungku atlak in Jisu in ongsa, “Eloi, Eloi lama sabakhthani?” Mahchuva, “Kei Ringpu o, kei Ringpu o, jarella keita namthlah peiangme?”
Mahchunna akseh akloon arouin mahchuta anthleih a anson, “Anve, amah in Elaijah ta aong,”
Che mii inkhat in tlaanna putsia tuiibuh aphuumche, thing apaara khit a amah in a iinnatu amlan, che amah in ason, “Elaijah in athlengche amahta louva amthrumme anrei.”
Che Jisu in tranga an ongche amah akphuk dongsa.
Cheva mathruunna thlaamma anjaarpuun arelnata athlangphah innih suuk a inthrelsa.
Che amahsoh amaingat a akngir, raalmii reijapuui in amah akphuk dongchu amuh in ason, “Atak a, mahmii i Ringpu vaa Asa kupa reo!”
amah in Kalili a amlai amahta anjuih, che rou antloh; mahche aktlei tam inkho Jerusalem a amahsoh inruuijoua thlengjousei.
Arimathia Joseph, trongtloh ankaar a injahna vei, ataktal in Ringpu kurung huunnata jonna ak am in aril inthok hanga Pilat ninga sehsa, che amah in Jisu aruungta lohnatu anihpei.
Che Pilat in thi sameta salungkhousa; che amah in raalmii reijapuuita, amah in athina sootsme ta aruipei.
Che amah in raalmii reijapuui kuungnata aromche, amah aruungchu Joseph in alohnatu amjapei.
Che amah in bulapuun aleiche, amahta thingkharh nata amthrumpei, bulapuun khanna atuumpei, lungpiita khurh a anseem rusuunna amahta amitolhpei; che rusuun akhaarta lunga amikhumpei.
Meri Makadalini leh Joses anu Meri in ramma amitolhme ta anmuhpei.
Che kouhva matsahrem anrang juktiinga anmah in rusuunpiia sehsei mahlaiva ramvaarsa.
Che anmah in khatkhat a insonsei, “Rusuun khaarna lungita inihngut a tunang in amilatmeio?”
Che achunga an an in, lung inlat a amta anmuhpei, mahchu khalmo inrol lungpii.
Che rusuunna anluut in, intlangsa khat changtonga inbok a am anmuhpei, puunngou a inliing, mahchuta anmuh in salungkhousei.
Chunna ankuunga asonei, “Salungkhou nohve; nannih in Najareth na Jisu amithlukhata nanjon. Amahvah ringsa, onna amnohsa; amahta amitolhna munkha anve.
Chuta sehve, amah aroi leh Pitar ninga sonve amahvah nannih nanmaa Kalili a lousehsa; mahchunna nannih in amahta nanmuhpitu, amah in nankuunga matsah a nanisonche khananga.”
Che anmah in apaalla anthruhche rusuunnata tlaansei; alamva antak inchuun mahche salungkhou suuksei che intrikhemsei.
Ipekva anmah in kouhtu matsahrem akni inranga, mah chuvah amah in matsahremma Meri Makadalini mah chuvah khousaar sirih amnomna kumeikuunga atakta ammuhpei.
Amah in anthruhche amahsoh anruuipi ankuunga asonei, chunna anmah in marhuuia trapsei.
Amah in ringsa mahche keiin kammuhpei ta ankuunga asonkha antheih in anmah in malotnohsei.
Mahche aknua anmah in ramboomma ansehsuunga, ahoongkhat veia anmah innih kuungah atakta ammuh ei,
che anmah in anlengche aktlei kuungakho ansonpei, chuta anmah in malotnohsei.

Achenaremma somleikhat in tebor a inbok a an amlaia amah in thlengsa; che anmah in amilotnoh khatkho anriltrang khanna amah in ankuunga asaallei, alamva amah in aringche aknua amahta akmuh in malotnohsei.
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Tukleiram anaamte nannih in sehve che akthra trongta mii naamte kuunga raanve.
Tukhat in malot a inlup akphahta akaltu; chuta tukhat in malotnoh a inlupta amlaaltu.
Che amlot mii ankuungva mah daang in anruuipituei: kei kikminga anmah in khousaar aminomtu; akthar trong trongtuei;
muruul suur seilakho che tuur iinseilakho; anmahta jakhatkho tlohnohtuei; akna aksaaeita anmah ankut in anpalla thratuei.”
Che anmah in amun naamtea ansehche anraanpei, Akpu in anmahsoh thlou atlohlaia, daang in atlohthlou akthra trongchu chimsa ta anrompei. Amen.
Amthron lainata anmit tak in anmuh mahche trongta rou aktlohmii, in ikuunga amilankha aknujuih a,
inih ikaar a atlungkirche thlouvaa amramma mii aktam in thamin maveia kut ansunna turella,
O, amtik liin Thiophilas nangin nitam akchim thaminta rom ajanatu,
keikho matsahna thloulam anaamte nikuunga thratu ta madonna kimjih.
Che anmah innih in Akpu vaa trongthuun mahche pichaar naamte akchimnoh amnoh a seh a Ringpu maikunga akchimlamseh veiei.
Chuta ansa amnoh, alamva Elijabeth va khungsa. Che anmah innih ankumkho tamsei.
Chunna nga tloh a amah in aloom ruul aknujuih a Ringpu maikuunga thiimpu thlouta atlohlai,
thiimpu phom kastam nujuih a Akpu thlaamsuunga luut a mekruk haal akuunga tlasa.
Che mekruk ahaallaia mii naamte apaalla ngenna ammei.
Mahchunna Akpu vaa ringroi inkhat in mekruk ahaalna mun akchangtonga ngirra amahta ammuhpei.
Chunna Jekhariah in mahchuta amuhlai inhalsa, cheva tak a intri suuksa.
Mahchunna ringroi in akuunga ason, “Intrinohro, Jekhariah, alamva nangin ningenkha atheihpei, chunna nang nikmei Elijabeth in asa kupa inkhat apoktu, che amah akming John niongtu.
Chunna tlan mahche khalmo roomthok nangtu veitu. Che amah nipok in mii aktam anroomthoktu.
Alamva amah in Akpu amit anna liintu, tuiibuhkho iinnohtu. Che anu vonsuung nata mathronna Li Akseeng in siptu.
Chunna Israel asa aktamta amah in anmah Ringpu kuunga amlengtuei.
Che anpa amilungta ansakuung che trongson amjuihnoh miita akchim lousingah amlengnatu Akpu turel amchaang miita thlouraang amtlohnatu, Akpu ninga Elijah vah li leh aktranga sehtu.”
Chunna ringroi in akuunga amsang, “Ringpu amaia akngir Kabriel keisang che nangsoh trongnatu mahche akthra trongi nikuunga thlennatu keita kamthlah ang.
Che anro, thlou naamte i asuuknohsot mahnichu phah a nangva trong suuknoh uche, alamva akthlengsam laia aktlungsam kison trongta nangin malotnohche.”
Nga tloh a asonlaia mii eiin Jekhariah ta apaalla gaak a amsei. Che amah in mathruunna thlaamma sotmal a am invah anmah in salungkhousei.
Mahchuche amah in anthruh inva ankuunga trong cheknohsa. Cheva amah in mathruunna thlaamsuungah ahamuhta amuhpeita anmah in anrompei. Cheva amah in ankuunga trongtheihnoh sang ta daang atloh ei.
Cheva amah in rou atlohna thlou amcheche inna inlengsa.
Mahni khannata chuche aknua akmei Elijabeth nao inpooisa che mah i sonna amah atak in thla ranga inthupsa.
“Mah chuvah miikaara keiin injak kikoknatu kichunga Akpu in keianna aknikhanna keita nga tloh a kamsuuk peiang.”
Chunnata thla kuruk antang in Najareth antih Kalili vaa khuuboom phah a Ringpu kuungnata Kabriel ringroita amthlahpei
Devit innsuung Joseph an ong kupa inkhatta trong amromche akseeng rungaa kuunga thlengsa, che rungaak akmingvah Meri.
Che amah in akuunga thlenga ason, “Doiphah veiro, malungsi akphah rungaak o, Akpu in nangta nanruuipi.”
Chuta mah asontrong chunna amah in khalmo inchoisa, kamthruunni jaknangta kamthruunna vei satame ta arilsuunga amdonpei.
Mahchunna ringroi in akuunga ason, “Intrinohro Meri, alamva nangin Ringpu akuungnata malungsi niphahpei.
Che anro, nangin nao inpooia nisakupa inkhat nipoktu. Mahche amah akmingva Jisu niongtu.
Amah in amtik liintu che ankaangremva Ringpu Asa kupa niongtu. Mahche Akpu Ringpu in amahkuunga apa Devit vaa anbokna amlantu.
Che amah in Jakob atute chunga ache amnoh a paaltu. Che amah kurung huunnavaa ache amnohtu.”
Mahchunna Meri in ringroi kuunga ason, “Keiva kamsalkho amnohmangta mahchu khatloh a vei ume?”
Mahchunna ringroin akuunga ason, “Akseeng Li in nangkuunga trumtu, che Akthloiremvaa tuui in nangkuunga aniim thla a thlou atlohtu; churella nipoksam akseengi Ringpu vaa Asa kupa niongtu.
Mahche anro nang sakhei Elijabeth khungkha atartinga asa kupa inkhat inpooia ipek thla kuruk aphahpei.
Alamva Ringpu nata anthruh trong naamte veinoh amnoh.”
Mahchunna Meri in ason, “Anro, Akpu rou aktloh kumei keikuunga nangin nison nujuih a keikuunga suuk veiso.” Cheva ringroi in amahkuung nata amahpei.
Chunnata Meri in inthoua rapthing ram Judia khuuboom inkhat a intha sehsa.
Mahche amah in Jekhariah inna luut a Elijabeth ta saambaan amlanpei.
Chunna nga tloh a Elijabeth in Meri va saambaanta atheihlai avonsuungna naoin inthomsa. Che Elijabeth kho Li Akseeng in sipsa.
Mahche amah in tranga in ongsa, “Kumei ankaar a nangva doiphah veisache. Chunna nivon suungna naoi doiphah veisa.
Mainangi keininga khatloh vei ume? Keitu Akpu anuin kikuunga athlengi?
Mah chuvah anro, nang saambaan ahou kimkuur in atheihlai, kivon suungna naoin khalmo roomthok a inthomsa.
Chunna amlot kumeikha doiphah veisa. Alamva Akpu tingnata keikuuunga asonkha tlungusa.”
Mahchunna Meri in ason, “Kei kiril in Akpu ta kampaakpei.
Mahche kei kikli in keikal Akpu Ringpu akuunga aroomthoksa.
Alamva Akpu nangta rou aktloh ah marnop kumei ahoongta nihun anpei. Alamva anro, ipeknata mathronna ringnatluun anaamte in keita doiphah vei ta kan ong usang.
Alamva akchek amneh khanna keikuunga akliinthlou atlohpei, che Akpu amah akmingva akseengsa.
Che amahta aktrih miiva ringnatluun rel Akpu arilvol am.
Amah kutbaanga atrang ammuh, amah in amtuhta akrom ril in amah khanna thoiliin miita akthek kirpei.
Phompii ah akchek amneh mii eita atuulsunpei. Chunna marnop miita amliinpei.
Aktraam miita akthra poot ah amah in amsippei, mahche doonkhaal miita aruuk a amthlahpei.
Abraham leh ache amnoh amah arilvol antheihnatu,
inih ipa ipu ankuunga asonnanga amahvaa roijuih Israel ta amjoompei.”
Mahche Meri in thla inthumvak amahsoh inruuia amsa cheva inna inlengsa.
Cheva Elijabeth in nao apoknatu thla antang in asa kupa inkhat apokpei.
Mahche Akpu in amahkuunga ralthloia arilvol ammuhpei ta anthringpi mii in mahche amah sakhei in antheih lai amahsoh inruuia anroomthoksei.
Mahche nga tloh a nijan kirit atangin naota avun tannatu anmah in thlengsei. Che anmah in apavaa akming nujuih a naota Jekhariah anthunsam,
chuta anuin ason, “Nganoh, amah akming John iongtu.”
Mahche anmah in akuunga anson, “Nang sakhei ankaar a oinanga an ongming louamnoh.”
Mahche amahta jaknangming nithunjame ta nao apakuunga anromna daang tloh a anruipei.
Mahchunna amah in amjihnatu intlaap inkhat anih a, “Amah akming John” ta amjihpei. Che annaamte in salungkhousei.
Mahche kak hang abao inhoongsa, amlei injaksa che amah in Ringpu ta mapaak a trongsa.
Cheva anmahsoh inhiilla ak am annaam in intri suuksei. Che anaamte i Judia ram muul pumtea inthangsa.
Mahche naoi jangvei umeta aktheih annnaam in anrilsuunga ansihpei. Alamva Akpu kut in amahsoh inruuisa.
Cheva apa Jekhariah in Li Akseeng sip a phoonga ason,
“Israel vaa Ringpu Akpu doiphah veiso, alamva amah in athlengche amah amiita thloknatu thlou atlohpei,
mahche amah roijuih Devit innsuunga inih turella chaanring aki amthruhpei,
leithingnata akseeng ringraanei annar a amson khananga,
inihta jekna mii mahche inihta inintirh ei ankutnata inikaltu;
inih ipa ipuei rilvoltheih trongchetta impaangnatu, mahche amah akseeng trongirhnata mapolhnoh a intheihnatu,
inih iputhou Abraham kuunga trongchet atloh nujuih a,
inihta jeknaei ankutnata inikalla intri amnoh a amahta routloh icheknatu,
inih iringna chaan in sot a amah maikuunga kseenga mahche akchimlamseh veia iamnatu.
Mahche nao nangva, Ankaangrem ringraan kiong uche; alamva nangin Akpu alam nimchaangnatu amah amaa a seh uche,
amah amiivaa anlehta ipnatu chaanring akrah amlantu,
inih Ringpu in inirilvol apaalla inthim leh akthi aniimma anbok miita amvaarnatu,
anthimma anbok anchunga mahche akthivaa anniimma ak ammi anchunga amvaarnatu, inih ikehkaarta leh oi lamma inichingnatu relnasa.”
Naoin li inkho liinsa, trangkho trangsa, mahche amah atakta Israel ankuunga ammuh nohmiil raprilla amsa.
Kurini in Siria vaa rampuui aveilai miipokteen i matsahremsa.
Mahche mii naamtein anmah anmah ankhuboomma anming amijihnatu mii naamte in sehsei.
Mahche Joseph kho Kalili vaa Najareth khuuboom nata Judia vaa Bethlehem antih Devit khuuboom phah a hangsa, alamva amahvah Devit sakhei che innsuungvei.
Amahsoh trong amiromche nao anpooi Meri soh inruuia ming amijihnatu sehsa,
mah khanna an amlai, nao apoknatu anising tangsa.
Che amah in matsahrem asa kupa inkhat apokpei, mahche naota puunna thlomma siilthlai saakna bukuunga amtolhpei, alamva miitlungna inna anmahtu aphom amnohsa.
Cheva ram achunna Sadamkem arouin raprilla rik a anmah Sadamlomta khulouh a anngaak.
Mahche Akpu vaa ringroi inkhat in anmaikunga indangsa, che Akpu vaa paarthra in anmahta inhiilla amvaar in intrisei.
Cheva ringroi in ankuunga asonei, “Iintrinohve, alamva anve miinaamtetu veia khalmo roomthokna athra trong keiin nankuunga kithlenchou;
alamva mi in Devit vaa khuuboomma nannihtu Nanikal Akpu poksa amahvah Khrista Akpu sa.
Mahche nannih turel daangva maisa, dalduh a anthlom naokhat siilthlai saakna bukuunga intlolh a am nantuuktu.”
Mahche ngasuuksa, ringroi ruul in Ringpu mapaak a anson.
“Inkaangrem veia Ringpu ta paar mathrat, che thaleichunga Akpu ta mapel miikaar aleh oi am veisa!”
Mahche nga intlohsa, ringroi in anmah kuungnata ringramma ankalsoh sadamkem in khatleh khat insonsei, “Inih in ipek Bethlehem a seh a Akpu in inikuunga inimrom aksuuk trongi seh a anrei.”
Cheva anmah in inthademma seh a Meri leh Joseph che siilthlai saakna bukuunga amitolh naochukho antuukpei.
Cheva anmah in ohchuta anmuhlai, naorella ansonkha ankuunga anson trongsoh inkeih a amirompei;
Mahche sadamkem in anson trongta aktheih in salungkhousei.
Chuta Meri in arilsuunga aratrat madonna anson naamte i arilsuunga asih.
Mahche sadamkem ankuunga ansonta aktheih mahche akmuh naamtein inlengseia mahchurel Ringpu ta paar amithrat che amipaak.
Mahche Moses trongsuur nujuih a anmah in amiseeng natu lai athlengin, amahta Akpu kuunga doonnatu Jerusalem a anthlenpei.
(Akpu trongsuura injih nanga, “Naopoom amhoong matsah akpok kupa relta Akpu kuunga Akseengta in ongtu.”)
Mahche Akpu trongsuur in ason nujuih a “Rapril ukthru inkhat nohle khuinu ate innih” inkatphu veia doonnatu.
Mahche anve, akming Simeon mii khat Jerusalem a louam, amahvah Israel vaa akthra aktlanta loungaak akchimlamseh mahche Ringpu ta chet a amdon mii, mahche Li Akseeng in amahchunga am.
Che amah in Akpu Khrista ta amuhnoh miil akthi muhnohtung ta Li Akseeng apaalla amahkuunga amdangpei.
Chunna Li in atak a chuunga amah in Ringpu mathruunna thlaamma luutsa; che trongsuurva kastam nujuih a Akpu turel tlohja atlohnatu anu apa in nao Jisu ta anhonpei.
Amah in Jisu ta akutbaanga konna Ringpu ta mapaak a ason,
“Akpu nangin nison nujuih a ipek nang roijuihta leh oi veia namthlah,
Akpu nang chaanringkha kimit in kimuhpei,
alamva mii naamte anmaikuunga mahkha nangin thlouraang nitlohpei.
Jental ankuunga madangna turel akvaar mahche Akpu amii Israel jaatturel paarthra veisa.”
Jisu anu apa in amahturel asontrongta antheih in salungkhousei;
Mahche Semeon in anmahta doi malanna anu Meri ta ason, “Anro, naoi Israel ankaarna aktam in atlaakna arilta mahche anthohna turel, inruuia akjanoh daang aveinatu asihpei
(mahche chemseiin nangtalva li a naksuntu), che mii aktam anrilla amidon naamteta amdangna turelnasa.”
Aser jatihna Phanuel va asakumei Anna an ong ringraan kumei inkhat am, amah in amsalsoh kum sirih apaalche
kum sopritlei manli chang trulmeinu kumei veisa. Amah in suun jaan buhella ngenna mathruunna thlaam mathlahnoh.
Che mah pungtal chunna amah in thlenga Ringpu ta ampaak, mahche Jerusalem ta thloknatu ngaak a louam anaamtinga Akpu rella trongei.
Mahchuche naoin inrolla trangkho trangsa, che lousingkho sipsa; Ringpu malungsikho achunga amsa.
Ipekva Jisu anu apa in kum kumtu veia laalna buhdoon turel Jerusalem a seh ei.
Mahche Jisu in kum somleinih aphah in buhdoonna kastam nujuih a anmah in hangsei.
Cheva buhdoonchu acheche anmah in inlengsei, Jisu vah Jerusalem a inmahsa. Anu apa in mahchu romnoh ei.
Chuta Jisu vah ansehpijou aruul ankaar a jaota amidonna anmah in nikhat suuntla lam sehsei, cheva anmah uhnao leh ansehpi ankaar a amahta jon jonna amsei.
Chuta amahta antuuknoh inva jonna Jerusalem phah a inlengsei.
Cheva nithum aknua anmah in Jisu ta Ringpu mathruunna thlaam asuuunga lulok ei antrongta rungaia ankaar a trong ruia inbok a am antuukpei.
Mahche arungai anamte in Jisu in atheih asing mahche anruita amsang naamte chunna salungkhousei.
Cheva amahta anmuh in salungkhou seia anuin ason, “Kisa o, nangin kannihta nga nantloh ungi jarelname? Anro nipa leh keiin kanril lah a nangta kanjonche.”
Mahchunna ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in keita nanjon angi jarelname? Keiva Pa inna amtupot talsang ta nannih in romnoh choume?”
Amah in ankuunga asonna trongkha loutheinohsei.
Chunna anmahsoh inruuia Najareth ah inlengsei, cheva anmah in ansonta amjuihpei; anu inva anson naamte i arilsuunga chet a asih.
Annas mahche Kaiaphas in aklok thiimpu anveilaia raprilla Ringpu atrongkha Jekharia asa kupa John kuunga thlengsa;
mahche alehnata ip a malengnatu, che anmah in anrilthlenga anmahta aluptnatuei amah in akthra trongta raanna Jordon ram apumtea thlengsa.
Ringraan Isaiah atrongta jikjia anjih nangsa, “Raprilla rapaorool inkhatvaa ahouva: nannih in Akpu alam machaangve, amah alam mathluunve.
Akdep naamte amsiptu, muulpii leh muul naamte amnimtu, ankor lam amthluuntu, che akdep aktoong lam amtrimtu;
mahche mii naamtein Ringpu vaa chaanring anmuhtu.”

Chunnava nannih nanril thlenga matikcha a inrah veive. Che ‘Iputhou Abraham am’ ta nanrilsuunga son mathronnohve; alamva keiin nankuunga kisonchou, Ringpu in mah lung tamkhaak nata Abraham vaa asa tam amthruhchek.
Ipektalkho mah thingi akjungah reiikho intaara am; churella thra inrahnoh thing anaamteta phuura meikaara athlak.”
Chuunna miitam in akuunga anrui, “Chuleva kannih in jangkantlohtu tlame?”
Chunna amah in ankuunga amsangei, “Inluut innih ak am amah in, ak amnohluung akuunga inkhat malanso; che saakphu ak am inkho mahchunanga tlohso.”
Roithrai inkho inlupnatu thlengsei, che akuunga anson, “Lulok o, kannih in jangkantlohtu tlame?”
Chunna amah in ankuunga asonei, “Abihkhek nata akral lounohve.”

Raalmii inkho akuunga anrui, “Mahche kannih inkho jangkantlohtu tlame?” Mahchuna amah in ankuunga asonei, “Tukhat kuungakho karaanga nohle chimnoh hoonga namma maruknohve, nangin nilahkhaan nisihkhanna pel veive.”

John in ankuunga amsangei “Keiinva nannihta tuiia kilup uchou chuta keichunga ralla amtik amkha thlengsa, amah akehkhraang arui keiin majak kimtik amnoh; amah in nannihta Li Akseenga mahche meia naniluptu.
Amah akut a aksi japna kulei am, che aksita thratea ajaapche kihuta amah tomma apeitu; chuta aksiva athih amnoh meia athlaktu.”
Che amah in nga tloh a bungthokna trong jikcha sonna mii kuungah akthratrong araan.
Chuta Herot ramngaak in amah anaokupa Philip akmei Herodia ta alohrella amah in thranoh atlohthlou anaamterel John in asaal.
Mah naamte ichunga Herot in mah ikho atlohpei, mah chuvah amah in John ta simma athunpei.
Li Akseeng in amah achunga khuinu nanga ringramnata houkhat thlengsa, “Nangi kirilvol Kisa kupache, nang nikuunga keiin khalmo pelsang.”
Heli Mathat vaa asa kupa, Mathat Levi vaa asa kupa, Levi Melkhi vaa asa kupa, Melkhi Janna vaa asa kupa, Jannai Joseph vaa asa kupa,
Joseph Mattathias vaa asa kupa, Mattathias Amos vaa asa kupa, Amos Nahum vaa asa kupa, Nahum Esli vaa asa kupa, Esli Nakai vaa asa kupa., Nakai Maat vaa asa kupa,
Maat Mattathias vaa asa kupa, Mattathias Semin vaa asa kupa, Semin Josekh vaa asa kupa, Josekh Joda vaa asa kupa,
Joda Joanan vaa asa kupa, Joanan Rhesa vaa asa kupa, Rhesa Jerubabel vaa asa kupa, Jerubabel Seltiel vaa asa kupa, Seltiel Neri vaa asa kupa,
Neri Melkhi vaa asa kupa, Melkhi Addi vaa asa kupa, Addi Kosam vaa asa kupa, Kosam Elmadam vaa asa kupa, Elmadam Er vaa asa kupa,
Er Joshua vaa asa kupa, Joshua Eliejer vaa asa kupa, Eliejer Jorim vaa asa kupa, Jorim Mathat vaa asa kupa, Mathat Levi vaa asa kupa,
Levi Simeon vaa asa kupa, Simeon Judah vaa asa kupa, Judah Joseph vaa asa kupa, Joseph Jonam vaa asa kupa, Jonam Eliakim vaa asa kupa.,
Eliakim Melia vaa asa kupa, Melia Menna vaa asa kupa, Menna Mattatha vaa asa kupa, Mattatha Nathan vaa asa kupa, Nathan Devit vaa asa kupa,
Devit Jesi vaa asa kupa, Jesi Obed vaa asa kupa, Obed Boas vaa asa kupa, Boas Sala vaa asa kupa, Sala Nason vaa asa kupa,
Nason Amminadab vaa asakup, Amminadeb Amin vaa asa kupa, Amin Arni vaa asa kupa, Arni Hejaron vaa asa kupa, Hejaron Peres vaa asa kupa, Peres Judah vaa asa kupa,
Judah Jakop vaa asa kupa, Jakob Aisaak vaa asa kupa, Aisaak Abraham vaa asa kupa., Abraham Terah vaa asa kupa, Terah Nahor vaa asa kupa.,
Nahor Seruk vaa asa kupa, Seruk Reu vaa asa kupa, Reu Pelek vaa asa kupa, Pelek Eber vaa asa kupa, Eber Selah vaa asa kupa,
Selah Kainan vaa asa kupa, Kainan Arphasek vaa asa kupa, Arphasek Sem vaa asa kupa, Sem Noah vaa asa kupa, Noah Lamekh vaa asa kupa,
Lamekh Methuselah vaa asa kupa, Methuselah Enokh vaa asa kupa, Enokh Jared vaa asa kupa, Jared Mahalaliel vaa asa kupa, Mahalaliel Kainan vaa asa kupa,
Kainan Enos vaa asa kupa, Enos Seth vaa asa kupa, Seth Adam vaa asa kupa, Adam Ringpu vaa asa kupa.
Seitan in amahta nijan sopli raprilla amdoi, mahsuunga amah in jakhatkho saanoh iinnoh; che aknichu antang in Jisu avon traamsa.
Seitan in amahta ason, “Nangin Ringpu Asa kupa chele, lungta tol veiro ta jathang malanro.”
Che Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Mah i injih a amsa, tol ruin mii in ringnohtu.”
Mahche seitan in amahta ankaang khat a aphurhche kaksuunga Jisu ta tukleiramvaa kurung huunna anaamteta ammuhpei,

mahche seitan in Jisu ta ason, “Keiin nangkuunga akchek amneh anaamte khatkho anmahvaa akchek amneh apumte i nangkuunga kamlan uche; alamva mah i keikuunga kamsilkir peiang, keiin kikdit tukhat kuunga mah i kamlantu.
Chunna nangin keita intolhtlep a kamthruun chele anaamte i nang nita veitu.”
Mahchunna Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Mah i injih a am, nangin Akpu nangvaa Ringpu ta namthruun tupot, che Akpu amahruta rou tlohro.”
Cheva amah in Jisu ta Jerusalem a sehpia Ringpu mathruunna thlaam akooinep a amngirhche Jisu ta ason, “Nangin Ringpu vaa Asa kupa chele onnata injaamro;
alamva mah i injih a am, ‘Nangta nakdomnatu Akpu amah in nangturel amah ringroita jathang amlantu,’
mahche nikehkha lunga inchuk a atlik noh natu anmah in nangta ankut a nankontuei.”
Mahchunna Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Nangin Akpu nangvaa Ringpu ta chaang annohro.”
Seitan in amdoitupot naamte amdoiche veikhat taancha lai aphahnohmiil Jisu ta mah a sehsa.
Che Jisu in anmah sinakok a amtheih ei, mii naamtein amahta paar amithratpei.
Mahche ringraan Isaiah nirikta Jisu kuunga amilanpei, che amah in nirikta mahoonga mahtrong anjih ita aktuuk,

“Akpu vaa Li keichunga am, churella amah in inranriing ankuunga Akthra Trong kraannatu keikuunga thao keipoih ang. Mananga ansuur miita mathlahnatu che mitcho eita veikhat mamuh ajanatu, nanga ak ameita mathlahnatu,
Akpu in inihta inijana chupta sonna madangnatu keita kamthlah ang.”
Che amahta amjoom ankuunga nirikta amlanche inboksa; che sinakok a ak am naammte in amahkuunga minna an anpei.
Mahchunna Jisu in ankuunga son amthronpei, “Mi in mahtrong nantheih in ringjih a anjih trongi nankuunga tlungsa.”
Che anmah naamtein amahturel akthra trongsei, che Jisu anarnata anthruh malungsi trongkhanna salungkhoua anson, “Mahmii i Joseph asa kupa nohme?”
Mahchunna Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Inlitnoh a mah tronglammi huuina a nannih in keikuunga nansontung, maipa nitakta mathratro, Kaparnaum a nitloh naamte kantheihkha niram akho tlohro!”
Che asonei, “Keiin nankuunga tak a kisonchou, ringraan ta amah ramboomna mii in janoh ei.
Chuta taktak a keiin kisonchou, Elaijah amlaia kum inthum thla kuruk marvaan inkhaar a ram apumte khalmo buhchaal asuuklai Israel a trulmeinu tam traam anphah.
Chuta Elaijah ta tukhat kuungkho mathlahnoh, Elaijah ta Sidon ramma am Jarephat a trulmeinu akuung khop ah amthlaning.
Ringraan Elsa in a amlai Israel a reichi kop tam ammei; chuta Siria na Naman noh a tukhatkho maseengnoh.”
Mahchuta antheih in sinakok a am anaam in khalmo amilung inhaangsei.
Che anmah in inthoua Akpu ta khuuboom nata amithruhpei, che amahta antrenna khat ah amilatnatu khuuboom muul abunga antuulpei.
Chuta amahvah ankaar nata inlit a sehsa.
che amah in amtheih khanna salungkhousei. Alamva amah atrongkha akchek amnehsoh inruuia trong.
Mahche sinakok a akseengnoh khousaar li akchuung mii khat am; amah in ahou suuk a ongsa,
“He! Najareth na Jisu, nangin kannihta jangthohtang nitihme? Nangin kannihta kanimmaang thlengcheme? Nangi tucheme kiromche, Akseeng Ringpu khache.”
Chunna Jisu in amahta saalla ason, “Rimta amro, che amahkuung nata inthruhro!” Che khousaar in amah ningnata inthruhsa, amah atakva jakhatkho masoknoh
Mahchunna mii naamte in salungkhou seia khatleh khat insonsei, “Mahtrongi jangsme? Alamva achek amnehsoh inruuia amah in akseengnoh luutta aktrang jathang amlanche inthruhsei.”
Mahche kooi a ak am ram naamtea amah in atlohthlouta antongpei.
Mahchunna Jisu in akuunga angirhche atlunkhata asaal; cheva atlun in amahta amahpei; cheva amah in kak hanga inthoua anmahta rou atloh ei.
Pekva kni atlak in mii naamte kuunga am natna satna jikcha amahkuunga anthlen; amahta inkhat khat a anchunga akut sih a amthrat ei.
Mahchuche Jisu vah Ringpu vaa Asa kupata anhou tranga ong onga inthruhsei. Che Jisu in anmahta khaamma matrongnohsei, alamva Jisu vah Khrista ta anmah in anrompei.
Chuta amah in ankuunga asonei, “Keiin Ringpu vaa kurung huunna akthra trongta aktlei khuuboom akho kiraantu tlasa; alamva mairella keita kamthla ang.”
Che nga tloh a amah in Kalili vaa Sinakok jikcha a seh trong araanpei.
Amah in tuiiram apaalla muli innih am amuh, chuta ngaman in muulnata trumma anmah torota chaamma ammei.
Amah in muli innih kaarna inkhat mah chuvah Simon vaa mulikha tuiipaal nata ste heithourota ason, chunna Jisu in inbok a muli asuungnata miitam amtheih ei.
Amah in trong anngeihsoh Simon ta ason, “Nga nisuurnatu nang torokha athuukna a deenro.”
Mahchunna Simon in amsang, “Akpu, kannih in khulouhthlang ngaman insuullung, chuta jakhatkho mannohsung, chuta nangin nison nujuih a keiin dentang.”
Chunna anmah in ohchunna andeen in, ngapoong inkhat anbahpei; mahcunna anmah toro inthritsa.
Muli aktleia anmahsoh nga akmanjou in thlenga majoomnatu ankut jaap a an ong. Chunna anmah in thlenga muli innih sipkenga nga anthun in tuiisuunga inphuumsamsei.
Chunna Simon Pitar in mahchuta amuh in akehkungah intolh a ason, “Akpu, kei kuungnata sehrosa, alamva keiva alehchel miiang.”
Alamva anmah in anman ngakhanna amahkho che amahsoh inruuia annaamtea salungkhousei.
Simon soh inruuia Jebedi asa kupa Jems mahche John inkho salungkhousei. Mahchunna Jisu in Simon ta ason, “Intrinohro, ipeknata mathronna nangin mii aksuur vei uche.”
Cheva anmah in tuiipaalla muli innihta an ilche, anaamte mathlah a Jisu aknuta anjuihpei.
Cheva Jisu in akut jamma amahta palla ason, “Keiin kijapei, nangin seeng veirosa.” Kak hang achunna reichi in amahta amahpei.

Mahchunna Jisu in amahta akchet tronga ason, “Tukhat ningkho sonnohro; chuta seh a thiimpu ta mamuhro, nang nitakta amseeng rella seh a Moses in trongthuun amlan nujuih a ankuunga sakhi aveinatu inkatphu inkhat katro.”
Chuta Jisu rella trong ral ralla amphorh chuche arungai leh annatna mathratnatu miitam pul pulla thlengei.
Chuta amah atakva rapriltonga inpella angen.
Mahche anve, apangnem thia akna miikhatta raanga matolh a anthlen, amahta Jisu amaikuunga sihnatu ansuul,
chuta mii tammalla amahta asuunga hongpinatu upai amnohsa; chunna anmah in innbunga kalseia, innbungta keak a raangsoh Jisu amaikuung talla anthlakpei.
Anmah in amilotta amuh in asonei, “Kupa nang nilehta ki ip peiche.”
Mahchunna lulok khatkho Pharisi in arat arat a madonna anson, “Ringpu ta usitnoh a aktrong mii i tume? Ringpu noh a tunang in aleh ip achekme?”
Chunna anmah in arat arat a amidonchuta aromma ankuunga amsangei, “Nanrilla nga tloh a namidonkha jarelname?
‘Nang nilehta ki ip peiche’ ta sonle chunohleh ‘Inthoua sehro’ ta sonni jaknangin aklaime?”
Chunna miivaa Asa kupa in tukleiram a aleh ipnatu amtik amta nanromnatu Jisu in apangnem thimiita ason, “Keiin nangta kisonche, inthouro, raangkha choia nang inna inlengrosa.”
Mahche amah in kak hanga anmaikuung nata anthohche raangta choia Ringpu ta mapaak a inna inlengsa.
Chuuna annaam salungkhousei mahche Ringpu ta amipaakpei, khatkho antak a intri suukseia antihpei, “Inih in alehluung thlouta mi in imuhpei.”
Chunna amah in anaamte mathlahkir a anthohche Jisu aknuta ajuihpei.
Chunna Levi in Jisu turella inna buh adoonnatu amchaang; chunna amah in buh saakpinau anbokpijou roithrai khatkho aktlei mii khalmo tammei.
Mahche Pharisi leh anmah Ringjih lulok eiin Jisu aroi anchunga arat rat a inso a ankuunga asonpei, “Nannih in roithrai leh alehchel miisoh jarella nansaak nan iinjoume?”
Mahchunna Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Aruung thramii turelva daktar kananoh, chuta akna mii tingva kana;
keiin akchimlamseh miita ak ong thlengnoh ang, chuta alehchel mii in ril anthlengnatu ak ong thlengang.”
Mahchunna Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Changri in aruul apaisoh a amjoulai anmahta buh mahel achekume?
Churella mainangjim akni thlengtu, che changrita ankuungnata aphurhche aknua anmah in buh anhel umang.”
Chela Jisu in ankuunga pandam tloh a asonei, “Tukhat inkho akthrapuun akir anthritna a, amlui puunna louphohnoh ei; phoh eileva akthrata inthrittu, mahche akthar akirkhakho amluisoh asak inchunnohtu.
Tukhat inkho amlui savun thonga akthar ngangli tuii louthaal noh ei, thaal eileva ngangli tuii aktharkha savun thongta amphuuktu, atuiikho intahtu; che savun thongkho maangtu.
Chuta akthar savun thoonga anthaaltu tlasa.
Mahche ngangli tuii amlui an iinche tukhat inkho akthar dinoh ei, alamva amlui in tui aral.”
Chuta Pharisi arouin anson, “Sabat nia trongsuur in ajanoh tlohphunoh thlou nannih in jarella nantlohme?”
Jisu in amsangei, “Devit khatkho amah in anruuipi mii in antraamlai jangantlohme tihkha nannih in paanohchoume:

mah chuvah amah in Ringpu mathruunna thlaamma khatloh a luutme mahche thiimpu noh a saa janoh amimuhna tolta amah in khatloh a loua asaakme, che amahsoh anruuipi miita khatloh a amlanme ta nannih in paanohchoume?”
Mahche ankuunga asonei, “Miivaa Asa kupa in Sabat niva Akpu sa.”
Ringjih lulok leh Pharisi ei in Jisu amraal tuuknatu sabat nia akna amthrat umeta ruunga an anpei.
Chuta Jisu in anmah anrilla amidonchuta aromma, akut inkhattong akthi kupakuunga ason, “Inthoua varo, che onna ngirro.”
Cheva Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Keiin nannihta nanirui tangchou, sabat nia akthra tloh nohle thranoh tloh, miipunsi kal nohle mamaang i trongsuura tlohphume chunoh a tlohphunohme?”
Anmahta invella a aneiche asonei, “Nikutkha jamro.” Machunna akutta ajam inva thrasa.
Chuta anmah amilung inhaanga Jisu ta kha itloh umeta anmah in khatleh khat trongsei.
Kini avaar in, aroita akuunga aongei, mahche anmah somlei innihta achar ei che anmahta raangroi tih a anming athunnei.
Anmahchuva, akming Pitar kho an ong Simon mahche anao Andriu, Jems khatkho John, Philip che Bartholomeu,
Methiu che Thomas, Alphia asa kupa Jems che Jilot an ong Simon,
Jems asa kupa Judas che Jisu ta indah a michang akvei Iskariot Judas anmah isei.
Mahche akseengnoh li in anchut mii eita amthrat ei.
Mahche miitam in amahta anpalnatu anjon, alamva amah atuui inthruh a miinaam aknata amthrat ei.
Ipek aktraam miichoukha doi akphahsachou, alamva nannihta nanimvahtu. Ipek aktrap miichoukha doi akphahsachou, alamva nannih in innui nanphahtu.
Mahni achunna tlanve mahche roomthok a inthomve, alamva anve, ringramma nannih nankhaan liinna am; alamva oinang jimma anpa anpuin ringraan eita anchut.
Chuta akdoon nannihva lahnasachou! Alamva nannih in diltlan masoh nanphah.
Ipek von anvah nannihva lahnasachou! Alamva nannih in traam uchou. Ipek annui nannihva lahnaschou! Alamva nannih in marhuui uchou mahche trap uchou.
“Mii naamtein nannih turella akthra antronglai nannihva lahnaschou! Alamva oinang jimma anpa anpuin ringraan akveieita nga tloh a anchut.”
nannihta phool nanitloh mii eita doi malanve, nannihta jakhatkho soonnoh a nanitloh anmah turella ngenve.
Nangta nimaipii inkhat ah akbeengleh amahkuunga inkhat tongkho dohro. Mahche nisilh puun naksut amahta nilungluutkho naksutle indahnohro.
Darkaar amma naninih miirelta malanve; nipoot aklou miikhannata veikhat inlenga lounohve.
Mahche miita nankuunga namitlohja khananga, nannih inkho mii kuungah tlohve.
Nannih nankuunga akthra aktloh miita akthra tlohchoule, nankuunga jaknang roomthokna am ume? Alamva alehchel miiluung inkho mahchunanga antlohkhame.

Che nannih in inlenga kanphahtuta namidon ankuunga baobeh mapuchoule, nankuunga jaknang roomthokna am ume? Alamva aleh akchel miiluung inkho mahchuta inlenga phahnatu alehchel ankuung akho amipu khame.

Chuta nannihta jekna mii eita rilvolve, akthrakho tlohve, inlenga keisiintuta madonnoh a mapuve, mahchunna nannih nankhaan inroltu, che nannih in ankaangremva Asa veiuchou; alamva mii in atlohman akromnoh mahche thranoh mii eita amah in amchaalei.
Nannih nanpa in nanirilvol nanga nannih inkho mii rilvol theihve.”
Malanve, che nankuunga nanimlantu, akthra chaanga olla namma lok a pet holh a nannih buktiimma naniraangtu. Alamva nannih in nan olna chaangtal khanna nanioltu.
Aroi inkhat in amah lulok achunga amphunoh, chuta amahta mapungpha a matheih amtamche amah lulok nanga vei umang.
Nangtalva nimit a am thinglipta muhnoh a, niuh ninaovaa anmit a am thinglipta jarella nianme?

Nang nimitalla thinglip ak amva muhnohchea a khatloh ani uh ninaota, ‘Unao o, nang nimit a ak am thinglipkha kei loutang ta son nichek ume?’ Akthra veisin nangin matsah a nang nimitna thinglipkha loumanro, mahche aknua niuh ninao anmit a am thinglipta nilohnatu seenga muh nichektu.”
alamva thing anaamte i amah akrah ah inrom. Alamva mii in kuling thingnata thotthing louritnoh ei mahche kuling suun inchaam nata nganglirah louritnoh ei.
Akthra mii in amlungla akthra lalta amthruh, mahche akthranoh mii in amlungna akthranoh lalta amthruh; alamva amlunga ak amkhata anar in trong.”
Keikuunga thlenga kitrongta arungeihche aktloh miikha tunangsoh intrimmme tihkha keiin nanimmuhtang.

Mah chuvah amah in thuuk a achohche lungpii chunga innmun tholla inntloh mii khat nangsa; che tuiiliin athlenglai tuii masuur in inn khata amratpei, che mah innkha machek cheknohsa, alamva mahkha thratea atlohpei.

Chuta trongta arungeihche aktlohnoh amahkhava innmun thratea tholnoh a philchunga inntloh mii khat nangsa; alamva tuii masuur in amrat in kak hanga inriilla puursa, che mah innkha khalmo tlik invuia maang veisa.”
Ipek raalmii reijapuuivaa roijuih inkhat in kna a thisamma am, amah roijuih in amah akputa khalmo klua aktlohmii.
Amah in Jisu ta atheih in Judi ei anparuulta amahkuunga mathlah a amah roijuihta thlenga amthratnatu atirh ei.
Amah in Jisu kuunga anthlengche amahta inruruh a ason, “Mahmii matikcha mii turel thlou nitloh in thratu,
alamva amah in inih jatihta arilvol, che inih sinakokta iniseem.”

Chunna Jisu in anmahsoh sehjousa. Chuta Jisu in inn khasoh khalmo anlahnolai raalmii reijapuui in amah aruulkhatta mathlah a Jisu kuunga amson, “Akpu, nitakta malahnohro, alamva Akpu in keiinna nithlengsam i keiva matik chanoh ang;
alamchunna keitalkho nikuunga thleng matik chanoh angta kamdon. Chuta trongruta son paningro, chunna kei roijuih in thratu.

Alamva keiluungkho akchek amneh khatvaa athlanga ammiiang, kei kithlanga raalmii ammei; in khat kuunga ‘Sehro’ ta kison in seh; mahche in khat kuunga ‘Varo’ ta kison in va, mahche ‘Mah i tlohro’ ta kison in atloh.
Mahchuta Jisu in atheih in salungkhousa, che amah aknu akjuih miitamta inheia asonei, ‘Keiin nankuunga kitihchou, Israel ankaar a oinang mii khatkho tuuknoh ang.’
Amah in amthlah mii in innkhanna anlenglai amah roijuihva thra a louamsa.”
Amah in khuboomvaa kolol anailai, anve, akthi miikhatta anpuih. Mah chuvah anu trulmeinu in apok asa kupa khalekruning, khuuboomna miitam in trulmeinusoh inruuia seh ei.
Akpu in trulmeinu chuta amuh in, arilvol hanga akuunga ason, “Trapnohro.”
Che amah in innaia avache ukuta apalpei, ukuta akpuui in ngirra amsei. Chunna amah in ason, “Intlango, keiin nikuunga kisonche, inthlouro.”
Cheva akthi mii in inthousa, mahche trongkho amthronpei. Cheva intlangsa chuta anukuunga amlanpei.
Miinaam in intri suuksei; che anmah in Ringpu ta paar mathrat a ason, “Akliin ringraan inkhat ikaar a inthruhsa!” che “Ringpu in amah amiita thlenga a anpei!”
Amahrella antong trongi Judia apumtea mahche mahvella inhiilla am ramboom anaamtea inthek a sehsa.
Mahchunna John in aroi innihta onga Akpu kuunga mathlah a amsonei, “Akthleng samkha nang sacheme, chunoh a kannih in aktleita kan an umangme?”
Mahche mii in Akpu kuunga anthlenglai anmah in anson, “Tui aklup John in kannihta nikuunga kanimthlah a kanimruiung, ‘Akthleng samkha nang sacheme, chunoh a kannih in aktleita kan an umangme?’ ”
Mah pungtal achunna Jisu in akna aksa jikcha, rii natna jikcha mahche thranoh li in luut jikchata amthratei, che amah in mitcho jikcha muh amphah ei.

Chunna Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Nannih in nantheih khatkho nanmuh anaamtekha John kuunga seh a sonve: mitcho in anmit muh anphahpei, kehtlik in seh anchekpei, reichi kop in tlengsei, amkuur akpang eiin antheihpei, akthita amringei, aran anriing ankuunga akthra trongta raanna rungaia theih amphahpei.
Tunangkhat keita keivatnohmii khavah doiphah veisa.”
John vaa trongraan ei in anlengnua, John relna miitam kuunga Jisu in son amthronpei: “Nannih in raprilla jangta ak an sehchoume? Thli in aklok raphaltame?
Chuche nannih in jangta nan annatu sehchoume? Anneem puun aksilh miikhattame? Anve, khalmo thra inliinga puunrei silh a tlanna akpaal anmahvah kurung kool a amsei.
Churella nannih in jangta ak an sehchoume? Ringraan inkhattame? Oi, keiin nankuunga kisonpeichou, amahvaa ringraan inkhatchung akralsa.
Mah i amah turella injihsa, ‘Anve kei trongraanta nanmaikuunga kamthlah, amah in nannih nanmaa a nanlam amchaangtu.’
Keiin nankuunga kisonchou kumei in anpokaar a John ta ralla anrol tukhatkho amnoh; chulata Ringpu vaa kurung huuunna avah andihrem amah in inrolrem veitu.”
(Mahchuta aktheih mii naamte khatkho roithraiei in aklup John phah a Ringpu ta amichimpei;
Chuta Pharisi mahche ukil ei invah aklup John kha phah a anmah atak turella Ringpu in amdonkha indahsei.)
“Chunna mah ringnatluun na mii ita keiin jaknangsoh kamlak ume, che anmah in khonang seime?
Anmahva keithiilla inbok a khatleh khat ong nao khanangsei, kannih in nannih turella pasi kantumta, nannih in laamnoh sachou; kannih in tinta kantlohta, nannih in trapnoh sachou.
Alamva aklup John in tolkho saanoh a, ngangli tuiikho iinnoh a thlengsa; nannih in ‘Amahta khousaar amrui’ ta nanson.
Miivaa Asa kupa in saa iinna thlengsa; che nannih in nanson, ‘Anve, avonpii liin mahche tuiibuh ak iin, roithrai mii mahche alehchel miivaa anpai.’
Chuta amah asa ei in lousingta amichimpei.”
Cheva anve, khuuboomna alehchel kumei inkhat in Pharisi inna Jisu in buh asaaknatu inbok a amsa ta aromma, amah in inteina thao inthaal lungbeel inkhat athlenpei.
Jisu akehkuung aknungtong angirhche trap a, akthlia Jisu akehta machor amthronpei, mahchuta amah asamma anuulpei, che Jisu akehta machoh a, thao ateipei.
Mahchun Jisu ta akouh Pharisi in ohchuta amuhlai arilsuunga amidonpei, “Mahmii inta ringraan inkhat veile, amahta akpal i tume, amah kumei i alehchel mii ta arom uta.”
Mahchunna Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Simon, keiin nangkuunga jangmekhat kisontu am.” Chunna amah in amsang, “Lulok, mahchu jangsme?”
“Tunangkhat baobeh ampu mii khatnata baobeh akpu mii innih ammei; mii inkhat in dinari reija ranga intoolsa, che aktleikhat in sopnga intoolsa.
Anmah in ansiincheknoh khanna ammah innihta a ip ei. Pek tunang jaknangmii khata amah in ralla aringvol ume?”
Simon in amsang, “Keiin kamdonva, amahta ak ip khata thloia amah in aringvoltu.” Jisu in akuunga ason, “Nangin chimma pichaar nitlohpei.”
Mahchunna Jisu in kumeitonga inheia Simon ta ason, “Amah kumei i nimuhme? Keiin nang inna luutsang, kikeh chaamnatu tuii kamlannohche, chuta amah kumei in akthlia kikeh machor a asam in keinuulpei.
Nangin keita kimchoh nohche, chuta onna kiluutnata amah in kikeh machoh inngainoh.
Ngang in kikanga thao keiteinohche, chuta amah inva kikeh a thao keiteiang.
Churella keiin nangta kisonche, keiin amahvaa aleh jikchata ki ippei; alamva amah in keita khalmo aril kamvollang. Aleh steta in ip mii khanna steta aril involning.”
Mahche Jisu in kumeita ason, “Nang nileh anaamte ki ip peiche.”
Chunna Jisu soh saaknatu inbokpijou mii in anmahseeng ankaar a trong amithronpei, “Alehchel mii rounakho ip akchek amah i tunang meio?”
Mahche Jisu in kumeita ason, “Nangin namlotrella nangta nakkalpei; leh oia sehrosa.”
Mahche thranoh li in akluut che kumei arou aknaeita amthrat ei, khatkho amahkuung nata khousaar sirih in anthruhna Meri Makadalili,
che Herot vaa ataploikuunga thlou amrel Khuja akmei Joana leh Susana, aktlei kumei jikcha in anmah andoon ankhaal mathruh a amijoom.
Chi akloon mii in amah chita avorhnatu sehsa; che amah in chi avorh in chi arouin lamkomma a tlasa, che mahchu keh akho anchilhpei, marvaanna va inkho ansaakpei.
Mahche chi arouin lungkaara tlasa; che mahchu amoongin leipii amnohrel chaarsa.
Mahche arouin kuling kaara tla, che kuling in mahchusoh jouta amoongche ahippei.
Aktleiva akthra leipiia tla a che mahchu moonga akrah suruk reija inrah. Tronglam i asonsuunga Jisu in onga ason, “Tunangkhat in rungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso.”
Mahchunna Jisu in asonei, “Ringram huunnavaa anthuptrong romnatu nankuunga kamlanchou; chuta aktlei ankuung avah anmah in muh a anmuhnoh natu, che rungaia anlohtheihnoh natu pandam veia kison.”
Lamkom na in arungai miisei; mahchunna seitan in thlenga antak in malot a inkal anphahnoh natu anril suungnata trongkha sut a aloh ei.
Lung achungnava anmah in anrungeih in trongchu roomthok a anlouloh, chuta akjung thuuk a athlaknohrel lai kakruta amilot che madoi athlenglai anril inleng anmahkhasei.
Kuling kaarna khava anmah in antheihche, anmahtu annono anhoong anva laltu rilla roomthok in achek a thra marahna janoh.
Mahche akthra leipiina khava akseeng leh akthra anril in trongkha anrungeih che chetkenga choia andoutheih a thra inrah anmahkhasei.”
Alamva indang cheknohtuta inthup a amtu jakhatkho amnoh, che inromnoh tuta inthup a amtu jakhatkho amnohtu.
Churelna nannih in jaknang hoonga nantheihme cheksilve; alamva ak am mii kuungah ralla kamlantu, che ak amnoh mii kuungnata amah in ste asihkhaphao klohtu.”
Mahche Jisu anuleh anao eiin amahta inmuhpinatu apaalla ngaak a amsei.
Chuta Jisu in ankuung asonei, “Ringpu trongta nantheihche athlou veia aktloh anmahta kei kinu che kinaosei.”
Anmah in mulita thoua anseh in amahva insa: Cheva tuiiramma khuleh thli tranga karaangsa, chunna mulisuunga tuii sipsamma thihnaringna anphahpei.
Cheva anmah in Jisu ta mathoua anson, “Jisu, Jisu, kannih thisamsung!” Mahchunna Jisu in inthoua thlileh tuiisolh amthronta akhaam in annih a inngaia inneemsa.
Mahche Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in namilot khosame?” Chunna anmah in trihkho trih a salungkhoukho khouva khatleh khat insonsei, “Thlileh tuii inkhoh amah atrongta amijuih Jisu i tumeio?”
Mahche Jisu in tuiipaalla anthruhlai, khousaar chuung mii khat khuuboom nata inthruh a Jisu soh intuuksa; alamva amah in khalmo sot a puunreikho silhnoh inn akho amnoh, chuta rusuunkaara am.
Amah in Jisu ta amuh in onga Jisu amaikuunga intlolh a ahou inkaanga ason, “Akthloirem Ringpu Asa kupa Jisu o, nangin keita jangtlohtang nitihme? Keiin nangta kamthruunche keita kamlahnohro.”

Alamva Jisu in mahmii chunnata anthruhnatu akseengnoh lita jathang amlan. (Alamva seengnoh li in amahta lai amrel asuur; che mii in amahta seel seilakho, thirruia kaanseilakho che ahang masuur seilakho, amahta ankaannakha akpotkir mahche khousaar in amahta raprilla amnom.)
Mahche Jisu in akuunga arui, “Nikming tume?” Chunna amah in ason, “Lejan” alamva khousaar tam in akuunga luut ei.
Khousaar in kannihta adong amnoh khur a kansehnatu jathang kanitlohnoh rota Jisu kuunga anngen.
Pek muulkaar a vokjaam khat anthlai saa ammei; che anmah in kannihta vokjaam ankaar a kanluutnatu kanijarota Jisu ta anngenpei. Mahchunna Jisu in anmahta ajapei.
Cheva khousaar in mii chunnata inthruh a vokjaam kaar a anluutche tuiiramma hunpeia tuii luut a raangchatsei.
Cheva vokjaam aksel in mah aksuuk khata anmuh in tlaanna khuuboomma khatkho ramboomma antongpei.

Cheva mah aksuuk chuta ak an heihei inthruhsei, che anmah in Jisu kuunga thlengsei, khousaar in inthruh a amah miikhan puunreikho silh a invetnoh ramroom veia Jisu kuunga inbok a am anmuh in intrisei.
Cheva khousaar asuur amahta khatloh a thrakhem meta akmuh mii in akthleng ankuunga antongpei.
Cheva Kerasenis ramta kooi a ak am mii in anmah ankuungnata mah a asehnatu Jisu ta anson; alamva anmah in intri suuksei; cheva amah in muli chuunga inlengsa.
Chunna khousaar in inthruh a amah mii khanna Jisu soh inruuitangta akuunga angen; chuta amahta mathlah a ason,
“Nang ni inna inlengrosa, che Ringpu in nangturel jikcha phah akliinthlou naktlohme sonna madangro.” Chunna amahturel Jisu in jikcha phah akliinthlou atlohmeta khuuboom apumtea sonna amdangpei.
Mah khanna akming Jairas an ong kupatkhat thlengsa, amahvaa sinakok akpuui mii; amah in Jisu akehkungah intolh a keiinna thlengrota angen,
alamva asakumei inkhatruning, kum somlei innihvak thisamma am.
Jisu in athlenglai miitam in anlompei.
Mahche tukhat inkho amithrat cheknoh kum somleinih thii luunga kna kumei khat in,
Jisu kuunga thlenga, amah apuunpaarta apal; cheva amah athii luungchu kak hanga indoonsa.
Mahchunna Jisu in ason, “Keita keipalkha tunangme?” Mii naamte in nakpalnoh ungta andah inva, Pitar in ason, “Akpu, miitam in nangta naklommei che nangkuunga inhommei!”
Chuta Jisu in ason, “Tumekhat in keipallang; alamva kei kuungnata tuui inthruhsa, kirom.”

Kumei khanna kei i inthup janoh tunaisang ta arompeia amah in inchuunna thlengsa, che amahkuunga intoltlep a jarella amahta kapalme mahche khatloh a kak hanga keita kamthrat angmeta miinaam anmaikuunga asonpei.
Che Jisu in kumei akuung khanna ason, “Kisa kumeio, nangin namlot kharella nangta namthratpei; leh oia sehrosa.”
Jisu in atrongsuung talla rampuui innata mii khat in thlenga a ason, “Nang nisa kumeikha thisa; Lulokta inlenga chutnoh rosa.”
Chuta ohchuta Jisu in atheih in akuunga amsang, “Intrinohro, malotru malot paningro, amah in thratu.”
Inn achunna amah in athlenglai, Pitar, John, Jems inkhatkho naova apa leh anu noh a tukhatkho asuunga luutpinohsa.
Cheva amahturel miinaam in trapkho trapsei, che sinthruuisei; chuta amah in ason, “Trapnohve; alamva amahvah thinoh, chuta inning.”
Amah naoi thisa anromma Jisu ta aminuihpei.
Chuta Jisu in nao akutta matuh a aong, “Rungaak o, inthouro.”
Mahchunna amah akli inlenga, kak hang ngirsa; che amahkuunga saakphu malanveta jathang amlanei.
Cheva anu apa in salungkhousei; chuta mah aksuuk i tukhat ningkho sonnohveta Jisu in ankuunga aktrang jathang amnanei.
Cheva anmahta Ringpu kurung huunnata anraannatu mahche akna aksaeita mathratnatu amthlah ei.
Che ankuunga asonei, “Rapkheitla nansehnatu sungrolh slakho, thong slakho, tol slakho baobeh slakho, jakhatkho phurhnohve, inluut innih phurnohve.
Che nannih in nanluutna innkhanna tlungve, che mah khannata inthruhkho inthruhnohve.
Che tunangkhat in nannihta nanisoongnoh eile, khuuboom khannata nannih in nanthruh laia nannih nanchunga sakhi aveinatu nankehna uphulta mathiimma mahve.”
Cheva anmah in khuu khuua seh a Akthra Trong anraan mahche akna amithratei.
arouin Elaijah ta indangsa, che aktlei in ringraan amlui ankaar nata ringsa ta anson.
Herot in ason, “Keiin John akang kitanpei, chuta keiin amah relna oinangtrong ktheih mii i tusame?” Churel Jisu ta amuhnatu ajon.
Chunna miitam in mahchuta anromma amah aknu anjuihpei; che Jisu in anmahta thratea lousoonga Ringram huunna relna trong mahche natna thra akdi anmahta amthrat ei.

Pek kini atlaktum somleinih in Jisu kuunga thlenga anson, “Miitam ei i mahvel inna kooi a am khuu khuu leh khuuboomma ansaak an iin antuuknatu mahche anriknatu mathlah eirosa; alamva inih in mii amnohna achikna a amsame.”

Chuta Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in anmah kuunga saakphu malaneive.” Anmah in anson, “Inih in seh a mii naamte turel ansaakphu leinoh maleva, ikuunga tol atum ranga leh nga innihnata ralla amnohsa.”
Alamva anmahva kupa akpul rangavak ei. Jisu in aroikuunga asonei, “Anmahta mii sopnga sopnga loom veia mabok eive.”
Che nga tloh a anmah naamteta amibokpei.
Mahchunna Jisu in tol atum ranga leh nga innihta louva ringram intouva a anche doi malanna mahchuta khoia miitam ankuunga ansemnatu aroita amlanei.
Che anmah naamtein saa a anvon invahsei. Che anlei akirkaar luktoong somleinih anchunpei.
Che anmah in amisang, “Aklup John, chuta arouin Elaijah, che aktlei in ringraan amlui ankaarna inkhatta ringsa ta nansonei.”
Che Jisu in asonei, “Chuta nannih inva keita tume nantih angme?” Che Pitar in amsang, “Ringpu vaa Khrista khache.”
Chuta mah i tukhat kuungakho antongnoh natu tranga asonei,
“Miivaa Asa kupa in klah knang khalmo aphahtu tla, anparuul ei in, akthloi thiimpu mahche ringjih lulok eiin amahta indah a anthattu, che nithum tihpia amah in ringtu.”
Alamva tukhat in amah achaanta ankaljale maangtu, che tukhat in kei turella amah ali maangle, amah in inkal aphahtu.
Alamva mii inkhat in tukleiram apumte aphahche ataktal maang nohle tum veile amahtu achuungna jangamsame?
Alamva tunangkhat in keirella mahche keitrong rella injak phahle, miivaa Asa kupa in Apa leh Akseeng ringroivaa paarthra a athlenglai injak aphahtu.
Chuta keiin nankuunga taktak a kisonchou, onna angirmii arouva Ringram huunna anmuhnohmiil kthita matemnoh usei.”
Che amah in angensuunga, Jisu vaa ameel amthleipei apuunreikho inngousa intlekho intlesa.
Che anve, mii innih in Jisu soh trongei, anmahchuva Moses leh Elaijah ei,
Anmah in paarthrata mamuh a Jerusalem mapung amiphahnatu Jisu in asehnasam rella trongei.
Pek Pitar leh amahsoh anruuipiva an ihmua mitchusei, anmah in inthranga an anlai Jisu vaa paarthra che amahsoh ngirjou mii innihta anmuhpei.

Chunna anmah in Jisu kuungnata anthreklaia Pitar in Jisu ta ason, “Inih in onna iam thra; chunna thlaam inthum tlohrei, nangturel inkhat, Moses turel inkhat mahche Elaijah turel inkhat tlohrei” — amah in jangta asonme romnoh.
Che amah in trongi asonsuunga, sumphai thlenga anmahta akhalpei; anmah in sumphai kaar a anluut in intrisei.
Che sumphainata hou inkhat thlenga ason, “Mah i keiin kichar Kisa kupasa; amah in ason rungaive.”
Che mahouchu atrongche, Jisu akrouta am anktuuk ningsa. Mahchunna anmah in rimta amsei, che mahlai anmuhkha tukhat kuungkho sonnoh ei.
Che anve, miitam ankaar nata kupakhat in ongsa, “Lulok, kisa kupata anrota amthruun, alamva amah i keitu veia khalekru kpok kisa kupaning;
anro, li inkhat in amahta suura asih, cheva amah in kak hanga ongsa; abaoa amchilkho inthruh a akchut, che khalmo masok a akuungnata mah indah a inthruhsa.
Amahta aminomnatu nang niroita kisonei chuta manom cheknoh ei.”
Jisu in amsang, “Ah, malotnoh mahche inhe ringnatluun, keiin nannihsoh jikcha sot a amjouva kdou uchoume? Nisa kupakha onna thlenro.”
Amah in athlenglai, khousaar in amahta chutchit a amlah. Chuta Jisu in akseengnoh lita asaalche, kupasa khata amthratpei, che apakuunga naota amlanpei.
Anmah naamtein Ringpu vaa achek amneh thlou khanna salungkhousei.
Chunna Jisu in atlohthlou anaam khanna mii naamtein anhalsuunga aroita asonei,
“Mahtrongi namikuura thunve; alamva miivaa Asa kupata miikut a amilansampei.”
Chuta mah asonni anmah in romnohsei, che anmah in ohchuta anlohtheihnoh natu mahche khiial antlaknoh natu anrilta amthup; cheva mairella anmah in akuunga akrui trihsei.
Chuta Jisu in anmah anrilla trong inkharh a amidonchuta aromma andihnao inkhatta akuunga kaia asihche,

asonei, “Tunangkhat in keiminga amah andihnao ita louchoule keita nanloh ang, che tunangkhat in keita keilou choule keita kamthlah amahta nanlohpei; alamva nannih nankaar a andihrem amah in akliinremtu.”
Chuta Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Amahta khaamnohve; alamva nannihta nanijetnoh miikha nannih nanmiisa.”
Mahche Jisu in amah amaa a mii aloumathlah natu atirh ei, Jisu turella thlouraang antlohnatu atirhmii khanna Samaria khuukhat a luutsei;
chuta mah khanna mii in amahta loulounohsei, alamva atak in Jerusalm phah a asehnatu aril amngirhpei cheva anmah in Jisu ta loulounohsei.
Amah aroi Jems leh John in mahchuta anmuh in anson, “Akpu, marvaan tingna mei mathlah a anmah in ankaangkhem naturel kansonnatu kanimtlohja cheme?”
Chuta anmahta inheia asaalei.
Cheva anmah in khuu inkhat a sehsei.
Mahchunna Jisu in akuunga ason, “Uiiramuiivaa ankhur am, che marvaanna vakho anbu am; chuta miivaa Asa kupava akang asihna munkho amnoh.”
Mahche aktlei in khat kuunga ason, “Kei kiknu keijuihro.” Chuta amah in ason, “Akpu, keiin matsah a kipata akphuum kisehnatu keijamanro.”
Chuta amah in akuunga ason, “Akthi in antak anroua anphuumnatu akthita mah eiro; chuta nangva seh a Ringpu kurung huunnata raanro.”
Mahche aktleikhat in ason, “Akpu, keiin niknu kijuih uche; chuta keiinna ak am eita matsah a saammaan tangei.”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Tunangkhat in akut a langkol amtuhche aknung inheia ak an mii in Ringpu kurung huunna turella amahvah matik chanoh mii.”
Mahche Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Lou luhnatuva tam am, chuta akluhtu miiva tamnoh; churella lou luhnatu thloutloh mii amthlahnatu lou Akpu kuunga ngenve.
Nannih in sehve; anve, uiiramuii ankaar a sadamte nanga keiin nannihta kamthlah peichou.
Skhao thong maruuinohve, thong mahche kehkhraang jakhatkho phurhnohve; che lamma tukhatkho mathruunnohve.
Nannih in nanluutna inn khanna matsah a, ‘Mah innkhanna leh oi am veiso!’ ta sonve.
Mahche ohkhanna leh oi vaa asa kupata amle, nannih leh oi kha anmah anchunga amtu; chuta amnohle, mahchu nankuunga inlengtu.
Mah innkhanna nga amve, che anmah in nanimlankha saa inna amve, alamva thlou aktlohmii in amahtu atlohman phah i matikcha; inn inkhatnata inn inkhat a inlennohve.
Nannih in khuupii khat a nanluutlai anmah in nannihta ja a nanilou eile, anmah in nanmaikunga nanidoonkha saave;
mah khanna ak am mii kna ksaeita mathrat eive, che ankuunga sonve, ‘Ringpu vaa kurung huunna nankuunga innaisa.’
Chuta nannih in khuupii khat a nanluutlai anmah inta nanijanoh a nanilounoh eile, lamkhanna seh a sonve,
Nannih khuupiina uphul kankeh a akmaarta nannihta naniandah veia kannuulpei; chuta nannih in mah i romve, mahchuta Ringpu vaa kurung huunna nankuunga innaisa.
Keiin nankuunga kisonchou, mahni chunna mah khuupii chunga Sodom in ralla rilvolna veitu.”
Chuta pichaar atlohlai nannih nanchunga Tair leh Sidon in ralla rilvolna veitu.
Mahche Kaparnaum nango, nangva ringram phah a nakdom ume? Nangta repnanga nakthlaktu.
Mii sopsrih khan roomthok a inlengsei, che anson, “Akpu, nang nikminga khousaar inkho kannih kanthlanga ammei!”
Mahchunna Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Khu inthla in marvaannata tlananga Seitan in tla kimuh.
Anve, muruul mahche nachal anchunga nanchilhnatu khatkho nannih jeknaei antuuita nancheknatu keiin nannihta akchek amneh kamlanchou; che jakhat inkho nannihta nanimsok tlohnohtu.
Chuta oh inna nannih in roomthok tlohnohve, mah chuvah li in nanthlanga am, chuta nannih in roomthokve mah chuvah nannih nanming ringramma injih a amtusa.”

Bilam naamte Pa in keikuunga namsilpei, che Pa noh a Asa kupakha tumeta tukhat inkho romnoh ei, nohle Asa kupa noh a Pa ta tukhat inkho romnoh ei che Asa kupa in achar miikhan amahta amdangnatu relna.
Alamva keiin kitihchou, ringraan leh kurung eiin nannih in nanmuhta anmuhja, chuta muhnoh ei, mahche nannih in nantheihta antheihjahang, chuta theihnohsei.”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Trongsuura khatloh a injih a amme? Che katloh a nipaame?”
Amah in amsang, “Nangin Akpu Ringpu ta niril apumte, niruung ringna apumte, nikli apumte, mahche nimdon apumtea rilvolro, che nangin nanthringpita nitaknanga rilvol eiro.”
Mahchunna Jisu in akuunga ason, “Nangin khalmo chimma namsangpei khame, mahchu tlohro, che nangin ringuche.”
Chuta atak in akchim aveija hanga Jisu ta ason, “Keiin kinthringpi miichu tume?”
Jisu in amsang, “Mii inkhat in Jerusalem nata Jerikho phah a ajunglai, amah in inru inraan ankut a tlasa, amah apuunrei ansutche marat a akthi hoonga mah a sehsei.
Pek mah laitalla reipakthra veia thiimpu inkhat in amah lamtongkhan ajunglai; amahta amuh in akomtonga peella sehsa.
Mahchunanga Levi na mii khat inkho amun achunna athlengin, amahta amuh, aktleitonga peella sehlasa.
Chuta Samaria na mii khat in rapkheitla asehlai amah amnatonga thlengsa amahta amuh in aringvol hangsa,
cheva amahkuunga thlenga asoknata thaoleh ngangli tuii poih a athlompei, cheva amah atak sachunga amchuungche miitlungna inn khat ah aphurhpei che thratea asihpei.

Mahche akhuvar a amah in baobeh dinari innih thlenna miitlungna inn akpu ta malanna ason, ‘Amahta thratea anna rou tlohro; che amah relna nangin baobeh namluut anaamte keiin veikhat kithlenglai kamlengkir uche.’
Anmah inthum ankaar a jaknangmii in inru inraan ankut ah aktlavaa anthringpi mii veime ta nangin nimdon sakhi khome?”
Amah in ason, “Amahta aringvol hanga rou aktloh miihkhasa.” Mahchunna Jisu in akuunga ason, “Nangin seh a mah khananga tlohro.”
Amah anaokumei Meri an ong inkhat am, amah in Akpu akehkungah inbok a amah atrongta arungeih.
Chuta Martha in routloh a khalmo innoksa; amah in Jisu kuuga thlenga ason, “Akpu o, kei kikroua routloh inchek angta kinaoin keimah i thousanoh cheme? Keita kamjoomnatu amahta sonro.”
Chuta Akpu in amsang, “Martha, Martha, nithlou tamrella inchoia lah sacheme;
thlou inkhatva darkaar. Amahkuung nata inlounoh tupot akthra chuumta amah in acharpei.”
Chunna ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in nanngenlai,” ngata sonve: “Pa, nang nikming akseeng veiso. Nang kurung huunna tlungchu veiso.
Kannih in nikhat nikhattu kanvahna saakphu aknirel kanimlanro.
Kannih kanlehta kani ipro, alamva kannih inkho kanleiman antool eita kan ip; mahche kannihta madoi tinga kanimthlak nohro, chuta thranoh tingnata kanikalro.”
alamva rapkheina kiruul inkhat keikuunga tlunga, amahta kamlannatu jakhatkho amnohsang’ ta nison in;
amah in inn asuungnata, ‘Kei kilahnatu keivotnohro, ipek inn inkhaarsa, che kisaeisoh kukthoolla insung; keiin inthoua jakhatkho namlan cheknoh usang’ ta amsang ume?
Keiin nannihta kisonchou, amah in aruultak aveiphao inthoua akuunga malan indah, chuta amah in inleng inlenga angen rella amah in inthoua amahtu darkaarta amlantu.
Mahche keiin nannihta kisonchou, ngenve, mahche nankuunga nanimlantu, jonve, mahche nannih in natuuktu; innkhaar beengve, nannihta nanimhoongtu.
Alamva akngen miirel in anphah, akjon miirel in aktuuk, mahche innkhaar akchum miirelta amhoongtu.
Nannih nankaar a jaknang apa in Asa kupa in tol anihta lung amlan ume;
chunoh a amah in aartui anihta ruulsok amlan ume?
Nannih in leikha akthranoh veichoulakho, nansa kuungva akthra kutthol amlan theihchoule, ringramma am Pa kuunga akngen mii kuungah jikcha ralthloia Li Akseengta nanimlan usa!”
Chuta anmah mii arouin ason, “Amah in khousaarvaa kurung Biljebul apaalla khousaarta amnom”
mahche aktlei mii in amahta chaang anna ringramnata daang inkhat amahkuung nata anjon.

Chuta anmah anrilchuta aromma ankuunga asonei, “Ringram kurung huunna anaamte in antaksuunga inthrek baak atlak in maangna suuk, che taploikuung inkhat in taploikuung suunga inthrek baak atlak in klah ah tlaei.
Mahche seitan ankaar a inthrek baak tlale amah kurung huunna in khatloh a paal tueime? Alamva keiin Biljebul apaalla khousaar amnomta nansonnang.
Mahche keiin Biljabul apaalla khousaarta manom angle, nansakupa invah tunang anpaalla anmahta aminom ume? Alamchunna anmah in nannihtu pichaartloh vei tuei.
Chuta keiin Ringpu akut majung apaalla khousaarta amnom veiangle, ringram kurung huunna i nankuunga thlengsa.
Aktrang mii in raal kutlai puunrei thratea silh a, innta alougaak in apoot achei maangnoh a am.
Chuta mahchung ralla aktrang thlenga amahta chekle, amah in atrangpina kutlai puunrei anaamteta ansuttu, che ansutpootta insemtuei.
Keisoh anruuinoh amahkhan keita keiandah veisa, che keisoh inchunjounoh amah khanna akthek.”
Che amah in athleng laia innchu athiirche thratea alamnaia innaalla asih aktuukpei.
Cheva amah in seh a amahchung ralla akthranoh aktlei li sirihkho thlenna anluutche mahchunna amsei; chunna amah miikha matsahna ahoong chunga juktoolna ahoong in ralla thranoh veisa.”
Chuta Jisu in ason, “Ringpu trongta rungaia mahchuta amjuih aksih miikha doiphah veisa.”
Alamva Jonah in Nineveh na mii ankuunga daang aveinanga, miivaa Asa kupa inkho mah ringnatluun inna veiusa.

Akhutingna kurungpii in pichaarnia mah ringnatluun na kupaeisoh inruuia inthoua anmahta amilaal tuei; alamva amah kumei in tukleiram achena akiingnata Solomon lousing arungeihnatu thlengsa, che anve, Solomon chung ralla anrol jamekhat onna am.
Nineveh na mii in pichaarnia mah ringnatluun isoh inruuia inthoua maita amilaaltu; alamva Jonah in trong araan khanna anmah anril anthlengpei, che anve, Jonah chunga ralla anrol jamekhat onna am.”
Nang nitaktu meiserva nimitsa; nimitkhata thra seengle, nitak apumtekho thra akvaar in siptu, chuta nimitkhata thra seengnohle, nitak apumtekho inthim in siptu.
Churella nangkuungah ak am akvaarkha anthimnoh natu insuulro.
Nang nitak apumteta akvaar in siple, anthimna amun tlakna amnohle, meiser kvaar in nangkuunga nakleng nanga nitak apumte kvaar in siptu.”
Amah in buh asaaknoh maa a matsah a akut asilnoh invah Pharisi in amuh a salungkhousa.
Mahchunna Akpu in akuunga ason, “Pharisi nannihvah buhkaan leh kamva apaaltonga thra nantlen, chuta nanril suungavah salokleh akthranoh in sipchou.
Chuta kmong eio, apaaltonga thra a iniseem amah in asuungtongkho naniseem nohme?
Chuta asuunga ak am pootkha inltenve; che anve, bilam anaamte nannih turella seengkirsa.
Pharisi nankuunga lahna veisachou! Alamva Sinakok a akangveia inbokva nandit chela keithiil keithiilla mii in nannihta nanimthruunna naninjahkho nandit
Nannihva lahna veisachou a! alamva nannihva mii in anmuhno rusuun nangsachou, mah amunkhata mii in romnoh a achungakho sehtlam loontlam ei.”
Ukil khat in amakuunga amsang, “Lulok, mah nison i kannihta kanisaal peiche.”
Amah in ason, “Ukil nannihkho lahna veisachou a! Alamva nannih in miita pootrikvah namiroon, nannih nantak invah pootrikha ste ajaangnatu nankutmajung inkhat inkho domnohchou.
Nankuunga lahna veisachou! Alamva nanpa nanpuin anthat ringraan eita phuumnatu rusuun nanchoh.
Chunna nannih in sakhi veisachou, nanpa nanpuvaa anthloukha nannih in nanjatlam; alamva anmahta anthatpei nannih in anmahtu rusuun nanseem.
Alamchunna Ringpu alousingin ason, keiin ringraan leh raangroi eita kamthlahtuei, anmah arouta anmah in anthattu che arouta anchuttu,
mahchu tukleiram amthron lainata ringraanei anthii tlakha mah ringnatluun chunginna atlakna ajanatu relna,
Akseeng munleh thiilkuung ankaar a akthi akmaang Abel vaa thiinata Jekhariah athii phah a.
Ukil nannihta lahna veisachou a! Alamva nannih in khiialvaa chapi nanlohpei; nantak invah luutnohchou, che akluut miikho nankhaampei.”
alamva amah in trong amsoilai ansuurnatu amahta ruunga a amsei.
Inphoongnohtu inbahkhuptu jakhatkho amnoh, nohle inromnanoh luunga inthuptu jakhatkho amnoh.
Alamchunna nannih in inthim kaara nanson naamtekha akvaar kaar a intheihkirtu, che nannih in khumma nanroua insoh a trongchoukha innbunga indanga insonkirtu.”
Chuta nannih in tunangta trih uchoume keiin nanimtheih tang. Anthatche aknua repnanga thlaknatu tuui ak am amahta trihve; oi, keiin nankuunga kisonchou, Akpu amahta trihve!
Baobeh innih turellaru usak ranga nanjurnoh eime? Ringpu amaikuunga ampolhtu jakhatkho amnoh.
Jarelna choume, nankangna sam phaova amasing tangkir a ateenpipei Intrinohve; nannihva usak chunga aman nanral.”
“Mahche keiin nankuunga kitihchou, miimaikuunga keita keija kamliin miirelta, miivaa Asa kupa inkho Ringpu vaa ringroi anmaikuung akho ja a kamliintu;
chuta miimaikuunga keita keijanoh miirelta Ringpu vaa ringroi anmaikuung akho janohtu.
Che miivaa Asa kupata indah janoh a aktrong miirelta a iptu; chuta Li Akseengta janoh a aktrong khava ipnohtu.
Che anmah in nannihta sinakok ah, rampuuiei mahche akchek amneh ei anmaikunga naniphurh laia, nannih in khatloh a kamisangtu chunohle khatloh a trong tu ungta inchoinohve;
alamva Li Akseeng in mah pungtal khanna khatloh a trong uchoumeta nanimtheihtu.”
Miitam ankaarna inkhat in amahkuung ason, “Lulok, keiin kphahtuphu kichang khaankha kei kuungakho keipeknatu kiuhte kuunga keisonro.”
Chuta Jisu in akuunga ason, “Miio, nannih nanpootta semnatu mahche nanchunga pichaar tlohnatu tunang in keita keithunme?”
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Cheksilve, che karal karaamsam anaamte nata nantak inkem theihve; alamva miikhatvaa achaan i amah in asih adoon akhaal khanna amnoh.”
Mahchunna ankuunga pandam khat malanna asonei, “Akdoon miikhatvaa aramma saak iin inleisolh a tam masuuk a asih;
chunna arilsuunga amdonpei, ‘Keiin kha kitloh usa: alamva kei saangniim kipeinatu aphom amnohsa?’
Che amah in ason, ‘Keiin mai tlohtang: keitom anaamte thrit a ralbeb a anrol seemtang; che mahchunna kei saangniim mahche pootchei anaamte peia sihtang.

Mahche kei kiruungvaa likuunga sontang, Li o, akthlengsam kum jikchana turella nangtu saangniim khatkho pootchei akthra jikcha kipeipei; nang turella lahna amnohsa, saaro, iinro, khatkho roomthokrosa.’
Chuta Ringpu in amahkuunga ason, ‘Kmongo, mi in khulouh a nang niklikha keiin kiloh usa; che nangturel thlouraang tloh a nisih naamtekha tunangta vei ume?’
Ringpu tinga doonnoh a atak turel lalpei amahkha oinangsa.”
Alamva chaan in saak iinchunga che puunrei in iruung chunga aral.
Uiiaakta madonve: anmah in vorhkho vorhnoh ei vaatkho vaatnoh ei, anmahtu tom nohle khoongkho amnoh ei, chulata Ringpu in anmahta roia akemmei. Nannihva va chunga khalmo ralla akthloichou.
Mahche nannih tunang in aringna turella inchoichoua amah achaanta kiilkhat maral nanchekme?
Chunna nannih in andihte khatphao tlohcheknoh chouva jarella anlei chaan turella inchoichoume?

Tuiirei ta madonve, anmah in khatloh a moongeime; anmah in inchekho incheknoh ei che thrulhkho thrulhnoh ei; chuta keiin kisonchou, Solomon luung inkho amah paarthra a anmah nanga puunrei inliing inseemnoh.
Chuta Ringpu in phaia akring inloueita maichah thra a sihleva mi in ak am mahche tungva avah taploia inloontu, chuleva nannihva khalmo akthloi akral choume, malot amnoh miieio!
Mahche nannih in jangkansaaktu che kan iintuta nanril inhalnohve.
Alamva tukleiramna jaatboom in mainang ita anjon; nannihtu nandarkaar am nan Pa in arom.
Mahchu ngutva Ringpu vaa kurung huunnata jonve, che mah naamte i nanta veitu.”

Nannih in nandoonkha juur choulaia, anran anriingta malanve; amlui amnoh skhao nannih turel tlohve, kmaang amnoh, mah chuvah inruin thlenga anlohcheknoh mahche aklungin mamaang acheknoh ringramma nannihtu lal sihve.
Alamva nannih nanlal amna khanna nanrilkho amtu.”
mahche changvaangna buhdoonnata anmah Akpu in inna anleng akngaak anmah khanangve, chunna amah in athlenglai kak hanga inkhaar achumlai anmah in amihoongnatu mahchunang veive

Anmah Akpu in athlenglai doutrang inthranga antuuk roijuih eikha doiphah vei tuei; keiin nannihta atak a kisonchou, amah in anaam raak a anmahta tebor a amboktuei, che amah in thlenga anmahta rou atlohtuei.
Amah in innih tihpi jaanngaak nohle inthumtihpi jaanngaak atlak in thlenga anmahta tuukleva anmahva doiphah veiusei!
Chuta mah i romve, innpuin jaknang punga inruin thlengume tihta romleva, amah in innta mahnoh a che inruin thlenga apoot acheita khoia maruknoh uta.
Nannih inkho inchaanga amve; alamva miivaa Asa kupa in namidonnoh punga thlengtu.”
Pitar in ason, “Akpu, mah pandam i kannih kankuung khopta nisonningme chunoh a mii naamte akho nisonme?”
Mahchunna Akpu in ason, “Mahchunna, ajana laikhanna innpuin amahkuunga a inn alou mahche apootchei pumte masilla amahta malot aja aksing amreltheih miichu tume?
Amah akpu in athlenglai mahchunanga thra marella amah a inn alouta kemtheih a amlaitalla aphah roijuikha doiphah veisa.
Atak a keiin nankuunga kisonchou, innpuin adoon akhaal naamte aroikuunga amchoih kirtu.
Chuta amah roijuih in arilla anroua amdontu, ‘Kei akpu in thleng thilsa,’ cheva amah in kupa kumei roijuih eita khonraan mathronna, che saa iinna tuiibuh inruia amle,
roijuih in amdonnoh aknia mahche amah in aromnoh punga amah akpu in thlengtu, amahta tanti atlohtu che malotjanoh mii eisoh repnanga asihjoutuei.
Roijuih khanna amah akpu in amdonva arom, chuta inchaangnoh chunohle amah akpu in amdonta tlohnoh, amah roijuih khava trihkhop sungmun aphahtu.

Chuta akpu in amdon romnoh, che khon aja roijuih khava sungmun inleou a akhontu. Che khalmo darkaar am mii eita anmah darkaar nujuih a tam amlantuei, chekho ralla tam darkaar mii kuungah ralla tam amlantu.”
Keiin kanlupna ahoong inkhat am; mahchu atlungnoh miilva keiin jikcha kitho umangme!
Keita thaleichunga leh oi amlan thlengta namidon ang? Nganoh, keiin nankuunga kisonchou chuta ralladom threknatu;
peknata innsuung khat a mii ranga amta inthrek inbaak asuuknatu, che inthum in innihta janohtu mahche innih in inthumta janohtu,
anmah in inthrek inbaak tuei, apa in asa kupata che asa kupa in apata an theihnohtu, anuin asa kumeita che asakumei in anuta antheihnohtu, ani in amouta che amouin anita an theihnohtu.”
Mahche akhuna thliraang nanmuh in, ‘Kini tranga insaatuta’ nansontrang, che insaakho insa.
Akthra veisin eio! nannih in thalei mahche marvaan hoongva nanmuhche mah i ngatuta sonvah nanchek; chuta ipek pek a aksuukva jarella sonva cheknoh choume?”

Nangsoh trong nisuukpi miisoh pichaarpu amaikuunga nansehjoulai, lamma nansehsuung amahsoh injana thlennatu insuulro, chunohleva amah in nangta pichaarpu akuung phah a kaia naksehpi aja, che pichaarpu in nangta phrangki kuunga namsiltu, cheva phrangki in nangta simma nakthuntu.
Keiin nangta kitihche, nangin niksiin tuphu achena baobehkha nisiin nohmiil amun khannata inthruh janohluung uche.”
Chunna Pilat in Kalili na miita thii leh anmah in inthiimna pootsoh amipool relna Jisu kuunga aktong mii arou mahlaital khanna ammei.
Chunna amah in amsangei, “Alamva nga tloh a anmah in klah knang anphah rella, Kalili na mii in Kalili a am annaamte chunga ralla alehchelsei ta namidonme?
Keiin nannihta kitihchou, Mahchunoh, chuta nannih in nanril thlengnoh choule mahchunanga nannaamte maanguchou.
Nohle Silom a am thaprel in mii somlei kiritta dolh a athat, anmah in Jerusalem a am mii anaamte chunga ralla thranoh tlohmii seita namidonme?
Keiin kitihchou, Mahchunoh, chuta nannih in nanril thlengnoh chouleva mahchunanga nannaamte maanguchou.”
Chunna amah in nganglibil aktloh eita asonei, ‘Anve, mah kumthum asuung in keiin thotthing akrah akjon kthlengin, khalekkho tuuknoh ang. Tuk a loonve, leipii sul amvei i jarelname?’
Chunna amahkuunga amsang, ‘Lulok, mah i mi inkumkho ammangso, keiin mah ita inhiilla kichohche haar thlakmangtang.
Mah inta akthleng kumma akrah inrahle, thrasa roomthok nasa; chuta inrahnoh leva tukrosa.’ ”
Ipek sabat nia sinakok inkhat a amah in amtheih ei.
Mahchunna kum somlei kirit thranoh li in atak a amma sol inkuuia inding cheknohluung kumei khat am.
Mahchuta Jisu in amuh in amahta onga ason, “Kumeio, nitakna aksolkhanna nangta nakmahpei.”
Amah achunga akut asih in kak hanga atakkha indingkengsa, cheva ringpu ta ampaakpei.
Chuta sinakok akpuui in amahta antheihnohsa, alamva sabat nia Jisu in akna amthrat, “Thlou tlohnatu nijan kuruk am; mahni chunna thlenga akna mathratro, chuta sabat nia tlohnohro.”
Chunna Akpu in akuunga amsang, “Akthra veisin eio, siilkonna khit a nansih siilchal nohle samongta sabat nia majak a tui maiinnatu nankainohme?
Abraham va asakumei akvei, kum somlei kirit seitan in suura asih kumeita sabat nia amthlah nohme?”
Che maita ason, amah anjetta akjak amphah ei; che paarthratna thlou amah in atlohkhanna mii naamte in anroomthoksei.
Mah i mii inkhat in amah thakbilla avorh intrammu inkhat nangsa; chuuna intrammu in moonga thingnanga inrolsa, mah chuvah marvaanna va in abaak a anbu antlohpei.”
Mahchuva, kumei inkhat in jaam olna chaang inthumma, anaamteta chol an olnohmiil akmot khanangsa.”
Chunna tunangkhat in amahkuunga ason, “Akpu, inkal akphah eikha mii steru tueime?” Mahchun ankuunga asonei,
“Ansiik thonga luutnatu kalthi tlohve; alamva keiin kisonchou, miitam in mah khanna anluutnatu anjontu chuta cheknoh tuei.
Innpuin inthloua innkhaar akhaarche nannih in apaalla ngirra inkhaarta chumma nantihtu ‘Akpu, innkhaar kanimhoongro,’ amah in nanimsangtu, ‘Ramnata thlengchoume keiin naniromnoh ang.’
Mahlai nannih in son namithrontu, ‘Kannih in nangsoh kansaak kan iinjou, che nangin kannih kanlam kanlam a namtheih ung.’
Chuta amah in nanisontu, ‘Keiin nannihta kisonchou, ramnata thlengchoume keiin nannihta naniromnoh ang; thranohthlou aktloh naamte eio, kei kuungnata amnohve!’
Nannih in Ringpu vaa kurung huunna a Abraham, Aisaak, Jakop mahche ringraan annaamteta nanmuhlai ohkhanna nanha maket a traptruui uchou.
Che mii in kulkung kulrel nata khatkho akhu akhinata thlenga Ringpu vaa kurung huunna tebor a inbokjou tuei.
Mahche anve, matsah miikhan juktooltu che juktool miikhan matsahtu.”
Mah pungtal achunna Pharisi in thlenga akuunga asonpei, “Onnata sehrosa amnohrosa, alamva, Herot in nakthatsampei.”
Chunna anmahta asonei, “Nannih in seh choulaia uiiramuiita sonve, ‘Anve, keiin khousaarta kamnomei che akna eikho kamthrat ei, che nithum tihpia keiin kitlohtuphu kithlou kamche usa.
Chuta mi inkho, tungvakho, tuibahkho keiin sehtu tlasang; alamva Jerusalem nata ringraan inkhaluungtkho maangva veinohtu.’

Nannih nankuunga kamthlah ringraan eita akthat mahche lunga akden Jerusalem o! Jerusalem o! Aarpui in ateta amthlanuuia a oh nanga keiin nisata jikcha injomma ki oh umangme, chuta nannih in indahschou,
Anve, nannih nan innta nanmahpei. Che keiin kisonchou, ‘Akpu minga akthleng amahkha doiphah veisa ta nansonnohmiil keita keimuhnoh usachou!’ ”
Anve, Jisu maikuunga inthlinga kana mii khat am.
Mahchunna Jisu in ukil leh Pharisi ankuunga aruiei, “Sabat nia akna mathrat i tlohphume, chunoh a tlohphunohme?”
Chuta anmah in rimta amsei, cheva amahta matuh a alohche mathrat a amsehpei.
Che ankuunga asonei, “Tunangkhat nansa kupata nohle nansiilchal khatta sabat nia kuha a tlale, sabatni slakho kak hanga aklounohtu tu amchoume?”
Mahchuta anmah in masang cheknohsei.
Kouhna a akthlengei in injahna phomma inboknatu anchar rella amah in pandam khat malanna asonnei,
“Tunangkhat in changvaang buhdoonna a nangta nakkouh eile, injahna phomma inboknohro, tunang arom amah in nangchung ralla injahna veimii akouhchekho aja;
amah in nangkuunga thlenga nakson aja, ‘Mah injahna phom i mahmii ita mabokro,’ chunna athlangtla injahnanoh phomma nangin inlenna inbokha nikuunga injakna veitu.

Chunna nangta nakouh eile, athlangtla injahnanoh phomma inbokro, che nangta nakouh innpuin nakmuhlai nakson aja, ‘Ruullo, injahna phomma kalla inbokro;’ chuleva nangsoh nanbokpijou naamte anmaikuunga nangta nanjahna veitu.
