Alamva tunangkhat atak anroua amliinja mii khata inruruh amveitu, che tunangkhat atak anroua inruruh akveikhata amliintu.”
Nangin buhdoon cheleva, anran anring, ankeh ankut miipuhnoh ei, mitchoei mahche marnop eita kouh eiro,
chunna nangin doiphah veiuche, alamva anmah in nikuunga naksiin cheknoh tuei. Akchimlamseh ei in veikhat anringlaia Akpu in nang nilaiman nanksiintu.”
Chuta Jisu in akuunga ason, “Mii inkhat in ujouhoong veikhat atloh, chunna amah in miitam akouh ei;
mahlai achunna ujouhoong turella akouh mii in anthlengnatu amah roijuihta mathlah a am ongei, ‘Thlengvesa, anaamte athlouraang chekirsa.’
Chuta anmah naamtein ril inkhatnanga anthlengnoh natu son amithronpei. Matsahna in amahkuunga ason, ‘Keiin lou inkhat kiklei, mahchuta seh a antang; keiin kingenche kei iprosa.’
Mahchuche aktlei inkhat in asonla, ‘Keiin siilchal aklang ranga kiklei, che keiin anmahta thranoh thra anmaantang; keiin kingenche kei ipro.’
Mahchuche aktlei inkhat in asonla, ‘Keiin kumei khat changvaanga kilohpekmang, chunna thleng cheknohsang.’

Chunna roijuih in thlenga amah akpukuung atongpei. Mahlai achunna innpuin amlung inhaanga roijuihta asonei, ‘Khuboomvaa ram anrol anrolla mahche, lamsuh lamsuh a intha seh a inran inriing, marnop mitcho mahche ketlik mii eita onna thlenve.’
Mahchu roijuih in kitlohpei chuta ipekkho inboknava ammang
Mahche Akpu in roijuihta ason, ram anrol anrolla, lamsuh lamsuh a seh a keiinn asipnatu anmahta thlengnoh janohta sonna mathleng eive.
Alamva keiin nannihta kitihchou kouh akphah mii tunangkhat inkho kei ujou hoongna buh aktui matemnoh tuei.”
Mahchuche aknua mii khalmo tam in Jisu soh inruuia sehsei. Che Jisu in inheia ankuunga asonei,
“Tunangkhat in kei kiknuta juihtang tihle anu apa, akmei asa, auh anao, asar ajuur, oi, amah ataktal luungkho intirh hangnoh leva amah in kiroivei cheknohtu.
Amah thingkharhta phurhnoh a kiknu keijuihnoh amahkhan kiroivei cheknohtu.
Alamva nannih nankaar a tunangkhat in inn inkaang tlohtang madonle mahchuta machekhem acheknatu matsah a inbokmaanna akluutsam huutnoh maan ume?
Tunang in arom, amah in innmun amthronche mache acheknoh khanna ak anmii annaamte in
mahmii i inntlohva amthronpei chuta mache cheknohsa ta amahta manuih hou aja.
Chunohle tunangkhat kurung in aktlei kurung inkhatta raal intlohpitang madonle, amah raalmii akpulsom in amah jekna raalmii akpul sopnihta raal antlohpichek umeta matsah a inbokmaanna huutnoh ume?
Raal intlohpi cheknoh tupotle raal asuuknoh maa a trongtloh mii mathlah a injana thlenna leh oi amnatu atlohtu tla khame.
Alamchunna chunanga nannih nankaar a tunangkhat in amah in asihnaamte mathlahnoh miikhan kiroivei cheknohtu.”
Mahchu tuklei turelkho haar turelkho akanana amnohsa, mii in ilon uningsa. Tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso.”
Cheva Pharisi khatkho ringjih lulok eiin inso a ansonpei, “Mahmii in alehchel eita louja a anmahsoh buh ansaakjou khame.”
Chunna mah pandam ita ankuunga asonei:
“Nannih nankaar a mii inkhatva sadam reija asihnata inkhat amaang in, raprilla sopkulei ku ta mah a akmaang khata aktuuk nohmiil akjonnohtu mii tunang amchoume?
Che mahchuta aktuuk in aroomthok a adaar a athongpei.
Amah inna athlengin, amah aruul apaita che anthringpi eita onga asonei, ‘Keisoh roomthok jourei, alamva kei sadam akmaangkha kiktuukpei.’
Chunanga keiin nankuunga kisonchou, oinang jimma rilthlengnoh kananoh mii sopkulei kunata alehchel mii inkhat in ril athlengrella ringram a roomthokna veitu.”
“Chunohle kumei khat in harngou apumsom asih, mahsuunga apumkhat maangle, amah in meiser taar a mahchuta aktuuk nohmiil inn thra thir a jonnohrei ume?
Mahchuta aktuuk in, amah aruul apaiei mahche anthringpi eita onga asonei, ‘Keisoh roomthok jourei, alamva keiin kammaang haarngou apumkha kiktuukpei.’
Chunanga keiin nankuunga kisonchou, oinang jimma rilthlenga alehchel mii inkhatrella Ringpu vaa ringroi anmaikuunga roomthokna veitu.”
anmah ankaarna maksi in apakuunga ason, ‘Pa o, nangin nidoon nikhaal suunga keiin kichangtu khaan kamlanrosa.’ Cheva amah alalchu anmah innih kuungah asempei.
Nikhat ninih aknua, asa kupa maksi in achangkhaan naamte amtlonche, khalmo klah rapkheitla khuuboom khat ah sehsa, ohkhanna akanana amnoh a adoon naamte ahuuinapei.
Amah in adoon naamte amthangkir cheva, mah ramboom achunna khalmo lahna buhchaal suuksa, che amah in avaatna thlengsa.
Cheva ramboom achunna am mii khat kuunga aringnatu luut a amsa, innpuin amahta louva vokthlai akpe akseltu amthlahpei.
Mahcheva vokthlai ansaakna a amahkho avon amvah jahangsa; tukhat inkho akuunga saakphu malannohsei.
Chuta atak akroua arilla insonsa, ‘Keipa in mii chahchah tam thlou matloh a amah roijuih in inleisolh a saa iin anphah, chuta keiin onna traamkrel, dongkrella amsang!
Keiin inthoua pakuunga sehtang, che pakuunga kisontu, “Pa o, keiin ringram mahche nangta jekna veia alehthlouta kitlohpei;
Kei i nisakupa angta ong matik chanoh sang; nangin thlou namtloh niroi ei inkhatnanga keita keiloua keihuuina rosa.” ’
Cheva amah in inthoua apakuunga thlengsa. Chuta amah in intonga inlabeb a athlenglaia, apa in amuh a aringvol hangsa, cheva inthademma tlaanna amahta konna amchohpei.
Mahchunna Asa kupa in apakuunga ason, ‘Pa o, keiin ringram mahche nangta jekna veia alehthlou kitlohpei; Kei i nisakupa angta ong matik chanoh sang.’
Chuta amah apa in aroieita asonei, ‘Akthrarem puunrei intha thlenna, amahta masilhve; akut a kutsi maneihve, che akeh a kehkhraang machuungve;
mahche siilte annou thlenna thatve mahchu saa a roomthok jourei;
alamva amah kisakupa i thinata inlengsa; amah in maangcheta, inlenga kiktuukpei.’ Cheva anmah in roomthok amithronpei.
“Ipek asa kupa anpa in louva am; amah in inntonga thlenga inn anailai, amah in laa hoileh laamhou atheihpei.
Chunna roijuih ankaar nata inkhatta onga mahchu jarelna meta arui.
Chunna amah in ason, ‘Nang ninaokha thlengsa, chunna nipa in ninao kupata nanoh saanoh a ringa aphahrelna siilte annouta athatpei.’
Chunna amah in amlung inhaanga luut indahsa. Apa in inthruh a amahta amnem,

chuta apakuunga amsang, ‘Anro, vachah soot kumsuunga nangta rou kitlohche, keiin nitrongson kamjuihnoh jakhatkho amnoh; kiruul kipai eisoh roomthok jounatu nikhatnikho siiltekhat rounakho kamlannohche.
Chuta nisakupa in kochanoh miisoh inruuia nilal amthangche athlenglaiva, nangin amahturel siil annouta nithatpei!’
Mahchunna apa in akuunga ason, ‘Kisakupa o, nangva keisoh anirel amjoume, che keiin kisih anaamte i nangtaning.
Chunna inih in tlanna iroomthoktal tupotsa, alamva ninao iva thinata kiringsa, che maangnata iktuukpei.’ ”

Amah in aroi ankuung akho ason ei, “Thlousil thlou marella aksih kdoon mii khat am, thlousil thloumarel mii khanna nang nipoot nicheita apupu akanana amnoh veia ahuuinapei ta akdoon kuungkhanna anlonpei.
Chunna amahta onga ason, ‘Nangrella keiin kitheih i khame? Nangin thlousil thlou marella namluut akpul hisab kamlanro, alamva nangin veikhat inlenga thlousil thloumarel veicheknoh usache.’
Cheva thlousil thloumarel in arilsuunga ason, ‘Kei Akpu in thlousil thloumarel phomnata keilousale, keiva khavei usangme? Keiin tuklei kichohna tukho trangnohsang, che doh a kisaakna tukho injaksang.
Kei kiril kamngirhpei mah chuvah kei Akpu in thlousil thloumarel phomnata keiloule, mii inva keita anmah an inna keiloukho ajaei.’
Cheva amah akpu vaa lal antoleita khatkhat a onga, matsahna miita arui, ‘Nangin kei akpu alalta jikcha intoolchme?’
Amah in amsang, ‘Thao olna chaang reija.’ Amahkuunga ason, ‘Nangin hisab majih a nisihna nirikha louro, che intha inbok a sopnga majihro.’
Mahchuche aktlei khatta arui, ‘Nangin jikcha intoolcheme?’ Amah in amsang, ‘Kihu olna chaang reija.’ Amahkuunga son, ‘Nangin hisab majih a nisihna nirikha louro, che soprit majihro.’
Trongson majuihnoh thlousil thloumarel in ksinga thlou atlohrella amah akpu in ampaakpei; alamva akvaarvaa ansachunga tukleiramna ansa in anmah anmahtu ringnatluun turel tlohkhallah ralla singei.
Keiin kisonchou, chimnohlal turella nantak nantaktu ruul linve, mahkha acheni avah anmah in nannihta ache amnoh a amna amunna naniloonna turelna.”
Chuleva akchimnoh lal luungakho malotphu veinoh choule, khatloh a akchim lalla nannihta thlou nanimsil ume?
Aktlei miita ah malotphu veinoh chlouleva, khatloh a nang nita luungakho mii in thlou namsil tueime?

Roijuih tukhat inkho akpu innihvaa routloh cheknohtu, alamva inkhatta intirh a inkhatta aringvoltu, nohle inkhattingva aril maluut a inkhattingva maluutnohtu. Nannih in Ringpu mahche lalta routloh cheknoh uchou.”
Baobeh akditrang Pharisi ei in, mahchuta antheih lai, amahta antheihnohsei.
Chuta ankuunga asonei, “Nantak invah miimai kuunga akchim veisungta namimuhpei, chuta Ringpu in nanril arom; alamva miikaara inkaanga indom veikha Ringpu mit an avah intirhsana vei.
Chuta trongsuur nata tikta ansun inkhat ansoi chungva ringram leh thalei amaang in ralla laitu.
“Akdoon mii khat louam, amah in bukal amchu puunleh bulapuun silh a anirel roomthok tlanna saa iinna paal.
Che atak pumte paan akming Lajaras an ong inran kupakhat amah kolol a ansih,
Akdoon kupa vaa tebornata aktla aktli saakphukhan avon amvahjahang; mahchu chunga uii inkho thlenga amah apaannata amileiakho amiliik.
Anran miikha thisa, che ringroi in amahta Abraham aklaak a anphurhpei. Akdoon miikho thisa che anphuumpei;
cheva amah in thikhua aleluunga klah a amsa, amah in inlahnata intoua a an in, Abraham khatkho amah aklaak a am Lajaras ta amuhpei.

Chunna amah in onga, ‘Pa Abraham, keita niril kamvolroba, che Lajaras akutmajunga tuii phuumma kikdang chaar kamleita amchornatu amahta keininga mathlahroba; alamva keiin meiboom inna aleh a klah a kdoupei.’

Chuta Abraham in ason, ‘Nangin niringlaia niphahtuphu anaam niphahpei mahkha intheihro, che mahchunanga Lajaras inkho thranoh tlannoh jikcha aktuukpei; chuta pekva amah in onna diltlanna amsa, che nangva alehluunga klah a amsa che.
Mah naamte i chungakho, kannih leh nannih nankaar a tunangkhat inkho van ancheknoh natu asonna amnoh a adongna amnoh aku inrolkhat incheknoh a am.’
Amah in ason, ‘Chuleva pa o, amahta keipa inna namthlahnatu kamthruunche,
alamva kei unao ranga ammei, anmah inkho onna alehluunga lahna amun in anthlengnoh natu anmahta chaak a son eiso.’
Chuta Abraham in ason, ‘Anmah kuunga Moses mahche ringraan amsei; anmah antrongta rungai eiso.’
Che amah in asonla, ‘Nganoh nganoh, pa Abraham; chuta tunangkhat akthi kaarnata anmah ankuunga thlengeile, anmah anril anthlengtu.’
Amahkuunga ason, ‘Anmah inta Moses mahche ringraan antrongta rungainoh eile, akthi kaarnata ringa ankuunga thleng seilakho anmah in tikni akho anril thlengnoh tuei.’ ”
Amah in andihnao inkhatta aleh ah amthlaak angutva arukinga buhsukna lung inkhat mathoia tuiiboomma nanthlak in amah turelva ralla akthratna veitu.
Nantak nanroua cheksilve; nan uh nannao in alehthlou tlohle, amahta chaakve, che amah inta aril thlengle, amahta ipve;
Che amah in nikhatnia nikuunga veisrih alehthlou tlohle, mahchunna nikuunga veisrih inlenga kei kiril kithlengpeita naksonle amahta ipve.”
Akpu in asonei, “Nannih in intrammutal malotchoule, nannih in mah thotthing ita ‘Nang nikjung inlongbulh a tuiiboomma moongrota’ nanson in nantrong amjuihtu.
“Nannih nankaar a tunangkhat in amah roijuih in loukhoi seh nohle sadamkem asehnata athlengin ‘Intha thlenga buh nisaaknatu mah tebor kuung in inbokro’ ta nanson peime?
Mahchu ngut a nangin amahta ‘Buh kisaaknatu thlouraang tlohrosa, nitak intlen inseemma keiin buhsa kichenohmiil rou keitlohro; keiin kisaakche aknua nangin nisaak ni iin umangta’ sonnohrei choume?
Innpuin jathang malanna roijuih in rou atloh kharelna amahta ampaakrei peime?
Nannih inkho chunanga tlohve, nankuunga anson naamte nannih in nantlohlai sonve, ‘Kannihva matik chanoh roijuih ung; kannih in kantlohtupot kanthloukha kantloh uning.’ ”
Che amah in khuu inkhat a aluut in, reichi kop kupa som in inlabep a ngirra amahsoh intuuksei
cheva anmah in anhou inkaanga onga anson, “Akpu Jisu, kannihta kanirilvolro.”
Anmahta amuh in asonei, “Nannih in seh choulaia nantakta thiimpu ankuunga mamuh eive.” Anmah in ansehsuunga antakchu seengsei.
Cheva anmah ankaarna inkhat in anatna thra sang ta aromin, inlenga, ahoutranga onga Ringpu ta ampaak;
che Jisu akehkungah akhup a antolhche, amahta ampaak. Amah atakva Samaria na mii.
Mahchunna Jisu in ason, “Mii somta kamseengnoh choume? Kuvah ramche seime?
Mah rapkheina mii inoh a Ringpu ta inlenga mapaaknatu tukhatkho amnohseime?”
Che amahkuunga ason, “Inthoua nilamting sehrosa; nangin namlot kharella nangta namthratpei.”
chunohle anmah in ansontu, ‘Anve, onna amsa!’ nohle ‘Mah khanna amsa!’ alamva anve, Ringpu kurung huunna i nannih nankaar a amsa.”
Che anmah in nankuunga nanisontu, ‘Mah khanna anve!’ nohle ‘Onna anve!’ Sehkho sehnohve, aknukho juihnohve.
Alamva marvaanna inkhattonga khu anthla in aktlei inkhattonga kvaar nanga miivaa Asa kupa aknikha ochunanga veitu.
Chuta amah in matsah a klah knang khalmo aphahtu tla che mah ringnatluun in amahta indahtuei.
Noah laia suuk khananga, miiva Asa kupa aknikho mahchunanga veitu.
Noah in mulipii asuunga luutnatu aknichu aphahnohmiil, anmah in saa iinna, changvaanga mahche anmahta chang mavaanga inpea ammei, mahcheva tuiiliin thlenga annaamteta ammaangkhemei.
Chunanga Lot laia suuk khananga, anmah in saa iinna, lei a juura, che inn lou tloh a ammei,
chuta Lot in Sodom nata anthruh aknia marvaannata mei leh meirui inkah a anmah naamteta ammaangei–
chunna miiva Asa kupata amdangni achunna mahchunanga veitu.
Mahni achunna tunangkhat innchunga am in innsuunga am pootta alohnatu trumnoh eiso, che louva ak am amah inkho mahchunanga inna inlengnoh eiso.
Lot akmeita intheihve.
Tunangkhat in amah achaanta ankalnatu jonle mahchu maangtu, chuta tunangkhat in amah achaanta maangle mahchu amringtu.
Keiin nankuunga kisonpeichou, mahni khulouh a kukthol inkhat a mii innih amtuei; inkhatta aphurhtu che aktlei inkhatva amahtu.
Kumei innih in buh sukjoua amtuei; inkhatta aphurhtu che aktlei inkhatva amahtu.”
“Mii innih in loupuk ah amtuei; miikhatva alohtu aktlei khatva amahtu”
Anmah in akuunga anson, “Ram ame, Akpu?” Amah in asonei, “Akthi ruung amna amunkhanna barmupii in inlomtuei.”
“Khuuboom inkhat a Ringpu ta trihnohluung mahche miita injahnohluung pichaartloh mii khat am;
che mah khuuboom chunna trulmeinu inkhatkho am, amah in pichaartloh akuunga injomma thlenga ason, ‘Keita jekna mii i achunga akchim pichaar tlohro.’
Mahchu kakva amah in indahmang; chuta aknua arilsuunga akroua insonsa, ‘Keiin Ringpu ta trihnoh sanglakho mahche miita injahnoh sanglakho,
trulmeinu in keita keichut keichut a amtaningva, keiin amahturel akchim pichaar tlohtasang, chunohleva inleng inlenga keita keivot usang.’ ”
Akpu in ason, “Akchimlamseh noh pichaar aktlohmii in jangta asonme rungaive.
Chunna amahkuunga juktiing khulouh trap a ason, Ringpu in amah turella acharche mii turelva pichaar tlohnoh ume? Anmah in trap a ansonta rungainoh a amthil ume?
Keiin nannihta kitihchou, anmah turel inthademma amah in pichaar atlohtuei. Chulata, miivaa Asa kupa in athlenglai, amah in thaleichunga malot mii aktuuk ume?”
Antak anrouta akchimlamseh ungta malot aksih mahche aktleita usitnoh a madon ankuunga amah in pandam ita asonei.
“Mii innih in anngennatu mathruunna thlaamma hangei, inkhatva Pharisi che aktlei khatva roithrai mii.
Pharisi in ngirra anroua nga tloh a angen, ‘Ringpu, kampaakche keiva mii aktlei nangnoh ang, mii masimna, karaam, chimnoh aktloh, miimei miisa laal aktloh miinoh ang nohle roithrai anmah nangnoh ang.
Keiva kouh inkhat suunga buh veinih kihel, keiin kphahpot somsuunga inkhat kamlan.’
Chuta roithrai miikhan klahbeb a ngirra, ringramtinga amit meenga han anluung cheknoh, chuta alukhe beenga, angen, ‘Ringpu, alehchel keita niril kamvolro!’

Keiin nannihta kitihchou, mah chuvah mahmii in aktleichungle atakta machimma inna inlengsa; alamva tunangkhat in anroua atakta amliinjale inruruh kamveitu, chuta tunangkhat in anroua atakta inruruh veile amahta kamliintu.”
Chuta Jisu in anmahta akuunga onga, asonei, “Andih naoei in keikuunga thlengeiso, anmahta khaamnohve; alamva Ringpu kurung huunnavah andihnao nangjim antasa.
Atak a nannihta kisonchou, andihnao inkhatnanga Ringpu kurung huunnata aklounoh amah khanna tiknikho luutnohtu.”
Mahchunna Jisu in akuunga ason, “Jarelna keita akthrata nak ong angme? Ringpu noh a tukhatkho akthra amno.
Nangin trongthuun nirompei: ‘Miimei miimasal laalnohve, mii thatnohve, inrunohve, chimnoh a sakhi malannohve, nannu nanpata injahve.’ ”
Che amah in ason, “Anaamte ivah nao kiveilainata majuih a thlengsang.”
Mahchuta Jisu in atheih in, amahkuunga ason, “Nangin nitlohtu inkhat vaatmang. Nangin nidoon naamte juura inranriingta malaneiro, mahche ringramma nang nilal amtu; che thlenga kiknu keijuihro.”
Chuta mahchuta atheih in aril lahsa, alamva amahvah khalmo kdoon mii.
Jisu in amahta anna ason, “Akdoon mii in ringram huunna a anluut tupot i khalmo luua suuk!
Alamva akdoon mii in ringram kurung huunna aluutchungva uuksa inkhat in kukthrimpoa phaova anthruh in ralla aklai.”
Mahchuta aktheih ei in anson, “Chuleva tunang in inkal aphahchek ume?”
Chuta amah in ason, “Miikuungva veinohtupot thloukha Ringpu kuungva veitu seengning.”
Pitar in ason, “Anro, kannih in kan inn kanlou mathlah a niknu kanjuih peiche.”
“Atatak a keiin kisonchou, tunangkhat in ringram huunna rella a inn nohle akmei nohle auh anao nohle anu apa nohle asaeita mathlah a,
ipek lai in khalmo ralla mahche akthlengsam chup a ache amnoh ringna akphahnohtu tukhatkho amnoh.”
Alamva amahta Jental jaat ankuunga amilantu, mahche aminuihtu khatkho injakna veia aminangche atakchunga amichiltu,
amahta sunga amirattu, anthattu, che nithum tihpia amah in veikhat ringtu.”
Mahtrong chuta anmah in rom cheknohsei; mahchu ankuungnata mathup a asih, anmah in lou theihnohsei.
miitam in ansehhou chuta atheih in, mahchu jangthlou meta aruiei.
Anmah in akuunga antih, “Najareth na Jisu in lamma seh.”
Chunna amah in ongsa, “Devit vaa Asa kupa Jisu, keita niril kamvolro.”
Amah amaa a akseh in rim amrota ansaal; chuta “Devitva Asa kupa, keita niril kamvolro!” ta amah in ral ralla ongsa.
Cheva Jisu in ngirra miichuta amahkuunga anthlennatu jathang amlanei, akuunga annai in, amahta arui,
“Nang turella jangnamtlohja angme?” Amah in ason, “Akpu, kei kimit i kimuhjahang.”
Chunna Jisu in akuunga ason, “Nimitchu muhrosa; nangin namlot kharella nangta namthratpei.”
Cheva kak hang amitchu muh achekpei mahche amah aknuta juih a Ringpu ta paar amthratpei; mii naamtein mahkhata anmuh in, Ringpu ta amipaakpei.
Mahchunna akming Jakhaias an ong kupakhat am; amahva akthloi roithrai mii, che kdoon mii.
Che amah in Jisu tumeta a annatu insuul, chuta mii tammal khanna muh cheknohsa, alamva amahvah arep innim.
Chuna amah in Jisu ta amuhnatu tatthei achunga kalsa; alamva mahlam tonga Jisu in thlengsam.
Che Jisu in mahtonga athlenglai, amahta intoua anche ason, “Jakhias, intha a trumro; alamva mi invah nang inna tlungtu tlasang.”
Chunna amah in intha trumma Jisu ta roomthok a aloulohpei.
Cheva mahchuta anmuh in annaam insoa trongsei, “Amah in alehchel inna rapkheikhat veia atlungnatu luutsa.”
Chunna Jakhias in inthoua Akpu kuunga ason, “Anro, Akpu, keiin kdoon tangkhaiva anrankuunga kamlanei, che keiin tunangkhat antata chimnoh a louangle saruk manli kamlengei.”
Mahchunna Jisu in akuunga ason, “Mi in mah innsung inna chaanring thlengsa, amakho Abraham vaa asa kupasa.
Alamva miiva Asa kupa in akmaang khata jonnatu mahche kalnatu thlengsa.”
Alamchunna amah in ason, “Phom inkaanga akpuui inkhat in kurungram aphahnatu khalmo ramlah ramboom inkhat a asehche, inlengsa.
Amah roijuih somta aongche, ankuunga mina som malanna asonei, ‘Keiin kithleng nohmiil mah mina in malat a thrulhnave.’
Amah aramna mii in amahta intirh eia amah aknua trongphurhmii mathlah a anson, ‘Mahmii in kanchunga akpu veia paal dinoh ung.’
Amah in kurungramta aphahche inna anlengin, anmah in malat a anthrulnakha jikcha amichuung peime anromnatu, inbaobeh amlanna mii eita amahkuunga anthlengnatu am ongpei.
Matsahna in amaikuunga ason, ‘Akpu, nang mina inkhat khanna mina som kamchuungpei’
chunna amah in akuunga ason, ‘Thra nitlohpei, akthra roijuih! Nangin thlou indihte a malot aja niveirella, khuuboom somchunga akchek amneh veirosa.’
Innih tihpi in thlenga ason, ‘Akpu, nang mina khanna mina ranga kamchuungpei.’
Che amah in akuunga ason, ‘Nangin khuuboom ranga chunga akchek amneh veirosa.’
Che aktleikhan thlenga ason, ‘Akpu, nang minakha maisa, keipuun apaara khit a kisih;
alamva nangva karaang mii che, churella nangta niktrih ang; nangin nisihnoh pootta niloh, che nangin nivorhnoh pootta niluh.’
Amah in akuunga ason, ‘Nang nibaoa anthrutal khanna keiin kamlaal uche, thranoh roijuih! Keiin kisihnoh khata kiloh mahche keiin kivorhnoh khata kiluh ta nangin nirompei?
Chuleva jarella kei baobehkha baobeh sihna thlaamma sinoh cheme, keiin kithlenglai mahkha akchuungsoh inruuia kamtlon uta.’
Chunna akomma akngir eita asonei, ‘Amahkuunga mina somkha loua mina som ak amkuunga malanve.’
(Chuta amahkuunga anson, ‘Akpu, amahta mina som amchesa!’)
‘Alamva keiin nankuunga kitihchou, mah chuvah ak am mii kuungah ralla kamlantu, chuta ak amnoh mii kuungnata amah in ste asihkhakho kilohtu.
Keiin anmah anchunga akpu veia kipaallaia keijekna eita onna keithlenve che anmahta kei maikuunga that eive.’ ”
Amah in Chorophol Muulsoh innaia am Bethphake mahche Bethani annai in, aroi ankaarna innihta sonna amthlah ei.
“Nanmaa a am khuusonna sehve, che nannih in mahchunna naluutlai tukhat inkho achuungnanoh samong ate inkhat inkhit a am nantuuktu, mahkha majak a onna thlenve.
Che anmah in mai jarelna namijakmeta nanirui eile, nga tloh a sonve, ‘Akpu in maita darkaar am.’ ”
Chunna amah in amthlah mii in seh a Jisu in ankuunga asonnanga antuukpei.
Che anmah in samong ateta amijaklai, samong akpu in ankuunga asonei, “Jarelna nannih in samong ateta namijakme?”
Chunna anmah in anson, “Akpu in maita darkaar am.”
Che mahchuta Jisu kuunga anthlenpei, samong atechunga anmah anpuun thah a Jisu ta amichuungpei.
Amah in chuunga aseh in, anmah anpuunrei lamma anlouthah.
Pekva amah in akchek amneh a atlohthlouta anmuh in rool inkaanga onga Ringpu ta mapaak amithronpei,
“Akpu minga akthleng kurungkha doiphah veisa! Ringramma leh oi khatkho anaamtetu ralla ankaanga mapaak!”
Che miitam ankaar a Pharisi arouin amahta anson, “Lulok, niroita saaleiro.”
Anmahta amsangei, “Keiin nankuunga kitihchou, anmah inta rim amseile, lungin ongusei.”
“Nangin mi in nangtal in leh oi niveirel thloukha romcheleva! Chuta ipekva nimit annata mahchu inthup a ammang.
Alamva nichunga oinang aknichu thlengtu, mah chuvah nang jekna mii in nangta kooi a paaltuei, che nangta inhiilla aram ramna mii naamte in nangta nankhaartu,
Cheva nangleh nang nisa naamteta tukleia antuul usa. Che nangva asuunga lung inkhat in inkhatva achunga anmah in sinoh usei; alamva nangta nak an kithlenglai romnohche.”
asonei, “Mah i injihsa, keiinvah ngenna inn veitu, chuta nannih in mahchu inru inraanva akon namiveipei.”
chuta anmah in antlohja hangkha antlohnatu tuuknoh ei, alamva mii naamtein amah atrongkhanna inbeisei.
amahta anson, “Kannih kankuunga kanisonro, nangin jaknang nichek namneh amma mah thlouei i nitlohme? Nohle mah akchek amneh thloui tunang in nangkuunga amlanme?”
Amah in ankuunga amsangei, “Keikho nankuunga trongkhat naniruitang: pek keisonve,
John in alupkha ringram tingname chunohle mii tingname?”
Che anmahseeng seeng intella insonsei, “Inih in ‘Ringram tingna,’ ta sonmele, ‘Chuleva jarella amahta malotnoh choume?’ initihtu.
Chela inih in ‘Mii tingna’ ta sonmele, mii naamtein inihta lung inidentu; alamva anmah in John ta ringraan inkhatta anloh.”
Chunna anmah in mah i ramname romnoh ungta amisangpei.
Mahchunna Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Mah akchek amneh thlouei i jarelna kitlohme keiin nankuunga nanison nohtung.”
Che nganglirah luhnatu laikha athlengin, nganglirah ste anloupeknatu lampaar aksaa ankuunga amah roijuih inkhatta amthlah; chuta lampaar aksaa thloutloh in amahta khonna aruuk a amilengpei.
Chela amah in aktlei roijuih inkhatta veikhat amthlahla, amahlakho loukhonna khalmo usitnoh a aruuk a amilenglapei.
Chelakho amah in inthumtihpi veia amah roijuih khat amthlahla; mahmii chuta khonraanna apaaltinga anlonpei.
Cheva nganglibil akpu in ason, ‘Keiin mah i kha kitloh usa? Keiin kirilvol kisa kupata mathlahtang, amahta anmah in injah tuei.’
Chuta nganglibil lampaar Aksaa thloutloh ei in amahta anmuh in, khatleh khat intella insonsei, ‘Mahmii i pipasa; amahta thatrei, chuche amah in aphah tuphukha inihta imveinatu.’
Cheva amahta nganglibil apaalla that a anlonpei. Chuleva nganglibil akpu in anmahta kha atloh tueime?
Amah in thlenga nganglibil lampaarsa thloutloh eita ammaang tuei, che ngangli bilta aktlei mii kuungah amlantu.” Mahchuta antheih in antihpei, “Ringpu in janohtu!”
Chuta anmahta anna asonei, “Chuleva mah injih i jarelname: ‘Inntloh mii in andahtal lungta innkiingtu amuvei hukvei nohme?’
Tungangkhat in mah lungchung khanna anloom miirelta akir kir a koituei; chuta mah in tunangkhat achunga inloomle amahta amvuitui.”
Chunna anmah in amahta anruungpei, che ril akseeng veisin, inruk a aksuimii eita amithlahpei, mah chuvah amahta ruunga atronga suura pichaar aktloh akhal mahche rampuui ankuunga thlenna amilannatu.
Amahta anrui, “Lulok, kannih in kanrom, mah chuvah nangin chimma trongche mahche chimma namtheih ung, nangva keimii miimii annohche, chuta Ringpu alamta chimm namtheih.
Kannih in Keisaar kuunga roithaangi trongsuur in ajame chunoh a janohme?”
Chuta amah atronga anromnatu antrong khanna amah in arompeia, ankuunga asonei,
“Baobe apumkhat kammuhve. Mah achunga injih i tume?” Anmah in anson, “Keisaar.”
Amah in ankuunga asonnei, “Chuleva, Keisaar ta veile Keisaar kuunga malanve, mahche Ringpu ta veile Ringpu kuunga malanve.”
Amah in asontrong khanna miimai kuunga amahta suur cheknohsei; chuta amah in amsangtrong khanna salungkhou seia rimta amsei.
“Lulok, Moses in kannih turella amjihvah miikhatva auh anao inkhat in kumei alohche asa amnoh a thileva, amah auh anao turella adhara amnatu auh anaokhan akmei veia alohtutla.
Pek auh anao sirih ammei; anparem in kumei alohche asa amnoh a thisa;
innih tihpi inkho che inthumtihpi inkho anmei veia anlohpei,
mah chunanga sirih tihpi phah amahta anlohche ansa amnoh a thisei.
Aknuremma kumeikho thisa.
Alamchunna veikhat kiring athlenglaiva kumeikha anmah ankaar a tunang akmei vei ume? Alamva anmah sirih in amahta anlohpei.”
Chunna Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Mah chupna asa ei in changvaangei che chang mavaanga inpe ei;
chuta kthinata veikhat kiringkha phahnatu matikcha ta antenche anmahva changvaangnoh tuei chekho chang mavaanga inpenoh tuei,
alamva anmahva veikhat inlenga thinoh usei, jarelna tihva anmahva ringroisoh intrim usei che veikhat akring khavaa asa vei taningeiva anmahva Ringpu asa veiusei.
Mah chuvah Moses inkho Akpu ta Abraham, Aisaak leh Jakop vaa Ringpu ta aonglai akthi mii kiringsei, mah i inchaam kaarna thaminna ataktal in seenga amdangpei.
Pek amahvah akthiva Ringpu noh, chuta akringva Ringpu; alamva mii naamte amahkuunga ringsei.”
Ringjih lulok ste in amisang, “Lulok, nangin thratea nisonpei.”
Alamva anmah in veikhat inlenga karaanga akuunga trong jakhatkho ruinohsei.
Alamva Devit ataktal in Leila nirik a ason, ‘Akpu in kei Akpu kuunga ason,
nang jeknaeita nikehchuunna kamveinohmiil, kei kikchanga inbokro.’
Nga tloh a Devit in amahta Akpu a ong; chuleva khatloh a amah in asa vei ume?”

“Ansuul puunrei silh a inloi akdi mahche keithiil keithiilla mii in kamthruun eisota akdi chuche sinakok a akthrarem inbokna a inbok khatkho buhdoonna a mii in jnjahna vei ringjih lulok eikhata cheksilve,
anmah in trulmeinu an innta amiruk mahche khalmo soot a akngen veisinnei. Anmah in ralla anrol maraal aphahtu.”
che inran trulmeinu inkhat in kuri apum innih akatta amuh.
Amah in ason, “Keiin atak a kitihchou, amah inran trulmeinu in anmah annaamte chunga tam akatpei;
alamva anmahva huuitanga maleia ansihnata loua ankat, chuta inran kumei inva amah in aringnatu asih apumteta akatpei.”
mahchunna Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Laikha thlengumang mah chuvah nannih in nanmuh poot ei i amah amun inna lung inkhat in inkhatchunga indolhnoh a inmahnoh a, apumte inpilkir umang.”
Chunna amah in asonei, “Nannihta chimnoh a inhea naniseh pinanohtu cheksilve; alamva keiminga mii khalmo thlenga ‘Kei i amahsang!’ che ‘Lai innaisa!’ ta nanisontu. Mahlaia anmahta juihnohve.
Nannih in raalhou mahche raal amsuuk ahou nantheihlai, intrinohve; alamva mah i matsah a suuktutla, chuta achenava kak hanga thlengnohtu.”
Mahchuche ankuunga asonei, “Jaatboom inkhat in jaatboom inkhatchunga che kurung huunna inkhat in kurung huunna inkhatchunga raal suuktuei;
aktrang runaangnu jikcha thoutu, ram aje ajea buhchaal che thitrang natna satna rii jikcha suuktu; khatkho trihkhopna vei mahche akliin daang jikcha ringramnata nanmuhtu.
Chuta mah naamte i asuuknoh maa a nannihta suura nanichuttu, mahche sinakok a nanimlantu che simma nanithuntu, chuche kei kikming rella kurung khatkho rampuui ankuunga naniphurh tuei.
Mahlaichun nannih ringtukna thaminta nansonnatu laikha thlengsa.
Alamchunna mahlai khatloh a namisang umeta nanlah nanohtu matsah a nanril mangirhve;
alamva nannih jeknaei in nantrongta vat nohle indah ancheknoh natu nar khatkho lousing kamlan uchou.
Nannu nanpa in, nan ute ei in, nan uhte nannaoei in, che nanruul nanpailuung inkho nanilontuei, che mii arouva nanithattu;
kei kikming relna mii naamtein nannihta nantirh tuei.
Chuta nankangna sam akmol inkhatkho maangnohtu.
Nannih in nandoutrang khanna nanchaan inkal nanphahtu.”
Mahlai Judia a ak am in muul muulla tlaaneiso, khuuboom suunga ak am in ohkhannata inthruh eiso, che ramboom apaalla ak am in innsuunga luutnoh eiso;
alamva anjih anaamteta atlungnatu athunglohna aknikha maisa.
Mahni achunna naoson akroi anmah kuunga aleh a lahnasa a! Alamva thaleichunga khalmo klah knang suuktu mahche inhaanga asaokha mii anchunga tla usa;
anmahta chemsei aha in athattuei, che arouin jaatboom naamte ankaar a phurh a pajatla a ansihtuei; Jental ei laikha atlungnohmiil, Jerusalem ta Jental in anchilhtu.”
tukleiram a aksuukthlou khanna amidon in klahmalla mii in intrituei; alamva marvaanvaa atuui inloktu,
mahchuche miivaa Asa kupa in tuuileh paarthrasoh inruuia sumphaia thleng anmah in anmuhtu.
Pek mah ei ita suuk amthronlai, intouva anve, alamva nannihta nanithloknatu innnaisa.”
Anmah in anbur suun amthronsoh, thralpiini naisa ta nantak in muh a nanrom.
Mahchunanga mah naamte i suuk nanmuhlai, Ringpu kurung huunna naisa ta nanrom.
Atak a keiin kisonchou, mah naamte i asuuknoh miilva, mah ringnatluun i maangnohtu.
Marvaan mahche thaleiva maanga cheumang, chuta kei kitrongeiva tiknikho maangnoh luungtuei.”
alamva mahchu thaleichung apumtea a am miinaamchunga thlengtu.
Chuta anaamte nata inlit nancheknatu che miiva Asa kupa maikunga ngir nancheknatu lai amrel jihtranga ngenve.”
Juktiingrel inranga mathruunna thlaamma amah atrongta anrungeihnatu miinaam in thlengei.
Akthloi thiimpu leh ringjih lulok eiin Jisu ta khatloh a ithat umeta amijon; alamva anmah in miita antrihrelna.
Cheva somlei innih ankaarna inkhat Iskariot akuunga Seitan in luutsa;
chunna amah in akthloi thiimpu khatkho phrangki ankuunga seh a Jisu ta anmah kuunga khatloh a kamlan umeta antelpiei.
Ohchunna anmah in anroomthoksa, cheva amahkuunga baobeh amilannatu injasei.
Nga tloh a amah in ajapei, miitam amnohlai Jisu ta ankuunga amlannatu taancha ajonpei.
Chunna Jisu in Pitar leh John ta sonna amthlah ei, “Nannih in seh choulaia laalna buhdoon saaknatu inihturel thlouraang tlohve.”
Amahkuunga anson, “Mahchu ramma thlouraang namtlohja ungme?”
Chunna amah in ankuunga asonei, “Anve, nannih in khuuboomma nanluutlai, mii khat in tuiipul tonga seh nantuukpitu; amah in aluutna innkhanna juih a luutve,
che innputa sonve, ‘Lulok in nangta nakson, “Miitlungna khumkha khosame, kei kiroisoh laalna buhdoon ramma kansaak ume?” ’
Mahchunna thra thlouraang atlohche achungnung khum anrol inkhat amah in nanimmuhtu; mahchunna thlouraang tlohve.”
Che anmah in seh a, Jisu in ankuunga asonkhata antuukpei; mahche ohkhanna anmah in laalna buhdoonta thlouraang antlohpei.
Amah in ankuunga asonei, “keiin klah kphahnoh amaa a mah laalna buhdoon i nannihsoh khalmo kisaakja hangsa;
alamva keiin nankuunga kitihchou Ringpu vaa kurung huunna a mah i amthlung nohmiil keiva mah i saanoh usang.”
Che Jisu in kamta loua Ringpu ampaakche ason, “Mah i loua nankaar a insemve;
alamva keiin nankuunga kitihchou, Ringpu kurung huunna athlengnohmiil keiva ngangli atuii innoh usang.”
Che amah in tolta loua, Ringpu ampaakche mahchuta anmah kuunga malanna asonei, “Mah i nannih turel kamlan kei kiruungsa. Nannih in keita nantheihnatu mah i tlohve.”
Mahchunanga saa ancheche kamta loua ason, “Mah kammi nannih turel tla kei kithii a akthar trongirhnasa.”
Chuta anve keita kamlansam miiva akut tebor a keisoh asihjou.
Alamva Ringpu in amdon nujuih a miivaa Asa kupa in sehsa; chuta amahta amlan miikhava aleh a lahnasa a!
Anmah ankaar a tunang in mah i atloh umeta anmahsengta inrui amithronpei.
Chunna anmahta asonei, “Jental kurung in miichunga ankil maphonga akpu veia paallei; che miichunga akchek amneh in kannihva miinaamtetu anpaiungta amidang.
Chuta nannih nankaar avah mahchu suuknohso; inkhattinga nannih nankaar a akliinrem amah in aksiinrem veiso, che lulok in routloh veiso.
Tebor a anbokkha tunang in akliinme, nohle rou aktloh khareme? Tebor a anbok khanohme? Chuta keiva nankaar a routloh mii inkhat hukveisang.
Pa in kurung huunna inkhat keikuunga amsilnanga, mahchunanga nankuung akho kamsil uchou,
nannih in kei kurung huunna a kei tebor a nansaak nan iintu mahche phompii ah inbok a Israel jatih somlei innihta pichaar nantlohtu.”
“Simon, Simon, anro, seitan in nangta kehu nanga nakloknatu anihpei,
chuta nangin namlotta amaangnohnatu nangturel kingenpei, che nangin keikuunga veikhat nanlenglai, niuhnaota anril matrangeiro.”
Chunna Pitar in amahta ason, “Akpu, keiva nangsoh sim akho kisehjounatu mahche nangsoh thikho kithihjounatu thlouraang chesang.”
“Pitar keiin nikuunga kisonche, nangin keita nakromnoh angta veithum nandahnohmiil mi in aarkhong in inkhuungnohtu.”
Jisu in anmahta asonei, “Chuta pekva, skhao ak am amah in phurhso, mahchunanga thongkho phurhso; tukhat in chemsei amnohle anluut juura chemsei leiso.
Alamva keiin nankuunga kitihchou, mah chuvah mah ringjih i keininga amthlungtu tla, ‘Amahta alehchel eisoh inteensa; alamva keirella injihkha tlungsa.’
Chunna anmah in anson, ‘Akpu, anro, onna chemsei innih am.’ Mahchunna ankuunga asonni, ‘Mah i chanasa.’ ”
Jisu in amunchunna athlengin ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in madoia nantlaknoh natu ngenve.”
Lung veikhat iloon in asehchaanga aklah khanna amah in ankuungnata insenga akhuk makamma angen,
“Pa o, nangin nimdon veileva, mah kam i kikuung nata lourosa; chulata keiin kamdon veinoh a nangin namdonchu veiso.”
Cheva ringramna ringroi inkhat in amahkuunga indangsa, amahta amtrangpei.
Che Jisu in aril lahmalla ralla tranga angen. Che amah akthlankha thiitlang nanga tukleia tla.
Amah in angennata inthoua, aroi ankuunga athlengin anmahva klahmal seia inna louam antuukei,
chunna ankuunga asonei, “Jarelna inchoume? Madoia nantlaknoh natu inthloua ngenve.”
chuta Jisu in amahta ason, “Judas nangin miivaa Asa kupata machoh a nijurhpeime?”
Jisu soh inruui aroi in aksuuksam khata anmuh in ason, “Akpu, kannih in chemseiah kantuk useime?”
Cheva ankaarna inkhat in akthloi thiimpu vaa naichi amkuur akchangtonga apheklokpei.
Chuta Jisu in ason, “Mah i ajapei.” Cheva amah amkuurta palla amthratpei.
Cheva amahta aksuur akthleng akthloi thiimpuei mahche mathruunna thlaamvaa phrangkiei khatkho anparuul eita alousonei, “Inruraanta aksuursam nanga chemsei leh suungsoh inruuia thleng sachoume?
Keiin anirel nannihsoh mathruunna thlaamma kiamlaia keisuurnoh choua. Chuta anthim tuui in apaallai, nannih in thlou nantlohnatu mah i nannih nanpungsa.”
Che anmah in innpaal alaia mei luh a anboklaia Pitar kho ankaar a inboksa.
Cheva amah in meilenga anboklai, roijuih rungaak inkhat in amahta amuh a tlingta anche ason, “Mah kupa ikho amahsoh inruuijou mii.”
Chuta amah in indah a ason, “Kumeio, amahta romnoh ang.”
Kak amche mii aktleikhat in amahta amuh a ason, “Nangkho anmah ankaarnache.” Chuta Pitar in amsang, “Kupa o, keinoh ang.”
Mahche pung inkhatvak aknua aktlei mii inkhat inla ason, “Taktak a mah kupa ikho amahsoh inruuijou miisa. Alamva amahva Kalili na mii.”
Chuta Pitar in ason, “Kupa o, nangin nisonkha kei romnoh ang.” Che kak hanga atrong suunga aarkhongin inkhuungsa.
Mahchunna Akpu in inheia Pitar ta a anpei. Che mi inva arkhongin ankhuungnoh maa a nangin keita veithumkhek kandah ucheta akuunga Akpu in ason trongkha Pitar in intheihsa.
Chunna amah in apaaltongta inthruh a aril sok a trapsa.
Che anmah in Jisu ta amit makaanga anrui, “Nangta tunang in nakkhonme? Kaniphoongro.”
Che anmah aktam in thranoh trong achunga trongsei.
“Nangi Khrista cheleva kanisonro.” Chuta Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Keiin nankuunga nanison sanglakho nannih in malotnoh luung uchou.
Mahche keiin nannihta nanirui sanglakho kamsangnoh uchou.
Chuta peknata mathronna miivaa Asa kupa in Ringpu tuui akchanga inboktu.”
Mahchunna anmah naamtein anson, “Chunohleva nangva Ringpu vaa asa kupa cheme?” Che Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Keisangta nannih in nansonpei.”
Mahche anmah in anson, “Inih in sakhi veikhat ijonnatu darkaar ammangme? Alamva inih itak in anarnata trong itheihpei.”
Amahta maraal mathlaak mathronna anson, “Mahmii in inih jaatboomta amahnoh lamma inhea amseh, che Keisaar tinga roithaang malan athing, chela ataksaak in keiva Khrista kurung angta ason.”
Mahchunna Pilat in amahta arui, “Nangi Judi ei kurung cheme?” Chunna Jisu in amahkuunga amsang, “Nangin nisonre peio.”
Che Pilat in akthloi thiimpu leh miitam ankuunga asonei, “Mahmii i keiin amraal jakhatkho tuuknoh ang khame.”
Chuta anmah in tranga tak a anson, “Amah in miita akrok, Kalili nata maiphah a che Judia apumte luunga miita matheih a hou amsuuk.”
Pilat in mahchuta atheih in, mahmii i Kalili na mii meta aruiei.
Chunna Jisu vah Herot in apaalna athlanga am miita Pilat in arom inva, mahlaia Herot atakkho Jerusalem a amtaningva, Jisu ta amahkuunga amthlahpei.
Herot in Jisu ta amuhlai khalmo aroomthoksa, alamva amah in Jisu ta amuhjana khalmo sootsa, jarelna tihva amah athlou rella atheihpei, che Jisu in salungkhouna daang atlohta amuhja a am.
Nga tloh a Jisu ta trong khalmo arui; chuta amah in masangnohsa.
Akthloi thiimpu mahche ringjih lulok eiin amahta khalmo malaal a lonna ngirei.
Che Herot in amah raalmiisoh Jisu ta mananga aminuihpei; mahchuche amahta annaal puunreia maliinga, Pilat kuunga amilengpei.
Mahlaital achunna Herot leh Pilat vah inkhatveia ruul veisei, alamva matsah avah khatleh khat jekna veia ammei.
Cheva Pilat in akthloi thiimpuei, thloupuuiei, mahche mii eita ongjoua,

anmahta asonei, “Miita amahnoh lamma akchingmii nantihche keikuunga nanthlenpei; keiin amahta nanmaikunga minna suia kianche, anve, nannih in mahmii ita lonna trongchou i keiva amah amaraal tuuknoh ang;
Herot inkho amah amaraal tuuknoh, chunna amahta inihkuunga amthlahlapei. Anve, amahta thatnatu matikcha amaraal jakhatkho amnoh.
Alamchunna amahta kikchaakche kamthlahtu.”
Khuldoon ujou hoongna aknia Pilat in anmah turel mii inkhatta amthlahtu tla.
Amah khuuboomma hou amsuuk che mii athatrelna simma inthunning.
Pilat in Jisu ta amthlahja hanga ankuunga veikhatla asonei;
chuta anmah in ong onga “Amahta mathluro, amahta mathluro!” ta onga ansonpei.

Che amah in veithum tihpi ankuunga asonei, “Jarelname, amah in jaknang thranohthlou atlohpeime? Amahta thatnatu matikcha maraal jakhatkho keiin tuuknoh ang khame; alamchunna amahta kikchaakche kamthlahtu.”
Chuta anmah in tranga tak a, rool inkaanga onga amahta imthlutupot ta annihpei. Anmah anhouin achekpei.
Cheva anmah in annih nujuih a Jisu ta thatnatu ajapei.
Anmah in annih nujuih a trong amsuuk khatkho miithat rella simma anthun miita amthlahpei; chuta anmah in amidon nujuih a antlohnatu Jisu ta ankuunga amlanpei.
Miitam in amah aknuta anjuih, anmah ankaar a kumei arouin amahturel anlukhe beenga sinthruuiei.
Chuta Jisu in anmahta inheia asonei, “Jerusalem asakumei eio, keiturel trapnohve, chuta nannih nantakturel khatkho nansaturel trapve.
Alamva anve, ‘Nao akpoknoh khung mahche naophomma nao amnohluung khatkho naochuh am innohluung eikha doiphah veisei!’ ta ansonna aknikha thlengsa.
Mahchuche muulpiita, ‘Muul nannih in kantakchunga tlave’; che rapthingta, ‘Rapthing nannih in kannihta kanibahve’ ta anmah in son amithron usa.
Alamva thing an emlai mainang ita tlohseile, achaarlaiva khavei ume?”
Amaraal am aktlei mii innihkho Jisu soh thatjounatu anphurhpei.
Kangruh Amun antihkhanna anmah in anthlenglai, ohkhanna Jisu ta amithlupei, che anmaraal am innihta inkhat in amah akchangtonga mahche inkhat in akveitonga amithlupei.
Mahchunna Jisu in ason, “Pa o, anmahta ip eiro; alamva anmah in jangthlouta kantlohme antak in romnoh ei.” Che amah puunreita ankaar a insemnatu reipak chaang in ansei.
Ohkhanna akngir in anna ammei; chuta Judi akchingei in amahta manuih a anson, “Amah in mii aktleiva akalpa; mahmii i Ringpu in achar Khrista chu veile atak anroua inkalso!”
Raalmii inkho thlenga ngangli tui akthuurta amahkuunga malanna,
amahta anson, “Nangin Judi kurung chele, nikroua inkalro!”
Amah akangchunga, “Mah i Judi ei Kurung” ta injih a am.
Thingkharh a anthoi anmaraal am ankaarna inkhat in Jisu ta manuih a ason, “Nangva Khrista noh cheme? Nikroua inkalro che kannihkho kanikalro khame!”
Chuta aktlei inkhat in amahta saalla ason, “Nangin Ringpu ta trihnoh cheme, nangva niphahtuphu nimaraal talta niphahpei ta romnoh cheme?
Inihva iphahtuphu taksa, alamva inihva itlohkhaanta matikcha a iphahpei, chuta amah kupa ivah chimnoh jakhatkho tlohnoh.”
Chunna amah in Jisu ta ason, “Jisu, nang kurung huunna a nithlenglai keita kantheihrono.”
Mahchun Jisu in akuunga ason, “Tak a keiin nikuunga kisonche, mi in nangta keisoh inruuia Paradais a amjou ume.”
kini in anthimlai; mathruunna thlaam a anjaarpuun innih suuk a inthritsa.
Cheva Jisu in rool inkaanga onga ason, “Pa o, kei kikli nikut a kamsil peiche!” Mahchuta asonche akphuk achena veisa.
Pek raalmii reija akpu in mah aksuuk chuta amuh in, amah in Ringpu ta mapaak a ason, “Tak a amahvah amaraal amnoh miirea!”
Mah aksuuk khata an annatu anboom mii naamte in, ohkhata anmuh in, anlukhe beeng beenga an inna inlengsei.
Amahta akrom annaamte in che Kalili nata amah aknujuih kumei ei in saraalla ngirra aksuuk khata anna amsei.
amahva anmah in amidonta che antloh thlouta jathlaang thlaang miinoh, mahche amahva Ringpu vah kurung huunna loungaak a am mii.
Amah kupa in Pilat kuunga seh a Jisu aruungta anih.
Chunna Jisu aruungta mathrumma innaal pitlangpuun inkhat a aklepche, tukhatkho anlousih nohna lungppiita viit a anseem rusuunna asihpei.
Mahkha thlouraang antlohni akni veisa, che sabat amthronni tumnasa.
Kalili nata Jisu aknujuih a akthleng kumei in Joseph ta juih a rusuunta che Jisu aruungta khatloh a ansihme ta a an;
Cheva anmah in inlenga amrimtui pootleh inteina thao thlouraang antlohpei.
Mahche trongthuun in ason nujuih a sabat nia anmah in inngaisei.
Che rusuun akhaar lungta inphonga am antuuk,
chuta anmah in asuunga anluut in Jisu aruungta tuuknohsei.
Mah churella anmah in inhalla an amsuunga, anve, intle inluut silh a kupa innih ngir anmuh;
anmah in intriseia ankhup in, kupa innih in ankuunga anson, “Akthi kaarna kiringta jarelna nanjonme?
Amah in Kalili a amlai khatloh a nanisonme intheihve,
mah chuvah miivah Asa kupata alehchel ankut a amilanche amithlutu, mahche nithum tihpia ringtu.”
Chunna amah trongchuta intheihsei.
Che anmah in rusuunnata inlenga mah naamte chuta somleikhat leh aktleikuunga ansonpei.
Pek mah kumei eichuva Makadalini Meri, Joanna, Jems anu Meri, mahche aktlei kumei eisoh inruuia mahchuta raangroi ankuunga antongpei;
chuta mah trongchu ankuung avah apupu trongta anlohpei, anmahta malotnohsei.
Chuta Pitar in inthoua rusuun phah a tlaanna sehsa; che inkhup a an in, innaal puunta injarh a am, mahchunoh a aktlei jakhatkho muhnohsa.
Mah aknital chunna anmah ankaarna mii innih in khuuming Immaus ah seh ei, mahchu Jerusalem nata mel sirihvak inla,
anmah in aksuukthlou naamte kharelna khatleh khat trongsei.
Che anmah in tronga intella ansehsuunga, Jisu atak in ankuunga innaia anmahsoh sehjousa.
Chuta amahta anromnoh natu anmah anmitta ammangei.
Che Jisu in anmahta asonei, “Nannih in seh malamma khatleh khat trongchou i jarelname?” Chunna amahta ancheknohseia ngirtlinga amsei.
Che anmah innih ankaarna akming Kleopas in amahkuunga amsang, “Minka suunga aksuuk ei i jakhatkho romnoh nanga rapkhei veia, Jerusalem ak ankhoptu thlengscheme?”
Cheva anmahta aruiei, “Jaknang thlouta suuksame?” Chunna anmah in anson, “Ringpu mahche mii naamte maikuunga thlouvah khatkho tronga akchek amneh ringraan vei Najrethna Jisu relna,
khatloh a inihvaa akthloi thiimpu leh inipuui ei in amahta thatnatu maraal mathlaak a amithlu tameh.
Amahva Israel ta akthloktu miitalsa ta imtuur peita, mah naamte aksuuk i mi insoh nijanthum aphahpei.
Inih ikaarna kumei arouin juktiing inrangdor a rusuunna seh eia, ralladom inihta salungkhouna inimveipei.
Amah aruungta tuuknohsei, anmah anhamuh a ringroi in Jisu vah ringsa ta asonta kannihting inlenga knisonung.
Kannih kankaarna arouin rusuunna seh eia, kumei in anson khananga antuukpei; chuta amah atakva muhnohsei.”
Mahchunna Jisu in anmahta asonei, “Ah kmong miieio, ringraan in ason anaamteta nanrilla malot tapchoukhame!
Khrista in anaamte klah knang athotu mahche amah paarthra a luutnoh ume?”
Amah atakrelna ringjih naamte in asonkha Moses nirik ah mahche ringraan annaamte antrongta anmah kuunga minna amtheih ei.
chuta amahta khaamma anson, “Kannihsoh amjouro, alamva khulouhram veisa, che khalmo thilsa.” Chunna Jisu in anmasoh amjounatu inlengsa.
Amah in tebor a anmahsoh anboklai, amah in tol loua doi amlan, che mahchuta khoia, anmahta amlannei.
Cheva anmah in inthrangseia amahta rom akchekpei; cheva ankuungnata maangsa.
Anmah in khatleh khat insonsei, “Lamma ringjihta inihkuunga inimtheihlai iril khalmoa kaangnohme?”
Mahche anmah in pungtal achunna inthoua Jerusalem a inlengsei, mahchunna aroi somleikhat leh aktleisoh amjou antuukpei.
Che anmahta ansonei, “Taktak a Akpu in ringsa, Simon kuunga ammuhpei!”
Chunna lamma aksuukthlou, amah in tol khoia amah atakta khatloh a amromeime tihrelna antongpei.
Chuta anmah in intria kukthlata imuhpeita amidonpei.
Che Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in jarella inlao sachoume, che jarella nanrilla amahnoh namidon peime?
Kei kikutleh kikehta keianve, keisang, keiromve; keipalve mahche keianve; alamva keita nanmuh angi oinanga kukthlava aruung khatkho aruh amnoh.”
Mahchuta asonlai ankuunga amah akut leh akehta ammuh ei.
Anmah in malotnoh a, roomthoknoh a che salungkhoua an amsuunga, ankuunga asonei, “Onna isaaktuphu nansihme?”
Innsuunche nga akirta akuunga amilanpei.
Che mahchuta loua anmaikunga asaakpei.
Chunna ringjihta rom ancheknatu anmah anrilta amhoongpei
Mahchuche Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Mah chuvah Khrista in klah knang aphahche nithum tihpia thinata ringtu,
che rilthleng khatkho alehnata ip rella Jerusalem nata mathronna jatboom apumtea mah ita keiminga inraantu.
Mah naamte i nannih in sakhichou.
Che anve, Pa atrongchetta nankuunga kamthlah peichou; chuta achungtonga tuuita puun nanga nansilh nohmiil khuuboomma amve.”
Anmahta doi amlansuunga, ankuungnata achunga ahanpei.
Che anmah in roomthok a Jerusalem a inlengsei.
Che anmah in Ringpu mathruunna thlaamma injomma Ringpu ta mapaak a amsei.
Amah in kulkunga Ringpu soh louamjousa;
Poot anaamte amah apaalla inseemkirsa, inseempot anaamte amah jaonoh a inkhatkho inseemnoh.
Amahninga ringna louam, ringna chuva mii turel avaarna veisa.
Akvaar in inthim kaara amvaar, che anthim in akvaarta cheknoh.
Amah in akvaarta sakhi aveinatu thlengsa, mah chuvah mii naamte in amah apaalla malot ancheknatu.
Amah atakvah akvaar khanoh, chuta akvaar khata asonnatu amah in thlengsa.
Mii naamteta amvaarnatu akchim akvaarkha tukleiramma thlengsa.
Amahvah tukleiramma louam, che tukleiramta amah apaalla aseempei, chuta tukleiram in amahta romnoh.
Amah ataktal in thlengsa, chuta amah amiiei in amahta loulounoh ei.
Chuta amah akminga malot a amahta aklou mii naamteta, Ringpu asa anveinatu amah in tuui amlannei;
Tunangkhat in amahninga akpok eiva, thiitingna khonoh nohle ruungtingna khonoh nohle mii in amdon tingna khonoh chuta Ringpu tingnasa.
(John in mahmiita sakhi malanna onga ason, “Keiin ksonkha mahmii isa, kei kmaa a akthleng mii in keichunga kliin, alamva kei kiamnoh maa a amahvah louamsa.”)
Amah ningna aksip malungsi nata malungsi apumte inih naamte in iphahpei.
Alamva trongsuurkha Moses apaalla amlanpei, che malungsi leh akchimva Jisu Khrista apaalla thlengsa.
Tukhat inkho Ringpu ta loumuhnoh ei; Asa kupa khop in amuhning, Ringpu tingna khalekru vei Asa kupa apasoh annai amahta amrompei.
Amah in indah tlohnoh, chuta seenga phoonga asonei, “Keiva Khrista noh ang.”
Che amahta anrui, “Chuleva nangva tucheme? Elaiah cheme?” Che amah in asonei, “Keiva amahnoh ang.” “Ringraan cheme?” Amah in amsangei, “Amahnoh ang.”
Chunna amahta anson, “Nangi tucheme? Kannih kankuunga kanimsangro alamva kannihta kanimthlahmii ankuunga kansonnatu. Nangva tunangang nitihme?”
John in ason, “Keiva rapril kaara an onghou miikhasang, ringraan Isaiah in asonnanga, ‘Akpu vaa lamkha mathluunve.’ ”
Ipek anmahva Pharisi ankuungnata amithlah ei.
Che amahta anrui, “Chule nangva Khrista khonoh chele, Elaiah khonoh chele mahche ringraan khonoh chele, nilup eikha jarelname?”
John in amsang, “Keiin tuiia kiluppeichou, chuta nannih in nanromnoh nankaar a inkhat ngirra am,
kei kiknua akthleng miivaa akehkhraang arui majakho keiva kimtik amnoh ang.”
Mah anaamte i John in alupna Jordon araal Bethani a suuksa.
Mahmii isa keiin kisonkha, ‘Kei kiknua akthleng mii ivah keichunga akliin, alamva amahvah kei kmaa a louamsa.’
Kei kitak in amahta romnoh ang; chuta mairella keiin tuiia aklup thlengsang, mah chuvah amah atakta Israel ankuunga aphoongnatu.”
Che John in sakhi malanna ason, “Keiin ringramna Li ukthru nanga atrumche amah achunga am kimuh.
Kei kitak in amahta romnoh ang; chuta lupnatu keita kamthlah amah in keisonang, ‘Li in trumma achunga am nimuhna miital khanna nannihta Akseeng Li a naniluptu.’
Kei kitak in muh a sakhi kamlanchou mah chuvah mah i Ringpu vaa Asa kupasa.”
Jisu in asehlai amahta anna ason, “Anve, Ringpu vaa Sadam!”
Mah in asonta aroi innih in antheih, che anmah in Jisu aknuta anjuihpei.
Jisu in anheilai, amah aknuta anjuih amuh a ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in jangta nanjonme?” Amahkuunga anson, “Rabbi” (arthava Lulok), “Nang ramma amcheme?”
Anmah kuunga asonei, “Thlenga anve.” Anmah in thlenga ramma ammeta anmuhpei; che mahni chunna amahsoh amjousei, alamva mahchu pung somvak tlasa.
John atrong rungaia Jisu aknujuih mii innih inkhatva Simon, Pitar che anaokupa Andriu veisa.
Amah in matsah a amah ute Simon ta aktuuk a amahninga ason, “Inih in Miisa iktuukpei” (arthava Khrista).
Amahta Jisu kuunga athlenpei. Jisu in amahta anna ason, “Nangva John vaa asa kupa Simon che. Nangta Keiphas kiong uche (arthava Pitar).”
Philip vaa Andriu leh Pitar an amna khuuboom Bethsaida na.
Philip in Nathanel antuukpia akuunga ason, “Moses trongthuunna injih mahche ringraan in amijih, Najareth na Joseph asa kupa Jisu kantuukpei.”
Nathanel in amahta ason, “Najareth nata aktlei akthra inthruhsame?” Philip in amahta ason, “Thlenga anro.”
Nathanel in Jisu kuunga thlengta amuh a, amahta ason, “Anro, taktak a Israel mii, akuunga aril chimnoh amnoh.”
Nathanel in Jisu ta ason, “Keita khatloh a nakrom angme?” Jisu in amsang, “Philip in nangta nak ongnoh maa a nangin thotthing athuuia niamkha kimuhche.”
Nathanel in amsang, “Rabbi, nangva Ringpu Asa kupache! Nangva Israel ei kurungche.”
Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Keiin nangta thotthing athuuia kimuhche ta nikuunga kisonrelna namlotme? Maichung ralla anrolthlou nangin nimuh umang.”
Chela amahta ason, “Keiin nangta taktak a kisonche, nangin ringram inhoonga Ringpu vaa ringroi eiin miiva Asa kupa chunga trum kal nimuhtu.”
Changvaang achunna Jisu kho, aroieikho ankouhpei.
Chunna ngangli atuii avaat inva Jisu anuin amahkuunga ason, “Anmah ngangli atuii thangsa.”
Chunna amahta ason, “Kumeio, nangleh keiin itlohtuphu jangamme? Keitu lai thlengnohmang.”
Amah anuin roijuih ankuunga asonei, “Amah in nankuunga nanison nanisonkha tlohve.”
Judi ei heikoh a maseengna khuuthloubeel kuruk mahchunna amithrun, beel inkhat khat a litar reijavak chal.
Jisu in anmahta asonei, “Khuuthloubeel anaamtea tuii masipve.” Che anmah in khuuthloubeel anaamteta tuii amisippei.
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Pekva nannih in suuk a buhdoon antong amrel mii ninga heivesa.” Che mahchu anheipei.

Mahchuta buhdoon antong amrel mii in amtem in ngangli tuii veisa, mahchu ramnata anthlenme romnoh (khuuthlou beelnata aksuuk roijuih khop in mahchuta anromning) buhdoon antong amrel mii in changrita aong,
che amahta ason, “Mii in matsah a aktuita ansemmaan; mahchuta inkhopseima antihlai tuinohbebta ansemmang; chuta nangva akthra nganglituiita pekphah nisihmang.”
Mah i Kalili vaa Kana a Jisu in matsahrem ampaang daangsa, chunna amah paarthrata amdangpei; che aroi in amahta amilotpei.
Mathruunna thlaamma siilchal, sadam, mahche khuinu juura khatkho inbok a baobeh khoia an amlaia antuukpiei.
Mahchunna Jisu in ruisung seemma, siilchal, sadam, mahche anaamteta mathruunna thlaamnata amnomei, che baobeh apum ankhoihna anmah tebor anaamteta achung athlang amlatpei.
Che khuinu akjuureita asonei, “Mah naamte i loukirve; nannih in Keipa innta baobeh malatna inn maveinohve.
Keiinna mah nantlohthlou irella kiril sok a kaangsang” ta ringjih a injihkha amah aroi in inthiehsei.
Mahchunna Judi ei in amahta anson, “Mah thlou nitloh in kankuunga jaknang daang nammuhsam ungme?”
Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Mah mathruunna thlaam i mamaangve, mahche keiin nithumma kiseemtu.”
Mahchunna Judi in anson, “Mah mathruunna thlaam i anseemna kum soplilei kuruk luut, mah chunangin nithum suunga niseemchek ume?”
Chuta Jisu inva amah akseeng aruungta asonna.
Alamchunna Jisu in thinata aringlai, amah aroi in maita asonna naita intheihsei; chunna anmah in ringjihkho mahche Jisu in asontrongta amilotpei.
Ipek Jisu in Jerusalem a laalna buhdoon suunga amlai, amah in daang jikcha atlohta anmuh in, amah akminga mii jikcha in amahta amilotpei;
chuta Jisu atak inva anmah ankuunga malotna amnoh,
alamva annaamteta aromei che tunangkhat in aktleiturel sakhi malanna amnoh alamva amah in miiril suunga amkha jangme arom.

Mahmii kupa in nikhat khulouh a Jisu kuunga thlenga ason, “Rabbi (Lulok) nangva Ringpu tingnata akthleng lulokcheta kanrom; Ringpu in inruuipinoh avah, nangin nitloh daang i tukhat inkho tloh cheknohtu.”
Mahchunna Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Taktak a keiin nikuunga kisonche, tunangkhat inta thar a poknoh leva, amah in Ringpu vaa kurungram muh cheknohtu.”
Nikodimas in Jisu ta ason, “Mii khat in atarche khatloh a inlenga pok achekume? Amah in anu poomsuung veinih inlenga luut a pok achekume?”
Jisu in amsang, “Atatak a keiin nikuunga kisonche, tunangkhat in tuiia mahche Li a poknoh avah, Ringpu kurung ramma luut cheknohtu.
Ruunga akpok in ruungsa, mahche Li a pok in lisa.
Nangin thar a poktu tlacheta nikuunga kson khanna salungkhou nohro.
Thli in araangja na a raanna seh, mahchuta nangin ahou nitheih, chuta mahchu ramnata thlengme nohle ramma sehme romnohche; mahchunang jimma Li ah akpokho veiningme.”
Nikodimas in amahkuunga ason, “Mah i khatloh a vei achekume?”
Jisu in amahkuunga amsang, “Nangin Israel ei lulok inkhatveia mah kisonita loutheinoh cheme?
Atatak a keiin nikuunga kisonche, inih in iromkhata trongningme, che inih in imuhkhata sakhi veiningme; chuta kannih in kanson sakhita nannih in lou indahschou.
Tukleiram a poot eita nankuunga kson in malotnoh choule, ringramna poot eita nankuunga son angleva khatloh a namilotchek ume?
Miivaa Asa kupa in ringramnata trum khanoh a tunangkhat inkho ringramma kalnohmang.
Moses in raprilla murulta akdomnanga, miivaa Asa kupata akdomtu tlasa,
mah chuvah tukhat in amahta malotle ache amnoh a ring anphahtu.”
Alamva Ringpu in tukleiramta amlaalnatu Asa kupata mathlahnoh, chuta amah apaalla tukleiram in inkal aphahnatu Asa kupata amthlahpei.
Amahta amlot mii khata malaalnoh, amahta amlotnoh mii khata amlaalpei, alamva amah in Ringpu vaa Asa kupa akming khanna malotnoh
Mah pichaarchuva maisa, mah chuvah tukleiramma akvaar thlengsa, chuta mii invah akvaar khachunga anthimta thloia anditpei, alamva anmah anthloua thranoh seengsa.
Alamva thranoh aktloh miirel in akvaarta intirh ei, amah in atlohthlouta indangtuta akvaara thlengnoh ei.
Chuta tunangkhat akchim aktloh amahvah avaarna a thlengtu, jarelname tihva amah in Ringpu in atlohthlou khanna seenga andangnatu relna.
John inkho Salim akom Anon ah alup ei, alamva mah khanna tuiitam am; mii akthlengeita alup ei.
Alamva mahlaiva John va simma inthunnohmang.
Ipek John aroi leh Judi inkhat ankaar a maseengna rella trong inkharhna suuksa.
Che anmah in John kuunga thlenga anson, “Rabbi, Jordon araalla nangsoh amjou, nang sakhi namveikha onna amsa, amah in miita tui alup ei, miikha anro, che mii naamte in amahkuunga thlengei.”
John in amsang, “Ringram tingnata akphahkhop amahnoh avah tukhat inkho jakhatkho phah cheknoh ei.
Keiva Khrista khanoh ang, chuta amah amaa a keita kamthlah angta keiin kisonkhata nantak in keitu sakhi veisachou.
Tharei in aktuukha changrisa, mahkha thareivaa apaisa, ngirra amahta arungeih, changrivaa ahouta atheih in aroomthok hang; alamchunna mah roomthok inna kirilla sipsang.
Amahvah ahanraltu tla, chuta keiva inlengtu tla ang.”
Amah in amuhta che atheihta sakhi amlan, chuta amah aringtukna thaminta tukhat inkho lounoh ei;
amah aringtukna thaminta aklou miiva Ringpu i chimsa ta atak a chum innamsa.
Alamva Ringpu in amthlah mii khanna Ringpu atrongta trong, jarelna tihva Amahkuung aksip Li ta amlan;
Pa in Asa kupta arilvol, chunna poot anaamte amahkuunga amsilpei.
Asa kupata amlot tukhat in ache amnoh ring aphahpei; Asa kupa trongson amjuihnoh tukhat in ache amnoh ring phahnohtu, chuta Ringpu in inhaanga asaokha atakchung amtu.
(tak a Jisu atak inva tukhatkho lupnoh, chuta aroi khopin anlupning),
amah in Judia mathlah a Kalili a sehlasa.
Che amah in Samaria vanna sehtu tlasa.
Chunna Saikhar antih Samaria vaa khuuboom Jakop in asa kupa Joseph kuunga amlanna ram akomma Jisu in thlengsa.
Mahchunna Jakop vaa tuiirum am. Chunna Jisu in lamsei asehna klah a tuiirum apanga inboksa. Mahchu suunjaivak atlaak laina.
Samaria na kumei inkhat in mahchunna tuiichoi thleng. Jisu in amahta ason, “Tuii ki iinnatu kamlan roba.”
Alamva amah aroieiva ansaak an iintu aklei khuuboomma sehsei.
Chunna Samaria kumei in Jisu ta ason, “Nangva Judi re chea che khatloh a Samaria kumei kei kuungnata tui ni iinnatu naknih angme?” alamva Judi in Samaria soh insamnoh ei.

Jisu in amahkuunga amsang, “Nanginta Ringpu vaa akutthol mahche ‘Tuii ki iinnatu kamlanro’ ta nikuunga tuii naknih i tumeta romchele, nangindom amahkuunga tuii nih a amah in nangkuunga akring tuii nikpek uta.”
Kumei khanna amahkuunga ason, “Lulok, mah tuii i nisuuknatu jakhatkho amnohche, che mah tuiirum i khalmo thuuk; chunna akring tuii ramnata niphah ume?
Mah tuiirum ita kanimlan kan pa Jakop chung nangin liincheme, amah atak inkho, asiil inkho onnata tuii an iinnohme?”
Jisu in amahkuunga ason, “Mah tuii ita ak iin miirel veikhat inlenga raaltuei,
chuta keiin kamlansam tuiita tukhat in ak iin miiva tikniakho tuiiraal amnohluung usei; keiin kamlansam tuiita ak iin mii khavah akuunga ache amnoh ringnaturel anthruh dop veitu.”
Kumei in amahkuunga ason, “Lulok, mah tuiichu kamlanro, chunna keiin tikniakho tuii kraal nanohtu che onna tuiichoi kithlengnoh natu.”
Jisu in amahkuunga ason, “Seh a namsal ongro, che onna thlengpiro.”
Kumei in amahkuunga amsang, “Keiva kamsalkho amnohre manga.” Jisu in amahkuunga ason, “Keivah kamsal amnohmang” ta chimma nisonpei;
“chuta nangva namsal ranga tihresa o, che ipek niampi ikho nang namsalnoh; nangin nison i chimpotsa.”
Kumei in amahkuunga ason, “Lulok, nangi ringraan cheta krompeiche.
Kan pa kanpu in mahmuul chunga Ringpu ta anlou mathruun; nang inva Ringpu amithruunna amunvah Jerusalem natu ta nison.”
Jisu in amahkuunga ason, “Kumeio, keita kamlotro, Pa ta mahmuul luung inkho mahche Jerusalem luungakho namithruunnoh natu pungkha thlengsa.
Nannih in nanromnohta namithruun, kannih inva kanromta kamithruun, alamva chaanring athlengna i Judi tingna.
Chuta ipek apungchu thlengsa, Pa ta amthruun mii in Li a mahche akchimma amithruuntu tlasa, alamva mah khananga amahta amthruun miita Pa in akdit
Ringpu vaa Li, chunna amahta amthruun mii in Li a mahche akchimma amithruuntu tlasa.”
Kumei in amahkuunga ason, “Misaiah (Khrista ta an ong) thlengtu antihkha krom; amah in athlenglaia bilam anaamte inihkuunga inisontu.”
Jisu in amahta ason, “Nangkuunga aktrongi amah khasang.”
Mahai talla amah aroi in thlengsei. Mah kumeisoh tronga a am in anmahva salungkhousei, chuta tukhat inkho “Jangnimdonme” nohle “Jarella amahsoh trongcheme” ta aksonchek amnohsei.
Mahchunna kumei in amah tuiipulta amahche, khuuboomma inlenga miita asonei,
“Keiin kitloh anaamteta keison mii i thlenga anve. Mahmii i Khrista antih khatame?”
Anmah in khuuboom nata inthruh a amahkuunga thlengsei.
Mahlaia aroi in amahta ngenna anson, “Raabi, buh saarosa.”
Chuta amah in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih in nanromnoh saakphu kisaaktuphu am.”
Mahchunna aroi in khatleh khat insonsei, “Tunangkhat in amah in asaaktuphu anthlen meio?”
Jisu in anmahta asonei, “Keita kamthlah amah in amdonta aktlohche amah athlouta thratea amche i keitu saakphusa.
‘Ipek thla manlia amche lou luhna thla thlengusa ta nannih in insonnoh choume?’ Anve, keiin nankuunga kisonchou, ipek lou luhnatu kuunsa ta nankang domma lou anve.
Akvorh amah in akvaatsoh aroomthok jounatu akvaat amah in atlohman aphahche ache amnoh a ringnaturel akrah amhuung.
Alamva onna ason i achimna vei, ‘Inkhat in chi avorh mahche aktlei inkhat in avaat ta anson i akchimsa.’
Nannih in nantlohnohta nanluhnatu; aktlei in antlohpei, che nannih in anmah anchekna kaar a luutsachou.”
Mah kumeivaa aringtukna thaminna, “Keiin kitloh naamte amah in keisonpei” ta asonkhanna Samaria khuuboomna miitam in amahta amilotpei.
Nga tloh a Samaria na mii in amahkuunga anthlenglai, anmahsoh an amjounatu amahta anngenpei; cheva ohkhanna ninih anmahsoh amjousa.
Amah atrongkhanna miitam in ral ralla amahta amilotpei.
Anmah in kumei kuunga anson, “Nangin kankuunga maita nisonrella kannih in malotnoh ung, alamva mah i kantak in kantheihpei, che mah i taktak a tukleiramta akkal Akpu sa ta kamrompei.”
Nijannih aknua Jisu in mah khannata Kalili a sehsa.
Alamva ringraan ta ataktal aramna mii in injahnoh eita Jisu ataktal in sakhi amlan.
Nga tloh a Jisu in Kalili a aseh inva buhdoonna a Jisu in atloh naamtekha Kalili na mii in Jerusalem a muh a Jisu ta anlohpei. Alamva anmahkho buhdoonna a sehsei.
Churella Jisu in tuiita ngangli tuii am olkha Kalili vaa Kana a veikhat sehsa. Che Kaparnaum a asa kupa kna phom aknai mi inkhat am.
Jisu in Juda nata Kalili a thlengsa ta amah in atheihlai amahkuunga seh a asa kupa aknata thlenga amthratnatu angen, alamva thisamma knasa.
Churella Jisu in akuunga ason, “Nangin salungkhouna daang muhnohchele malotnoh luung uche.”
Phrangki in ason, “Lulok, ksakupa in athihnoh maa a inthabeb a keiphahro.”
Jisu in amahta ason, “Inlengro nisakupa in ringtu.” Jisu in amahkuunga asontrongta malot a inlengsa.
Chunna amah in anlengsuunga, amah roijuih in lamma antuukpia nisakupa ringsa ta asonpei.
Anmahta aruiei jaknang laia naoin thrame, anmah in anson, “Majaan pung sirih atlaklai atlun in amahpei.”
Jisu in “Nisakupa thratu” ta amahkuunga asonna pungtalkha amah in arompei; chunna amah atak che ataploikuung apumtein amilotpei.
Jisu in Judia nata Kalili a athlengche daang ampaang maisoh veinih tihpisa.
Mah i aknua Judi ei ujou hoongna athlengin, Jisu in Jerusalem a hangsa.
Ipek Jerusalem a Sadam Thong akomma pukhri inkhat am Hibru tronga Bethjatha antih akiing ranga vei thlaam kooia am.
Mahthlaam chunna akna aksa mitcho, kehtlik mahche anpangnem akthi tamkhaak intolh a ammei.
Alamva inromloua ringroi in pukhrisuunga trumma tuii amchektrang, mahlai tukhat in matsah a tuiikhanna trumle, anmah annat satna thraei.
Kum sopthumlei kirit kna atak solmi inkhat mahchunna am.
Mahmii chunna ohkhanna khalmo soot a kna intolh a am Jisu in amuh a amahkuunga ason, “Nang ninatna thra nikditme?”
Akna miikhan Jisu ta amsang, “Lulok, tui anchek ancheklaia pukhri a keitrumpinatu kimii amnoh, chunna keiin kitrumlaiva aktlei mii in keichung matsah a trummei.”
Jisu in amahkuunga ason, “Inthouro, nang nantolhnakha choia sehro.”
Chunna kak hanga mahmiikha thrasa, che amah in antolhnata choia sehsa.
Pek mahchu sabat nina.
Chunna knathra mii khata Judi in anson, “Mah i sabatni, nangin nantolhnata choia sabat nia sehche i tlohphunoh.”
Chuta amah in ankuunga amsangei, “Keita kamthrat amah in keisonang, ‘Nang nantolh nata choia sehro.’ ”
Amahta anrui, Nikuunga “Nantolhnata choia sehro ‘ta naksonmiichu’ tunangme?”
Chuta keita tunang in kamthrat angme romnoh ang, alamva aphomchunna miitam ammeia Jisu va inlitsa.
Mahchu aknua Jisu in amahta mathruunna thlaam a antuukpia, ason, “Anro, nang thrakhem sache! ralla akthranoh nichunga atlaknoh natu veikhat aleh tlohnohrosa.”
Amahta amthratkha Jisu sa ta Judi ankuunga atongpei.
Churella Judi in Jisu ta andah a chut amithronpei, alamva amah in sabat nia thlou atlohpei.
Chuta Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Pa in pekphah i thlou atlohmang, keiinkho kitlohmang.”
Mairella Judi in Jisu ta thatnatu ralla anjonpei, alamva amah in sabat nita khoi khop noh a, Ringpu ta amah Apa tih akho aong, amah atakta Ringpu soh amtrim.
Alamva Pa in Asa kupata arilvol, che amah atak in atlohthlou anaamte amahkuunga ammuh, che nannih in salungkhounatu oichungkho ralla anroolthlou amah in akuunga ammuh umang.
Alamva Pa in akthi miita amringche akring amlannanga, nga tloh a Asa kupa inkho madonna amring miita akring amlan.
Pa in tukhatkho pichaar tlohnoh, chuta Asa kupa akuunga pichaar tlohnatu amsilpei,
chunna anmah in Pa ta injah nanga, mii naamte in Asa kuptakho injah tupotchou. Tunangkhat in Asa kupata injahnohle, amahta amthlah Apa ta injahnoh ei

Keiin nankuunga taktak a kisonchou, keitrongta rungaia aktheih mahche keita kamthlah amahta amlot amah in ache amnoh a ring aphahpei; amah in pichaar tlohna a thlengnoh usa, chuta amahvah kthinata akring tinga akvanpei.
Alamva Pa in ringa am khananga, amah in Asa kupa ningakho ringa amnatu amlanpei,
che amah in miivaa Asa kupa aveirella pichaar atlohnatu amahkuunga amtik amneh amlanpei.
Mah kson in salungkhou tlohnohve; alamva pungkha thlengsa, lai achunna rusuunna ak am naamte in amah ahouta antheihtu.
Thra aktlohmii in thinata ringa kiring aphatu, che thranoh aktlohmii in thinata aringche pichaar aphahtu.”
Kei kitak kikroutata sakhi malan angle, kei sakhi i chimnoh;
Keirella sakhi amlan aktlei inkhat am, che amah in keirella sakhi amlankha chimta krom.
John akuunga trongtong namithlah, che amah in akchimrella sakhi amlanpei.
Keiin kphah sakhi i miikuung nanoh chuta mah i nannih in inkal nanphahnatu nankuunga trongi kisonchou.
Amahvah antruung meiser khasa, che nannih in lai kakturel amahvaa akvaara roomthok nandit.
Chuta John khachunga ralla akliin sakhi keita am; alamva Pa in keikuunga amlanthlou tal khata kamchenatu tloh a ammang, Pa in keita kamthlah angta kthlou in sakhi veisa.
Che keita kamthlah Pa in kei turella sakhi amlanpei. Nannih in tikni akho amah ahou theinoh mangchou, amah ahoongkho tiknikho muhnoh mangchou;
che amah atrongkha nanrilsuunga amnohmang, alamva amah in amthlah khata nannih in malotnohchou.
Nannih in ringjihta nanjon, alamva mahsuung akhanna nannih in ache amnoh ring nanphahtuta namidon; che keitu sakhiva mah anjih khasei;
chuta nannih in ring nanphahnatu kikuunga thleng indah mangchou.
Keiin mii kuungnata paarthra lounoh ang.
Chuta nannih nanrilsuunga Ringpu ta rilvol i amnohchouta kromchou.
Keiin Pa akminga thlengsang, chuta nannih in keita keija a keilounohchou; aktlei inkhat in amahtal akminga thlengleva nannih in amahta nanloulohhtu.
Khalekruta akvei Ringpu tingnata paarthra nannih in lounoh a, inkhat in inkhatnata paarthra louva nannih in khatloh a malot nanchek ume?
Keiin nannihta Pa kuunga kamlaal uchouta madonnohve; nannih in matuura nansih Moses in nannihta maraal nanimlan.
Nannih inta Moses ta malotchoule, nannih in keita namilot tupot ang, alamva amah in keirella amjihpei.
Chuta amah in amjih khata nannih in malotnoh choule, nannih in kei kitrongta khatloh a namilot ume?”
Che mii khalmo tam in amah aknuta anjuihpei, alamva amah in akna mii ankuunga daang jikcha atlohkha anmuh.
Jisu in muulla akalche ohchunna aroisoh inbokjousei.
Pekva Juditu laalna ujouhoong chol jaonoh buhdoonna aknikha innaisa.
Intouva a an in, mii khalmo tam amahkuunga thleng amuh a, Jisu in Philip kuunga ason, “Anmah in ansaaktu ramnata tol ilei ume?”
Mah asonni amahta chaang annatu atlohning, alamva amah atak in kha atloh ume arom.
Philip in amahkuunga amsang, “Kutlang reija innih aman akho ansaaktuphu tol leinakho bangnohtu.”
Aroi ankaarna Simon Pitar anao Andriu in akuunga ason,
“Mah khanna niimtol ranga leh nga innih aksih nao kupasa inkhat am; chuta mii khalmo tam i kha itloh usa?”
Jisu in ason, “Mii naamteta mabok eive.” Amah amunchunna meiphul thratea moong; maiphul chunga annaam inboksei, anmahva kupa akpul rangavak ei.
Chunna Jisu in tol atumta louva ampaakche anbok miita ansempei; mahchunanga nga chukho anmah in anvon anvah nohmiil ansaakpei.
Che anmah naamte in anvon anvahche Jisu in aroita atih ei, “Jakhatkho mamaangnoh a anlei akirkaarkha chunve.”
Chunna anmah in mahchuta amichunpei, che mii in mahchuta ansaakche niimtol ranganata anlei akirkaarkha luktoong somlei innih sip a anthaal.
Amah in atloh daang khata anmuh in anson, “Tukleiramma akthleng ringraankha taktak a mahmii isa.”
Chunna amahta namma kurung amiveinatu kansuursam peiang ta arompeia, Jisu in veikhatla akroua muulla insengsa.
anmah in muli chuunga tuiiboom vanna Kaparnaum phah a ansehnatu amithronpei. Cheva inthimsa, Jisu vah ankuunga thlengnohmang.
Thli tranga araangrella tuiiboomma tuiisolh thlengsa.
Anmah in kilomitar inthum nata rangavak mulita anthoh in, Jisu in tuiiboom chunga akeh ah seh a thlengsa mulikuung phah a innai anmuhpei. Chunna anmah in intrisei,
chuta anmah kuunga asonei, “Intrinohve; keisang.”
Cheva anmah in roomthok a amahta mulisuunga anloulohpei, che kak hanga anmah in antlungnasam tuiipaal khanna mulikha tlungsa.
Akhuvar a tuiiboom araalla miitam in muli inkhatruta am anmuhningsa, che Jisu in aroisoh inruuia mulia chuungnohsa, chuta amah aroivah anroua sehningsei.
Chulata Akpu in mapaak a tol ansaakna amunkha naia Tiberias tingnata muli ste ankuunga thlengei.
Jisu kho aroikho mah khanna amnohseita anrompeia, anmah in muli chuunga Jisu akjon Kaparnaum a sehsei.
Che anmah in Jisu ta tuiiboom araalla antuuk a amahta anson, “Rabbi, tik a onna thlengcheme?”
Jisu in anmahta amsangei, “Keiin nankuunga taktak a kisonchou, nannih in keita nanjon angi daang nanmuh kharelnanoh, chuta nannih in niimtol nansaakche nanvon anvah kharelna.
Akmaangsam saakphu relna thlou tlohnohve, chuta miivaa Asa kupa in nankuunga nanimlansam ache amnoh ringna phah amsam saakphu kharella thlou tlohve alamva amahta Pa Ringpu in chum anampei.”
Chunna akuunga anson, “Ringpu athlou kantlohnatu kannih in jangthlouta kantlohtu tlame?”
Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Akpu amah in amthlah amahta malot i Ringpu vah thloukhasa.”
Chunna ankuunga asonei, “Chuleva kannih in muh a kamilotnatu, jaknang daang nampaang ume?”
Kan pa kanpu in raprilla manna ansaak; nga tloh injih nangsa. “Amah in ringramna tol ankuunga amlannei”
Chunna Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Keiin nankuunga taktak a kisonpeichou, ringramnata tol nanimlankha Moses noh, Pa in ringramnata akchim tolta nanimlanpei.
Alamva Ringpu vaa tolli maisa mah chuvah ringramnata trumma tukleiramma ringna nanimlanpei.”
Anmah in akuunga anson, “Akpu, lai amrella kannihta tol kanimlanro.”
Chuta keiin nankuunga kisonchou, nannih in keita nanmuh peiang chuphao keita kamlotnohchou.
Pa in keikuunga amlan anaamte keininga thlengtu; keikuunga akthleng miita tikniakho manomnohtung.
Keiin kamdonta kitlohnatu ringramnata thlengnoh ang, chuta keita kamthlah Akpu amah in amdonta kitlohnatu thlengsang;
che keita kamthlah Akpu amah in amdonkhavah maisa, amah in keikuunga amlan anaamteta keiin jakhatkho mamaangnoh a, chuta achena aknia amringna turelnasa.
Alamva Pa in amdonkhavah maisa, mah chuvah Asa kupata muh a amlot mii naamte in ache amnoh a ring anphahna turelnasa; che amah in keita achenia kamringtung.”
“Keiva ringramnata akthleng tol khasang” ta Jisu in asonkhanna Judi in amahkuunga anson.
Anmah in anson, “Mahmii i Joseph asa kupa Jisu khanohme, anuleh apava iromnohme? Che keiva ringramnata aktrum angta ipek khatloh a asonme?”
Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Nannih seeng nankaar a insonohve.
Keita kamthlah Pa in keichingnoh avah tukhat inkho kikuunga thleng cheknoh, che keiin amahta achena aknia kamringtu.
Mah i ringraan nirik a injih khasei, ‘Anmah naamteta Ringpu in amtheih tuei.’ Pa tingnata aktheih mahche tamma akrom mii naamte in keikuunga thlengei.
Tunangkhat in Pa ta nanmuhpei tihnoh ang Ringpu tingnakhop in Pa ta amuhning.
Keiin nankuunga taktak a kisonchou, amlot mii khanna ache amnoh a ring aphahpei.
Keiva ringnatu tol khasang.
Nanpa nanpuin raprilla manna kha sakho ansaak, thikho thisei.
Ringramnata akthleng tolkha maisa, mah chuvah tunangkhat in maita saaleva thinohtu.
Ringramnata aktrum akring saakphukha keisang; tunangkhat in mah tol ita saaleva, amah in ache amnoh a ring aphahtu; che tukleiram in ringna turella keiin kamlansam saakphukha kei kitaksa.”
Chunna Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Keiin nannihta atak a kisonchou, nannih inta miivaa Asa kupa atakta saanoh choule che amahvaa athiita innohchoule, nantak a akring amnohtu;
kei kitakta aksaa mahche kei kithiita ak iin mii in ache amnoh ring aphahtu, che amahta keiin achena aknia kamringtu.
Alamva kei kitak i saakphu khasang, mahche kei kithii i iinphu khasa.
Kei kitakta aksaa mahche kei kithiita ak iin amahkuunga keiin amtung. Che keiin akuunga injomma amtung.
Akring Pa in keita kamthlah mahche keiin Pa rella kiring nangjimma, keita keisaamii in kei turella amahkho ringusa.
Ringramnata aktrum tolkha maisa, ipa ipuin ansaakche thieikha ohkhanangnoh saakphu ita aksaa amah in ache amnoh a ringtu.”
Amah in Kaparnaum a amtheih ei nanga, mahtrongi sinakok a asonei.
Amah aroi in maita antheih in akuunga anson, “Mah i aklutrongsa, tunang in arungeihchek ume?”
Chuta amah aroi in insoeita Jisu in aromma ankuunga asonei, “Mah kson in nannih nanril inlengna veime?
Chuleva miivaa Asa kupa in matsah a a amna a akalkha nannih in muchoule khatloh a nanson ume?
Chaan amlankha Lisa, ruung inva jakhatkho akanana amnoh; keiin nankuunga kson trongeikha li leh chaan khasa.”
Chuta nannih nankaar a amlotnoh ste ammangchou. Alamva amlotnoh mii eikha che amahta akjuur miikha tunangmeta matsah a arompei.
Che amah in ason, “Churella keiin nankuunga kisonchou, Pa inta amahkuugna malannohle, tukhat inkho keikuunga thleng cheknohtu.”
Maiche aknua amah aroi aktam in inlengsei, che amahsoh veikhat sehjou nohsei.
Jisu in aroi somlei ihta asonei, “Nannihkho nanlengjasme?”
Simon Pitar in akuunga amsang, “Akpu, tukuunga seh usungme? Nangkuunga ache amnoh chaantrong am;
kannih in nangta malot a kanrompeiche mah chuvah Nangva Akseeng Ringpu khache.”
Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Keiin nannih somleinihta kcharnoh choume, nankaarna inkhatva rappu chuungsame?”
Simon Iskariot asa kupa Juda rella Jisu in mahtrongi asonpei, alamva somleinih ankaarna inkht in amahta ajurhsam.
Maiche aknua Jisu in Kalili a sehsa; amah in Judia a sehnoh, alamva Judi in amahta anthatnatu anjon.
Pek Judi ei Ramuk buhdoonnakha innaisa.
Chunna amah anao in akuunga anson, “Nangin nitlohthlou ei i niroi inkho anmuhnatu amah aphommi mah a Judia a sehrosa.
Alamva tukhat in amah atakta mii kuungah marom akdimii in inthup a atloh jakhatkho amnoh. Nangin mah ita nitlohche nitakta tukleiramma madangro.”
Alamva amah anaotak inkho amahta malotnoh mangei.
Jisu in anmahta asonei, “Keiturel lai ipek thlengnohmang, chuta nannihtu laiva aknirel onna am.
Tukleiram invah nannihta nantirh cheknoh ei, chuta amah inva keita kantirh alamva amah athlouva thranoh ta keiin sakhi kamlanrelna.
Nannihvah buhdoonna khanna sehve; keiva mah buhdoon khanna sehnohtung, alamva keiturel lai tlungnohmang.”
Mah ita asonche, atakvah Kalili a inmahsa.
Maiche aknua amah anao in buhdoonna a ansehnua, amah atakho mii maromnoh a inruk a hangsa.
Judi in amahta buhdoonna a jonna anson, “Mahmiikha ramchesame?”
Miitam ankaar a amah relna chikchakta insosei. Arouin anson, “Amahvah akthra mii khame,” aktlei in anson, “Mahchunoh, amah in miita chimnoh a inhea aching.”
Chulata Judi ta antrih rella tukhat inkho amahrella indanga trongnohsei.
Buhdoonna laita ahanphah in Jisu in mathruunna thlaamma hanga amtheih ei.
Judi in salungkhoua anson, “Mahmii in tamnoh luunga atheih asingi khatloh a veime?”
Mahchunna Jisu in anmahta amsangei, “Keiin kamtheihchou i keitanoh, chuta keita kamthlahvaa ata;
tukhat in amah in amdonta atlohjale, amah in amtheihkha Ringpu tingname chunohle amah akroutu akchek amnehta trongme tihkha atak in aromtu.
Amah akroutu akchek amneh a trongle amah akroutu paarthrata ajon; chuta amahta amthlah akuungnata paarthrakha jonle mahkha akchim, amahkuunga chimnoh ansoi amnoh.
Moses in nankuunga trongthuun nanimlannoh peime? Chuta tukhat inkho trongthuunkha majuih nohchou. Nannih in keita jarelna keithat reita nanjonangme?”
Mii in amisang, “Nangva khousaar chuungsache! Nangta tunang in nakthatreita nakjonme?”
Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Keiin thloukhat kitloh, mah thlou khanna nannih nannaamte in salungkhoua amchou.
Moses in nankuunga avun tannatu nanimlan (Mahkha Moses tingnanoh, chuta pa pu tingnasa), che inngeihna aknia nannih in miita anvun nantan.
Moses trongthuunta akoihnoh nahtu inngeihna aknia miita anvun tanchoule keiin inngeih nia mii aknata kamthratkhem rella nannih in keichunga namilung inhaangnohme?
Miisak anna pichaar tlohnohve, chuta akchim pichaar tlohve.”
Alamchunna Jerusalem na mii arouin anson, “Anmah in thatreita anjonkha mahmii inohme?”
Che onna amah in indanglonga tronga amsa, cheva amahkuunga jakhatkho sonnohsei! “Mahmii i tak a Khrista sa ta anrompeime?
Chuta Khrista in tik a thlengume, ramnata thlengume tukhat inkho romnoh; chulata amahvah ramnata thlengme irom.”

Chunna Jisu in mathruunna thlaamma amtheih ei, “Nannih in keita nanromang, che ramnata thleng umeta nanromnoh angme? Chuta keiin kichek kamneh roua thlengnoh ang; keita kamthlah amahkha akchimsa, amahta nannih in romnohchou.
Keiinvah amahta kirom, alamva keita kamthlah amahkuung nata thlengsang.”
Chunna amahta suurnatu anjon; chuta tukhat inkho achunga kut thlaknoh mangei, alamva amah apung epekphah thlengnohmang.
Chulata miitam ankaar nata mii jikcha inva amahta malot a anson, “Mahmii in atloh daang chunga Khrista in athleng laia ralla atloh umang?”
Jisu rella mii khalmo tamin chikchakta insoeita Pharisi in antheihpei, chunna akthloi thiimpu leh Pharisi in amahta ansuurnatu phrangkita amithlah ei.
Mahlai Jisu in ason, “Keiin nannihsoh kak soot a amjoutung, mahchuche keita kamthlah amahkuunga sehlatung;
Nannih in keita nanjontung chuta keituuknoh uchou; keiin kiamna a nannih in thlengcheknoh uchou.”
Judi in khatleh khat insonsei, “Inih in tuuk icheknoh natu ram amunna mahmii in sehsam reime? Kriik ankaar a inthek invorh ak am inih mii ankaar a seh a Kriik eita matheihtang atihmeio?
‘Nannih in keita nanjontung chuta keituuknoh uchou,’ che ‘Keiin kiamna a nannih in thleng cheknoh uchou’, ta amah in atrongi jaknang trongsame?”
Keita amlot amah in, ringjih in asonnanga, ‘Amah arilsuunga akringvaa avaatuii luungtu.’ ”
Pek tunangkhat in amahta amlot mii in anphahsam Li kharella ason; alamva Likha malannohmang, mah chuvah Jisu kha paar mathratnoh mang.
Aktlei in anson, “Amah i Khrista khasa.” Chuta mii arouin anson, “Khrista in Kalili nata thlengume?
