Khrista va Davit innsuungna, Davit in a amna khuu Bethlehem nata inthruhta ringjih in asonnohme?”
Chunna amahrella mii ankaar a inthrek inbaak suuksei
Arou inva amahta ansuurja hangsa, chuta tukhat inkho amah achunga kutthlak cheknohsei ak.
Anmah in anthlenglaia Pharisi in anlouson, “Nannih in amahta jarella thlennoh choume?”
Phrangki in amisang, “Tukhat inkho mahmiinanga trongnoh mangei!”
Pharisi in ankuunga amisang, “Nannihkho amahnoh lamtinga nanisehpi peime?
Amahta malotnatu tukhat in nankuungnata nohle Pharisi tingnata akchek amnehtrong inthruhsme?
Trongsuur romnoh miitamva phool anphahpei.”
Mah i matsah a Jisu kuunga seh a intuukpi anmah ankaarna Nikodimas in ankuunga asonei,
“Inih trongsuur nujuih a mii khat in jangthlouta atlohmeta matsah a rungaihnoh maanna miita pichaartloh ajame?”
Amahkuunga amisang, “Nangkho Kalili na miinohcheme? Majonna anve Kalili nata ringraan tukhatkho inthruhnoh.”
Cheva anmah in inn inna inlengsei.
Chuta Jisu vah Chorphol muulla hangsa.
Juktiing inranga amah in mathruunna thlaamma veikhat thlenglasa; mii naamte in amahkuunga thlengsei che amah in inbok a anmahta amtheih ei.
Ringjih lulok mahche Pharisi ei in kupalaal kumei inkhatta, alaia amingirh
che anmah in akuunga anson, “Lulok, amah kumei i kupasoh inlaalla amlaitalla kansuurpei.
Moses trongsuur avah oinang miita lung denna thatnatu kankuunga trongthuun kanimlanpei. Amah kumei irella nang invah jangnisonjame?”
Amahta janoh a maraal amithlaknatu chaang anna mah ita akuunga anson. Jisu in inkhup a tukleichunga akut majung in amjih.
Amahta rui ruia an am in, amah in ngirjok a ankuunga asonei, “Nannih nankaar a aleh ak amnohluung miikhan matsah a amahta lung deenso.”
Che veikhatlakho inkhup a tukleichunga akut majung in amjih.
Anmah in ohchuta antheih in, anparem nata mathronna inkhat khat a inthrukirsei, che Jisu leh amaikuunga angir kumeikhopta inmahningsei.
Jisu in intouva anche amahta ason, “Kumeio, ramche seime?” Tukhat inkho nangta namlaalnoh seime?
Kumei in ason, “Akpu, tukhat inkho keita kamlaalnohsei.” Che Jisu in ason, “Kei inkho nangta namlaalnoh sang; inlengrosa, che veikhat inlenga aleh tlohnohronoh.”
Mahchunna Pharisi in amahta anson, “Nang nikroutu sakhi namlan; nang sakhi i chimnoh.”

Jisu in amsang, “Kei kikroutu sakhi malan sanglakho, kei sakhikha chim, alamva keiin ramnata thleng angme mahche ramma sehtungme krom, chuta keiin ramnata thleng angme chuche ramma sehtungme nannihva romnohchou.
Nannihva miihoong aknujuih a pichaar nantloh, keiva tukhatkho pichaar tlohnoh ang.
Chulata keiin pichaar tloh angle, kei pichaar tlohva chim, alamva kei kikroua pichaar tlohnoh ang, chuta kei leh che keita kamthlah amahsoh kitlohjou.
Nannih trongsuur avah mii innihva sakhi in chimta injihsa;
Kei kikroutu sakhi kamlan, che keita kamthlah Pa in keitu sakhi amlan.”
Alamchunna anmah in akuunga anson, “Nangpa ram amme?” Jisu in amsang, “Nannih in keikho kei Pakho romnohchou; nannih in keita keiromchoule, kei Pakho nanrom utaning.”
Mahtrongi mathruunna thlaamsuung baobeh sihna thlaamma amah in amtheih ei, chuta tukhat inkho amahta suurnoh ei, alamva amahtu laikha tlungnohmang.
Mahlaia Judi in anson, “Keiin kisehna samma nannih in thleng cheknoh uchou” ta asonni, amah akroua inthatsam meio?
Amah in ankuunga asonei, “Nannihva athlang nachou, keiva achungna ang; nannihva tukleiram nachou, keiva tukleiram nanoh ang.
Keiin nannihta kisonchou mah chuvah nannih nanleh khanna thiuchou, alamva nannih in keita amahsa ta kamlotnoh choule nannih nanleh khanna thiuchou.”
Amahta anson, “Nangi tunangcheme?” Jisu in anmahta asonei, “Matsah nata keiin nankuunga kisonkhasa.
Keiin nankuunga khalmo kisontuphu mahche pichaar kitlohnatu tam am; chuta keita kamthlah amahkhavah chim, keiin amahkuung nata ktheihta tukleiramma indanga kisonpei.”
Pa rella anmah kuunga kitrongkha anmah in lou theihnohsei.

Chunna Jisu in ason, “Nannih in miiva Asa kupa khata nandomlai akhanna kei i amahsang ta nanrom umang, keiin kichek kamneh khanna jakhatkho tlohnoh ang, chuta Pa in keikuunga kamtheih khata nga tloh a trongsang.
Che keita kamthlah amah in keisoh amjou, keita kikroua keimahnoh, amahta mapelnatu lai amrel keiin thlou kitloh.”
Amah in nga tloh a trongsa, che miitam in amahta amilotpei.
che nannih in akchimkhata nanromtu, mahche akchim khanna nannihta thlaang thlaang nanimveitu.”
Anmah in akuunga amisang, “Kannihva Abraham atuteung, chunna kannihva tunangkhat miivaa naichi louveinoh mangung. Mahchuta khatloh a ‘Nannihva thlaang thlaang mii veiuchou,’ ” ta nakson ungme?
Naichi in inna ache amnoh a amma relnoh; asa kupa vaa ache amnoh a am.
Chunna Asa kupa inta nannihta ningtamna nanimphahle, nannih in atatak a aningtam mii vei uchou.
Nannihva Abraham atutechouta krom; chulata nannih inva keita thatreita nanjonnang, alamva kei kitrongi nanrilsuunga amnatu aphom amnoh.
Keiin Pa kuungnata kimuh kimuhkhata trongsang, che nannih inkho nanpa kuungnata nantheih nantheih khata nantlohpei.”
Anmah in akuunga amisang, “Abraham vah kannih kan pa.” Jisu in ankuunga asonei “Nannih inta Abraham asa veichoule, Abraham in atlohthloukha nantloh tupotsa,
chuta Ringpu tingna akchimta theih a nannih nankuunga akson keita, ipekva thatnatu nanjonnang; Abraham va mainangi tlohnoh.
Nannih nanpa in atlohthlouta nannih inkho nantloh.” Anmah in akuunga anson, “Kannihva kumei kupa inlaalla pok miinoh ung, kannih kan Pa inkhat am, mah chuvah Ringpu sa.”

Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Ringpu ta nannih nan Pa maveichoule, nannih in keita nanrilvol tupotsang, alamva keiin Ringpu nata inthruh a thlengsang; kei kikrou kichek kamneh a thlengnoh ang, chuta amah in kamthlah ang.
Keiin nankuunga ksonni jarelnaru lou theihnoh sachoume? Mah i jarelname tihva nannih in kei kitrongta rungai cheknohchou.

Nannih nanpa seitan vaa atasachou, che nanpa in akditta tloh i nannih in namidon khasa. Amahvah akungnata mathronna miithat mii, amahkuunga akchim atlohnatu amnohluung, alamva amahkuuga akchimluung amnoh. Amah in amchinthivaa atronglaia, amah atak a am anono khata trong, alamva amahvah amchinthi, che amchin apasa.
Chuta keiin nankuunga akchimkhata kisonrel, nannih in keita kamlotnohchou.
Nannih nankaar a keita alehchel namithlaknoh angme? Keiin akchimta am angle, jarella kamlotnoh choume?
Ringpu ata akveimii in Ringpu trongson arungeih; jarelna, nannihva Ringpu atanohchou churella Ringpu atrongta rungainohchou.”
Jisu in amsang, “Keiva kousaar chuung noh ang; chuta keiva Pa ta injah ang, nannih inva keita kanjahnoh chou.
Chuta kei kikroutu paarthratna jonnoh ang; mahchuta onna akjon Mii khat am amah in pichaar atlohtu.
Keiin nannihta taktak a kisonchou, tunangkhat in kei kitrongta ngaak a majuih choule, mahmii khavah tikniakho kthi muhnohluung usa.”

Judi in amahta anson, “Ipek inih in irompei mah chuvah nannihva khousaar chungsachou, Abraham in thisa, ringraankho thisei; chuta nangin nisonva, ‘Tunangkhat in keitrong ngaak a majuihleva, amah in kthi tiknikho matemnohtu.’
Kan pa Abraham athihche nuaa nangin liinsacheme? Ringraankho thisei! Nang nikrouta tu angmeta insooncheme?”
Jisu in amsang, “Kei kikrouta paarthratna mavei angle, kipaar thratna i jakhat khonoh; keita paar kamthratva nannih in Pa ta nan ong keipa in paar kamthrat ang.
Chuta nannih inva amahta romnohchou; keiinva amahta krom. Keiin amahta romnoh angta sonangle, keikho nannih nanga chinthi veisang; chuta keiva amahta krom churella amah atrongta ngaak a kamjuih.
Nannih nanpa Abraham in kei kiknita kmuhtu ta aroomthok; amah in ohchuta amuh a aroomthoksa.”
Mahchunna Judi in akuunga anson, “Nangva kum sopngakho phahnoh mangche, che nangin Abraham ta nimuhpeime?”
Jisu in asonei, “Keiin nannihta taktak a kisonchou, Abraham apoknoh maa a kei louamsang.”
Chunna amahta andennatu lung anchunpei; chuta Jisu vah inthupsa, mahche mathruunna thlaamnata inthruhsa.
Amah in nga tloh a asehlai, amit choa pok mii khat amuh.
Chunna aroi in akuunga anrui, “Lulok, mahmii kupa in amit choa pok i tunangvaa aleh relname, chunohle anu apa eime?”
Jisu in amsang, “Mahkha atak in alehthlou atloh relna khonoh nohle anu apa khonoh, chuta Ringpu thlouta amahkuunga amdangna turelnasa.
Keita kamthlah amah athlouta kini amlaia itlohtu tlasa; khulouh veisle tukhat inkho thloutloh cheknohtu.
Keiin tukleiramma kiamlai sootva, keiin tukleiramtu akvaarsang.”
Mahchuta asonche, tukleia machilla philchop amnoiche philchuta amit ah ateipei,
amahta ason, “Seh a, Silom pukhri a chaamro” (Silom arthava Mathlah). Chunna amah in seh a achaampei, che amit muh a inlengsa.
Matsah avah doh a aksaa miita amit muh akchek inva anthringpi in ansonpei, “Mahmii i inbok doh a aksaa mii khanohme?”
Arouin anson, “Mahmii khasa” aktlei in ansonla, “Amahnoh, asak inloning” Amah in ason, “Kei i mahmii khasang.”
Anmah in akuunga anson, “Chule nang nimit khatloh a meenga nimuhchek peime?”
Amah in amsang, “Jisu ta an ong mii khanna philchop manoia kimit keiteiche keisonang, ‘Silom a seh a chaamro’; chunna keiin seh a kchaam inva kimit muh kichekpei.”
Amahta anson, “Amahvah ram amme?” Amah in asonei, “Romnohsang.”
Anmah in mitcho khata Pharisi ankuunga anthlenpei.
Jisu in philchop balla amit ammuhna aknikha sabatni veisa.
Amah amitkha khatloh amuhmeta Pharisi inkho anruila. Ankuunga asonei, “Amah in kimitchunga philchop abal, mahchuta keiin kchaam in muh kichekpei.”
Pharisi arouin anson, “Mahmii i Ringpu tingnanoh, alamva amah in sabat ngaaknoh.” Chuta aktlei in anson, “Alehchel mii in oinang daang khatloh a atlohchek ume?” Anmah ankaar a inthrek inbaakna veisa.
Chunna anmah in mitchota veikhat ansonla, “Amah in nimit nammuh taningva amahturel nangin jangnisonjame?” Amah in ason, “Amahvah ringraan inkhat.”
Amit muh akphah miikha anu apa ta Judi in an ongnohsoot, amahvah amitcho chuta amuhpeita anmah in malotnoh lusei,
cheva anmah in anu apa ta anrui, “Amah i nansakupa khanohme, amit choa pokta nanson khanohme? Chuleva khatloh amah in muh achekpeime?”
Amah anu apa in amisangpei, “Amah i kansakupa, amit choa pokta kanrom;
chuta amah in khatloh a ipek amit amuhme, che tunang in amah amitta ammuhme romnoh ung, amah atak changsa atak in atak turel asontu, amahta ruive.”
Amah anu apa in Judi ta antrih rella mah i anson, alamva tunangkhat in Akpu ta Khrista ta phoongleva; amahta sinakok nata aminomtu ta Judi in matsah a anjana am.
Churella anu apa in anson, “Amah atak changsa, atakta ruive.”
Chela anmah in amitcho miita veinih inlenga onga anson, “Ringpu ta mapaakro; mahmii i alehchel miita kanrom.”
Amah in amsang, “Amah i alehchel miime chelnohme keiin romnohsang; keiin kiromva, kimit choangta ipekva muh kichekpei.”
Amahkuunga anson, “Amah in nangkuunga kha atlohme. Khatloh a nang nimitta amhoongme?”
Amah in amsangei, “Keiin nankuunga kisonpeichou, che nannih in keirungainoh sachou. Chela nannih in jarella veikhat nanrungeihja mangme? Nannihkho amah aroi nanveja taksame?”
Cheva amahta thikrak a saalla antipei, “Amah aroiva nangche, chuta kannihva Moses aroiung.
Ringpu in Moses kuunga trongsa ta kanrom, chuta mah kupa iva ramnata thlengme romnoh ung.”
Mahmii in amsang, “Amah in ramnata thlengme tihkho romnohchou, chuta kimitva amhoongpei. Mah i jarella salungkhouna veime.
Inih in irom mah chuvah Ringpu in alehchel miita rungainoh, chuta tunangkhat Ringpu ta injah a amthruun mii veile che amah in amdonkhata tlohle mahmii khata Ringpu in arungeih.
Tukleiram amthron lainata tukhat amit choa pokta amuhpeita anson lou theihnoh mangme.
Mahmii inta Ringpu tingnanoh leva, jakhatkho tloh cheknohtu.”
Amahkuunga amisang, “Nangva aleh in inlep a pokche, chela nangin kannihta kanimtheihla mangche?” Cheva amahta aminompei.
Amahta aminompeita Jisu in atheihpei, cheva amahta antuukpia akuunga ason, “Nangin miivaa Asa kupata namlotme?”
Amah in amsang, “Lulok, mahmiikha tume, keiin kamlotnatu?”
Jisu in ason, “Nangin amahta nimuhpei, nangkuunga aktrongi amah khasang.”
Chunna amah in ason, “Akpu, keiin kamlot,” cheva amah in Jisu ta amthruunpei.
Jisu in ason, “Akmuhnoh mii in anmuhnatu che akmuh mii in mitcho anveinatu, tukleiramta pichaar tlohnatu keiin thlengsang.”
Jisu komma innaia am Pharisi arouin mahchuta antheihpei, cheva amahkuunga anson, “Mahchu kannihkho mitcho sungme?”
Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih inta mitchobeng chouleva, nanleh amnoh uta; ipek nannih in nanson, ‘Kannih in kanmuh,’ chuta nannih nanlehva nantaksoh am.”
“Keiin nankuunga atatak a kisonchou, ‘Tunangkhat in sadamkon thonga luutnoh a, apangtinga kalla akluut miikha inru inraansa;
chuta thonga akluut miikhava sadam kemsa.
Amahturel thong akngaak in thong amhoong; sadam in amah ahou antheih, che amah sadam eita anminga a ongei.
Amah sadam eita ankonnata amthruhlai, anmah anmaa a seh, che sadam in amah aknuta anjuih, alamva amah ahouta anrom.
Aktleina akthleng miivaa aknu juihnohtuei, chuta aktlei mii ankuungnata tlaantuei, alamva anmah in aktleinata akthleng miiva ahou romnoh ei.’ ”
Mah pandam i Jisu in ankuunga huuina a asonei, chuta anmah kuunga asonkha loutheinoh ei.
Chunna veikhat inlenga Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Keiin nankuunga atatak a kisonchou, keiva Sadamkonvaa thong khasang.
Kei kmaa a akthleng annaamte inru inraan sengei; chuta anmah anhouta sadam in rungainoh ei.
Keiva thong khasang; tungangkhat in keikuunga luutleva, amahta kakaltu, che amah in sehloonna meiphul asaakna aktuuktu.
Inrumii in amruknatu, thatnatu mahche ammaangnatu noh a thlengnoh; anmah in akring anphahnatu keiin thlengsang, mahchu inleisolh a anphahnatu.
Keiva akthra sadamkem khasang. Akthra sadamkem in amah sadam turel achaan amthlah.
Baobeh akthrulh, sadamta kemnoh mii in, uiiramuiipii athleng amuh in sadamta eia atlaan; che uiiramuiipii in sadamta eita a atlaanei che heihei akthek ei.
Amah in tlaanna amah ei alamva amahvah baobeh akthrulh miining mahche sadam turelva akirkho aril maluutnoh.
Keiva akthra sadamkem khasang; kei sadam eita ansak kromei che anmah inkho keita kanromang,
Pa in keita keirom khananga, keiinkho Pa ta krom; chunna kei sadam turella kichaan kamthlah.
Kei sadam akonna ak amnoh aktleiakho kei sadam ammei; anmahkho keiin kithlentuei, che anmah in kei kihou antheihtu. Mahchunna sadamlom inkhat mahche sadamkem inkhat vei tuei.
Churella Pa in keita keirilvol, alamva kei kichaan kamthlahpei mahchuta veikhat inlenga kaphahnatu.
Tukhat inkho kikuungna chaan lounoh, mahchu kitakrouin ja a kamthlah. Kei chaanta kamthlahnatu kei kituui am, che mahchu veikhat inlenga klohnatu tuuikho am; mah trongthuun i Pa tingnata kphahpei.”
Anmah aktam in anson, “Mahmii i khousaar chuunga innahsa; jarella atrongta nanrungeihme?”
Aktlei in anson, “Mah i khousaar chuung mii inkhatva atrongnoh. Khousaar in mitchota ammuhchek ume?”
Aknu achunna maithruunna Thlaam Katna buhdoonkha Jerusalemma suuksa.
Mahchu phalbia tla, che Solomon vaa mathruunna thlaam innmuk a Jisu in sehsa.
Chunna Judi in Jisu ta kooia anngrihche anson, “Nangin kannihta jikcha soot a namsimna umangungme? Nangin Khrista chele kankuunga seenga kanisonrosa.”
Chunna Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Keiin nankuunga kisonpeichou, che nannih in keita kamlotnoh sachou. Keiin Pa akminga kitlohthlou anaamte, kei turella sakhi amlan;
chuta nannih in keita kamlotnoh sachou, alamva nannihva kei Sadam nohchou.
Kei Sadamtva kihou antheih, keiin anmahta kromei, che anmah in kei kiknuta kanjuih ang;
che anmahta ache amnoh akring kamlanei, mahche anmahva tikniakho maangnoh usei, che anmahta tukhat inkho kikutnata keisutnoh tuei.
Anmahta keikuunga amlan Pa in aktlei naamte chunga akliin, che tukhat inkho anmahta Pa kutnata sut cheknoh tuei
Pa leh keiva inkhat ningung.”
Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Pa tingnata akthra thlou jikcha nankuunga kammuh peichou; mahsuung akhanna jarella keita lung nandensam angme?”
Judi in amisang, “Akthra thlou nitloh kharella nangta lung nakdeennoh ung chuta Ringpu ta leem manuih a nitrong kharelna; alamva miikhatcheta nitakta Ringpu namvei.”
Jisu in ankuunga amsangei, “Mah i nannih trongsuura injhinohme, ‘Keiin kisonchou, nannihva rappunoh choume?’
Ringpu trong akthlengta amah in rappu ta ongle (ringjihva koii cheknohtu),
keiturelva Pa in maseenga tukleiramma kamthlah peiang, che ‘Keiva Ringpu Asa kupa ang’ ta kisonlai khatloh a nannih inla nangva Ringpu ta leem manuih a trongche nantih angme?
Keiinta Pa athlouta tlohnoh angle, chuleva keita kamlotnohve;
mahchuta keiin tloh angle, nannih in keita kamlotnoh choulakho, Pa in keikuunga am mahche keiin Pa kuunga ammangta nanromnatu che romma amahkuunga nan amnatu kthloukha malotve.”
Veikhatla amahta ansuurnatu insuulsei, chuta ankutnata inlitsa.
Amahkuunga mii khalmo thlengei; che anmah in anson, “John va daang jakhatkho tlonoh, chuta mahmii irella John in asonva chim.”
Ohkhanna miitam in Jisu ta amilotpei.
Akpu ta thao polh a Akpu akehta asamma aknuul Meri vaa atra Lajaras knasa.
Chunna aute in Jisu kuunga trong mathlah a ason, “Akpu, nangin nirilvol amahkha knasa.”
Jisu in mahchuta atheih in ason, “Aknakha thitangta knanoh; mah iva Ringpu paarthrata amliinna turelnaning, mah chuvah amah apaalla Ringpu Asa kupata paar amthratna turelna.”
Jisu in Martha leh anaosoh che Lajaras ta arilvolei.
Chunna amah knasata atheih in, amah in an amna khanna Jisu in ninih nichuunga amsa.
Mahchuche aknua Jisu in aroita asonei, “Inih in Judia a veikhat sehrei.”
Aroi in akuunga anson, “Lulok, Judi in nangta lung nakdenreita ipek nanjonnoh eime, chela veikhatla mah khanna sehsamla mangche?”
Jisu in amsang, “Nikhatsuunga pung somleinih amnohme? Tunangkhat in suunna sehloonle amah akeh masuihnohtu, alamva amah in tukleiramna akvaar ita amuh.
Chuta tunangkhat in khulouh a sehloonle, amah akeh amsuihtu, alamva akvaarkhan amahkuunga vaarnoh.”
Nga tloh a atrongche, ankuunga asonlaei, “Inih iruul Lajaras insa, chuta amahta kamthohnatu keiin sehtang.”
Aroi in amahkuunga anson, “Akpu, amah in inleva knathra usa.”
Pek Jisu vah Lajaras in athih rella atrongna veisa, chuta anmahva inna amtuta amidonpei.
Cheva Jisu in ankuunga seenga atihpei, “Lajaras thisa;
alamva nannih in namilotnatu keiin mah khanna amnoh angta nannih turel keiin roomthok ang. Chuta inih in amahkuunga sehrei.”
Pheipokta an ong Thomas in anruuipijou amah aroikuunga asonei, “Inihkho amahsoh sehreio, inih in amahsoh inruuia thijou khoromnohme.”
Pek Jisu in mahchunna athlenglai Lajaras rusuunna anphuumna nijan manli aphahpei.
Bethani vah Jerusalem nata mel innihvakta inlaning,
Chunna Judi jikcha in Martha leh Meri annao kupa athih rella bohnatu thlengei.
Martha in Jisu thlengsta atheih in, louseh a amahta antuukpipei, mahsuunga Meri va inna inbok a inmah.
Martha in Jisu ta ason, “Akpu nanginta onna amcheleva, kei kitrakha thinoh uta.
Che ipekho krom mah chuvah nanginta Ringpu kuunga jangmekhat ningenchu, Ringpu in nangkuunga amlantu.”
Jisu in amahkuuga ason, “Nang nitra veikhat ringtu.”
Martha in amahkuunga ason, “Achena aknia veikhat ringna akhanna amah in ringtuta krom.”
Jisu in amahkuuga ason, “Veikhat akring mahche akring chaankha keitalsang; keita kamlot mii khanna thislakho ringlatu,
che tunangkhat in ringa keita kamlot miikhan tiknikho thinoh usei. Mah i nangin namlotme?”
Martha in akuunga ason, “Akpu, oi; nangva Ringpu Asa kupa, Khrista tukleiramma thlengcheta kamlotche.”
Mahchuta asonche, amah anaoeisoh Meri kuunga inlenga amahta inruktea onga ason, “Lulokha onna amsa, nangta nak ong.”
Mahchuta atheihsoh, inthademma anthohche amahkuunga sehsa.
Pek Jisu vah khuusuunga tlungnohmang, chuta Martha in antuukpina khanna ammang.
Amahta boh a, inna ak amjou Judi in, Meri in khalmo intha a inthoua anthruhkhata amuh in, rusuunna seh a trapsam naita anjuihpei.
Meri in Jisu amna a thlenga Jisu ta amuhsoh, amah akehkungah akhuk makamma ason, “Akpu, nanginta onna amcheleva, kei kitrakha thinoh uta.”
Amah in atrapta Jisu in amuh in, amasoh akthlengjou Judi kho trapsei, chunna amah akli leh aril khalmo asokpei;
chunna amah in ason, “Amahta ramma nanphuumme?” Akuunga anson, “Akpu, thlenga anro.”
Jisu in trapsa.
Cheva Judi in ansonpei, “Anve, jikcha amahta arilvolme!”
Chuta ankaarna arouin anson, “Mitchota anmuhchek amah in mii ikho athihnoh natu tlohcheknoh ume?”
Jisu in ason, “Lungkha phongve.” Akthivaa aute Martha in akuunga ason, “Akpu, pekva innam usa, alamva athihna nimanli aphahpei.”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Nanginta malotchele Ringpu va paarthra nimuhtuta naksonnoh angme?”
Chunna anmah in lungta anphongpei. Che Jisu in intoua a anche ason “Pa o, nangta kampaakche alamva nangin kei kitrongta naktheih ang.
Nangin keita anirel naktheih angta krom, chuta onna miitam ngirra ak am mii turella kisonche, mah chuvah nangin keita namthlah angta anmah in amilotnatu.”
Mahchuta asonche, housuuk a onga ason, “Lajaras, inthouro!”
Akeh akut puun inlep a, che amai puunna inthlomma akthi miikhan inthruhsa. Jisu in anmahta asonei, “Amahta majakve, che masehvesa.”
Alamchunna Meri soh akthlengjou Judi jikcha in, Jisu in atlohthlou khata anmuh in amahta amilotpei;
chuta arouinva Pharisi ankuunga seh a Jisu in atlohthlou khata antongpei.
Chunna akthloi thiimpu leh Pharisi in jamata maboomma, anson, “Inih in kha itloh usame? Alamva mahmii in daang jikcha ampaangpei.
Nga tloh a oinanga atloh ita maja maleva, mii naamte in amahta amilot usa, cheva Rome na akchek amneh in thlenga inihtu akseeng amunleh inih jaatboomta inimmaang usa.”
Chuta ankaarna inkhat mah kumma akthloi thiimpu akvei Kaiphas in ankuunga asonei, “Nannihva jakhatkho romnohchou;
mah chuvah nannaamte nanmaang ngutva mii khat athih in jaatboom anaam amaangchunga ralla thranohme.”
Mah i amah atak turellakhop sonnoh, chuta mahkum chunna akthloi thiimpu aveilai Jisu in jaatboom turella thituta matsah a alouphoongpei,
amah jaatboom relna khop noh, chuta inthek invorh a ak am Ringpu vaa asaeita veikhat inlenga athlenna turelna.
Chunna mahni khannata mathronna amahta khatloh a ithat umeta intelsei.
Machunna alamveia, Jisu in Judi ankaar a indanga sehloon tlohnohsa, chuta rapril komma am Ephraim khuupii aveella sehsa, aroi eisoh machunna amjousei.
Anmah in Jisu ta jonna, mathruunna thlaamma ngirra khatleh khat insonsei, “Nannihva jangnamidonme? Amahvah laalna buhdoonna thlengnoh usa, thlengrei ume?”
Pekva akthloi thiimpu leh Pharisi ei in akthloi trong anmithruhpei, mah chuvah “Tukhat Jisu amna akrom mii in anmah kuunga marom eiso, chunna amahta ansuurnatu.”
Mah khanna anmah in buh saaknatu amichaangpei, Martha in amahta rou atloh, che Lajaras kho anmah ankaar a tebor a inbok.
Meri in amanchaal amrimtui akseeng nata ansoor thaochuta alohche, Jisu akeh a polh a asamma anuul; mah innchu thao anrim in sipsa.
Chuta amah aroi ankaarna Judas Iskariot in (amahta akjuursam mii) ason,
“Jarella amanchaal thao i reija inthum denaria juura anranriingta malannohme?”
Amah asonni, anranriingta madonna sonnoh, alamva amahvah inrumii; amah in skhao achoih, amah skhao nata loua ahuuina.
Jisu in ason, “Akroua mahro, keita kanphuumna turella machaang thlaangso.
Nannihva inranriingsoh injomma amjouchou, chuta nannihva injomma keisoh amjou nohchou.”
Jisu in mah khanna amsa ta anrompeia Judi miitam in mahkhan thlengsei, Jisu khop relna noh a chuta Lajaras thinata amringkho annatu thlengsei.
Chunna Lajaras kho anthanatu akthloi thiimpu in inchaangsei,
jarelna tihva amah in alamveia Judi jikcha in ajea seh a Jisu ta amilotpei.
Chunna anmah in tuum abaak anchoihche amahta intuukpinatu inthruh a, onga anson, “Hosanna! Akpu minga akthlengkha, Ringpu in doi amlan! Israel Kurungta Ringpu in doi amlan!”
Anjihkha atlungnatu, Jisu in samong aruulchunga chuungsa;
“Intrinohro, Jaion vaa asakumei; Anro, nang kurung in samong aruulchung chuunga thlengsa!”
Amah aroi in matsahva mah i romnoh ei; chuta Jisu ta paar amthrat inva, anmah in intheihsei mah chuvah mah naamte i amahturel injihkhata akuunga suuksa.
Chunna akthi Lajaras rusuunata amring laia akmuh mii naamte in mahchuta sakhi amilan.
Amah in daang atlohkhata antheih rella mii khalmo tam in amahta intuukpi seh ei.
Pharisi in khatleh khat insonsei. “Nannihva jakhatkho tlohcheknoh sachou; anve tukleiram in amahta aknu anjuihpei.”
Anmah in Kalili suunga am Bethsaida na Philip kuunga sehsei, che amahta anson, “Lulok, kannih in Jisu ta kanmuhja.”
Philip in seh a Andriu ta ason; Andriu in Philip soh sehjoua Jisu kuunga ansonpei.
Jisu in ankuunga amsangei. “Miivaa Asa kupakha paar amthratnatu laikha thlengsa.
Ta tak a keiin nankuunga kisonchou, kehu ahuui in thaleichunga atlaakche athihnohmiil ngata amning; chuta mahkhan athuuche ringa moonga akrahtam inrahning.
Tunangkhat in amah achaanta arilvole maangtu tlasa, che tunangkhat in mah tukleiramna chaan ita intirhle ache amnoh a am veitu.
Tunangkhat in keita rou keitlohle, amah in kei kiknuta ajuihtu tla; che keiin kiamna a, kei roijuikho amtuei; tunangkhat in keita rou keitlohle, Pa in amahta injahtu.
Pa o, nang nikmingta paar kamthrat.” Cheva ringram tingna hou inkhat thlengsa, “Keiin maita paarthra kamveipei, che keiin veikhatlakho paarthra kamveitu.”
Akomma angir miitam in mahchuta antheihpei che anson, mah chuvah khuu inrining. Aktlei in anson, “Ringroi inkhat in amahkuunga trongsa.”
Jisu in amsang, “Mah hou i nannih turella thleng, kei turelna noh.
Pekva tukleiramta pichaar tlohnatu laikha thlengsa, pekva tuktleiram chunga akpaalta amnom usa;
che keita thaleinata achunga keidomlaia, miinaamtekho keikuunga kdomtuei.”
Amah in maita asonnava keiin thitungta amromna.
Miitam in akuunga amisang, “Trongsuur nata kannih in kantheihva Khrista va ache amnoh a amtu. Khatloh a miivaa Asa kupata achungting adomtu nitihme? Miivaa Asa kupachu khome?”
Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Akvaar in nannihsoh inruuia kak amtu. Akvaar in nannihsoh amlai sehloon tlohve, chunohleva inthim in nanichektu; inthim kaara akseh mii in ramma seh angme tihkha romnoh.
Nankaar a akvaar in a amlai, akvaarta malotve, chunna nannih in akvaarvaa asa nanveinatu, akvaarta malotve.”
Jisu in mahchuta asonche, anmah ankuungnata insengsa.
Anmah anmaikunga daang jikcha tlohslakho, anmah in malotnoh ei;
Mah anaamte i ringraan Isaiah in asonkhata atlungna turelna: “Akpu, tunang in inih itrongsonta amilotpeime, che tukuunga Akpu kutbaangta amdang peime?”
Alamchunna anmah in malot cheknoh ei. Alamva Isaiah in inlenga ason,
“Amah in anmah anmitta amchohpei che anmah amilung amtrangpei, chunna anmit in anmuhnoh natu, che anmah anril in anromnoh natu, che kikuunga inhei tuveia kamthrattuei.”
Mahtrongi Isaiah in asonpei, alamva amah paarthra i amuhrella trongsa.
Chuslakho mii aktam aktloh akhal inkho amahta anmilotpei, chuta anmah in Pharisi eita antrih in alamveia seenga phoong cheknoh ei, chunohleva anmahta sinakok nata aminomtuei;
alamva Ringpu in amdon khachunga mii in andomta ralthloia anmah in andit.
Che tunangkhat in keita keimuhle keita kamthlah amahta amuhpei.
Keiin tukleiramma akvaar veia thlengsang, chunna tunangkhat keita kamlot mii in anthimma amnohtu.
Tunangkhat in keiin kisonta atheihche arilla sihnohle, amahta keiin pichaar tlohnohtung; alamva keiin tukleiramta pichaar tlohnatu thlengnoh ang chuta tukleiramta kalnatu thlengsang.
Keita keijanoh mahche keiin kisonta roulounohle amahkuunga pichaar am; mah chuvah keiin kisontrong khanna achenia amahtu pichaar veitu.
Alamva kei kichek kamneh a trongnoh ang; chuta keiin jangta kisontu che trongtung tihkha keita kamthlah Pa atak in trongthuun keikuunga kamlanang.
Che amah trongthuunva ache amnoh chaansa ta krom. Alamchunna, keiin kson trongi Pa in kikuunga asonta trongsang.”
Che anmah in buhdoon ansaaksuunga, Simon asa kupa Judas Iskariot arilsuunga Jisu ta ajurhnatu seitan in chuungsa.
Jisu Apa in anaamte akut a amlanpei khatkho Ringpu kuungnata thlengsang che Ringpu kuunga sehla usang ta aromin,
buhdoonnata inthoua, apuunta akomma asihche amah anaamta puunthreh ah inraaksa.
Cheva kuteenga tuii asuungche, aroi ankehta chaam amthronpei, che anraakna puunthreh a anuulei.
Amah in Simon Pitar kuunga thlengsa; che Pitar in akuunga ason, “Akpu, nangin kikehta nichaam samme?”
Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Keiin kitlohsam i ipek nangin romnohche, chuta aknua nirom umang.”
Pitar in akuunga ason, “Nangin kilehta chaam janohluungtu.” Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Keiin nikehta nakchaamnoh angleva nangva kei kiroinohche.”
Simon Pitar in akuunga ason, “Akpu kikeh khop noh chuta kikutleh kikangkho.”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Tuii insilche mii khavah chaamnatu darkaar amnoh, akeh khopta inchaam uning, chuta amahvah anaamtea seengsa; che nannihva seengsachou, chuta nannaamte vanohchou.”
Alamva amahta akjuursam atak in arom; mah kharella amah in ason, “Nannihva nannaamte seengnohchou.”
Nannih in keita Lulok mahche Akpu ta nan ongang; nannih chimchou, alamva kei i amahtalsang.
Chunna keiin nannihtu Akpu mahche Lulokho veia, nankehta chaamsangle, nannihkho khatleh khat nankeh inchaamve.
Alamva keiin nankuunga kitloh kikhal khananga, nannihkho nantloh nankhalnatu athlou veia kammuhpeichou.
Keiin nankuunga atak a kisonchou, ‘Roijuih inkhat in amah Akpuchunga ralla liinnoh; che akseh inkho amahta amthlah chunga ralla liinnoh.’
Mah kisonita nannih in romchoule, che maita tloh chouleva nannihva doiphah veisachou.
Keiin nannaam turel trongnoh ang, keiin kacharkha keiin krom; mah chuvah ringjihkhata atlungnatu, ‘Keitol aksaa amah in keita kandah a kichunga akeh athoongpei.’
Mah i asuuknoh maa a, ipek nankuunga kisonpeichou, chunna mahchu asuuklaiva keisang tihkha nannih in keita namilotnatu mah thloui kitlohpei.
Keiin nankuunga atatak a kisonchou, ‘Keiin tukhat kamthlahmii khata ja a aklou mii in keita kanloh peiang; che nannih inta keita keilou choule keita kamthlahmii khata nanlohpei.’ ”
Amah in tukuunga trongme anromnoh in, aroi in khatleh khat in ansei.
Jisu in aroi ankaarna arilvol inkhat in Jisu avonna inbeia am.
Chunna Simon Pitar in akuunga inruk a ason, “Amah in turella trongme, ruiro.”
Chunna Jisu avonna inbeia am mii in akuunga ason, “Akpu, mahmiichu tume?”
Jisu in amsang, “Keiin tol akir phuumma kamlansam mii khasa.” Nga tloh a amah in tol akirta aphuumche, Simon Iskariot asa kupa Juda ta amlanpei.
Tol akirta amlanche aknua, seitan in akuunga luutsa. Jisu in akuunga ason. “Nitlohsamchu inthademma tlohrosa.”
Mah i jarella amahkuunga asonme ta ipek tebor a anbok tukhat inkho romnoh ei.
Alamva Juda vah skhao aksih taningva. “Ujou hoongna turella inihtu darkaar am leiro,” chunohle anranriing kuunga malanrota Jisu in akuunga asonbrata arouin amidon.
Chunna tol akirta alohche, kak hanga amah in inthruhsa; mahchu khulouh na.
Che Ringpu vaa paarthrata amah apaalla madangle, chuleva Ringpu in miiva Asa kupata atak in kak hanga paar amthrattu
Andih naoeio, lai kaksuunga nannihsoh amjousang. Nannih in keita nanjontung; che Judi ankuunga keiin kisonnanga keiin ipek kisonchou, ‘Keiin kisehna samma nannih in thlengcheknoh uchou.’
Akthar trongthuun khat keiin nankuunga kamlanchou, mah chuvah keiin nannihta kirilvol nangchoua, nannih khatleh khat ril involve
Nannih inta khatleh khat ril involchoule, miinaam in nannih i kei kiroi chouta naniromtu.”
Pitar in amahkuunga ason, “Akpu, jarelna keiin ipektal nakjuih cheknoh tungme? Nangturel keichaan kamthlahtu.”
Jisu in amsang, “Keiturel nichaan namthlahchek ume? Keiin nikuunga atak a kisonche, nangin keita nandahna veithum aphahnohmiil, aarkhong in khak inkhuungnohtu.”
“Nannih nanril malah a insuk inhal tlohnohve, Ringpu ta malotve, keikho kamlotve.
Kei Pa inna khum tam am; chunohleva, keiin ksonche uchou mah chuvah keiin nannih turella amunkhat amchaang sehtung?
Che keiin nannih turella seh a amunkhat machaang sangleva, keiin veikhat thlenglatung che kei kiamna a nannikho nan amnatu kloh uchou, chunna keiin kiamna a nannihkho am uchou.
Che keiin ramma seh angme nannih in lamkha nanrom.”
Thomas in akuunga ason, “Akpu, nang ramma sehsam cheme kannih in romnoh ung, che khatloh a kannih in lamchu kanromchek ume?”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Lam khakho, akchim khakho, mahche akring khakho keisang; keinoh avah tukhat inkho Pa kuunga thlengnoh tuei.
Nannih inta keita keirom chouleva, kei Pakho nanrom uta; ipekva nannih in amahta nanrompei che nanmuhpei.”
Philip in amahkuunga ason, “Akpu, Pa ta kanimmuhro, che kannih in peltu ung.”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Khalmo soot a keiin nannihsoh inruuijousang, che ipekphah keita keiroomnoh mangchoume? Keita keimuh miikhan Pakho amuhpei; nangin khatloh a Pa ta kammuhro ta nisonmangme?
Keiin Pa kuunga ammangche Pa in keikuunga amta malotnoh cheme? Keiin nankuunga kisontrongi kei kikrou kichek kamneh a trongnoh ang, chuta keikuunga ak am Pa in athlouta atloh.
Keiin Pa kunga che Pa in keikuunga amta kamlotro; chunohle kei kthloukhanna malotro.
Keiin atatak a nankuunga kisonchou, keita kamlot amah in keiin ktlohthoukha amah inkho atlohtu; che maichunga akliin thloukho amah inkho atlohtu, alamva keiin Pa kuunga sehsang.
Bilam nannih inta keiminga nihchoule mahkha keiin kitlohtu, chunna Apa in Asakuunga paar amthrattu;
bilam nannih inta keiminga nihchoule, mahkha keiin kitlohtu.”
Che keiin Pa kuunga kingentu, che nannihsoh ache amnoh a amjounatu amah in aktleikhat Nanichaaktu amthlahtu.
Tukleiram inkho phah acheknoh akchim Li, mah chuvah tukleiram inva muhkho muhnoh mahche romkho romnoh, chuta nannihva amahta nanrom; alamva amah in nannihsoh inruuia amtu che nanrilsuunga amtu.
“Keiin nannihta sarahsa naoleeng nanga nanimah nohtung; keiin nankuunga thlengtung.
Tukleiram in lai kak aknua keita keimuhnoh uchou, chuta nannih in keita nanmuh latung; alamva keiin ringsang, nannihkho ring uchou.
Mahni chunna keiin Pa ninga ammang, che keiin nannih ninga ammangta nanromtu.
Kei trongthuunta akjuih amah in, keita aril kamvol ang; che keita keirilvol amahta Pa inkho arilvoltu, che keiin amahta kirilvolla kitaktalta kammuhtu.”
Judas (Iskariot khanoh) in akuunga ason, “Akpu, khatloh a kankuunga nitaktalta nammuhsam ungme, tukleiram avah mamunohtung nitihme?”
Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Mii khat inta keita keirilvolle, amah in kitrong amjuihtu, che Pa in amahta aril involtu, che inih in amahkuunga thlenga che amahsoh inih in itloh ikhaljoutu.
Tunangkhat in keita keirilvolnohle kitrongta majuihnohtu; che nannih in nantheih trongi kei ningnanoh chuta keita kamthlah Pa kuungna.”
“Keiin nannihsoh kiamjoulai mah i trongsang.
Chuta keiminga Pa in nannihta Nanichaak Li Akseeng amthlahtu, amah in nannihta anaamte nanimtheih a keiin kson anaamte ikho nanrilla nantheihnatu atlohtu.
Leh oi nankuunga kmahchou; kei leh oi nankuunga kamlanchou; keiin kamlanchou i tukleiram in nanimlan khanangnoh. Nannih nanrilla insuk inhal tlohnohve, che intrikho intrinohve.
Nankuunga ksonkha nannih in nantheihpei, ‘Keiin sehtung, mahche nankuunga thlenglatung.’ Nannih in keita keirilvol choule, keiin Pa kuunga kisehsam i nanroomthoktu, alamva Pa in keichunga liin.
Che anaamte i asuuknoh amaa a keiin nankuunga kisonpeichou, chunna mah i asuuklai nannih in namilotnatu.
Keiin nannihsoh tam trongnoh usang, alamva tukleiram akpuui in thlengsa. Amah in keichunga ralla atuui amnoh;
chuta Pa in kikuunga trongthuun amlankhata kitlohning; chunna Pa ta kirilvol tih a tukleiram in anromtu. Inthouvesa onnata sehrasei.”
Akrah amnoh keikuunga ak am abaak anaam amah in atan, anrahsam abaakva ralla anraahnatu amseengche ralla akrah inrah.
Keiin nankuunga kitrongin nannihva seengsachou.
Keikuunga amve, che keiin nankuunga amtung. Ngangli in akuungsoh inkeihnoh a abaak akroua inrah cheknoh nanga, nannih in keisoh nan amnohmiil inrah cheknoh uchou.
Keiva ngangli khasang, nannihva abaak sachou. Tukhat in keininga amleh, che keiin amahninga am angle, amahvah tam inrahtu, alamva keinoh a nannih in jakhatkho tlohcheknoh uchou
Tukhat in keininga amnohle, abaak tanna ilonche chaar nanga chaar uchou; che akchaar abaak eita matlonna meikaara thlaak a mahchu kaangsei
Nannih inta keininga amchoule, che kei kitrongta nankuunga amle, nannih in nannihja nihve, che mahchu nankuunga veitu.
Nannih in tam nanrah khanna Pa ta paar amthratpei; chunna nannih in kei kiroi veisachou ta seenga namimuhpei
Pa in keita aril kamvol khananga, keiinkho nannihta kiril involchou; kei rilvolkhanna inpotnoh a amve.
Keiin Pa trongthuun eita ngaak a che amah arilvolkhan kiam nanga, nannih inkho kitrongthuun eita ngaakchoule, kei rilvolkhan ipotnoh a am uchou.
Kei kroomthok asipnatu, mah ita nankuunga ksonpeichou.
Tukhat in amah apai turella achaan amthlahchung, ralla akliin rilvol tukhat kuungkho amnoh.
Kei trongthuun ita majuih choule, nannih i kei kipaichou.

Maicheva keiin nannihta roijuihta naniongnoh usang, alamva roijuih in amah akpu in jangthlouta atlohme romnoh; chuta keiinva nannihta kipaita kiongpeichou, alamva Pa kuungnata ktheih anaam nankuunga kamrom peichou.

Nannih in keita keichar nohchou, chuta keiin nannihta kcharpeichou mahche thlou kithun peichou chunna nannih in seh a akrah nanrahnatu che akrah in nannihsoh amjounatu; chunna bilam Pa kuunga keiminga nichoule, mahchu amah in nankuunga nanimlantu.
Mah i nankuunga kei trongthuunsa, nannih khatleh khat ril involve.”

Nannih inta tukleiramna choule, tukleiram in amah ata veia nannihta nanirilvoltu; alamva nannihva tukleiram nanohchou; chuta keiin nannihta tukleiram nata kichar peichou, churella tukleiram in nannihta nantirh.
‘Roijuih inkhat in amah akpuchunga liinnoh’ ta nankuunga kson trongkha intheihve, anmah in keita keichut eileh, nannihta nanichutpei; anmah in kitrongta majuih eileh, nantrongkho amijuihtu.
Chuta mah naamte i keirella nankuunga antlohtu, alamva keita kamthlah amahta anmah in romnoh ei.
Keiinta thlengnoh a che ankuunga trongnoh angleva, anmah anleh amnoh uta, chuta ipekva anmah anlehva ip janoh usa.
Keita kantirh amah in Pakho intirhsa.
Tukhat inkho atlohnoh thlouta keiin ankaar a tloh sangleva, anmah anleh amnoh uta; chuta ipekva anmah in Pa leh keita muhkho kanimuhpei, che kannihta kanintirkho kanintihrsei.
Mah i anmah trongsuura anjih trongkhat a atlungnatu relnasa, mahchuva, ‘Jakhat khonoh ah anmah in keita kantirhsei.’
Chuta Pa kuungnata keiin nankuunga kamthlahsam Nanimjoom athlenglai, akchimva Li inkho Pa kuungnata athlenglai, amah in keirella sakhi amlannatu,
che nannih inkho sakhichou, alamva mathron lainata nannihva keisoh inruuijoume.”
“Nankeh narilnoh natu mah i keiin nankuunga ksonpeichou.
Anmah in nannihta sinakok nata nanimnomtu, nannihta nanithatmii tunangkhat in Ringpu kuunga mathruunnatu kannihta kanimlan peita amidon laikha atak a thlengsa.
Chunna mah i antlohtu alamva anmah in Pa khatkho keita keiroomnoh ei.
Anmah anpungchu athleng laia nannih in nantheihnatu mah i ksonpeichou.
“Alamva keiin nannihsoh kiamjou rella, mahlaiva trongi nankuunga sonnoh ang.
Chuta pekva keita kamthlah amahkuunga seh usang; chuta nankaarna tukhat inkho keita ‘Ram sehsam cheme’ ta keiruinoh noh uchou.
Chulata mah i nankuunga kisonrella nannih nanril klah a sipsachou.
Chuslakho keiin akchimta nankuunga kisonchou: nannihtu athratna veinatu keiin seh ang, keiin sehnoh angleva, nannihta Nanimjoom thlengnohtu; chuta keiin seh a mahkha nankuunga kamthlahtu.
Che amah in athlenglaia, tukleiramvaa aleh, akchimlamseh khatkho pichaar rella sonna bahap amthlaktuei:
alamva aleh amrella, anmah in keita kamlotnohsei;
akchimlamseh amrella, alamva Pa kuunga kei seh usang che veikhat keita keimuhnoh usachou;
trongtloh latloh rella, alamva tukleiram akpu ita amilotpei.
“Keiin nankuunga kisontu tam am, chuta mahchu nannih relva tammal usa.

Akchim Li khan athleng laia, mah akchim khanna nannihta nanichingtu; alamva amah akrou akchek amneh khanna trongnohtu, chuta amah in atheihkhata trongtu, che akthlengsam anaamte turel nankuunga nanimromtu.
Amah in keita paar kamthrattung, alamva amah in kikuungnata alohche nankuunga nanimromtu.
Pa in asih anaammte keita; alamchunna kisonpeichou keikuungna anaam alohche nankuunga mahchu nanimromtu.”
Chunna arouin khatleh khat insonsei, “Kak amche aknua nannih in keita keimuhnoh usachou, che veikhatla kak amche aknua nanmuh latung; ‘Alamva Pa kuunga sehsang.’ Amah i jaknang trongta asonna meio?”
Anmah in anson, “ ‘Kak amche aknua’ atihna i jaknang trongta asonname? Jarelna trongme kannihva romnohsung.”

Amahkuunga anruija khata Jisu in aromma, ankuunga asonei, “Kak amche aknua, nannih in keita keimuhnoh usachou, che veikhatla kak amche aknua nanmuh latungta keiin nankuunga kisonrel nanroua inrui sachoume?”
Keiin nankuunga atatak a kisonchou, nannih in marhuuia trap uchou, chuta tukleiram inva aroomthoktu; nannih in klah knang nanphahtu, chuta nannih in nanlah nannangkha roomthokting in oltu.
Kumei in nao amuhtumma klah, alamva amah apungkha thlengsa; chuta amah in nao apoknua, tukleiramma mii khat poksa ta aroomthok rella amah in alah anangkha veikhat intheihnoh.
Mainanga ipek nannihkho klah knang nanphah, chuta keiin nannihsoh veikhat inmuhlatung che nanril aroomthoktu, chuche nanroomthok kha tukhat inkho nankuungnata nanilounohtu.
Mah akni achunna nannih in keikuunga jakhatkho keinihnoh usachou. Keiin nankuunga atatak a kisonchou, nannih in keiminga Pa kuunga nannihja nihchoule, mahchu nanimlantu.
Ipekphah nannih in keiminga jakhatkho keinihnoh mangchou; nihve, che nanphahtu, chunna nannih nanroomthok kha atlungnatu.
Mahni chunna nannih in keiminga nannihtu. Keiin nannih turel kipakuunga kinihtuta sonnoh ang;
alamva nannih in keita nanringvolang chuche kei i Ringpu kuungnata thlengsang ta namilot.
Kei Pa kuungnata thlengsang che tukleiram a thlenglasang; veikhatla tukleiram kamthlahche kipakuunga sehlatung.”
Amah aroi in anson, “Oi, ipekva ahoong trongnoh a indanga trong sache.
Bilam anaamte nangin niromkir che tunang inkhat in nangkuunga nakrui amnohta ipekva kannih in kanrompei; ohchunna nangi Ringpu nata thlengcheta kamilotpeiche.”
Jisu in ankuunga amsang, “Ipekva namilot peime?”
Nannih in inthek invorh uchouva, keirouta nanmahnatu laikha thlengusa, atak a, thlengkho thlengsa.
Nannih in kikuunga leh oi nanphahnatu, mah i nankuunga kisonchou. Tukleiramma klah knang nanphah chuta nanril matrangve; keiin tukleiramta kichekpei.
nangin miinaamtetu tuui namlannanga, ache amnoh chaankho akuunga malanro.
Mahche akchim Ringpu inkhatruta che nangin namthlah Jisu Khrista ta anmah in anromnatu, mah i ache amnoh chaan khasa.
Keiin kitlohnatu thloukha kikuunga namlan angkha kimchepeia, thaleichunga nangta paarthra kamliin peiche;
Che ipekva Pa, tukleiram seemnoh amaa a nangsoh inruuia kei paarthra louam khanna nangkuunga keita paarthra kamveiro.
“Tukleiram nata kikuunga namlanmii ankuunga keiin nikmingla kamdangpei; anmahchuva nangtasei, mahche nangin anmahta kikuunga namlan peiang, che anmah in nitrongta antak ah ansihpei.
Ipekva nangin bilam kikuunga namlan anaamte; nangtingna ta anmah in anrom;

alamva nangin kikuunga namlan trong eita anmah kuunga kamlanpei, chuche anmah in mahchuta louloua, keiin nikuungnata thlengsang ta anmah inkho chimma anrompei, mahche nangin keita namthlah angta anmah inkho amilotpei.
Keiin anmah turella kingen; keiin tukleiram turella ngennoh ang, chuta nangin kikuunga namlan anmah turelna, alamva anmahva nangnitasei,
Kei kita anaamte i nang nitasa, che nang nimii eikho kei ktasei, che keiin anmahninga paarthra kphahpei.

Che ipekva kei tukleiramma amnoh usang, chuta anmahva tukleiramma am umangei, che kei nikuunga thlengsang. Akseeng Pa, inih in khalek iveinanga anmahkho anveinatu, kikuunga namlan anmahta nangminga kem eiro.
Keiin anmahsoh kiamlaiva, kikuunga namlanche anmahta nang nikminga kikemmei; che keiin anmahta kikoollei, ringjih trongkha atlungnatu akmaangvaa asa kupa khanoh a, anmah tukhatkho maangnoh ei.
Chuta ipekva kei nikuunga thlengsang, che anmah antak a kei kroomthok mathlungnatu keiin tukleiramma trongsang.
Keiin nang nitrongta ankuunga kamlanei; che tukleiram in anmahta intirhsei alamva keiva tukleiram nanoh ang mah khananga, anmahkho tukleiram nanoh ei.
Keiin anmahta tukleiram nata lou eirota nikuunga ngennoh ang, chuta anmahta thranoh khannata kem eirota kingenche.
Keiva tukleiram nanoh ang mah khananga, anmahkho tukleiram nanoh ei.
Anmahta akchimma maseeng eiro; nang nitrongva akchim.
Keita tukleiramma namthlah angkha mah khananga keiinkho anmahta tukleiramma kamthlah ei.
Alamva anmahta akchimma inkatnatu, anmah rella kei kitakho inkatsang.
“Anmah relna khop keiin ngennoh ang, chuta anmah antrong apaalla keita kamlot anmah turelnakho kingen,
Mahche anmah annaam khalek anveinatu; nangin keita namthlah angta tukleiram in amilotnatu, Pa o, nangin keikuunga che keiin nikuunga kiam nanga, anmah inkho nikuunga an amnatu keiin kingenche.
Inih in khalek iveinanga anmah inkho khalek anveinatu, kikuunga namlan paarthrakha keiin anmah ankuunga kamlanpei,

Keiin anmah kuunga che nangin kikuunga niam anmah in mapungpha a khalek veinatu relna, chunna nangin keita namthlah peiang che niril namvol peiang, mah khananga anmahta nangin nirilvolsei ta tukleiram in aromnatu relna.
Pa, tukleiram mathronnoh amaanata nangin keita niril namvol anga, nangin kikuunga namlan paarthra khata kikuunga namlanmii ankuungakho amnatu, kei kiamna aphomma anmahkho keisoh amjou kikdit.
Akchim Pa, tukleiram invah nangta nakromnoh ei, chuta keiinva krompeiche; che nangin keita namthlah angta anmah inkho anrompei.
Nangin keita niril namvol angkha anmah ankuungakho amnatu, che keiin anmah ankuungakho kiamnatu, nang nikminga anmahta kamrompei ei, chela kamromla umangei.”
Ipek Akpu ta akjuur Judas inkho amunkha arom; alamva Jisu in amunchunna injomma aroisoh antuukna.
Chunna Judas in raalmii leh akthloi thiimpu tingnata aklok ste che Pharisi eisoh mitton khatkho chemsoh inruuia mahchunna sehsei.
Chunna Jisu in mah naamte i atakchunga suuksam aromrella, anmaatonga avache asonei, “Tuta nanjonme?”
Anmah in anmisang, “Najareth na Jisu.” Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Keitalsang.” Amahta akjuur Judas kho anmahsoh ngirjoua am.
Amah in ankuunga, “Keitalsang,” ta asonlai annunga inlenga tukleichunga inriilsei.
Amah in veikhat inlenga ankuunga aruiei, “Tuta nanjonme?” Che anmah in ansonpei, “Najareth na Jisu.”
Jisu in amsang, “Keisangta, nankuunga ksonpeichou; nannih in keita keijonchoule, miiei i inlengeiso.”
Mahtrongi atlungna turel amah in trongsa, “Keita kamlan ankaarna tukhatta sulla mamaangnohtung.”
Chunna Simon Pitar in achoih chemta akjuukche, akthloi thiimpu vaa aroi akchangtong amkurta apheklokpei. Naichi chuva akmingva Malkhus.
Jisu in Pitar kuunga ason, “Nang chemkha akhumsuungah thunro; Pa in keikuunga amlan kammi keiin innohtupot angme?”
Mansahremma amahta Annas kuunga anthlen; alamva mahkum achunna amahvah akthloi thiimpu Kaiphas vaa apu.
Kaiphas in Judi naamte thitu ngut ah mii khat athih in thloia thratuta akson miikhare.
chuta Pitar vah thong apaalla ngirra am. Chunna akthloi thiimpusoh inrom aktlei aroi inkhat in inthruh a, che thong akngaak kumeikuunga asonche Pitar ta asuunga amluutpi.
Thong akngaak rungaakhan Pitar ta ason, “Nangkho amah aroi ankaarna inkhatnoh cheme?” Amah in ason, “Keiva amahnoh ang.”
Ipek roijuih leh phrangki eiva khalmo ksikrella meihol meita luh a inhiilla ngirra antak malumma amsei. Pitar kho anmahsoh jouta mei oh a am.
Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Keiin tukleiramma indanglonga trongsang; lai amrel Judi in anboom anboomna sinakok jikcha a mahche mathruunna thlaamma kamtheih ei, keiin inruk akson amnohluung.
Jarelna nakruiangme? Keiin jangta kisonme aktheih anmah in anromtu, anmah kuunga ruieive.”
Mah ita asonsoh, akomma akngir phrangki ankaarna inkhat in Jisu amaipiia akbeengche ason “Oinanga nangin akthloi thiimpu kuunga namsangtu phume?”
Jisu in amsang, “Keiin chimnohta trong khonoh ang, chimnoh a sonnoh ang; chuta keiin chimma trong sangleva, jarelna nakbeeng angme?”
Chunna Akpu ta khit a Annas in thiimpu aklok Kaiphas kuunga amthlahpei.
Pitar in amkur apheklok roijuihvaa unao khat in arui, “Nangkho amahsoh inruuia thakbilla sehjoua kimuhmii khanohcheme?”
Mahchuta Pitar in veikhatla indahlasa, mah laitalla aarkhong inkhuungsa.
Chunna Pilat in inthruh a ankuunga asonei, “Mahmii i jaknang alaal amrelna nanthlenpeime?”
Amahkuunga amisang, “Mahmii in thranoh atloh amnohleh, nangkuunga thlennoh tu ung.”
Pilat in ankuunga asonei, “Nantaksaak in amahta phurh a, nannih trongsuur nujuih a pichaar tlohve.” Judi in amahkuunga anson “Tunangmii khatta that aja tih a kankuunga rai amnoh.”
Mah i Jisu in jaknang hoonga thi umeta ason trongkhata atlungnatu suuksa.
Chunna Pilat in amah koolla veikhat aluutche Jisu ta onga arui, “Nangi Judiei kurung cheme?”
Jisu in amsang, “Mah i nang niril suungnata nisonme, chunoh a aktlei in keirelna nikuunga ansonta trongcheme?”
Pilat in amsang, “Kei Judi angme? Nang jaatboom leh akthloi thiimpu in nangta keikuunga kanpek ang. Nangin jangnitloh relname?”
Jisu in amsang, “Kei kurung ramva tukleiram nanoh; kei kurung rammi tukleiram naleh, keita Judi ankut a kamlannoh tuei, kei roijuih in raal antlohpi tuei; chuta kei kurung rammi tukleiram nanoh.”

Pilat in akuunga ason, “Chule nangvah kurung cheme?” Jisu in amsang, “Keiva kurungang tih a nangin nisonpei. Akchimkhata sakhi kamlannatu mairelna keiin poksang, Akchim akveimii in kei kihou antheih.”
Pilat in akuunga ason, “Akchimmi khome?”
Mah ita asonche, Judi ankuunga veikhat inthruh a asonei, “Keiin amahchunga jakhat amaraal tuuknoh ang khame.
Chuta laalna buhdoon aknia nannih turella keiin miikhatta mathlahnatu nannih kastam am; Judiei kurungi nannih turella keiin mathlah nanditme?”
Anmah in ong onga amisang, “Mahmii inoh chuta Barabbas ta” – Ipek Barabbas vah inrumii.
Mahlai Pilat in Jisu ta alohche khalmo amhaipei.
Che raalmii in kuling lukhum ansakche, akanga amikhumpei, che kdukpuun amisilh;
amahkuunga thlenga anson, “Judiei kurungo, kamithruunche!” Mahche amaia anbeeng.
Mahchun Pilat in veikhat apaal inthruh a ankuunga asonei, “Anve, mahmii in chimnoh thlou atloh jakhatkho tuuknoh ang tih a nanromnatu, nankuunga kithlenchou.”
Chunna Jisu in kuling lukhum khumma che kdukpuun silh a inthruhsa. Pilat in ankuunga asonei, “Anve, miikha onna amsa!”

Akthloi thiimpu leh phrangkiei in Jisu ta anmuh in ongsei, “Amahta mathluve, amahta mathluve!” Pilat in ankuunga asonei, “Mahmii i nannihtal in phurh a mathluve, alamva keiinva achunga jakhatkho amraal tuuknoh ang.”
Judi in amahkuunga amisang, “Kannih kantrongsuur doonung, che trongsuur aknujuih a mahmii i madaiphu, alamva amah atak akroua Ringpu Asa kupa vei.”
Pilat in mahchuta atheih in thloiralla intrisa;
Amah koolsuunga veikhat aluutche Jisu ta arui, “Nangi ramna cheme?” chuta Jisu in akuunga masangnohsa.
Chunna Pilat in akuunga ason, “Nangin kikuunga trongnoh ucheme? Nangta namthlahtang chunohle namthlahnohtang kikuunga tuui amta romnoh cheme?”
Jisu in akuunga amsang, “Nangkuunga achungnata tuui namlannoh leva, nangvah kichunga tuui jakhatkho amnoh uche; mairella keita nikuunga amlan miikhava ralla akliin aleh am.”
Chunnata Pilat in Jisu ta mathlahnatu insuulsa, alamva Judi in ongsei, “Nangin mahmii ita mathlahchele, nangva Keisaar aruulnohche. Nga tloh a Keisaar chunga trongsei.”
Mahtrong chuta Pilat in atheih a, Jisu ta apaalla amthruhche Intlaap a inthah lung Hibru tronga Kabbatha antih phompii ah inboksa.
Pekva mahchu Laalna Buhdoon inchaangna aknisa; mahchu pung kurukvak tlasa. Amah in Judi ankuunga asonei, “Anve nannih kurung!”

Anmah in ongsei, “Mahmiikha phurhvesa, mahmiikha phurhvesa, amahta mathluve!” Pilat in ankuunga asonei, “Nannih kurungta keiin kimthlu ume?” Akthloi thiimpu in amisang, “Kannihvah Keisaar noh a kurung aktlei amnoh.”
Machunna amahta amithlunatu ankuunga amsilei.
Mahmun chunna, Jisu soh inruuia aktlei mii innihta veichanga, che Jisu vah alaia, thingkharh a anjampei.
Pilat inkho mingkhat majih a thingkharh chunga ataar, mah chuvah ngata anpa, “Najareth vaa Jisu, Judi vaa Kurung.”
Mah anjih i Judi mii aktam in anpaapei, alamva Jisu ta thingkharh a amithlunatu akut akeh thirkit a hemma anjamna amunvah khuuboomsoh innai, chuche anjihva Hibru, Latin che Kriik tronga amijih.
Judi vaa akthloi thiimpu in Pilat kuung anson, “Judi vaa kurung,” tih a majihnohro chuta, “Mahmii in ason, Keivah Judiei kurungang.”
Pilat in amsang, “Keiin kimjihkha kimjihchepei.”
Raalmii in Jisu amithlulai anmah in apuunreita anlohche manli amisuukpei; inkhatrel anchangnatu, Jisu alungluutkho anloh. Amah alungluutva anthruina amnoh puun.

Chunna anmah in khatleh khat insonsei, “Mah i inih in threlnohrei, chuta irasi anna tunang in changume anrei.” Mah i ringjih in asonkha atlungnasa, “Anmah in kei kpuunreita anmahkhop in insemsei, che kei kpuunreita anmah in rasi an anpei.”
Jisu in anuleh arilvol aroi in akomma ngirra am amuh a anukuung ason, “Kumeio, nisa kupata anro.”
Chela amah in aroikuunga ason, “Anro, ninu onna am.” Mah pungchunna aroi in amahta innting anlengpipei.
Mah khanna akthuur tuii sip beelkhat mangirh a ansih; chunna anmah in akthuur tuii sip hisop sung apaara putsi jemma ankhitche amah abaoa anthun.
Jisu in akthuur tuiita alohche ason, “Mah i chesa.” Che amah akang makhup a akli amthlahpei.

Alamva Inchaangnatu akni taningva, Judi in aruungta ingeihnia thingkharh chunga sih dinoh ei (alamva inngeihni i khalmo injah a ngaakna akni), churella thingkharh a amithlu miita ankeh thliknatu che anruungta mathrumnatu anmah in Pilat kuunga annih.
Chunna raalmii in thlenga matsahnakha akeh anthlikpei, che inkhatkhasoh jouta thingkharh a anbaangjoupei;
chuta anmah in Jisu kuung anthlenglai amahvah louthichesa, chunna amah akehva thliknohsei.
Chuta raalmii ankaarna inkhat in amah apanga kusei asun, che kak hanga thii leh tuii inthruhsa.
Mahchuta akmuh mii in sakhi veisei–amah sakhi i chim, che akchimta kison tiha atak in arom–chunna nannih inkho namilotnatu.
“Amah aruhva khalekho tliknohtu” ta ringjih in asonkha atlungnatu mah i suuksei.
Che veikhatla ringjih in aktlei trongjih a ason, “Amah in kusei ankhoh Akpu ta an antu.”
Chuche khulou khat a Jisu kuunga matsahrem a thlenga antuukpi Nikodimas in, Joseph soh inruuia, moroi amrimtuisoh inpool ser sopthumvak thlenna thlengsei.
Nga tloh a anmah in Jisu aruungta louva, Judiei annono mii phuumna ah anloutloh amrimtui thaosoh inruuia annaal bulapuunna amahta antuumpei.
Pek Jisu ta thingkharh ah amithluna amunkhanna thakbilkhat am, mah thakbil chunna tukhatkho anlouphuum nohna rusuun khat am.
Alamchunna Judi ei Inchaangni asuukrelna, innai rusuun khanna, anmah in Jisu ta ohkhanna ansihpei.
Chunna amah in tlaanna, Simon Pitar mahche Jisu in arilvol aktlei aroi ankuunga seh a ansonei, “Anmah in Akpu ta rusuunnata anlohche ramma ansih peitame kannih in romnohsung.”
Chunna Pitar in aktlei aroisoh inthruh a anmah in rusuuntonga sehsei.
Anmah annih a tlaanjousei, chuta aktlei aroi in Pitar ta aralche matsah a rusuunna tlungsa;
che inkhup a ahunbirh in, amah in bulapuun am amuh, chuta asuungva luutnoh.
Cheva Simon Pitar thlenga, amah aknu juihveia rusuun suunga luutsa; anmah in bulapuun am anmuhpei,
che amah akang anthlomnava bulapuun soh amjounoh chuta ajea inlumma am.
Che matsah a rusuun akphah aktlei aroi in asuunga luutsa, che amuhpeia amlotpei;
alamva amah in ringtu ta Ringjih in asonkha, anmah in romnoh mangei.
Cheva aroi in innting inlengsei.
Chuta Meri vah rusuun apaalla ngirra trapsa, che amah in trap malamma rusuun asuunga inkhup a a an;
chunna amah in inngoua inliing ringroi innih, Jisu aruung antolhna a inkhat in aluuthlunga che inkhat in akehthluunna inbok a am amuh ei.
Anmah in akuunga anson, “Kumei nang jarella trapcheme?” Amah in ankuunga asonei, “Alamva anmah in kei Akpu ta anlohpei, che amahta ramma ansihpeime romnohsang.”
Mahchuta asonche anhei in, Jisu ngirra am amuhpei, chuta amah invah mahkha Jisu sa tih a romnohsa.
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Kumei, jarella trapcheme? Tuta nijonme?” Amahta thakbil akngaak mii meta akuunga ason “Lulok, nangin amahta loucheleva keisonro, ramma nisihpeime, keiin amahta loutang.”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Meri.” Amah in inheia akuunga Hibru tronga ason, “Rabboni!” (arthava Lulok).

Jisu in akuunga ason, “Keita kamtuhnohro, alamva Pa kuunga kalnoh ma ang; chuta kei kiuh kinao ankuunga seh a soneiro, keiin Pa kuunga khatkho nannih nan Pa kuunga, kei Ringpu kuunga khatkho nannih Ringpu kuunga kalsam ma ang.”
Chunna Meri Makadalini in seh a aroi ankuunga asonei, “Keiin Akpu ta kimuhpei” che amah in Meri Makadalili kuunga ason naamte anmah ankuunga atongpei.
Mahchu asonche, amah akut innihleh apangneemkho ammuh ei. Cheva aroi in Akpu ta anmuh in anroomthoksei.
Jisu in veikhat inlenga ankuunga asonei, “Leh oi in nannihta nanimruui veiso. Pa in keita kamthlah nanga, keiinkho nannihta kamthlahpeichou.”
Mahchuta asonche ankuunga akphuk seemma asonei, “Akseeng Li phahve.
Nannih in tunangkhatvaa alehta ipchoule, anmah anlehta in ipsei; anmahta nannih in ipnohchoule, anmah anlehta in ipnohsei.”
Chunna aktlei aroi in akuunga anson, “Kannihva Akpu kanmuhpei.” Chuta ankuunga ason, “Keiin amah akut a thirkit amun mahche thirkit akhur a kikut majungin kipuurnohmiil, keiva malotnohtung.”
Nirit aknua, amah aroi Thomas kho ankaar a injaosa. Inn ankhaar chuta Jisu in athlengche innkaar a ngirra asonei. “Nankuunga leh oi amso.”
Chunna Thomas kuung ason, “Nikut majungkha onna sihro che kikut i anro; nikutkha jamma kpangneemma puurro, malotnoh tlohnohro, chuta malotro.”
Thomas in akuunga amsang, “kei Akpu mahche kei Ringpu!”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Nangin keita namlot angi keita nakmuhrelna angme? Muhnoh a amlot mii eikha doiphahsei.”
Chuta Jisu vaa Ringpu Asa kupa Khrista sa ta namilotnatu, che malot a nannih in amah akminga ring nanphahnantu amah i injihsei.
Maiche aknua Tiberias tuiiboomma Jisu in atakta veikhatla aroi ankuunga anmuh ei; amah ataksaakta oinanga ammuh ei.
Simon Pitar, pheipokta an ong Thomas, Kalili vaa Kana na Nathanael, Jebidi asa kupaei, che aktlei aroi innihsoh amjouei.

Simon Pitar in ankuunga asonei, “Kei ngaman sehtang.” Amahta anson, “Kannihkho nangsoh inruuia sehtu ung.” Anmah in inthruhseia mulisuunga chuungsei; chuta mah khulouhthlang chunna anmah in jakhatkho mannohsei.
Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Naoeio, nga injaochoume?” Akuunga amisang, “Injaonoh ung.”
Amah in ankuunga asonei, “Torokha muli nansihna akchangtonga denve, che nannih in nga ste nanmantu.” Chunna anmah in andenpei, cheva ipekva nga atammal inva, anmah in kai cheknohsei.
Jisu in arilvol aroi Pitar khata ason, “Amah i Akpu taksa!” Mahchuta Simon Pitar in atheih inva puunrei aveipei, amah in puunrei silhnoh a thloutloh a am cheva tuiiboom suunga choonga luutsa.
Chuta aktlei aroi in nga sip torota kaia muli chuunga thlengsei, alamva anmah in tuiipaal nata khalmo inlanoh ei, chuta kehkaar reija vakning.
Anmah in tuiipaal anphahsoh, meiholmei anmuhpei, che meichunga machaar a ansih ngaleh tolkho anmuhpei.
Jisu in asonei, “Nannih in nanmannga ste heive.”
Chunna Simon Pitar in muli amnatinga avaache nga aksip torota apaalting akaipei, anmahva mii reija sopngalei inthummei; mahchu ngatam slakho, torova inthritnoh.
Jisu in ankuunga asonei, “Thlenga saakphu saavesa.” Ipekva amah i Akpu sa ta anrompeia, “Nangi tucheme” ta tukhat inkho ruinohsei
Jisu in thlenga tolta alohche ankuunga ngasoh inruuia amlannei.
Ipek mah i Jisu in thinata aringche nua aroi ankuunga amunna veithum tihpisa.

Veinih tihpi amah in akuunga ason, “John asa kupa Simon, Nangin keita niril namvol angme?” Amah in akuunga ason, “Oi, Akpu; keiin nangta kirilvolche i nangin nakromang.” Amah in akuunga ason, “Kei sadamta kem eiro.”

Veithum tihpila akuunga ason “John asa kupa Simon, nangin keita niril namvol angme?” “Nangin keita niril namvol angme?” ta veithumkhek amah in akuunga ason inva Pitar marhuuisa. “Akpu, nangin bilam niromkir; keiin nangta kiril involche i nangin nirom.” Jisu in akuunga ason, “Kei sadamta masaak ma iin eiro.

Taktak a keiin nikuunga kisonche, nangin nao niveilaiva, nikroua ninaam raak a che nangin nisehjana a sehche; chuta nangin nichang laiva, nangin nikut nijamtu, chuche aktlei in ninaam akraaktu che nangin niseh nandahna a nakphurhtu.”
(Maita Jisu in asonnava, Pitar i khatloh hoonga thitume che Ringpu ta khatloh hoonga paar amthrat ume amtheihna.) Mahtrong chuta asonche akuunga ason, “Kiknu keijuihro.”
Pitar in amahta amuh a, amah in Jisu ta ason, “Akpu, mahmii iva khavei ume?”
Jisu in akuunga ason, “Mah i keiin kimdon veileva keiin kithlengnohmiil keininga amtu, mahchunang ningva khavei uche? Kei kiknu keijuihro!”

Amah aroi i thinoh uta tih a insonkha unao ankaar a inthangsa; Jisu inva akuunga amahta thinohtu talva tihnoh, chuta, “Mah i keiin kimdon veileva keiin kithlengnohmiil mahchu keininga amtu, mahchunang miiningva khavei ume?”
amahta Ringram a ahanni khaphah, amah in achar Raangroi ankuunga Akseeng Li apaalla amtheih trongthuun anaamtekho kimjihpei.
Amah in alah anang aknua anmah ankuunga kiringa malot aja sakhisoh ammuh ei, nijan sopli Akpu vaa ringram kurung huunna relna trong.
Anmahsoh a amjou laia, Jerusalem mathlah a ansehnoh natu anmahta akchaak ei, chuta Pa vaa trongchet ngaaknatu ason, “Mah i keikuungnata nantheih khasa,”
alamva John inva nannihta naniluppei, chuta nannihvah mi innata sootnoh luunga Li Akseenga inlup uchou.
Chunna anmah in pulla anthlengche akuunga anrui, “Akpu, ipek lai in Israel ankuunga amaana kurung ramkha veikhat namleng tupotme?”
Amah in ankuunga asonei, “Pa in amahvaa achek amneh a kak a asih lai mahche manjangnuramta nannih in nanromphunoh.
Chuta Akseeng Li in nanchunga athlenglai, nannih in tuui nanphahtu; mahche nannih in Jerusalem a, Judia naamtea, Samaria a che thalei adonga anaamte phah a nannih in keitu sakhi veiuchou.”
Mahchuta asonlai, amahta anna amsei, cheva sumphai in amahta ahanpeia muh cheknohsei.
Amah in akalsuunga anmah in ringramting intoungolh a an anlai, anve, puungou insuul silh mii innih in ankomma ngirra,
anson, “Kalilina miieio, nannih in jarella ngirra ringramta anna amchoume? Jisu ta nannih nankuungnata ringram a ahan nanmuhnanga, veikhat athlengkho nannih in nanmuh umang.”
Cheva anmah in Jerusalem akomma am kouh inkhatvaa lam chorophol muulnata Jerusalem a inlengsei;
anmah in ohchunna anluut in, Pitar, John, Jems, Andriu, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomio, Mathiu, Alphias asa kupa Jems, Jilot an ong Simon, mahche Jems asa kupa Juda in an amna achungtong khumma kalsei.
Anmah naamte kumeieiso, Jisu anu Meri mahche anaoeisoh ril inkhatveia ril luut a anngenjou.
Mahlai chunna unaoei ankaarna Pitar in anngirhche (mah akpulmii eichu reijalei sopnivak ei) ason,
“Unaoeio, Akseeng Li in ringjih a, Jisu jurhnatu akchingmii Judas rella David in matsah a asonkha atlungna veisa.
Alamva amahvah inih ikaar akho inkhat vei mahche amahta routloh akho jao.
(Ipek amah kupa in athratnoh khaan lou inkhat aklei, chunna amah in inthoia, avon puuk a aril naamte in sonna intheksa.
Mah i Jerusalem vella am mii naamte in anrompei, chunna mah loupukchu antronga Alkeldama ta an ong, mah chuvah Thiivaa Loupuk.)
Alamva mah i Leila nirik a injihsa, ‘Amah in a amnakha ksangkhem veiso che mahchunna tukhat inkho paalnohso’ mahche ‘Amah athlouta aktlei in angut masilso.’
Chunna kankaarna inkhat Akpu Jisu in lai amrel aseh alonrel anruuipijou,
aklup John nata mathronna amahta kankaarnata achunga ahanphah a, kannihsoh inruuijou khat in Jisu thinata veikhat ringchu sakhi veitu tla.”
Chunna mii khat ancharnatu Barsabas an ong Joseph, Justus sakheina mahche Mathias ta andompei.
Che amah in ngenna ason, “Mii naamte rilta akrom Akpu, mahmii innih ankaarna inkhat nicharchu kanimmuhro
Judas in amthlah raangroi thlou mahche roitloh phomta lohnatu, amah in aphomkhan sehsa.”
Che anmah innihturel reipak chaang an anpei, mahchu Mathias kuunga tlasa; cheva amahta raangroi somleikhat ankaara amijaopei.
Pentikos aknichu athlengin, anmah naamte in amunchunna inchunna louamsei.
Che kak hanga aktranghou ringramnata thlengsa, che anmah in anbokna innkha apumtea sipsa.
Cheva machunna mei nanga khalmo ahoutrang intheihsa, che mii naamte anchunga chuungsa.
Annaamte Li Akseeng in sipsei che aktlei tronga trong amithronpei, Li in atrongnatu antakchunga amlan nujuih a.
Ipek ringram athlanga ak am jaatboom naamtea malot aktrang Judiei Jerusalem a ammei.
Cheva mahou chunna miitam thlengjousei, che anmah in inhaltlamsei, alamva annaamte in anmah antak antaktronga trong antheihpei.
Che anmah in salungkhou seia anson, “Mah aktrong naamte ei i Kalili na miinoh eime?
Che khatloh a anmah in antrongi itrong itronganga itheih peime?
Parthia na, Media na, Ilami na Mesopotamia na, Judi na Kappadonia na, Pontas na che Asia na,
Phrikia na, Pomphilia na, Ijip na, che Sirini na vei Libia ramna che Rome ak an akthleng Judi leh akseengnoh Judi ei,
Krita leh Arabia na mii in antrongta itrongnanga itheih i Ringpu atuui thlousa.”
Annaamte salungkhoua inhaltlamsei cheva khatleh khat insonsei, “Mah i artha jangansonna meio?”
Chuta arou inva anmahta manuih a anson, “Anmah in akthar ngangli tuii inruisei.”
Chuta Pitar in somlei khatsoh inruuia angirhche hou inkaanga onga ankuunga asonei, “Judia leh Jesusalem a am miieio, mah i nannih in nanromchu veiso, kei kitrongi keirungaive.
Alamva mahmii ei i nannih in namidonnanga inruinoh ei, alamva ipek juktiing pung inthumta tlamang.
Chuta mah i ringraan Joel in atrongna khasa.

‘Achena akniva oinang veitu, Ringpu in sonna amdang, chuta kei kikli anruungnaamte chunga kpoihtuei, che nansakupa, nansakumei in anphoongtu che nannih naolon in muh nanphahtu khatkho aktar ei in anmang mangtuei,
Kei roijuih kupaleh kumei anchungakho mahchunanga intrimma veitu, mahlai chunna kei kikli anchunga kpoihtuei che anmah in anphoongtu
che aksuuk tupotchu marvaan achungnata kammuh uchou che thalei athlanga daang jikcha, thii mahche mei khatkho meikhu ahu.
Kini in inthim usa che thlakho thii nanga veitu, amahnoh amahnoh kliinthlou mahche muhphunoh muhna akni veitu, Akpu vaa akni athlengnoh amaa a.
Chunna tukhat in Akpu mingta ak ong miirel in inkal anphahtu.’
“Israel nannaamte keiin kison i rungaive, Najareth vaa Jisu Ringpu in tuuivaa athlousoh salungkhousoh, che daangsoh amah apaalla nannihta nanimtheih Akpu i nannih nantak in nanrom.
Ringpu in matsah a romma amah in inlitnoh luunga amchaang aknujuih a Akpu ta nankuunga nanimlan, nannih in amahta louva trongsuur amnoh kut in thingkharh a namithlupei.
Chuta Ringpu in kthivah klah knangnata majak a amahta amringpei, alamva amahta akthi in suura sih cheknohsa.
Alamva amahrella Devit in ason, ‘Keiin Akputa lai amrella kimaa a kimuh, alamva amah in kikchang kuttonga am chunna keiin inloknohtung,
Churella kiril in tlansa, che kamlei inkho aroomthoksa; thloiralla kiruungin matuura ringusa.
Alamva kei kiklita repnanga mathlahnoh uche, nohle nang Akseeng Inkhat in thikhuta kammuhnohtu.
Chaan lamta nangin keikuunga namrom peiang; nangin keisoh niam in keita roomthok namsuuktung.’
“Unaoeio, keiin nankuunga inthohna ipa ipu Devit rella atak a kisonjava amah atakva thisa, mahche anphuumpei, che amah rusuunva mi in phah a inihsoh ammang.
Churella ringraan khat veia, amah in aromcheva Ringpu in amahkuunga trongchet amtloh, tihva ruungtinga amah atu ate ankaar nata inkhat in amah phompii ah amboktu,
amah in matsah a muh a Khrista in veikhat aringna turella trong, mah chuvah amahta thikhua mathlahnohtu, chekho aruungin thranoh seengnoh muhnohtu.
Mah Jisu ita Ringpu in amringpei, che inih inaamin mairella sakhi veisame.
Mahchurella Ringpu kut akchanga amahta ralla amliinpei, che Pa tingna Akseeng livaa trongchet aphahpei, nannih in nanmuh mahche nantheih i amah in nanchunga nanipoihpei.
Alamva Devit va Ringram a kalnoh, chuta amah atak in ason, ‘Akpu in kei Akpu kuungah ason, nangin kei kikchanga inbokro,
keiin nak andah mii eita nang nikehchuunna kamveinohsoot.’
Churella Israel taploikuung naamtein tak a romeiso mah chuvah nannih in namithlu Jisu i Ringpu in amahta Akpu khatkho khrista amveipei.”
Ipekva anmah in mahchuta antheih in anmah anril khalmo asokpei, che Pitar leh raangroi aktlei ankuunga ansonpei, “Unaoeio, kannih in jangkantloh usame?”
Chunna Pitar in ankuunga asonei, “Nanril thlengve, mahche nannih nanlehnata naniipnatu Jisu Khrista akminga nannaam inlupve mahche nannih in Akseeng Li vaa kutthol nanphahtu.
Alamva trongchet i nannih khatkho nansa turella mahche ramlah a amii eiturel Akpu Ringpu in annaamteta a ongna.”
Mahche aktleitrong jikchasoh inruuia amah in ankuunga sakhi amlanei che anmahta bungthok a asonei, “Mah thranoh ringnatluun nata inkalve.”
Nga tloh a amah atrongta aklou ei in inlup anphahpei, che mahnichunna li akpul inthumvak amchunpei.
Chunna raangroi in amitheihna a, anchunna a, tol ankhoina a mahche ngenna a annaam in anril amiluutpei.
Li naamte anchunga intritna thlengsa; mahche raangroi anpaalla salungkhouna khatkho daang jikcha antlohpei.
Mahche amlot mii naamte inchunna amjouei che poot anaamte inkhatveia miinaam in inchunna anhuina;
Anmah in andoon ankhaal ram muul ansih pootcheita juura darkaar am ankuunga ansem.
Chuche akni aknileh mathruunna thlaam a thlengjouei anmah in inn inna tol khoia roomthoksoh inruuia mahche anril liinna ansaak an injou,
Ringpu ta amipaak inruuia mii naamtein rilvol anphah, mahche inkal akphah eita aknirel Akpu in mii daak a anmasing amralei.
Ipek Pitar leh John in ngennatu pungku atlak in mathruunna thlaam a hangsei.
Che apok lainata sehtheihnoh mii khat anthlen mahmiichu aknirel mathruunna thlaam a Akthrathonga akluut mii eita doh nihnatu ansih mii.
Pitar leh John in mathruunna thlaamma anluutsam amuh in akut doh a amsa.
Mahchunna Pitar in John soh amahta minna an anche ason, “Kannihta kaniannro.”
Chunna amah in ankuungnata jangmekhat kaphah tunaita ramrinna alouannei.
Chuta Pitar in ason, “Keiva harngou khatkho ra–ao doonnoh ang, chuta keiin kdoonta nikuunga kamlanche; Najareth Jisu Khrista vaa minga sehro.”
Cheva amah akchangtong kut matuh a domma amthohpei, mahcheva kak hanga amah akeh leh akehringta trangsa.
Mahchunna amah in inthomma ngirsa che sehsa anmahsoh inruuijoua mathruunna thlaam a luutsa, inthomma seh a Ringpu ta ampaakpei.
Mahchunna amah in inthomma ngirsa che Ringpu ta mapaak mapaak a anmahsoh mathruunna thlaam a luutsei. Amah in sehtheih a Ringpu ta ampaakkha mii naamtein anmuhpei,
mahche mahmii in mathruunna thlaam a Akthrathong amunna inbok a doh a aksaa mii khasa ta anrompei; cheva amahkuunga aksuukthlou khanna salungkhousei.
Amah in Pitar leh John ta antuukpilaia, mii naamtein ankuunga tlaanna Solomon Innmuk khanna miinaam in salungkhoua thlengsei.

Che Pitar in anmahta amuh in ankuunga trongsa, Israel miieio, mah thlouin jarella salungkhou sachoume, kannih kantuuia chunohle malot akli a amahta akeh a kamisehrella nannih in kaniantlinga amschoume?
Abraham Aisaak mahche Jakop vaa Ringpu, inih ipa ipuei Ringpu roijuih Jisu ta paar amthratpei. Mahmii chuva Pilat in mathlah tangta anngirhlai nannih in namilanpei mahche amaikuung talla indahchou.
Chuta nannih in Akseeng khatkho Akchimlamsehta indahsachou, che nannih turella miikhatta amthlahnatu nanjapei,
Ringpu in kthinata ringsa Inthohna Akputa nanthatpei, kannih in mairella sakhisung.
Amah akmingta malot apaalla mah kupa i nannih in nanmuh nanrom mii i amtrangpei; che Jisu apaalla malot in amah aruung i nannaamte maikuunga mapung ampha.
“Chunna ipek unaoeio, nannihta nanipuuiin anloutloh khananga, nannih inkho romnoh a nantlohpeita krom.
Chuta Ringpu vah ringraan in annar a matsah a ansonche tihva Khrista in klah knang adoutu ta amah in amthlungpei.
Alamchunna nannih in nanril thlenga veikhat inheive. Chunna nannih nanlehta ammuhtu. Mahlaia Akpu tinga akthar rilchu thlengtu,
mah chuvah nannih turella Jisu Khrista ta thlou athunche amthlahtu,
anaamte akthar laichu aphahnohmiil amahva ringram a amtutla mah chuvah amaanata Ringpu vaa akseeng ringraanei annar a amtrongpei.
Moses in asonei, ‘Akpu Ringpu in keita keijok keikemnanga nan unao kaarnata ringraan inkhat amthruhtu. Amah in nankuunga ason naamte rungaive.
Mahche mai suuktu, mah chuvah amah ringraan chunna asonta thra arungainoh li makheita miikaarnata ammangtu.’
Mahche Samuel nata akthleng ringraan annaamte in mahche amah aknua akthleng in ansonkha ipek akho ansonmang.
Nannih ringraanei mahche Ringpu in nanpa nanpu ankuunga amlan trongirhnavaa asasachou ta Abraham kuunga ason, ‘Vaknu akthlengsam nantu nante a tukleiram a am taploikuung annaamtein doi anphahtu.’
Ringpu in amah aroita amringpei, nannaamte nantak a nanthratnohnata inheia nannihta doi amlannatu amahta matsah a nankuunga amthlahpei.”
Anmah in miisoh antronglai, thiimpu leh mathruunna thlaam angaakei aklok mahche Sadukiis ei in anmah kuunga thlengsei,
mii in amilung inhaangsei alamva Jisu thinata veikhat ringsa ta anmah in mii kuungah anraan kharella.
Cheva anmahta ansuurpeia tungva juktiing aphahnohmiil simma ansihpei, alamva mahchu khulouhram veisa.
Chuta trongkhata arungai mii aktam inva amilotpei; amlot mii akpul rangavak ei.
Akhuvar a rampuuiei, anparuulei, che ringjih lulok eiin Jerusalem a inchunsei
inruuia akthloi thiimpu Annas, Kajaphas, John leh Alekjendar mahche akthloi thiimpu innsuung aksuuk ei in Jerusalem a annaamtea inchunsei.
Mahche anmahta ankaar a sih a trong anruipei, “Jaknang tuuia chunoh a tunang minga nannih in mah i nantlohme?”
Chunna Pitar in Akseeng Li a sip a ankuunga asonnei, “Rampuuiei che anparuulei,
akehtu miita kannih in akthra thlou kantloh rella jaknang li a amahta namithrat amah ita mii in kannihta chaang kanian eileva,

nannaamte in mahche Israel mii naamtein mah i romve, mah chuvah nannih in thingkharh a namithlu che Ringpu in thinata amring Najareth vaa Jisu Khrista minga mah chuvah amah apaalla mah kupa i thrakhemma nanmaa a ngirsa.
Inntloh mii inhuuina indah a nanlontal lungin inn akiinglung veisa.
Che aktlei tukhat kuunga chaanring amnoh, alamva ringram athlanga amlan miikaara inihta inikaltu aktleiming inkhatkho amnoh.”
Ipek Pitar leh John in anril anraangta anmuh in, anmahva nirik theinoh mahche miistru ningeita anrom inva anmah in salungkhousei; che anmahva Jisu soh inruuijouei tih a anrompei.
Chuta anmah in amithrat kupakhan ankomma ngirra am anmuh in, mahchu indah a jakhatkho son cheknohsei.
Chuta anmah in jamanata aktleia sehnatu jathang amilanche, mahchurella anmah inkhatle khat intelsei,
che anson, “Inih in antakchunga jangitloh ume? Alamva anmah in inthangna daang inkhat amipaangpei ta Jerusalem a ak am miinaam kuunga amidangpei, che inih inkho mahchuta indah cheknohme?
Chuta mairella miikaara antongnoh natu, tukhat kuungkho amah akminga ralla antrongnoh natu mathrit eirei.”
Chunna anmahta an ongche Jisu minga antrongnoh natu che mii amitheihnoh natu anmah in anchaakpei.
Chuta Pitar leh John in ankuunga amisangpei, “Kannih in Ringpu atrongta majuihchunga nantrongta majuih in Ringpu auunga thloia thra umeta nanroua picaar intlohve;
alamva kannih in kanmuhta mahche kantheihta sonnoh cheknoh ung.”
Anmahta tandi tlohnatu alam tuuknohseia, anmahta ralla amithritche mii antrih rella amithlahpei; alamva aksuukthlou kharella miinaam in Ringpu ta amipaakpei.
Alamva kum sopli akral mii anatnata mathratna daang antlohpei.
Anmah ansuurkhata anmithlah inva anpaikuunga seh a akthloi thiimpu leh anparuul in ansonkhata ankuunga antongpei.
Che mahchuta antheih in anmah in Ringpu kuunga anhou suuk a onga anngen, “Akthloirem Akpu, marvaan, tukleiram, tuiiboom mahche asuunga ak am anaamteta akseem Ringpu,
nang roijuih kan pa David in Akseeng Li apaalla asonpei, ‘Jental in Jarella amilung inhaangseime, mahche jarelna mii eiin veinohtupot thlouta anmidon peime?
Tukleiramna kurung eiin anroua inchaangsei, mahche Akputa khatkho amah in thao apoih eita andah a rampuui in inchunjousei’–
alamva amah atak a nangin thao nipoih nangtu akseeng roijuih Jisuta andah a Herot leh Pontias Pilat annih a Jental leh Israel eikho amah khuuboomma inchunjousei,
amah i nang nikut in che nangin matsah nimchaang khata tlohnatu relna.
Chunna pekva Akpu, anmah in anmithrit eikha anrosa, mahche nang niroi ei in karaanga nang nitrongta antrongnatu machekeiro,
nang roijuih akseeng Jisu apaalla aknata mathratnatu daang leh salungkhouna thlou mapaangnatu nikutkha jamro.”
Chunna anngenlai, anmah in inchunna an amna munkha inloksa; che annaamte Akseeng Li insipseia kraanga Ringpu trongta trongsei.
Mahche aktrang tuuisoh inruuia raangroiei in Akpu Jisu aringna rella anmah anringtukna thaminta anmilan, che annaamte chunga akliin malungsi anphah.
Anmah ankaar a tukhatkho akvaat amnoh ei, alamva ram chunoleh inn lou akdoon in mahchuta juura, che anjuurhna amanchuta anthlen.
Mahche raangroi ankehkuunga mahchuta ansih; che tukhat darkaar am miita ansem.
Nga tloh a Saipras ah pok, Levi vaa raangroi in Barnabas antih amahsoh asa kupa anromna Josep in,
amah alou inkhatta ajuurhche, baobeh thlenna raangroi ankehkuunga asih.
Chuta akming Ananias an ong mii khat in amah akmei Sapphira soh amah aram akirkhat ajurh,
che amah akmeisoh romjoua anphahnata ste anmah chuumtuta ansihche, arouruta thlenna raangroiei ankehkunga asihpei.
Chuta Pitar in ason. “Ananias, nangin Akseeng Li ta masimna a mahche ram amannata nangtu arou nikhainatu jarelna Seitan in nirilsuunga sipmeio?

Mahchu nijurhnoh laiva nitanohme? Chuta mahchu nijurhcheva nihuuinaja ahuuina janohsa. Mah thloui nitlohnatu nang nirilla khatloh a akthar inthruhme? Nangin miita masimna nohche, chuta Ringpu ta namsimnapei.”
Ananias in trongchu atheihsoh, tukleia inriilla thisa, che aktheih annaamte in khalmo intrisei.
Mahchu akmuh intlangsa ei in inthoua amah aruungta tuumma apaal khur a anphuumpei.
Pung inthumvak inngeihche aknua amah akmei in aksuuk thloukha jakhatkho romnohluunga hukluutsa.
Mahchunna Pitar in akuunga ason, “Keisonro nangin ramkha vachahruin nijurhningme?” Cheva amah in ason, “Oi maichah a.”
Chuta Pitar in amahta ason, “Akpu vaa Li ta madoinatu nannih in khatloh a injachoume? Rungairo nang namsalta akphuum eikha innkhaar kuunga ammei, che nangta apaalla nanphurhtu”
Kak hanga Pitar akehkungah amahkho inriilla thisa. Intlangsa in anluutlaia amahta thia am antuukpei, cheva amahta apaalla anphurhche amsalkomma anphuumpei.
Maita aktheih mii naamte anchunga khalmo intri hangsei.
Ipekva raangroi ankut a daang leh salungkhouna thlou khalmoa miikaara antlohpei. Mahche annaamte in Solomon innmuk a inchunsei.
Che anmah ankaar a tunangkhat inkho anmahsoh inchunpia kraang cheknohsei, chuta mii inva anmahta khalmo injahsei
Mahche amlot kupaleh kumei miitam in ral ralla Akpu kuunga amichunei,
mahchunna anmah in aknaei luungkho lamma thlenna mahche intolhna tuklaichunga matolh a ansih, alamva Pitar in lamma athlenglai amah aniim slakho anchunga atlaknatuta.
Jerusalem vella ak am khuupii khuupiinata miitam in aknaeita anthlen, che anmah annat ansatna thraei.
Chuta akthloi thiimpu leh amah in anruuipi Sadukiis loomei in kallak a sipsei,
anmah in raangroi eita ansuurche miitam amna simma ansihpei.
Chuta khulouh a Akpu vaa ringroi khat in sim akhaareita mahoonga anmahta apaalla anthruhpiche asonei,
“Seh choulaia mathruunna thlaamsuunga ngirra mah Akringtrong naamte i mii kuungah raanna tongve.”
Chunna mahchuta antheih in kini avaarsoh mathruunna thlaamsuunga luut a amitheihpei.
Ipek aklok thiimpu leh amah in anruuipi in thlenga Israel vaa jamaleh chum eita annaam ongjoua, raangroi eita simma thlennatu amithlahpei.
Chuta phrangki in anthlenglaia, anmahta simsuunga tuuknohsei, cheva anmah in inlenga antongpei.
“Simkha thra inkhaar che akngaak ei in thongkha thra anngaak a kantuuk ei, chuta thong akhaar kamihoong inva asuunga tukhatkho tuuknohsung.”
Ipek mathruunna thlaamta akngaak raalmii akpuui mahche akthloi thiimpu in mahtrong chuta antheih in anmah rella khalmoa inhalsei,
Mahchunna tukhat in ankuunga thlenga atih, “Nannih in simma nanthun mii eikha mathruunna thlaamsuunga ngirra miita matheih a amsei.”
Mahchunna raalmii akpuui in phrangki eisoh sehjoua hou masuuknoh luunga anmahta anthlenpei, alamva mii in lung kanidentu ta intrisei.
Chunna anmahta anthlenche jama ankaar a ansihpei che akthloi thiimpu in anmahta trong anruiei,
“Amah akminga mii namitheihnoh natu tranga kanchaakchou, chuta nannih in miita namitheih a Jerusalem a sipsa, che amah athii kantakchunga namithlak natu nantlohpei.”
Chuta Pitar leh raangroi in amisang, “Kannih in miitrongta kamijuihtu ngutva Ringpu trong kamijuihtu tla.”
Nannih in thinga mathoia nanthat Jisu ta kannih kan pa Ringpu in amringpei
Israel in anril anthlengnatu mahche anmah anlehta ipnatu, Ringpu in amahta Akching mahche akkal Akpu veia akchang kut a amliinpei.
Mairella kannih in sakhisung, mahche Ringpu in ason amjuih mii eita amlan Akseeng Li inkho sakhi.
Mahchuta antheih in anmahva khalmo amilunghaangsa mahche amahta anthatjasa.
Chuta jamana Pharisi akmingva Kamaliel, trongsuurvaa lulok mii naamtein injahnavei inkhat in ngirsa, mahche raangroi eita apaalla kak ansihnatu jathang amlanei
Che amah in ankuunga asonei, “Israel miieio, anmah ankuunga nantlohthlou i cheksilve.
