Alamva mah akniei i amaa a akming Theodas in kei ningsangta amdon mii khat inthruh, mii reija manlivak in amah aknuta anjuih; chuta amahta anthatpei mahche aknua aje ajea inthek invorhsei, che jakhatkho veinohsa.
Amah aknua miipok teennatu amah aknichunna Kalili na Juda in inthoua mahche mii arouta amah aknuta anjuihpei; atakkho kmaang kremsa, che amah aknu akjuih mii eikho inthek invorhsei.
Mahchunna ipek aksuukthlou i keiin nankuunga kitihchou, maseh eivesa; alamva anmah in antlohthlou i mii tingnata suukleva mah i jakhatkho veinohtu;
chuta mah i Ringpu tingnata veileva nannih in anmahta cheknoh uchou!”
Chunna anmah in atrongkha anjapei, che anmah in raangroi eita onga ankhonpei mahche Jisu akminga antrongnoh natu anchaakche anmithlahpei.
Cheva anmah in jamanata sehsei, anroomthoksei mah chuvah amah akming kharelna klah knang phah matikcha injahna vei tuei tih a Ringpu in asonpei.
Mahche anmah in aknirel mathruunna thlaam a che inn inna matheih a Jisu Khrista ta akraan, inngainoh luungsei.
Ipek akni aknileh aroi tam ahanral in, Kriik trong aktrong Judi ei in Hibru trong aktrong Judi anchunga andah a insosei alamva aknirel saakna iinna ansem anmilanlai anmah trulmeinuta thou sanohsei.
Chunna somleinih in Akpu amlot mii eita onga ansonpei, “Inih in Ringpu trong akraan thlouta mathlah a tebor thloua routloh i chimnohsa.
Alamchunna unaoeio, mah thlou irella mii thunna thlou imtlohnatu malot ah anming inthang, Akseeng Li a sip, lousingin sipmii sirih nankaarnata charve,
Chuta inihva angenna mahche akthra trongta routloh a iril maluutreio.”
Mahchuta anson in annaamte anril pelsei, cheva Akseeng Li in mahche lousingin sip Stephen che Philip, Prokhoras, Nikanor, Timon, Parminas mahche Antiokna Judi in ol Nikolas ta ancharpei.
Anmahta raangroi anmaa a ansihpei, che anmah in ngenna anchunga ankut ansihpei.
Mahche Ringpu atrong porh ahanralpei; Jerusalem a ak am aroiei anmasing khalmo tam athloipei, mahche thiimpuei inkho amlot mii aknuta anjuihpei.
Mahche Stephen in malungsi leh tuui in sip a, miikaara salungkhouna thlou mahche daang khalmo atlohpei
Mahchunna thlaang thlaang mii, Sinakok na mii arouin (mahchu ngata an ong); mahche Sirini na, Alexjendri na, Silisia na, che Asia na mii arouin Stephen soh trong inkharh anmithronpei.
Chuta anmah in lousing leh Li a trongta indah eia ngir cheknohsei.
Mahchunna anmah in inruk a miita masoh anmitronpei, “Amah in Moses leh Ringpu ta andah a manuih a trong antheihpei.”
Mahche anmah in anparuul che ringjih lulok eita rok a anmisaopei, che anmah in ankuunga thlenga amahta ansuurpei cheva jama anmaa a anthlenpei,
cheva akchimnoh sakhi amlan miikhatta thlenna anmisonpei, “Amahmii in akseeng ita mahche trongthuunta indah a trong inngainoluung;
alamva Najareth na Jisu in amah amunni ammaangtu, mahche Moses in inimlan amaanata iloutloh nonota amah in a thlengtu ta amah in asonkha kannih in kantheihpei.”
Mahchunna jama ah anbok annaamte in amahta thratea an an in ameelkha ringroi khatvaa ameelnanga anmuhpei.
Mahchunna aklok thiimpu in ason, “Mah i chimme?”
Mahchunna Stephen in ason, “Unao khatkho pa eio keirungaive. Paarthra Ringpu in inih ipa Abraham in Haran na a amnoh maa a, Mesopotamia a amlaia ammuh,
che akuunga ason, ‘Nang niramnata che nang unao pasata mah a keiin nangkuunga kammuhsam ramkhanna sehro.’
Mahchunna Kaldi ramta mathlah a Haran na paalsa. Che apa athihnua, Ringpu in loua ipek nan amna ram inna thlenna asihpei;

chulata amah amunchunna amah in aphahtu phukho malannoh, amah in akehmunphao malannohsa, chuta asa apoknoh lainata amah atak che vaknua akthlengsam amah atuteting anmah anta aveinatu rammi kamlantuta Ringpu in trongchet amlanpei.
Ringpu in nga tloh a amahkuunga trongsa, mah chuvah vaknua akthlengsam atu atein miiramma mii aktlei veia amtuei, anmahta naichi maveia kum reija manli mananga ansihtuei.
Chuta Ringpu in ason, ‘Anmah in rou antlohmii eikhata keiin pichaar kitlohtuei, mahchuche aknua anmah in anthruhche mah amun inna keita kamithruuntung;’
cheva amahkuunga avuntan trongirhna amlanpei. Nga tloh a Abraham in Isaak vaa apa veisa, mahche nirit tihpia amahta avun atanpei; Isaak in Jakop apa veisa, che Jakop in somleinihvaa anpa veisa.
“Cheva pipaei in Joseph ta kallak seia, amahta Ijip a anjurhpei; chuta Ringpu in amahta anruuipi,
alah anang jikchanata akalche Ijip kurung Pharaoh amaa a malungsi leh lousing amlan, che kurung in amahta Ijip leh amahram apumte chunga rampuui amveipei.
Ipekva Ijip mahche Kanan apumtea saakchaal thlengsa, cheva khalmo klah knang suuksa, chunna inih ipa ipuei in saakphu tuuk cheknohsei.
Chuta Ijip a saangniim amta Jakop in inih ipa ipu eita matsah a a amthlah ei.
Mahche innih tihpia ansehlai, Joseph in auhte ankuunga atakta amromei, che Joseph ataploikuungta Pharaoh kuunga amrompei.
Cheva Joseph in apa Jakop ta che amah unao anaam, li sopsrihlei rangata a ongnatu amthlah ei;
che Jakop in Ijip a jungsa. Cheva amah atak, che inih ipa ipueikho thisei,
mahchuche anmahta Sikkem a thlenna Abraham in Sikim nata Hamor a asa kupa ankuungnata harngou ste malanna akleiche rusuunna anphuumpei.
“Chuta Ringpu in Abraham kuunga amlanche trongchet khanna annai inva, Ijip a mii porh a miitam ahanralpei.
Joseph ta akromnoh aktlei kurung in Ijip a apaal inva anmahta chut amithronpei.
Amah in inih jaatta khalmo thranoh anhuinapei che amnangei, mah chuvah naoson eita anring nanotu apaalla anlonei.
Mahlaia Moses poksa, che Ringpu maikuunga khalmoa ameel kthra, mahche thlathum apa inna amma liinsa;
che amahta apaalla ansih in, Pharaoh asaningol in amahta alohche asa kupa maveia ajokpei.
Mahche Moses in Ijip na lousing naamte amtampei, khatkho tronga che thlou a akchek amneh veisa.
“Amah in kum sopli aphah in, amah uhnao Israel eita annatu arilla suuksa.
Ankaarna khat in thranohmalla atlohkhata amuh in, amnangmii khata akalnatu aloungaakpei cheva athunglou veia Ijip mii khata athatpei.
Amah in amdonva anmahta akut a akalnatu anmah turel Ringpu in amthlah peita anrombra, chuta anmah in romnohsei
Mahche akhuvar a anmah in incham injanatuta asonei, ‘Nannih i unaoseengchou, jarella nannih khat in khatta chimnoh a innah insuulchoume?’
Chuta amah unaokuunga chimnoh aktlohmii inna amahta apanga ilsunna asonpei, ‘Kanchunga nipaalnatu mahche pichaartloh niveinatu tunang in thlou nakthunme?
Majaan Ijip miikhatta nithatnanga keikho keithattangta nitlohme?’
Amah athunglousam thlou khanna Moses in tlaansa, cheva Median ramma pajatla a amsa, cheva kupasa innihvah apa veisa.
“Ipek kum sopli achenua, ringroi khat in Sinai muul rapril inbang khat a meibom khat veia amuhpei.
Moses in mahchuta amuh in salungkhousa; chunna amah in innaia annatu aluut in, Akpu ahouta thlengsa.
‘Kei i nipa nipuvaa Ringpu, Abraham, Isaak che Jakop vaa Ringpu sang.’ Cheva Moses in inchuunsa, an cheknohsa.
Cheva Akpu in amahta ason, ‘Nang nikehnata kehkhraangkha liimro, alamva nangin ningirhna munkha akseeng tukleisa.
Ijip ah am kei kimiita thranoh a anminangi tak a kimuhpei, mahche anmah in thonoh a anlahoukha kitheihpei. Chunna anmahta kikalnatu keiin thlengsang. Ipek varo, keiin nangta Ijip a namthlahtang.’
“ ‘Tunang in nangta kanchunga nipaalnatu mahche pichaar tlohnatu nakthunme?’ ta anmah in andah Moses ta inbangkaar a mamuh a ringroi akut a akpuui mahche akkal Akpu veia Ringpu in amthlakhasa.
Amah in Ijip na in aang tuiiboomma, kum sopli raprilla salungkhouna thlou mahche daang jikcha tloh a Ijip nata chinga asehpiei.
‘Ringpu in nannih unaopasa nata keinanga ringraan khat kamthruhtu.’ Nga tloh a Israel ankuunga aksonkha amah Moses ireh.
Sinai muulla amahkuunga atrongpi ringroisoh raprilla amsa che ipa ipueisoh louam mahche inihkuunga Akringtrong aphahche inimlan miikha amahsa.
Amah in ason ipa ipuin majuih indah ei, chuta amahta ajea an ilche, amah anril avah Ijip ting inlengei,
Aaron akuunga ason, ‘Kannih kanmaa a aksehtu kanniturella leili rappu seemreiro; alamva Ijip nata chinga kanisehpi Moses ta khatloh a vei satame romnohsung.’
Cheva mahlai chunna anmah in siilte khatta anthatche leili rappu kuunga thiilpoot veia ankat mahche anmah ankut a anseem poot khanna anroomthoksa.
Chuta Ringpu in anmah ankuungnata inheisa, mahche ringraan nirik a anjih khananga, ‘Israel innsuungeio raprilla kum sopli nannih in siilta mathruunna pootchei keikuunga nankatnohme?

Nannih in namilotva rappu thiilta mahche nannih arsivaa rappu Rephan vaa leilita nanlohnome; amah leili rappu chuva nannih in namithruunnatu nanseempei. Chunna keiin nannihta Babilon araalla kphurh usachou.’
“Inih ipa ipuei in sakhitu mathruunna thiil raprilla anmahsoh am, Ringpu in Moses ta matheih a asonnanga; amah in amuhche ahoongsoh intrimma aseemtu.
Inih ipa ipuei in anpathou anputhou nata mathruunna thiilchu phah a Joshua soh inruuijoua inih ipa ipuei anmaa a louam jatih eita manomma ramkhanna athlenpei. Mahchu Davit in a amlai phah a am,
Davit in Ringpu amaikuunga rilvolna aphah mahche Jakop in amah Ringpu amnatu amunkhat aktuuknatu anihpei.
Chuta amah turella inn inkhat Solomon in atlohpei.
Chulata Ankaangrem kut a inseem inna amahva amnoh, ringraan in asonnanga,
‘Ringramva kei kphompii, mahche thalei in kikeh chuunna. Kei turella nannih in jaknang inn nantloh ume, Akpu in ason, chunoleh keiin kanngeihnasam ramname?
Mah naamte i kikut in seemnoh angme?’
“Nannih rukingtrang eio, nannih in lai amrella Akseeng Li ta nanlouthing. Nanpa nanpuin anloutloh nanga nannihkho nantloh.
Ringraan suunga nanpa nanpuin anchutnoh amreiseime? Akchimlamseh mii khat athlengnatu matsah a ansonta nannih in nanthatpei, ipek nannih in amahta nanjurhpei che nanthatpei,
ringroi in trongsuurta nannih nankuunga nanimlanta nanphahpei, mahchu nannih in majuihnohchou.”
Ipek ohchuta antheih in khalmo amilung inhaangsa, che anha kret kretta anmiketpei.
Chuta amah in Akseeng Li a sip a ringramta intouva a an in, Ringpu vaa Paarthra ah Jisu in Ringpu akchanga ngirra amuhpei;
che amah in asonei, “Anve, ringramta inhoong mahche miivaa Asa kupa in Ringpu akchanga ngirra am kimuhpei.”
Chuta amah in rool inkaanga onga anmikuur ansiinpei mah chuvah amahkuunga inlomsei.
Cheva amahta khuuboom apaalla anminomche lung andenpei; mahchuta sakhi akvei in anmah anpuunreita akming Saul an ong nao kupakhat akehkungah ansihpei.
Nga tloh a anmah in Stephen ta lung andenlai, amah in ngenna “Akpu Jisu, kei kikli i keiluorosa.”
Mahcheva amah in akhuk makamma ahou suuk a ongsa, “Akpu, mah aneh i anmah anchunga mathlaaknoh eiro.” Cheva maita asonche amahva insa.
Ril luut a amlot ei in Stephen ta anphuumpei, mahche amah turelna khalmo marhuuisei.
Chuta Saul in khakla ta ammaang, inn inna luut a, kupa kumei eita kai kaia simma athunei.
Ipek inthektlamma akseh mii eiin anseh ansehna a akthra trongta anraanpei.
Philip in Samaria khuuboom khat a sehsa, mahche anmah kuunga Khrista ta sonna araanei.
Mii khalmo tam in Philip trongta antheih in mahche daang atlohthlou jikchata anmuh in ril khalek veia amah in asonkhanna anril luutsa.
Alamva akseengnoh li in aluutna mii ramkhanna ong onga inthruhsei, mahche pangneem akthi leh kehtlik miitam thrasei.
Nga tloh a mah khuuboomna mii in khalmo anroomthoksei.
Chuta akming Simon ta an ong mii khat am, amahva matsah a leiva tloh a khuuboomma Samaria na mii eita salung makhoua asih ei, amah in, keiva akthloimii angta ason.
Mii andihrem nata anrolhrem phah a annaamtein amahkuunga anril maluut a ason, “Mahmii i Akliinta an ong Ringpu vaa tuui am mii khasa.”
Mahche anmah in amahkuunga anril anmiluut, alamva lai khalmo soot a anmahta salung amkhouei.
Chuta Philip in Ringpu kurung huunna mahche Jisu Khrista akmingta araan in amahta anmilotpei, mah khanna kupa kumei eita anluppei.
Simon inkho amlotpei. Mahche Simon in alupche Philip soh inruui sehjousei, mahche Philip in daang leh salungkhouna kliinthlou jikcha atloh in amahva salungkhousa.
Ipek Samaria na mii in Ringpu trongta anrouloh peita Jerusalem a ak am raangroi in antheihpeia, anmah in Pitar leh John ta anmakuunga anmithlahpei,
anmah in Akseeng Li anphahnatu raangroi in thlengseia anmah turella anngenpei;
alamva tukhat chungkho Akseeng Li trumnohmang, chuta anmah in Akpu Jisu akminga inlupningei.
Mahchuche anchunga ankut ansih a anmah in Akseeng Li anphahpei.
Ipek Simon in raangroi ankut anmah anchunga ansih apaalla Akseeng Li anphahchuta Simon in amuh a, anmakuunga baobeh amlanei,
“Kei kuungakho mah tuui i kamlanve, chunna keikho kikut kisih kisihnamii in Akseeng Li anphahnatu;” ta asonei.
Chuta Pitar in amahkuunga ason, “Nang haarngou i nangsoh maangjouso, alamva Ringpu kuttholva inbaobeh thrulhna thlouta nimdonpei.
Onna nang nikholkho nichuumkho amnoh, alamva Ringpu kuunga nang niril chimnoh.
Churella nang nithratnoh khannata niril thlengro, mahche Akpu kuunga ngenro, che vei ajaleva nang nilehkha ip aja.
Alamva nangva ankhah tuur amche, che aleh in nangta nakkhit a am kimuhche.”
Mahchunna Simon in amsangpei. “Nannih in nansonkha keichunga jakhatkho atlaknoh natu kei turella Akpu kuunga ngenve.”
Ipek anmah in sakhi malanna mahche Akpu trongta raanna, Samaria na mii in khuu khuua akthra trongta raanna Jerusalem a inlengsei.
Chuta Akpu vaa ringroi khat in Philip ta ason, “Inthoua akhutong Jerusalem nata Kaja phah a aktrum lamkhanna sehro.” Mah khanna raprillam lam.

Chunna amah in inthoua sehsa. Cheva anro, Ethopia na aksarh inseemche mii khat, amahvah Ethopia na kurungpi Kandas ta rou aktlohche amah adoon akhaalta thloupu veia ak an phrangki in Jerusalem a Ringpu amthruunnatu thlengsa.
Amah in anlenglai; amah skol kari a inbok a ringraan Isaiah nirikta paa amsa.
Mahchunna Li in Philip ta ason. “Mahkhan kalro che amah skol kari a jaoro.”
Chunna Philip in amahkuunga tlaansa, che amah in ringraan Isaiah nirik apaata arungeihpei, cheva aruipei, “Nangin nipaakha niromme?”
Mahchunna amah in ason, “Tunangkhat in kamtheihnoh leva khatloh a kiromchek ume?” Cheva amah in Philip ta skol karichunga akalnatu aongpei che amahsoh inbokjousei.

Ipek amah in ringjihta apaana achaangva maire: “Sathat kuunga sadamta anthlennanga; nohle sadamta amul akchehmii kuunga anthlennanga; sadamta amul akchehmii kuunga atrong suuknoh nanga, amah abao ma aangnoh
Amahvaa inruruh khanna amah apichaarta inlousa. Amah ringnatluunta tunang in tanga son achekume? Alamva amah achaanni thaleinata inlousa.”
Cheva mahkhata aromnoh khanna Philip kuunga ason, “Amah ringraan in trongi tunang turella asonme, amah atak turelna asonme chunoh a aktleikhat turelna asonme?”
Mahchunna Philip in abao aanga amah ringjih ajatal khannata mathronna amahkuunga Jisu rella akthra trongta araanpei.
Che anmah in lamchunna ngata anseh in tuii ste amnah a thlengsei, cheva aksarh inseem in ason, “Anro! Onna tuii amsa! Keita keilup ajaume,” amah in amsang, “Ajanohna jakhatkho amnohtu?”
Chunna Philip in ason, “Nang niril apumte inta malotchele, ajatu.” Che amah in amsang, “Jisu Khrista i Ringpu Asa kupata kamlot.”
Cheva amah in skol karita mangeihnatu jathang amlanpei. Mahche mahnia Philip leh aksarh inseem in tuiia trumsei, che amahta aluppei.
Che anmah in tuiinata anthruhsoh, Akpu vaa Li in Philip ta veikhat inlenga mamuhnohsa, chunna amah in aroomthok a alamtonga sehsa.
Chuta Philip va Ajotas a antuukpei, che amah in Keisaria a athlengnomiil amah in sehseh a khuupii anaamma akthra trongta araanpei.
che amahkuung nata Damascas ah am sinakok ankuunga phurhnatu tronjihthuun anihpei, mahchunna tunangkhat Akring lamma amah amii akvei kupaleh kumeita tuukleva, anmahta Jerusalem a athlennatu relna.
Ipek amah in nga tloh a asehlai Damaskas soh annai in, kak hanga ringramnata akvaar khat in amahta kooia vaarsa.
Mahchunna amah in tukleichunga inriilsa mahche amahkuunga ahoukhat in ason atheihpei, “Saul, Saul, nangin keita nakchut angi jarelname?”
Che amah in ason, “Akpu nang tucheme?” Chunna amah in ason, “Keiva nangin nakchut Jisu khasang;
chuta inthouva khuuboom akhanna luutro, mahche nangin jangnitloh umeta nangkuunga naksontu.”
Saul soh sehjou mii in anhou suuknoh luunga ngirra amsei, miihouva antheih chuta tukhatkho muhnoh ei.
Saul in kuleinata inthousa; mahche amit amengin jakhatkho muh cheknohsa; chunna amahsoh aksehjou in akutta matuhjoua Damaskas ah anthlenpei.
Nijan inthumkhek amah in muh cheknohsa mahche sanoh iinnoh a amsa.
Ipek akming Ananias an ong aroikhat Damaskas a am. Akpu in amahkuunga ahamuhkhat a ason, “Ananias.” Che amah in ason, “Akpu, kei onna amsang.”
Mahche Akpu in amahkuunga ason, “Inthoua lam intluun antihna khanna sehro; che Judas in Tarsas na Saul an ong mii khat ruiro; alamva anro, amah in ngenna am,
amah in amit veikhat muh acheknatu akming Ananias an ong kupakhat in thlenga amahchunga akut asih in muh achekpei.”
Chuta Ananias in amsang, “Akpu amah in Jerusalem a nang Akseeng nimii antakchunga khalmoa thranoh atlohpeita amah relna mii jikchah ningnata kitheihpei;
che amah in nang nikmingta ak ong mii naamteta suur makaangnatu akthloi thiimpu akuungnata akchek amneh rai aphahpei.”
Chuta Akpu in amahkuunga ason, “Sehro, alamva amah i Jental mahche kurung ankuunga khatkho Israel asa kupa ankuunga kei kikmingta phurh a araannatu amahta keiin kichar kutlaisa;
alamva kei kikming relna amah in maichah phah a klah knang athotu tlame tihkha kammuhtu tlasa.”

Chunna Ananias in seh a inn akhanna luutsa. Che akutta Saul achunga asihche ason, “Unao Saul, nangin nithlengna lamma nammuh Akpu Jisu in nangin veikhat nimit muh nicheknatu mahche Akseeng Li in nisipnatu keita kamthlah ang.”
Cheva mah laitalla kak hanga akornanga jamekhat amitnata tlasa che amah in veikhat muh achekpei. Mahcheva inthoua inlupsa,
che saakphu asaakche trangsa.
Alamva nijan khalmo soot a amah in Damaskas na aroi eisoh amjousa.
Mahche kak hanga Sinakok ah Jisu ta raan raanna ason, “Amah i Ringpu vaa Asa kupa.”

Amah atrongta aktheih annaamte in salungkhoua ansonpei, “Amah akminga ak ong Jerusalem mii eita amnangmiikha mahmii inohme? Amah in anmahta makaanga akthloi thiimpu kuunga aphurhnatu madonna onna thlengnohme.”
Chuta Saul in ral ralla trangsa mahche Jisu i Khrista talsa chimta Damaskas na Judi eita anril amhalei.
Nijan jikcha aknua, Judi in amahta anthatnatu ansilpei,
chuta anmah in ansilkha Saul in arompei. Amahta anthatnatu suun khulouh phalkuung phalkuunga anmah in ruunga amsei;
chuta aroi in amahta phurh a khulouh a lungpal chungnata athlanga buka khat a thunna anmithlakpei.
Mahche Jerusalem a amah in athlenglai aroi eisoh anchunpinatu insuulsa; cheva anmah annaam in amahta trihsei, alamva amahkho aroi inkhatsa ta anmah in malotnohsei.

Chuta Barnabas in amahta aloulohpei, mahche Saul in Akpu ta lamma khatloh a amuhme che tunang in amahkuunga trongme chuche khatloh a Damaskas a amah in Jisu Khrista akminga karaanga trongme tihkha ankuunga asonpei.
Nga tloh a Saul in Jerusalem a anmah ankaar a luut a sehloon atlohpei,
amah in aril kraanga, Akpu akminga trong araanpei. Che amah in Kriik trong aktrong eita indah veia trongpia anjetpiei, chuta amahta anthatnatu anjon.
Cheva amah unaoin mahchuta anrompeia, amahta Tarsas a anmithlahpei.
Nga tloh a Judia na, Kalili na mahche Samaria na khakla ei in leh oi anphah; mahche Akpu ta trih a Akseenga Li a inboh a miitam ahanral.
Pek Pitar in ankaar a sehloon tloh a amah in Akpu kuunga akseeng miian amna Lidia a Jungsa.
Mah khanna akming Anias an ong khumchunga kum kirit intolh a apangnem thi mii khat aktuuk.
Che Pitar in amahninga ason, “Anias, Jisu Khrista in nangta namthratpei, inthoua nantolhnakha seemro.” Cheva kak hanga amah in inthousa.
Mahche Lidia ah che Sharon ak am annaamte in amahta anmuhpei, cheva anmah in Akpu kuunga inheisei.
Ipek Joppa a akming Tabitha ta an ong aroikhat louam, Tabitha arthava Dorkas an ongna. Amah Kumei ivah akthra thloultloh ah che amlantheih ah thra.
Mahnichunna amah in kna a thisa; cheva amahta ansilche, achungnung khumma anmitolhpei.
Lidia va Joppa soh innai taningva, Pitar va mah khanna amta antheih a, kupa innihta amahkuunga mathlah a, “Nirilvolla mathilnoh a kankuunga thlengro;” ta angenpei.

Chunna Pitar in inthoua anmahsoh sehjousa. Che amah in athlengsoh, amahta achungnung khum a ankalpipei. Trulmeinu annaam in akom anngirhche trap a amsei, Darkas in anmahsoh an amjou laia akthrui inluutei mahche aktlei puunrei eita amimuh.
Chuta Pitar in annaamteta apaalla amthruh eiche akhuk makamma angenpei; che aruungtonga inheia ason, “Tabitha, inthouro.” Chunna amah in meengsa, che Pitar ta amuh in inthoua inboksa.
Mahche amah akutta jamma amahta kaia amthohpei. Mahcheva akseeng mii leh trulmeinu eita onga anmah ankuunga kumeita kiringa amlanei.
Cheva mah i Joppa apumtein arompei, che mii jikcha in Akpu ta anmilotpei.
Che Pitar in Joppa a nijan khalmo soot a savun akseem Simon inkhatsoh amjousei.
amahva akchimlamseh che taploikuung apumma Ringpu ta trihmii inkhat, mahche mii kuungah aril liinna amlantheih khatkho Ringpu kuunga tranga akngenmii.
Nikhatni pung kuvak a Ringpu vaa ringroi inkhat in amahkunga thlenga Kornilias kuunga asonkha ahamuhkhat a thra a amuhpei.
Cheva amah in trihkanga anche ason, “Akpu mah i Jangsame?” Mahchunna ringroi in amahta ason, “Nangin ningen mahche namlan eikha Ringpu amaikhuunga koroutu veia kalsa.
Ipek kupa eita Joppa a mathlah eiro, che Pitar ta an ong Simon ta thlengpi eiso.
Amahva savun akseem Simon soh amjou, amah innva tuiiboom apaalna.”
Amahkuunga aktrong ringroi in ansehnua, amah roijuih ankaar nata innihche amah in atirh akjuihtrang raalmii anaamkaar a akchimlamseh inkhatta aongpei,
amah in maisoh inkeih a alamtanga asoneiche anmahta Joppa a amthlahpei.
Mahchuche akhuvar a anmah in lamma nga tloh a ansehlai, khuuboom innaisei, pung kurukvak a Pitar in angennatu inchunga kalsa.
Cheva avon traamma jangmekhat asaakjasa; atak in intrinanga amuh inkhatta muh a amsa.
Che ringram inhoongsa mahche jamekhat inrolh intlaapkhat thalei akiing manlia amthlak amuhpei.
Mahchunna alamtanga saak iin injao, avonna intolla akseh che akjuung vaakho injaosei.
Mahche amahkuunga ahoukhat thlengsa, “Pitar, inthouro, that a saaro.”
Chuta Pitar in ason, “Akpu, mahchunoh; alamva keiin tiknikho sakmangleh akseengnoh lousanoh ma ang.”
Khatla veinitihpi hou amahkuunga thlenglasa, “Ringpu in amseengche pootta nangin seengnoh ongnoro.”
Mah i veithumkhek inlenga nga tloh a suuksa, cheva kak hanga pootkha ringramma ahanpei.
Ipek Pitar in amuh ahamuhkha arthata inhalla amsuunga; anro, Kornilias in amthlah kupa in Simon innkha khometa thonga ngirra amsei
cheva anmah in Pitar ta an ong Simon kha amah khanna ammeta anruipei.
Mahche Pitar in ahamuh kharelna anhalsuunga, Li in amahkuunga ason, “Anro, kupa inthum in nangta nakjonei.
Inthoua trumro, che niril inhal tlonoh a anmahsoh inruuijouro; alamva anmahkha keiin kamthlah ei.”
Cheva Pitar in trumma anmah kuunga asonei, “Nannih in nanjonkha keisang, jarelna thlengchoume?”

Anmah in anson, “Raalmii reijapuui, akchimlamseh che Ringpu ta trihmii, Judi jatih apumtein antrongna Kornilias in nangta amah inna nithlengnatu che nang nitrongta arungeihnatu akseeng ringroi in amahkuunga amthlahpei.”
Chunna anmahta aongche amah inna asih ei.
Akhuvar a amah in inthoua anmahsoh inruuia sehsa, mahche Joppa tingna unaopasa ste in amahta anruipei.
Akhuvar a anmah in Keisaria a luutsei, Kornilias in anmahta ngaak a mahche ataploikuung unaoeisoh che anthringpi apaieita onga a ampiei.
Pitar in asuunga aluut in, Kornilias in amahta antuukpipei che amah akehkungah inriilla amahta amthruunpei.
Chuta Pitar in amthohche ason, “Ngirro; keikho miiang.”
Cheva amahsoh trongjoua asuunga luutsei che miitam amjou antuukpipei.

Che anmahta asonei, “Nantak Judi khat in aktlei jatih khatta inruuipi chunohleh intuukpi i khatloh a trongsuura tlohphunoh ta nanrom, chuta keiin tukhatta sakmang chunohleh akseengnoh tih a kiongnohnatu Ringpu in kammuh peiang.
Chunna mairella keita kamthlah anga, keiin indahnoh luunga thlengsang. Nannih in jarelna keikuunga mii namithlah meta kiruinachou.”
Kornilias in ason, “Nijan manli amaa a, pungku atlak in, keiinna ngenna ammang; cheva anro, antleh puunrei silh a kupakhat kimaa a ngirsa,
amah in ason, ‘Kornilias nangin ningenkha kitheihpei, che nangin niril liinna namlan eikha Ringpu amaa a antheihpei
alamchunna Joppa a akming Pitar an ong Simon ta ongnatu mii mathlahro; amahvah tuiiboom komma am savun akseem Simon inna tlunga amsa.’
Chunna kak hanga nangkuunga mii kamthlah, nangin nithlengi khalmo tlansa. Alamchunna Akpu in nangkuunga trongthuun amlan naamteta kanrungeih natu ipek kannaam Ringpu amaikuunga amsung.”
Mahchunna Pitar in aanga ason, “Taktak a keiin kirom mah chuvah Ringpu va keimii miimii manainoh,
chuta amahta aktrih jaatboom eita khatkho akchim aktloh miita amahkuunga loulouphu suuk.
Amah in Israel kuunga trong amthlahkha nannih in namrom, leh oi vaa akthra trongta Jisu in araan (amah in anaamtetu Akpu sa),
Judia ram pumteta sonna amdangnakha John in alupnua Kalili nata mathronna araanpei:

Ringpu in khatloh a Najareth vaa Jisu ta Akseeng Lia che tuuisoh thao apoime; khatloh a amah in akthra thloutloh a mahche seitan in akroieita mathrat a amunrelta seh, alamva Ringpu in amahta anruuipi.
Amah in Judi ei ramboom leh Jerusalem annih a atlohthlou anaamte relna kannih in sakhi veisung. Jisu ta thingkharh a mathoia anmah in anthatpei;
chuta Ringpu in amahta nithum tihpia thinata amringpei mahche indanglonga inmuhsa;
mii naamtein muhnoh eichuta Ringpu in acharche kannih in sakhitu veia kanmuhpei, amah in thinata aringche amahsoh kansaak kan iinjoupei.
Akringei mahche akthiche eita pichaar tlohnatu Ringpu in akseengthlou tlohnatu phom athunni amahmii isa ta mii kuungah akthratrong anraan mahche sakhi malannatu amah in trongthuunta kanimlanpei.
Ringraan annaam in amah relna sakhi amilan mah chuvah amahta amlot mii naamte in amahminga alehnahta in ip anphahtu.”
Pitar in trong ita asonlai aktlei mii naamte chunga Akseeng Li trumsa.
Cheva Pitar soh thlengjou amlot mii ankaarna in salungkhousei, alamva Jental anchungakho Akseeng Li apoihpei.
Alamva anmah in aktlei tronga trongsei Ringpu ta inkaanga amipaakta anmah in antheihpei. Mahchunna Pitar in ankuunga sonna amdangva,
“Inih in Akseeng Li iphah nangjimma akphah eita lupnatu tunangkhat in tuiita ithingchek ume?”
Cheva anmah in Khrista minga lupnatu anmah kuunga jathang amlannei. Mahche anmah in Pitar kuunga kak anmahsoh amjounatu anngenpei.
Ipekva Jental jaat inkho Ringpu trongta anrouloh peita Judia a am unaopasa inkho antheihpei.
Mahchunna Pitar in Jerusalem ahanglai, avuntan ruul in amahta trong injetpia,
anson, “Jarella nangin avuntan mii kuungah seh a nisaakpi eime?”
Chuta Pitar in ankuunga thra matheih a intlaanga son amthronpei:
“Keiin Joppa khuuboomma kingenlai, stuuipa in keidolh a kiamlai ahamuhkhat a intlaapkhat nanga trumma, ringram akiing manli nata amthlaak kimuh; mahchu kikuunga trumsa.
Mahchuta innaia kian in akeh manli amsa inkhat in inkhatta that a aksaa raprilsaei, intolh a akseh saei, mahche marvaanna va ei kimuh ei.
Che ahoukhat in keison kitheihpei; ‘Inthouro, Pitar; that a saaro.’
Chuta keiin kison; ‘Mahchunoh, Akpu; alamva akbuur mahche akseengnoh, kbaoa tiknikho luutnohmang.’
Chuta ringramtingna ahouin veinih tihpia amsangpei, ‘Ringpu in amseengche eita buur tih a lounohro.’
Mah i veithum suuksa, cheva anaamte ringramting ahanpei.
Mah laitalla kupa inthum kan amna a tlungsei, anmahva Keisaria nata keikuunga amithlah ei.
Inkaang inniim mathlinnoh a anmahsoh sehjounatu Li in keita keisonang.
Khatloh a ringroi in amah a inna ngir amuhmeta kanisonung che atihpei, ‘Joppa ah tumekhatta mathlah a akming Pitar an ong Simon ta thlenso;
nangleh nitaploikuung apumtein chaanring nanphahnatu amah in akthra trongta nangkuunga araantu.’
Keiin trong kamthronlai, Akseeng Li thlengnanga, antak chungakho thlengsa.
Mahchunna Akpu in khatloh a asonme keiin intheihsang, ‘John inva tuiia naniluppei chuta nannihva Akseeng Li in naniluptu.’
Inih in Akpu Jisu Khrista ta imlotlai Ringpu in inimlan kuttholta intrimbenga anmah ankuungakho malanleva, Ringpu ta andah a akthlengchek kei i tusangme?”
Mahtrong ita antheih in anmahva daichritsei. Mahche Ringpu ta paar mathrat a ansonpei, “Cheva Ringpu in Jental jatihkho anril mathlenga chaan amphah ei.”
Chuta Saipras a mahche Sairini na mii arouin Antiok a thlenga Kriik trong aktrong Judi ankuunga trongei mahche Akpu Jisu ta anraanpei.
Mahche Akpu akut in anmahta anruuipiei, mahchunna miitam in malot a Akpu tinga inheisei.
Mah trongraanni Jerusalem ah am Khakla amikur a tlungsa, cheva anmah in Barnabas ta Antiok a amithlahpei.
Amah in athlenglai Ringpu vaa malungsita amuhpei, che amah in aroomthoksa; anmah in Akputa malot a chet a an amnatu annaamta ril amthokei;
alamva amahva Akseeng Li in khatkho malot ah sip akthra mii. Mahche miitam Akpu kuunga athlenei.
Nga tloh a Barnabus in Saul ta ajonnatu Tarsas a sehsa;
cheva amahta aktuukpeia, Antiok a athlenpei. Alamva kumkhattluun anmah in Khakla soh intuuk a miitamta anmitheih; che Antiok a aroieita matsahremma Khristen ta an ongpei.
Pekva mahlaia ringraan in Jerusalem nata Antiok a thlengsei.
Mahche ankaarna khat akming Akabas in ngirra tukleiram apumta trihkhop saakchaal suuktuta Li in matsah a amphoongpei; che mah i Klaudias in apaallai suuksa.
Mahchunna aroi in anchek anchek nujuih a, Judia a ak am anmah unaopasa ankuunga majoomna mathlahnatu ngirsei;
Che thlouchu antlohpei, majoomnachu Barnabas leh Saul kut ah mathlah a anparuul eita anmiphahpei.
Mahlai chunna Herot kurungin Khakla mii aroueita akchutpei.
Amah in John anao Jems ta chemseiah athatpei;
mah khannata Judi anril pelseita Herod in amuh a, Pitar kho asuurnatu ajilpei. Mahchu Chol jaonoh Buhdoon asuungna.
Amahta asuurche simma asihpei, mahche Laalna buhdoon acheche miinaam kuunga amthruhja hanga amahta mangaaknatu raalmii manli manli in loom khatkhat vei loom manli ankuunga amahta amlanpei.
Chunna Pitar ta simma athunpei; chuta khakla in amah turella ril luut a Ringpu kuung anngen.
Herot in amahta amthruhsam aknital khulouh a, Pitar in raalmii innih kaara thirhang innih in ankhit a inna amsa, che akngaak ei in sim athongta ngaak a amsei;

che anro, Akpu vaa ringroi inkhat in amahkuunga indangsa, mahche akvaar khat in khumsuunga vaarsa; che amah in Pitar apangta pek pekta beenga amthohche asonpei, “Intha inthouro.” Chunna akutnata thirhangkha tlasa.
Che ringroi in amahta ason, “Nipuunrei silh a nikekkhrang chuungrosa.”
Cheva Pitar in inthruh a amah aknuta ajuihpei; ringroi in taktak a atlohthloukha amah in romnoh, chuta amahva ahamuh khatta kimuhta amdon.

Anmah in matsahnaleh innihtipi angaakna munkha vanna anthruh in, khuuboomtonga seh a thirpal kuunga thlengsei. Mahchu anmah turella akroua inhoongsa che anmah in inthruh a anvanche lamkhat juih a sehsei, cheva kak hanga ringroi in amahta amahpei.

Che Pitar in akroua bahab athlak inva atihpei, “Pekva mah i keikuunga tak a aksuuk thlousa mah chuvah Akpu in amah ringroita mathlah a Herod akutnata mahche Judi in tlohreita amidon anaamte nata keita keikalpei.”
Amah in arom inva Pitar in John anu akming Mark kho an ong Meri inna thlengsa, mah khanna miitam inboom a ngenna amsei.
Cheva Pitar in innkhaarta achumin, rungaaksa khat akming Rhoda in atrong amsangnatu inthruhsa.
Pitar ahouta arompeia, aroomthok malla innkhaarva mahoongnohsa chuta tlaanna aluutche Pitar in innkhaara ngirra amta asonpei.
Amahkuunga anson, “Nangi invetscheme.” Chuta amah in tranga asonei mah i taktaksa. Anmah in anson, “Mah i amahvaa ringroisa.”
Chuta Pitar in inn akhaarta inleng inlenga beenga amsa; anmah in inn akhaarta anmihoong invah amahta anmuhpeia salungkhousei.
Chuta anmah in daichrit a an amnahtu akut in amromei. Che amah in asonei, “Mah i Jems mahche unaoei ankuunga sonve.” Cheva amah in insenga aktleiting sehsa.
Ipekva ram avaarin Pitar ta khavei umeta raalmii ankaar a khalmo inhal suuksei.
Cheva Herot in amahta ajonta tuuknohsa, thong akngaakeita minna aruiche amahta thatnatu jathang amlanpei. Cheva Pitar in Judia nata Keisaria a jungsa, che mahkhan amsa.

Ipekva Herot in Tair leh Sidon na mii ankuunga amlunghangsa, chunna amah in loomkhat veia amahta intuukpinahtu thlengsei, che kurung innsuungta ak an amrel phrangkita leh oia amjounahtu annoolpei, alamva anmah ramboom in kurung ramboom nata saak in kanphahning.
Amahta intuukpinatu ajani khat ah Herot in kurung puunreita silh a phompii ah inbok a miitam kuunga trongsa.
Chunna mii in ongsei, “Mah i rappu khatvaa ahousa, miihounohsa!”
Kak hanga Akpu vaa ringroi khat in amahta ahaipuulpei, alamva amah in Ringpu vaa paarthrata jahnoh, cheva aklungin amahta asaakpei che thisa.
Chuta Ringpu atrongva ral ralla porh a liinsa che khalmo ahanralpei.
Cheva Barnabas leh Saul in mathlahthlou amithlung peia Jerusalem nata inlengsei, akming Mark ta an ong John ta anthlengpipei.
Pekva Antiok ah am khakla ah raangroiei, lulok ei, Barnabas, Niker an ong Simeon, Sairini na Lusias, Herot koolla akjao Manian mahche Saul,
anmah in Akputa amithruunlai mahche buh hella anngenlai, Akseeng Li in ankuunga asonei, “Thlou antlohnatu keiin kiong Barnabas leh Saul kha kei turella threk eive.”
Cheva buh hella anngenche ankutta anchunga ansihche anmahta amithlahpei.
Li Akseeng in amthlah eia anmah in Seleukia a jungsei, che mah khannata Saipras a muli chuunga sehsei.
Anmah in Salamis antlunglai, anmah in Judi ei Sinakokrel Ringpu atrongta anraan. Che anmahta majoomnatu John ta amiruui.
Tuiikoiram ta anmah in vanna Paphos a anseh in, mahchunna leiva aktloh theihsoh che chimnoh ringraan akming Bar–Jisu an ong Judi khatsoh intuuksei.
Amahva Serkias Paulas antih rampuui khatsoh inruuimii, mahmii rampuui in Ringpu trongta arungeihja hanga Barnabas leh Saul ta aongei.
Chuta rampuui in amlot khannata mathlahnatu leiva theih Elimas in (alamva amahmingi amilengin mainanga suuk) anmahta athingei.
Chuta akming Paul kho an ong Saul in Li Akseeng sip a amahta antlinga ason,
“Seitan asa kupa, akchimlamseh naamteta andah mahche billam mii masimna miileemleh thranoh in sip nang, Akpu vaa antluun lamta amkor dongnoh umangcheme?

Chunna pekva anro, nang nichunga Akpu akut am, nimit chotu mahche lai kak kini muhcheknoh uche.” Kak hanga sumphai leh inthim in achunga tlasa mahche amah akutta matuh a ansehpinatu miita maalla ajonpei.
Cheva rampuui khanna aksuuk thloukhata amuh inva amlotpei, alamva Akpu rella amitheihna khanna amahva salungkhou khemsa.
Pekva Paul mahche anruuipiei in Paphos nata Pamphilia khuuboom Perka a muli chuunga thlengsei. Mah khanna John in anmahta amah eiche Jerusalem a inlengsei;
chuta anmah in Perka nata Pisidia na Antiok ah thlengsei. Che sabat nia anmah in sinakok a luut a inboksei.
Trongsuur nata che ringraan in amijih niriknata anpaache, sinakok akpuui ei in anmah kuunga mii mathlah a anson, “Unaoeio, miita bungthoknatu nantrongsam amchoule, mahchu sonve.”
Ochunna Paul in ngirra akut a khoh an ason, “Israel ei mahche Ringpu aktrih eio, rungaive.
Israel vaa Ringpu in ipa ipu eita acharpei mahche anmah in Ijip a an amlai anmahta matheih matamma amliinei, che anmahta akutbaanga domma mah khannata anthruhpiei.
Che raprilla kum soplivak anruuipiei.
Che amah in Canaan ramma jaatboom sirihta ammaangche, anpa anpuin an amna ram phahphu veia anmahta amlannei, mahkha kum reija manli alei sopngavak luut.
Mahchuche aknua ringraan Samuel phah a amah in trongtloh eita amlannei.
Che anmah in kurung khat thunnatu annihpei; chunna Ringpu in Benjamin jatihna Kis asa kupa Saul ta kum sopli anchunga paalnatu amlannei.

Che Ringpu in amah aphomnata alohche, Davit ta anmah kurung amveipei; mah churella sakhi veia asonpei, ‘Keiin Jesi asa kupa Davit kuunga kiril kikditta kphahpei, keiin kamdon anaamte amah in atlohtu.’
Ringpu atrongchet nujuih a mahmii atute a Israel ta Akkal Jisu amthlahpei.
Amah in athlengnoh maa a Israel annaamte in anril thlengatu John in trong araanpei.
Mahche John in athlou achetumma asonei, ‘Nannih in keita tumeta namidon angme? Keiva mahmii khanoh ang, chuta amahva kiknua thlengmang, keiva amah akehkhraang arui majakho kimtik amnoh.’
“Unaoeio, Abraham innsuungvaa asa kupaeio, mahche nannih nankaar a Ringpu aktrih eio, inihkuunga amah chaanringvaa akthra trongi amthlahpei.

Alamva Jerusalem a am mii mahche anchunga akpaalei in Akpu ta asak maromnoh ei, chekho sabat nirel anpaa ringraanei antrongta lou theihnoh ei, amahta malaalla, matsah a inphoongche khata amithlungna amiveipei.
Amahta thatnatu alam tuuknoh seiklakho Pilat kuunga annihpei.
Che amahrella injih naamte anmah in amithlungpei, amahta thingkharh nata anlohche rusuun khat a ansihpei.
Chuta Ringpu in amahta kthinata amringpei;
mahche Kalili nata Jerusalem a athlengpijou mii ankuunga nijan khalmo soot a atakta ammuh ei, anmah in pekva mii kuungah sakhi veisei.
Che ipa ipu ankuunga Ringpu atrongchet akthra trongraanta nankuunga kanthlenchou,
Jisu ta amringche anmah ansakuunga mah ita amthlungpei; che mah i leila nirik innih tihpia injih inangsa, ‘Nangva kei kisa kupache, mi in keiin nangta kpokpeiche.’
Che amah in athihche amringpei, che kmaang kremma veikhat inlengnoh usa, nga tloh a amah in ason, ‘Keiin Davit vaa akseeng mahche doieita kamlan uche.’
Alamchuna aktlei leila nirik akho ason, ‘Nang nimii akseeng khata nangin akthi mamuhnoh uche.’
Davit relnava, amah atak ringnatluun in Ringpu in amdonrouta atlohche thisa mahche apa apu rusuunpiia amahkho anphuumpei, che aruungin thusa
chuta Ringpu in amringche amah invah thi muhnohsa.
Alamchunna unaoeio, maita nankuunga marom kikdit mah chuvah amah apaalla alehnata ipnatu trongi kanraanchou.
Moses vaa trongsuur apaalla nannih in alehnata nanningtam phahnoh choukha amahta malot apaalla mii naamtein alehnata ningtam nanphahpei.
Ringraanei in anson nirik a injih eikha nantak a tlaknohnatu cheksilve.
‘Anve, mii manuihtrang eio, salungkhouve maangve; alamva keiin nannih laia thloukhat kitloh, mii khat in mahchu nankuunga sonna marom slakho, thloukhat i nannih in tiknikho malotnohchou.’ ”
Anmah in anthruhsoh, mah ivah akthleng sabat nia anmah kuunga ansonnatu mii in inruruh a ansonpei.

Mahche sinakok a inchunkha ankoisoh, Judi mahche Judiei heikoh a akluut Ringpu ta ril luut a amlot miitam in Paul leh Barnabas annuuta anjuihpei, raangroi in anmah kuunga tronga che anmah in Ringpu vaa malungsia chat amnoh a an amnahtu antak ei.
Akhuvar sabat nia khuuboomna miitam in Ringpu trongta rungeihnatu inboomsei.
Chuta Judi in miitam khata anmuh inva, anmah in kallak a phuulsei, Paul in ason trongkhata mathleng tlamma anmahta andah a inhaangkanga trongsei.

Mahchunna Paul leh Barnabas in pirkenga a trongseia antihpei, “Matsahrem kannih in Ringpu atrongi nannih nankuunga sonnoh janohsa. Chuta nannih inva mah i indahschou, mahche ache amnoh ringna phah i nantaksaak in matik chanohta pichaar nantlohsaak taningva, anve kannihva Jental tinga inheia sehsung.
Alamva nga tloh a Akpu in kankuunga trongthuunta malanna kanisonpei, ‘Keiin nangta Jental jatih turella akvaar kamvei peiche, mahchunna thalei achenakhem phah a nangin chaanringta nithlennatu.’ ”
Mah ita Jental jatih in antheih inva anmah in anroomthoksa mahche Ringpu trongta paar anmithratpei; mahche ache amnoh ringna phahnahtu ancharmii in anmilotpei.
Mahcheva Akpu trongta anmah ram avel apumtea anraanpei.
Chuta Ringpu ta ril luut a amlot kumeiei, injah aja kumeiei mahche khuuboomna aklok kupa eita Judi in hou masuuk a, che Paul leh Barnabas ta andah a anchutche, anmah ramsiintinga aminompei.
Chuta anmahta andahna veia ankehna uphulta antatche amithiimpei, cheva Ikoniam a sehsei.
Mahche aroi eiin roomthok khatkho Li Akseeng in sipsei.
Pekva Ikoniam a Judi ei sinakok a luutjousei, che anmah in antrongin Judi leh Kriik khalmo tam in Akpu amilotpei.
Chuta amlotnoh Judi ei in Jental eita hou masuuknatu anrok mahche anmah unaota tuur thunna chirol antlohpei.
Chunna anmah in Akpu relna karaang kanga tronga mah khanna soot amsei, anmah ankut a daang jikcha mahche salungkhouna thlou jikcha tloh a Akpu amlungsivaa trongrelna sakhi veisei.
Chuta mah khuuboomna mii eikha ajejea inthreksei, mii arouin Judi ei toonga, mahche aktlei arouinla raangroiei toonga amsei.
Jental leh Judiei in anmah ramngaak eisoh amahta manangnatu mahche lung dennatu ansuulpei,
ta mahchuta anrom inva Likaonia vaa khuuboom Listra leh Derbe che amah aveel ramboom a tlaansei;
che mahram chunna akthra trongta anraanpei.
Pekva Listra a akeh sehtheihnoh a pok akehtu kupakhat inbok a am.
Paul in atrongta amah in minna arungeih; mahche keita kamthrattung ta amah in amlotkha Paul in amuh a amahta antlinga,
arool inkaanga ason, “Nang nikehkhan chimma ngirro.” Chunna amah in inthomma sehsa.
Paul in atlohthlouta miitam in anmuh inva anrool makaanga Likaonia tronga asonpei, “Rappu eiin miihoong loua inihkuunga trumsei.”
Anmah in Barnabas ta akming Jias antihpei che Paul ta akming Hermes antihpei, alamva amahva akthloi trongraansei.
Khuuboom amaatalla am mathruunna thlaamma Jias vaa thiimpu in mii tamsoh inthiimna a ankatja relna siilchal leili leh reikuul eita palthonga anthlenpei.
Chuta raangroi Barnabas leh Paul in mahchuta antheih a, anpuunreita anthritche miitam ankaar a luutthop a ongsei,

“Miieio, jarella mah i nantlohme? Kannihkho nannihsoh intrim miiung, nannih in mainang akanana amnoh thlou ita nga tloh a ringram, thalei, tuiiboom mahche mahsuunga am pumteta akseem akring Ringpu kuunga nanheinatu nankuunga akthra trongta kanthlenchou.
Akcheche ringnatluun na amah in jaat naamteta anmah in amidon lamma ansehnahtu ajehsei;
chuta amahtu sakhi amnoh avah mahnoh, alamva amah in marvaanna khuta masuur a akthra manjangnuram inimlan; amah in akthrata atlohpei, saak iin mahche roomthoksoh inruuia nannih nanrilta ampelpei.”
Mah trongchu ansonphao mii in anmah kuunga inthiimnahtu poot ankatsam luungkho anmah insuulla matlohnoh ei.
Chuta aroi eiin amahta kooia an amlai, amah in inthoua khuboomma luutsa; mahche akhuvar a amah in Barnabas soh Derbe a sehsei.
Anmah in khuuboom khanna akthra trongta anraanpei mahche aroi tam anseemche anmah in Listra, Ikonia mahche Antiok a inlengsei,
aroiei anlita matranga mahche malottinga inngainoh natu anmahta bungthok a asonei, trihkhop a klah knang jikchata doua inih in Ringpu kurung huunna a luut ume.
Mahche anmah turelna khakla relta anmah in anparuulta phom anthunei, che buh hella ngenna anmah in amlot mii eita Akpu kuunga amisilei.
Mahche anmah in Pisidia inthruh a ansehche Pamphilia a thlengsei.
Che anmah in akthra trongta raanna amilanche Attalia a jungsei;
mahcheva anmah in amipaangthlou kharelna Ringpu vaa malungsi in anmahta amisilna amun Antiok phah a muli chuunga thlengsei.
Mah khanna antlungin khakla anaamteta matlonna amichunche Ringpu in anmah anpaalla antlohthlou naamte che Ringpu in Jental jaat in amilotnatu akhaar amhoong peita anmah kuunga sonna amidangpei.
Che anmah in aroi eisoh inruuia mahmun khanna soot amsei.

Mahchunna Paul leh Barnabas in anmahsoh injahnoh a trong inngei insinsei, mahtrong inruiina relnava Paul leh Barnabas mahche aktlei mii arouta Jerusalem a raangroiei mahche anparuul ankuunga anhangnatu thlou anthunpei.

Nga tloh a khakla in anmahta mathlah a anmah in Phonikia mahche Samaria inthruh a anthleng in Jental jatih in anril anthleng kharelna antongpei, mahchunna khalmo anroomthokta unaopasa kuunga amidangpei.
Anmah in Jerusalem anthlengsoh khaklana raangroiei mahche anparuul eiin anmahta roomthok a anlousonpei, che Ringpu in anmah anpaalla atlohthlou anaamteta anmah kuunga ansonpei.
Chuta Pharisi nata amlot mii arouin ngirra anson, “Anmahta anvun tannoh janoh, mahche Moses vaa trongthuunta majuihnatu anmahta chaaknoh janoh.”
Mairelna intelna raangroi leh anparuul eiin inboomma intuuksei.

Anmah in trong soot a anngeiche aknua Petar in ngirra anmahta asonei, “Unaoeio, nannih in nanrom mah chuvah keiin Jental jaat in kanarnata akthra trongraanta theih a amilotnatu matsah a Ringpu in ikaarnata keita keicharpei.
Miirilta akrom Ringpu in ankuunga sakhi amlanpei, inihkuunga Akseeng Li amlannanga anmah kuungkho Akseeng Li amlanpei,
mahche inihleh anmah ikaar a inthliin jakahtkho sihnoh, chuta malot apaalla anmah anrilta amseengpei.
Mahchunna pekva ipa ipuinkho che inih inkho roon icheknoh potrik rukolta aroi anriingchunga thoonga nannih in Ringpu ta jarella chaang nan anme?
Chuta inih in imlot mah chuvah anmah nanga Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa malungsi apaalla inihkho inikaltu.”
Paul leh Barnabas anpaalla Ringpu in Jental Jaat ankaar a daang mahche salungkhouna thlou jikcha atlohrella ansonta anrugeih in mii inboom annaamte daichritsei.
Anmah in trong ancheche, Jems in amsang, “Unaoeio, keiin kisonni minna rungaive,
Simeon in inisonpei Ringpu in amah akming turelna anmah ankaar nata mii ruulkhatta alohnatu khatloh a Jental jatih a seh a an anme.
Ringraan antrong leh maisoh injaei, mah i nga tloh a injihsa,
‘Maiche aknua keiin inlengtunga, Davit in a amna inn inthrit khata keiin kiseemlatu; tumma akmaang khata keiin kiseemlatu, che mahchuta keiin kamngirhlatu,
mah chuvah anlei mii eiin mahche kei kikming ak ong Jental jaat naamtein Akpu ta anjontu,
mah namte i Akseem Akpu akromin ason.’
“Alamchunna kei pichaarva maisa, mah chuvah Jental jaat in Akpu kuunga inheisei inih in anmahta malaannoh eirei,
Chuta rappu ramnaia ankatpoot seengnoh mahche ariing raak a anthatsa khatkho thii saa iin antlohnoh nahtu majihreio.
Alamva amaa leithingna ringnatluun jikchanata khuuboomrel Moses vaa trongthuunta raanna thlengsei, sabat nirel Sinakok ah paa a thlengsei.”
Chunna Antiok ah amithlah angroi leh anparuulsei mahche khakla naamtein thratuta ngirsei, anmah in unaoei ankaar nata Barnabas ta an ong Judas leh Silas ta charra anmithlahpei,
amah athlangna trongjihthuun isoh amithlahpei: “Raangroi leh anparuul mahche unao pasa in Antiok ah, Siria mahche Silisia ah am Jental jaatna unaopasa nankuunga kamithruunchou.
Kannih in kamitheihnoh kankuung nata mii arouin nannihta mah trongin insuuk inhal nanimphahpei mahche nanrilta machetnohsa ta kantheihpei,
kannih in inkhatveia mii ste char a, anmahchuva kanringvol Barnabas leh Paul ta mathlah i thratuta kanjapei
anmah in inih Akpu Jisu Khrista rella anmah anchaan rou anjapei,
churella kannih in Judas mahche Silas ta kamithlahpei, kannih in kanjanakha anmah in nankuunga anson usa.
Amah darkaar inoh a akliin potrik amnoh i Akseeng Li in mahche kannihting thrasata kamidonpei;

mah chuvah rappu ramnaia ankatpoot akseengnoh saakphu saanoh, kupa kumei aleh thloua sehnoh, mahche ariing raak a anthat mahche thii saa iin nata nannih in inpelve. Mainang nata nannih in inpeelchoule, nannihting akthra veitu.”
Nga tloh a anmahta amithlahpei, anmah in Antiok a jungsei; mahche amlot kulsa eita anmitlonche, trongjihthuun chuta ankuunga amilanpei.
Anmah in mahchuta anpaache rilthokna trongkhanna anmah in anroomthoksa.
Ringraankho vei Judas leh Silas in unao eita trongla jikcha a anmah arilta thok a amitrangei.
Anmah in kak an amche, unao pasa eiin amahta amthlah miikuungala leh oia amithlahpei.
Chuta Silas in mah khanna a am in thratu kamdon.
Chuta Paul leh Barnabas vah aktlei mii eisoh Akpu trongta matheih a che raanna Antiok a amsei.
Nijan kak aknua Paul in Barnabas ta ason, “Inih in akthratrong iraan iraanna khanna veikhat inlenga khuuboomrel ak am iuhnao eikha khakha am eimeta anneiro.”
Barnabas invah Mark ta an ong John ta anmahsoh inruuia ansehpija.
Chuta Paul in Pamphilia a inpella inmah chuche anmahsoh thloutloh sehjounoh a anmahta inruuipi i thranohtuta Paul in amdonpei.
Anmah ankaara injanoh a khalmo anjetrella anmah in khatleh khat inthreksei; Barnabas in Mark ta phurh a muli chuunga Saipras a sehsei,
chuta unaoei in anmahta Akpu vaa malungsia amisilh peitaningva Paul inva Silas ta chaar a sehsa.
Che amah in Siria mahche Silisia vanna seh a khakla anlita amitrangei.
Che amah in Derbe leh Listra akho sehsa. Mahchunna aroi inkhat akming Timothi Judi kumei khat Ringpu amlotvaa asa kupa; chuta apavah Kriik jaat.
Amahvah Listra leh Ikoniam a am unaoei in khalmo ansoolna mii.
Paul inva Timothi ta anruuipija, amah amunna am Judiei relna Paul in amah avunta atan, alamva amah apavah Kriik ta annaamtein anrompei.
Anmah in khuuboom khuuboomma vanna anthleng in, Jerusalem a am raangroi leh anparuul ei in anmithlak trongirhnata anmah kuunga amilanpei.
Nga tloh a khakla ei in malotting huktrangei mahche akni aknileh mii ahanralpei.
Akseeng Li in Asia a akthra trongraan athingrella anmah in Phrikia mahche Kalatia ramta phaova sehsei.
Che anmah in Misia amaatalla anthlengche, Bithinia ah sehnatu insuulsei, chuta Jisu vaa Li in anmahta maluut janohsa.
Chunna Misia phaova anmah in Troas a jungsei.

Mahche Paul in khulouh a ahamuhkhat amuhpei. Mesidonia na kupakhat in ngirra akuunga ngenna ason, “Mesidonia ah sehnatu thlouraang kantlohpei, mahchunna akthra trongta anmah kuunga raannahtu Ringpu in kaniongpeita ngirsung.”
Chunna amah in ahamuh khata amuh inva anmah kuunga akthratrong iraannatu Ringpu in inihta iniongpeita kak hanga Mesidonia a sehnatu ngirsung.
Alamchunna Troas nata kannih in chimma Samothras phah a muli chuunga sehsung, mahche akhuvar a kannih in Nepolis a,
Mesidonia ramsiinvaa amuvei khuuboom mahche Rome in amtuh ram Philiia a sehsung. Mah khuuboom in kannih in nijan kak nichuunga amsung;
mahche sabat nia kannih in kololthong apaal avaakom khat a sehsung, mah khanna ngennamun amkho ajata kamidon, che mah khanna inchunna am kumei ankuunga trongsung.
Kannih kantrongta arungai kumei akmingva Lidia, amahva Thijatira khuuboomna, mangkra amchu puun akjuur, Ringpu ta amthruun kumei. Paul in asonta aril amluutnatu Akpu in arilta amhoongpei.
Che amah kumei khatkho ataploikuung annaamta kanlup in, “Keita chimma Akpu malot mii ta keilou choule, keiinna thlenga amve” ta kannihta tranga kanisonpei.
Kannih in ngenna amunkhanna kansehlai, naichi rungaaksa khat in kannihsoh intuuksa, amahva vaknua aksuuksam akphoong li am, mah thlouchu tloh a amah akpuei turella baobeh khalmo athrulh.
Amah rungaaksa in Paul khatkho kannihta kanijuih a, “Nankuunga chaanring phahnatu alam akraan mii i akthloirem Ringpu vah roijuihsei;” ta ongsa

Khalmo soot a amah in maita tloh a am. Chuta Paul ta amlaangtlam khanna amahtonga inheia asonpei, “Amah ningnata nanthruhnatu keiin Jisu Khrista akminga kikchaakche.” Che mah laitalla li in inthruhsa.
Chuta amah akpuei in baobeh ah matuura thrulhnakha imaangnatu veisa ta anmuhpeia, anmah in Paul leh Silas ta ansuurpei, anmahta keithiil suunga kaia aktloh akhal ankuunga ansonpei;
che anmahta pichaarpu ankuunga anthlenche anson, “Mahmii ei i Judi ei che anmah in inih khuboomta aminokpei.
Kannih khatkho Rome a ak am mii in louphunoh mahche majuih phunoh trongsuur kastamta anmah in amitheih.”
Miitam inchunna antakchunga kut anthlakpei, mahche pichaar akpuin anmah anpuunreita liimma akthritpeia che anmahta sunga ankhonnatu asonpei.
Che anmahta sungmun suplaak a ankhonche simma ansihpei, anmahta thra a ansihnatu sim angaak eita amisilpei.
Anmahta chaakna trongchu anphahche, sim asuungremma thunna ankehta thirhang amilukpei.
Chuta khulouh janjai vak a Paul leh Silas in ngenna mahche Ringpu ta mapaakna laatloh a amsei, simsuungna in anmah anlaachuta anrungeih,
cheva kak hanga runaangnu tranga inloksa, chunna sim amunkho inloksa; kak hanga thong anaamte inhoongsei mahche thirhang inlukeikho inliimkirsei.
Sim angaak in anthoh inva thong anaamte inhoong anmuhpei, simma anthun annaamte inlit a tlaanseita amdonpeia chemta juuk a akroua ansunatu insuulsa.
Chuta Paul in ahousuuk a onga ason, “Nikroua nimangnahtu tlohnohro, alamva kannaamte onna ammung.”
Sim angaak in meiserta anihche onga innotslamma asuunga luutsa, mahche intrikho intria inchuunna Paul leh Silas amaikuunga inriilsa,
anmahta apaal amthruh eiche asonei, “Unaoeio, keiin inkal kphahnatu jangkitlohtu tlame?”
Che anmah in anson, “Akpu Jisu ta malotro, nangleh nitaploikuung in inkal nanphahtu.”
Cheva amah khatkho ataploikuung in anpumteta Akpu trongta ansonpei.
Che mahni khulouh talla anmahta phurh a ansokna munta amah in tlenna achaammei, che mah laitalla amah khatkho ataploikuung pumte inlupsei.
Cheva anmahta a inna athleneiche ankuunga saakphu adoonei; mahche ataploikuung pumtein amilot inva khalmo anroomthoksa.
Chuta ram avaar invah pichaarpuei in pulista mathlah a ason, “Anmahta mathlah a maseh eiro.”
Cheva sim angaak in Paul kuunga amah trongchuta asonpei, “Pichaarpuei in nannihta mathlahnatu keikuunga mii amithlahpei; churella pekva inthruh aleh oia sehvesa.”

Chuta Paul in ankuunga asonei, “Kannih kamiraalkho tuuknoh ei, Rome namii kannihta miikaara kanihkhonche simma kanisihpei, mahche kannihta inruk a kanimthlahsam peime? Mahchu janohtu, antaktal thlenga kannihta apaalla kanimthurh eiso.”
Pulis in amah trongchuta pichaarpu ankuunga atongpei, cheva anmah i Rome na mii eita antheih inva intrisei.
Mahchunna ankuunga thlengseia kanlaalpeita ansonpei, che anmahta apaalla mathruh a khuuboom mathlah a ansehnatu ansonpei.
Nga tloh a anmah in simnata inthruhsei, Lidia ta seh a anphahpei, unao eita anmuh in anmah arilta anthokche sehsei.
Pekva anmah in Amphipolis mahche Apollonia vanna ansehche Thessalonika a thlengsei, mah amunchunna Judi ei sinakok khat louam.
Cheva Paul in anchangna nujuih a ankuunga luutsa, mahche kouh inthumkhek amahsoh ringjih nata rui ria intelsei,
Khrista in klah knang doua thinata ringtutla ta invuia anmahta amitheih ei, “Keiin nankuunga kraanva Jisu i Khrista khasa.”
Mahche ankaarna mii arouva amitheih in mahchu anjapei, cheva mathruunna ril akluut Kriik miitam mahche aklok kumei tam in Paul leh Silas soh pulsei.
Chuta Judiei in kallak eia kulthoknoh miita thlenna, miitam anmichunpei mahche khuboomta hou anmisuukpei, cheva Jason innta kut anthlakpei, anmahta apaalla miitam anmaa a mathruunnatu anjonpei.
Cheva anmahta antuuknoh invah anmah in Jason mahche anmah unaopasa arouta khuuboomna akchek amneh ei anmaikuunga kaia ongsei, “Tukleiramta achung athlang amlatmii eikha onna thlengsei,
che Jason in anmahta alouloh ei, mahche annaamtein Keisaar jathangta indah a thloutloh a antihpei mah chuvah Jisu antih aktlei kurung khat am.”
Miitam che khuuboomna akchek amneh eiin mahchuta antheih in anril innoksa.
Cheva anmah in Jason mahche aktlei tingnata baobeh anlohche, anmahta amisehpei.
Unao pasa eiin kak hanga khulouh a Paul leh Silas ta Beroa a amithlahpei; che mahkhan antlungin anmah in Judi ei sinakok a luutsei.
Pekva amah Judi ei in Thessalonika a am Judiei anchunga ralla anril liinnei, alamva anmah in akthra trongraanta traamma anlouloh, mahche ringjihta aknirel chim chimnoh amijon.
Mah churella Kriik ah ankaang savaanga am kupa kumei miitam in amilotpei.
Chuta Paul in Beria akho Ringpu trongta araanpei ta Thessalonia na Judiei in anrompei, mah khanna thlenga miitamta masoh a hou anmisuukpei.
Cheva kak hanga unaopasa eiin Paul ta tuiiboomma sehnatu amithlahpei, chuta Silas leh Timothi va mah khanna inmahsei.
Mahche Paul ta akthul ei in amahta Athens phah a anthlenpei; che Silas leh Timothi ta inthademma amahkuunga mathlengnatu jathang anphahche anmah in sehsei.
Pekva Paul in Athens ah anmahta ngaak a an amlai, khuuboom khanna rappu leili in sip a am anmuh in amlunghaangsa.
Chunna amah in sinakok a Judi eisoh mahche anril luut a amthruunmii eisoh trong inngeia intelsei, che aknirel keithilla ak ammei sohkho trong intellei.

Epikurian leh Stoik aksui amjon ei in Paul soh intuuksei. Mahche mii arouin ansonpei, “Amah in trongtlammi jangta asonmeio?” Arouin ansonpei, “Amah i aktlei ramboomna rappurella trong akraan mii inlo, alamva amah in Jisu mahche thinata ring rella trong.”
Cheva anmah in Paul ta matuh a Aiopakas kuunga thlenna ansonpei, “Nangin trong niraan akthar namtheihna i jangtame kannihkho kanromja khame?
Alamva akthar trongla kamikura nithlen; chunna mah i jangta nisonname kanromja.”
Pekva Athens na mii naamte mahche okhanna am miiramna in akthar trongla son chunoh arungainoh avah aktlei jakhatkho tlohnoh a amningsei.
Chunna Paul in Ariopakas alaia ngirra ason, “Athens a am miieio billamma nannih in heikoh ah nanril khalmo luutmiichou tih a kirom.

Alamva kiseh kisehna a nannih in namithruunpot ei i kimuh kian in nga tloh a inhak a injih thiilkung khat keiin kiktuukpei, ‘Inromnoh rappua.’ Churella nannih in romnoh a namithruun ita keiin nankuunga sonna kiraanchou.
Ringpu vaa tukleiram mahche mah khanna ak am apumteta akseemsa, amah in marvaan leh thaleitu Akpu taningva mii in kut ah iseem thlaamma amnoh.
Amah in avaatna amnanga miiva kut in amahta routlohna phukho suuknoh, ipekphah amah in mii naamteta chaan, phuuk mahche billamta amlan.

Ohche amah in mii khatnata miijaatih anaamteta thaleichung apumtea anna amnatu aseempei. Amah in lai laitu aksuuksam aknieita khek khekta amnaipei mahche mii in an amnatu ramrieita matsah a amdon nujuih a atlohpei,
anmah in mii naamte nata inlah a amnoslakho, anmah in Ringpu ta anjonnatu, ankut in amahta palla anrilla suuk mahche tuuk ancheknatu,
alamva inih in amah kuungah ringme, inchek iphah mahche paalme; mah i nannih nanmii jirim amjih arouin anson nanga ‘Alamva inihva amah atuteme.’
Alamchunna inih in Ringpu vaa atute taningmeva, Ringpu i miikut in iseemtheih mahche miirilla madonna iseem ra-ao nohle harngou nohle lung leili khatnang tih a inih in madonnoh tupotme.
Mii eiin Ringpu ta aromnoh laiva Ringpu in miita a ipmang, chuta ipekva amah in amun anaamtea ak am mii naamteta rilthlengnatu trongthuun amlanpei,
alamva amah in thlou athun mii khanna tukleiramta chimma pichaar atlohnatu aknikhat amnaipei, amahta thinata maringa mii naamte kuunga chimsa ta asonpei.”
Pekva akthi in iringsme ta anraan antheih invah mii arou invah amahta aminuihpei; chuta mii arou inlavah ansonpei, “Mairelna kannih in nangkuung nata veikhat kanrungeih jamang.”
Nga tloh a Paul in mii anboomeita amahpei.
Chuta mii arou invah Paul ta anjuihpei che amilotpei, anmah ankaar a Aropakas va jamana Dionisias, kumei khat akming Darmaris che anmahsoh inruuia aktleikho injaosei.
Oiche aknua Paul in Athens mah a Korinthia ah sehsa.

Mah khanna Pontas a pok a anthohna akmingva Akuila Judi mii khat antuukpipei, amahva akmei Priskilla soh inrangte a Itali nata thlengmang, alamva Klaudias in Judi naamteta Rome mathlah a ansehnatu jathang amlanpei. Chunna anmahta inmuhpinatu Paul in sehsa;
alamva amah athlousoh inchunrelna anmahsoh amjoua thlou antlohjou, anmah anthlouva khlupuun thlaamtloh ei.
Amah in sabat nirel sinakok a trong antelpiei, mahche Judi leh Kriik eita amjanatu aksuulei.
Silas mahche Timothi in Mesidonia nata anthleng in Paul vaa akthra trongraan thloua aril amluutpei, Judi ankuunga Jisu i Khrista sa ta sakhi amlannei.
Chunna anmah in amahta indah a ansaal in, apuunta thinna asonei, “Nannih nanthii nantaksaak chunga tlaso! Keiva kilaan amnoh. Ipeknata keiva Jental tinga seh usang.”
Cheva ohkhannata mathlah a akming Titas Jastas an ong Ringpu ta amthruun kupakhat in seh a amah innva sinakok soh intonga am.
Sinakok akpuui Krispas inruuia amah ataploikuung in Akpu ta amilot; che Corinthia na mii jikcha inkho mahchuta antheih a amilotpei che inlupsei.
Nikhat khulouh a Akpu in Paul vaa ahamuh a ason, “Intrinohro, chuta trongro daichirit nohro;
alamva keiin kanruuipiche, tukhat inkho nitakchunga nakpal namsok tlohnohtuei; alamva mah khuuboom inna keimii tam ammei.”
Ohkhanna anmahta Paul in Ringpu trong matheih a mah khanna kumkhat che thla kuruk amsa.
Chuta Kalio in Akhaia vaa rampuui aveilaia, Judiei in inkhatveia Paul ta suura Pichaar koolla anthlenpei,
mahche asonpei, “Mahmii in trongthuunta indah veia Ringpu ta namithruuntu ta miita amsoh ei.”
Chuta Paul in atrongsam tumma, Kalio in Judi eita asonei, “Judi eio, nannih in mah i chimnoh thlou mahche kochanoh aiilkhoi thlou rella leva, keiin antrong anlata louphu suuk;
chuta mah i jakhatnoh trong akmingrelna che nanrou trongthuun relna trongtlohna veile nantak nanroua mathlaakve; mainang relna keiin pichaar akpu vei indah ang.”
Cheva amah in pichaarkool nata anmahta amnompei.
Chunna anmah in sinakok akpuui Sosthenes ta ansuurpei che pichaarkool amaatalla ankhonpei. Chuta mah aksuukthlou khanna Kalio invah jakhatkho aril inheinohsa.

Maiche aknua Paul in nijan ste sootbeb a amche unao pasata inthrek pinatu trong asonche Siria a muli chuunga sehsa, che Prisilla leh Akuila in amahsoh inruuijousei. Kenkri a asam akchehpei, alamva amah atrongirhna khat am.
Cheva anmah in Ephesia ah thlenga anmahta ohkhanna amahpei; chuta atakva sinakok a luut a Judi eisoh trong inkherhsei.
Amahta ste soot a amnatu ansonta atak in indahsa;
chuta inthrekna trong anmah kuunga atrongche asonei, “Ringpu in amdon veile keiin nankuunga veikhat inlenglatung,” cheva amah in Ephesia nata muli chuunga sehsa.
Amah in Keisaria atlungsoh, Jerusalem a hanga khakla ta roomthok a amthruunei, mah chunnata lai kak amche, Galatia che Phrikia ramma seh a aroi naamteta malottinga amtrangei.
Amah in Antiok a lai kak amche Kalatia mahche Phrikia ram avella khatnata khat a seh a aroi eiin Akpu amilotta ralla amtrangei.
Mahlaia Judi inkhat akmingva Appolos an ong Alenxandria ah pok mii in Ephesia ah thlengsa. Amahvah innaalla trongtheih, ringjihta thra a akrom mii.
Amahta Akpu vaa alamrelna anmitheihpei; amahvah John in alupkhop relna romslakho, anmah in li luut a Jisu relna trongsa mahche miita chimma amtheih ei.
Amah in sinakok ah intrinoh luunga trong amthronpei, amahta inna phurh a Ringpu alamta minna invuia amitheihpei.

Cheva amah in Akhaia a asehja hanga, unaopasa in arilta amitrangpei, che amahta roomthok a anroulohnatu aroi ankuunga trongjihthuunta majih a anmithlahpei. Mahkhan atlungin, malungsivaa akli a amlot miita khalmo amjoomei,
alamva atuui amma Judi eisoh trong ansin in amah in Jisu vah Khrista saa ta ringjih nata ammuh ei.
Appolos in Corinthia a amlai Paul in achungtong khuuboom vanna Ephesia ah thlengsa. Mah khanna aroi ste aktuukpei.
Che anmahta asonei, “Nannih in namilotlai Akseeng Li nanphahme?” Chunna anmah in anson, “Akseeng Li am tihkho kannihva lou theihnoh ung.”
Chunna amah in asonei, “Chuleva nannih in jaknang hoongkhanna inlupchoume?” Anmah in anson, “John in alupna hoongkhanna inlupung.”
Chunna Paul in ankuunga asonei, “Rilthlengnatu John in alupei, amah aknua akthleng mah chuvah Jisu ta amilotnatu asonei.”
Mahchuta antheih in anmah in Akpu Jisu akminga inlupsei.
Mahche Paul in anchunga akut asih in Akseeng Li anchunga trumsa; ohchunna anmah in aktlei tronga trongsei che Ringpu trongta anraanpei.
Mahcheva anmah annaamvah mii somleinih vak ei.
Che amah in sinakok ah luut a intrinoh a thlathum tronga Ringpu kurung huunna relna antelpipei mahche amilotnatu aksuulei,
chuta mii arou inva anril maluutnohsei, che malotnohsei, mahche anmahta mah a sehsa che aroieita sehpia Tirannas thlaampiia aknirel intelsei.
Amah in kumnih phah a am, chunna Asia a am Judi leh Kriik annamte in Akpu trongta antheihpei.
Ringpu in Paul akut ah salungkhouna thlou khalmo amtloh,
chunna lumaan nohle puuneita amah aruungnata phurh a aknakuunga anthlen in akna aksaa thraei mahche thranoh li in anmah ankuungnata inthruh ei.

Mahlaia amun khatnata khat ah inloi akseh ei in thranoh lita amnomchek Judi mii ste inkho thranoh li akluutta manomnatu anchunga Akpu Jisu mingta sonna antih ei, “Paul in araantrongva Jisu minga nanthruhnatu keiin jathang kamlanchou.”
Judiei akthloi thiimpu akming Skiva asa kupa sirih in mainangta tloh a ammei
Chuta thranoh li in anmahta amsangei, “Keiin Jisu ta kirom mahche keiin Paul kho kirom; chuta nangva tucheme?”
Cheva thranoh li in aluutna mii khanna antakchunga injaamsa, anmah naamteta insuulpia achekirei, cheva anmah in athlaia mahche atakta insoksik a inn khannata tlaansei.
Ephesia ah am Judi mahche Kriik annaamte in maita anrompei; chunna annaamtea intri hangsei; mahche Akpu Jisu mingta inkaanga amipaakpei.
Amlot mii jikcha inkho thlenga inruk a thranoh antlohthlouta indanga ansonpei.
Che mittrang aktheih miitam inkho anmah nirik thlenna miitam anmaikuunga matlonna anhaalkirpei; anmah in nirik anaamteva aman anten in pulla harngou baobeh akpul sopngasa.
Nga tloh a Akpu trongta khalmo raanna pungporh a akchek amnehsoh liinsa.
Pekva mah ei i aknua Paul in Mesidonia che Akhaia vanna Jerusalem a asehnatu Li in ason, “Keiin mahkhan kiamche Rome kho kmuhtutla.”
Che amahta amjoom Timothi leh Erastas innihta Mesidonia ah amthlah eiche amah atakva Asia ah kak amsa.
Mahlaia Akpu vaa lamrella khalmo trong suuksa.
Alamva akming Demitrias antih mii khat harngou akseem in Artemis rapputhlaam ahoongta maseemma mii jikchaeita thlou matloh a khalmo baobeh aphahnaei.
Mah thlouin aktlohjou mii eita onga machunna asonei, “Unaoeio, mah thlou itloh inna inih in doonkhaalme ta nanrom.
Mahche nannih in nantheihpei che nanmuhpei mah chuvah Ephesia khop noh a Asia ram apumtea Paul in miita kut ah iseem rappu i Ringpu noh tih a sonna miita amah atrongting aphurh ei.

Maanna inih baobeh thrulhnata thihnaringna ah mathlaak khop noh a akthloi rappunu Artemis vaa mathruunna thlaam inthangkho akming amthitu, Asia naamte che tukleiram amun apumtea mii in anmithruun rappunuvaa akchek amneh akulkho ammaangtu.”
Maita antheih in anmah in khalmoa amilung inhaangsei, cheva ongseia antihpei, “Ephesia na miiei Artemis in akthloisa.”
Nga tloh a khuuboom apumteta anmihal tlampei; anmah in Paul soh sehjou Mesidonia na mii Kaijas che Aristarkas ta suura khalek veia leengna munna intha a luutsei.
Paul in miitam kaar a luuttangta amdon, chuta aroi eiin amahta maluutnohsei,
amah apaiei, Asia na aktloh akhal arouin amahta leengna munna intrinoh a luutnatu ansonpei.
Pek arouin trongkhat a ongsei chela arouinla trongkhat ah ongsei, che mii aktam in jangtlohnatu inhom seime ta maromnohsei.
Miitam kaarnata arouin Alexander ta amaatonga an ilpei. Mahchunna Alexander in miitamta rimta an amnatu akut a amrompei, atakta anngaaknatu trong aksuul.
Chuta mah i Judi miisa ta anrom invah, pung innivak anmah in rool khalek a ongsei, “Ephesia na mii Artemis in akthloisa.”

Chuuna khuupiina amjih miikhan miitamta daichrit a asih ei che asonei, “Ephesia kupaeio, Ephesia khuuboomna akthloi rappunu Artemis thlaamta aksel mahche marvaannata aktla akseeng lungta akromnoh jaknangmii amchoume?
Mahchunna mah i indahna janoh taningva nannih in rimta amtu tlachou mahche innotslamma jakhatkho tlohnohve.
Alamva rappu mathruunna thlaamna pootta inrunoh mahche inih rappunuta thranoh a aktrongnoh mii eita nanthlenpei.
Churella Demitrias che amahsoh kutthloua aktheih mii inta tukhat chunga trongkat amleva, pichaarkool inhoonga am, mahche rampuuimii ammei; anmah in aklaanchu thlen eiso.
Chuta nannih in maichunga nanjon amleh, mahchu pichaar aknujuih a injomma aktlohkhal jama in trongir amithlaktu.
Alamva mi in housuuk irelnavah inih in thihna ringnasoh intuukmangme, mainang housuuk relnava kannih in akchim malan cheknohtu ung.”
Maita asonche miitam inchunta amthriinpei.
Housuukha annemnua, Paul in aroieita onga bungthok amlanei che anmahta mah a asehnatu asonche atakva Mesidonia ah sehsa.
Amah in ram jikchahta vanna asehlai anmahta ril matrangna trong khalmoa asonei, che amah in Kriis ah thlengsa.
Mah khanna thlathum amsa, che amah in Siria ah muli chuunga sehtangta anchaanglai, Judiei in amahninga thranoh tlohnatu ansuulpei, chunna amah in Mesidonia vanna anlengnatu aril ngirsa.
Amah in anruuipi miieichuva Beroia na Piarhas asa kupa Sopater, Thessalonia na Aristarkhas mahche Sekandas. Che Derbe na Kaias, Timothi che Asia na Taikhikas leh Trophimas mahche Timothi anmahsei.
Anmah in kanmaa a louseh a Troas ah kaningaak a louamsei,
chuta Chol jaonoh Tol buhdoon aknua kannih in Philippi nata muli chuunga sehsung, mahche nijan ranga aknua Troas ah ankuunga thlengsung, mah khanna nijan sirih amsung.
Matsahrem kouh aknua, kannih in tolta masuuknatu kanchunlai, Paul in tungva asehja hanga anmahsoh janjai phah a tronga amsa.
Kannih in kanchunna achungnung khumma mitton tam intaar.
Akming Eutikhas antih naokhat in inn thongsiinna inbok a am, Paul in soot atrong inva imuh alohpeia thikhemma insa, cheva inn inkaang inthumtihpi arelanata tlasa mahche thia anchunpei.
Paul in trumma naota akpomche ason, “Nanril malahnohve, alamva amah achaan atak a ammang.”
Paul in inn inkaang inthumtihpi arella kalsa mahche tolta masuuk a ansaakpei, anmahsoh soot ramvaarphah a trongsa, cheva sehsa.
Mahche anmah in kupasa khata ringa anphurhpei, che anmah anroomthokha ste sta nohsa.
Chuta kannih in muli amna a matsah a lousehsung, muli chuunga Asos ah sehsung, kannih in Paul ta mah khannata mulia kanphurhjasa, alamva Paul in kehlamma sehtangta inchaangsa.
Amah in kannihsoh Asos ah antuuklai, amahta muli machuunga kannih in Mitilini ah thlengsung.
Kannih in mah khannata muli chuunga kansehlai akhuvar a Khios amaatalla thlengsung; mahche akhuvar akho kannih in Samos ah muli chuunga kanthlengche Miletas ah tlungsung.
Alamva Paul in Asia a lai soot a amnohnatu Ephesia vanna muli achuungnatu aril ngirsa; alamva vei ajaleva Pentikos nia amah in Jerusalem atlungnatu innotsa.
Mahche Paul in Miletas nata Ephesia ah pao mathlah a mah khanna am khakla va anparuul eita aongei.
Che amahkuunga anthleng in alousonpei,
“Keiin Asia ramma kikeh kichuunni khannata lai amrella keiin nannihsoh inruuia khatloh a ammangme ta nantak in nanrom,
inruruh a mahche ruithli luungsoh inruuia Akpu ta rou kitloh mahche Judiei in keita thranoh masuuknatu chaang kan annang;
nannih in inkal nanphahnatu akirkho khaak tlonohluunga nankuunga sonna kamdangkir peichou, che savaangna mahche inn inna kamtheih peichou.
Judi leh Kriik mii annih kuunga Ringpu kuunga anril thlengnatu mahche Akpu Jisu Khrista ta malotnatu sakhi kamlan.
Che pekva anvesa, Li in keikhit a Jerusalem a sehsang, mah khanna keininga kha suuktungme romnoh ang;
khuuboomrel niseh nisehna a simma niluutnatu mahche klah knang niphahnatu nangta nakngaak a amta Akseeng Li in keikuunga keison khopta kromning.

Chuta kei i aman tammang chunoh a amanchaal mii angta insonnoh ang, keiin kitlohtuphu kithlouta mapaang chuche Ringpu amlungsiva akthra trongta sakhi malannatu Akpu Jisu ningnata keiin kaphah routlohta aktlohsang.
Ringpu kurung huunnavaa Akthra Trongta nankaar a keiin raanna sehsang, che pekva anve, nannih tukhat inkho kei kimeelta veikhat inlenga keimuhnoh usachou ta krom.
Churella keiin mi in nangkuunga sakhi kamlanchou mah chuvah tukhat inta nanchaan maang chouleva kei kamraal amnoh,
alamva Ringpu in inichaak inimtheih apumte akirkho mathlahnoh luunga nangkuunga sonna kamdangkir peichou.
Nantak turella mahche sadamlom naamte turella pirve, amah Asa kupa vaa thii in akleiche Ringpu vaa khakla ta thra nanroinatu Li Akseeng in nannihta ak an nanimveipei.
Mah i keiin krom mah chuvah keiin kisehnua akraang uiiramuiipii eiin nankaara thlengtuei, sadamlom inleia mahnohtu;
mahche nannih nankaarna amlot miiluungkho masimna a chimnoh lamting naniphurh natu nankaarna mii inthruh tuei.
Alamchunna pirve, kumthum luut a suun khulouh inngainoh a ruithli luunga kamtheih choukha intheihve.
Pekva keiin nannihta Ringpu mahche amah malungsita son aja kisonpeichou mahtrongin nannihta naniseem achek che amah in amseengche mii in aphahtuphu doikha nanimlan achek.
Keiin tukhat kuungata haarngou nohle ra–ao nohle inliingna puunreita ralla dinoh ang.
Kei darkaar a mahche tlohkhalla kisehpijou in anvaat anpa jikcha kikut innih in tlohkhalla rou kitlohpieita nanrom.

Mah naamte i nankuunga kammuh peichou mah chuvah nga tloh a thlou tranga tlohcheknoh aksool miita imjoomtu tla, Akpu Jisu atrong, ‘Akphahchunga amlan in ralla doiphah vei’ tih a asonkha intheihtu tlame.”
Nga tloh a atrongche anmahsoh ankhuk makamjoua annaam anngenjoupei.
Che anaamtea trapsei mahche Paul ta kon konna amichohpei,
Anmah in kei kimeelta veikhat inlenga keimuhnoh usachou ta asonkhanna anril khalmo kaangei. Cheva amah in keita mulithaangna phah a kanthulang.
Kannih in anmahsoh kanthrekche muli chuunga antluunna Kos ah thlengsung, akhuvar khanna Rhodes, che mah khannata Patara ah thlengsung.
Mah khannata Phonisia ah aksehsam mulikhat kantuuk a mah khannata chuunga sehsung.
Kanthlengin Saipras kanmuhpei, che kannih in kaveitong mah ah muli chuunga kansehche Tair ah tlungsung; alamva mah khanna mulina pootta amithrumsam.
Mah khanna aroi eisoh intuuk unga nijan sirih amsung. Li vaa akliia anmah in Paul ta Jerusalem a asehnohnatu ansonpei.

Kannih in kan amnatu anising atangche, mah khannata mah a sehlasung; anmah anmei ansasoh annaam inruuia khuuboom apaal phah a kanithulpei; mahche tuiiboom apaalla kankhuk makamma kanngen mahche inthreknatu trong khatleh khat kansonche inthreksung.
Mahcheva kannih in muli chuunga sehsung che anmahkho an inna inlengsei.
Kannih in Tair nata tuiiboomma lamsei seh kanche che Tolemais ah tlungsung; mahche unaopasa eita roomthok a kamithruunche anmahsoh nikhat amjousung.
Che akhuvar a kannih in seh a Keiseria ah thlengsung; che mii sirih suunga khatva evenjalis akming Philip amah innsuunga luut a amahsoh amjousung.
Amah asarungak manli ammei changvaangnoh mangei, anmahva ringraanei.
Mah khanna kannih in nikhat ninih kan amlai, akming Akabas an ong ringraan khat Judia nata thlengsa.

Kankuunga thlenga Paul in anraakna khapatta alohche akeh akut a akhitche ason, “Akseeng Li in ngata nakson, nga tloh a Jerusalemna Judi ei in khapat akputalta amah khapatsaak a khit a Jental ankut a anmilantu.”
Amah trongchuta kantheih in, mah khanna ak am in amahta Jerusalem a asehnohnatu kanngenpei.
Chunna Paul in amsangpei, “Nannih in trap a kirilta nankhoih angi jarelname? Alamva keiva Akpu Jisu akmingrelna Jerusalem simma luutkhopnoh a thihnatu phah a thlouraang kitlohpei.”
Amahta masehnoh natu kansuulta ajanoh inva, “Akpu in amdon veiso,” ta inngaisung.
Maiche aknua kannih in thlouraang tloh a Jerusalem a hangsung.
Mahche Keiseria na aroi aroukho kannihsoh sehjousung, kannih in kantlungnasam matsah a aroi akvei Saipras na Manason inna kaniphurhpei.
Kannih in Jerusalem kanthlengin, unao pasa eiin roomthok a kanimthlungpei.
Akhuvar a Paul soh kannihsoh Jems kuunga sehsung; mahche anparuul naamte louamsei.
Anmahta roomthok a amthruuneiche, amah in rou atloh Ringpu in Jental ankaar a atlohthlouta khatkhat a atongpei.

Mahchuta antheih in, anmah in Ringpu ta paar anmithratpei. Che amahta anson, “Kan uh kannao Paul o, Judi ankaara amlot mii akpul jikcha tam ammiieime nirom mahche annaamtea trongthuunna anril anmiluutpei,
Jental ankaar a ak am Judi annaamta Moses trongthuunta mathlah a ansa eita anvun tannohve mahche kastamta majuihnohve ta nangin namtheih peita anmah in nangrella antheihkirpei.
Chuleva kha itloh usaame? Nang thlengsa ta inlitnoh a antheih usa.
Churella nangkuunga kansonni majuihro. Trongchet aklou mii manli kannihsoh ammei;

mahmii manlitia maruuia anmahsoh nitak maseengrosa che anmahtu akluut inbaobeh nangin malanro, chunna ansam anchehnatu. Nga tloh a nangrelna ansonchahkha chimnohta annaamte in anromtu chuta nitakva trongthuunta ngaak a ringro.

Chuta amlot Jental turelnavah kannih in tranga sonna mah i kamithlakpei; mah chuvah anmah in rappu leili ah andoonpoot saakphunata, thinata, che aruking raak a anthat siildaar nata khatkho ahoong thranonata inpelve.”
Mahche Paul in mahmii chuta aphurh eiche akhuvaara amah leh anmah antakta anmiseengpei, mahche maseengna achenia anmah khatkhat in katphu amilannatu laita maromnatu mathruunna thlaamma luutsei.
Nijan sirih achetumma, Asia na Judiei in mathruunna thlaamsuunga Paul ta anmuh in, miitamta hou amsuuk ta amahta ansuurpei,

Anmah in ongsei, “Israel miieio kanimjoomve! Amunrel sehseh a trongthuunta che anmah mathruunna thlaameita janoh a miita amtheih kupa i mahmii isa; oichunga mathruunna thlaam asuunga Kriik eita thlen thlenna amah akseengmun ita amibuurpei”
Alamva anmah in khuboomma Paul leh Ephesia na mii Trophimas ta matsah a anmuhpei, che Paul in amahta mathruunna thlaamma aluutpipeita anmah in amidonpei.

Cheva khuuboom apumte hou masuuk a anthohpei, chunna miitam in inthruh a tlaanna thlengjousei; anmah in mathruunna thlaam asuungnata Paul ta matolh a kaia amithruhpei che kak hanga thongkho ankhaarkirpei.
Che amahta anthatnatu ansuullai, Jerusalem apumtea housuuksa ta Rome na raalmii akloktingnata trong thlengsa.
Kak hanga amah in raalmii leh raalmii reijapuui eita phurh a miitam amnatinga tlaanna thlengsei; chunna anmah in raalmii leh raalmii reijapuuita anmuh inva Paul ta khon inngaisei.
Mahlaia raalmii aklok in Paul ta thlenga asuurpei, che amahta thirhang innih a khitnatu trong amlanpei. Amah i tume che amah in jangthlouta atlohpeime ta anruipei.
Miitam kaarnata arouin trongkhat che arouinla aktlei trongkhat a ongsei; hou derderta atammal inva amah in akchimtalli khometa marom cheknosa, amahta raalmii amna a anphurhnatu trong amlanpei.
Amah in achungtonga kal in, miitam in trihkhop a an ongkhanna raalmii eiin amahta domma anphurhpei;
alamva miitam in juih a, “Amahta thatve!” ta rool jakkanga ongsei.
Paul ta raalmii amnah munna anthlentumma raalmii aklokta ason, “Keiin nikuunga trongste son ajaume?
Nangi Ijip na miinoh cheme, inrang akhanna miithat miisun raprilna mii akpul manlita raprilla thlenna, mii chah chahta hou amsuukha nangnoh cheme?”
Chuta Paul in amsang, “Keiva Silisia vaa Tarsas na Judi ang, mah khuuboom khannata inthouang; keiin mah miitam ankuunga kitrongnatu keijarota kingenche.”
Raalmii aklok in ajapeia, achungtong kalna thaak ah ngirra mii eita akut aklek ei; che miitam in daichrit a an amlai amah in ankuunga Hibru tronga asonnei:
“Unaoei mahche kipa kipueio, ipek keiin nanmaikunga kitak kanngaaknatu kisontrongi rungaive.”
Amah in ankuunga Hibru tronga atrongta antheih inva, anmah in ralla daichrit a amsei. Che ason:
mah lammita aknu akjuih mii eita keiin thi ajaphah a kikchut kamnangei, kupa kumei eita makaanga simma kithunei,

mah i akthloi thiimpu leh anparuulna jama annaamtein kei sakhisei. Unaoei ankuunga amithlahnatu trongjihthuun jama ankuungnata kphah mahche anmahta tanti malannatu chekho anmahta suur suura Jerusalem athlennatu keiin Damaskas ah sehsang.”
“Keiin nga tloh a kisehlaia, Damaskas kannai in suunjai jaanga inromloua kak hanga ringramnata khalmo intle aakvaarkhat in keihiilla vaarsa.
Cheva tukleia inriilsang chunna houkhat in keikuunga ason kitheihpei, ‘Saul, Saul, keita jarella nakchut nammaang angme?’
Mahchunna keiin kamsang, ‘Akpu tucheme?’ Amah in keita keison, ‘Keiva nangin chut a mananga nisih Nazaret na Jisu khasang.’
Ipek keisoh sehjou mii invah intle akvaarkha muhvah anmuh chuta keikuunga aktrong amah ahouva theihnoh ei.

Mahchunna keiin kisonni, ‘Akpu, keiin jangkitlohtu tlame?’ Chunna Akpu in keisonang, ‘Inthouva Damaskas ah luutro, nangin nitlohtu thlou Ringpu in thlouraang atloh anaamte relna ohkhanna nangkuunga naksontu.’
Kvaarkha antlehmal invah kimit muh cheknohsang, keisoh inruuimii in kikutta matuh a kansehpipei, mahche Damaskas ah tlungsang.
“Judi annaam in injahna mii, trongsuur nujuih a malotting arilluutmii akming Ananias an ong mii khat ohkhanna am.
Amah in kikuunga thlenga kikomma angirhche keisonnang, ‘Unao Saul, nimit muhchekrosa!’ Mahlaital chunna keiin muh kichekpei.
Amah in keita keisonnang, ‘Nangin Ringpu amdon niromnatu, Akchim Akpu ta muh nicheknatu mahche amah anarhouta nitheihnatu, inih ipa ipuei Ringpu in thlou tlohnatu nakcharpei.
Alamva nangin nimuh khatkho nitheih eita mah kharelna mii naamte ankuunga nangin sakhi veiuche.
Ipek nangin jarella ningaakme? Inthouro che inlupro, amah akming ongchalaia nang nilehta chaamro.’ ”
“Keiin Jerusalem a inlenga mathruunna thlaamma kingenlai, keiin ahamuh ah amsang,
amahta kimuh in keisonang, ‘Intharo che Jerusalem nata inthabeb a inthruh rosa, alamva keirella nang nisakhi anmah in naklounoh tuei.’
Mahchunna keiin kison, ‘Akpu, anmah antak in anrom mah chuvah sinakokrel nangta namlot mii eita simma kithunnei che kakhonnei.
Mahche nang turella sakhi amlan Stephen athii atlaklai keikho akomma ngirang mahchu keiinkho kaja, che amahta anthatlai amah anpuunreita ngaak a ammang.’
Chuta amah in keison, ‘Sehro; alamva keiin nangta ram aklah Jental jatih ankaar a kamthlah uche?’ ”
Maiphah a anmah in atrongchuta minna anrungeih; mahcheva anrool inkaanga onga anson, “Mainang mii i thaleinata mamaanga thatvesa! ta anson. Alamva amah in aringnatu thlou amnohsa.”
Anmah in ongsei, anpuunta anlekpei mahche marvaantonga phil anthekpei,
raalmii amna munna anthlennatu trongthuun amilanpei, che miitam in amahta indah a khalmo ongsei, jarelname alam romnatu amahta khonna trong ruinatu jathang amilanpei.
Chuta amahta khonnatu savunruia amikaang in, Paul in akomma akngir raalmii reijapuuita ason, “Rome na miikhatta pichaar tloh a amraal antuuknoh maa a khonni aiilme?”
