Raalmii reijapuui in mahchuta atheih invah amah in raalmii aklokkuunga seh a asonpei, “Nangin jangtlohtang nitihme? Alamva mah kupa i Rome na mii.”
Mahchunna raalmii aklok in thlenga Paul ta ason, “Keisonro nangi Rome na miicheme?” Amah in ason, “Oi.”
Raalmii aklok in amsangpei, “Keiin inbaobeh tam malanna Rome na mii vei kphahning.” Paul in ason, “Chuta keiva kipoklainata Rome namii veichesang.”
Cheva amahta invuia trong aruisamkha kak hanga inlengsei; che raalmii aklok inkho Paul i Rome namii khat tih a arompei che amahta akhitmii inkho trihsa.

Chuta amahta akkhit kuunga ason invah amjakpei, Judiei in amahta jarella amilaalme ta aromja rella aklok thiimpu leh jama annaamte inchunnatu jathang amilanpei, che Paul ta athlenche anmah anmaa a amigirhpei.
Paul in jamata antlinga asonei, “Unaoeio, mi in phah a keiin Ringpu amaa a akthra thranoh chim chimnoh romna lousinga ringang.”
Cheva aklok thiimpu Ananias in Paul akomma angireita amah anar a anhainatu jathang amlanei.
Chunna Paul in amahta ason, “Ringpu in nangta nak haitu, inngou inteibang nanga! Nangin trongsuur nujuih a keita pichaar tlohnatu nanbokche trongsuur nata inthlenga keita khonnatu jathang nitlohme?”
Amah akomma angirhin anson, “Ringpu vaa aklok thiimpu ta jikcha thranoh a nisaal peime?”
Chunna Paul in asonei, “Unaoeio, amahta aklok thiimpu tih a romnohsang; alamva mah i nga tloh a injih a am, ‘Nang nakpuui eita thranoh a trongnohro.’ ”
Che mah ita ason inva, Pharisi leh Saduki ankaar a injanoh a innih suuksei.
Alamva Saduki inva thinata akringkho, ringroikho che likho amnoh antih, chulata Pharisi inva anaamte amchim ta anmilot.

Mah chuvah khalmo miitam in ongtlamma housuuksa; cheva Pharisi anloomna trongsuurva lulok eiin ngirra indah a, “Kannih in amahkuunga chimnoh jikchakho tuuknoh ung. Ringroi inkhat in chunoh a li khat in amahkuunga trongleva?”
Khatleh khat in injanoh a amahta kanthrelusa ta anson inva raalmii aklok in intrisa raalmii in trumma Paul ta ankaar nata namma anthlennatu che raalmii amna a anhonnatu jathang amlanpei.
Akhuvar khulouh a Akpuin Paul akomma ngirra ason, “Niril matrangro, alamva nangin keirella Jerusalem a sakhi namlannanga Rome akho nangin sakhi namlantu.”
Ni avaar in, Judiei in inchunna anmah in Paul ta anthatnohmiil jakhatkho saanoh iinnoh umeta intella trongchet anlohpei.
Mah thranoh ita antlohna turella inchaangeichu mii sopli akralei.
Che anmah aklok thiimpu leh anparuul ankuunga seh a ansonpei, “Kannih in aktrang trongirsoh inruuia Paul ta kanthat nohmiil jakhatkho matemnoh reita trongchet kanlohpei.

Churella anmah kuunga trongsuuk i minna majonna akseengchu maromnatu nannih in jama eisoh raalmii aklokuunga ipek maromve Paul ta nankuunga athlennatu amah in onna atluungnoh maa a amahta kanthatnatu thlouraang chesung.”
Pekva Paul asarvaa asa kupa in Paul ta lamma anruungsamta antheihpei, cheva amah in seh a raalmii amna a luut a mahchuta Paul kuunga asonpei.
Chunna Paul in raalmii reijapuui ankaarna khatta onga ason, “Mah nao kupa i raalmii aklokuunga phurhro, alamva amakuunga jangmekhat asontu am.”
Cheva amah in nao kupa khata phurh a raalmii aklokuung anthlenpiche anson, “Simma am Paul in keionga amahnao kupa i nangkuunga phurhnatu keisonpei, amah in nangkuunga asonja ste am.”
Raalmii aklok in akut matuh a athlangtinga sehpia inruk a arui, “Nangin keikuunga nisonja amchu keisonro?”
Amah in ason, “Tungva Paul ta jama ankuunga jungpia trong suukta minna majonna akseengchu maromnatu ta ansonkha amisimnaning.

Chuta anmah in ansonkha nangin indahhro; alamva kupa sopli akral in amahta anthatnatu lamma ruunga amsei, anmah in Paul ta anthatnohmiil jakhatkho sanoh iinnoh umeta trongchet anlohpei, pekva inchaanga amsei.”
Cheva raalmii aklok khanna naokhata, “Amahkuunga keiin kimrompeita tukhat kuungkho sonnohro,” ta nao kupasa khata chaak a amthlahpei.
Cheva amah in raalmii reijapuui innihta onga asonei, “Mi in khulouh pung inthumma Keisaria ah sehnatu raalmii reija innihsoh skol raalmii sopsrih mahche kuseichoi reija innihta thlouraang tlohvesa.
Che Paul in achuungnatu skol ste thlouraang tlohve che rampuui Pheliks kuunga thranoh hoihnoh jakhatkho masuuknoh a Paul ta nanphurhnatu.
Cheva amah in trongjihthuun nga tloh a amjihpei.
“Klaudias Lisias akthloi rampuui Feliks, kamthruunche,
Mah kupa ita Judi in ansuurche thatrei antihpei, amah atak i Rome namii tih a kirompei, raalmii eisoh seh a amahta kikalpei.
Amahta jarelna amilaalme tihrella kiromja hanga anmahta jama kuunga kithlenpei.
Mairella keiin kiktuukva anmah trongsuurta anruuina rella amahta maraal anmithlakning, chuta amahta thatnatu chunohle simma sihnatu talva amahkuunga amraalvah amnoh.
Mah kupa chunga thranoh antlohnatu anruungi keikuunga amithlahpei, amahta amlaalmii ankuung akho achunga chuunga amithlak amaraal chuta nangkuungkho ansonnatu trongthuun kamlan.”
Nga tloh a amah in amitheih nujuih a raalmii in Paul ta phurh a khulouh a Antipatris kuunga anphurhpei.
Akhuvar a inlengsei che skol raalmiivah Paul soh ansehnatu anmahpei.
Anmah in Keisaria anthlengche rampuui kuunga trongjihthuunta amilanpei, Paul kho amahkuunga amisilpei.
Rampuui in trongjihthuunta apaache, amahvah ramna mii meta arui. Cheva amahmii i Silisi na miisa tih a arompeia
amah in ason, “Nangta namlaalmii in atlunglaia nitakchunga trongsuuk i keiin kitheih umang.” Cheva amahta Herot koolla ngaak a sihnatu jathang amlanpei.
Nijan ranga aknua akthloi thiimpu Ananias in anparuul stesoh che akming Tertulas soh inruuia jungsa. Ukil in rampuui kuunga Paul chunga trong ankatpei;
amahta amiongche, Tertulas in amahta maraal peknatrong ason,
“Akthloi Pheliks kannih in nang napaalla khalmo leh oia am kanphah, che nang napaalla kannih jatihta ralla pungporh namveiung,
bilamma mahche amun anaamtea nitlohman romma kanjache.
Chuta, nang laita soot lohnohnatu nirilvol akhanna kitrongta toibeb a nirungeihnatu kinoolche.
Alamva amah kupa i trihkhopna thloutloh miisa tih a kanrompei, amah in tukleiramma am Judi ankaar a hou amsuuk miisa che amahva Najareth na kochanoh ruulta akching aklok khatsa.
25 Che amah in mathruunna thlaam luungkho mabuurtangta aksuul chuta amahta kansuurpei.
Chuta akthloi kepten Laisias in kalthi hanga thlenga kannih kankutnata kanilohpei,
Nang nitaktal in amahta ruia minna nisuiche kannih in maraal kanpek i anaamtekho rom nichektu.”
Judi inkho amahchunga amaraal malan injaoseia, mah naamte i chimta ansonpei.
Mahcheva rampuui in Paul ta atrongnatu aheisiir in Paul in amsangpei,
“Nangin kum vachah soot a mah jaatboom chunga pichaarpu hukveisache ta kiromchera, keiin roomthok a kitak kanngaaknatu kison.
Keiin Jerusalem a Ringpu amthruun kisehna i nijan somleinih ralnohmang ta thra nirom;
keiin mathruunna thlaamma chunoh a sinakokrel chunoh a khuuboomma tukhatsoh trong inkharh chunoh a miitamta hou kamsuukkho anmah in keituuknoh ei.
Ipek keita kamilan angi akchim sakhi namlan cheknoh tuei.

Chuta amah i keiin nikuunga kijapei, ohchuva anmah in heikoh ruul tih a an ong Lam aknujuih a inih ipa ipuei Ringpu ta keiva kamthruun, trongthuunna anjih anaamte che ringraan in ason anaamteta kamlot.
Anmah in Ringpu ta matuura anjananga, mahchu akchimleh chimnoh innihrella veikhat thinata ringtu.
Nga tloh a keiin lai amrel Ringpu kuunga mahche mii kuungah seengnoh kiveinoh natu klah ang.
Ipek kum kak aknua kei kimiiei aklah aknangeita majoomma malannatu che katnatu thlenna thlengang.
Mahchuta kitlohlai kei kitakta mathruunna thlaamma kamseeng anmah in anmuh, ohkhanna miitam amnoh ei che innah insuulkho suuknoh. Chuta Asia na Judi arouin
keita kamilaalang, anmah in keita keijanoh a ansontuphu amleva nang nimaikuunga kei kamraal ansonuta.
Chunoh a anmah antak in kei kamraalta tuuk eileva mah jama ankuunga kingirh laia son eiso.
‘Akthi in veikhat ringtu tih a ingaak rella mi in keiin anmah amaa a chaang an kiphahning.’ ”
Chuta Lam kharelva minna akrom Pheliks in pichaar atlohnohnatu ason, “Raalmii akpuui Lisias athlengin nannih pichaarkha achena kamthlak umang.”
Nga tloh a raalmii reijapuui in Paul ta seella sihnatu chuta aningtamma sihnatu, che aruul apai in amahkuunga malanphu amilanlai anthlouta thingnohnatu trongthuun amlanpei.
Nijankhat aknua Pheliks in akmei Judi kumei Drusilla soh thlenga; amah in Paul ta am ongche Jisu Khrista ta malot rella trongta arungeih.

Akchim pichaar tlohrella, atakta inkem achek mahchu vaknua akthlengsam pichaar rella Paul in asonta atheih invah Feiliks in trih a ason, “Ipektu veia sehrosa; keiin taancha kphahlai nangta veikhat kam ongla uche.”
Mah laitalla Paul in baobeh kamlantungme ta amah in matuura am. Chunna Paul ta ong onga atrongpi.
Chuta kumnih aknua Porsias Pestas in rampuui veia Philiks angutta amsilpei, Feliks invah Judi ei turella thloutloh akdit a Paul ta simma asihpei.
Festas in pekva aramma athlengin, nijanthum aknua amah in Keisaria nata Jerusalem a hangsa.
Chunna akthloi thiimpu leh Judi aklok ei in Paul chunga trong ankatpei; che amahta antakpei,
anmah in Paul ta lamma ruunga thatnatu che Jerusalem a mathlahnatu annoolpei.
Fistas in amsangei mah chuvah amah atak inkho mah khanna inthabep a asehja hangsa.
Nga tloh a amah in asonei, “Nannih nankaar a aktloh akhal keisoh inruuia mah khanna sehjourei, mah kupa in asoina amleva, amahta malaneiso.”
Amah in nijan niritnohle niku tlanoh a anmah ankaar a amche Keisaria a sehsa; mahche akhuvar a amah in kurung koolla inbok a Paul ta anthlennatu jathang amlanei.
Che Paul in athlengin Jerusalem nata akjung Judiei in amahta hiilla ngirsei, amahta amilaalnatu akchim amilancheknoh khanna aklup trongsuuk jikcha amakuunga anmihthlakpei.
Paul in atakta anngaaknatu ason, “Judiei trongsuurta andah a, chunoh a mathruunna thlaamta andah a, chunoh a Keisaar ta andah a keiin chimnoh jakhatkho tlohnoh ang.”
Chuta Festas invah Judi ei rella ngir akdit a Paul ta ason, “Nangin Jerusalem hanga nichunga trong ankat inrelna mah khanna kei keikuunga pichaartloh i nikditme?”
Chuta Paul in ason, “Keita pichaar tlohna turella Keisaar nang pichaar koolla ngirsang; nangin thra niromkhaning Judi ankuunga keiin chimno tlohnoh ang.

Chunna keiin chimnoh tlohmii angleh mahche thi ajaphah a kilaal amsangleva matikcha thi aja chunnata keiin inlitnohtung; chuta anmah in keikuunga maraal kamithlak angi chimnoh, tukhat inkho keita kamlancheknoh tuei. Keisaar nikuunga trong kikatpei.”
Cheva Keisaar in amah jama eisoh antelche amsangpei, “Keisaar kuunga trong nikat peitaningva, Keisaar kuunga sehtu tlache.”
Pekva nikhat ninih aknua, kurung Agrippa mahche Bernis in Festas ta anlousoong natu Keisaria ah tlungsei.
Mah khanna soot an amche, Paul chunga trong ankatrella Festas in kurung kuunga malanna anson, “Feliks in simma thunna asih amah mii khat mah khanna am.
Keiin Jerusalem kiamlai, akthloi thiimpuei mahche Judiei anparuul eiin Paul chunga pichaar tlohnatu kansonang.

Keiin kamsangei mah chuvah tunangkhat miita thatnatu rai mathlaak tih i Rome ammiiei ankastamnoh, anmah in amilaal miikhasoh innakpitu mahche amaraal akphahmii khankho indenpia atrongnatu lai amahkuunga malanphu.
Churella anmah in onna anthleng joulai, keiin mathilnoh a chuta akhuvar a keiin pichaar koolla inboksang che miikhatta anthlennatu jathang kamlanpei.
Amahta amilaalnatu ngirra aktrongei in amahchunga khalmo malaalla trongtuei ta kamdonta, amah achunga chimnoh amraal jakhatkho thlennohsei;
chuta anmah in chimnoh a amilot rella che Paul in akthra trongta araanva antheih mahsuunga Jisu Khrista in veikhat ringsa tih a asonrelna amahchunga trong anjetna steva am.
Anmah in trong ruia amijonnava keiin seenga majon cheknohsanga, amahta Jerusalem seh a mairelna maseengnatu ningirhjame ta krui.
Chuta anmahta kool kemma sih a akthloi kurungin trong achena amthlaknatu Paul in trong akatpei, amahta keiin Keisaar kuunga kamthlanohmiil amahta akngaak kuunga thra a ngaaknatu jathang kamlanpei.”
Chunna Agrippa in Festas kuunga ason, “Kei kitak inkho amah kupa in asonta kirungeih jahang.”

Nga tloh a akhuvar a Agrippa mahche Bernis in roomthok a thlengsei, che anmah in raalmii akpuuisoh che khuuboomna akming akseh mii eisoh miitam boomna thlaampiia luutsei. Cheva Festas ajathang nujuih a Paul ta asuunga anthlenpei.

Che Fistas in ason, “Kurung Agrippa mahche onna inihsoh inruuia amjao anaam, Judi anaamtein mahmii i veikhat inlenga ringphunohsa ta Jerusalem a che onna onga keikuunga trong ankat i mahmii i nanmuhpei.
Chuta amah in thi aja tandi phahnatu thloutalva atloh jakhatkho tuuknoh ang; che atak inkho kurung kuunga trong akattaningva amahkuunga kamthlahnatu ngirsang.

Chuta amahrella keita aklokkuunga maitalsa tih a kimjihtuphu. Oirella amahta keiin nanmaikunga amuhvei kurung Agrippa nimaikuunga kithlenpei mah chuvah amahta minna ruiri kantihche aknua jaknangta kimjih ume tihchu kiromnatu.
Alamva simma inthun miikhatta amah achunga amithlak amraalta seenga sonna keiin mathlah i alam chanohta kiloh.”
Agrippa in Paul ta ason, “Nangin nitak turella nitrongnatu kijapeiche.” Chuna Paul in akutta ajamche atakta anngaaknatu asonpei:
“Kurung Agrippa, Judi in keita keiandah a kanloon relna kei kitakta kanngaaknatu nimaikuunga mi in ngirra trong kphahrella kireipak thrata kloh,
alamva Judi ei kastam anaamte che anmah in injetna jikcha thloia niromkir; churella kitrongta tlohtheih a nirungeihnatu kinoolche.
“Mathron lainata keiin kijatih ankaar a mahche Jerusalem a nao kiveilainata keiin kiringna, kichaan khatkho kihoong kiva Judi annaamte in kanromang.
Lai khalmo soot a anmah in keita kanrom taningangva, anmah inta keirella sakhi anmilanjale malaneiso, mah chuvah inih heikoh in ralremma cheksil ruul Pharisi khat veia ringsang.
Ringpu in ipa ipuei ankuunga trongchet amlankhata keiin kimtuur relna keiin onna ngirsang che keita chaang keianpei.
Isakhei somleinih inkho amahta kanphahtuta matuura khulouh suun anril maluut a Ringpu ta amithruun. Kurungo! Mah matuur irelnasa keita Judi ei in kanloonna angi.
Ringpu in mii thinata amringta nannih in jarella malotjanoh ta namidonme?
Mahtal chuta Jerusalem a keiin kitlohpei; keiin aklok thiimpu ningnata akchek amnehva trongrol kphahche akseeng mii jikchaeita simma thunkhop noh a anmahta thatnatukho rou kijapei.

Sinakok jikcha ah anmahta injomma tanti kamlanei mahche Ringpu ta thranoh manuih a antrongnatu kiksuullei; anmahta andah a mei suuk a kimluung inhaanga miiram khuuboom luungkho seh a anmahta kikchut ei.”
“Nga tloh a keiin aklok thiimpuei ankuungnata akchek amnehvaa trongrol mahche thlou masilna jathangsoh inruuia Damascas ah seh ang.
Kurungo, lamma kisehlaia suunjai talla, ringramnata kvaarkhat kinita ralla intle in che keisoh sehjou kannaamta hiilla kvaar kimuhpei.
Kannaamte a tuklei ah kanril invah houkhat in Hibru tronga keikuunga keitihpei, ‘Saul, Saul, Jarella nangin keita nakchut angme? Lungkumta indah a nikeh a kao i nangta naksoktu.’
Ohchunna keiin kison, ‘Akpu, nang tucheme?’ Akpu in keison, ‘Keiva nangin nikchut Jisu khasang.

Chuta inthoua a ngirro; alamva mairella keiin nikuunga kamuhpeiche, mah chuvah nangin nimuhche khatkho nikuunga keiin kammuhsam alam irella rou nitlohnatu che sakhi niveinatu keiin nangta thlou kithun uche.
Keiin kamthlah Israel leh Jental ei jatih nata kikaluche.

Anmah anmitta mahoongnatu, mah chuvah anmah in kthihnata akvaara anlengnatu che seitan vaa tuui nata Ringpu tinga anlengnatu, chunna anmah in anlehnata in ip anphahnatu khatkho keita kamilot apaalla akseeng ankaar nata tutu inkho anphahphuchu anphahnatu.’ ”
“Kurung Agrippa o, ringramna ahamuhkha keiin mahuihnoh tlohnoh ang,

chuta matsah a keiin Damaskas ah mahche Jerusalem na mii khatkho Judia ramboom apumtea khatkho Jental jatih akho sonna kamdangtuei, mah chuvah anmah in anrilta thlenga Ringpu ting inlengtu tlasei mahche anril anthleng i matikcha tihrella thlou amipaang tutla ta kisontuei.
Mah irella mathruunna thlaamma kiamlai Judi ei in keita suura kanthatnatu ansuul.
Mi in phah a keita kamjoom Ringpu tingnata thleng, chunna onna keiin ngirra mii aksiin leh akliin annihtinga sakhi kamlanpei, Moses mahche ringraan in suuktu tlasa ta ansonpot jakhatkho sonnoh ang:
mah chuvah Khrista in klah knang athotu, chuche matsahremtu veia thinata ringtua Israel mahche jatih innih ah akvaarta sonna araantuta matsah a asonpei.”
Amah atakta anngaaknatu oita ason inva, Festas in hou inkaanga asonpei, “Paul nangi innahsache; nangin khalmo nitam nitheih khanna nangta namnahpei.”
Chuta Paul in ason, “Akthloi Festas, kei i innahnoh ang, chuta kitak in seenga akchimta trongsang.
Alamva mah irella kurung in niromkhaning, keiin amahkuung akho kiningtamma trongsang; alamva mairella amah in aromnanoh amnohta kirom, alamva mah i akiingkaangah tlohphu thlounoh.
Kurung Agrippa, ringraan eita namlotme? Keiin krom mah chuvah nangin namlot.”
Agrippa in Paul ta ason, “Lai kak asuunga keita Khristen kamveitangta namdonme!”
Paul in ason, “Lai kaksuungna slakho soot slakho thirhang talva inkhitnoh a nang khop noh a chuta mi in keitrongta arungai mii naamte in keinangjimma nanveinatu Ringpu ta kingen.”
Cheva kurung, rampuui, Bernis mahche anmahsoh inbokjou anaamtea inthousei;
ohkhanna inmahseia, anmah in khatleh khat insonsei, “Amah kupa in thi aja nohleh simma thunnatu matikcha thlou jakhatkho tlohnoh.”
Chunna Akrippa in Festas kuunga ason, “Amah inta Keisaar kuunga trong katnoleva mathlah aja uta.”
Inih in mali chuunga Itali a sehnatu iril in anglaang laia, anmah in Paul mahche simma anthun aktlei eita Akastan raalmii ruulna reijapuui akming Julias kuunga amilanpei.
Asia tuuiboomma ankuungah sehsamma Thesalonia vaa Mesedonia Adramita antih mii khat Aristarkas vah kannihsoh inruuijousung.
Akhuvarra kannih in Sidon na tlungsung. Julias in Paul ta amchaalpeia amah aruulpai ankuunga amahta darkar am amilannatu amthlahpei.
Mah khanna kannih in mali chuunga kanseh in kanmaatonga thliraang in kanninam unga Caipras ah mulita kanthohpei.
Kannih in Silisia mahche Pamphilia tuiiboomta vanna muli kanthoh in Lisia khuuboom Mira ah tlungsung.
Ohkhanna raalmii reijapuui in Itali phah a aksehtu Alekjendria na muli khat aktuukpei, kannihta amah in mulia kanimchuungpei.
Kannih in nijan khalmo soot a maliata tap a kanthoh, che klukanga lahna kanphah a Knidas ah tlungsung, thli in kanmaatonga kanidenna mulithou janoh a kannih in Salmoni vaa Kriti ah mulita kanthohpei.
Pher Havens antih muli inngeihna akomma Lasia khuuboom inkhatkho am, mahchunna kannih in khalmo klah a thlengsung.
Lai khalmoa maangsung, mahche tuiiboom chung kansehkha thihnaringna thlousa, alamva buhelna aknikho avanpei, anmahta Paul in chaak a,
asonei, “Lulok eio, tuiiboom chung seh i insok insiikna mahche khalmoa maangna iphahtuta kroom, onna muli leh asuunga anthunpoot khop noh a inih chaankho thihnaringna veitu.”
Chuta Paul in asonchunga muli akpuleh kepten in asonkhadom raalmii reijapuui in aril amluutpei.

Alamva mah mali thlaknakha phalbia amnatlannoh amun taningvah, mii aktam invah okhannata muli chuunga sehnatu anchaakei, taancha anna akhitong kulkung mahche akhutong kulkung tonga am Krita ta muli chuunga Phoniks ah tlunga phalbi suunga mah khanna am ichek umeta kamidonpei.
Akhuna thliraang in phirphirta araan in, anmah in khatloh a kanphah usa ta amidonpei, akrik thirhangta anlohche Kriti tuiiboom apaalla innaia mulita anthohpei.
Chuta akhi nisuuk antih aktrang khuleh thli in tuiipaal nata athlangtonga amratpei;
mulita aktrang khuleh thli in adenpeia, che thliraangta thleia seh cheknohsa, kannih in leimanoh insuulungta inngaia thliraang asehnata kanjuihpei.
Mahche Kauda antih tuiiboom in hiilla asihna ramma kannih in mulita kankaiche maloh a dop ah inchuk umeta intrisung, mulia injaar puunta andokche mahchuta thliraang in araanna a amisehpei.
Anmah in inkalna aja muli andihta andomche mulita khit a rui anaamte anhuina, sitsai anpeinatrang annoi philla inchuk umeta trihsei.
Aktrang khuleh thliraang in kannihchutche, akhuvaara anmah in mulina poot anaamteta loonna amithrumpei;
che nithum tihpia mulina pootta kanloonpei.
Nijan khalmo sootsunga kinihkho mahche arsikho kanmuhnoh invah aktrang khuleh thliraang in kannihtong araan invah, inkal kanphahchek umangmeta kamituur in anaamte achena avah kamithlakkirpei.

Khalmo soot a saak iin kanphahnoh invah, Paul in anmah kuunga thlenga asonei, “Miieio, nannih in keitrongta majuih ata Kriti na mulia chuunga sehnoh meleva, mainang insok insiik mahche kmaangi phahnoh utame!
Pekva nanril matrangnatu kitihchou; alamva nankaarna tukhatkho nanchaan maangnohtu, chuta muliva maangusa.
Alamva keiin aknu kijuih mahche keiin kamthruun Ringpu vaa ringroi inkhat in mi in khulouhtal khanna kikomma ngirsa,
che amah in ason, ‘Paul, intrinohro, nangin Keisaar amaikuunga ngir; mahche anro, nangsoh muli chuungjou a nisehpi annaamta Ringpu in nangta namlanpei.’
Ohchunna kupaeio, nanril matrangve, alamva kikuunga keisontalkha suuktuta keiin Ringpu ta kamlot.
Chuta tuiiboom in hiilla asihna ramkhanna inchuk usame.”
Nijan somlei manli tihpi khulouh ah Adria tuiiboomma thliraang in raanna kaniphurhpeia, khulouh janjai jaanga mali akthouin ram amunkhat ah innaisame ta amidonpei.
Chuuna anmah in jikchakhek thuukme boihmeta an ol in lam sopnih thuukta anrompei; chela anmah in ste seh a veikhat an ol in lam somlei ranga thuukta anrompei.
Anmah in lungpiisoh inchuk umeta intriseia, muli aknungnata thirhang manlita anthlakpei, mahche ram avaarnatu anngenpei.
Muli akthouin inlit a antlaannatu insuulseia, muli amaana akrik thirhangta anthlaknanga anthohche mulia anthun pootkhata tuiiboomma amithlakpei.
Paul in raalmii reijapuui leh raalmiita asonei, “Mahmii inta mulisuunga amnoh eileva, nannih in inkal chekno uchou.”
Ohchunna raalmii in muli khitna ruikhata antanche amithlakpei.
Ram avaartumma anmah annaamteta buh ansaaknatu Paul in asonei, “Nannih in jakhatkho saanoh iinnoh a nanngaakna mi insoh nijan somlei manli tihpisa.
Oirella nannih in saakphu ste nansaaknatu kingenchou; tukhatkho nankangna sam akmal khatkho trilnohtu.”
Mah i asonche tolta louva anmaikuunga Ringpu ampaak; mahchuta akhoihche saa amithronpei.
Chunna anaamte anrilta amtrangpeia anmahkho ansaakpei.
Muli akchuung annaamteva mii reijanih che sopsrihlei kuruk ung
Anmah in inkhop a ansaaknu a mulina kehuta tuiiboomma anlonche akrikta amijaangpei.
Pekva kini avaar in muli akthouin ramsak romnohsei, chuta tuiiboom apaalla sitsai in sip a anjoolna amunnna jaleva thoureita insuulsei.
Chunna anmah in akrik thirhangeita tuiiboomma anthlakpei, mah laitalla muli ankhitna ruieita majak a anjaarpuunta thliraang in araannatu ankhitpei che mulita tuiiboom apaalla amithlungpei.
Chuta muliva sitsai abanga inchuksa, cheva tui adepna a sedolhsa; muli apaal tongkho inchuk a machek janoh a amsa, mahche muli aknungtongkho tuiisolh in akhoihpei,
simma anthunmii in iroia antlaannohna tuta raalmii in anmahta thatnatu inchaangsei.
Chuta raalmii reijapuui in Paul ta akalja hangsa, anmah in amidonkha matlohnohsa. Tukhat tuiia iroi atheih khanna mulinata matsah a matjaamma tuiipaalla antlungnatu jathang amlanei,
onnata in mahmii in muli thingpep chunga che muli akoihna anvuichunga leouva tuiipaalla tlungsei. Nga tloh a annaamte tuiipaalla tlungsei.
Kannih in kthi kanphahsam nata inlit kanphahche, tuiiboom rammingvah Melta antihkha kanrompei.
Mah khanna mii anrilthrata kanimmuh ung mah chuvah anmah in meitloh a kanikem ung, alamva khusuur amthronpeia ksiksa.
Paul in thing apulkhat amtlonpeia mei abukpei, mei antruung invah murul inkhat inthruh a akutta ajella inthoia amsa.

Chunna amah akut a inthoia am murulta anmuh in, anmah in khatleh khat insonsei, “Ril inhalna amnohsa mah i miithat mii, amah in kthi aphahsam tuiiboomnata inlitslakho akchim pichaar in amahta ringa am janohsa.”
Chuta murulta meisuunga akthinpei che akuunga jakhatkho soknohsa.
Atakta inthlinga kak hanga intolh a thi usata ngaak a amsei; chuta lai soot a amahta anngaaknua atakchunga reipaksina jakhatkho suuk anmuhnoh invah, anril inthlenga antihpei amahvah rappusa.
Tuiiboom ramchu kurungming Pablias antihpot aramsoh intonga ramkhat am, amah in kanilohche rilvolla rou kanitloh a nijanthum kanisih ung.
Nga tloh a suuksa Pablias apata atlunna mahche anap kluunga knasa; chunna Paul in amahta phah a a anche ngenna atakchunga akut sih a amthratpei.
Mah i asuuk inva tuiiboomma am aktlei akna eikho thlengeia amah in amthratei.
Anmah in kutthol khalmo kanimlanung; che kannih in mulithoua kanseh samsoh kannihtu darkaar am malisuunga anraangpei.
Thlathum aknua pheipok unaota injih Alexandri na mulikhat a chuunga phalbi suunga tuiiboom chunga sehsung.
Sirakos ah kantlungche ohkhanna nijanthum amsung.
Mah khannata inkoia mulithoua Rhejiam ah tlungsung; nikhat kan amche aknua akhutongna thli karaangsa, che nijannih tihpia Puteoli ah thlengsung.
Amlot unaoei ohkhanna intuuk unga anmahsoh nijan sirih amjounatu kannihta kanikouhpei. Chuche Rome a thlengsung.
Ohkhanna unaoei in kannih rella Inn Inthum antihkha phah a kannihsoh intuukpinatu thlengsei. Paul in anmahta amuh inva Ringpu ta ampaakpei che aril amtrangpei.
Kannih in Rome a kanthlengin, Paul vah amahta akngaak raalmii eisoh amjounatu amjapei.

Nijanthum aknua ohkhanna Judi akchim eita annaamtea Paul in aongei; annaamma anpul in ankuunga asonni, “Unaoeio, keiin inih imiieita chunoh a inih kastamta andah a kitloh thlouvah jakhatkho amnoh, chuta anmah in keita Jerusalem nata simma kansih anga Rome namii veia ankut a kamilanang.
Anmah in keita minna kanrui anga, keita kamthlahja hangsa, alamva kei kes a anmah in keita tanditloh a thranoh ah kanthlaknatu alam jakhatkho amnoh.
Chuta Judi in mahchuta indahseia, keiin kijatih chunga andah a kitloh jakhatkho amnoh slakho keiva Keisaar kuunga trong kikattu tlasa.
Chunna mairella nannihta inmuhpinatu che nannihsoh trongnatu kijon peichou, keiin thirhang inluk angi Israel in amituur kharelna.”
Chunna amahta asonei, “Nangrella Judia tingnata trongjihthuun phahnoh ung, che onna akthleng unaopasa tukhat inkho nangrella thranoh antong mahche antrong nakho amnoh.
Chuta nangin nimdonchuta nangningnata kanrungeihja; alamva amun naamtena mii in nang nimiieita indah a antrongnavah kantheih.”

Mahchu nikhatni aminaiche amah in mii kuungah thlengsei. Juktiingnata khulouhram phah a Ringpu huunarel ankuunga maphorh a sonna sakhi amlanei mahche Jisu rella Moses trongthuun nata che ringraanei niriknata amsuullei.
Mah asonkhanna mii arou inva amilotpei, chuta arou inva malotnohsei.
Nga tloh a ankaar a khatleh khat injanoh a, Paul in ankuunga trong asonche inthreksei, Paul in ankuunga ason trongchuva:
“Mahmii ankuunga seh a sonve, nannih in rungaiva nanrungeih taktu chuta tiknikho romnoh uchou, nannih in muhva nanmuhtaktu chuta maromcheknoh uchou.

Alamva mahmii ei i amidonnatu katalla anril kmongsei, anmah amikur in rungaidahsei, che anmah anmit in ksingsei; chunohleva anmah anmit in anmuh uta, anmah amikur in antheih uta, anril in anrom uta, anmah annatnata kamthratnatu keikuunga inleng tuei ta;
keiin nankuunga kamromjachou, mah chuvah Ringpu vaa chaanring i Jental jatih a kamthlahpei; anmah in anrungeihtu.”
Paul in mahtrong chuta asonlai, Judi ei in amahta anmahpei, che anmah ankaar a anroua khalmo klukanga intelsei.
Kumnih tluunta amah in an amna innkhanna amsa che amahkuunga akthleng annaamta roomthok a aloujapei,
tukhat inkho thingnoh a che indanglenga Ringpu kurung huunna rella sonna araan mahche Akpu Jisu Khrista rella amtheih ei.
mah chuvah akseeng ringjihta akraanei anlii a matsahna atrongchetsa,
akthratrong chuva Asa kupa rella, ruung nujuih avah Devit vaa atute tingnasa
mahche kthinata veikhat ring inihtu Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa Akseeng Li atuuia Ringpu Asa kupa amveipei,
amah akmingrella jaatboom anaamte in malot sonjuihkha thlennatu amah apaalla malungsi khatkho raangroivaa phom inih in iphahpei,
Jisu Khrista amii veinatu naniong akaar a nannihkho injaosachou;
Alamva Asa kupa vaa akthra trongin kei kiklisoh inruuia rou kitloh Ringpu in keitu sakhi veisa mah chuvah keiin inngainoh a kingenrel nannihta son sonna kingenpichou.
Ringpu in amdon veileva ipek keiin upai tloh a thlengtung kutthol ste keiin nankuunga malannatu kanmuhpija hangmangchou,
alamva nannihta nanimtrang natu Li tu vei kutthol nankuunga kamlannatu nannihta khalmo kanmuhpija hangchou.
Chunna keiin kamlot leh nannih in namilot khanna nannih leh kei ikaara khatleh khat insohnatu.
Unaopasa eio, keiin nankuunga kamromjava, keiin injomma nankuunga kithlengja (chuta pekphahva keijanoh mang) mah chuvah Jental ankaar a akrah kiluhnanga nannih nankaar akho akrah luhnatu.
Keiva Kriik mii akho, pungpornoh mii akho, che aksingmii akho kmongmii akho laman intoolsang.
Chunna Rome na miitingkho akthra trongta kiraanja hanga amsang.
Alamva ringjih in Pharaoh ta ason, “Alamva kei tuuita nangkuunga mamuhnatu che thalei pumtea keimingta sonna niraannatu keiin nangta akseeng phomma kimbokpeiche.”
Alamva Ringpu rella jangmekhat rom ajanatu anmah kuunga seengbenga amtheihpei, alamva Ringpu ta ankuunga ammuhpei.
Tukleiram aseemlai nata amah akutseem muh icheknoh mah chuvah ache amnoh tuui mahche inkhatru vei Ringpu in aseempot ei i amah akliia seenga muh ichekpei. Churella anmahta ip janohtu,
alamva anmah in Ringpu ta rom seilakho anmah in amahta Ringpu sa tih a injahnoh ei chekho amahta mapaak khonoh ei, chuta anmah in amidon anaam kananoh hukveisa che kanana amnoh anrilta amthimpei.
Ksing sungta son seilakho, anmah in kmong hukveisei,
mahche kthi amnohluung Ringpu apaarthrata kthi nai amivei, che avonna intolla aksehsoh intrimma leilisoh inthlengsa.
Churella Ringpu in anmah anrilla andit che akseengnohta tlennatu amthlahpei, anmahseeng seeng ankaar a antak anruung anruungta injahnoh natu relna.
Jarella tihva anmah in Ringpu rella akchim chimnoh trongsoh anthlenpei, chuche akseem Akpu ta mathruun mahche amahta aroutloh ngut akut ah inseempot eita anmithruunpei che roukho antlohpei.
Mairella Ringpu in anmah anhoong thranoh chimnoh tlohnatu amthlahpei ei. Anmah kumei ei inkho kumeitu thlou amche anhoong akchimta mathlah a thlou amnoh chimnoh anhoong khanna anthlengpei,

Mahchunanga kupa inkho kumeisoh inkeih a louamche akchim anhoongta amithlahpei, che khatleh inkhat indi ringvolkhanna kaangkhemsei, kupa in kupata injak romnoh thlou atlohpipei mahche anmah in akchimnoh thlou antlohkhanna saak iin tandi anphahpei.
Anmah in Ringpu ta innaipi indah taningeiva tlohphunoh thlou tlohnatu anmah kuunga chimnoh ril Ringpu in amlannei.
Anmah in akthranoh hoong, chimnoh ditnatu ril, mii mamaangnatu suul, kallak in sip, miithat miisun, housuuk a innah insuul, mii masimna, mii maangnatu di,
mii loonna trong, Ringpu ta intirh, intirhsa hoong, mii usitnoh, kei ningsangta insoon, thranohthlou amthron, anu apa in ason majuihnoh,
kmong, aril ngirnoh, rilvoltheih ril amnoh, mii turella madonnohluung, mah naamte i anrilla sipsei.
Mainang thlou aktlohmii in thi ajalam ta Ringpu atrongthuunta anmah in rom seilakho, anmah in mahchukhop tlohnoh a mainang aktloh miita amija lamang.
inih in irom mah chuvah mainang thlouta aktloh miichunga Ringpu in pichaar atlohkha achim nujuih a pichaar atlohtu.
Mainang thlou aktloh miita pichaar atloh mahche anmah in antlohtalta aktloh miio, Ringpu in pichaar atlohlai nangva inlit kichektuta namlotme?

Mii ringvoltheih ah ril akdoon, soot akdouchek che soot akthochek ril am romro, chunohleva Akpu ta usitnoh choume? Rilvoltheih Ringpu in nangta niril thlengnatu lamma naksehpi achek ta nangin maromnoh cheme?
Chuta nang niriltrang in mahche nirilthleng nandah in alamveia Ringpu in trihkhop a amlunghaang che amah akchimlamseh pichaar amdangnia trihkhop a amah amlunghaang nitakchunga niphahtu.
Alamva amah in atlohthlou nujuih a amah in amlantu:
tukhat in soot douchek a akthra thloutloh in paarthra, injah mahche kthi amnohluungta ajon:
chuta tunangkhat in atak akroutu suul mahche akchimta juihnoh, che thranohta juih, anmah chunga trihkhop a malunghaang amtu.
Thranoh aktlohmii anchunga trihkhop a klah knang che ril klah amtu, matsah a Judi ankuunga mahche Kriik ankuungakho,
chuta akthra tloh miiva paarthra, injah aja che leh oi Judi anchunga che Kriik anchungakho amtu.
Alamva Ringpu va keimii miimii threknoh.
Alamva trongsuur rungaikhop mii in Ringpu akuunga chimnoh ei, chuta trongsuurta amjuih aktloh miita amchimei.
Trongsuur akdoonnoh Jental in antak a louam trongsuurta majuih a tloh a ammei, anmah in trongsuur doonnoh seilakho, antak a trongsuurva am.
Chunna anmah arilsuunga injih trongsuur thlouta amidang, chim chimnoh akrom anmah anril inkho sakhisa mah chuvah anril intrimnoh inna anmahta amlaal chunohleh anmahta ipkho a ip ei.
Keiva akthratrong nujuih a Jisu Khrista apaalla miivaa anrukta Ringpu in pichaar atlohsam i mahni khannasa.
Chuta nangin nitakta Judi ang intihchele, mahche nangin trongsuur ah ringa Ringpu soh nankeih rella thoichele
amah in amdonchu romma che akthra romchu jaro, alamva nangva trongsuur in namtheihpei,
mahche nangva mitchota lam akching che inthim kaara ammeita amvaar tih ita nang nitak in seenga romcheleva,
nangin trongsuurvaa lousing che akchim hoongkhata amma, kmongta amchim, naoeita amchim veichele –
aktlei miita amtheih nang, nang nitakva matheihnoh cheme? Miiva inrunoh veta nang invah niraanche, nangva namrukme?
Miimei miisa laalnohveta nangin nitihche nangva miimei miisa ta nilaalme? Rappu leilita antrih nang, nangva mathruunna thlaamnata namruk nohme?
Trongsuur akrom nangin, trongsuurta khoia nangin Ringpu ta injahnoh cheme?
Alamva mah i nga tloh a injih nangsa, “Nannih rella Jental ankaar a Ringpu akmingkha trihnoh a trongsei.”
Nangin trongsuur in asonta majuihchele, avuntan i tak a kanana vei, chuta nanginta trongsuurta khoichele, nangin vun nitankha avun intannoh veisache.
Chunna avuntan mii khat in trongsuur alamta ngaak a sehle amah in avun atankha intan nangjimma injah phunohme?
Chuleva tukhat in aruunga avun intannoh mii khat in trongsuurta ngaakleva injih trongsuur ah avuntan chuta trongsuurta akhoi nangta pichaar nitlohtu.
Alamva apaaltonga Judi akvei in Judi taknoh chele apaaltonga ruungi avun tankhop in akseeng avuntan thlounoh.
Chuta asuungtonga Judi akveimii in Judisa; mahche akchim avuntan mii injih thloutanoh chuta lia avun atanpei; amahta mapaak i mii tingnanoh chuta Ringpu tingna.
Chuleva Judiei in anchuungna jangamme? Chunoh a avuntan in achuungna jangamme?
Billam anaamte achungava am. Mathronna veia, Ringpu trongkha Judi ankuunga amsilpei.
Mii ste in malotnoh eileva khavei useime? Anmah in amilotnoh akhannna Ringpu va malot aja khata kananoh amivei utame?

Mah chuvah khak veinohsoh! Mii naamtein chimnoh seilakho Ringpu va akchim vei, mah i nga tloh a injih khanangsa, “Nangin nitronglai nitrong khanna nangta chimche naktihso, che nangta pichaar naktlohlai nangningna akchim khanna nichekchu veiso.”
Mah chuvah khak veinohso! Chuleva khatloh a Ringpu in tukleiramta pichaar atloh ume?
Kei kichimnoh inna Ringpu vaa akchim in hanralla amahvaa paarthrata maliinle, alehchel keita jarelna pekphah a kamlaal angme?
Mahche akthra anthruhnatu inih in thranoh tlohreime? tih a mii arouin inihta inihrilh iniloonna anson. Anmah in amilaal i chimta ison.
mah i nga tloh a injih khanangsa: “Akchimlamseh mii tukhatkho amnoh, amnoh, tukhatkho amnoh;
akromchek mii tukhatkho amnoh, Ringpu ta akjon mii tukhatkho amnoh.
Annaamte anmai inheikirsei, anaamte in chimnoh lamma sehkirsei; akthra tloh tukhatkho amnoh, amnoh tukhat luungkho amnoh.”
“Anmah anrool anhoongva rusuunsa, anmah amilei in miita leemna ah anhuuina.” “Murulvaa tuur in anmah amileithuui a am.”
“Anmah annar a phoolleh inkhah in sip.”
“Anmah ankehva intha a thii masuuknatu am,
anmah in ansehna lamva kmaang krel lahna in am,
leh oi vaa lamta anmah in romnoh ei.”
“Anmah anmit in Ringpu ta trihnoh ei.”
Alamva trongsuurta athlou veia aktloh tukhatkho Ringpu in machimnohtu, alamva trongsuur apaalla alehvaa lousing thlengsa.
anmah in Jisu Khrista ta amilot apaalla Ringpu in anmahta akchim amveipei, Khrista amlot mii naamte kuunga Ringpu in maita amsuukpei. Alamva amahta amlot miikuung avah inthliin jakhatkho amnoh;
mii naamtein aleh amsei chunna Ringpu vaa paarthra nata inleousei,
Jisu Khrista tinga inthloknava akliia Ringpu vaa malungsi akutthol in anmahta khangvaalla amchimpei.
Ringpu in amahta malannoh, chuta atak athih apaalla mii in amahta malot a anlehnata inthlok anphahpei, Ringpu in akchimlamseh ang tihchu maromnatu mah i amsuukpei.

Amaa leithing akhanva amah in miivaa alehta doutranga anna am; chuta amahva akchimta maromnatu ta ipekva amah in miivaa alehta amdangpei. Nga tloh a kei i akchimlamseh angta atakta amdangpei mah chuvah Jisu Khrista ta amlot tukhatta akchimlamseh amveipei.
Chunna inih in ithoina tuphu amme? Mah chuvah veinohso. Jaknang trongsuurme? Thloua trongsuur amme? Ochunoh, chuta malotva trongsuurna.
Alamva trongsuur in asonthlou khannoh a mii in amlot apaalla amchim peita irom.
Chunoh a Ringpu i Judi ei khoptu Ringpu me? Amahvah Jental jatih turelkho Ringpu nohme? Oi, Jental ei turelna khopning,
alamva avun aktan ei in amahta amilot apaalla amchimpeime mahche avun aktannoh inkho amahta amilot apaalla anmahta amchimei. Ringpu khalekta amning
Malot apaalla trongsuurta jakhatnoh maveireime? Mah chuvah suuknohso! Mahchungut a, inih in trongsuurta imchet.
Chunna ruung nujuih a inih ipu Abraham rella inih in jangison ume?
Alamva Abraham ta amah athlou nujuih a machimleva, amah in an orhna tuvah am, chuta Ringpu kuungna vanoh
Alamva ringjih in khatloh a asonme? “Abraham in Ringpu ta amlotpei che amahta akchimlamseh mii tih a ateenpipei.”
Ipek mii khat in thlou atlohlai atloh khaankha kuttholta ateenpi.
Mii khat in thlouva tlohnoh, chuta Akchimlamseh noh eita amchim amahta malot, amah malot i akchimlamseh tih a inteenpisa.
Davit inkho nga tloh a asonpei, athlouva tlohnoh miikhatta Ringpu in akchimlamseh tih a ateenpi mii i doiphahsa ta asonchuvah:
“Anmah in anchimnohta a ip ei, mahche anmah anlehta abahmii eikha doiphahsei;
Akpu indahmii anlehta teenpinohkha doiphahsei.”
Oinang doiphah i avun aktankhop mii turelname, mah i avun aktannoh mii turelna nohme? Inih in isonva malotkha Abraham kuunga akchimlamseh veia inteenpisa.
Mahchu khatloh a amahta inteenpime? Ohchu amahta avuntanche aknuname, chunoh a avun tannoh amaaname?
Mahkha amahta avun tanna daang veia aphahpei, mah i akchimlamseh eita ateenpinatu relna, avun tannoh a amlot mii naamte ningkho anpa veinatu relnasa,
Mahchunanga Abraham vah avun aktanchetu anpa veikhop noh a amaa leithinga amlotmiitu akthra pandam veia akcheche mii eitukho apa veisa.
Trongsuura akmaar mii in lalchun veiseileh, malot i apupusa che trongchet i jakhatkho veinohsa.
Alamva trongsuur in trihkhop a malunghaang amsuuk; chuta trongsuur amnoh in trong majuihnoh kho amnoh.
mah i nga tloh a injihsa, “Keiin nangta jatih tamtu apa kamvei peiche” — trongchet in thita kiring amlan mahche ak amnoh pootcheita onga amsuuk amah in Ringpu ta amlot.
Amah in amtuur amnoh slakho oinanga matuura amlotpei, mah chuvah “Nang nitu nitekho mainanga vei tuei,” ta amahrella asonnanga amah in jatih tamtu apa aveinatu relna.
Amah aruungtu amdonlai malottinga amah in marnopnoh, akthiche ruungnanga isonva kum reija tlungsa, Sarah naolom ah nao amnatukho jakhatkho madonnoh a.
Amah in Ringpu atrongchetta malotnoh tlohnoh a aril intluunnoh amnoh, chuta Ringpu ta mapaak a amah in malotkho trang ahanral,
Ringpu trongchetva tlohtang tloh achek ta Abraham in arilla ngir.
Amah in amlotkha oirelna, “Amahta akchimlamsehsa ta ateenpipei.”
Chuta trongah, “Akchimlamseh veia atenpipei” tihkha amah akroutu relna injihnoh,
chuta inih turelkho injihsa, inihtu Akpu Jisu Khrista ta thinata amring Ringpu ta malotmele, chuleva amah in inihta akchimlamseh veia inihteenpitu;
atrongta imjuihnoh rella amahta anthatpei che inihta inimchimnatu amahta amringpei.
Inih in ingirhna malungsia malot apaalla iluutna iktuukpei, mahche Ringpu vaa paarthrata iphahtuta imtuur rella iroomthokme.
Mah chukhopnoh a ilah isam akho iroomthok, inih in iromva ilah ksam in doutrang amsuuk;
doutrang in ahoong amsuuk, mahche ahoong in matuur amsuuk,
mahche matuur in imdon koinoh, alamva Akseeng Li ta inimlan apaalla irilla Ringpu arilvolta inipoihpei.
Inih in marnoplai talla, amah apungtal chunna Khrista in Ringpu amlotnoh mii turella kthisa.
Jarelname itih inva akthra mii khat turella tukhat in aril kraanga thislakho akchimlamseh mii khat turella thi i chaalla suuk.
Chuta inih in aleh eveilai talla, Khrista in inih turella thikhan Ringpu in inihta inirilvolkha inimmuhpei.
Churella pekva Jisu athih in inihta inimchimpei, amah apaalla inihta Ringpu amlunghaang khannata jikcha ralla inikal ume!
Inih in Ringpu vaa jekna iveisuung talla amah asa kupa in athih apaalla inihta Ringpu soh inimchunpei. Amah in aring apaalla inihta inikal ume.
Mah chukhopnoh chuta inih Akpu Jisu Khrista apaalla inih in Ringpu ting iroomthoksa, amah apaalla pekva inih in amahsoh inja iphahpei.
trongsuur louamnoh laia tukleiramma aleh louamsa, chuta trongsuura amnoh laia alehva louteennoh.
Chuta kthi in Adam nata Moses phah a paalla am, Adam in trongsuur majuihnoh nanga aleh aktlohnoh ei inkho amah nangjimma intrimsei. Adam vah akthlengsam amahkhava pandamsa.

Chuta khangvaal kutthol iva khangvaal nangnoh. Alamva miikhatvaa aleh hunhaia mii khalmoa thisale, Ringpu vah malungsithei mahche mii khat mah chuvah Jisu Khrista in khangvaalla inimlan kuttholta huuitanga miitam kuunga amlanpei,

Miikhatvaa aleh hunhaia chimnoh suuknanga khangvaalla inimlan kutthol ivah mahchunang noh. Alamva mii khat in aleh ah atlakrella pichaar suuk janoh huktlasa, chuta trong amjuihnoh tukhat in aknua khangvaalla amlan kutthol in chimnata thlengsa.

Alamva miikhatvaa aleh hunhaia amah apaalla kthi inta paalleva, malungsi mahche akchimlamsehta khangvaal kutthol tih a huuitanga akphah eiva mii khat tihva Jisu Khrista apaalla veikhat ralla akringa paaltu.
Chunna mii khat in aromnoh hunhaia mii naamteta akchimnohting amthlak nanga, miikhatvaa akchimlamseh athlou apaalla ringnatu amchimkha mii naamteta amlanpei.
Alamva mii khat in trongson majuihnoh rella miitamta aleh amthlak nanga miikhatvaa trongson majuih apaalla miitamta akchimlamseh amveitu.
Trongsuur majuihnoh ahanralnatu trongsuur thlengsei; chuta aleh ahanralna khanna malungsikho huuitang aralpei,
chunna aleh in kthichunga loupaal nanga, inih Akpu Jisu Khrista apaalla ache amnoh ring inimlannatu malungsi in akchimlamseh akliia apaalnatu veisa.
Mah chuvah suuknohso! Inih in khatloh a aleh ah na am umeme?
Jisu Khrista soh inlup nannih in inaamma amah athii a inlupsme tih i romnoh choume?
Alamva thii a inlup apaalla amahsoh inphuumsme, nga tloh a Pa vaa paarthra apaalla Khrista ta thinata amringnanga inihkho akthravaa chaanna isehnatu relnasa.
Alehvaa aruungta mamaangnatu inih in veikhat alehvaa naichi iveinohnatu inihvaa amlui miikha amahsoh inruuia thingkharh ah amithlupei tih a inih in irom.
Alamva akthi miikha alehnata aningtam veisa.
Chuta inih inta Khrista soh inruuia thijou taningmeva inih in imlotvah amasoh ringjou ume.
Alamva inih in iromva thinata amringche Khrista in tiknikho veikhat inlenga thinoh usa; mahche thi in veikhat inlenga chek a achunga paalnoh usa.
Amah in thikha alehtinga anaamte thisa, chuta amah achaan akringva Ringpu ting ringsa
Nga tloh a nannih inkho alehtinga thisachou mahche Jisu khrista apaalla Ringpu ting ringsungta madonve.
Churella thi aja nanruunga aleh in akditta atlohnatu aleh in nanchunga akchek veia nanipuuinohsa.

Nannih nanruungvaa akhol in aleh thranohta atlohnatu akchimnoh tinga kutlai veia huuinanohve chuta thinata amringche mii nanga khatkho nanruungvaa akhol eikha Ringpu vaa akchimlamsehna kutlai nanga nantakta Ringpu kuunga malanve.
Alamva aleh in nanchunga akchekveia nanihuuina nohso, jarelna tihva nannihvah trongsuur athlanga ringnoh sachou chuta malungsi athlanga ringsachou.

Kthita akthlen alehvaa naichi vei sachoulakho, chunoh a akchimlamseh akthlen son majuivaa roijuih vei sachoulakho, nantakta naichi veia trongson majuihnatu malanchoule, trongson amjuihvaa roijuih veisachou tih a romnoh choume?
Chuta Ringpu ta mapaakrei, alamva nannih in alehvaa naichi louvei sachoulakho, nankuunga nanimlan matheihna ahoongkha ril luut a namijuihpei,
mahche alehnata mathlah a nanphah peitaningva akchimlamseh vaa roijuih veisachou.

Nantak in marnop taningchouva keiin miihoong nanga trongsang. Alamva nannih in seengnoh mahche akchimnoh ah ralla chimnoh a naichi veia nantak akhol eita namilankhempei, chunna pekva amseengnatu akchimlamseh vaa roijuih veia nantak akhol eikha malankhem vesa.
Pek nannih in nanjakna thlou kharella nankuunga jaknang kanana inlengme? Alamva mah naammtetu achenavah kthisa.
Chuta pekva nannihta alehnata mathlah aningtam nanimlanpei mahche Ringpu vaa roijuih veisachou, nannih in nanchuungnavah akseengta phah mahche adongna avah ache amnoh a Ring phah khasa.
Alamva aleh tlohna khaanva kthi khasa chuta Ringpu tingna khangvaal akuttholvah inih Akpu Jisu Khrista ah ache amnoh aring khasa.
Unaoeio, keiin trongsuur akrom mii kuungah trongsang–mahchuva mii khat in aringlaiva trongsuur in khit a asihmang tih i nannih in romnoh choume?
Nga tloh a changvaangche kumeikha amsal aringsoot laiva amsalrella trongsuur in khit a asihmang; chuta amsalta thisaleh trungsuur nujuih a amahta amthlahpei.

Mahchu nujuih a kumei khat in amsal aringsootva, amah inta aktlei miimasalsoh injouleva, amahta kupalaal itihtu. Chuta amsalta thisale mah kumeikha trongsuur nujuih a aningtam veisa, che amah inta aktlei kupakhatsoh paalleva kupalaal veinohsa.
Inih iruungin iringlai trongsuurtu veia aleh in akdit ah thita amrahnatu iruungvaa akhol in thlou atloh.
Chuta amaa leithinga inih in pajatla veia iamrel ithihkhanna trongsuurnata inimthlahpei, mah i amlui nirik ah anjih khannanoh chuta Li vaa akthar chaanna inih in rou itlohnatu relna.
Chuta trongthuun in reipakthratna roulouva ralladom ditnatu thlou khalmoa kamsuuk peiang. Alamva trongsuur noh a aleh in kthisa.
Keiin amaa leithing avah aleh jaonoh a ringang, chuta trongthuun athlengin, veikhatla aleh i ringsa mahche kei thisang,
Ringnatu trongchet trongthuun in keiturelva thihnatu veisa.
Alamva trongthuun in taancha loulouva aleh in keisimnapei mahche trongthuun in keithatpei.
Chunna trongsuur i kseeng, che trongthuunkho kseeng mahche chim khatkho thra.

Chunna akthra i keitu thihna veisame? Mah chuvah veinohsoh. Aleh i thranohta rom kicheknatu akthra akliia aleh in keita thihna kamsuuk peiang. Mah i trongthuun akliia aleh in ralla thranoh aveinatu relnasa.
Kei kitaksaak in kitlohthlouta maromnoh ang. Alamva keiin kitlohjata tlohnoh ang, chuta keiin kintirhtalta kitloh.
Ipek keiin kitlohdah talta tloh angleva, trongsuur i thra tih a kitak in kijapei
Chunna amah kitlohkha keiin tlohnoh ang, chuta kitak ah ak am aleh in atloh.
Alamva kei kiruung asuunga akthra jakhatkho amnoh tih a kirom. Keiin akchim kitlohjakha kitak a am, ohchuta mahkha keiin tlohcheknoh ang.
Alamva keiin kitlohjata tlohnoh ang, chuta keiin thranoh romma ktloh.
Ipekva keiin kitlohdah talta tloh angleva, mah aktlohkha keinoh ang, chuta keikuunga ak am aleh khanna atloh.
Chunna mah trongsuur i akthra thlou tih a keiin akthrachuta kitlohja laia, keininga thranoh am tih a rom kichekpei
Alamva kei kitaksuunga Ringpu trongsuurta kiroomthoksang.

Chuta kei kiril in amdon andahta raalla kantlohpi kei kiruungvaa akholsuunga ak am aktlei trongsuurkhat kimuh, mah trongsuur in kei kiruung akholtinga thloutloh a alehvaa trongsuur in keita paja kamthlak ang.
Kei i vaisi miisang akthisam ruungnata tunang in keikal ume?
Inih Akpu Jisu Khrista apaalla Ringpu ta kampaak. Chunna kiril invah Ringpu atrongsuurta routloh a ammangta kimdon, chulata kei kiruung invah alehvaa trongsuurta routloh a amsang.
Alamva Khrista Jisu kuunga am akring Li vaa trongsuur in keita alehnata mahche akthivaa trongsuurnata mathlah a kining kamtam peiang.
Alamva trongsuur in iruunga marnop a trongsuur in atlohcheknohta Ringpu in Asa kupata alehchel iruung ahoongta loua, che alehrella amthlah a amah in ruunga alehta maraal amthlakpei.
Mah chuvah trongsuur in atlohphuta aleh in amdon nujuih a sehnoh li aknujuih a seh i inihtinga amthlungnatu relna.
Alamva ruung in amdon nujuih a akringmii aruungin amdonthlouta arilla asih, chuta Li in amdon nujuih a akring mii in Li in atlohthlouta arilla asih.
Ruunga irilsih i thihna chuta Li a irilksihva chaan mahche leh–oisa.
Alamva ruung in amdonna ah ril aksih mii in Ringpu vaa trongsuura luutkhemnoh.
Mahche ruunga am mii in Ringpu amdon mapel cheknoh.
Chuta Khrista in nankuung amleva, aleh hunhaia nanruungta thisalakho, akchimlamseh relnava nannih nanliva ringmang.
Thinata amring Jisu vaa Li in nankuunga am amnoh Li vaa apaalla kthi nai nanruungta akring amlantu.
Chunna unaoeio, inih in routloh ah intool veisame, ruung in amdon nujuih a iringnohnatu ruungvaa aleimanta intolnohme.
Alamva nannih inta ruung in amdon nujuih a ringchoule nannih in thiuchou, chuta nannih in Li akliia ruung athlou eikhata thatchoule nannih in ring uchou.
Alamva Ringpu in Li ah achingmii annaamteva Ringpu asa kupasei.
Alamva nannih in intritna a naichi nanveinatu Likha phahnohchou, chuta Asa kupa akvei miiva Li ta nanphahpei. Inih in, “Abba! Pa,” ta iongpei.
Inihvah Ringpu vaa asa veisame tih a inih iklisaak in sakhi imlanpei.
Inih inta asa veimeleva inihkno laalchun veisame, inih in alah anangnah chuum jajou meleva, inihta paarthra inimveitu.
Alamva kutseem anaam in Ringpu Asa kupata aphoongnatu ngaaklipnoh a ngaak a ammei;
alamva kutseem in akanana amnoh athlanga amsa, amah in amdon nujuih vanoh a matuursoh inuruuia amahta akananoh athlanga asihpei;
Akmaangsam kutseemma suura insihnata mathlah a aningtam khakho Ringpu asa ei paarthra khanna anningtam amphahtu.
Inih in irom mah chuvah inseempot apumte pekphah khatloh a amme.
Inseempot khop noh a, Li vaa akrah matsah akphah inisaakho akjok ihukveinatu, tihva inih iruungta inithlokha ngaaklipnoh a ingaak laia itaksuuga inthtruh sa.
Alamva imtuur in inihta inikalpei; ipek inih in imuh matuur i matuur khanoh alamva tunang in amuhche pootrelna matuura am ume?
Chuta inih in imuhnoh khanna matuura ammeleva, mah kharella inih in doucheksoh inruuia ngaak a amme.
Mah khananga isolna jikcha ah Li in inimjoom; alamva khatloh a ingen ume ingennatu maromnome, chuta Lital in sinthruuisoh isoncheknoh trong jikchasoh inruuia inih turella trongtloh a am.
Mahche miirilta akjon Li in miiril kha intlohme arom, alamva Li in akseeng mii turella Ringpu amdon nujuih a angen.
Ringpu ta rilvol mii in amahturel amdon nujuih a aongmii turella Ringpu in bilam athratnatu atlohta inih in irom.
Alamva unao pasa tam ankaar a matsah akpok aveinatu, matsah a inromche amahta Asa kupa in chunna matsah a amchaangpei.
Amah in matsah a machaanga asih mii eikho aongei; aongche anmahkho amchimei amchimche anmahkho paar amthratei.
Mah naamte irella inih in jangison ume? Ringpu in inih turella ngirleva tunang in inihta inindah umangme?
Amah Asa kupata khaaknoh a inih naamte turella amahta inimlansoh inihkuunga apumte i malungsisoh inruuia jarella khangvaalla inimlannoh ume?
Ringpu in achar anchunga tunang in amlaal umangme? Ringpu vaa akchim.
Tuta amlaal ume? Akthikha Khrista sa oi, thinata liimma aringche Ringpu akchanga amma initurel tak a angen.

Khrista in inirilvol nata tunang in inithrek ume? Trihkhop a klah knang innahme, nohle chutchit innahme, nohle saakchaal innahme, nohle puunrei silh amnoh innahme, nohle thihnaringna innahme, nohle chemsei innahme?
Mah i nga tloh a injih khanangsa, “Alamva nangrella kannihta suuntla kanithatnatu sadam eita thatnatu anmidonnanga amidonpei”
Chuta alam apumtea kannihta kaniringvol amah akliia raal akchek ei anchunga kannih in ralla kanchek.
Alamva kei kirilla seenga kilohva, akthi inkho, akring inkho, ringroi inkho, akchek amneh inkho, ipekna inkho, akthlengsam inkho, atuui inkho
ankaang inkho, akthuuk inkho, inseemche bilam asuung am tukhat inkho inih Akpu Jisu Khrista kuunga Ringpu amlungsi khannata inihta inithrek cheknohtu.
Keiin Khrista akminga akchimta trongsang, keiin masimna a trongnoh ang, chim chimnoh akrom kiril in akseeng Li vaa apaalla sakhi kamlan.
Chunna kirilsuunga khalmo klah mahche inngainoh a kirilla amlah am.
Alamva kiruung tinga kei kisakhei, unaoei, kitaploi kuungei rella kitaktal in phool phah mahche Khrista soh inthreksangta kamdon.
Amahva Israel miivaa ansasei, paarthra, trongirhna, trongsuur malanna, Ringpu ta amthruun, mahche trongchetta akphahsei.
Amahva pipasei, ruungtinga anmah tingnata Khrista poksa. Lai amrella mapaak, apumte chunga Ringpu sa. Amen.
Abraham atuteh anveirella annaamte in amah atuteh noh ei, “Chuta Isaak nata nang nitute iongtu.”
Mah i asonnavah ruungtinga asa ei in Ringpu asanoh ei, chuta trongchet amlanna asa eikhata atuteh veia ateenpiei.
Alamva mah atrongchet i oisa, “Mainang laia keiin inlengtung mahche Sarah in asa kupakhat apoktu.”
Chukhopnoh a, Rebeka inkho miikhatsoh mah chuvah inih ipa Isaak soh innjonga nao inpooitu.
Chuta nao anpoknoh laia che athra nohle thranoh jakhatkho asuuknoh laia, achar nujuih a Ringpu in amdon khanna ngat a ngirhnatu athlouvaa apaalnanoh, chuta amahta aong apaalna.
Rebeka kuunga asonpei, “Anpaa in maksita rou atlohtu.”
Mah i injih khanangsa, “Jakop ta kiringvolsa, chuta Esau va intirhsang.”
Chunna inih in jangison ume? Ringpu vah chimnoh mii manaia thlou atlohta sonreime? Mahchu khak veinohso!
Alamva mah i Moses ta ason, “Keiin kiringvol mii khata kikchaaktu, che keiin kamchaal mii khata kamlungsitu.”
Chunna mah i mii in amdon tingnakho veinoh nohle mii in aksuultrang tingna khonoh, chuta malungsitheih Ringpu ningnasa.
Alamva Ringjih in Pharaoh kuunga ason, “Kei tuuita nangkuunga mamuhnatu che thalei pumte ah keimingta sonna niraannatu keiin nangta ankaang phomma kimbokpeiche.”
Chunna ringvoltheih miita amah in amchaalpei, che riltrang miita aril amtrangpei.
Chuleva nangin keikuunga naksontung, “Jarella pekphah a amah in akchimnohta ajonmangme? Alamva amah in amdonta tunang in thing achekume?”
Miieio, Ringpu atrongta amsangsamkha tucheme? Philchop ah beel akseem miita, “Jarella keita nga tloh a nakseem angme?” ta philchop in ruinoh.
Philchoptlang khata athratna athloua huuinatu, nohle akcham thloua huuinasam beelseem mii in philchop atlangta akut ah aseemja hoonga seem ajanohme?
Ringpu amlunghaangta mamuh a mii kuungah amah atuuita amromja slakho, tlumkhemma mamaangnatu inchaang slakho, beelta akseem inva amsoiva amnohtu,
amah in adoon paarthrata matsah a amchaang malungsitheih beelthum khanna ankuunga amahvaa doonkhaal paarthrata maromnatu,
amah in Judi khopta ongnoh chuta Jental jaatkho aong, inihkho iniongnoh peime?
Hosea a amah in tak a nga tloh a ason, “Kei kimiinohta ‘kimiisei,’ ta kiongtu; keiin kirilvolnoh kumeita ‘kiringvol kumei’ ta kiongtu.”
“Che, nannih i, ‘Kei kimiinoh sachou,’ ta ansonna amuntal khanna amahta, ‘Akring Ringpu vaa asa eio,’ tih a kiongtuei.”
Mahche Isaiah in Israel rella ongsa, “Israel asa ei in tuiiboomna sitsaichah tam seilakho, ankaar a anmahkhopta kakaltuei;
alamva Akpu in thaleichunga amlunghaangna che antha achenathlou veia ampaang usa.”
Chuche Isaiah in matsah a ason khananga, “Akpu inta atute tam inimahnoh lehva, inih in Sodom nangjim vei ume, che Komorah soh intrim usame.”
chuta akchimlamseh veinatu trongsuura anbei Israel in trongsuurta amithlung inkho phahnoh ei.
Jarelname? Alamva anmah in akchimlamsehta malot apaalla thrulhnoh ei, chuta anmah in akchimlamsehta phah i thlou itloh apaalla iphahtuta anmidon. Anmah in lungkhanna ankeh amisuihpei,
mah i nga tloh a injih khanangsa, “Anve, keiin Jaion na lungkhat kilin, mah khanna miikeh amisuihtu. Mah lungpii khata amlot mii in injak phahnohtu.”
Unaoeio, kiril in akditva anmah in inkal anphahnatu Ringpu ting ngen isa.
Anmah in Ringpu rella anrilva luut, chuta romma majuinoh eita keiin anmah rella sakhi kamlan.
Alamva Ringpu tingna akthleng akchimlamseh ta anmah in romnoh ei, anmah antak anrou turella anjonkhanna Ringpu vaa akchimlamseh ah anmah in luutnoh ei.
Alamva Khrista in trongsuurva achenasa, chunna amahta amlot mii naamteta amchimtu.
Chuta malot ah inbeia akchimlamseh in ason, nang nirilla sonnohro, “Tunang in ringramma kal ume?” (mahchuva, Khrista ta achungnata mathrum)
nohle, “Tunang in kdong amnoh athukna a trum ume?” (mah chuvah Khrista ta thinata achungting han).
Chuta mah i jangta asonname? Trongi nangkuunga innaisa, nang ninar a mahche nang nirilla am (mahchuva, kannih in malot a trong kanraan);
alamva nanginta ninar a Jisu i Akpu tih a phoongchele mahche Ringpu in amahta thinata amringpei tih ata nirilla malotchele, nangta nakaltu.
Alamva mii in arilsuunga amilot chunna amahta amchimpei, che amah in anar a aphoong chuuna amahta akal.
Ringjih in ason, “Amahta amlot miirel injak maphahnohtu.”
Alamva Judi leh Kriik ankaar a anthliin jakhatkho amnoh, amahta ak ong mii in amah adoon akhaalta ankuunga amlanche mii naamte turelva Akpukha intrim.
Alamva, “Akpuva akming ak ong miirelta akaltu.”
Chuta amlotnoh mii in amahta khatloh a an ong ume? Che amahta aktheihnoh luung mii in khatloh a amahta amilot ume? Mahche trongraan mii amnoh a anmah in khatloh a antheih ume?
Che anmahta mathlahnoh a khatloh a mii in trong anraanchek ume? Mah injih inanga, “Akthratrongta akraan mii ankeh i jikchah thrame!”
Chuta annaam in akthratrongta majuhinoh ei; alamva Isaiah in ason, “Akpu, kannih kankuung nata antheihche tunang in amlotpeime?”
Chunna, irungeihche malot thlengmang, che Khrista vaa akthra trongraan apaalla rungai iphahmang.
Veikhatla keiin kirui, Israel in lou theihnoh eime? Moses in matsah a ason, “Jaatboomnoh inkhat ankuunga keiin kallak kamsuuk uchou, kmong jatih khatta huuina a nannih namilung kamhaangtu.”
Mahche Isaiah in karaanga ason, “Keita keijonnoh mii in keita kantuuk ang, keirella keiruinoh ankuunga kei kitaktalta kammuh ang.”
Chuta amah in Israel rella ason, “Trong amjuihnoh mahche inhea aklou ankuunga nikhat suuntla keiin kikut kijampei.”
Ringpu in matsah a alourom amiita janoh a indah tlohnoh, Elijah rella ringjih in khatloh a nanisonme romnoh choume? Israel ta andah a amah in Ringpu ting khatloh a anoolme?
“Akpu nang trongraan eita akthat anmah in nang thiilkuungta anthritpei, che kikroua kanmah ningsang, che anmah in kei chaanta thatnatu kanjonang.”
Chuta Ringpu in ankuunga khatloh a amsangume? Baalta ankhuk makamma amithruun nohmiil akpul sirih keiturel ajea kisihpei.
Chunangjimma ipek malungsi apaalla achar anlei ste ammei.
Chuta malungsi apaalla charleva mah i thlounata veinoh; chuleva malungsi i malungsi veinoh usa.
Mah i nga tloh a injihsa, “Ringpu in ankuunga kmong amuhnohnatu mit mahche antheihnoh natu makuur mi in phah a ankuunga amlanei.”
Che Davit in ason, “Anmah teborkha thranoh madoina khatkho chaang veiso, anmah turella keh masuihna khatkho inlenga athunglohna veiso.
Anmah in muh ancheknoh natu anmit inthimso, mahche ache amnoh a ankong inkuiso.”
Ipekva anmah in aleh ah sehsei isonnava tukleiram in doonkhaal avei in, anmah in maichahtal pungporh phahseileva jikchahtal doonkhal tueime.
Kei kiruul Judi eita kallak masuuknatu che ankaarna mii arouta kalnatu.
Alamva anmah in injaonoh a tukleiramma inchamna veileva, anmah in anlouja i thinata ringnoh avah kha suuk ume?
Matsah akrahva adihnata seengle adih atlangkho seeng; akjungta seengle abaak eikho seengei.
Chuta abaak arouin tliklehva che raprilna chorphol asoiinanga anmahva amunkhanna mamoonga chorphol adoonkha inseemnatu namithloppei,
Abaak achunga thoinohro. Nanginta thoichele, nangta nakjok akjungkha nangnohche chuta akjung khanna nangta nakjok tih i intheihro.
Nangin nitihtu, “Keita kamthlopnatu abaak eikha athlikei.”
Mahchu chim. Anmah in amilotnoh alamma anmahta athlikpei, chuta nangva namlotrella ngat a ngirche. Mahchunna nangin thoinohro, chuta trihro
Alamva Ringpu in ak amche thingbaakei khata kalnohlehva, nangkho amah in nakalnohtu
Chunna Ringpu vah miita amchaaltheih mahche trihkhopnakho vei tih a romro. Chuta Ringpu vah mii machaal theihkha nikuunga inkeih a amtu, chunohlehva nangtalkho naktantu.
Aktlei inkho malotnoh a mathlah seileva kamthloptuei, alamva veikhat inlenga mathlopnatu Ringpu ninga atuui am.

Alamva nangta raprilla akmoong chorphol akuungnata tanna thakbilna chorphol akuunga asoi masuunnatu nakseem anglehva, raprilna chorphol abaak eita louva asoii masuunnatu seem meleva jikcha thra a suun ume.
che Israel anaamteta inkaltuei, mah i injih khanangsa, “Nangta nakkal mii in Jaion nata thlengtu che Jakop nata amlotnoh miivah ammangtu.”
“Keiin anmah anlehta kilohlaia amah in ankuunga kei trongirhna vei tuei.”
Akthra trongin alamveia anmahva nannih turella Ringpu jekna veisei, chuta achar in alam veia, puthou ipithou eita madonna anmahta anrilvol.
Alamva Ringpu in aong leh akuttholva thlengnoh.
Laikhat avah nannih in Ringpu atrongsonta majuih nohchou chuta pekva anmah in atrongson amijuinoh rella nannih in rilvoltheih nanphahpei.
Chunna nannih in amah rilvoltheihta nanimmuh rella anmahtingkho amah rilvoltheihta maphahnatu, ipek anmah in trong majuinoh veisei
Alamva Ringpu in mii naamteta trongson majuihnoh amveiei, chunna amah rilvoltheihta ammuhnatu relna.
“Alamva tunang in Akpu vaa arilta aromchek ume, chunoh a tunang in amahta akchaakchek veimeme?”
“Chunohle tunang in veikhat kamlenglatung ta madonna akuunga kutthol alamme?”
Alamva amahkuung nata khatkho amah apaalla che poot anaamte amah turelna seengning amahkuunga ache amnoh paarthra veiso. Amen.
Nannih in tukleiram ahoongta majuihnohve chuta akthra i khome mahche loua akchimma mapungpha veia Ringpu in amdon jangme majonna nanril mathar choulaia nanhoongta mathleive.

Alamva Ringpu in keikuunga amlan malungsi apaalla nannih in namidontuphu khannata ralla nantakrella inkaanga namidonnoh natu, chuta Ringpu in nannih khatkhat tinga nanimlan malotvaa chaang nujuih a seenga pichaar intlohve.
Alamva ruung inkhat ah akhol tam am, akhol naamte atlohtuthlou inchunnoh,
chunanga inih in tam samelakho Khrista ningva ruung inkhat ningme, che akhol in khatleh khat ruul veisei.
Inihkuunga inimlan malungsi nujuih a inihting ajeje kutthol am; mah naamtechu huuinarei, phoongnatu veileva imlot nujuih a phoongrei;
routlohnatu veile routlohna a huuinarei; matheihnatu veile amtheihmii inkho thra a amtheihso;
rilthoknatu veile rilthok mii inkho thra rilthokso, malannatu veile amlan mii inkho ril seenga malanso.
amthruun mii inkho ril luut a seenga mathruunso, amjoom mii inkho ril luut a majoomso, mii rilvoltheih inkho roomthok a rilvolso;
unao rilvolnanga khatleh khat ril involve; inkhat in khatta akral akthloisang madonnoh a inruruh a injahve.
Thloutloh talnohve, Li soh inruuia tloh khalve, Akpu ta rou tlohve.
Nangin namtuurna a roomthokve, klah knanga doutrangve, injomma Ngenve.
Akseeng mii andarkaar a malan aja malanve, rapkheina akthleng miita rou tlohve.
Roomthok mii eisoh roomthok jouve, aktrap eisoh trapjouve
Khatleh khat ril intrimma ringve; thoinohve, inruruh miisoh inruruh jouve; nanroua singsangta madonnohve.
Nankuunga thranoh aktloh miita thranoh malengnohve, chuta mii naamte kuunga ril liin thlouta mamuhve.
Vei ajaleva, nanchek makhei mii naamte leh oia amjouve.
Kirilvol eio, nanroua inthungnohve, chuta Ringpu malunghaangna ah mahve, alamva mah i injih a amsa, “Leiman akthungva keita, keiin leiman kithungtu, Akpu in ason.”
Mahchunoh, “Nang Jekna inta traamle, masaakro; amah in atuii raalle, iinphu malanro, alamva nga itloh in akangchunga ak al meiholta nibunpei.”
Thranoh in nangta nakcheknohso, chuta akthra in nangta nakchekso.
Alamchunna aktloh akhaleita andahmiiva Ringpu in thlou thunna asih eita indahsei, andah miichunga pichaar amtu.

Alamva rampuui eiin akthra thlou aktloh miita mathritnoh ei, chuta thranohthlou aktloh miita amithrit ei. Nangin aktloh akhaleita trihnoh cheme? Chuleva akthra thlou tlohro, che amah in ajapotkha nangin niphahtu,

Alamva nangkuunga akthra thlou tlohna turella aktloh akhal ei i Ringpu vaa routloh miisei. Chuta nanginta thranoh tlochele trihro, alamva amah chemseikha sulla choinoh; amahva Ringpu routloh miisa, chimnoh aktloh anchunga amah amlunghaangkha athlou veia aktloh khasa.
Alamchunna Ringpu vaa amlunghaang khannata inlitnatu khop noh achim chimnoh ril romna rellakho anthlanga amtupotchou.
Mahchusoh intrimma roithaang namilantu, alamva aktloh akhallei i Ringpu ta rou aktlohsei.
Mii naamtein malanphu malanso, roithaang antolh antolh in malanso, nitrihtu miikha trihro mahche najahtuphu miikha injahro.
Trongthuun chuva, “Nangin miimei miimasalta laalnohro, nangin mii thatnoro, nangin inrunohro, nangin miita innarhnohro.” Mahche aktlei trongthuunva, “Nangin nantongpi miita nitaknanga rilvolro.”
Rilvol in antongpi kuunga chimnoh tlohnoh; churella rilvol in trongsuurta amthlungpei.
Khulouh i chesamsa, ramvaarnatu innaisa. Inih in inthimlaina thlouta mathlah a avaarlaina raal puunrei silhrasei,
suunna itloh ikhalnanga inih in chimma sehrei, tuiibuh inruiinohve, nanhoong nanvaata mabuur mahche chimnoh thloua sehnohve, innah insuul mahche kallak tlohnohve.
Chuta nannih in Akpu Jisu Khrista ta puunrei nanga silhve, mahche ruung in akdit mathlungnatu ruunga tancha malannohve.
Malottinga marnop miita lousoongve, chuta amah atak anroutu relnava trong inkharhpinohve
Mii khat inva bilam saa aja tih a malot aja, chulata marnop mii inva inlou saru khopta asaakning.
Aksaa khanna aksaanoh khata usitnoh tlohnohso, che aksaanoh khanna aksaakhata pichaar tlonohso; alamva Ringpu in amahta asoongpei.
Aktlei roijuihta pichaar aktlohsam nangi tucheme? Atak in amah Akpu maikuunga ngirnoleh inriil amahta amngirhtu, alamva Akpu in amahta amngirhchek.

Tunangkhat in akni khatta amuveia louva akngaak mii khanna Akpu ta injah a ngaakso; tunangkhat akngaaknoh inkho Akpu ta injah a asaak a iin, alamva amah in Ringpu ta ampaak; aksaanoh amah inkho Ringpu ta injah a saanoh, che Ringpu ta ampaak.
Tunangkhat inkho atak akroukhop turella ringnoh, che tukhat inkho atak akroutukhop turella thinoh.
Inih in ringmele Akpu turella ringme, che inih in thimele Akpu turella thime; chunna inih in ring samelakho mahche thisamelakho Akpu turelnaning.
Alamva Khrista in athihche veikhat aringi akthi khatkho akring annihtu Akpu aveinatu relna.
Mah i injih a amsa, “Keiin kiringi Akpu nia mii naamte in ankhuk makamma amithruuntu, che malei anaam in Ringpu ta amipaaktu.”
Chunna inih inaamin Ringpu kuunga itloh itlohthlouta imlantu.
Keiin kirom, Akpu Jisu ta kamlot mah chuvah jakhatkho seengnoh ta isonnatu amnoh, chuta seengnoh ta amdon amahkuungva seengnohning.
Nangin nisaakpot khanna niuh ninaota aril masokchele, nangva rilvol nujuih a sehnohche Khrista in amah turella thisa churella nangin amahta nisaakpoot in mamotnohro.
Chunna nangin nithratkha thranoh nanga matrongnohrei.
Alamva Ringpu kurung huunnava saak iin khanoh chuta akchimlamseh che leh oi mahche akseeng Li a roomthok khare,
Nga tloh a tukhat in Khrista ta routloh i Ringpu ta ja a aloulohtuphu mahche mii inkho anja.
Chunna leh oi amnatu mahche khatleh khat inseemjounatu inih in tlohrei.
Saak iin rella Ringpu thlouta mamaangnohve. Bilam anaamte i tak a akseeng, chuta tukhat in asaak in mii aktleita anloomnatu veile mah chuvah alaal,
Stak aksaanohle tuiibuh iin nohle niuh ninaota akeh masuihnatu jakhatkho nitlohnoh in chimtu.
Nangin namlotkha Ringpu leh nang nakaar a sihro; atak in ajache atak anroua pichaar intlohnohkha doipha veisa.
Chuta aril inhalla saaleva akrouta amaraal inpesa, alamva amah in amlot khanna tlohnoh; alamva bilam malottinga innmun maveinoh a tlohkhalli aleh.
Aktrang inih in marnop eisoh amjou ringjoutu tlasame, inih irilkhopta maplelnatu tlohnohrei;
inih in inthringpi miita mathratnatu che anmahta seemjoua anril mapelrei.
Alamva Khrista inkho atak anrouta mapelnoh chuta mah injih inangsa, “Nangta nansaalna antrongkha keikuung tlasa.”
Alamva leithinga anjih naamte inihta inimtheihnatu injihsa. Mah ringjih in doutranga mahche inih irilta inithok apaalla inih in matuur iamna turelna.
Jisu Khrista aknujuih ah nannih in khatleh khat ril intrimma khalek veia nan amnatu Ringpu in doutrangna mahche rilthoknata nanimlan veiso.
Chunna nannih in pulla roolhkhat veia Ringpu mahche inihtu Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa apata paar namithrat.
Ringpu vaa paarthra rella Khrista in inisoong nanga, nannih in khatleh khat insoongve.
Alamva keiin kisonchou, mah chuvah puthou pithou ankuunga atrongchet amlankhata amngatnatu Ringpu in akchimrella Khrista in anvuntan ankuunga roijuih veisa,
Amah rilvoltheih khanna Jental in Ringpu ta paarthra amiveinatu. Mah i nga tloh a injihsa, “Oirella keiin nangta Jental ankaara kidomuche, mahche nang nikmingta laa veia kitlohtu.”
Mahche veikhatla ason, “Jental nang nimiieisoh roomthokve.”
Veikhatla ason, “Jental nannaam in Akpu ta mapaakve, mahche mii naamtein amahta mapaak veiso.”
Chela Isaiah in ason, “Jisu va akjung thlengtu, amah in Jental anchunga paaltu; Jental in amahkuunga anmituurtu.”
Akseeng Li atuuia nannih in matuurting nansipnatu che malot apaalla leh oi roomthok in nanimsipso.
Keitu unaoeio, nantak a akthra in sipsachou, akromin sipsachou, mahche khat in khatta inchaak nanchekpei ta krom in kiril ampelpei.
Chuta nannih in nantheihnatu alam ste rella keiin thouna thra a kimjihpei. Ringpu malungsi apaalla.
Jental ankuunga keiin Jisu Khrista vaa routloh kiveinatu, thiimpu nanga Jental in ankat pootkha maseeenga akseengpoot inkhat aveinatu.
Ringpu thlou a keiin Jisu Khrista kuunga kithoina am.
Alamva Jental in trongson amijuihnatu tranga mahche athloua kei kipaalla Khrista in atlohthlou khanoh a aktleia kithouna thranohtung.
Akseeng Li atuuia atlohthlou salungkhouna daang mahche salungkhouna thlouvei apaalla keiin Jerusalem avella invella Ilirikam phah ah Khrista vaa akthratrongta huuitanga kraanpei.
Nga tloh a aktleikhat in innmun atholche mah amunchunga keiin inn kitlohnatu Khrista vaa akming aktheihnoh ankuunga akthratrongta kiraanja hangsa.
Chuta nga tloh a injihsa, “Amahrella insonlou mii in anmuhtu, che amahrella lou theihnoh mii in anromtu.”
Chuta pekva mahveelin kithlou mahche a kei turella khum amnohsa chunna nankuunga khalmo kithlengjana kum khalmo sootsa,
keiin Spain kisehlaia nankuunga thlenga nannihsoh roomthok kitlan thoa nannihsoh kak kiamjouche rapkhei tlalatung.
Ipektal keiin akseeng mii eita majoomnatu Jerusalem a sehsang.
Alamva Jerusalem na akseeng mii ankaar a inran ringmii turella majoom i Mesidonia leh Akhaia na mii in anril pelsei;
mah thlou chunna anmahkho pelsei, tak a anmah ankuunga leiman intoolhsei, alamva Jental in Li tu vei doikhanna chuum phahjou eileva anmah in pootcheitu vei doihva routlohkho antlohtupot.
Alamchunna keiin thloui kamcheche anmah turella inthrai baobeh ankuunga kamlanche Spain kisehlai nannihsoh inmuhtung,
Keiin nankuunga kithlenglai Khrista tinga aksip doisoh inruuia thlengtungta krom.
Kei turella Ringpu kuunga nannihsoh keisoh ingenjounata Akpu Jisu Khrista apaalla mahche Li Akseeng in inirilvol apaalla keiin unao nankuunga kinoolchou.
Mah chuvah Juduia a am Ringpu amlotnoh ei ankuunga atakta ankalnatu che Jerusalem a am akseeng mii in okhanna rou kitlohnatu keija eileva;
chuleva Ringpu in amdon nujuih a keiin nankomma roomthoksoh inruuia thleng kichektu, che inih in khatleh khat insonjou ume.
Leh oi vaa Ringpu in nannaamteta namimruui veiso. Amen.
Kenkri ah am khakla ta amjoom isar Phobi ta anve kemve ta kamsilchou,
mah chuvah thloia akseeng mii veia nannih in amahta Akpu minga loulouve, amah in bilam darkaar amle nannih tingnata majoomve, alamva amah in mii jikchakho keikho kamjoomang.
Keichaan turella anmah in klah knang doua, anmahta keikhop in mapaaknoh a Jental ei khakla anaam inkho anmahta amipaakei.
Anmah innsuunga inboompi khakla tingkho saambaan kamlanei, amahvah Asia suunga matsahrem Khrista tinga akthleng miisa.
Nankaar a thlou tranga aktloh Meri ta saambaan kamlan.
Kei innsuungthok che keisoh simma amjou Andronikas mahche Junias ta saambaan kamlanei, anmahva keichunga matsah a Khrista malot a louamche raangroi ankaar a amuvei miiseengsei.
Akpu kuunga kirilvol Ampliatas kho saambaan kamlan.
Khrista kuunga inihsoh tlohkhaljou Urbanas mahche kirilvol Stakhias ta saambaan kamlanei.
Khrista ting aja mii Apelles ta saambaan kamlan. Aristobulas ataploikuung eikho saambaan kamlanei.
Kei sakhei Herodion kho saambaan kamlan. Akpu kuunga am Narnikas ataploikuung suuk eikho saambaan kamlanei.
Akpu tinga tranga thloutloh mii Triphina leh Triphosa ta saambaan kamlannei.
Akpu malot ah amingseh Ruphas kho saambaan kamlanei.
Asinkritas, Phlekon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas mahche anmahsoh amjou unao ankuunga saambaan kamlanei.
Philolokas, Julia, Nerias mahche asar Olimpas, che amahsoh inruuijou akseeng mii eita saambaan kamlanei.
Akseengin inchohsoh inruuia khatleh khat saambaan inpeve. Khrista vaa khakla annaam in nannihta saambaan nanimlan.
Alamva oinang mii in Akpu Khrista ta rou tlohnoh ei, chuta anvon turelna khopning. Anmah in akthra mahche miita mapelsin tronga jakhatkho romnoh miirilta ansimna.
Alamva nannih in sonmajuih veichoua annaamte in anrompei. Ochunna nannih rella kiroomthoksang, nannihta keiin akthra turella kamsing peichoua Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa malungsi in nannihsoh amjousa.
Leh oi vaa Ringpu in Seitanta khalmo intha a nankeh majaa a nanimchilhtu. Inih Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa malungsi in nannihta nanimruui veiso.
Trongjihthuunta amjih Tertias ta Akpu ninga saambaan kamlan.
Inih Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa malungsi in nannih naamteta naninruuipi veiso. Amen.
Pekva akthratrong mahche Jisu Khrista rella kiraan nujuih a chup chupta mathup a asih anthupkha,
ipekva anthupkha amdangpei, che ringraanei ringjih apaalla jaat anaamteta amirompei atrongthuun apaalla malot aja trongjuih athlengnatu.
Akromkir Ringpu vaa Jisu Khrista apaalla lai amrella mapaakna veiso. Amen.
mah chuvah bilam trongla mahche khiial anaamtesoh nannihta nanimdoonpei–
Khrista tingna ringtukna thamin in nannihta nanimchetpei.
Alamchunna inih Akpu Jisu Khrista amdangta nanngaaklai litu vei kutthol jakhatkho vaatnohchou;
inih Akpu Jisu Khrista aknia nanchimnoh amnohnatu amah in nannihta achena phah a chet a nanisihtu.
Amah Asa kupa Akpu Jisu Khrista soh paaljounatu inihta iniong Ringpu vah malot ajakhame.
Akpu Jisu Khrista minga kisonchou mah chuvah nannaam injajouva nankaar a inthrek baak amnohnatu, chuta ril intrim mahche pichaartloh ah rilkhat nanveinatu kinoolchou.
Alamva nankaar a innah insuul amchouta Klois amiiei in keikuunga kantongang.
Kisonnava khatleh khat in, “Keiva Paul amiisang,” nohle “Keiva Apollos amiisang,” nohle “Keiva Kephas amiisang,” nohle “Keiva Khrista amiisang,” ta nanson.
Khrista vah inthrek inbaaksame? Paul ta nanngut a thingkharh ah amithlu peime? Nohle nannih in Paul minga inlup sachoume?
Keiin Ringpu ta kampaaknava Krispas leh Kaias noh a tukatkho lupnoh ang;
chunohleva keiminga inlup mii in ansontu.
(Stephanas innsuung khopta kilupning. Anmahnoh a tututa kilupme intheihnoh sang.)

Alamva keita malupnatu Khrista in kamthlahnoh chuta akthratrong raannatu kamthlah ang, akthratrongta theihsinga khatkho lousingsoh raannatu kamthlahnoh, chunangleva Khrista vaa thingkharh atuuikha jakhatkho veinohtu.
Alamva akmaang mii turel thingkharh trongi kmongsa, chuta inkal akphah inih turelva Ringpu atuuisa.
Mah i nga tloh a injihsa, “Aksingei anlousingta keiin kammaangtu, antheih singta sul kamveitu.”
Aksingmii ram amseime? Ringjih lulok ram amseime? Mah chup in trong insin aktheih ram amseime? Tukleiram miivaa lousing Ringpu in ammaang nohme?
Alamva tukleiramna mii in Ringpu alousingah ringeita Ringpu ta rom cheknoh ei. Akthratrongta kmong inih in iraan apaalla amlot miita ikalli Ringpu in apelna.
Alamva Judi in daang annih, mahche Kriik in lousing anjon,
chuta inihva thingkharh ah amithlu Khrista ta iraan, Judi ei turelva keh masuihna che Jental ei turelva kmongna,
chuta amah in aongche mii Judi leh Kriik ankuungva Khrista i Ringpu atuui mahche Ringpu alousingsa.
Alamva Ringpu in kmong avei in mii in ralla singsei, Ringpu in marnop avei in mii in ralla trangei.
Alamva unaoeio, amah in naniongkha minna madonve, tukleiramma iringna chaan nujuih a aksingmii tamnoh, tuuia am mii tamnoh, akliin mii tamnoh,
chuta aksing eita injak amphahnatu tukleiramna kmong eita Ringpu in achar, aktrang eita amjaknatu tukleiramna marnop eita Ringpu in achar,
amuveipot eita jakhatkho amveinoh natu Ringpu in tukleiramma intooltaang che mii in jakhatnoh a amidon marnop eita achar,
ohchunna tukhat inkho Ringpu maikuunga thoiphunoh.
Khrista Jisu kuunga mah i nannih nanchaan anthruhnasa, mahkuunga Ringpu lousing, akchim lamsehchu, inimseengna mahche inithlokna Akpu veisa;
alamchunna nga tloh a injihsa, “In orh mii in Akpu turel in orhso.”
Alamva thingkharh ah amithlu Jisu Khrista khanoh a nankaar a aktlei khatkho nanromnoh natu kiril ngirsang.
Nannihsoh kiamlai marnop khatkho intria che inchuunna amjoume;
keiin trong akthratrong kiraankha miita mapaakna theihsing trongnoh, chuta akchim Li leh tuuita kamdangchou,
chunna nannih in namilotkha mii lousing khanoh Ringpu vaa tuui aveina.
Chuta anruk khatkho anthup Ringpu alousingta inih in imtheih. Mah chup i amaa leithinga Ringpu in inihtu paarthratnatu machaanga alousihpei.
Mah chup in rampuui tukhat inkho maita louromnoh ei; mahchuta lourom eileva paar amthrat Akpu ta anmah in thingkharh a loumathlunoh tupotei.
Chuta mah i injihsa, “Mit in amuhnoh, makuur in atheihnoh, chekho miirilla luutnoh; mah ita arilvol mii turel Ringpu in amchaangpei.”
Mah i Ringpu in Li apaalla inihting inimdangpei. Alamva Li in bilamma mahche Ringpu vaa akthuuk rellakho aktlok.
Alamva miivaa akli khanoh a miikaara tunang in miirilta rom achekume? Mahchunang Ringpu vaa ak Li noh avah tukhat inkho Ringpu in amdon romnoh ei.
Inih in tukleiramna lita phahnohme, chuta Ringpu in kutthol inimlanta rom icheknatu amah Lita iphahpei.
Mah i mii lousingta nanimtheihnoh ung, chuta Li ah kamitheihchou.
Li ah am mii in bilam chim chimnoh pichaar atloh, chuta atakva tukhat inkho pichaar tlohnoh.
Alamva “Tunang in Akpu arilta romma amtheihchek ume, chuta inihva Khrista vaa aril amme.”
Keiin siilchuh kim iinpeichou, antlang saakphu nanimsaaknoh ang, alamva mairella nannih in inchaang nohchou, che inchaang khonoh mangchou,
isonnava nannih in pekphah ruunga ammangchou. Alamva nankaar a kallak hangche innah insuul amchou i nannihvah ruungnanoh choume, che apupuh mii nanga ringnoh choume?
Alamva tukhat in, “Keiva Paul amiisang,” aktlei inla, “Keiva Appolos amiisang,” tihsachoule nannihva ruunga am miinoh choume?
Keiin klin, Appolos in tuii apoih, chuta Ringpu in amliin.
Chunna aklin amah khanoh tuii akpoih amah khanoh chuta amliin Akpu khaning.
Aklin leh tuii akpoih amahvah intrimmei; miirel in athlou athlou nujuih a kutlangman aphahtu.
Alamva inihvah Ringpu soh thlou aktlohjoume; nannihvah Ringpu alouchou Ringpu ainnchou.
Jisu Khrista in atholche innmun khanoh a aktlei tukhat in innmunthol cheknoh.
Pekva tukhat in mah innmun i ra–ao ah, harngou ah, amanchaal lunga, akchaar inloua chakpoolla tlohle–
mii khatkhatvaa athloukha seenga ammuhtu, alamva mah khanna amdangtu, alamva mahkha mei in amdangtu, mii in atlohthloukha khakhame tihva mei in chaang a antu.
Tukhat in antholche tihva mah innchunga aktloh innta inthrit cheknoh luunga amle, amah in atlohkhaan aphahtu.
Tukhat in atlohthlouta kaangleva amaangna veitu, chuta meikaarnata inkal khananga inkaltu.
Tukhat in Ringpu mathruunna akseeng thlaamta mamaangleva, amahta Ringpu in ammaangtu. Alamva Ringpu mathruunna thlaamva akseeng mahche thlaamkha nannihchou.
Alamva tukleiramna lousingi Ringpu kuung avah kmong. Alamva mah i nga tloh a injihsa, “Aksing eita anmah antheih ansinga Amah in asuurei.”
Khatla, “Aksingei in amidon ril akanana amnoh tih a Akpu in arom.”
Churella tukhat inkho miirelna thoinohso. Alamva poot naamte nannih nanta,
Paul slakho, nohle Appolos slakho, nohle Keiphas slakho, nohle tukleiram slakho, nohle akthi slakho ipekna slakho nohle vaknuna slakho anaamte nannih nantasa,
nannihvah Khrista vaa atasachou; che Khrista in Ringpu vaa atasa.
Mah chukhopnoh a thlou amrel mii eikha malot aja mii vei tupotei.
Nannih in keita pichaar keitloh choule, nohle miivaa pichaar nujuih a pichaar keitloh choule, keiningva mahchu jakhat khonoh, kei kitakluungkho pichaar intlohnoh ang.
Kitak in kitak rella romnoh ang, che mah khannakho keita kamchim vanoh. Chuta keita pichaar aktlohva Akpu ning.

Churella Akpu athlengnohmiil, laita aphahnoh maa a pichaar tlohnohve, inthim kaara anthunpeita amah in akvaara athlentuei che miiril suunga inchaanga am jikchakho amdangtu. Mahlai miirel in Ringpu ta mapaak anphahtu.
