Alamva tunang in nangta aktleinata namthlin peime? Nidoon chela niphahnoh jaknangta ammangme? Nangin kutthol phahnoh nangjimma jarella in orhmang cheme?
Nannihva sipchou, doonchou! Kannih injaonoh a nannihva kurung veisachou. Kannih in nannihsoh kurung veia paaljou i keiin kikdit.
Alamva achena veia Ringpu in raangroi aknita inimmuhta keiin thinata raitla nanga; ringroileh miitinga tukleipaaltu kumhei annatu inimveipei.
Inih in Khrista rella kmongsame, chuta nannihva Khrista tinga singsachou. Inihva marnopme. Chuta kannihta athlangtla naniannuung.
Pek pungiphah a vontraam tuiiraal kanphahmang, puunrei doonnoh ung,
Kannih in insuullung kankut in tranga thlou kantloh, che kannihta thranoh a kanisaalung ankuunga doi kamilan, kannihta kanichut laia kandou;
Kannihta loonna antronglai anmahta kamineemei; kannihva tukleiramna buurnam nanga veisung. Pekphah kannihva poot anaamtu burnam veisung.
Nannihta nanimjaktang ta mah i majihnoh ang, chuta nannihta kirilvol kisanang kikchaakchou.
Alamva nannihta Khrista tinga nanichingnatu inteen cheknoh mii doonsachou lakho, nanpa tam amnoh. Alamva akthratrong apaalla Jisu Khrista ninga keiin nanpa veisang.
Keiin kamsohchou mah chuvah kei kihoongta keitamve.
Mah churella Akpu ninga malot aja kirilvol Timothi ta nankuunga kamthlah, khakla ah keiin kamheih nanga, Khrista ninga kiseh kilonna kihoong kiva pumte amah in nannihta nanimtheihtu.
Nannih kuunga thlengnoh usang tihnanga mii arouva thoisachou.
Chuta Akpu in amdon veile nankuunga intha thlengtung, anmah akthoi antrongta kijonnatu noh a anmah antuuita jonnatu thlengtung.
Alamva Ringpu kurung huunnavaa trong khop noh a chuta tuuia,
Nannih in jaknangta nanditme? Keiin sungsoh nohle rilvolsoh inruuia ril inneemsoh thlengtungme?

Mah i tak a antongpei mah chuvah nankaar a kumei kupa ah lamchat chimnoh akseh amchouta, oinang kumei kupa ah chimnoh hoonga seh i rappu amthruun ankaar rounakho tuuknohme; alamva mii in apa akmeita paalpia am.
Nangva kei ningsangta in orhcheme? Inthleng adom nangin sinthruuihnoh ucheme? Tukhat in oinanga chimnohoong aksehkha nankaarnata manomve.
Akpu Jisu Khrista minga nannihsoh kei kikli in Akpu Khrista vaa tuuisoh anchunlai a,
oinang mii anruungta mamaangnatu seitan kuunga malanve chunna amah Akpu Jisu Khrista aknia inkal aphahtu.
Nannihva chol injaonoh vei taningchouva akthrachol inpool nanveinoh natu amlui cholta maseengve. Alamva inihva laalna sadamte buhdoonna ah akvei Khrista in inihturel inkatsa.
Churella inih in buhdoonna chol amlui, akthranoh khatkho kochanoh chol jaonoh a akchim khatkho akseeng tolsoh mapaangve.
Mahchu tukleiramna kumei kupa chimnoh hoonga seh nohle karaam, nohle inruraan, nohle rappu amthruun eisoh inchunnoh natu tihnoh ang, chunangleva tukleiram nata inthurh a sehtu tlasachou.

Chuta tukhat in keiva Akpu amlot miisang atihche kumei kupa ah chimnoh hoonga seh nohleh karaam, nohle leili mathruun, nohle inkhahkanga trong, tuiibuh inruii, nohle inru inraan mii veimele inchunpinoh veta kamjihpeichou, mainang miita saajou iinjoupinohve.
Alamva apaaltongna mii eita pichaar tlohnatu kei kithlou jangamme?
Khakla suunga ak am mii eita Ringpu in pichaar atloh ei, “Nannih nankaar ah akthranoh mii eita manomve.”
Akseeng mii in tukleiramta pichaar atlohtu ta romnoh choume? Chuleva iringlai nannih inta tukleiramta pichaar tlohchoule, indih indah trongsuura pichaar tlohnatu matik chanoh choume?
Ringroi eita inih in pichaar itlohtu ta romnoh choume? Chuleva iringlai aksuuk thlouei i inih in ralla pichaar itlohchektu phunohme?
Chuleva iringlai aksuuk thlouei rella nannih in pichaar nantloh in, khakla avah amuveinoh ta amdon mii eita pichaar nannih in nancharpei.
Nannih in nanjaknatu mah ita kitihchou. Chuleva amah unaota ankaara pichaar akltohchek nankaar a aksingmii inkhatkho amnoh choume?
Mahchu ngut a unao khat in unao khatchunga indenpinatu trongkat seh, mahchu Akpu malotnoh ankuunga seh ei.
Chuta nitakva chimnoh mahche miisimna thlouva nantlohche nan uh nannao chunga thranoh thlouvah nantloh.

Akchimlamseh noh mii in Ringpu kurung huunna phahnohtu ta romnoh choume? Nanroua insimnanohve kumeile kumei mahche kupaleh kupa seengseeng chimnoh hoonga seh khatkho rappu rapnaita mathruun, nohle miimei miimasal nohle sa lamchat ah seh, nohle karaam nohle tuiibuh inruii,
inru inraan nohle inkhah a trong oinang mii in tikniakho Ringpu kurung huunna phahnoh tuei.
Nannih mii arouva mainangjim chou, chuta nannihva nanichaampei, nanimchimpei, Akpu Jisu Khrista minga che inih Ringpu akli a nannihva nanimchimpei.
“Buh in vonpii turelna che vonpii in buh turelna” — che annih a khatkho khatkho Ringpu in ammaangtu. Ruungi kumei kupa chimnoh hoonga huuinatu phunoh, chuta Akpu turelna, mahche Akpuva ruung turelna.
Akputa Ringpu in amringpei che inihkho amah atuui in inihta inimtrangpei.
Nannih nanruungi Khrista vaa akholsa ta nannih in romnoh choume? Khrista aruungvaa akholta keiin kilohche ahoong thranoh kumei aruung kamveiume? Mah chutalva veinohso.
Kochanoh kumeisoh anchun mii in kochanohsoh inkhat veisei ta romnoh choume? Alamva mah i injihsa, “Innihvah ruung inkhat vei ume.”
Chuta Akpu soh inkhatveia anchun mii in amahsoh li inkhat veisei.
Kumei kupa chimnoh lamchat thranoh thloukha dongve. Mii in alehthlou atloh anaame ruungvaa apaaltonga suuk; chuta thranoh hoonga sehmii in amah aruung saakta jekna a alehthlouta atloh.
Nannih nanruungi Ringpu ningnata nanphah, Akseeng thlaam nantaksuunga amta romnoh choume?
Nannihta Ringpu in nanman teenna nanileipei, chunna nanruung in Ringpu ta paar mathratve.
Pek nannih in namijih trongrol kharella: “Kupakhat in kumei khating apaalnoh in thratu.”
Chuta mairella kumei kupa inlaalna madoi tinga nantlaknoh natu, kuparel in akmei amsoh che kumeirel inkho amsal amsoh.
Amsal in akmeikuungah changvaangna malanphu malanso; mainanga akmei inkho amsalkuunga changvaangna malanphu amsalkuunga malanso.
Alamva akmei in atak aruungvaa akpunoh, chunanga amah amsaltasa, mahchunanga amsal inkho atak aruungvaa akpunoh; chuta akmeiva amah atasa.
Manjangnuram khat khopnatu injana khanoh a khatleh khat injanoh tlohnohve, ngenna nanril maluutve; chuta nantak nanroua intel nanvaat rella seitan in nanimdoinoh natu inchunve.
Mah i ajanatu veia keiin kisonchou, trongthuun vanoh.
Keiin kiam nanga mii naamtein nanveinatu kamdon. Chuta miirel in Ringpu tingnata amah amahtu kutthol khatkhat am, mii khat in kutthol khat, aktleikhat in aktlei kutthol khat am.
Changvaangnoh ei mahche trulmeinuta kisonchou, mah chuvah keiin kikroua kiam nanga anmahkho am eile thratu.
Chuta anrouva inseelcheknoh eile changvaang eiso. Alamva anruungin anditta thocheknoh eileva changvaangin thloia thra.
Chuta akmei inta mahle amah in innjongnoh a amso, nohle amsalsoh inja a inchamso, amsal in akmeita madah nohso.
Akpu malotnoh kupa khatta amsal maveia ampile, kupa inta amahsoh amjou dile, kupakha madah nohso.
Alamva Akpu malotnoh amsalkha Akpu amlot akmei apaalla amseengpei, che Akpu malotnoh akmeikha amsal apaalla amseengpei. Mah chunohleva nansakha seengnoh vei tuei, chuta pekva anmah akseeng veisei,
Chuta Akpu malotnoh miikhanta inthrekpia mahle mahthlangso. Akpu malotnoh kupa nohle kumeikha innjong inkht a amnoh nangsa. Alamva leh oia iamnatu Ringpu in iniong.
Akmei eio nang namsalta kikaltu nohle kalnohtung tih i khatloh a niromme? Nohle amsallo, nang nikmeita kikaltu kalnohtung tih khatloh a niromme?
Tunangta avun antanche aongme? Chuta amah in avun intannohnang hukveinohso. Avun intannoh amaa a tunangta aongme? Chuleva amah in avun intannanga hukveinohso.
Avun intan in jakhat khanoh che intannoh in jakhat khonoh, chuta Ringpu vaa trongthuunta amjuihkhata amuvei.
Mii naamte Ringpu in aonglai talla a amna chaangkhanna amsoh.
Naichi niveilaitalla nak ongme? Mah khanna nang nirilsokna veinohso; chuta nanginta thlaang thlaang phahchek a nichuungna veichekle nangtu nivaithra veiso.
Alamva naichi aveilai Akpu in aong miikha Akpu vaa thlaang thlaangta akphah miisa. Mahchunanga thlaang thlaang aphahlai aong miikha Khrista vaa naichi veisa.
Nannihta aman teenna nanileipei, chunna nannih in miivaa naichi veinohvesa.
Chunna unaoeio, mii khatkhatta aonglai talla a amna chaangkhanna mii naamtein Ringpu soh incheknoh a amso.
Pek changvaangnoh a am mii eita keiin Akpu vaa trongthuunta sonnoh ang, chuta Akpu rilvoltheihta keiin kaphah malot aja mii khat nanga keiin kamdonta kamlanchou.
Keiin kimdonvah pekpek klah knang iphah i ianlaiva mii khat in a amnatal chaanga an am in thratu kimdon.
Nangin kumei khat kuunga inkhit a amcheme? Nanlitnatu jonnohro. Nangin kumei khatkuung nata inlit sacheme? Changvaangnatu jonnohro.

Chuta nangin changvaang chele, aleh tlohnohsache, radaang khat in changvaangle amah in aleh tlohnohsa. Chulata tukhat changvaangin tukleiramma klah knang anphah, che mah chunangi keiva nanimphah dinoh ang.
Unaoeio, keiin mah i kisonnava akthra kanana lai i khalmo chomsa, peknata mathronna akmei am mii in akmei amnohnanga amso,
marhuui mii in marhuuinoh nanga ameiso, roomthok mii in roomthoknoh nanga ameiso, che pootchei aklei mii in doonnoh nanga am eiso.
Tukleiramta ak huuina anmah in chimnoh a huuinanoh eiso; alamva tukleiram ahoongva maang umang.
Chuta changvaang kupa invah amah akmeita khatloh a kampe umeta tukleiramtu veia pootchei rella aril inchoisa,

che amah in akdit arilkho inthrek baak veimele che changvaangche kumeileh akseeng rungaakho anthliinna am. Changvaangnoh kumei in ruunga mahche li ah kseeng aveinatu amah in khatloh a Akputa kampel umeta amdon, Chuta changvaangche kumei invah amsalta khatloh a kampel umeta tukleiram thlou rella inchoi.

Nannih in nanchuungna aveina turel mah i keiin kisonchou, keiin nannihta nanivattang tihrella mah i sonnoh ang, chuta nannih in alam thra chimma nanpornau mahche nanril inthrek baak amnoh a Akpu routloh nanveinatu kisonchou.
Tukhat in trong amromche amah in chimma seh nohle amah in amdon nujuih a veiso, che sehso; anmah in changvaang eiso mah i alehnoh.
Chuta tukhat in changvaangnoh slakho aja tih a che amah in amdonta ngirra chetkanga amle, mahche amah arilvolta seenga sihnatu aril ata ngirle, amah in akthra thlouta atloh.
Chunna amah aringvolta akmei veia aklou mii khankho akthra thlou atlohpei, chuta changvaang andah amah inkho ralla akthra atlohpei.
Chuta kei pichaarva amah inta inn paalnoh a amle amah turelva ralla roomthokna veitu. Ringpu in kikuunga amta kimdon.
Tukhat in keiva jangmekhat kromta madonle chuta aromphu pekphah romnoh mang.
Chuta tukhat in Ringpu ta arilvolle Ringpu inkho amahta arom.
Alamva ringram nohle thaleia rappu an ong khalmo amslakho tak a “rappu” khalmo am mahche “akpu” khalmo am.

Chuta inihtu vei Ringpu khat mah chuvah inihva Ipa am, poot naamte amahkuung nata veikirning, che inih i amah turella veime, mahche Akpu khat am, mah chuvah Jisu Khrista, amah apaalla poot naamte mahche amah apaalla inihkho ringme.
Saakphuin inih Ringpu kuunga luut janoh; inih in isaak i iinni ralla athratna khonoh; chuche inih in saanoh iinnoh melakho ralla thranohkho maveinoh.
Nannihvaa thlaang thlaangkha nanhuuina laia malot ah marnop miitinga keh masuihnoh natu cheksilve.
Alamva khiial am nangin leili mathruunna thlaamma nisaaknatu tebor a nanboklai mii khat in nangta nakmuhle, chim chimnoh rommah marnop amahta leili ah ankat pootta asaaknatu namsoh nohme?
Khrista in amah turella marnop niuh ninaota nang khiial in nammaangpei.
Nga tloh a nannih nan uh nannao chunga aleh tloh a che chim chimnoh akrom anmah anrilta namisoh i Khrista kuunga alehthlouta nantlohpei.
Alamchunna Saakphuin kiuh knaota thranoh ting mathlaak sangle, keiin kiuh knaota thranoh a kamthlaak angutva tiknikho stak saanohtung.
Aktlei mii in keita nangva raangroi noh cheta madon aja, tak a nankuunga keiva raangroi inkhatsng, alamva raangroi kiveina chuumva Akpu kuunga nannihkho veisachou.
Keita minna keisui keijon ankuung avah mah i kitakta kanngaakna.
Saak iin relna inih in itlohtuphu amnohme?
Aktlei raangroiei, Akpu vaa unaoeio, mahche Keiphas nanga amlot kumeita miisoh inruuijou thoknohme?
Nohleh ringnatu thlou aktloh miiva Barnabas leh keikhop ningsungme?
Tunang in atak alanai inbaobeh ah raalmiithlou atlohme? Ngangli thakbil itlohche akrah aksaanoh tu amme? Sadamloom iselche sadamchuh ak iinnohtu amme?
Mah i akchek amneh antronga keiin kisonme? Trongsuur in maisoh intrimma sonnohme?
Alamva mah i Moses trongsuur ah injih a am, “Siilchal in chi akchilhlai nangin amuur khitnoh tupotche.” Ringpu in Siilchal relna amdonnohme?
Mah naamte i inihta inisonna nohme? Mah i inih turelna injihsa, alamva loukhoi mii in amtuursoh inruuia akhoi, mahche akrah aksir in akrah kiluhtuta matuursoh inruuia asirh.
Kannih in nankaar a litu vei chi kanvorhche nankuungnata achuungnatu vei akrah phahmele, mahchu aralmal peime?
Nannih in nandoonta aktlei mii in kannihkho mah i phahphomthok ta nanisonle, kannih in oirella jarella nanisonnoh tu ungme?
Oichunga inih in akchim tlohphomsuuk amnohme? Chulata mainang akchim tlohphomsuuk inih in huuinanohme, chuta Jisu Khrista vaa akthratrongta raanna kanpektu ngut a kannih in bilamma kannoolchou.
Mathruunna thlaamma routloh ei in mathruunna thlaamma anthlenta saa iinna ringei tih i romnoh choume? Mahche thiilkuunga routloh ei in chuum anjajou nohme?
Mahchunanga akthra trongraan mii in Akthra Trong anraan nujuih a ringtuei tih a Ringpu in trongthuun amlanpei.
Alamva keiin akthratrongta raan angle, keitu kithoina amnoh. Alamva mahkha tlohnoh janoh thlouta keikuunga kampuih ang. Keiin akthratrongta raannoh angle keitu klahna veisa!
Alamva keiinta tlohtangta kimdon khanna tloh angle keitu kitlohkhaan am; chuta keiinta tlohtangta kimdon khanna tlohnoh angle akthra trongta raannatu kikuunga thloukha kamsilpeiang.
Chuleva, keiin kitloh khaankha khasame? Kitak in akthratrongta raannatu tlohphom suukta huuinanoh a, akthratrong kiraankha kitlohkhaan lounoh a kiraan.
Alamva keiin mii naamte nata thlaang thlaang phah sanglakho kichek makhei mii naamteta Khrista kuunga thlennatu kitak in naichi veisang.
Judi eita kithlen cheknatu keiin anmah kuunga Judi nanga veisang; trongsuur thlanga ak am eita thlen kicheknatu keiin anmah kuunga trongsuur thlanga amnang veisang.
Trongsuur athlanga ak amnoh eita thlen kicheknatu keiin trongsuur thlanga amnohnang veisang. Chuta Ringpu vaa trongsuur jaonoh a am vanoh ang. Khrista vaa trongsuur athlanga ammang.
Marnop eita thlen kicheknatu keiin marnop ankuunga marnopnang veisang. Upai tloh a mii arouta kal kicheknatu mii naamte ankuunga keiin anmahnang veisang.
Keiin mah anaamte i akthratrong rella kitloh, mah chuvah doi naamte khanna chuum iphahjounatu.
Akleeng rel in bilam aksuul. Maang makhei in bilam aksuul. Maang aja boorpiita anphahnatu insuulei, chuta inihva maang janoh boorpiita phahnatu insuulme.
Thrasa, keiin kamsinna amnoh avah sulla tlaannoh ang, marvaanting apupuh chumnanga keiin chumnoh ang;
chuta aktleitinga trong kiraanche kei kiruungta kikutthlanga kisih.
annaamte Moses kuunga sumphaia mahche tuiiboomma inphuumsei,
mahche annaamte intrim litu vei saakphu ansaakjou,
che litu vei tuii anmah in an iin. Alamva anmah annuta akjuih litu vei lungpiinata anmah in tuii an iin, che lungpii khava Khrista sa.
Chuta anmah aktam ankuunga Ringpu in pelnohsa, chunna anmahta raaprilla inthekvorh amsuuk ei.
Pekva anmah in thranoh anditnanga inih in thranoh ikdiknoh natu mah anaamte i inihturel inichaakna veisa.
Anmah arouin leilita mathruun anvei nanga nannihva veinohve; mah i injihsa, “Anmah in ansaaknatu mahche an iinnatu inboksei, mahche roomthok a anlaamnatu inthousei.
Anmah arouin kumei kupa ah chimnoh lamma ansehnanga inihvah kumei kupa ah inlaalnohrei, che nikhatrua mii akpul sopnihlei inthum intolh a thisei.
Anmah mii arouin Akputa chaang an annanga, inih invah Akputa chaang annohrei;
nohle anmah mii arouin antlohnanga nannihva insonnohve che akmaang mii in anmahta amimaangpei.
Ipekva anmahta chaakna turella mah naamte i suuksa, chuta inihta inimtheihnatu mah i injihsa, achena chupkha inihting thlengsa.
Chunna ngir angta amdon mii khanna anriilnoh natu cheksilso.

Mii in iringna ah anonotu vei madoi khanoh a aktleitlei madoina nantakchunga suuknohmang. Ringpu vah malot aja, che nannih in douchek a nanlii ahanralnatu, nannihta madoi tinga nanithlaaknoh natu athing, mahche madoi khannata nannih in dou nancheknatu insenga nanmahnatu lamkhat amah in amchaangtu.
Keiin aksing ankuunga kiromnanga kisonchou, keiin kisonchou i nanroua pichaar intlohve.
Inih in imlan doiva chapla i Khrista athii achuum ijajoupei! Inih in tol ikhoih Khrista aruungta ijajou nohme?
Alamva tol inkhatning inih in miitam melakho ruungva khalekning inih naamtein tol inkhatta isaakjou.
Israel eita madonve; inthiimna poot ansaakha thiilkuunga chuum anjajou nohme?
Chuleva keiin kison i jangme? Mah chuvah leili kuunga ankatpootchu jangvei ume?
Rappu ramnai amthruunei in ankatkha Ringpu ting katnoh ei, chuta rappu ramnaiting ankat. Nannih in rappu ramnaita nanpai namivei keiin dinoh ang.
Nannih in Akpu chaplanata che rappu ramnaivaa chaplanata iincheknoh choume? Nannih in Akpu vaa tebor mahche rappu ramnaiva tebor annihnata sajou cheknoh uchou.
Inih in Akpu ta mii kallakna maveireime? Ohchunanga inih in trangmeme?
Tukhat inkho akroutukhop rella athratna jonnohso, chuta amah aringpimii turelkho athratna tlohso.
Stak anjurhna ah stak eita seeng seengnoh nirilla ruinoh a saaro.
Alamva “Thalei mahche asuunga am naamte Akpu ata.”
Akpu malotnoh mii khat inta buh saakjou natu nak onga sehtung madonchele, nansaaknatu nanmaikunga andoonkha thra thranoh nirilla inruinoh a saaro.
(Chuta tukhat in nannihta nanison aja, “Mah i rappu ramnaia ankatchepei.” Nga tloh a mah kharella nankuunga nanisonmii rella che chim chimnoh nanromrella mahkha saanohve.
Mah kisonni nannih turelanoh chuta chim cimnoh ril akdoon mii turella mahkha sonnohve.) Alamva kei kiningtam rella mii in kamirel tupot angme?
Keiinta mapaaksoh inruuia saa angle, keirella jarella thranoh a trongeime?
Churella nannih in sachoulako nohle iinchoulakho, nannih in nantloh nankhal bilam naamtekha Ringpu paarthratnatu tloh khalve.
Judi tingkho, Kriik tingkho mahche Ringpu tingkho, tukhat tingkho, thranoh mathlaaknatu tlohnohve.
Kei turelvah reipakthra majonnoh ang chuta bilam mii naamteta mapelnatu insuullang, mah chuvah miinaam in inkal anphahnatu.
Chuta nannih in rom kikditva kupatu akangva Khrista, kumeitu akangva amsal, mahche Khrista tu akangva Ringpu.
Tunangkhat kupa in akang makhumma ngen nohle Ringpu trongta trongle amah akangta injahnohsa.
Chuta tukhat kumei in amah akang makhumnoh a ngen nohle trong phoongle amah akangta injahnohsa, akang matusoh intrimsa.
Alamva kumei khat in akang makhumnohle, amah in asam chehso, chuta kumei inta asam chehnohle, amah akang matuta injakna veile amah in akang makhumso.
Alamva kupava Ringpu vaa paarthra khatkho aniim taningva akang makhumnohso; chuta kumeiva kupa vaa paarthrasa.
(Alamva kupa i kumeinata seemnoh, chuta kumeiva kupanata vei.
Kupa i kumei turella seemnoh, chuta kumei i kupa turella aseem.)
Mah chuvah ringroi in alamveia kumei in anchunga inkhat ammangta injahna daang veia akang makhumso.
(Chuta Akpu ningva kumei in kupa jaonoh a ring janoh, che kupa in kumei jaonoh a ring janoh),
alamva kupanata kumei aseemnanga pekva kumeinata kupa apok. Bilam Ringpu tingnata veiseengning.
Nanroua pichaar intlohve, kumei in akang makhumnoh a ngen i tlohphunoh;
Kupakhat in asam seile, atak anrouva chop aphah i mahousa louamnoh inkho inimtheih,
chuta kumei khat in asam seile mahkha atak an orh nanohme? Alamva asamseikha amah akangta makhumnatu veia amlanpei.
Tukhat in huuinanoh, nohle Ringpu vaa khakla inkho huuinanoh tih i inih in irom.
Chuta nannihta kamthieh nachou nanimpaak noh ang, alamva nannih in thlengjoua inboomjou chou i athratna veinoh chuta ralla athratnohna vei,
alamva matsahremma khakla veia nanboomlai, nankaar a inthrek baak suuk chouta kitheih; mahchu steva kamlot,
Alamva nannih nankaara akchim akseeng romna turella inthrek baak suukchou.
Nannih in nanchunlai Akpu buhdoon saaknatu inchunnohchou.
Alamva nannih in nansaaklai aktlei akthlengnohta ngaaknoh a nanta nantata nansaak tukhatva matsah a heitraamsei che aktlei in inruisei.
Jarelname? Nansaak nan iinnatu inn amnoh choume? Chunoh a Ringpu khakla ta usitnoh choume, mahche akdoonnohta namijak name? Keiin nannihta jangkitih uchoume? Mahchunoh keiin tlohnohtung.
che amah in ampaaknua tolta akhoihche, “Mah i nannih turella kei kiruungsa. Keita nantheihnatu mah i tlohve.”
Mahchunanga ampaakche chaplata loua ason, “Mah chapla i kei kithiina akthar trongirhnasa. Mah i nannih in nantheihnatu tlohve.
Alamva nannih in nansaakrel khatkho amah chapla ita nan iinrel Akpu anlengnohmiil Akpu thikha nannih in raanve.”
Alamchunna tukhat in tolta saa nohle Akpu vaa chaplata matik chanoh hoonga iinle amahva Akpu mahche thii ah amaraal amsa.
Mii khat in atak kminna in anso, che tolkha saaso mahche chaplakha iinso.
Alamva tukhat in mah i jarella ruung in isaak i iinme tihta romnoh a saa iinleva, akroua pichaar intlohnoh a asaak a iinpei.
Mairella nankaar a mii khalmo marnopsei, che knasei mahche arouin thisei.
Chuta inih itak inta chimma pichaar intlohmele, inihta pichaar initlohnoh usa.
Chuta Akpu in pichaar initlohlai tukleiramna miisoh inruuia chimnohting inimthlaknoh natu Akpu in inichaak.
Chunna unaoeio, nannih in nansaaknatu pulla nanboklai, khatleh khat inngaakve–
nannih in nanboomlai mii in nanimlaalnoh natu, tukhat in traamle amah a inna saaso che aktlei relnava keiin kithlenglai kamtheih umangchou.
Unaoeio, pek Li tu vei kutthol nanromnoh i dinoh angchou.
Nannih in nanrom mah chuvah atrong suuknoh rappu ramnai amthruun veia nan amlai, atrong suuknoh leili kuunga inhea naniching.
Alamchunna keiin nannihta kamromjachou, mah chuvah Ringpu vaa Li apaalla tukhat inkho “Jisu in phool phahso” tihnoh, che tukhat inkho “Jisu i Akpu” tihcheknoh ei, Li Akseeng khopning.
che ajeje routlohna ahoong am, chuta Akpuva intrim,
che ajeje athloulam tam am, chuta mii naamteta thlou amtloh Ringpu vah khalekning.
Miinaam turella akthra veinatu Li vaa athlouta mamuh i mii naamte kuunga amlanpei.
Mii khat kuunga intrim li aknujuih a lousing mahche aktleitinga khiialtrong,
aktleitinga intrim Li ah malot, aktleitinga Li khat ah mathratna kutthol,
aktlei khattinga salungkhouna thlou tlohnatu, aktlei miitinga trong phoongnatu, aktlei miitinga Li anthliin threknatu, aktlei miiting ajeje aktleitrong trongnatu, aktlei trongta malengnatu.
Mah naamte i Li khat in intrimma thlou atloh, amah in amdon nujuih a mii khat khatting kutthol amlanpei.

Alamva inih in Judi mii vei samelakho, Kriik mii vei samelakho, naichi mii vei samelakho, thlaang thlaang mii vei samelakho, inaamte Li khatvaa apaalla ruung inkhat athlanga inlupsame; mahche inaamte Li khat ah inim iinpei.
Alamva ruungvah akhol inkat, chuta akhol tam in aseem.
Alamva “Keiva kutnoh ang, keiva ruungvaa akholnoh angta akeh in sonleva amah aruungva akholnata inleusame.”
“Alamva keiva mitnoh ang, keiva ruungvaa akholnoh angta makuur in sonleva, amahva akholnata inleusme.”
Ruung apumte mit veile, ramma irungeih usa? Ruung pumte makuur veile, ramma imhok usa?
Chuta oinanga Ringpu in ruungvaa akholkhat khatta amah in achar nujuih a aseempei.
Akhol naamtein akhol khatru veileva, ruungva ram am usa?
Tak a oinang akholva tam am, chuta khalekning.
Chunna mit in kut ah “Nangva keitinga darkaar amnohche” ta son cheknohtu, khatla kang in kehta “Nangva keitinga darkaar amnohche” ta son cheknohtu.
Inthleng throlla marnop nanga imuh ruungva akholta threk janoh.
Inih in injah a imdon ruungvaa akholleita ralladom injahme, mahche klukanga imdonnoh ruungvaa akholleita ralladom imthrat.
Klukanga imdon akhollei turella mathrat i darkaarnoh. Chuta Ringpu in ruungvaa akholleita khlek veia aseem mahche amuh veinoh tih a imdon ruungta thloia imdonpei,
chunna ruung asuuunga inthrek amnohnatu chuta ruungvaa akhol in khat inkhat turella amdon.
Akhol inkhat inta klahle akhol naamte klahjouei; akhol khatleh khatta injajou eile annaamte roomthok jouei.

Ringpu in khakla suunga raangroi ta matsah a thlou athunei, innih tihpia ringraan eita, inthum tihpia lulok eita atthunei, chuche salungkhouna thlou aktloh eita chela kna ksa mathratnatu kutthol amlanei, akchingei mahchuche trong ajeje trongnatu thlou athunei.
Annaamte raangroi seime? Annaamte ringraan seime? Annaamte lulok seime? Annaamte salungkhouna thloutloh seime?
Annaamte kna ksa mathratnatu kutthol amseime? Annaamte aktleitrong trongseime? Annaamte trong amlengseime?
Chuta kliin kuttholta nanril malut a diveh. Mahche keiin nankuunga akral akthloirem lam kamtheih uchou.
Keiin tukleiramna miitrong mahche raangroi antrongta trong sanglakho, chuta kitak a mii rilvol amnoh angle, keiva anring daar nohle kanta anring khanangsang.

Mahche keiin ringraanei antuui amsanglakho, anthuptrong rom sanglakho, mahche khiial naamte amsanglakho, che muulpii eita malennatu kitak apumtea malot sanglakho, chuta kei kitak a mii rilvol amnoh angleva keiva jakhat khonohsang.
Keiin kamdon naamte malan sanglakho, kiruungta meia haalnatu malan sanglakho; keiinta mii rilvol amnoh angle, mah i keiin kichuungna jakhatkho amnoh.
Rilvol in adoutrang, che rilvol in khallak amnoh nohle in orh amnoh,
rilvol in thranoh hoonga sehnoh; rilvol in akrou turella suulnoh, rilvol in miisoh injanoh tlohnoh, chimnoh tlohnoh, rilvol in intha malunghaang amno, rilvol in thranoh madonnoh,
rilvol in chimnoh thlou a aroomthok hangnoh chuta akchim thloua aroomthok.
Rilvol in pootrik naamte aroon, anaam amlot, annam amtuur che anaamtea adou.
Rilvol in ache amnoh, trongphoongkho kham umang; aktleitrong trongkho dong umang, khiial amslakho maang umang.
Alamva inih khiialva mapung phanoh, che inih trongphoongkho mapung phanoh.
Chuta mapung phakha athlengin mapung akphanohkha maangusa.
Keiin nao kiveilai nao nanga trongang, nao nanga kamdon, nao nanga kirilla suuk; keiin kanrol invah naohoongkha kamthlahpei.
Alamva ipek inih in inthimrip a pitjanga imuhnanga, chuta imaile imai inmuh umangme. Ipek keiin akirruta kromning; chuta keita apumtea keiromnanga aknu avah keiinkho apumte krom umang.
Chunna malot, matuur, rilvol inthum i incheknoh a amjouei, chuta ankaar a anrolremva rilvol isa.
Nannih in rilvolta thrulhve, mahche Li tu vei kutthol diveh, amuveia trongphoong kuttholta diveh.
Alamva tukhat in aktlei trongta trongle miitinga trongnoh; chuta Ringpu ninga trong; amah in atrongkha tukhat inkho romnoh, chuta Li ah anthup trongta akphoong amah inkho trongsa.
Khattinga tukhat in trongphoong trongle miita seemnatu che mathlannatu trong.
Aktleitrong aktrong amah in akrouta inseemning, chuta trong akphoong amah inva khakla ta aseem.
Pekva keiin nannaamteta aktlei trongah kimtrongjachou; chuta ralla trong akphoong, trong akphoong amah in aktleitrong aktrong amahchunga ralla liin, chunna khaklakho inseemnatu.

Unaoeio, pek keiin nankuunga aktleitrong tronga thleng sanglakho trong kiphoong apaalla, khiialvaa apaalla, trongraanvaa apaalla, chunohle matheihvaa apaalla trongta trongnoh angle, keiin nankuunga jaknang kichuunga veitungme?
Pasi khatkho snanta nanga chaan amnohpot akchim roolta inringnohle, tunang in asukme tihchu khatloh anrom ume?
Che raal pik ul aktumin ahou maseengnohle, tunang in raaltloh sehnatu inchaang ume?
Chunna nanrouakho; nannih inkho namileia aktlei tronga theihsinga trongnoh chouleva, jaknang trongta trongcheme tihchu tunang in arom ume? Alamva nannih in marvaanna sulla trong veiuchou.
Tukleiramma trongtam ammi inhalna amnoh, che mahtrong ivah artha jaonoh trongta isonnatu jakhatkho amnoh.
Chuta keiin trongta artha romnoh angle, aktrong mii tingva rapkheimii veisang, che aktrong miikho keikho rapkheimii veisung.
Chunna nanrouakho; Li ta madangnatu nannih in ngaaklipnoh a am taningchouva, khakla seemma ralthloi veinatu suulve.
Alamchunna aktleitrong inkhat aktrong amah in artha maleng cheknatu tuui nihso.
Alamva keiin aktleitrong inkhat ah ngenangle, kei kikli in angen, chuta kei kiril avah akrah amnoh veisang.
Chuleva keiin jangta kitloh ume? Keiin kingentu mahche kiril inkho laa kitlohtu; keiin li ah laa kitlohtu mahche kiril inkho laa kitlohtu.
Nang niklisoh inruuia mapaakchele jangkhat romnoh mii khat in nangin nisonkha amah in romnoh taningva nangin nampaakha amah in khatloh a “Amen” atih ume.
Alamva nanginva khalmo thra a nampaakpei, chulata aktlei miiva seemma mathratnohche.
Keiin Ringpu ta kampaak mahchuta keiin nannaamchung ralla trongsang.
Keiin aktleitrong akpulsom kitrongut a aktlei in anlohtheihnatu matheih a khakla ah aktleitrong ranga kitrongin ralla thra.
Trongsuura injihsa, “Aktleitrong aktrong mahche aktleinar apaalla, mahmii ankuunga trongtung, mainanga itloh inkho kitrongta rungainoh tuei.”
Nga tloh a aktlei trongta trongi amlot mii tingva daangnoh, chuta amlotnoh mii turelna; trong aphoonglaia mah chunanga trongphoong ivah amlot mii turelna noh chuta amlotnoh miiei turelna.
Alamchunna khakla apumtea che annaam in aktleitrong aktrongeile, apaalna mii nohle amlotnoh mii in mah amunkhan anluutlai, aktleitrong aktrong eita anmah in nannihta innahsei nanitihnoh tueime?
Chuta mii naamtein trong anphoonglai inromlouva amlot mii khat nohle jakhatkho romnoh mii khat in luutle, mii naamte in amah amaraalta amiromtu, amah in amdonnatu mii naamte in amahkuunga an antu.
Nga tloh a amah arilsuunga anthupta che amah in intolhtlep a, Ringpu ta amthruuntu mahche phoonga asontu “Tak a Ringpu in nankaar a am.”
Tukhat in aktleitrong trongle, mahkha mii innih nohle aktam remma mii inthumkhop trongso; che mahchu mii khat in malengso.
Chuta trong amlengmii tukhatkho amnohle khakla a rimta ammeiso mahche anroua Ringpu tinga trongso.
Ringraan innih nohle inthum in trong eiso, che aktlei in jangansonme chaang an eiso.
Akom anbokmii aktleikuunga anthup trongta madangleva matsahna miikhan rim amso.
Alamva nannaam in romma annaaamteta masohnatu khatkhat a trongphoong aja;
ringraan anliva ringraan anthlanga am.
Alamva Ringpu vaa ril inhalna Ringpu noh chuta leh–oiva Ringpu.
Mah khananga khakla naamte akseeng mii veisei.
Kumei in khakla suunga rimta ammeiso. Alamva antrongnatu ajana amnoh, chuta trongsuur in ason nujuih a anmah in trongsuur thlanga ammeiso.
Anmah in anromja amle, an inna amisalkuunga rui eiso. Alamva khakla suunga kumei in trongi injakna.
Ringpu trongi nankuungnata inthruhme? Nohle mah chukhopta nankuungnata thlengme?
Tukhat in keiva ringraan khat ang; nohle li ah am mii angta madonle, keiin nankuunga kamjihna amaram Akpu vaa trongsuurta atak in jaso.
Tukhat in maita romnohle atakluungkho tuangme inromnohsa.
Chunna keitu unaoeio, trongphoongta ril luut a diveh, che aktleitrong trongkha khaamnohve;
chuta anaamte thratea che intlaanga nantloh veiso.
Unaoeio, nannih in nantheihnatu pek keiin kisonchou, mah chuvah nankuunga akthratrong kiraankha phahkho nanphahpei che mah trongkhanna ngrisachou,
mah trongkhan nannihkho inkalsachou, mahkhata chet a matuhchoule mah khanna inkal nanphahpei, chunohleva sulla namilotpei.
amahta anphuumpei mahche ringjih nujuih a nithum tihpia ringsa.
Keipha chuche somlei innih ankuunga amah in atakta ammuh ei.
Mahchuche unao reijalei ranga akralchunga veikhat ah ammuh ei, anmah ankaar a mii aktamva pekphah ringmangei, chuta arouva insei.
Mahchuche Jems kho ammuhpei, che raangroi naamteta ammuh ei.
Mah naamte i aknua thla tangnoh a akpok keikho kammuh ang.
Alamva keiva raangroi ankaar a keiin aksiinrem veisang, alamva keiin Ringpu vaa khakla ta kikchut relna keita raangroi ta ongi matik chanoh sang.

Chuta keiin ipek kiringi Ringpu amlungsi in ringsang, keikuunga amlan amahvaa malungsi i sulnoh: mahchusoh inthlenga annaamte chunga keiin thloia thlou kitloh mahchu keinoh ang, chuta keisoh inruuijou Ringpu amlungsi in atloh akhalning.
Mah i kei sanglakho che anmah seilakho, kannih in kanraan, chuche nannih in namilotpei.
Khrista in thinata veikhat ringsa ta pek amahta raanmele, nankaarna arouin thinata veikhat ring amnohta khatloh a nansonchekme.
Chuta akthi inta veikhat ringnoh seileva Khrista inkho veikhat ringnohsa khame.
Khrista in veikhat ringnoh saleva, inih in iraankho sul veisa, nannih in namilotkho sul veisa.
Alamva Ringpu in Khrista ta veikhat amringpei ta amahrella isonpei, chuta Ringpu in Khrista ta veikhat maringnoh saleva akthi eikho maringnohsa.
Alamva akthi eiin ringnoh seileva, Khrista kho ringnohsa.
Khrista ta maringnoh saleva nannih in namilotkho sulsa nannih ipekphah nanleh ah ammangchou.
Mah chuvah Khrista ah ak in anmahkho maangsei.
Alamva inih in iringlaikhoptu veia Khrista ta matuur meleva, inih in mii naamte chunga aklahrem suunga amsame.
Chuta pekva tak a Khrista in veikhat ring taningva, inna ak am ankaar a matsahrem akrah veisame.
Alamva mii khat apaalla kthi thlengsa, che mii khat apaal akho thinata veikhat kiringkho thlengsa.
Alamva Adam a mii naamte thisei, mahchunanga mii naamte Khrista ting inimringpei.
Chuta miirel in amah amahtu lai veitu: Khrista in matsahremtu akrah veisa, mahche aknua amah in athlenglai Khrista vaa ata vei tuei.
Mahchuche rampuui eita, aktloh akhaleita che tuui ak am naamteta ammaangche aknua kurung huunna Apa Ringpu kuunga amlanche achenachu thlengtu.
Alamva amahta jekna mii naamteta amah akehthuia asihnohmiil anchunga amah in paaltu.
Achenaremma amah in ammaangsam jeknachuva kthi khasa.
“Alamva Ringpu in bilam amah akehthui asihpei.”
Bilam amah athlanga asih eiche, bilamta amah athlanga aksih Ringpu in bilam chunga akthloirem maveinatu amah Asa kupa luungkho amah athlanga asih veitu.
Chunohleva akthi eita aklup mii in jangantih ume? Akthi mii inta ringnoh seileva akthiei anngut ah jarella anmah in inlupseime?
Jarella pungrel thihnaringna kphah mangme?
Unaoeio, inihtu Akpu Jisu Khrista kuuga keiin ammangta nankuunga in orh angi keiin indanglonga kan orh relna keithingang.
Ephesia ah rapril sasoh kannaak in miihoong veia ktrongin keitu kichuunga jangamme? Akthi in ringnoh seileva, “Inih in saarei iinrei, alamva inih in tungva thiume.”
Nannih in insimnanohve: “Thranoh miisoh inruui in akthra hoongta ammang.”
Akchimril khanna inlengve mahche aleh tlohnohve. Alamva mii arouva Ringpu vaa khiial amnoh ei. Nannih in injak nanphahnoh natu maita kisonchou.
Chuta mii arou invah anruitu, “Akthi mii in khatloh a ringume? Anmah in jaknanga ruung veia thleng tueime?”
Kmong miio! Nangin nivorh chikha thinoh avah mah in ringnohtu!
Mahche nangin chi nivorhlai akmoongcheta vornohche, chikhopta nivorhning, mahchu kehu nohle aktleichi veikho aja.
Chuta Ringpu in akdit nujuih a chikha amah amahtu ajanatu amlanpei, che amah amahtu chi nujuih akmoong.
Alamva atakchi anaam intrimnoh, chuta miitakchi in alam aje, sa eikho antakchi alamkhat, nga eikho antakchi alam ajeje.
Ringramna ruung akveikho mahche tukleiramna ruung akveikho ammei; chuta ringramtu vei ruungva paarthra inkhat che tukleiramtu vei ruungva paarthra in ajela.

Kini kvaar in antle athratna inkhat, che thla kvaar in antle athratna inkhat, mahche arsi kvaar in antle athratna inkhat, alamva arsi khat in avaar antle i aktlei arsi khat avaar antlesoh athrat inthlin.
Thinata veikhat ringkho oinanga vei. Maangtuphu ah invorhsa, maangnohtu phuting kiringsa.
Injahphu nohting invorhsa, paarthrating kiringsa. Marnopting invorhsa, tuuiting amringpei.
Aruungting invorhsa, litu vei ruunga kiringsa. Tukleiramtu ruungta amle litu ruungkho am.
Nga tloh a injihsa, “Matsahna mii Adam in akringtu mii hukveisa” juktoolna mii Adam in akring amlan Li hukveisa.
Chuta Li tu akveiva matsahna khanoh, chuta tukleiramtu vei aruungkhare, che aknua Li khasa.
Matsahna miikha thaleinasa, amahva tukleina mii; innih tihpina mii in ringramna.
Philnata aseemnanga, philla aseem amahkho mainangsei; ringramnata veinanga ringramnatu akvei anmahkho mainangsei.
Inih in tukleinata aseem aniim louva poknanga, inih inkho ringramna aniim louva pok ume.
Unaoeio, keiin mah i kisonchou: thiileh ruung in akmaangnoh tupot phah janohtu.
Anve! Anthup trongta kisonchou. Inaam innoh ume, chuta inaamte inthleng ume,
kaksuunga imit rip itlohsuunga juktoolna pik ul atumtu. Alamva pik ul atumtu, akthi eita maang janohting amringtu, mahche inihta inimthlengtu.
Alamva maang aja i maang janoh ah isilhtu tla, kthi akvei tupot i kthinoh tupot isilhtu tla.
Maang aja i maang janoh ah inthlengche, isilh inna mahche kthi aja i kthi janoh tinga isilh in ringjih in asonkha tlungsa: “Raalchek in akthita amduulpei”
“Akthi nango, nangin raal nichekha khosame? Akthi nango, nang namreikha khosame?”
Akthivaa amreiva alehsa; alehvaa tuuiva trongsuursa.
Chuta inih Akpu Jisu Khrista apaalla raalchek inimlan Ringpu ta mapaakreio.
Alamchunna kirilvol unaoeio, ngat a ngirve, inchekchik tlohnohve, Akpu thlouta nantloh nankhal in sul aveinoh natu romma lai amrel Akpu a thloutloh ah huuitanga tloh khalve.
Kouhrel matsah aknia, nannih khatkhat in nanphah chaanga matlon choulaia sihve chunna keiin kithlenglai namilan tuphu inthrainatu.
Mahche keiin kitlunglai, nannih in nanjamiita trongjihthuun soh nankuttholta phurh a Jerusalem a kamthlahtuei.
Keikho seh aja tupotle, anmah in keisoh inruuia sehtuei.
keiin nannihsoh amjouta jaleva nohle phalbi akho nannihsoh amjouta jaleva, mahchunna ramram ame keita miiramma namiseh natung.
Keiin pek aphom khatnata khat ah kisehlaiva nannihsoh inmuhdah ang; Ringpu in keijaleva lai kakva nannihsoh kiamjahang.
Chuta keiin Pentikos ni phah Ephesia ah amtung,
alamva kanana thlou tlohnatu inn khat laakta inhoonga amsa, mahkhata akjetmii tammei.
Tukhat inkho amahta usitnoh tlohnoh eiso. Intha a lamma leh oia thulve chunna amah in keikuunga anlengnatu, unaoeisoh anthlengjou natu keiin ramrinna amsang.
Thlou naamte rilvol amma tloh khalve.
mahkhanang miisoh tlohkhal jouva akchek amneh ei anthlanga nan amnatu tranga kisonchou.
Keiin Stephanas, Phorkhunatas che Akhaikas anthleng in kiroomthoksa, alamva nannih nan amnohlai intlohtuphu thlou anmah in antlohpei;
alamva anmah in inih irilta amithrappei. Mah khanang mii eita ansak maromve.
Unao pasa annaam in nannihta saambaan nanimthlah. Akseenga inchoh a khatleh khat saambaan inpeve.
Tunangkhat in Akputa rilvolnohle, atakchunga phooltlung veitu.
Inih Akpu Jisu va malungsi in nanimruui veiso.
Nannihta kirilvolchou i ralthloia Jisu Khrista in nantakchunga am veiso.
Inih ilah isam anaamteta inibohkhanna inih inkho bilam klah knang akphah eita boh icheknatu Ringpu in inih itak ah ilah isamna jikcha ah inibohpei.
Alamva inihrella Khrista in huuitanga klah knang adounanga, Khrista apaalla inihkho huuitanga inibohpei.

Inih in klah knang iphahlaia, amah inta nannihta nanibohleh mahchu chaanring turelnasa, che inihta inibohkha inihta inimthlanna turelna. Mah chuvah kannih in kanphah klah knangsoh intrimma nannih inkho doutranga nanphahkha nanrompei.
Nannih turella kannih in kamituurva incheknoh, alamva kannih in kanlah kansamma chuum nanjajou nanga, kannih in kanbohna akho chuum nanjajou tuta kanrom.
Jarelna, thihnatu tandi aklu inih in iphahpei; chuta itak ikrouin imdonna ah matuurnoh a thinata amring Ringpu ta imlotnatu.
Thihna phah a thranoh suuksamta amah in inikalpei, chekho amah in inikal umang; veikhatlakho inikal umangta amahkuunga kamituurmang.
Nannih inkho ngenna kanimjoom umangchou chunna mii jikcha in anngenta masanga, inikuunga inimlan doih rella miitam in inih ingut a amipaaktu.

Alamva inih in in orhnava, chim chimnoh romna sakhi i inih in Ringpu tingna akseengin mahche iril seenga tukleiramma tlohkhalla iam isa, che inih in ralthloiakho itloh i inihtingna lousingnoh a chuta Ringpu vaa malungsia mahche nannihtingna akthrahoonga sehsung.
Alamva kannih in nankuunga jakhatkho majihnoh ung chuta nannih in akpaa leh nanromchekna tukhopning; nannih in thratea nanromtuta keiin kamtuur.
Nannih in steva nanrompei kannih rella in orchou mah chuvah Akpu Jisu aknichunna nannihrel kannikho in orh kanchek usa.
Alamva oirella keiva inlitnohtung ta nankuunga matsah a kithlengja luungsa, chunna nannih in saruk innih nanril peltu;
Mesidonia ah kisehlai nannihta kphahja hangchou che Mesidonia nata nankuunga inlenga Judia namisehtung ta kamdon.
Maita tlohtang kitihlai keita kamdonve. Keiin kamchaang anaamte tukleiramna mii in amchaang peime?
Ringpu vah ataktak a malot aja taningva, nankuunga kantrongi oi nohleh ah ta isonnatu amnoh.
Alamva kannih in mah chuvah Silvanas leh Timothi mahche keiin Ringpu Asa kupa Jisu Khrista rella nankaar a akthratrongta kanraankha oi nohle a atih a isonna amnoh, chuta amahningva lai amrel oi ning.
Alamva Ringpu atrongchet naamteva amahningvah oi ning. Mairella amah apaalla Ringpu paarthratnatu ison. Amen.
Chuta Khrista tinga kannih leh nannihta akseem akliinni Ringpu sa, mahche thlou tlohnatu inihta inimsilpei;
itakchunga amah chumta ininampei mahche irilsuunga amah ita trongchet veia inisihpei.
Nannihta malahnoh natu keiin Korinthia ah thlengnoh angta kei kichunga Ringpu in sakhi aveinatu kiong.
Namilot khata phlaak huuinatu thlou itlohjou, alamva namilotna khanna ngat a nanngirhnatu.
Alamva keiin kiril klahsoh inruuia veikhat nanian kithlengnoh natu veikhat ngirsang.
Alamva keiin nannihta nanimlah anglehva, tunang in keita room kamthok tungme?
Keiin kitlohkhata kamjihning, chunna keita room kamthok ankuunga keiin malahnohtung, keiin kiroomthok i nannih turellakho kiroomthokna veisa. Mah i kitak ah kamlotna amrelna.
Alamva khalmo klah knang mahche rilsok ruithlisoh inruuia mah i nankuunga kamjih, nannihta malah masuukna turelna noh chuta keininga am khalmo ralthloia huuitang rilvolkhata nankuunga kammuhjachou.
Chuta tukhat in klah masuuklehva, amah in pootrik aveinoh natu kei kirilta manatnoh chuta akirrua khalmo klua madonleva nannaamte rella klah aveinoh natu kison.
Mahkhanang miiturelvah, mii aktam in tandi nantlohkha ajapei.
Chunna mahkhanang miikha nannih in ip a nanloh in thratu, chunohleva aril lahmalla maang aja.
Churella amahta tak a kanringvolche ta namiromnatu kinoolchou.
Alamva oirella keiin kamjih mah chuvah bilam son namijuihmeta chaang kiannachou.
Nannih in tunangkhatta nan ipkha, keiinkho ki ippei. Keiinta ipsangleva, mah ki ipkha nannih rella Khrista amaikuunga ki ippei,
seitan in inih tingnata ralla kanana tancha alohtu, alamva mah aksil amchaangi inih in kmong relna khonohme.
chuta kei kirilva inngaicheknoh, alamva ohkhanna unao Titas ta tuuknohsang. Churella anmahta mathlah a sehnatu kisonche Mesidonia ting sehsang.
Chuta Ringpu mapaakrei, Khrista apaalla lai amrella inihta raalchek a inisehpi, mahche inih ipaalla amahta romma amrimtui lousingkha amun naamtea akthekpei.
Alamva Ringpu in akalche mii ankaar a che akmaang miiei ankaar a inihva Ringpu kuunga Khrista vaa amrimtui veisame.
Akthi in akthi kuunga anrim vei. Mairella mapungphava tunangsame?

Alamva kannihva mii jikchain antlohnanga Ringpu atrongta inbaobeh thrulhna veia tlohnoh ung; chuta rilseeng veia, Ringpu in thlou tlohnatu inimthlah veia, Ringpu in kanitirhna ah Khrista ta trongsung.
Nannih nantak nanrilla injihkhata mii naamtein paa a anromnatu nannihva kannihtu trongjihthuun sachou;

Nannihva kannih in kamithlah Khrista tingna trongjihthuun sungta namimuhpei, muk ah injih veinoh a chuta akring Ringpu vaa Li a injih sachou, lung inpepchunga injih veinoh a chuta malungchunga injih sachou.
Khrista apaalla Akpu ta tak a malot i inih itak ah amme,
bilam inih tingnata veiche thlengta isonnatu imtik amnoh; inihtu akchekva Ringpu tingnaning,
amah in inihta akthar trongirhnavaa amtik am khatkho inihta rou aktlohmii inimveipei, mah i anjih nanoh chuta Lina; alamva anjih invah athat, chuta Li in chaan inimlan.
Ipek akthivaa routlohta, lungchunga anvil trongjihthuun veileva injih a thloiral paarthra thlengsa, mah chuvah matsah avah vaarnoh slakho ameel antleta Israel in ancheknoh eileva,
Li vaa routlohkha jikcha liinthloia paarthra ume?
Alamva maraal malanna routloh khata thloiral paarthra amleva, akchimlamseh routlohna in jikcha thloiral paarthra vei ume.
Tak a amaana paarhtra akvaarkha chesa ipek mahkhachung akvaar paarthrakha thlengsa.
Alamva anthamche khanna paarthra veia thlengle, thlunglin akveikhava jikcha ralla paarthra ume.
Inih in oinang matuurta iamrella rilthokna khalmo thrame,
intham paarthrava Israel in mah khanna an amnohnatu Moses in amaipuun ajaar khanangnoh.
Chuta anmah anrilta amtrongpei, alamva mi in phah a, anmah in amlui trongirhna ah anpaallai, puun injaarkha inlounoh a am, alamva Khrista apaalla mah i inlousa.
Oi, mi in phah Moses vaa trongsuurta anpaarel injaarpuun in kanikhalta anrilla amidon.
Chuta mii khat in Akpu ting inheileva injaar puunkha inlousa.
Akpu vah Li, Akpu vaa Li amna ah ningtamna am.
Inih inaamte imai ah puun injaarnohsa, inruuia Akpu vaa paarthrata ian, mahchunanga ankaang thaak khatnata paarthravaa ankaang thaaktinga inithlentu; alamva mah i Akpu tingnata akthleng amah ak Lisa.
Alamchunna Ringpu vaa rilvoltheih apaalla amahta routloh iphahpei, inih in iril malengnohme.

Inih in inruk a injakna ithloueita imthlahpei, leemtheih nohle Ringpu trongta romsin veia huuina indahsame, chuta akchim trongrol apaalla, itakta Ringpu in inianna mii naamte rilta chim chimnoh amrompei.
Inihvaa akthra trongi inkhum slakho maiva akmaang ankuung khop a inkhumning.
Anmah rella mah tukleiramna rappuin malotnoh ei, Ringpu ahoong nangjim Khrista vaa paarthra akthratrong akvaarta muh ancheknoh natu anmah anrilta amchopei.
Alamva kannih in akthratrong kanraan i kannih kantanoh, chuta Jisu Khrista vah Akpu, Jisu rella kannih i nannihvaa roijuih veia kantaksaak in trong kanraan.
Alamva, “Akvaarin inthimta amvaarpei,” ta Ringpu in Khrista apaalla amahvaa paarthra lousing akvaarta inimlannatu inih imlungta amvaarpei.
Chuta inihvah mah lalli philbeella khinna isihpei, mah chuvah ankaangrem tuui i Ringpu ta inih itanoh ta ammuhnatu.
Bilamma inihta klah knang inimphah chuta inimvui vanoh, ilu amhai, chuta koinek vanoh;
inichut, chuta inimthlah vanoh; iniloonthrui chuta maang vanohme;
Lai amrella Jisu thita inih iruunga iphurh, chunna Jisu tingna akringkha ini iruungakho ammuhnatu.
Alamva inih in iringlai lai amrella Jisu turella ithihnatu imlanpei, chunna Jisu tingna akringkha kthi nai iruunga amna turelnasa.
Kthi in inihtinga thlou atloh, chuta akring inva nankuunga am.
Chunna, “Keiin kamlotpei, che trongsang,” ta anjih khananga malot likha intrimma am, kannih inkho kamilotmang, churella kannih in trongsung,
Inih in irom mah chuvah Akpu Jisu ta amring amah in inihkho Jisu soh inruuia inimringtu che kannihsoh inruuia amah amna a iniphurhtu.
Alamva mah i nannih turelnasa chunna mii kuungah malungsi ralla amrella malungsi in Ringpu vaa paarthrata ruunga roomthok malankho araltu.
Churella iril inlengnohme. Inih iruungi maangslakho, inihtu asuungtong liva anirel thar a am.
Alamva amah in kakrutu klah knangin inimlahkhan kirik akral chuta Akpu vaa paarthrava inihturel amchaangpei,
alamva inih in imuhchek pootting annoh a imuhcheknoh pootting ianpei; alamva muh ichekpootva kak turelnaning, chuta muh icheknoh pootva ache amnoh.
Alamva inih in irom mah chuvah inih in iringna thaleina khlupuun thlaamta maangsleva, inihturel kut ah iseemnoh, Ringpu tingna inn khat ringramma ache amnoh a am.
Onva tak a traptruuime, chunna ringramtingna inih in ngaaklipnoh a amme.
Chunna puun isilh in athlaia inituuknoh natu.
Alamva inih in mah khlupuun thlaamma iamsuung insuk inhalme, inihta puunrei inimsilhnoh vanoh, chuta puun nimsilh, chunna akringin kthi ajata amduulnatu relna.
Mahchuta inihturel amchaang amahkhavah Ringpu sa, che amah in ikuunga Li veia inimlan.
Chunna lai amrella iril inrol; inih in irom mah chuvah inih in ruungvaa inna iamlai, Akpu kuungnata inlame,
alamva inih in malot apaalla sehme, imuh apaalnanoh.
Inih irilta marolla mahche iruungta imthlahche Akpu soh amjouin ralla thra.
Chunna inih in inna amsamelakho nohleh mathlah a seh samelakho, inih in imsinnava amahta mapel khasa.
Alamva inaamte Khrista vaa pichaar phompii amaa a ngirume, chunna amah mah aruungin atlohthlou nujuih a thra slakho thranoh slakho miirel in iphahtu.
Churella Akpu ta trih a romma tranga kanson; chuta inih i jaknangmii veimeme tihchuva Ringpu in inirom, che chim chimnoh akrom nanril inkho aromtuta kamlot.
Kanroua nankuunga inlenga nanimpaak tanoh ung chuta kannihrel nanthoinoh natu kamilanchou, chunna mahmii arilla ak am khanoh akthloi ankuunga masang nancheknatu.
Kannih in klah knang phah sunglakho mah i Ringpu turelna, inih in chimma madon melakho, mah i nannih turelna.
Alamva Khrista in inirilvol khanna inihta inimtuhpei, jarelna tihva kannih in chimma kanrom mah chuvah mii khat in mii naamte turel thisa; alamchunna mii naamte thisei.
Che amah in mii naamte turel thisa, mah chuvah akringin anmah turelkhop ringnoh a anmah turel kthi inkhatveia ringnatu akring amahturel ringso.
Chunna peknata kannih in miita anna injahnoh ung; laikhat avah miita anna Khrista ta injah sunglakho, ipekva mahchunanga amahta injahnoh ung.
Alamchunna tunangkhat in Khrista ah amleva amahvah akthar kutseemsa; amluiva sehsa, anve akthar thlengsa.
Mah naamte i Ringpu tingna, Khrista apaalla ataksoh inimchampei mahche inchamnatu routlohta inimlanpei;
chunna, Ringpu in Khrista ah tukleiramna miita ataksoh inimchampei, anmah anlehta teenpinohsa; mahche inchamnavaa trongraanta amah in inihkuunga inimsilpei.
Churella inihvah Khrista vaa ankutseem same, Ringpu in kannihta kanihuina a amah atrongta kansonchou, Khrista angut a kannih in kannoolchou, Ringpu soh inchamve.
Alamva aleh akromnoh amahta inih ileh rella alehroon amveipei, chunna amahkuunga inih in Ringpu vaa akchimlamseh iveinatu.
Amahsoh tlohkhaljou, che, Ringpu vaa malungsita sulla nanlohnoh natu klukanga kannoolchou.
Alamva amah in ason, “Loulou aja laia keiin minna kirungeih mahche, che chaanring aknia nangta kamjoomche.” Anve, ipektalli inihta inilou inijaanatu pungsa; anve, ipektalli chaanringvaa aknisa.
Kannih in tunangkhat anlamta vatnoh ung, chunna inih in routloh a jakhatkho insoi inlaal iktuuknoh natu,
chuta, Ringpu vaa roijuihkhat veia bilamma kanroua kamidang: doutrangah, insuk inhalah, klah tho ah, ivaat ipa ah, trihkhop thihnaringna jikcha ah,
inikhon laia, simma inisih laia, anhaang laia, klah thlouvah, innoh jaalnoh a idoulaiah, itraamlaiah;
akseeng khiiallah, lousing doutrangah, rilvoltheih ah, Li Akseengah, akchim rilvollah,
akchim trongah, Ringpu atuui ah, kavei kchang akchim lamsehtu kutlai turellah;
injah mingseh ah, injanoh ah, thranoh mingseh ah mahche akthra mingseh ah, kannihta mananga kanichut ung, chuta akchimva,
romnoh ei nanga, chuta thratea anrom, thinanga, chuta anve ringung; tanti phahnanga, chuta kanithatnoh;
rilsok a klah nang, chuta lai amrelva roomthok a; inranriing nanga, chuta khalmoa amdoon; jakhatkho doonnoh nanga, chuta bilamva doonkir.
Korinthia a ameijo, kanril seenga kansonkchou;
kannihta knivatnoh chou, chuta nanroua invatchou,
chuta nanlah nansam in nannihta vat a nanisih. Inlengveia naoei ankuunga kisonnanga nanril maliinve.
Amlotnoh mii eisoh inchunnohve. Alamva akchimlamseh in akchimnohsoh inpaijou tueime? Nohleh akvaar leh anthimchu pul ajame?
Khrista leh Belial in injana jangamme? Nohleh amlot mii leh amlotnoh mii eisoh anpulna thlou jangamme?

Ringpu mathruunna thlaamleh leilisoh injana jangamme? Alamva inihva akring Ringu vaa mathruunna thlaam same; Ringpu in asonnanga, “Keiin ankuunga amtung, che ankaar a sehtung, keiin anmahvaa Ringpu veitung.
Alamchunna anmah ningnata inthruhve, che anmah ningnata inthrekve, Akpu in ason, akseengnoh jakhatkho palnohve, mahchuche keiin nannihta kison uchou,
mahche keiin nannih nanta veitung, mahchuche nannih in kisakupa khatkho kisakumei veiuchou. Akchekrem Akpu in ason.”
Kirilvol eio, trongchet iphah peitaningva akbuur khatkho thranoh linata ikrouva inseengrei. Ringpu ta trih a akseengta mapung maphareio.
Keiin nannihta nanimlaal tangta sonnoh ang, alamva thijou mahche ringjounatu nannihta kanrilla amta matnsah a kasonpeichou.
Keiin nannihta khalmo kamlotna am, keiin nankuunga thoisang, kei kitakva inboh in sipsang. Ilah inangna anaamte ah thloiralla kiroomthoksang.
Chuta amidonkoi anmahta akboh Ringpu in Titas athlenginkho kaniboh ung.
Amah in thlengkhop noh a chuta nankuunga naniboh nanga kannihkho kaniboh ung, marhuuia nanlah nannang, keirella nanril luutkha kanisonpei, chunna keiin ralla kroomthoksang.
Kei trongjihthuun in nanril malah slakho, keiin insiirnoh ang (insiir sanglakho) keiin kiromva trongjihthuun khanna nannihta kakva nanril amlahpei.

Mainanga nannih nanril alahrella kroomthoknoh ang, chuta nanril alah khanna nanrilta nanthlengpei tihrelna kroomthoksang; alamva nanlah i Ringpu turella lahsachou, chunna kannihrel alamveia nanlah nansamkha amaangna amnoh.
Alamva Ringpu tuveia klah knangin inih chaanringting iniseh pinatu ril inithleng che insiirna inimsuuknoh, chuta tukleiramtu veia klah knangin antakta thi amsuuk,

alamva anve, jaknang ngaaklipnoh in Ringpu tu vei klah knang nankuunga amthruhpeime, malunghaangna jikchain, intritna jikchain, madonna jikchain, rilluutna jikchain, tandi jikcha innahme nohle jaknang ngaaklipnoh thlouin nanrouva inseng sachoume! Alamva anaamte rellavah kansoi amnohta namidang.

Nga tloh a keiin nankuunga majih sanglakho, mahkha chimnoh aktloh mii khat relna noh, nohleh chimnoh a alah anangrelna khonoh, chuta kannihturel nanrilluut a nantloh nankhaljahang amsuuknatu Ringpu akuunga nannihta kammuhnachou.
Alamchunna inihkho inibohpei.
Mahche itakrou dil mathlannata ralla Taitas phlaak huui khanna inih in ralla iroomthoksa, alamva nannih nannaam in amah arilta inngai namiphahpei.
Alamva nannih rella keiin kithoinata amahkuunga son sangleva, keita injak kamphahknoh; chuta bilam anaamte nankuunga kansonkha chim, chunna Taitas amaikuunga kanthoinakha chimta kanloh.
Amah in asonta namijuih rella nankuunga sehsa, amah atrongson aktheih nannaamte in roomthok a nanlouloh rella nankuunga aril ralla am.
Keiin kroomthok, alamva nankuunga kamlotnava mapungpha.
alamva trihkhop klah knang chaang an asuuksuunga anmah in thloia anroomthok che anmah in kdongkrella inran seilakho anril liinna amilantheihkha aral.
Alamva amah in ral ralla anmilankha keiin sakhisang, mahche anmah in amidonchunga thloiralla amilan,
akseeng mii turel majoomnatu anmah in inruruh a kninih ung,
mah i kannih in kamidonthlou vanohsa, chuta anmah in matsah a antakta Akpu ninga amilanpei mahche Ringpu in amdon nujuih a kankuung kanipekpei.
Mahchu nujuih a mah thloui Taitas in amthron taningva mah malungsitheih thloui nankaar akho amah in tloh a amchenatu kanson.
Ipek bilamma mah chuvah nannih in malot ah, trongla ah, khiiallah, ril maluut ah mahche nannih in kannihta nanrilvol thlouvah nanral romve mah chuvah malungsitheih thlouvah nannih in nanrilluut aral.
Mah i keiin jathang veia sonnoh ang, chuta nannih rilvoltheih thloui akchim akseeng tihchu aktleitingkho chimta mamuhnatu kison.
Alamva inih Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa malungsi i nanrom, mah chuvah amah in doonslakho nannih turella amah in inran hukveisa, chunna amah anranriing khanna nannih in kdoon nanveinatu.
Mairella keiin kamrelchou: mah chuvah kumkhat amaa a nannih in dia nantlohnatu namithron thloukha ipek machenatu nantloh in nannihtu akthraremtu,
chunna nannih in dia nanchek nanchek nantlohja nujuih a mapung namiphahnatu tlohve.
Alamva nannih in nantlohja hangle amah in adoon nujuih a tlohso, chuta amah in adoonnoh nujuih vanoh a.
Keiin aktlei mii tingva malaia nannihtinga pootrik maronnatu tihnoh ang,

chuta ipek nannih in huuitanga nan amlai anmahting akvaatkha namilantupot, chela anmah in huuitanga an amlaia nannih in nanvaat nanpaakha anmah in nanipektu, chuleva khatleh khat intrimma amkha veisa.
Mah i nga tloh a injih khananga, “Tam amtlon inkho anlei amnoh, che tloom amtlon inkho avaat amnoh.”
Chuta Titas arilla akthra thlou amsuuk Ringpu ta mapaakna veiso.
Alamva kannih in kannool khopta amah in louja tlohnoh a, chuta khalmo aril luut a ataksak in ja a nankuunga sehsa.
Amahsoh inruuia khakla naamte suunga akthratrong akraantinga akmingseh unao khatsoh kamithlahjoupei;
Mah chukhopnoh a mah malungsitheih thlou irella kannihsoh sehjounatu amahta khakla ei in thlou anthunpei. Akpu vaa paarthra turella che inih akthrathlouta mamuhnatu kannih in thloukha kantloh.
Ril liin kutthol malanthloua kantakchunga tukhat inkho maraal kanimthlaknoh natu insuulsung,
alamva Akpu amaikuunga injahnaphu veikhop noh a miimaikuung akho injahnaphu aveinatu kannih in kamisin.

Anmahsoh inruuia inih iuhnaota kamithlahpei, mahmii i thlou jikcha ah minna chaang kan an in aril luut miisa ta kantuukpei, chuta pekva amah in matsah nata ralla aril luut alamva amah in nannihta khalmo nanimlot.
Taitas relnava, amah i keiin kisehpijou kiruul mahche kan uh kannao turelvah anmahva khakla ah akthratrong akraan miisei, Khrista ta paar amthrat miisei.
Chunna nannih rilvoltheih mahche nannih turella kanthoinavah khakla anmaikuunga chimta anmahta madangve.

alamva nannih in namijoomja nanrilta kroom, mah kharella Mesidonia ah am mii nankuunga nannih turel keiin thoi kphah; mah chuvah akseh kumnata mathronna Akhaia kho inchaangsa, che nanrilhang khanna mii aktamkho kamisohpei.
Chuta keiin unao eita kamthlah ei chunna nannih amchouta kanthoinakha sul aveinoh natu, keiin kisonnanga mairelna inchaanga nan amnatu;
chulata Mesidonia na mii stesoh inruuia kithlenglai inchaangnoh a louam choulehva, lam kanrinchoukha jakhatkho veinohsa ta ansonnoh natu che injakna aveinoh natu.

Chunna keiin kamdonva keiin kisehnoh maa a unaoei in nankuunga anlousehnatu sonni darkaarsa, mairelna nannih in trongchet nan amche mah kutthol irella matsah a thlouraang loutlohve, chuta irilla malanjahang kutthol veia malannatu.
Amuveivah maisa: tloompenga akvorh mii in tloompenga aluhtu, mahche klok a akvorh mii in klok a aluhtu.
Mii khatkhat in amlannatu arilla angirhnachaang nujuih a malanso, malandah nanga chunohle malannoh janoh tihnanga malannohso, alamva aril pella roomthok a amlan miita Ringpu in arilvol.
Ringpu in huuitanga doi anaamte nanimlan achek, chunna nannih in lai amrel bilam nankhopnatu mahche akthra thlou naamtea huuitang nancheknatu.
Mah i nga tloh a injih khanangsa, “Amah in apaalla avorhpei, amah in anranriingta amlanpei; amahvaa akchimlamsehvah ache amnoh a am.”
Chi akvorhkuunga chi amlanche nannih turelkho saakphu tol amlannatu khalmo amtamtu, che akchimlamseh ah chi luhna tukho darkaarchu amraltu.
Nannih in ril inrolla namilantheih kharelna bilamma kdoon veiuchou, kannih kanpaalla Ringpu kuunga roomthok malanna asuukna veitu;
alamva amahta rou aktloh akseeng miieiva anmah in anvaatna khopta malannoh chuta Ringpu ah roomthok amlan atakchunga khalmo thloiralna veitu.

Amahta routlohna chaang an inna, Khrista vaa akthratrongta jaa a nannih in atrongson nanjuih mahche anmah turel khatkho aktlei turella ril inrolla namilantheih irella nannih in Ringpu ta paar namithrattu;
alamva nannih nankuunga Ringpu vaa aksoot malungsi kharelna anmah in khalmo nanimdon che anngen.
Isoncheknoh amah akutthol kharelna Ringpu ta mapaakna veiso.
Keiin kisonchou mah chuvah keiin kithleng laia keita tukleiramvaa ahoong amvaata amjuihpeita keichingna mii steta janoh a mamuhnatu kiril kamtrangkha kitlohnohnatu.
Alamva inih in tukleiramma ring melakho inih in tukleiramna ahoong nujuih a raal tlohnohme,
alamva inih in raal itlohna raal kutlaiva tukleiram tanoh chuta raalpal mamaangnatu akseeng ringramtingna atuui am.
Trong inkharh mahche Ringpu khiialta romnoh natu akvaat akthoinaamte inih in immaang, mahche mii in amidon ril naamteta suura Khrista atrong amijuihnatu amahkuunga ithlen.
Nannih in atrongson namijuih i mapung aphalaia, atrongson amjuihnoh mii naamteta tandi malannatu imchaang.
Nannihta mamaangnoh a aseemnatu Akpu in nannih turel aktloh akhal keita kamveirella ste thoi sanglakho, keiin kanjaknatu amnoh.
Kei trongjihthuun khanna nannihta nanimthrit tanoh ang.
Alamva anmah in anson, “Amah trongthuunvah kirik che trang, chuta amah aruungin a amlaiva marnop mahche atrong avaa jangkhat veinoh.”
Oinang miiva bahab tlaeiso mah chuvah iamnohlai inih trongjihthuun in kha asonme, iamlaikho mahkhata itlohning.
Antak anroua inpaakmii eisoh ipai imveinatu nohle malaknatu ichek amnoh. Chuta anroua khatkhat a chaang in olla mahche anmahseengta antak anroua inlaak eivah romnoh ei.
Chuta achaangkhat nata maraldoia kannihva thoinoh tu ung, chuta Ringpu in kanimlanna achaangsoh intrimma thoi uningung nannihkho naniphahnatu.
Alamva kannih in kanroua raldoia sehnoh ung, kannih in nankuunga naniphahnoh sunglakho, Khrista vaa akthra trongsoh inruuia matsah a nankuunga thlengsung.
Aktleimiivaa anthloukhanna kannih in mah achaangnata maralla thoinoh ung; chuta kannih in kamituurva nannih in namilotkha ahanral in nankaar a kanthlou khalmo ahanral,
chunna nanramnata ralla ak am anmahtingkho akthratrong kanraannatu, aktlei ram akho kanraannatu che thlou kantloh relnava kanthoinoh natu.
“Tunangkhat akthloimiiva, Akpu turel thoisoh.”
Alamva atak anroua inpaakmii khanoh chuta Akpu in ampaakmii veia routlohso.
Nannih turel akseeng kallak suuk ang, alamva amsalkuunga akseeng tharei khat nanga nannihta malannatu Khrista ting trong kimchepei.
Chuta keiin kitrihnava murul chorolla Eve ta asimnananga, Khrista kuunga namilan rilseeng khata chimnohtinga naniphurtu.

Alamva kannih in trong kanraan cheta aktlei Jisu ta akraan mii khat thlenglehva, nohleh mii khat tingnata nanphahche inthlin li phah choulehva, nohle mii khat tingnata nanphahcheta inthlin akthratrongta louchoulehva, nannih in thratea oirella inchaanguchou.
Keiin kamdonva akthloi raangroi nata inleouangta madonnoh ang.
Kei kitrong kila ah theinoh singnoh sanglakho, khiialtingva chunangtalva noh ang, bilam naamteva nankuunga kamidangkirpei.
Keiin nannihta rou kitlohnatu rella aktlei khakla ei tingnata nankuunga majoomnatu lou aja kiloh ei.

Keiin nannihsoh kiamjoulai mahche kivaat kipalaia, tukhat tingkho pootrik maphahnoh ang, alamva Mesidonia ah aktlei unaoei in kei darkaar ah kamijoomang. Chunna bilam keiin nannihta pootrik nanimphahnoh ang, nanimphah nohtung.
Khrista vaa akchim in keiningah amtaningva, mah kithoina i Akhaia aveella ahou suuknoh a rimta amnohtung.
Mahchu jarellame? Alamva nannihta keiin kirilvolhnoh relnasame? Ringpu in arom kirilvolchou!
Alamva ohchunang miieiva chimnoh raangroisei, jarelna tihva mainang akchimnoh raangroi miieiva miinamthlou aktlohsei, che antak anroua Khrista vaa raangroi sungta anmeel mathlenga amdangmii khasei.
Salungkhouna amnoh, alamva Seitan atakluung inkho ameel mathleia akvaarvaa ringroi angta thlou atloh.
Chunna amah roijuih ei inkho akchimlamseh ungta anmeel mathlei seilakho saluungkhouna amnoh. Anmahtu achenava anmah anthlou nujuih a veitu.
Veikhatla kisonchou, tukhat inkho keita kmongta kamdonnohve; chuta nannih inkho nga tloh a kamdon chouleva, keikho ste kithoinatu, kmongkhat nanga keilouvesa.
(Keiin kisonnava Akpu in ajata sonnoh ang, chuta kmongkhat veia kithoina khat ah tranga kamlotnata kisonpei;
mii jikcha in tukleiramtu vei pootchei ah anthoirella, keiinkho thoitung.)
Alamva nannihva ksing taningchouva, kmong eita roomthok a nanthochek a!
Alamva nannihta tukhat in naichi nanimvei seilakho, nohleh saakphu nanimvei seilakho, tanchathra nanilou seilakho, nohleh inkaanga nanidom seilakho, nohleh nanmaia nanibeeng seilakho nandou.
Keiin kanjakna veia inih in marnopmal sameta kisonnachou!
Chuta aktleikhat ah tukhat in athoinatinga arilhangle keiin kmongnanga trongsang keikho kthoinatinga trangtung.
Anmahva Hibru eime? Keikho Hibru noh angme. Anmahva Isarel eime? Keikho Israel noh angme. Anmahva Abraham vaa atute eime? Keikho atutenoh angme.
Anmahva Khrista vaa roijuih eime? Keiva innah nanga trongsang–keiin thloiralla kitloh, thloiralla simma kansih ang, amun puhnoh a kanhaiang, che injomma thihna phah a klah knang kphah.
Judi ankut a sungmun soplitu inkhat tla a veirangakhek kamirat ang.
Rui in veithumkhek kamirat ang, lunga veikhat kanden ang. Veithumkhek muli inphuumsam ah jaosang, tuiiboom chung muli asehna maromcheknoh a khulou khat leh suunkhat klah jaosang;

injomma rapkhei kisehna jikchah ah, avaa ah thihnaringna jikchah, inruraan ankut ah thihnaringna jikchah, kei kimiiei tingna thihnaringna jikchah, Jental ei tingna thihnaringna jikchah, khuuboomma thihnaringna jikchah, rapril chaaramma thihnaringna jikchah, tuiiboom chunga thihnaringna jikchah, chimnoh unaoei ankut ah thihnaringna jikchah;
tlohkhalla mahche trihkhopna jikchah, khulouh ain jaal cheknoh a klah knang jikchah, vontraam tuiiraal jikchah, injomma buh an saanoh jikchah, kisik leh nisakaar ah klah knang kaphah jikchah.
Che maichunga aktlei jikchahla khakla naamte turella kiril inchoi in keinammang.
Tukhat in marnopleva keiva marnopnoh angme? Tukhat in klah knanga atlaklaia keiva tlanoh angme?
Keiinta in orh angle, keiin jikchahphah marnop angme tihkha muh a in orhtung.
Ringpu mahche Akpu Jisu vaa Apa, ache amnoh amahminga doiphah veiso, mah chuvah kimchinthi noh ang.
Damaskas ah Kurung Aritas athlanga am rampuui in keisuurnatu Damaskas khuboomta ngaak kemma am,
chuta keita buka khat ah thunna palvaa thongsiinna mathruh a kanthlaak ang, chunna amah akutnata inlitsang.
Mah inna keiin kichuungnatu jakhatkho amnoh slakho, keiva in orhtu tlasang; chuta Akpu vaa ahamuh leh amdangnava keiin kisontu tlasa.
Khrista ah am mii khata kum somlei manli amaa a inthumtihpi ringramma ahankha keiin kirom mah i ruungname chunoh a ruungnoh name keiin romnohsang Ringpu in arom–
Mahche keiin kromva amahta Paradais ah suura ahanpei–mah i ruungname chunoh a ruungna nohme keiin romnohsang, Ringpu in arom–
che mii in son janoh che tong ancheknoh trongta amah in atheihpei.
Mahmii angut a keiin orhtung, chuta kei kitakrou turelvah in orhnohtung, jarelna tihva mah akmuh tupot i keiva marnop ang.
Keiin kin orhja slakho, keiva kmongnohtung, alamva keiin akchimta trongtung. Chuta keiva onnata ingaisang, chunna mii in keiningnata anmuh mahche antheih khannata ralla amidonnoh natu.
Huuitanga madangnatu keiin ralla kin orh noh natu, Seitan trong akraan kulingkha keikuunga kamlanang, ohchunnata inpella ralla kin orh noh natu.
Chunna amah in keita keimahnatu, mairella keiin Akputa veithumkhek kingen;

chuta amah in keita keisonang, “Kei malungsi i nangturelva inkhopnasa, alamva kei tuui in aksoolta mapung amphapei.” Keiin kisoolna ah ralla roomthok a in ortung mah chuvah Khrista atuui in kichunga inngaia am.
Alamva Khrista turel kisoollaia injaknatrong kphahlai, khalmo klah knanglai, kanchutlai mahche trihkhopthlou asuuklai keiin pelsang alamva kisoollaia keiin trangsang.
Akchim raangroi andaang jikchasoh, salungkhouna jikchasoh mahche akchek amneh thlousoh inruuia nankaar a amipaangpei.
Alamva kitakta nankuunga pootrik maron khop noh a khakla aktleitlei tinga nannih in nansolna jangamme? Chimnoh amle kei ipve.

Keiin nankuunga kithlengnatu kanchaangna oisoh veithum tihpisa. Keiin nannihta pootrik namivei nohtung, alamva keiin nanpootta jonnoh ang chuta nannihta kijonchou; alamva asa ei in annu anpa turella malanphunoh, chuta anu apa in ansaturel malanphu.
Nannih nanli turel keiin kiampoot anaam roomthok a kihuuinatu, nannih turel roomthok a kitakho kihuuina umang. Nannih invah steta nanrilvol angme, keiva khalmo kirilvolchou khame?
Mahchu jaslakho kei kitaktal invah nannihta pootrik nanimroon veinoh ang, keita lousingtheih nantih ang, nannih namiraal khanna kisuurpeichou.
Nannih nankuunga kamthlahmii anpaalla keiin nankuungnata kichuungna kphahpeime?

Keiin Taitas ta asehnatu tranga kison, che unaoeisoh inruuia kamthlah. Taitas in nankuungnata achuungna aphahme? Inih in Li khat ah thlou itloh ikhalnohme? Inih in kehkaar khat ah kaarjouva itloh ikhalnohme?
Nanmaikunga kantakta loungaaknatu kantlohta madonna ammang choume? Mah i Ringpu amit anna kannih in Khrista ting trongsung; kirilvol eio, nannihta seem maliinna turelna.

Alamva keiin kintritnava nankuunga kithleng laia keiin kamdonnoh rilla nannihta nanituuk angle, mahche nannih in namidonnoh rilla keita keituuk aja; mah chuvah nar a inkharh inkhirh, khatleh khat kallak, malunghaang, anroutukhop insuul, mii loonna trong, apupu trongtlam, thoiliin mahche alam nainoh.

Keiin veikhatla kithleng laia kei Ringpu in nanmaikunga inruruh kamveitung, che matsah ah anmah akseengnoh, anhoong anchimnoh, anruunga thranoh anhoong nata anril anthlengnoh in keiting sinthruui asuukna veitungta intri hangsang.

Matsah ah aleh aktloh miiei mahche aktlei annaamteta kikchaak ei, che keiin veinih tihpi kiamlaina nanga ipek amnoh sanglakho chaaknatu ksonei, mah chuvah keiin veikhat inlenga thleng angle anmahta kalnoh tungei.
Khrista in kikuunga trongta sakhi nandit. Khrista in marnop veia nankuunga tlohkhalnoh, chuta nannihtinga tuui amtrangna.

Alamva marnop in alamveia amahta thingkharh ah amithlupei, chulata Ringpu vaa tuui in amah in ringsa. Jarelna inih in amahninga marnopme, chulata Ringpu vaa tuuia nannihsoh tlokhaljoua kannih in Ringpu soh ringjou ung.
Nannih in namilot i chetkenga matuh a amchou amnohchou thra minna suive. Nanroua chaang in anve. Jisu Khrista in nankuunga am tih i maromnoh choume? – chunohleva tak a chaang in ankha cheknoh uchou.
Keiin kamdonva inih in cheknoh manehnoh tanohme tih a nantak in nanromtu.
Chuta nannih in chimnoh nantlohnoh natu kannih in Ringpu kuung kangen– inih in chaang anna ah indangnatu relna noh, inih in cheknoh manehnoh melakho, nannih in akchimta nantlohnatu.
Alamva inih in akchimta indah a jakhatkho tlohcheknoh ume, chuta akchimtukhop relnaning.
Alamva kannih in kancheknoh kanpuhnohlai mahche nannih in nantranglai kanroomthok ung. Kannih in kanngenni thra ahanralnatu relna.
Thritnatu relna noh a seemna turella Akpu in keikuunga amlan aktloh akhal thloui kihuuina laia khalmo thranoh kiveinoh natu nannihsoh kiamnoh laia mah ita kimjihhpei.
Achenarem a, unaoeio, ksaampeichou. Nantloh nankhal nanmaa achenatu insuulve, keiin ksonkha nanril maluutve, khatleh khat injave, leh oia ringve, leh oia ril involve, Ringpu in nanimruuitu.
Akseenga inchohsoh inruuia khatleh khat saambaan inpeve.
Akseeng mii naamtein nannihta saambaan nanimlan.
Raangroi Paul in mii tingnata veinoh a miivaa anpaal akho veinoh a Jisu Khrista vaa apaalla che thinata amring amahta Pa Ringpu vaa apaalla —
mahche keisoh inruuijou unao anaam in,
Kalatia ah am khakla ankuunga:
inih Ringpu mahche Pa vaa amdon nujuih a ipek thranoh juk innata inikalnatu inih ileh rella ataktalta amlanpei;
amahkuunga ache amnoh a paarthrachu veiso. Amen.
Keivah salungkhousang mah chuvah Khrista vaa malungsi ah naniong amahta mah a inthliin aktlei akthratrong tingah khalmo intha a nanhei rella–
onna aktlei inthlin akthratrong amnoh, chuta mii ste in nannihta nanimlah a mahche Khrista vaa akthratrongta chimnoh nanimvei aja.
Chuta kannih in nankuunga kanraanche akthra trongnata inthlenga aktlei akthratrong khat kantakluung inkho nohle ringramtingna ringroi inkhat inta raanleva phool tlungtu.
Kannih in matsah a nankuunga kansonche khananga, pekkho veikhatla nankuunga kansonchou, mah chuvah nannih in nanphahche akthratrong khata nankuungah akraan amleva, amah in phool phahso.
Alamva mah i mii kuungnata phahnoh ung, nohle keitingnata kamtheihpot khonohchou, chuta mah i Jisu Khrista in aphoongkhata thleng.
che kei kimiiei ankaara keisoh kintrimpi anmah aktamva Judiei heikoh ah matsah veisung, ipa ipuin annonoa anroutlothlou akhanna khalmo kirilta kailuut.
Chuta keiin kipoknoh maanata keita kamjepeiang, che amahvaa malungsi apaalla keita keiongpei,
amahta Jental ankaara keiin kiraannatu Asa kupata keikuunga aphoongin pelsa, ruung leh thiisoh ring miisoh keiin intelpinoh ang,
kei kimaa a raangroi akvei ankuungakho Jerusalem phah a sehnoh ang, chuta keiin Arab ah seh ang; mahchuche veikhatla Damaskas ah inlengsang.
Chuta Akpu vaa anao Jems noh a aktlei raangroi tukhatkho muhnoh angei.
(Keiin pek nankuunga kimjih irella Ringpu maikuunga keiin kimah in thinoh ang!)
Cheva keiin Siria leh Sisilia aveella sehsang.
Khrista ningah am Judi vaa khakla eiin keita kisak keirom nohsei;
chuta keirella anmah in nga tloh a antheihva, “Laikhat ah inihta mamaangnatu inichut ansuul amah in amlotpeia pekva araanpei.”
Cheva anmah in keirella Ringpu ta paar amithratpei.
Keikuunga keiphoong nujuih a keiin seh ang, keiin Jental ankaara kiraan akthratrongkha amuvei mii kuungah kamromei, chunohleva keiin kitlaanni nohle kitlaankha sul vei aja.
Chuta keisoh inruuijoua Titas luungkho Kriik veislakho amahta avun tannatu jilla matlohnoh ang.
Jisu Khrista kuunga iammi ningtamta chimnoh amlot mii in inruk a jihnatu anthlengrel mah i suuk, mahchuta inihta naichi inimveinatu relna.
Kannih in kakrukho anmah anthlanga amnatu luutnoh ung, chunna akthra trongvaa akchimta nannih turella incheknoh a sihnatu.
Amuvei akchingeile anmahtu jangmekhat inthlin amnoh; Ringpu in keimii miimii manainoh, mahkhananga akchingmii eiin keikuunga jakhatkho anchuungna amnoh.
Inthleng ala, anvun tannoh mii turella akthratrongta keininga amsilpei tih a anmuhpei,
(alamva amah in avun tanna turella noon nathlou aktloh pichaar apaalla amtlohkha kei kipaal akho Jental ankuunga amlan.)

Keikuunga amlan malungsi i keikuunga amlanlai anmah in anromma kukcho veia ming akseh Jems, Keiphas mahche John in keiningah mahche Barnabas inruuipia akchangtongah akut kanimlanung, mahchuvah kannih in Jental mahche avuntan ankuunga sehnatu,
kannih in inranriingta intheih ungi anmah in kaniromung, mahtalta keiinkho kitlohja.
Alamva Jems kuungnata mii arou anthlengnoh maa a Pitar in Jental eisoh ansaak an iinjoupei; chuta anmah in anthleng laia amah in avun aktaneita trihrella akroua insengsa.
Che aktlei Judi arou inkho amahsoh ril seengnoh thlouta antloh, chunna anril seengnoh thlouta antlohkhanna Barnabas luungkho amiruuipei.

Chuta anmah in akthratrongta akchimrella intluunna ansehnoh kimuh in, anmah annaam anmaa a Keiphas ta kisonpei, “Nangin Judi khat niveiche Judi khat nanga ringnoh a Jental ei anhoonga niringche, khatloh a Jental eita Judiei nanga anringnatu niktak eime?”
Inih in ipok lainata Judime aleh am Jental khanohme,

mii khat i trongsuurvaa thlouin machimnoh chuta Jisu Khrista ta malot apaalla inimchimnatu inih inkho Khrista Jisu ta imlot, trongsuurvaa thlou vanoh, alamva trongsuurvaa thlouin tukhatkho machim cheknohtu.
Chuta Khrista in inimchimnatu insuulrei itaktal inkho aleh amsame tih a rommele, chuleva Khrista vah alehta rou aktlohsame? Mahchuvah tiknikho veinohso!
Alamva keiin kikthritche pootta veikhat seemsangle, kitak kanroua akchimta vanna akseh miisang tih a inromsang.
Alamva trongsuur apaalla keiin trongsuur ah thisang, mahchuvah keiin Ringpu kuunga kiringna turelna.

Keiin Khrista soh inthlujousang keiin kiringi keinoh ang, chuta kitaksuunga Khrista in ring; mahche ipek keiin ruunga kiringi keita keirilvol mahche keirella ataktalta amlan Ringpu vaa Asa kupata kamlot apaalla keiin ringang.
Keiin Ringpu vaa malungsita louphennoh ang, alamva trongsuur apaalla machimna suukle, chuleva Khrista in thi i amram amnoh veisa.
Ah, kmong Kalatia miieio, akchimta namilotnoh natu tunang in nannihta nanioi peime?
Oikhopta naniruitang: Nannih in trongsuurvaa athlouta nantloh rella Li ta nanphahme, chunoh a malotsoh inruuia rungaia Li ta nanphahme?
Nannih in maichah phah a kmong mangchoume? Li soh namithron joukha pek nannih in ruungah namiche peime?
Nannih in sulla klah knang nanthopeime? Tak a mahchu sul veisame?
Nannih kuungah Li nanimlan mahche nankaara salungkhouna thlou aktloh nannih in trongsuurta athlou veia nantloh relname chunoh a malotsoh inruuia nanrungeih relname?
Chunna amlot mii anmahta Abraham vaa asasei ta nannih in nanrom.
Jental in Ringpu ta amilot apaalla amchim peita ringjih in leithingah matsah a muh a, matsah a Abraham kuunga akthra trongta raanna ason, “Nang nipaalla jaatboom naamte in doi anphahtu.”
Chunna nga tloh a Ringpu amlot Abraham soh inruuia malot mii naamteta doi amlanei.
Alamvaa trongsuurvaa athlouta aktloh miirel phool athlangah ammei, alamva mah i injihsa, “Trongsuur nirik ah injih ah am naamte majuih a chet a ak amnoh miirel phool phahso.”
Pekva mah i seengsa mah chuvah Ringpu maikuungah trongsuur in tukhatkho machimnoh; alamva “Akchimmii in trongsuur malot apaalla ringtuei.”
Chuta trongsuurta malot tingnanoh, alamva “Mahkhata aktlohmii in mah khanna ringtuei.”
Khrista in inih turella phool phah veia trongsuurna phool khannata inithlokpei–alamva mah i injihsa, “Thingchunga anthoi miirel phool aphahpei.”
Mah chuvah Khrista Jisu apaalla Abraham adoita Jental anchunga thlengnatu, mahche inih in imlot apaalla Li vaa trongchetta iphahnatu relnasa.
Unaoeio, mii in antrongna nanga keiin trongsang: mii khat in madonna angirhnakha tukhat inkho sul maveinoh, nohle mahchu daakkho daaknoh.
Pek Abraham leh amah atute eita trongchet amlan. Miitam rella asonnanga, “Atute ankuunga” tihnoh, chuta inkhatturella sonna, “Nang nitu” mii khat ah atihning, amahchuvah Khrista sa.
Keiin kitihnavah oire: kum reija manlilei sopthum aknua akthleng trongsuur i matsah a Ringpu in amchetche trongsuur khata sul maveinoh.
Alamva inphahtu phuta trongsuur nata veileva, mah i trongchet nata veinoh usa; chuta mah i Ringpu in Abraham kuunga trongchet atloh nujuih a amlanpei.
Pek machamma amtuuk amah i loomkhat innihna macham matuukna thlounoh, chuta Ringpu akrou athlouning.
Chuta Jisu Khrista ta malot apaalla trongcheta amlot mii kuungah malannatu ringjih in anaamteta aleh athlanga asihkirpei.
Pek malotkha athlengnoh maa a, inihta trongsuur athlanga suura inisihpei, malotkhata amdang nohmiil mathupnoh a asih.
Chunna Khrista in athlengnohmiil trongsuu in inihta inisel, mah ita malot apaalla inihta inimchimnatu.
Chuta pekva malotkha athleng inva, inihta inisel athlanga amnohsame;
alamva nannaamte in Jisu Khrista ta namilot apaalla Ringpu asa ei veisachou.
Alamva Khrsista tingah inlup nannihvah khrista ta puunrei silhnaga nansilhpei.
Onna Judi kho, Kriik kho, naichikho, thlaang thlangkho threknoh, kupakho kumeikho threknoh; alamva nannaam Khrista Jisu kuunga inkhat veisachou.
Mahche nannih in Khrista vaa amii veisachoule, nannihvah Abraham vaa atutesachou, che trongchet nujuih a nannihvah lal akchun veisachou.
Pek keiin mah ita kisonchou, lal akchunkhan nao aveilaisootva, taploikuungah ak am anaamte amah in akpu veislakho, amah in naichinata inthliinnoh;
chuta apain nising akaknata aphahnohmiil apain amahta jok a asihna athlanga amah in am.
Mahchunanga inih in nao iveilai tukleiramvaa amuvei livaa naichi veia amme.
Chuta laita aphahkhem invah, kumei in apok, trongsuur athlanga Ringpu in Asa kupata amthlahpei;
mah i trongsuur athlanga am mii eita athloknatu relnasa, nga tloh a inih in injok asa iveinatu relnasa.
Alamva nannihvah asa kupa veisachou, Ringpu in Asa kupa vaa Li ta nanrilsuunga amthlahpei, Li in “Abba! Pa o tih a aong!”
Alamchuna Ringpu apaalla nangvah naichi inlenga veinohsache, chuta asa kupa veisache, che asa kupa taningchevah amah alal akchunkho veisache.
Amaa leithingah nannih in Ringpu nanromnohlai, nannihtu anono louamche amlui hoongah Ringpu noh a naichi ah inkhit a louamchou;

chuta pekva Ringpu nanromnatu nannih in thlengsachou, che Ringpu inkho nanirompei chela khatloh a marnopting mahche thaleina hoong litingah veikhat inlengla mangchoume, naichi nanveiche veikhatla naichi nanveija mangme
Nannih in kini, thla, manjangnuram mahche kumthla eita malot majuih a ngaak a thlengchou!
Keiin nannih turella kitloh kikhal i sul veisamtame intrisang.
Unaoeio, kinoolchou, nannihkho keinanga veive, alamva keikho nannih nanga veisang. Nannih in keiningah chimnoh tlohnohchou;
nannih in nanrom mahkha kei kiruungin marnoprella matsah a nankuunga akthra trongta kiraanpei;
mahche kei kiruungvaa ahoongi nannihtinga chaang anna veislakho, nannih in keita usitnoh mahche keiandah talva nohchou, chuta Ringpu vaa ringroi nanga, Khrista Jisu kuungah keita nanrounoh ang.
Nankuungah nanrilpelkha khaveisame? Alamvah keiin sakhi kimlanchou, mahchuvah vei ajaleva, nanmitta kholla keikuungah namilan utang.
Mahchu nankuunga akchimta kison in nannihta naniandah veisangme?
Anmah in nannih turel khalmo athratnatu antloh, chuta akthravah nohsa, anmah in nangta kankuung nata maje andit, mahchuvah nangin anmah turel khalmo athratna nitlohtu.
Alamva athratna thloutloh turella ril luut i keiin nannihsoh kiamlai khop noh a tlohvah thra.
Keitu andih naoeio, nanrilta Khrista ahoong mathlaak a anseemnoh miilvah keiin nannih turel naopoksam anuin klahnanga keiin klahsang.
Pek keiin nannihsoh amjoua kei kiroolhouta kithlengpeita kimdon; alamvah nannih rella kiril inhalsang.
