Trongsuur athlangah ak amja nannih i keisonve, trongsuuur in asonkha theihnoh choume?
Alamva mah i injihsa mah chuvah Abraham asa kupa innih kaara, khat in naichi kumeivaa asa mahche khatin thlaang thlaang kumeivaa asa.
Chuta naichi kumeivaa asa kupakha ruung nujuih a pok, che thlaang thlaang kumeivaa asa kupain trongchet apaalla pok.
Pek maita malak a asonnasa: mah chuvah amah kumei innih i trongirhna innihta mathieh a asonna ahoong, inkhat in naichi aveinatu asa apokei; amah kumeichuvah Hakar khasa.
Pek Hakar i Arab ah am Sinai Muulsa; amah kumei in pekna Jerusalem tu pandamsa, alamvah amah kumei in asaeisoh naichi veia ammei.
Chuta achungtong am Jerusalem vah thlaang thlaangsa, amah kumei innihvah inih inaamtetu inusei.
Alamva mah i injih a am, “Roomthokro, o asa poknoh, khung kumeio, nipuuknatu ongro, nao akroinoh nango, alamva akmaangming akphah ansa in amisal am ansanata ralla tammei.”
Unaoeio, pek inihvah Aisaak nanga trongchetvaa asasame.
Chuta lai achunna ruung nujuih a pok amah in Li nijuih a pok amahta chut a amnang, pekkho mah i suukmang.
Chuta ringjih in kha asonme? “Naichi kumeileh asa kupata manomve, alamva kumei khavaa asa kupain thlaang thlaang kumeivaa asa kupasoh lalchunjou janohtu.”
Chunna unaoeio, inihvah naichi asanohme chuta thlaang thlaang kumeivaa asasame.
Alamchunna Khrista in inihta thlaang thlaang inimphah peitaningvah, thlaang thlaang khanna chet a ngirve che naichi rukolkhanna veikhat inlenga roonpinohve.
Pek Paul keiin nannihta kisonchou mahchuvah nannih in avuntan chouleva, Khrista vah nannihting akanana amnohsa.
Avuntan akphah miirelta keiin veikhatla sakhi kimlanchou, mahchuvah amah in trongsuur naamteta amjuihnatu amahta akhitpei.
Trongsuur apaalla nantakta machimnatu ansuul nannihvah, Khrista tingnata inpotsachou, nannihvah malungsi nata inriilsachou.
Alamva Li vaa apaalla inih in malot a akchimlamseh matuurta inih in ingaak.
Alamva Khrista Jisu ningah avuntan nohle tannohva akanana amnoh, chuta rilvol apaalla malot a thloutlohkha kanana.
Nannih in thra a tlaanchou; akchim nantlohnatu tunang in nanivatme?
Nanimdoinatu naniong amah kuungnanoh.
Chol steruin alum apumteta ampho.
Keiin Akpu kuungah seenga kanrilta kisih mahchuvah nannih in keitingnata ralla aktlei annoh madonnoh uchou, tutu slakho pichaarkha amah in athotu tlasa.
Chuta unaoeio, pekphah avuntan rella keiin raan anglevah, jarella anmah in keita kanchut angme? Chuleva thingkharh ah akeh masuihnatu atlohpei.
Nannihta nanimchetnoh anmah in antak anroua inchoi seileva mahchu kei kirilpelna veiuta.

Alamva unaoeio, nannihta thlaang thlaang nanveinatu naniongpei; chuta nannih in thlaang thlaangkha ruung turella reipak thratnatu veia rouloulounohve, chuta rilvol apaalla khatleh khat rou intlohjouve.
Alamva trongsuur pumte i trongkhat in amthlungpei “Nangin nanthringpita nitaktal nanga niril mavolro.”
Chuta nannih inta khatleh khat in eia insachoulevah, cheksilve, mahchuvah khat in khatta mamaang maramna tuvah tlohnohve.
Chuta keiin kisonchou, Li vaa apaalla sehve, chuleva nannih nanruung in akditkha mapelnohtu.
Alamva ruung in akditvah ruungta jekna, mahche Li in akditkha ruungta jekna, alamva nannih in nantlohjakhata nantlohnoh natu anmah in khatleh khat in andah ei.
Chuta Li inta nanichingleva, nannihvah trongsuur athlangah amnohsachou.
Pekva ruungvaa athlou eiva seengsa. Mah chuvah: Kumei kupa inlaal, seengnoh, ruungah thranohoong seh,
leili mathruun, leiva tloh, khatleh khat in andah, inna insuul, inarh hang, malung haangtrang, akroutu insuul, khatleh khat injanoh, miichangnai,

kallak hang, tuiibuh inruii, derder tih, che maisoh intrimnaamte keiin nannihta matsah a kison khananga, pekkho nankuunga inrangbeb a kisonchou, mah chuvah oinangthlou aktlohmii in Ringpu vaa kurung huunnakha phahnohtu.
Chuta Li vaa akrahvah rilvol, phlaak huui, leh oi, doutrang, mii rilvoltheih, akthra, malot aja,
ril inneem, anroua inchaakchek, mainangta jeknatu trongsuurva amnoh.
Mahche Jisu Khrsita tu mii akvei in ruungta che ruung in akditleh akthranohta thingkharh ah amthlupipei.
Inih inta Li vaa apaalla ringmele, Li vaa apaal akho sehrei.
Ralla thloiliinmal, khatleh khat malung mahaang che khatleh khat kallak insihnohrei.
Unaoeio, mii khat in chimnoh lamma sehta suurchoule, li ah am nannih in ril innnemsoh inruuia oinang miita veikhat malengve. Nitak luungkho namdoinoh natu cheksilro.
Khatleh khatin nanlah nansamma injoomve, nga tloh a Khrsita vaa trongsuurta mathlungve.
Alamva jakhatnoh luungah mii khat in keiva mii khat veisang ta madonle, amah atak anroua insimnasa.
Chuta miirel in atak anroua chaang in anso, chunohleva amah atak anrouta ralla athoina veitu.
Alamva miirel in atak ataktu potrik aroontu.
Tukhat in trong ita matheih levah amtheihmii khasoh akthra naamte chuum jajouso.
Insimnanohve, Ringpu vah manuih phunoh, alamva mii khat in avorh nujuih a mahkhata inlenga aphahtu.
Tukhat in amah aruungtalta vorhle, aruungin avorhpot akmaang khata aluhtu, chuta tukhat in liting vorhle Li tingna ache amnoh chaankha aluhtu.
Inih in akthra tloh ah kmongnohrei, alamva inih inta iril inlengnoh levah athratna lai athlengin mahkha inluhtu.
Ohchunna inih in tancha iphahlai, mii naamte kuunga che amlot taploikuungah thloia akthra tlohrei.
Mah i ruungah thra a mamuh akdi tukhat in nannihta nanvun tannatu naninamtu. Khrista vaa thingkharh rella anmahsoh anchunnohnatu.
Alamva avun aktan anmahluung inkho trongsuurta majuihnoh ei; chuta nannih nanruungah paarthra phahnatu nannihta nanvunta tan anmah in andit.
Chuta inih Akpu Jisu Khrsita vaa thingkharh khop noh a kei turella paarthratna jakhatkho amnoh, mahchunna keichungah tukleiram i anmah in amithlahpei che keivah tuleiramma amsang.
Alamva avuntan tannoh in jakhatkho akanana amnoh, chuta akthar kutseem khare.
Amahlam ita majuih a akseh mii che Ringpu amii Israel anchungah leh oi khatkho rilvoltheih am veiso.
Peknata tukhat inkho keita kamlahnohchou; alamva Jisu rella kei kiruungchunga daakmun khalmo roonna ammang.
Unaoeio, Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa malungsi in nannih nanlita inruuipiso. Amen.
Pa Ringpu mahche Jisu Khrsista vaa malungsi leh leh oi nankuungah am veiso.
tukleiram aseemnoh maanata inihta amah in inicharpei, alamva inih in amah amaikuungah kseenga che akbuur itak ah amnohnatu.
Jisu Khrista apaalla, matsah a amah in inihta inirilvol, amdon nujuih a,
mii machaaltheih amah in khangvaalla amahvaa paarthra malungsi inimlan rella amahta mapaakrei.
Amah in adoon malungsi nujuih a, amah athii apaalla inithlokpei inih in ichimnohta in ip iphahpei.
Amah malungsi leh alousing huuitanga itakchungah inimlanpei.
Khrista kuungah iamnachaang nujuih a inihkuunga lousing naamte mahche amdon anthup trongta inimrompei.
Laichu atlunglai ringramma mahche thaleiah am bilam naamte amah kuungah khalek veia amchunnatu amchaangpei.
Amah in miita akchaaknatu amdon nujuih a tlohtangta amdonthlou anaamteta mathlung achek.
Khrista tingah matsah matuura inih in amah paarthrata impaaknatu matsah machaanga inicharpei.
Amah kuungah nannih inkho akchimtrong, chaanringvaa akthratrongta nantheih, che amahta namilot, trongchetvaa akseeng Li in nannihta chum naninampei,
Inih in iphahtuphuta inijapei mahchuvah inih in ita veia iphahnohmiil amah paarhtrata mapaakrei.
nannih turella keiin mapaak inngainoh ang, keiin kingenrel nannihta intheih ang,
mahchuvah inih Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa Ringpu, paarthravaa Apa in lousingvaa Li mahche amah khiialta madangnatu nankuunga nanimlan,
nannih naril mitta nanimvaarpei, mahchuvah amah in naniongna matuurchu jangmeta nanromtu, mahche akseeng miiei tingnata amah in aphahtuphu doonkhaalvaa paarthrachu jangme,
che amahta amlot miikuungah am amah atuui i jikcha phah olcheknoh a liinme, mah i amah in akchek amnehvaa thlou nujuih a suuk.
Amah in Khrista ta thinata amringpei che ringramma akchangtonga amboklai thloukha mapung amphapei.
Marvaan pumte chungah akpaal, akchek amneh tuui am mahche akpu akvei anchungakho paal mahche pekna chup ikhopnoh a athlengsam chup akho ming inpe annaamte chungah ralla akliin;
mahche anaamteta akeh majathuia asihpei, mahche khakla turella anaamte chungah akang amveipei;
khakla khavah amah aruung, amahtu aksipkeng khatkho bilam apumtea sip.
nannih in matsah avah mah tukleiramna sehnahoong nujuih a marvaanna kurung atuuita majuih a sehchou, mah aklikhan pek asonta amjuihnoh asa anchungah thloutloh a am.
Anmah ankaara inih inaamtekho matsah avah itak in akdit tloh a ringme, ruung leh iril in akditta tloh a mahche aktlei mii nanga inih in anono a rouam malunghaangei ansa veime.
Chuta Ringpu in mii rilvolthieh adoon khanna amah rilvoltheih akliinthlou khanna inihta inirilvolpei,
inih in chimnoh lamma seh a thia iamlaitalla Khrista soh inruuia inihta inimringjoupei (malungsi in nannihta nanikalpei),
inihta amahsoh inruuia inimringpei, mahche Khrista Jisu kuungah ringram amun jikchah ah inihta amahsoh inimbokjoupei,
mah i Khrista Jisu apaalla inihta inimchaal son icheknohchah amahvaa adoon malungsita akthlengsam kumtingah inihtingah inimmuhnatu relnasa.
Alamva malungsita malot apaalla nannihta nanikalpei; mah i nannih nanrouin nantloh thlounanoh, mah i Ringpu vaa kutthol maivah nannih in nansuulthlou khannanoh
alamva tukhat inkho in orhna veinohso.
Inihvah amahsoh thloutlohjou miisame, alamva Ringpu in matsah a amchaang akthra thlou turella Khrista kuungah amtlohpei mahchu inih in itloh ikhalnata veinoh.

Alamchunna nannih in intheihve mahchuvah amaa leithing lai inkhat avah nannih nanruungah Jental veia amchou, ruungah avuntan mii tih a in ong nanphahkha pekvah avun tannoh mii tih a in ong nanphahpei –
nannih in intheihve mahchuvah mahlai khanvah nannihvah Khrista kuungnata inthreksachou, Israel nata rapkheimii veisachou, nannih in trongchet navaa trongirhna khannata rapkheimii veisachou.
Chuta amaa laikhat ah inlaa a am nannihta pekva Khrista vaa athii khanna Jisu Khrista ningah nanimnaipei.
Alamva mah i inihtu leh–oisa, amah in nannihta khalek nanimveipeia jekna aveina inthrekna bangta akhoihpei.
Amah in Judiei trongthuun, trongsuur che mahsuungah am aniom jikchata ammaangpeia, ataktal in inih ingut a
thingkharh apaalla akthar mii khat veia iniseemma nga tloh aleh oi akseem Ringpu kuungah inihta ruung inkhatveia inimchampei, chunna Akpu soh in andah a ammekha achena avah inchamna athlenpei.
Che amah in thlenga inlaa a rouam nannihtingkho mahche innaia am anmahtingkho leh–oita araanpei;
alamvah amah apaalla inih in Li inkhat athlangah Pa kuungah luut iphahpei.
Chunnavah nannih in veikhat inlenga ram aktlei mii mahche rapkheitla veinohsachou, chuta nannihvah akseeng mii inruuia iramna mii mahche Ringpu vaa ataploikuung veisachou,
nannihva raangroi leh ringraanei innmun tholna achungah inn aktlohsachou, Jisu Khrista ataktal in innkiingtu kukchosa,
amah kuungah inn ahoong apumte khek khekta chaljoua Akpu kuungah akseeng mathruunna thlaamma nannih in liinsachou;
Li vaa apaalla Ringpu in nankuunga amnatu nannihta naniseempei.
Oirella nannih Jental nanngut ah Khrista Jisu trongta raanna turel simma am Paul keiin–
nannih turella keikuungah amlan Ringpu vaa malungsi thlouta marelnatu kikuungah kamsil angkha mairella nannih in tak a nantheihpei,
khatloh a anthup trongta keikuungah madanga kamrom angme tihrella keiin chombeb a kamjihnanga.
Maita nanpaalai keiin Khrista vaa anthup trongta kirom tih a nannih in room nanchektu,
mah anthup trongi aktlei ringnatluun miisa eitingvah roumaromnoh, pekvah Li vaa apaalla amah raangroi ankuungah mahche ringraanei ankuungah amdangpei;
mahchuvah akthratrong apaalla Jental eiin lalchun veijousei, che ruungah inkhat veijousei, mahche Khrista Jisu vaa trongchet khanna intrim akhol veijousei.
Ringpu atuuia thlou tlohnatu keikuungah amlan amah malungsi nujuih a keita amahvaa akthratrong aksil amrel kamvei peiang.
Jon icheknoh Khrista vaa adoon akhaalta Jental ankuungah raannatu, akseeng ankaara keiin khalmo antoolrem vei sanglakho, amah malungsita keikuungah kamlanang,
poot naamte akseem Ringpu kuungah chup chupnata mathup a asih anthuptrong amchaangkhata jangme tihchu mii naamteta mamuhnatu.
Khakla apaalla Ringpu vaa alam tam lousing khata ringram amun jikchah ah tuuileh akchek amnehkuungah pekva amrom usa.
Inihtu Akpu Jisu Khrista kuungah ache amnoh athlouraang aknujuih a,
inih in amahta imlot apaalla iril liin che iril lumma amah kuungah am iphah.
Chunna nannih turella keiin klah knang kiphah in nannih in nanril inlengnoh natu kisonchou, mah i nannih paarthratna.
Mairelna Pa kuungah kikhuk makamma kimthruun,
ringram mahche thaleiah am taploikuung naamte amah ningnata ming intholsei,
mahchuvah amah adoon akhaal paarthra nujuih a asuungtong miivaa Li apaalla akchek amnehsoh inruuia nanimtrangso.
Chunna malot apaalla Khrista in nanrilsuungah amnatu; che nannih in ril involkhanna akjung thlaak mahche chet a nan anmatu.
Jisu Khrista in inihta inirilvolna alaak adung aphei ankaang mahche akthuukta jangmeta romma, akseeng mii annaamtesoh nanromchek natu tuui amve,
mahche khiialnata akral Khrista vaa rilvolta nanromnatu che Ringpu vaa aksip apumtein nannihta nanimsipso.
Pek inih isuunga thlou aktloh tuui in angen alamva inih in imdonchungah khalmo ralla thloutloh chekvah amahkuungna,
khakla ah mahche Khrista Jisu kuungah khatkho ringnatluun naamte ah ache amnoh paarthra amahkuunga am veiso. Amen.
Alamchunna Akpu rella simma am keiin, nannihta naniongna nujuih a naniongna khanna nannih nanchaankha matikcha veia nansehnatu kinoolchou.
Inruruh mahche ril tap apumtesoh, doutrangsoh inruuia khatleh khat ril involla,
leh oi ah inkhit a lia ril inchunna sehnatu tlohve.
Nannihta nanionglai matuur khat ruungkhat mahche Li inkhat am,
Akpu khat, malot khat, inlup khat,
Ringpu khat che anaamtetu Ipa ipukho vei, amahvah anaamte chunga, anaamte tanga anaamte kaara am.
Chuta Khrista vaa kutthol achaang nujuih a inih khat khatting malungsita inimlanpei.
Alamchunna maita asonpei, “Amah in achungah inkaanga akallai, asuur ruuleita chinga asehpipei, mahche miikuungah kutthol amlannei.”
(“Amah in achungah kalsa” mah i arthavah, amah in thaleina tukleiril akho trumtu tih a asonnanohme?
Achungnata aktrum amahvah poot naamteta amsipnatu ringraam apumte achungtingah kalkho amahning)
Che amah akuttholta mii aroutingah raangroi amveinatu, aroutingah ringraan amveinatu, aroutingah akraanseh amveinatu, aroutingah sadamkem amveinatu, mahche aroutingah lulok amveinatu amlanei,
routloh a thlou tlohna turella akseeng mii eita anvaat anpaa ah masipnatu, Khrista aruung seemnatu.
Mah i inih inaamtein malot a mahche Ringpu Asa kupata romma innkha inphahnoh miil, amahta akromma kiminmii veia Khrista vaa aksip mapungpha olna chaang aveinohmiil.
Chunna tuiibuun in khatkho malot rella matheihna thli in raanna phurhtlam khatkho mii masimnatheih, trongtlam mahche amahnoh leemna trongin andihnao nanga veinohve.
Mahchu ngut a akchimta dia trongah, bilammah akang akvei Khrista kuungah inih in liin tupotme.
Amah kuungah ruung apumte khipta injomkir, che inthruikir, amah in amjonnarel injomkir, che amah in thlou amtlohta, thra a atlohlai aruungkha hukliinsa, rilvol apaalla akroua inseemsa.
Mah i pek keiin romma Akpu ningah sakhi kimlanchou, mah chuvah Jental eiin akanana amnoh a amidon rilta antloh ankhalnanga nannih inkho ringnohve;
anmah in anromna rilkha inthimma, anmahvah aktrangril che anmah in anromnoh rella Ringpu in amlan chaan khananga anmah in inhea seh ei.
Anmah in anril amitrangpei, kochanoh che akbuur thloutloh a karaamesi che kochanoh thloukha anroua inpesei.
Nannih invah mainanga Khrista ta romnohsachou!
Nannih inta amahrella oinanga routheih chouleva che Jisu ningah akchim amiita nankuungah nanimtheih eileva,
nannih in matsah nanringna tukleiramtu veimii masimna kiditrang, athlou chimnoh, thranoh nanhoong nanlakha mathlahve,
mahche nannih nanrilna likha matharve,
che akseeng akchimlamseh khatkho akseeng Ringpu tingna ahoongah aseempot akthar miita nannih in silhve.
Namilung inhaang slakho alehva tlohnohve, namilung anhaanglai kini mathlaknohve.
Khousaar kuungah reipakthra malannohve.
Inrumii in veikhat inlenga inrunohso, chuta mahchu ngut a amah akut in thloutloh a, huuinoh khalnoh mii eita amah in malan acheknatu thlou tranga tlohso.
Nannarnata thranoh trong inthruhnohso, chuta arungai mii ankuungah rilvolna aveinatu rilvol nujuih a nantrongna trongkhanna miita seemna veiso.
Ringpu vaa Li Akseengta malahnohve, nanithloksam aknikha phah a nannihta chum naninampei.
Ril inkhahkang, trihkhop a malunghaang, ril inhaang, derderta ong, mii loonna trong inruuia thranoh naammte nankuungnata inthruh veiso.
Khatleh khat ril involve, ril inneem veive, Khrista apaalla Ringpu inkho nannih nanlehta a ip khananga khatleh khat in ipve.
Alamchunna rilvolna naoei nanga Ringpu ahoongta amjuih veive.
Che Khrista in inihta inirilvol peia Ringpu kuungah amah ataktalta amrimtui malanna che inkatpoot veia inih turella atakta amlannanga rilvolkhanna sehve.
Akseeng mii turella matikcha nanveinanga, nannih nankaara changvaangnoh kumei kupain thranoh lamma seh mahche apumtea seengnoh, nohle ralla kidi i nankaar ah akming luungkho sonnohve.
Akmot miihoongah thranoh a trong, nohle asiimsaam trongi trongnohve, mainangei i matik chanoh sengei mahchungut a mapaakna trong veiso.

Mah i nannih in thra romve, kumei kupa ah thranoh akseh mii, nohle akseengnoh mii, nohle ralla kidi (mah chuvah leili amthruun mii), tukhat inkho Khrista mahche Ringpu vaa kurung huunna ah anphahtuphu jakhatkho amnoh.
Tukhat inkho nannihta apupa trongah nanisimna nohso; alamva oirella sonmajuih naoei anchungah Ringpu in trihkhop amlunghaangkha thleng.
Alamchunna anmahsoh inchunohve,
alamva nannihvah amaa laikhat avah anthim veichou, chuta pekvah Akpu kurung ningah akvaar veisachou; akvaarvaa asa ei nanga sehve
(alamva akvaarvaa akrahvah, akchimlamseh mahche akchim ankaara am).
Akpu ta mapelnatu romve.
Inthimma akrah amnoh thlou khanna akhol veinohve. Chuta mahchu ngut a anmah kuungah akvaar madangve.
Alamva anmah in inruk a antlohthlouta antrong inkho injakna veiei;
chuta akvaar ah iphoulaiva bilam naamte muh ichek, alamvah muh ichek naamte akvaarvaa apaalna.
Alamchuna mah i asonpei, “Inthourosa ak in nango, che akthinata inthourosa, che Khrista in nangkuungah akvaar namlantu.”
Nannih in singnoh mii nanga veinohve, chuta aksing mii nanga veive, khatloh a seh ungme tih a cheksilve,
laita thra huuinatheihve, alamva akni i thranoh.
Alamchunna kmong veinohve, chuta Akpu in amdonchu jangme romve,
nannih in tuiibuh inruiinohve, alamva mah khanna thranoh hoinoh asuukna am; chuta Li ah sipve,
nannih in khatleh khat leila, laa, mathruunna laa, litu vei laa naril pumtesoh inruuia rilvolna houa Akpu ting laa tlohve,
bilam turella inih Akpu Jisu Khrista mingah Pa Ringpu kuungah lai amrel mapaakve.
Khrista ta injahsoh inruuia nannih inkhatin khat aliah amve.
Alamva Khrista in khaklatu akang aveinangah amsal in akmeitu akangsa. Che ataktal in inikal Akpu sa.
Khakla in Khrista aliah ringnanga, akmei inkho mahchunanga bilamma anmah amisal li ah ammeiso.
mahchuvah trongsoh inruuia tuiia chamma khatlata akseeng aveinatu amah in amseeng,
mahchuvah khakla ta antriilnamun daak nohle anhuuinanoh nohle oinang jakhatkho jaonoh a, mahchuvah seenga mahche malaalna jakhtakho amnoh a khalmo akthra maveia khakla ta malanna turelna.
Nga tloh a amsallei inkho anmah aruungtak nanga nanmeita rilvolve. Anmah anmeita arilvol mii in amah atakta arilvol.
Alamva tukhat inkho tiknikho amah ataksaak aruungta intirhnoh, chuta Khrista inkho khakla ta ajoknatu, amah inkho aruungta masaak ma iinna ajok.
Alamvah inihvah amah aruungvaa akholsame.
“Oirella kupa in anu apa mathlah a amah akmeisoh inthlop tupotei, che anmah innih in ruung khalek vei tupotei.”
Mah anthup trongi romna ksi, mah i keiin Khrista khatkho khakla rella trongang,
Chulata miirel in ataktal nanga akmeita arilvolso mahche akmei in amsalta injahso.
“Nannu nanpata injahve” (mah i trongchetsoh inruuia matsahrem trongthuunsa),
“mahchuvah nang turella nivaithra mahche thaleichungah soot niringnatu relnasa.”
Apa eio, nansa eita amilung inhaangnatu roknoh eive, chuta anmahta Akpu rella matheih choulaia che akthra lam majuih masehnatu anmahta koolkem eive.
miiril ampelchek anmah nanga miian thratnatu veia routlohchu veinoh a, chuta Khrista vaa roijuih nanga nanril khanna Ringpu in amdonkha tlohve.
Miikuungah noh ah, Akpu kuungah nantloh khananga akthra rilsoh inruuia rou tlohve,
amah in naichi veislakho nohle thlaang thlaang veislakho tukhat in akthra tlohleva, amah in atlohtalta intrimbenga veikhat inlenga Akpu kuungnata aphahtu tih i romve.
Innpu eio, mahkhasoh intrimbenga nannih in naichi ankuungakho tlohve, anmahta matritnoh eive, alamvah nannihtukho mahche anmahtukho Akpu nannih turella ringramma am tih i nannih in nanrom.
Achena veia, Akpu kuungah mahche amah akchek amneh ah nannih in trangve.
Kousaar in thranoh chalaak asilna khanna indenpia ngir nancheknatu Ringpu vaa raal puunrei apumte silhve.

Alamva inih in insuulpi i thii leh ruungta indenpinohme, chuta inih in insuulpi i akchek amneh anchungah tuui anchungah, anthim tukleiram akpuei anchungah che ringram amun jikchah ah am thranoh li eita inih in indenpi.
Alamchunna thranohni athlenglai thratea ngir nancheknatu mahche anaamte tlohkira loungiir nancheknatu nannih in Ringpu vaa raal puunrei apumte silhve.
Alamchunna nantak nannaam akchimma inraak chloulaia, mahche akchimlamseh in lukhepho thunna ngirve,
leh oi vaa akthratrongi thlouraang tloh a kehkhrang nanga chuungve,
anaamte ichunga, malotna pho choive, ohchunna thranoh antruung meibomta that nancheknatu.
Chanringvaa thir lukhum mahche Li vaa chemseita choive mahchu Ringpu atrongsa.
Nanngen nannih naamte inruruh a lai amrel Li ah ngenve. Che oinang aktrang rilsoh inruuia jihtranga doutrang apumtesoh akseeng mii naamte turella ngenve,
che kei turelkho, anthupvaa akthratrongta intrinoh a raanni keikuungah keipeknatu keingenpive,
mairella keivah thirhanga inkhit akthratrong akphurh miisang; chunna keiin kitrongtuphuta intrinoh kitrongnatu keingenpive.
Oirella amahta keiin nankuungah kamthlahnavah, kannih in khatloh a ammungme tihrella nanromnatu che nannih nanrilta amah in nanimsohnatu.
Unaoeio, nankuungah Pa Ringpu tingna mahche Akpu Jisu Khrista tinga leh oi khatkho malotsoh inruuia rilvol am veiso.
Inih Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa inpot amnoh rilvol malungsi in nannihta nanimruui veiso. Amen.
Keiin nannihta kantheih kantheihlai Ringpu ta kimpaak,
keiin nannih turella kingenrel kiroomthoksoh inruuia kingen,
matsahni nata pekphah nannih in akthratrongta chuum nanjajoumang.
Nannih nankuungah akthra thlou amthron amah khanna Jisu Khrista aknikha aphahnohmiil nannihta nanimchetpitu tih a kimlot.
Nannih nannaamte turella keiin kimdonni chim, keivah akthratrong turella simma amma akthratrongta ngaaknatu che mahchuta kamchetnatu nannaamsoh malungsi ah chuum iphahjou.
Alamvah Jisu Khrista kuungah am rilvol kharella nannaamteta khalmo kimuhjachou i Ringpu in keitu sakhisa.
Lousing mahche akthra thranoh naamte nannih rilvolkha dir dirta ahanralnatu keiin kingen,
chunna nannih in jaknangta akthloiremme tih a nanromchek natu mahche Khrista vaa akni athlengnohmiil kseenga mahche nanlaal amnohnatu.
Jisu Khrista apaalla akchimlamsehna akrah ah sip a Ringpu ta paar mathratnatu che mapaaknatu.
Chunna pretoria (rampuui amna kool) akngaak naamtein mahche aktlei annaam in Khrista kuungah keiin simma kiami anrompei;
keiin simma kiamrella Akpu kuungah am unao aktam in intri amnoh a che anthouna mathrat a Ringpu trongta antrongnatu ralla anril amiluutpei.
Mii arou invah tak a kallak mahche annakja hangrella Khrista ta anraan; chuta aktlei invah akthra rilsoh anraan.
Keiin simma kiamkhanna ralla lahna daaknatu matsahna eiin ril seengnoh a Khrista ta anraan;
chuta keiin akthratrong rella ngirhnatu keicharpei tih i romma juktoolna mii in anrilvol rella anraan.
Mahchu jangta atlohname? Tlohsin in slakho akchim in slakho bilam Khrista ta inraan, mah churella keiin kiroomthok ang.
bilam thloua keiin injak phahnoh tungta tranga kimdon che kimtuur, chuta pek lai amrella kithouna in kirilla sip a, akthi in slakho nohle akringin slakho kiruungin Khrista ta injahtung.
Alamva kei turelvah kiringi Khrista turelna che kithih in thloia kichuungna.
Chuta keiinta ruungah ringa amangle, mah i kei turelvah akrah amnathlou, chulata keiin jaknangta kicharume keiin son cheknoh ang.
Keiin innih kaara kantlohna satnohmang. Khrista soh inruuia amjounatu mah a seh kikdit.
Chuta nannih turelva ruungah nga ammi darkaar.
Mah i romma malot a, nannih nanmaa sehnatu che malot phlaak huuinatu nannihsoh amjoutung chekho amkho amtungta kirom.
Mah i keiin nankuungah veikhat kithlenglai keirella nannih in Khrista Jisu ah paar namithratnatu relna.

Nannih nanhoongkha Khrista vaa akthratrong turella matikcha maveive, chunna keiin thlenga nannihta inmuhpinatu veislakho, chunoh thlengnoh inmuhnoh melakho, nannih in li khat ah chet a ngirchouta kitheihtu, akthratrongta namilot rella inchunna tlohkhaljou rilkhat veime.
Nannihta naniandah eiin nanimthritlaia intri tlohnohve. Mah i anmahta mamaangnatu matsah a akseeng akchim daangsa, chuta nannihtu chaanringsa, che mahchu Ringpu tingna.
Alamva amahta malot khop noh a Khrista turella klah knang phahnatu nannihta nanimlanpei.
Nannih in nanmuhche intrimbeng klah knang khananga mahchu pekva kei klah knangkho nantheih usa.
ril inmtrimma, rilvolla intrimma khalek veia, ril inchunna mahche ril inkhatveia keiin kiroomthokna ah mapung maphave.
Amah akroutukhop che thoiliin madonna jakhatkho tlohnohve. Chuta inruruh a nangchungah aktheih in thloita thra tih a madonnohve.
Mii in akroutukhop madonna kidi tlohnohso, chuta aktlei in andit khakho anso.
Jisu Khrista kuungah am rilkha nankuung akho amso,
amah in Ringpu hoongah rouam slakho Ringpu soh intrimma chet a amnatu madonnoh,
chuta atakta masanga roijuih khatvah ahoongta loua mii nanga poksa.
Mahche amah ahoongah mii nangjimma amah in kithih phah a atak in inruruh a che sonmajuih veia thingkharh ah thi aphahpei.
Alamchunna Ringpu in amahta thloi inkaanga adompei che aktleiming naamte chungah ankaang mingta amlan,
amahvah ringrammah, thaleiah mahche thaleithuui ah am annaamtein Jisu akmingah khuk makamma amithruunnatu relnasa,
che Pa Ringpu ta paar mathratnatu, Jisu Khrista vah Akpu sa tih a maleirel in anphoongnatu.

Alamchunna kirilvol eio, nannih in lai amrel son majuihnanga pekvah keiin nannihsoh kiamlai khop noh a pek keiin nannihsoh amnoh sanglakho trih a mahche inchuunsoh inruuia nannih chaanringta rou tlohve.
Alamvah amahta aril mapelnatu tloh a thlou nantlohnatu Ringpu in nankuungah thlou nanitloh a am.
Thlou anaamte insonoh a nohle inruii inri amnoh a tloh khalve,
mahchuvah nannih in amraal am chunohle jakhatkho romnoh, thranoh leh chimnoh ringnatluun akaara amraal amnoh Ringpu vaa asanang veive, anmah ankaara nannih in akvaar nanga tuklei ramchungah vaarve.
Chaan trongi chet a matuhve. Chunna Khrista vaa aknia keiin orhtung mahchuvah keiin sulla tlaannoh ang nohle sulla insuulnoh ang.
Kei kithiita nannih in poot nankatna ah poih a keita kamlan sachloulakho, keiin nannih nannaamtesoh inruuia tlansang mahche roomthoksang.
Oinanga nannih inkho keisoh tlan mahche roomthok jouve.
Timothi ta nankuungah inthabeb a kimthlahnatu Akpu Jisu ningah kimtuur, chunna nanpaota theih a keikho roomthok kiphahnatu.
Nannih turella athratnatu chimma aktlohja amahnangmii khatkho doonohsang.
Jisu Khrista turelnavah annoh eichuta anmah antak turellakhop amidonning.
Chuta Timothi akul amaal nanrom, asa kupain apasoh thlou atlohnanga akthratrong turella amah in keisoh rou atlohjou.
Alamchunna keita khakha intlohmeta keiroomso amahta nankuungah kimthlanatu kimtuurpei;
Akpu ta kimlot kitakkho sootnohveia nankuungah thlengtung.
Keiin kimdonvah kei kinao che keisoh tlohkhaljou mahche keisoh raalmii veijou, nannihting akthratrong akraan khatkho darkaar amma keita kamjoom Epaphroditas ta nankuungah mathlah darkaarsa,
alamva amah in nannaamteta khalmo nanmuhpija hanga, alamva amahvah khalmo kanana vei tih nanatheihrel aril inlangtlamsa.
Tak a amah in keiva kana angta asonnatu akirta vaatning, chuta Ringpu in amahta khalmoa amchaalpei; amahta amchaalkhop noh a keiin klahchungah klah kiphahnoh natu keikho kamchaalang.
Keiin ralla madonna amahta nankuungah kimthlahlai, amahta veikhat inlenga nanmuhsoh nanroomthok natu, mahche kiril inlaangkha anlengnatu.
Chunna roomthoksoh inruuia Akpu tinga amahta rousoongve; che oinang mii eita injahve,
alamva amah in Khrista thlou rella athihnatu akirta vaatning, keita nannih in namijoom tuphutang amah in thlou amchenatu klah knang aphahpei.
Achena a, kiuh knaoeio, Akpu ting roomthokve, inlengala maisoh intrimbenga majih i keitingvah lahnanoh, nannih turel nankana.
Uii eita cheksilve, thranoh aktloh eita cheksilve,
Alamvah akchim avuntankha inihsame. Ringpu ta Li ah amthruun, Khrista Jisu tingah paar amthrat mahche ruungah amlotnohkha inihsame.
Kei kiruungta kimlotnatu alam amkho aja, aktlei tukhat in aruungta amlotnatu alam am tih a madoneile, keiin ralla kimdon.
Nirit tihpia avuntan Israel mii, Benjamin jatih, Hibru veia pok Hibru, trongsuurting Pharisi khat veia,
amraal amnoh khakla ta akchutjami, trongsuur athlangah akchimlamseh.
Chuta jangmekhat keiin kichuungnatu amslakho, Khrista turellavah keiin maangnanga inteensang.

Tak a keiin bilamta amangna tih a kiteen, alamvah keitu Akpu Khrista Jisu ta rommi akthloiremsa. Alamva mah kharella poot anaamte maangsa, che mah makheichu keiin lou indah angta kimdon, keiin Khrista turella kichuungna vei tih a kimdon.
Che Khrista kuungah am iphahtupot trongsuur aknujuih a kikroua akchimlamseh veinoh ang, chuta mahchu Jisu Khrista ta malot apaalla Ringpu kuungah akchimlamseh i malotvah apaalnaning.
Chunna amah in thinata aringna tuuileh amahta kiromnatu, che amah in alah anangna chuumta kijanatu, amah athihnanga kithihnatu kitak in kijakhata kiromantu,
mahchuvah vei ajaleva thinata veikhat ring kiphahnatu relnasa.
Keivah mah i kiphahchepei nohle keivah maphung phasang tihtanoh ang; chuta keiin kiveinatu insuulang, alamvah Khrista Jisu in keita amah ata kamvei peiang.
Unaoeio, amahta kei kita kamveipei tih a madonnoh ang, chuta keiin kitlohkhatvah ammang, kei kiknua ak amta mapolh a kimaa a amta kiphahnatu kithrulh,
Khrista Jisu apaalla achungtongna khaan khata kiphahnatu kithrulh.
Inih in mainangting irilta sihrei; nannih inta aktleiril am choulevah, Ringpu in amdangkha nankuung akho amdangtu.
Inih in iphahkhata chimma matuh paningrei.
Alamvah anmah relna injomma nankuungah kisonpeichou mahche ipekkho ruithli suuk a nannihta kisonchou i aktleivah Khrista vaa thingkharhta jeknananga ringmangei.
Anmahtu achenavah kmaang krel, anmah rappuvah avonsei, che anmahtu paarthravah injakphah khasa, anmahvah tukleiramna khop turel amidonning,
Chuta inih in iamnatu ramvah ringramnasa, che mahkhata inih in ingaak.
Inih in marnop iruungta amah paarthratingah ruungnanga thlengtu, amah atuui apaalla poot naamte amah athlangah asihchek.
Alamchunna keiin kirilvol mahche khalmo klukanga kimdon unaoeio, keiin phlaak kihuuina mahche keitu boorpii akveieio, nga tloh a Akpu kuungah chet a ngirve.
Eudia mahche Suntikhi in Akpu ting nan amnatu klukanga kisonchou.

Tak a rukol roonjou inlukjou nanga kinoolchou, anmah kumei eita majoom eive, alamvah akthratrong rella keisoh inruuia Klemen khatkho thlou kitloh kikhalpijou aktlei eikho, anmah anming akring nirik ah injih a am kumei eikho.
Lai amrel Akpu ting roomthokve, veikhatla kisonchou, roomthokve.
Akdouchek nanrilkha miinaam in naniromeiso. Akpu athlengnatu innaisa.
Aktleitlei rella nanril inhalhil tlohnohve, chuta bilam naamte ngenna che inruruh a chunohle mapaaksoh inruuia nannih in nanngenkha Ringpu ting maromve.
Che nannih in anaamte roomma bahabtlatingah nanralnatu Ringpu ningnata akthleng leh oi khanna nannih namilung khatkho nanrilkha Jisu Khrista in kemma nanisihtu.
Achena ah, unaoeio, akchim naamte, injah aja naamte, akchimlamseh naamte, akseeng naamte, rilvol naamte akthra kulta amle, matikcha mapaaknatuphu amle, mairella madonve.
Nannih in keikuungnata nanrom, nanpaa, nantheih mahche nanmuh eikhata tlohve; che leh oi vaa Ringpu in nannihta nanimruui veiso.
Keiin kivaat kisam rella tihnoh ang, alamvah keiin bilamma amah kuungah pelli kitampei.

Khatloh a kiril in intoolla amtungme mahche khatloh a huuitanga amtungme kirom; bilamma mahche iamnahoong naamte inkhop inleiakho, vontraam akho, huuitang akho ikdik akho, anruk anrik naamte i kiloungaak natu kirom.
Keita kamtrang amah apaalla thlou naamte kitlohtu.
Chulata keiin klah knang kiphahlaia chuum nanjajou i miita rilvoltheih akthra thlouta nantlohpei.
alamvah Thessalonika tingkho imjoomnatu thlou veikhat khop noh a inleng inlenga keita namithlah ang.
Keiin kuttholta jonnoh ang; chuta nannih turella akrah inrah ahanral khata kijon.
Keiin kiphahtuphu anamte kiphahpei, ralla amsa; nannih in keikuungah namithlah kutthol, Ringpu mapelnatu inkattuphu Epaphroditas nata kiphahpeia sip a amsang.
Kei Ringpu in nannihtu darkaar anaam Khrista Jisu apaalla amah paarthra adoon akhaal nujuih a nanimlantu.
Inih Ringpu mahche inih Pa tingah ache amnoh a paarhtrakha am veiso. Amen.
Khrista Jisu ting am akseeng miinaamta saambaan kimlanchou, keisoh amjou unaoei inkho nannihta saambaan nanimlan.
Akseeng mii annaamte in nannihta saambaan nanimlan, thloia Keisaar ataploikuung in nannihta saambaan nanimlan.
Ringpu in amdon nujuih a Khrista Jisu vaa raangroi Paul mahche iuhnao Timothi,
alamva nannih in Khrista Jisu ta namilot mahche akseeng mii naamteta nanrilvolkha kantheihpei,
alamva nannih turel ringrammah asih matuur kharelna. Oirella akthratrong akchimkha matsah a nantheihpei.
Mah chuvah nankuungah thlengsa, mah i tak a tukleiram apumtea akrah inrah che moong nanga nannih in Ringpu vaa malungsi akchimta kantheih chuche mi innata nankaar akho am veisa,
mah i nanringvol roijuih Epaphras aningnata nanrompei. Amahvah inih ingut a Khrista ting malot aja rou aktloh miisa.
Li ah nannih in nanringvolkha kannih tingkho namirompei.
akthra turella akrah inrah a che Ringpu khiial tingna hanralla porh mahche amahta khalmo mapella Akpu vaa matikcha chaanna nansehnatu.
Alamva amah paarhtra che achek amneh nujuih a tuui anaamtesoh nannihta nanimtrang veiso, alamva mah i nannih in nandoutrang natu mahche roomthok a nanthotrang natu,
akvaar khanna akseeng mii inkho chuum aphahnatu inihta inija inih Pa ta mapaakrei.
Anthim in ichungah paalla am khannata amah in inikalche amah arilvol Asa kupa vaa kurung huunna tingah inihta inimlanpei,
che inih ilehta amahningah in ip iphah a amah kuungah inthlokho iphahpei.

alamva amahvah ringramma khatkho thaleia ak am aseem naamte suunga muh ichek khatkho muh icheknoh anaamte, phompii, nohle akthloi veia akpaalei, nohle aklok veia akpaalei, nohle akchek amneh ei slakho anaamte amah apaalla che amah turella aseemkirpei.
Bilam naamte amaa a amahvah rouamsa, che anaamte amah kuungah amkirei
Amahva ruungtu tihvah khaklatu akangsa, chunna bilam naamte ankaara amah in matsahrem veisa.
Alamva Ringpu vaa ahoongta amahningah sip a ammi Ringpu in apelna,
che amah in thingkharh apaalla leh oi inimphah peia thalei nohle ringramma am mii naamte amah apaalla inimcham peia inimtuuktu.
Mahche nannihvah, amaa laikhat ah thranohthlou jikcha tloh a rapkheimii mahche irilla amahta andah mii veichoukha,
pekva nannihta amah amaikuungah seenga imraal amnohluunga nanimlannatu atak aruungin athih apaalla machamma Ringpu soh inimtuukpei,

nannih inta malot khanna inngainoh a inchek amnoh a che chetkenga amchouleva, nantheihche ringram athlanga, aseempot anaamteting araanche akthratrongin amtuurna khanna nannih inta aktleiting inlenno choulevah mah i vei aja mah churella keiin routloh mii hukveisang.
Pek keiin nannih turella klah knang jikcha kiphahrella kiroomthok ang, che khakla akvei Khrista vaa aruung turella klah knang akvaatta keiin kimchepei,
Ringpu trong anaamteta nankuungah maromnatu nannih turella keikuungah amlan akseengthlou nujuih a keiin rou aktloh hukveisang,
chup jikchanata khatkho ringnatluun jikchanata mathup a asih trongta pekvah amah akseeng mii ankuungah amdangpei.
Ringpu in achar Jental ankaara anthuptrong amlan paarhtra i jikchah phah a doonkhaal angmeta amromja, mahchuvah paarhtravah matuurna nankaara am Khrista khasa.
Lousing naamte in mii naamteta chaak a che matheih a iraan, mah i Khrista ningah mii naamteta mapungpha a imlannatu relna.
Alamva oirella tranga inchek ang, che kei kichungah amah in tranga kamsoh nujuih aril luut a kitloh kikhal.
Alamva nannih turella, Laodisia ah am mahche kei kimeel akmuhnoh miiei turella keiin khalmo tranga insuullangta kamromjachou,
mahchuvah rilvol in khalek veia mahchunna anrilta masohna turelna, tak a seenga romna akdoonta, Ringpu vaa anthup lousing mahchu Khrista ta nantak a amnatu,
amah kuungah lousing khatkho thiehsingna lal apumte inthup a am.
Tukhat inkho nannihta nanileemna trongah nanisimna nohtu ta mah i kisonchou.
Alamva kei kiruungin nankaara injaonoh sanglakho, kikli invah nannihsoh inruuia am, nannih in achaang naia nantloh nankhal mahche Khrista ta chet a namilot kimuh in kiroomthok ang.
Alamchunna nannih in Akpu Khrista Jisu ta nanlouloh nanga, amahningah ringve,
amahningah akjung moonga, seemkho hanseemve, mahche malottingah inthrungve, porhve, nannihta nanimtheih khananga amahta mapaaktingah huuitangve.
Khrista in amdonnoh mii khanna anono a atlohthlou a che thuuk a madonmii in che jakhatnoh a miita leemna trongin nannihta mamaang aja, romve.
Alamva Khrista Ringpu vaa Akseenghoong pumte ruung veia am,
che miichungah akpaal khatkho akchek amnehvaa aklok chaan aksipkuungah thlengve.
Kut ah avun tannoh a amah kuungah avun intansachou, aruung atakta loonna Khrista vaa avuntan akhanna nannikho intansachou;
inlup a amahsoh inphuumjou sachou, che thinata amring amahta Ringpu athloua namilot apaalla nannihkho amahsoh inruuia thinata ringjou sachou.
Nannih nanleh ah mahche nanruung in avun intannoh a nanthihlai Khrista soh inruuia nannihta nanimringpei, inihvaa ileh naamtekho a ippei,
inihta jekna kut ah injih aiilta ammutpei, che thingkharh ah thirkit hemma inthoi apaalla ajea inisihpei.
Tukleiram akpuui ei che tuui ak ammei ankutnata Amah in asutpeiei che miinaam maikuungah anmah in raal chekta ammuh ei.
Mah ivah akthlengsam aniimning. Chuta amuvei pooteiva Khrista ata.
Tukhat inkho nantloh khaanta atak inruruh rella mahche ringroita amthruun rella puhnoh cheta naksonnoh eiso. Amah ahamuh ah, jakhatnoh rella arila thoiliinsa.
Che oinang akangveita chet a matuhnoh, akloknata ruung pumte, aruh, aril, atakchi naamte inkeih intuukkira, Ringpu in marolla liin.
“Matuhkho matuhnohve, matemkho matemnohve, palkho palnohve.”
Mah naamte ihuuina malamma maangtu seengning, mah i mii in amdon mahche malot rella nanimtheih nata namijuih nohme?
Mainang thloui tak a malottangta mathruunna lamma akseh, antak anrouta malah mahche ruungta malahna hoong slakho ruung in akditta vat a jakhatkho akana amnoh.
Chunna nannih in Khrista soh ringjou taningchouvah, achungtongah am poot eita jonve, mahkhan Khrista in Ringpu akchangtongah inbok a am.
Achungtongah am poot khanna nanril sihve, thaleichungah ak am poot eikhanna nanril sihnohve.
Alamva nannih in thisachou, che nannih nanchaan Ringpu kuungah Khrista soh inthup a amjou.
Inih ichaan akvei Khrista ta amdanglai nannihkho amahsoh inruuia paarhtra ah nanimdangtu.
Alamchunna thaleitu vei nantak ah amkha thatve: Changvaangnoh kupa kumei ah thranoh hoonga seh, akbuur, thranoh lamtinga arilhang, thranoh di, mahche kallak mainangei ivah leili amthruun miisei.
Mainang mii anchungah Ringpu amlunghaangna thleng.
Mainang li ah nanringlai sootvah oinang thloua seh a thranoh nantloh.
Chuta pekva anaamte i mathlahvesa, mah chuvah inraatkanga ksao, malung haangtrang, mii andah, mii loonna trong, mahche thranoh trong trongnohve.
Nannih in khatleh khat insimnanohve, alamva nannih in amlui hoongah nan amkha kanmahpei ta romve.
Akpu kutseem ah khiiallah akthar nanimvei peitaningvah akthar hoongta nannih in silhve.
Manna Kriik khatkho Judi, avuntan khatkho tannoh, barbarina
tunangkhat in tunangkhat chungah atlannoh amle, khatleh khat doujouve, khatleh khat in ipjouve; Akpu in nannihta nani ip nanga nannih khatleh khat in ipve.
Anaamte chungah rilvol in silhve, mah inna bilam anaamte mapung ampha a khalek veia akhit.
Che Khrista vaa leh oi in nanrilsuungah paal veiso, tak a nannihta aruungkhat veinatu naniongpei. Mahche mapaakkho mapaakve.
Khrista trongta nantaksuunga huuitanga am veiso, lousing naamte in inkhat in khatta matheih khatkho inchaak a, lailaa, mapaaklaa, mahche Li tu vei laasoh nanrilsuungah Ringpu ta mapaak a laa tlohve.
Mahche nannih in jangmekhat trongta nohle tlokhal choulakho, bilam naamte Akpu Jisu mingah tlohve, amah apaalla Pa Ringpu ta mapaakve.
Amsal eio, nanmeita rilvolve, mahche ankuungah thranoh tlohnohve.
Naoeio, bilam nannu nanpa in ansonta majuihve, alamva mah in Akpu ta ampel.
Apa eio, nansa eita anril mahaangnoh eive, chunohleva anril inlengtuei.
Naichi eio, bilam thaleiah am nannih akpu in ansonta majuih eive, miita mapel anmah nanga miian thratnatu routloh veinoh a khakla ah Ringpu trih a tloh khalve.
Nannih in miita routloh veinoh a, Akpu ta rou nantlohnanga nantloh nankhal naamte nanril maluut a tlohve.
Phahphu khaankha Akpu tingnata kanphahtu tih a romma, nannih in Akpu Khrista ta rou nantloh.
Alamva chimnoh a aktloh mii in amah in atlohthlou chimnoh khata inlenga amphahtu, che keimii miimii sihnohtu.
Khrista vaa anthup trongta kansonnatu akthratrong rella Ringpu in innkhaar kanimhoongnatu kannih turelkho kaningenpive, churella keiin simma amsang,
keiin kitrongtuphu veia mahchuta seenga kitrongnatu keingenpive.
Nannih nantrong nanlata malungsia machih nanga matuive. Chunna nannih in mairella khatloh nanimsang ume nanromchek natu.
Mairella nankuunga amahta kamthlahpei, chunna nannih in kannih rella nanromnatu mahche nannih nanrilta nanimsohnatu,
amah leh nankaara malot aja che rilvolna unao Onesimus soh inruuia kamthlahpei. Onna aksuuk naamte anmah in nankuungah ansontu.
mahche Jisu tih a an ong Justus inkho nannihta saambaan nanimlan. Avuntan ankaara Ringpu kurung huunna turel keisoh tlohkhaljouvah anmahningei, anmah in keita kanboh ang.

Nannih nankaara Jisu Khrista vaa roijuih Epaphras in saambaan nanimlan, nannih in mapungpha a nanngirhnatu che Ringpu vaa amdon naamte mapung maphanatu amah in lai amrella ril luut a nannih turel angen.
Alamva amah in nannih turel Laodisia mahche Hirapolis ah am mii turel tranga thlou atloh tih a keiin sakhi kimlan.
Rilvolna maipa Luke mahche Demas in saambaan nanimlan.
Laodisia ah am unao ankuungah nanphah in anboom khakla ta saambaan kamlanei.
Mah trongjihthuun i nankaara nanphahche, Laodisia ah am khakla akho mapaave, mahche Laodisia tingna trongjihthuun kha nannih inkho paave.
Arkhippas akuungakho sonve, “Nangin Akpu nata niphah routlohkha namthlungnatu roomro.”
Malungsi mahche leh oi nantak ah am veiso.
Inih Ringpu mahche Pa amaikuungah namilotthlou khatkho rilvolna thlou mahche inih Akpu Jisu Khrista ah am matuurkhan nanchetnatu intheih ung.
Alamva Ringpu in arilvol unaoeio, amah in nannihta nanicharpei ta inih in irom;

alamva kannihvaa akthra trongi nankuungah trong khop veia thlengnoh, chuta nankuungah tuuia, Akseeng Li ah mahche chet a malotsoh inruuia thlengsa. Nannih turel kannihvah jaknangmii veisungme ta nankaara mamuhna tuta nanrom.
Che nannih in Akpu vaa mahche kannih kanhoongta amjuih veisachou, alamva Li Akseeng nanithun peia roomthoksoh inruuia klah knang jikcha kaara trongkhata nanroulohpei,
chunna nannih in Mesidonia khatkho Akhaia ah am amlot mii naamte nanhoongta nanitamna veiso.
Alamva Mesidonia mahche Akhaia khop ah Akpu trongkha intheihnoh, chuta nannih in Ringpu namilotkha amun naamtea intheksa, chunna inih in aktlei isonnatu amnohsa.
Alamva antaksaak in nannih rella antongvah khatloh a nankaara kannihta nanison ungme, che nannih in akring mahche akchim Ringpu ta routlohnatu leili mathruunnata khatloh a Ringpu ting inheichoume,
thinata kiring mahche akthlengsam malunghaang nata inikal Jisu Ringpu vaa Asa kupa ringramnata iloungaaknatu.
Alamva unaoeio, nannihta nanian thlengungkha apupunoh tih a nantak in nanrom,
chuta Philippi ah kannihta klah knang khatkho injahna hoongah thranoh kanitlohkha nannih in nanrom, kannihta kaniandah anmaikuunga Ringpu vaa akthratrongta raannatu Ringpu in kanimsoh ung.
Alamva kannih in noolla kansonkha chimnoh nata nohle seengnoh nata chunoh a mii masimnatheih kuungnata inthruhnoh;
chuta akthratrongta kankuungah amsilnatu Ringpu in kannihta kanija peitaningvah, kannih in mii mapelna tuta tlohnoh ung, chuta kanrilta chaang ak an Ringpu ta mapelnatu trongsung.
Alamva nannih in nanromkhaning, kannih in tikniakho ril chimnoh a inpaaknatrong huuinahnoh ung, nohle salok rella intlohsin noh ung, Ringpu in sakhi;
Khrsita vaa raangroi veia kantak ah akchek amneh amsunglakho, nohle mii tingna slakho, aktlei mii tingna slakho, kannih in paarthrata jonnoh ung.
Chuta anukhat in asaeita klukanga aroiinanga, kannih inkho nankaara kanril inneem veisung.

Nannihta khalmo kanrilvol choua, kannih in nankuungah Ringpu vaa akthratrongta malankhop veinoh a kantak luungkho nankuungah malannatu inchaangsung alamva nannih i kannihtu khalmo inchaalna veisachou.
Alamva unaoeio, kannih in kantloh kankhal mahche tranga thlou kantlohta nannih in intheihchou nannihta pootrik maronnoh natu kannih in khulouh suun thloutloh a Ringpu vaa akthratrongta kanraanchou.
Malot mii nankuungah kannih in jikcha seenga, akchimlamseh ah mahche malaalna amnoh kanhoong kanva irella nannih in sakhichou.
Apa khat in asa akuungah atloh khananga, nannih khatkhatta bung kanthokchou, nanrilta kamisoh choukha mahche thlou kamisil choukha nanrom.
Amah kurung huunnavaa paarthra ah nannihta naniong Ringpu in matikcha chaanna nanichingnatu.

Alamva unaoeio, Judia na Khrista Jisu ningah am Ringpu vaa khakla ei anhoongta amjuih veisachou; alamva Judiei tingnata klah knang intrimma anphah khananga nannih inkho nanramna mii tingnata klah knang nanphahpei;
Anmahvah Akpu Jisu mahche ringraan eita anthat, che kannihkho kanimnomung; khatkho Ringpu ta mapelnoh ei che mii naamteta indah ei.

Jental in inkal anphahahnatu ankuungah akthratrong kanraankho anmah in kanivat ung–ngatloh lai amrel anmahvaa anleh chaangta ralla amisip. Chuta achena avah Ringpu in trihkhop a amlunghaanga anchunga thlengsa.
alamva kannih in nankuungah thleng kandit–Paul keiin inlenga nankuungah kithlengnatu insuullang, chuta seitan in inivatpei.
Alamva Akpu Jisu in athlenglai inih in imtuur nohle phlaak huuina nohle amah maikuungah ithoina boorpiichu jangsame? Mahchu nannihnoh choume?
Alamva nannih in kannihtu paarthratna mahche phlaak huuina veisachou.
chunna nannihta namilotna tinga nanimliinnatu khatkho nannihta bungthoknatu iuhnao mahche Khrista vaa akthra trongah Ringpu ta routloh iuhnao Timothi ta nankuungah kamithlahpei.
Mahchuvah mainang klah knang jikcha in tukhatkho nanicheknoh natu. Mah i inih ichuumsa ta madonna nantaktal in nanrom.
Alamva nannihsoh kan amjoulai inih in klah knang idoututla tih a matsah a kanson peichou; mah i suukho suuksa che nannih inkho nanrompei.

Alamva mairella keiin soot kidoucheknoh rella, chuche jangmekhat hoongah madoina khanna nannihta nanimdoi aja, inruuia nannih nanthloukha sul vei aja tih a kantrit rella che nannih in mah namitloh khata keiin kiromatu amahta kimthlahpei.
Oirella unaoeio, kannih kanlah kansamma mahche kantlannoh jikchata nannih in namilot apaalla kannihta nanboh ung;
nannih inta Akpu ningah chet ah ngirchouleva, pek kannihvah ringung.
Alamva Ringpu maikuungah nannih phlaak huuina naamte rella kannih in khatloh a Ringpu ta kamipaak ume,
nannih nanmeelta kanmuhnatu mahche namilotna thlou akvaat malanphu malannatu khulouh suun khalmo kanngennohme?
Pekva inih Ringpu mahche inih Pa ataklal in khatkho inih Akpu Jisu in amah akseeng mii eisoh inruuia athlenglai inih ipa Ringpu amaikuungah malaaltuphu amnoh a nanril seenga amchet amliintu.
Kannih in nankuungah kantloh kankhal nanga nannih khatleh khat inseem mahche mii naamteta rilvoltheih a aksip Akpu in nankuungah ringna chaan nanimralchu veiso.
Chunna inih Akpu Jisu in amah akseeng mii eisoh inruuia athlenglai inih Ringpu vaa mahche Pa amaikuungah malaannatuphu amnoh nanril akseengta amchet amliintu.

Achenaremma, unaoeio, Akpu Jisu ningah kannoolchou mahche kamisohchou; mahchuvah nannih in khatloh a ring uchou che khatloh a Ringpu namipeltu tihrella kannih kanningnata nanromcheta nantloh khananga nannih in ral ralla tlohve.
Alamva Jisu Khrista apaalla kannih in kamitheih choukha nannih in nanrom.
Alamva nannih nantakta seenga sih, kumei kupa thranoh hoongnata inlaachou i Ringpu in amdonthlou;
mahchuvah kupa makhei in amah akmeita khatloh a seenga mahche injah a asih ume tihrella nanromnatu,
Ringpu romnoh rappu ramnaita athruun mii nanga ruung in akditpot thranoh thloua nanril maluutnohve;
Nan uh nannao kuunga amahnoh lamma seh a chimnoh tlohnohve, alamva nannih nankuungah khalmo thra a kansonche khananga, anaamte ichungah athung akloutu amahvah Akpu sa.
Alamva Ringpu in inihta seengnoh veinatu iniongnoh, chuta akseeng veinatu iniong.
Alamchunna tukhat in maita akjanohvah, miita janoh tanoh, chuta Akseeng Li amlan Ringpu ta janohsa.
Chuta unao pasata rilvol relnavah tukhat inkho nankuungah amijihnatu darkaarnohsa, alamvah nantak khatleh khat ril involnatu Ringpu in nanimtheih chepei;
mahche tak a Mesidonia apumte ah am unao naamteta nanringvol. Chuta unaoeio, mahchu ral ralla nantlohnatu kamisohchou,
nannihta nanihchaak khananga, daikenga nanpaalnatu, nanthlou a nanril namiluutnatu, che nankut in thlou nantlohnatu;
chunna nannihta apaalna mii in naninjahnatu che tukhat tingkho nanbei nanohtu kisonchou.
Alamva Jisu in thisa mahche veikhat ringsa tih i imlot taningvah, mahchunanga Jisu apaalla Ringpu in Jisu soh inruuia athlengpi tuei.
Mairella Akpu trong ita sonna kantihchou, mahchuvah Akpu in athlenglai phah a ak am inih in ak inche ei chungah matsahnoh ume.
Alamva Akpu atak in ringramna hoisoh, akthloi ringroi in ong housoh mahche Ringpu vaa pek–ul ahousoh inruuia trumtu Khrista ah akthi eiin matsah a ringtuei;
mahchuche ringa am inih in anmahsoh inruuia marvaanna Akpu soh inmuhnatu sumphaia pulla kak hanga inihantu; che nga tloh a lai amrel inih in Akpu soh amjou ume.
Churella mah trongin nannih khatleh khat inbohve.
Alamva inruin khulouh a athlengnanga Akpu vaa akni thlengtu ta nantak in thra nanrom.
Mii in “Leh–oisa che insuuk inhal lahna amnohsa” antihlai kak hanga nao anpooi kumei khat in naopoktum knananga kmaang asuuknakha antakchungah thlengtu, che anmah in ohkhannata inlitnatu amnohtu.
Chuta unaoeio, mahnichu inruin athlengnanga nantakchungah athlengnatu salungkhouna veinohso, chuta unaoeio, nannihvah anthimma amnosachou.
Alamva nannih nannaamvah akvaarvaa asa kupa sachou mahche suunvaa asa kupa sachou; inihvah khulouh tukho anthim tukho relnanohme.
Churella aktleimiiei nanga inih in innohrei, chuta inih in pira singtheihrei.
Alamva ak in mii in khulouh a innei, che tuiibuh anruii in khulouh a inruiiei.
Chuta inihvah suunmii vei taningmevah, singtheihrei, malotna mahche rilvolna tingah silh a chaanringta matuurna thir lukhumta khumrei.
Alamva Ringpu in inihta trihkhop a malunghaangta iphahnatu inicharnoh, chuta inih Akpu Jisu Khrista apaalla chaanring phahnatu inicharpei,
Jisu Khrista in inih turella thisa, chunna inih in inthou samelakho in samelakho amahsoh inringjounatu suulrei.
Alamchunna nannih in nantloh nankhal khananga khatleh khat inseemma insohjouve.
che anmah anthlourella anmahta rilvolla khalmo inkaanga injahve, che nannih nankaara leh oi am veiso.
Unaoeio, nannihta bung kanthokchou, aklaal eita chaakve, li ah marnop eita masoh eive, khatleh khat doutrangve.
Tunangkhat in thranoh nanitloh rella tukhat inkho thranoh a malengnatu tlohnohve, chuta lai amrel khat in khatturel mahche miinaam turel akthra tlohnatu jonve.
Lai amrel roomthokve,
inpot amnoh a ngenve,
bilamma mapaakve; alamva mah i nannih turel Khrista Jisu kuungah Ringpu in amdon khasa.
Akseeng Li ta thatnohve.
Ringraan in anphoong trongta usitnoh tlohnohve,
chuta bilamta chaang anve, akthrata chet a matuhve,
bilam thranoh nata inlaave. Thranohoong naamte nata tlohnoh a inlaave.
Nannihta naniong Amahvah malot aja, che amah in ohkhata atlohtu.
Unaoeio, kannih turelkho kaningenpive.
Mah trongjihthuun i unao naamtein anpaanatu Akpu mingah kinoolchou.
Alamchunna nannih in inchut nanphahna jikcha ah malot trangchou mahche klah knang jikchata chet a nandouchek rella Ringpu vaa khakla ah nannih rella kanthoina vei.
Mah i Ringpu tingna akchimlamseh pichaarvaa akseeng aveinasa, mahchuvah nannihta Ringpu kurung huunna ah matikcha nanimveinatu, mahchurella nannih in klah knang nanphah–
nannihta nanimlah mii eita tak a Ringpu in mananga athung alohtuei,
che aktrang meikaara Akpu vaa akchek amneh ringroi eisoh ringramnata Akpu Jisu ta amdanglai, klah akphah nannih in kannihsoh inruuia inngai inimphahtu,
Ringpu akromnoh mii eita che inih Akpu Jisu vaa akthratrong amjuihnoh eita athung alohtuei.
Anmah tandivah ache amnoh kmaang krel klah knang veitu che Akpu akchek amneh paarhtra nata athrektuei.
Mah i amah akseeng mii in amahta paar mathratnatu mahche amlot mii in amah kuungah salungkhounatu amah in athlengsam akni khasa, alamvah nannih in kannih sakhita namilotpei.
Achena ah inih Ringpu in naniongta matikcha nanimveinatu, mahche nannih akthra turella nandit naamte khatkho namilotthlou naamte tuuisoh inruuia mathlungnatu, lai amrel nannih turella kanngen,
chunna inih Ringpu mahche Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa malungsi nujuih a, nankuungah inih Akpu Jisu mingta nankaara paar amthrattu.

mahchuvah li in salakho nohle trongin salakho nohle kannih in kamijih inlo trongjihthuun salakho, Akpu vaa akni thlengsa tihrella khalmo intha a nannih nanrilta machoi chunohle roomthok nanveinoh natu.
Tukhat inkho nannihta inhea nanisimna nohtu, alamvah thranoh amsuuk mii in matsah a anthlengnoh anmaa ah mahche aiil amnohmii, kmaang krelvaa asa kupata phanoh avah mahnichu thlengnoh umang,
Rappu ta mii in Ringpu sa ta an onga mahche amithruunnata amah in indah a atak anroua amliintu, che amah in Ringpu akseeng munna luut a Ringpu mathruunna thlaamma inbok a Ringpu sang ta akroua inson.
Keiin nannihsoh kiamjoulai mah i nankuungah kisonkha intheih choume?
Che amah laita amah in aphoongnatu pek athingkha nannih in nanrom.
Alamvah aiil akjuihnoh in anthupkha matsah nata thloutloh a am, amahta lam khannata inlounohmiil pekva akthing miikhan thinga amuning.
Mahchuche aiil akjuihnoh amahkhata amdangtu, mahche Akpu Jisu abaona tolsoh amahta athattu, che akpu athlenglai amahta ammaangtu.
Aiil amjuihnoh amah in athlenglai Seitan vaa thlouta atloh nujuih a tuui naamtesoh, masimna daangsoh mahche salungkhouna,
che kochanoh turella akchimlamseh nata mii masimna annaam eisoh inruuia maangjou tuei alamva anmah in inkal phahnatu akchim rilvolta anmah in roulounoh ei.
Alamchunna anmah in akchimnohta amilotnatu, che anmahta masimnatu Ringpu in antakchungah aktrang mii masimna ankuungh amthlah,
mahchunna akchimta malotnoh a akchimlamseh noh a roomthok anmahta amlaaltuei.
Chunna kannih in akthratrongta kanraan apaalla Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa paarthrata nanphahnatu nannihta naniongpei.
Churella unaoeio, chet a ngirve che narnatrong salakho naohle trongjihthuunna salakho nankuungah kimtheih choukha chet a matuhve.
nannihta nanibohso che akthra thlou rella mahche trongla a nanimchet veiso.
che kochanoh mahche akchimnoh mii tingnata inkal kanphahnatu kaningenve; alamva mii naamte amlot miinoh ei.
Chuta Akpu vah malot aja; amah in nanimtrangtu mahche thranoh tingnata naningaak naniseltu.
Mahche nannih turella Akpu ta kamilotna am, mahchuvah kannih in nankuungah trongthuun kamilankhata majuih a amchou che tlohkho nantloh umang.
Miita rilvoltheih Ringpu kuungah mahche Khrista vaa akchet khanna nannihta Akpu in nanichingso.
Alamva nannih in kannih kanhoongta khatloh a loua namijuih umeta nantak in nanrom; nannihsoh kan amjoulai kannihva talnoh ung,
kannih in tukhat tingnakho aman malannoh a tol loua lousanoh ung, chuta tukhat tingkho potrik kamiveinoh natu khulouh suun inchek a thlou kantloh.
Mahkha kannih in tlohphu tihtanoh ung, chuta kantloh kankhal kanhoong kanvata nantaamnatu nankuungah khudam veia kantloh.
Alamva nannihsoh kan amjoulai amah trongthuun i kamilan peichou: Tukhat in thloutloh indahleh, amah in saakho saanohsoh.
Alamva nankaara tukhat mii arouva ktalla ammei, miithlou ah theihsin veia houtamma jakhatkho tlohnohluunga ammeita kantheihpei.
Pekva mainang mii in daia anthloutloh a anringna anthrulnatu anmahta Akpu Jisu Khrista minga trongthuun malanna bung kanthok ei.
Unaoeio, nannih in akthra tloh ah kmonnohve.
Mah trongthuun in kansonchou. Tukhat in amah trongthuun in kansonta majuih indahleva, mahmiikha romve, che amahsoh tlohkhal jounohve amahvah injak aphahtu.
Andahnang avah lounohve, chuta unao pasakhat veia chaakve.
Pekva Leh oi vaa Akpu ta amlin lai amrel alam naamte ah leh oi nanimlanso.
Inih Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa malungsi in nannaamta nanimruui veiso.
Inihta inikal Akpu Ringpu mahche inih in imtuurna Khrista Jisu vaa trongthuun nujuih a Khrista Jisu tu raangroi Paul keiin.
Keiin Mesidonia ah sehtung kitihlai nangta Ephesia ah niamnatu tranga kisonpeiche, mahchuvah aktlei anthliin malot rella matheihnoh natu,
achaknoh inseem thaminna, ringramtingna malotphu thlouta maliin maphorhnatu angut a trong inkherhna masuuk, ache amnoh ringnatluun rella ril maluutnoh natu nangin anmahta namtheihnatu.
Khatting inih in imsinna ithloua akseengril, chim chimnoh maromna akthraril mahche ril seenga malotnatu inthruh rilvolsa.
Mii arouva oinangnata inheia sehseia kanana amnoh trongtlamma ammei,
anmah in jangta trongungme nohle anmah in chimungta antrangna aramva romnoh eia aiiltu lulokva anveija.
Pekva tukhat in aiilta alamchimma huuinale, aiilva thtra ta inih in irom,

mah i irom, mah chuvah akchimmii turella aiilta sihnoh, chuta aiil amjuihnoh khatkho aleh am mii turella, akseengnoh mii khatkho akchimta ambuurmii turella, apa khatkho anu akthatmii rella, miithat misunrella,
thranoh hoongah akseh mii rella, kumei kupa ah inlaal mii, miisuur, amlei seimii, chimnoh ah seitatloh, mahche akchim malottingah matheihnata inhea akseh mii turelna.
Mah i doiphahthra Ringpu vaa paarthra akthratrong kikuunga amsilta aknu majuihna turelna.
Keita aktrangli amlan inih Akpu Khrsita Jisu ta kimpaak, alamva amah aroutlohna ah thlou keithunanga keita malot aja mii kamveiang,
mansah avah keiin Ringpu ta khalmo thranoh a trong sanglakho, chut sanglakho mahche manuih sanglakho, chulata rilvolna kiphahpei alamva mahkha Amahta kimlotnoh rella romnoh a kitlohning,
che inih Akpu vaa malungsi Khrista Jisu ah amta malot, khatkho rilvolnakha kei turelvah khalmo inleisolhsa.
Aleh am mii eita kalnatu Khrista Jisu in tukleiramma thlengsa ta asonni malotphu mahche roulou matikcha, keiin aleh am ankaara akthloirem veisang,
chuta mairella keiin rilvoltheih kiphahpei.
Chup chuptu kurung, kthi amnoh, muh icheknoh, khalekru vei Ringpu ache amnoh paarthra khatkho injahna am veiso. Amen.
Kisakupa Timothi, anmah in nangta namisoh nujuih a nangin aktrang raal nitlohpinatu nangrella matsah a ringraan in ansontrong nujuih a thloui kamsil peiche,
nangin namlotta chet a matuhro mahche chim chimnoh romna akthra rilla amro. Mah maromna rilita indah eia mii arouva amilotnata mulikoi veisei,
anmah ankaara Himenas leh Alekjendar kho jaosei, anmah in antlohthlou mii manuih samanuih i thranohsa ta anmahta seitan kuungah kamlanpeiei.
Chunna matsahremma, keiin tranga kisonchou mah chuvah inruruh a noolpi, ngenpi, aktleiturel nihpi mahche roomthok malani mii naamte turelna,
kurungei turella khatkho inkaang phomma ammi turella nihpive, mah i inih in daia mahche leh oia, ringdamma paal punsi veinatu Ringpu in akdit che bilamma injahna veia iringnatu.
Mah i inikal Ringpu amit anna akthra che ajapot.
Amah in mii naamteta kalnatu khatkho akchimta marommii amah in akdit.
Alamva Ringpu inkhat am, che Ringpu leh mii akaara amnai matuuknatu inkhat am, mahchuvah Jisu Khrista,
alaitalla sakhi veinatu mii naamteta thlokna turella ataktalta inimlanpei.
Mairella keita akthratrong akraan mahche raangroi (keiin akchimta kison, simnanoh ang), malot ah mahche akchimma Jental eitu lulok veia keita thlou keithunpei.
Chunna kupa eiin malunghaang mahche injanoh a inkharhkhirh amnoh a akseengkut domma aphomrel ngenta keivah kikdit;
Kumei inkho in orh noh natu mahche injahna puunrei ah inseem inliing eiso, sam pinna amanchaal puunrei ah inliingnoh tupotchou
chuta akthrathloua keiva heikoh ammangta akson kumei in akthra thlou turella inliing eiso.
Kumei in daikenga kupa lia ring tameiso.
Kumei in matheih nohle kupachungah akpu vei keiin majanoh ang, kumei in rimta ameiso.
Alamva Adamta matsah aseem, chuche Ipta aseem.
Alamva Adamta masimnanoh, chuta kumeita amsimna a aiilkhoi hukveisa.
Kumei in malot ah, rilvolah akseengah, mahche ril inneemsoh inruuia am eile naopok ah kumeita akaltuei.
Mah isontrongi atataksa: Tukhat in sadamkem thlouta dile amah in akthra thlouta akdit.
Chuleva sadamkem khat in atak ah thranoh insoi inlaal amnoh tutla, kumei khatvaa amsal, achaangkhat ah am, akromtheih, injahna aja, routloh theih, mii amtheihchek,
tuiibuh inruinoh; karaangnoh chuta inneem, miisoh inkherhnoh che inbaobeh dinoh.
Amah ataploikuungta khalmo thra marella kemtheih, bilamma injahna vei mahche asaeita amah athlangah sih a kemtheih;
alamva tukhat in amah ataploikuungta khatloh a marel kamtheih umeta maromnohle, amah in Ringpu khakla ta khatloh a akemchek ume?
Amah in inrangte ah malot mii veinohso, nohle amah in orh a thoiliinle seitan vaa pichaara tla aja.
Oirella apaalla am mii eiin amahta injah tupotei, chunohleva seitan chaangah manna inriiltu che injak aphahtu.
Chunanga Dikan inkho cheksiltu tlasei, trongtlamnoh, tuiibuh ah karaamnoh, anchuungnatu thloua karaamnoh;
chim chimnoh romna akseeng rilsoh inruuia anthup amdangta malot a amtutu tla.
Anmah in antakta matsah a chaang in anmaan eiso; mahchuche antak in kanchungah malaalna amnohsungta romeile anmah in dikan veia routloh seiso.
Mahchunanga kumeiei inkho cheksil eiso, mii loonna trongnoh, chuta achaang naia am, bilamma malot aja kumei veitu tlaei.
Dikan in kupa khatvah amsal, anmah in ansa eita mahche antaploi kuungtah thra a marella amtheih veitu tlasei;
Dikan veia thra a routloh mii in atakta akthra thlou mahche Khrista Jisu ting am malot khanna khalmo malotna aja veitu tlasa.
Keiin nikuungah intha kithlengnatu matuura amah matheihna i kimjihpeiche.
Keiinta thil angleva, Ringpu vaa taploikuungah nangin khatloh a sehtungme niromnatu mah amramita kimjih, mah taploikuung chuva kukcho khatkho innmun akvei akring Ringpu vaa khaklasa.
Amahta ruung veia amdangpei, Li in amchimpei, ringroi in anmuhpei, jatih ankaara trongi inraansa, tukleiram in amlotpei, paarthra ah ahanlohpei.
Pekva Li in seenga ason mahchuvah vaknu lai avah mii arouva chimnoh li che khousaar in amtheihna khanna anril amiluuttuva amilotnata mah a sehtuei,
antak ah chim chimnoh romna rilta akthra veisinna miita leemma trongei,
changvaangta chimnoh tih a anthing mahche malot mii eita khatkho akchimta akrom eiin mapaaksoh inruuia ansaak an iinta Ringpu in aseempot saakphuta saaknohnatu anthing.
Alamva Ringpu in aseem naamte thrakir, che mapaakso inruuia rouloumele janohtu jakhatkho amnoh;
alamva mah i Ringpu atrong mahche ngen apaalla amseengpei.
Mah matheihna ita unao anrilla thunchouleva, nangva Khrista Jisu vaa akthra routloh mii veiuche, nangin aknu nijuih malotna trongin akthrata matheih a akjok vei uche.
Ringpu romnoh khatkho kmong veia seemma antong thaminna jakhatkho tlohna amnoh–akthratingah nikroua tamma theihro;
alamva ruung thratnatu insuulva steta kanananing, mairella pek ringna rella mahche vaknu akthlengsam ringna rella trongchet am.
Mah i inlitnohtu trong, mahche amahta jaa a roulouve khalmo matikcha.
Alamva mairella inih in thlou itloh che insuulme, alamva Akring Ringpu ta inih in imtuur, amahvah mii naamteta amuveia amlot mii eita akalchek akring Ringpu vah inih in chet a imlot.
Soneiro che maita matheih eiro.
Intlangsa khat veia tukhat inkho usitnoh naktlohnoh eiso, chuta nangva amlotmiiei turella nitrong nilaleh nihoong nivaa ah, miirilvolla, malot ah, akseeng punsi ah mii in nangta nantamna veiro.
Keiin kithleng nohmiil, savaanga ringjih paa ah, akthra trong raanna, mii matheih ah niril maluut a jaro.
Nitak ah am kuttholta thousanoh tlohnohro, mahkha anparuulvaa jama eiin nichungah ankut sihsoh inruuia ringraanei trong anpaalla nikuungah amilanpei.
Maita athloi veia tlohro, anmah ankuungah niril maluut a nitakta malanro, chunna nithlou nimaasehkha miinaam in muh eiso.
Nitakturel mahche mii matheih ah cheksilro. Mah thloukha tloh a amro, alamva maita tloh a amchele nangin nitakho che nitrong arungai mii eikho inkal uchou.
Aktar kupa eita saalnoh eiro chuta anmahta nipa nanga bungthok eiro; naolon eita niuh ninaonanga madoneiro,
aktar kumei eita ninu nanga madoneiro.
Taktak a trulmeinu eita injah eiro.
Trulmeinu khat inta asa ei nohle atuei amle, anmah in matsah a antaploi kuunga Ringpu amilot tihkha andangnatu annu anpakuungah anleimanta siineiso, alamva mah i Ringpu mit anna ajathlou.
Tukhat in taktak a trulmei vei mahche amahturel tukhatkho amnoh a akroua ringle, amah in Ringpu kuungah matuur khatkho khulouhthlang che suuntla inruruh a nih khatkho ngen inngainohso;
chunohleva aril mapelnatu ansuul trulmeinu in kiringbenga thisa.
Anmah antak ah anming athinohnatu trongthuun i matheih eive.
Tukhat in amah unao pasata che amuveia amah ataploi kuungkho jok cheknohleva, atak in malotthlouta indahsa che malotnoh miichunga amah in ralla thranoh veisa.
Kum sopruk akphahnoh trulmeinuva trulmeinu mingah majaonohve, kupakhatvaa akmei veithrol aja,

anmahva akthrathloua isoolna trulmeinule, asa ataploikuungta akjok theihle, rapkheina miita routloh theih madangle, akseeng mii eita ankeh chaamle, klah aknangeita majoomle, che bilamma akthra thlou tlohnatu atakta inkatsale, amahta trulmeinu ankaara majaovesa.
Chuta nao akvei trulmeinuva trulmeinu kaara majaonohve, alamva anmah anruungah thranoh ril luut tueia Khrista jekna anraltu chunna inn anpaaljatu.
Matsahna trongchetta ankhoih rella antakta malaalnatu thleng.
Mah chukhopnoh a anmah in ktalla thlou antlohnoh natu, inn inna inloia che miirilh miisonna thlou aminok che sonphunoh sonna ammei.
Chunna nao veia trulmeinuin, changvaanga ansa pok a, antaploi kuungta kemma am kikdit, che jekna mii in inihta inimlaalnatu anmahta tancha penohve.
Alamva trulmeinu arouva invaia Seitan aknujuih a lousehsei.
Tukhat malot kumei in nao trulmeinu doonle, anmahta majoomso; anmahrelvah khakla ta pootrik maveinoh eiso, mah i trulmeinu takta majoomnatu kisonchou.
Khakla ta thra chinga kem amtheih anparuul eita saruk innih injahve, amuveia trong akraanei che miita amtheih ansuul eita,
alamva ringjih in asonva, “Nannih in thlou namitloh siilchalta abao siinnoh tupotchou” khatkho “Thloutloh mii in atlohkhaan aphahtupot.”
Mii innih nohle inthumva sakhi amnoh a tukhat inkho anparuul chunga malaalna trong lounohve.
Tukhat inkho alehthlou tlohnohnatu inthingta aktloh miiva miinaam maikuunga saalve, chunna aktlei mii in antritnatu.
Ringpu khatkho Khrista Jisu mahche acharpot ringroi anmaikuungah keiin tranga kisonchou, mah chuvah keimii miimii annoh a thlou nitlohnatu kamsilche.
Tukhatchungah innot a nikut sihnohro, aktlei mii in antlohthlou aleh akhanna jaonohro; nohle nitak nikroua seengro.
Tuii khopta iinnohro; chuta nivonpii rella mahche niruungin injomma knatrang rella ngangli atuii ste ste huuinaro.
Mii arouva alehta pichaar antlohnoh maa a chuta aktlei anlehva tap a indangtu.
Mahchunanga akthra thlouva seenga indangsa; mahche seenga inphoongnoh slakho inthup a am cheknoh.
Naichivaa rukol akroon eiin anmah akpu eita injah i matikcha ta madon eiso, chunna Ringpu akmingta che matheihnata thranoh antrongnoh natu.

Tunangkhat Akpu in malot eileva, anmahta unao pasa anveirella injanoh tlonoh eisoh; mahchu angut a anmah in thloiralla routloh eiso, alamva anmah routloh akhanna akanana akphah mii eita rilvoltheih anphahpei.
Mah thloui matheih eiro che tranga takeiro.
Tukhat inta inhea matheihle inih Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa akchim mahche Ringpu malotna nujuih a matheihta indahleva,
amahva athoi aliinsoh in orhsa, amahva jakhatkho romnoh, mahche trong rella injanoh amsuuk, mah khanna kallak, inkhon inraan, thranoh a trong, thranoh madon,
che ril intluunnoh khatkho akchim antak ah amnoh ankaara inna insuul suuk, Ringpu malot i achuungnatu thlouningta anaamte i mainang nata suuk.
Ipelsoh inruuia Ringpu malotmele khalmo ichuungna;
alamva inih in tukleiramma jakhtkho thlennohme, che inih in tukleiram nata jakhatkho phurh cheknoh ume;
chuta inih in saakphu khatkho puunrei sihmele mah khanna inih in pel ume.
Chuta kdoon akdimii in madoina ah tlasei, chaangah mansei che artha amnoh khatkho lal akdi eiin mah khanna tlasei, mainangin mii maangna ah khatkho inthritna ah ammaang amthangpei.
Alamva inbaobeh ditrangin thranoh naamtetu akjungsa; mah ita dimalla anthrul miilla mii arouva malotnata invaitlamsei che klah knang phah a amilung kuksei insunsei.
Chuta Ringpu amii nangvah mah naaamte i mahro, akchimlamseh ah, Ringpu mathruunna, malot ah, rilvoltheih ah, douchek ah, ril inneemta masinro.
Malotna ah akthra raalkha tlohro; ache amnoh chaanta thra matuhro, sakhiei i anmaa a nangin akthra niphoonglai nangta nak ongpei.
Poot naamteta chaan amlan Ringpu kuungah che Pontias Pilat amaikuungah akthra sakhi anthruhta phoongkha Khrista Jisu kuungah keiin nangta kamsil peiche,
Inih Akpu Jisu Khrista in andangnohmiil trongthuun i amchu inpoolnoh mahche amingchat thranoh jonnoh a sihnatu keiin nangta kamsil peiche;
Doi amlantheih mahche khalekru vei akchek amnehrem kurung chungvaa Kurung, akpu chungvaa Akpu in ajapei atihna laikhanna mahkha ammuhtu.
Athih nainoh che kvaar in aphahcheknoh ramma amvah amahkhopning, tukhat inkho amahta tiknikho muhnoh mangei che muhkho cheknoh ei. Injahna khatkho ache amnoh a paalkha amah kuungah veiso. Amen.
Mah tukleiramma akdoonei turella anmah in kei ningsungta isoonnohnatu, inromnoh lal akho amituurnoh natu, chuta inih in itlannatu huuitanga poot naamte inimlan Ringpu ting malot eiso.
Anmah in akthra tloh eiso, akthrathloua doon eiso, ril liin khatkho ril inrolla malantheih vei eiso,
vaknuna turella akthra innmunthol nanga anmah turella lalpei eiso, chunna anmah in ache amnoh chaanta matuh eiso, mah ichaan taktaksa.
Timothi, nangta kamsilchekha ngaak a sehro. Ringpu jaonoh trong mahche akanana amnoh trong khatkho chimnohta an ong khiialnata inpelro,
alamva mah chunangta chim angta ansonna mii arouva malotvaa daaknata inthleia sehsei.
Malungsi in nangta nanruuipiso.
Khrista Jisu ah am chaanvaa trongchet nujuih a Ringpu in amdon Khrista Jisu ningah raangroi Paul,
keiin kirilvol kisa Timothi kuungah:
Pa Ringpu mahche inihvaa Akpu Khrista Jisu tingah malungsi, rilvoltheih khatkho leh oi am veiso.
Keiin inngainoh a kingen kingenna ah nangta kantheihlai kapa kapu in antloh khananga, akseeng chim chimnoh romna rilsoh rou katloh Ringpu ta kimpaak.
Nang ruithlita intheih anga, roomthok in kitak ah asipnatu, juktiing khulouh nangta kimuhja hangsache.
Niril seenga namlotkha keiin intheih ang, tak a malot i nang nipi Lois leh nangnu Unis kuungah amche pekkho ammangche, nankuung akho amtuta keiin kamlot.
Mairella nichungah kikut kisih apaalla nitak ah am Ringpu vaa kuttholta nihuuinatu kiromche;
alamva Ringpu in intrinatu li inimlannoh chuta tuuitu Li mahche rilvol khatkho atak anroua kut inchalnatu inimlan.
Chunna inih Akpu rella sakhi malanna chunohle amahrella simma am keirella injaknohro, chuta Ringpu vaa tuuiah akthratrong rella klah knang phah ah chuum jaro,
amah in inihta inikalpei che seenga amahningah inihta iniongpei, inih in itlohthlou relna noh, chuta amah in amdonkhat amrelna, mah chuvah amah in chup chup amaa a Khrista Jisu kuungah inimlanpei,
che pekva inihta inikal Khrista Jisu andang apaalla aphoongpei, amah in kthita ammutche akthratrong apaalla chaan khatkho kthi amnohluung akvaarting inihthlenpei.
Mah akthratrong irella keita akthratrong akraan, mahche raangroi khatkho lulok veia thlou keithunpei,
Alamchunna oirelna keiin klah knang kidou, chuta keiva injaknoh ang, alamva keiin kamlotkha kirom, amah kuungah kimsilhkha amah inkho Aknikha aphahnohmiil kemma keisihtuta kitak in kirom.
Nangin kei kuungnata nitheihche akchimtrong khata Jisu kuungah malot mahche rilvolna akthra pandamkha majuihro;
nankuungah amsil akchimkha inih isuungah am Akseeng Li vaa apaalla ngaak kemro.
Asia ah am annaamte in keikuungnata inheia sehseita nirom, anmah ankaara Phukelas mahche Hermokenes jaosei.
Onisiphoras ataploikuunga Akpu rilvol theihkha amso, alamva amah in injomma ril kamthlannang; keiin thirhang kanlukrella amahva injak amnoh,
chuta amah in Rome atlunglai arilhanga keita keijonang che keituuk ang —
mahni khanna Akpu tingna rilvoltheih aphahnatu Akpu in akuungah malanso che Iphisas ah amah in keita khalmoa rou keitlohkha nirom.
Chunna kisakupa, nangin Khrista Jisu kuungah am malungsi khanna trang veiro,
amaa a keiningnata nitheih sakhi chahkha nanginla aktlei ankuungah masil eiro.
Jisu Khrista vaa akthra raalmii khat nanga klah knangah chuum jajouro.
Raalmi khat veia thloutloh tukhat inkho amah alanai thlouva manoknoh, chuta amah in amsinnava amahta thlou akpe akpukhata aril mapel khasa.
Akleeng khat in kleeng insinlai aiil nujuih a leengnohle amah in boorpii phahnoh.
Thlou tranga aktlohmii in chiluh khanna amah achuum matsah a aphahtu tlasa.
Keiin jangkisonme madonro, alamva bilam naamte room nicheknatu Akpu in namlantu.
Keiin akthratrong kiraan nujuih a, akthinata ring, Devit nata thleng Jisu Khrista ta intheihro,
Mairella keiin aiil akhoih miinang veia thirhang inluk a che klah knang douva amsang. Chuta Ringpu atrongvah thirhang inluknoh.
Alamchunna incharmiiei turella bilam keiin kitho, mah chuvah Khrista Jisu kuungah ache amnoh paarthrasoh am chaanringta anmah inkho anphahnatu.
Mah isonni taktak: Inih inta Amahsoh thijou meleva, inih inkho Amahsoh ringjou ume;
inih inta dou meleva, inih inkho Amahsoh paaljou ume; inih in Amahta indah mele Amah inkho inihta inindahtu;
inih in Amahta malotnoh mele, Amahvah malotphu veia am–alamva Amah atak akrouta indah tlohnoh.
Trongla rella inkharhkhirh athratnanoh suuksamkha amah in anpeelnatu Akpu maikuungah soneiro mahche chaak eiro, mah chunangin arungai miita ammaang.
Ringpu in aja mii khat veia nitakta Amakuungah namlannatu nichek makhei suulro, thloutloh mii khat in athloua injakna amnoh, akchim trongta chimma huuinaro.
Ringpu malotnoh mahchunang apupu trongnata inpeelro, alamva mainangin thloithloita mii in Ringpu malotnoh anraltu.
Anmah antrong khanna ruungta aksaa in arik asaakanga anmahta asaaktuei, Anmah ankaara Himenas khatkho Philetas jaosei,
veikhat inlenga ringva chesa ta malot a amtuh mii in akchilhnata anlam inthlenga sehsei. Mii arouva malot khannata amihepei.
Chuta Ringpu vaa akchet innmunva ngirra am, amah chummi am, “Akpu ming akson mii in alehnata mah a seh eiso.”
Inn inrol khatsuungah ra–ao leh harngou beelkhopta amnoh, chuta thing mahche philbeelkho ammei, che arou eiva injahna aja thlou turel inhuuina, arouinla injahnanoh mii turel inhuuina.
Tukhat in injahnanoh akbuurnata anrouva inseengeile, chuleva amahvah akthra thlou naamte turel inchaanga mahche seenga huuina ajapei, Akpu turella huuina aja beel veitu tla.
Chunna naolon in andit antlohjahang tal rilkhata mahro, akseeng rilla Akputa ak ong mii eisoh inruuia akchimlamseh, malot, rilvol mahche leh–oita masinro.
Kmongei tronga injanoh a injet artha amnohmii in innah insuul amisuuk ta romma insengro.
Che Akpu roijuih mii invah innah insuultrang, veinohtupot, tlohphunoh, chuta mii naamte kuunga ril tap, mii matheih ah kthieh, akdouchek,
amahsoh injanoh miita inneemma seemma machim. Anmah in akchimta anromnatu che anril thlengnatu Ringpu in thlou atloh ei,
anmahta asuureiche amah in amdon tlohnatu, khousaar achaangnata inlit a tlaan ajaei.
Chuta mah i romro, achena aknichunna trihkhop a insuk inhal lahna thlengtu.
Alamva mii in atakkhopta arilvol suuktu, inbaobeh andittu, in orh tuei, inhaangtlam tuei, thoi tuei, annu anpa in anson majuihnoh tuei, mii in atlohkhaan romnoh tuei, seengnoh tuei,
mii rilvol amnoh tuei, mii andah tuei, miiruuta malaalla trongtuei, kaa anraltu, intrikhop tuei, akthrata intirh tuei,
mii loonna trongtuei, cheksilnoh tuei, thoiliin anraltu, Ringpu ta anrilvol chunga antak mapelnatu ralla andittu,
heikoh ahoongva antlohtu, amah atuuiva lounoh tuei, oinang miinata inpelro.
Alamva anmah ankaar nata taploikuung taploikuunga luut luut a aleh pootrik roonna alam jkchah ah ansehpi tlamtuei, marnop kumeita namma ansuur tuei,
rungai seilakho anmah in akchim khiialva phah cheknoh tuei.
Janes mahche Jambres in Moses ta indahnanga, nga tloh a anmah inkho akchimta indah ei; thranoh rilta mahche malotta indah ei;
chuta anmahvah pungpornoh usei, alamva anmah innih ankuungna nanga anmah in kmong eikha mii naamte kuunga indangtu.
Pekva nangin muh a nirom, mah chuvah keiin kamtheihna hoong, kihoong kiva, kimlotna, chaanna masinna, keiin kidoutrang, keikuungah am mii rilvol, keiin soot kidouchekna,
Antiok ah, Ikunium ah mahche Listra ah keikuungah aksuuk keita kanchutna, kei klah knangna, keikuung kanchutna aksuuk jikcha i keiin kidou, keichut seilakho anaamte ankuungnata Akpu in keikalpei.
Taktak a tukhat in Khrista Jisu kuungah akchim chaanna ring dieile, amah in inchut klah knang aphahtu tlasa.
Thranoh mii mahche mii masimna, thranohchung thranoh vei miita amisimnatu che mii inkho amahta amisimnatu.
Chuta nangin niromche eita chet a namlotna khannata incheknoh a amro, tutu kuungnata nitamme romro.
Che nangin nao niveilai nga tloh a akseeng ringjih kirompei ta nitak in minna bahab tlasache Khrista Jisu ta namlot apaalla mah ringjih in nangta chaanring rella namtheihchek.
Ringjih naamte Ringpu aphuknata suuk mahche miita matheihna turel, saalna turel, machimna turel, akchimlamseh ah matheihna turel akanana,
mahchunna akthra thlourelta mapaangnatu Ringpu amii in mapungpha a thlouraang atlohpei.
Kthi mahche kiringta pichaar aktlohsam Ringpu khatkho Khrista Jisu hanmah in andangsam che amah kurung huunna mingah keiin kamsilche.
Trongkha raanro, manjangnuram akho manjangnuramnoh akho tlohkhalro, soot doutrang mahche mii matheih ah masoinoh a anril mathlaak eive, chaak eive che bungthok eive.
Alamva akchim matheihna khannata soot doua am ancheknoh natu laikha thlengtu. Chuta amikuur inthakrella antaksaak in andit lamtingah inheisei,
anmah in inhea sehtuei mahche seemma anson thaminna invaia sehtuei.
Nangva lai amrel chetro, klah knang thoro, evengelis thlou tlohro, nangin nitlohthlou mapung mapharo.
Alamva keivah inkattuphu veia inkatchesang; keiin kisehnatu lai thlengsa.
Akthra raalkha ktlohpei, tlaan insinkho kimchepei, keiin kamlotta ngaak a sehsang.

Peknata akchimlamseh miitu boorpiikha keiturel keisihpei, amahkha akchimlamseh pichaar Akpu in mahnichunna keiin kitlohkhaan kamlantung, mahkha keikuung khop noh chuta amah in indangsamta rilvolsoh inruuia aloungaak mii naamte akho amlantu.
Keikuungah intha a nithlengnatu nichek makhei tranga insuulro.
Alamva Demas in pekna tukleiramta arilvolla keita keimah a Thesalonika ah sehsa, Kresken in Kalatia ah Titas in Dalmatia ah sehsei.
Luke in anroua keisoh inruui. Mark ta jonna thlengpiro; alamva routlohna turel amahta keikuunga khalmo kana.
Tikhikas ta Ephesia ah kamthlapei.
Nathlenglai Troas ta Karpas kuungah kmah inluut insuul leh nirik eita, amuveia savunna injih nirik eikho thlenro.
Kuri akseem Alekjendar in kikuungah khalmo thranoh keitlohpei; amah n atlohthlou nujuih a Akpu in athung alohtu.
Nangin amahrella cheksilso, alamva akthratrong iraanta amah in tranga indah.
Matsah a kitak kankalnatu kitlohlai tukhat inkho keiturel ngirnoh ei, annaam in keita kanmah ang. Anmahta andah a antakchunga thranoh tlohnoh eiro.
Chuta akthratrongta mapungpha a raan kicheknatu Akpu in kikomma ngirra li kamlanang, mah chuvah Jental annaam in amah trong ita antheihnatu. Nga tloh a saraang abaonata keita keikalang.
Thranoh naamte nata Akpu in keikalla mahche amahvaa ringram kurung huunna rella keikaltu. Amah kuungah ache amnohluung paarthra veiso.
