Erastas in Korinthia ah inmahsei, Trophimas vah kna a Miletas ah kmahpei.
Phalbi athlengnoh maa a nithlengnatu tranga insuulro. Pudens, Linas, Klaudia mahche unao naamtein nangta saambaan namlannei.
Akpu in nang niklita inruuipiso. Malungsi in nanruuipiso.
Ringpu vaa ringroi mahche Jisu Khrista vaa raangroi Paul, Ringpu in acharche mii in amilot mahche Ringpu amdon nujuih a akveikchek akchimta romma ahanralnatu,
ache amnoh chaanta matuura amchinthi amnoh Ringpu in leithingah kimlantuta trongchet atlohche,
che tancha athratlaia akthra trongta raan apaalla amah trongta iniphoongpei, mah chuvah akthratrongta raanni inihta inikal Ringpu vaa trongthuun nujuih a keita kamsilpeiang.
Mairella nangta Kriti ah kimahche, mahchuche akvaat thloueita nangin intlaanga nihantloh natu mahche keiin nangta kimtheih chekha aknujuih a khuupii khuupii ah anparuul eita anthlou thuneiro,
tunangkhat kupata malaaltuphu amnoh, kumei khatvaa amsal asa ei in Akpu malot antakchungah anlaal amnoh mahche son majuihnoh a ansoina amnohle anmah khanangta thlou thuneiro.

Alamva sadamkem khat in, Ringpu routloh khat veia, malaalna amnoh; kei ningsangta insoonnoh nohle intha amlung inhaangnoh nohle tuiibuh ah aril maluutnoh nohle innah insuul trangnoh nohle achuungna turel karaamnoh,
chuta routloh theih, akthra di, anroua inpuuichek, ril intluun, kseeng, mahche anroua kut inchalmii veitu tla;
amahta imtheih khananga malot aja trongta chet a matuhso, chunna akthra malot rella matheih acheknatu khatkho injanoh eita anmaraal mathruh acheknatu.
Alamva trongson majuihnoh alamtlanoh a trong mahche mii masimna khalmo ammei, amuveia anvuntan ruultingna,
anmahva trongnoh tupotei, anmah nangva anchuungnatu anditrella matheih phunohta matheih a taploikuung apumteta achung athlang amilat.
Anmah ankaara ringraan khat in ason, “Kritan eivah lai amrella amichin thiei.”
Mah sakhi i chim. Alamchunna anmah in malot a akchim anveinatu anmahta tranga saaleiro,
Judiei in anseem thaminna nohle akchimta thleia akseh miiva trongthuunna anril amiluutnoh natu tranga cheksilro.
Akseeng kuungah bilam kseeng, chuta akseengnoh mahche amlotnoh miikuungah bilam seengnoh; anmah anril chim chimnoh romna anrilkho seengnohsa.
Anmah in Ringpu akromva veia trongei chuta anmah in antlohthlouva amahta indah ei, anmahva intirhsei, trongson majuihnoh, akthra thlou rella anmahva matik chanoh ei.
Chuta nangva, malot rella akseeng akchimkhata matheihro.
Anpaa kupa eiin anril inneemma an amnatu, cheksilro, anril luut a thlourom, chimma malot, rilvoltheih mahche doutrang anveinatu matheih eiro.
Mahchunanga anpaa kumei in anhoong anla ah injahna kumei anveinatu; mii loonna trongnoh nohle tuiibuh ah naichi veinoh; anmah in akthra i jangme tih a matheih eiso,
che naolon kumei in amisal eita mahche ansa eita anrilvolnatu matheih,
thlou anromnatu, seengnatu, innthlou romnatu, malungsi amnatu che amisal li ah an amnatu, mah chuvah Ringpu trongta amithinoh natu matheih eiro.
Chunanga naolon kupain anroua inchaak ancheknatu tranga soneiro.
Bilam nitakta akthrathloua mamuhnatu suulro, mahche nangin namtheihna a ril seenga, ril luut a
akchim trongin miita maraal peknohnatu, chunna nangta nandah eiin injak anphahtu, nannih rella thranoh jakhatkho antrongnoh natu.
Naichi in anmah akpu anthlanga an amnatu mahche anmahta injah a mapelnatu; trongnoh eiso,
inrunoh natu, chuta akchim apumte ah bilamma inikal Ringpu vaa akchimta matheihna ah anmah in amithratnatu.
Alamva mii naamte turella chaanring i Ringpu vaa malungsi in ammuhpei,
Akpu malot mahche tukleiramtu vei akthra akchim diphuta dinoh, che ril inneemma, chimma, khatkho Ringpu tinga tukleiramma iringnatu inihta inimtheih,
inihtu doita matuur, mahche inihvah akliin Ringpu khatkho inikal Jisu Khrista vaa paarthra ammuhta inih in iloungaak,
inih in chimnoh nata inthloknatu che akthrathloua ril maluut a khatkho amah amiieita ata maveina turella maseengnatu ataksaakta inimlanpei.
Mah ita sonna madangeiro, bungthok eiro che chaak eiro. Tukhat inkho nangta usitnoh naktlohnoh eiso.
Anmah in rampuui mahche akchek amneh ei anthlangah an amnatu, trongson majuihnatu, mahche injahna thlou rella inchaanga an amnatu,
tukhat tingkho thranoh trongnoh natu, innah insuulnoh natu, ril tap a mahche mii naamte kuungah ril seenga mamuh i anmah in anromnatu matheih eiro.

Alamva inih in laikhat avah kmongme, trong majuihnohme, invaia sehme, aktlei tleita dia mahche ril mapel mathlanna thranoh tloh ah dia mahche kallak inpea lai jikchata mamaanga, intirhsa veia mahche khat in khatta intirhna veime a;
chuta inihvaa inikal Akpu miita rilvoltheih, mahche mii malungsi theihta mii kuungah ammuhpei,
alamva inih itak in akchimlamma seh a itlohthlou relna noh, chuta amah ataktal in inihta inirilvol nujuih a akthar pok a inisil peia che Li Akseeng in inimthar apaalla inihta inikalpei.
Inihta inikal Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa apaalla Li akseengta itakchungah huuitanga inibunpei.
Chunna inihta amah malungsi in inimchimpei, ache amnoh ringna ah matuura inih in lalchun iveinatu.
Mah asontrongi taktaksa.
Ringpu amlot mii in akthra thloutloh a anmah antak in cheksilla anril amiluutnatu ta tranga kansonchou, mah i miikuung avah akanana che akthrarem,
chuta kmong injanoh, apupu inthohnata majon, madon inchunnoh rella injanoh mahche trongsuur rella inna insuul, mainang nata inpelve, alamva oinangi akanana amnoh mahche sulning.
Miita ajea amthlakja mii khat i veikhat nohle veinih nakchaaknua, mahmii nangkha inlenga jakhatkho tlohpinohro,
mahchunang miiva chimnoh lamma seh, alehchel mahche atak anroua maraal inpemii tih a romro.
Jinas leh Apolos anlamma jakhatkho anvaat amnanohtu nichek makhei anmahta anneiro.
Che nang nimiiei in kananoh thlounata akthra thloutloh a am eiso.
Keisoh inruuijou annaamte in nangkuungah saambaan amithlah. Malot lamtingah inirilvol ankuungah saambaan kamilan.
Malungsi in nankuungah am veiso.
Khrista Jisu rella simma am Paul mahche iuhnao Timothi in,
Inih irilvol iuhnao mahche thlou itloh ikhalpijou Philimon kuunga
che inih isar Aphia leh inihsoh raalmii iveipi Arkhipas che nang inna nanboompi khakla.
alamva nangin Akpu mahche Akseeng mii ankuungah niam nanga nang rilvoltheih mahche malotkhata kitheih in,
Khrista Jisu ah am inihvaa akthra khiial naamte nangin namlotkha miikuung akho chuum nijajounatu kingenche.
Alamva nang rilvol, roomthok mahche inbohkha kiphahpei, alamva nang napaalla kiuh kinao akseeng miiei anrilta namthlanpei.
Alamchunna nangin darkaar amchu nitlohnatu keiin Khrista ningah amma nangta trongthuun namlan sanglakho,
trong akphurh Paul mahche Khrista Jisu rella simma am keiin kirilvolla nangkuungah kinoolche–
keiin simma kiamlai apa veia kisa Onesimas rella kinoolche.
(Matsah avah amah i nangkuungah akanana amnoh mii, chuta pekva amah i nangtingkho kei tingkho tak a akana veisa.)
Keiin amahta nangkuungah veikhat kimthlah, kei kiril laltu veia kamthlahpei.
Akthratrong rella simma kiamlai amah in nang ningut a keita rou keitlohnatu amahta keisoh inruuia roomthok a kiampi jounatu,
chuta nangin akthra thlou nitlohkha tlohnoh janohta nitloh veinohso, chuta nitlohja veia nitlohchu aveinatu nangin nikdit veinoh avah keiin jakhatkho cheknoh ang.
Amah in lai kaktu rella nangta nakmah a seh i ache amnoh a am aja,
amahvah naichi nangnoh chuta naichinata akral, ringvolna unao khat nanga, amuveia keiin kirilvol, unao khat nanga ruung akho che Akpu akho annih a kirilvol.
Chunna nanginta keita nipainanga kamdon chele, keita nangin nilouloh angkha mah khananga amahkho roulouro.
Amah inta nangkuungah alaal amle, nohle nang nitata antoolna amle, mahchu kei baobeh asehna khanna maluutro.
Paul keiin mah i kikuttal in kimjih, keiin mahchu kamlengtu mahchuvah keita intoolmangche tihtanoh ang.
Oi, unao o, Akpu kuungah nang ningnata jangmekhat darkaarva kikdit. Khrista kuungah kiril kamthlanro.
Nangva trongson namjuih rella keiin nikuungah kimjih, keiin kisonchungah nangin thloiralla nitlohtuta kirom.
Che kei kithlengnatu khumkhat thlouraang keitlohro, alamva nangin keiturel ningen apaalla keita nankuungah veikhat inlenga nakphurhtung kamdon.
che keisoh thloutlohjou Mark, Aristarkhas, Demas mahche Luke inkho saambaan nanimlanei.
Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa malungsi in nannih nanlita inruuipiso.
Leithingah Ringpu in ipa ipuei ankuungah ringraanei anpaalla aje ajea mahche alam jikcha suuk a tronga;
chuta mah aknichuta acheniva amah Asa kupa apaalla inihkuungah trongsa, amahta poot naamtetu lalchun amveinatu thlou athunpei, amah apaalla tukleiramkho aseempei.

Amah in Ringpu vaa paarthrata alengpei mahche Ringpu kuungah louam ahoongtalta amah in veisa, amah atuuivaa trong apaalla tukleiram pumte kool kemma asih. Amah in aleh am mii eita amseenglaia, akchek amneh in ankaang akutchanga inboksa.
Amah in ringroi anchungah ralla akthraming aveinanga anmah in anveichungah ralla amah in akthloirem veisa.
Alamva Ringpu in ringroi ankaara tuta asonme, “Nangi kei Kisa kupache, mi in nangta kipokpeiche?” nohle veikhatla,
“Keiin Amah Apa veitung,
“che amah in kei Kisakupa veitu?”
Che veikhatla, amah in matsah pokta tukleiramma athlenlai, veitu amah in ason, “Ringpu vaa ringroi annaamte in amahta mathruuneiso.”
Ringroi rella amah in ason, “Amah ringroiei li khatkho, amah rojuih ei turella meibommi tuin aseemme.”
Chuta Asa kupa relvah amah in ason, “Nang phompii, O Ringpu ache akham amnoh, akchim sungrolh i nang kurung kunnavaa sungrolhsa.
Nangin akchimlamsehta nirilvol, che trongsuur amjuihnoh eita intirhche,
“Alamchunna Ringpu, che nang Ringpu, nang nipai in nangta thao nakteipei;
“anchungah ralla roomthokna thaova naktei.”
Mahche, “Akpu nangin kulkuung nata thaleimun namthronpei,
“mahche ringramvah nang nikut in nitloh thlouseng;
“anmahvah kmaangtuei, chuta nangvah incheknoh a ammuche;
“anmah annaamteva puun amluinanga maluituei,
“puunrei namthlep nanga, che anmahta namthleng tuei,
“chuta nangvah inthlengnohche
“che nang nikumkha akham amnohtu.”
Chuta tunang in ringroi kuunga amah in ason amme, “Nang jeknaeita keiin nikeh chilhna kamveinohmiil, kei kikchangtonga inbok uche?”
Chaanring akphahsam annaamte turella routlohnatu amthlah, anmahva lia thlou tlohnatu amthlah miinoh eime?
Alamchunna inihta thliraang in raanna iniphurhnoh natu inih in itheih khanna ralla iril imluuttu tlasa.
Alamva ringroi eiin trongraanta sonna amidangta chimleh che chimnoh naamte khoia nohleh trongson amjuihnoh mii in atak atak in antloh nujuih a akchim pichaar tandi phahleh,
inih in vachah liin chaanringta thousanoh mele khatloh a inlit umeme? Mahkha matsah a Akpu in sonna amdangpei, che amahta akhoihmii eiin inihta amjapei.
Ringpu inkho daang eisoh, salungkhouna eisoh, alam jikchahna salungkhouna thlousoh mahche Akseeng Li vaa kutthlol jikchata amah in amdon nujuih a aseempei.
Alamva inih in itrangna ah akthlengsam tukleirammi Ringpu in ringroi athlangah sihnoh.
Amunkhat ah sakhi malanna ason, “Nangin madonna nianmii khasame, nohleh nangin klukanga nakem miivaa asa kupa i jakhasme?
Nangin amahta ringroi anthlangah ste tla a niseemnohme, nangin amahta paarthra leh injakna boorpii namkhumpei,
Poot naamte amah akeh athlangah asihpei.”
Ipek poot naamte amah athlangah asih, amah in akut ah achalnoh jakhatkho amnohsa. Mah chunanga poot naamte amah athlangah am tihtalva muhnoh mangme.

Chuta lai kakva ringroi anthlangah ste tlabeb a Jisu ta inih in imuh, amah in akthita klah knang adourella paarthra mahche injah in boorpii amkhumpei, chunna Ringpu vaa malungsi ah mii naamte turella amah in thisa.
Alamva amah in asa kupa jikchaeita paarthratingah athlen, klah knang adou apaalla chaanring lam amhoongta chap amchapei amah turella chanasa. Alamva mahrella che amah apaalla poot naamte veisa.
Alamva amseengpot miirel anmah anpavah khatning. Churella anmahta unaopasa tih a amah in ong injaknoh,
amah in ason, “Keiin nang nikmingta kiuh knaoei ankuungah sonna kamdangtu, kulsa ankaara keiin nangta kimpaak uche.”
Che veikhatla, “Keiin kimlot i amah kuungah kisihtu.” Che khatla, “Kei mahche Ringpu in keikuungah amlan naoeisoh onna amsung.”
Alamchunna naoei i ruung leh thii ah chuum anphah taningvah, amah atak inkho oh khananga intrim hoongta louva, amah in athih apaalla, thinata tuui am amahta tihvah seitanta ammaangnatu,
mahche thitrih a anchaanluung naichi veia insuura ammeita amthlahpei.
Alamva tak a amah in ringroi eita madonna majoomnoh thlengnoh chuta Abraham nata akthleng atute eita amjoom.
Alamchunna amah in miivaa anlehta ipnatu, Ringpu ta routloh a rilvoltheih mahche malot aja akthloi thiimpu ahukveinatu, amah in miinaamtetu unaonanga veitu tlasa.
Alamva amah atak in madoi aphah a klah knang atho khanna, madoi akphah eita amah in majoom achekpei.
Alamchunna ringramting iniongna ah chuum akjajou akseeng unaoeio, inih inara oisa ta sonna iphoong raangroi mahche akthloi thiimpu Jisu rella madonrei.
Moses kho Ringpu in malot aja mii nanga amahta thlou akthun amahkuungkho malot ajana vei.
Chulata inntloh miita innchunga ralla injah khananga, Jisu vah Moses chunga ralla injah aja paarthra veisa.
Alamva inn makhei akseem mii khat am, chuta poot anaamteta akseemva Ringpu.
Ipek Moses vaa Ringpu vah innsuung anaamtea roijuih vei, vaknua trongnasam jikcharella sakhitu veia malot aja,
chuta Khrista vaa Ringpu innsuung achunga asa kupa veia malot aja che inih in iril malumma imlot mahche innih in matuura in orh mekha achena phah a chet a matuhmele inihva amah innsuungsame.
Alamchunna Akseeng Li in asonnanga, “Mi in, nannih in amahouta nantheihlai,
raprilla chaang keiannia keita raaltlohnanga, nannih nanril matrangnohve,
mahkhan nanpai eiin keita chaang kan annang, che kum sopli kitloh thloueita anmuh.
Alamchunna keiin anmah ringnatluun chunga kimlunghaang sang, che kitih ei, ‘Anmah in lai amrella anrilla invaia sehsei; anmah in kilamta romnoh ei.’
Keiin kamlunghaanga trongchet kitlohnanga, ‘Anmah in kanngeihna a tiknikho luutnoh tuei.’ ”
Unaoeio, cheksilve, chunohleva nannih in akring Ringpu ta mathlah a amlotnoh tukhat in nannihta naniching aja.
Chuta alehting masimna a tunangkhat in nanrilta amtrangnoh natu “Mi in,” tih i amlaia, aknirel khatleh khat bung inthokve.
Alamva inih in iril lumma malot amthronnatu achenaphah a matuh a ammele, innihvah Khrista ah chuum akjajoukha veisame,
mah i asonlaia, “Mi in, nannih in amahouta nantheihlai, keita raal nantloh khananga nanril matrangnohve.”
Theih rerea raal nantlohna angkha tuchoume? Moses in aklokveia Ijip nata anthruhpi annaamkhanoh eime?
Tukuunga amah in kum sopli amlunghaangme? Aleh akthloh in raprilla antak thia anruungta tukleia inriil miinoh eime?
Akpu ingeihna ah anmah in tikniakho luutnoh tuei ta amah in tukuunga trongchet athlohme, chuta mahchu sonjuihnoh ankuungna nohme?
Chunna anmah in amilotnoh rella ingeihna a luut cheknoh eita irom.
Alamchunna amah anngeihna ah luutnatu trongchet khavah ammang taningva, nannih tunangkhat in mah khanna tlungcheknoh ajata pichaar nanitloh aja inih in cheksilrei.

Alamva amah kuungah trong inraan khananga akthratrongkha inihkuungah thlengsa; chuta anmah in antheihpot trongraankha ankuungah achuungna amnoh, alamva mahkhata arungai mii in malotsoh inruuia lounoh ei.

Alamva amlot inihvah inngeihna akhanna luutsame, amah in asonnanga, “Keiin kimlung inhaangrella suita kitlohnanga, ‘Ammah in kei kanngeihna a tiknikho luutnoh tuei.’” Chusalakho amah athlounaamte tukleiram amthron lainata chesa.
Alamva amah in amunkhat ah nijan sirih tihpita oinanga ason, “Ringpu in amah athlou anaamte nata nijan sirih tihpi aknih a inngaisa.”
Chela veikhatla amah amunna maita ason, “Anmah in kei kanngeihna ah tiknikho luutnoh tuei.”
Alamchunna arouin inngeihna akhanna akluuttu ammei taningva, che akthratrongta matsah akphah eiin trongsonta amijuihnoh rella mah khanna luutnoh ei,
veikhatla amah in, “Mi in,” tih a annikhat amnai, vachah asootnua Devit vaa apaalla insonchesa, trongchuva, “Mi in nannih in amah ahouta nantheihlai nanrilkha matrangnohve.”
Alamva Josua in ankuungah inngeihna malansale aknua Ringpu in aktlei aknikhat rella anmah kuungah trongnohtu.
Chunna nga tloh a Ringpu vaa amii turella sabatni am;
alamva tunangkhat in Ringpu anngeihna ah akluut amah khanna, Ringpu athlounata anngeih khananga amahkho athlounata inngaisa.
Alamchunna amah in asonta majuihnoh a intilnohnatu, inngeihna akhanna inih in iluutnatu tranga insuulrei.
Alamva Ringpu atrongva kiring mahche karaanga, aha innih chemseichunga ngeih lileh li; ruh akthlup phaova viit a athrek. Mahche imdonleh irilla amta aromchek.
Kutseem anaam jakhatkho amah amaikuunga inthup amnoh chuta amaikuunga itloh ikhalphao amah amit anna poot anaamte indanglong mahche inhoongbong.
Chunna ringram vanna akseh akloon inihtu akthloirem Thiimpu Ringpu vaa Asa kupa Jisu amtaningvah inih in inara iphoongkha chet a matuhrei.
Alamva inih in icheknoh imnehnoh laia inimjoomchek thiimpu doonme, chuta bilam amahkho inihnanga madoi aphah, chuta aleh amnoh akthloi thiimpu inihtu am.
Alamchunna inih in darkaar amlai inimjoom natu, inih in rilvoltheih iphahnatu mahche malungsi iktuuknatu inih in seenga malotsoh inruuia malungsivaa phompii ah innairei.
Alamva amah in alehrella kutthol malannatu, che ikattuphu katnatu Ringpu tu vei thloua miingut a miikaarnata charra Akthloi thiimpu rella thlou anthunpei.
Theihnoh singnoh eita mahche invaia akseh eita amah in rilvoltheih a daikenga am anchek, alamva amah atakluungkho marnop in hiilla asih.
Mairella anmah anleh che miivaa anlehrella inthiimna ah inkatpoot vei.
Che tukhat inkho injahna phommi ataktalin lounoh, chuta Aronta aongnanga Ringpu in amahkho aong.
Chunna Khrista atak in akliin thiimpu ahukveinata atak akroua inkaanga indomnoh, chuta acharmii in akuungah ason, “Nangi Kisa kupache, mi in nangta kpokpeiche;”
Aktlei amunkhat asonnanga, Melkhijedek aknua “Nangva ache amnoh thiimpuche.”
Amah in Asa kupa veislakho, klah knang atho apaalla trongson majuih theihsa.
Che amah in mapuungpha veia, asonta amjuih mii naamte turella amah in ache amnoh chaanringvaa anthruhna veisa,
Melkhijedek nata amahta Ringpu in akliin thiimpu amveipei.
Mairella kannih in klukanga anvui kansontu tam am, chuta nannih in rungai mahche aklou theihnohchou.

Alamva pekpek nannih i lulok veiphu sachou, chuta Ringpu trong matsahrem amuveikha tunangkhat in nankuunga veikhat inlenga nannihta nanimtheihnatu darkaarmang. Nannih in aktrang saakphunoh a, siilchuh darkaar mangchou.
Alamva siilchuh ruta saa a akring mii in akchimlamseh relna tronga rom taknohmang, alamva amahva naomang.
Chuta aktrang saakphuvah mapungpha mii turelna, alamva akthra thranoh alamma amtheihchek miiturelvah thra thranoh threknatu akroua insuul.
Alamchunna Khrista turella matsah matheihnakha mathlahrei che inih in mapungpha tongah sehrei, Ringpu tingah malotnatu rilthlenga veikhat akthithloua innmun linnohrei;
miichungah kutsih, thii ah inlup matheihna rella, mahche ache amnoh pichaar amunna veikhat inlengna tlohnohrei.
Che Ringpu inta mah i jale inih in itlohtu.
Alamva tukhat in akvaar aphahche veikhat rilthleng tih i veinohtupot. Tukhat in atuui amta, Li Akseengah chuum amjajouche,
Ringpu vaa akthratrong mahche akthlengsam chupvaa tuuieita amlenche, anmah in antheihchekvah,
anmahta veikhat inlenga anrilthlenga phah a matharnatu tloh veinohtupot; alamva anmah in Ringpu vaa Asa kupata anmah rella thingkharh a mathlua amahta indanglonga injak amiphah.
Alamva tukleichunga injoomma khusuura khutuiita a iin, che chi aklin in anmah turella thra anru saru masuuk a tuklei in Ringpu vaa doi aphah.
Chuta tuklei in kulingta moongle kanana amnoh, phool aphahnatu innaisa, che achena avah mahkha mei inhaal usa.
Kannih in nga tloh a trong sunglakho, unaoeio, nannih rella akthra mah chuvah chaanringtu veieita kannih in kamilot.
Akseeng mii ankuungah nannih in rilvol mamuh a rou nantlohthlou i romnoh tlohnohve, tloh akho amchou, alamva Ringpu vah akchimnoh khonoh. Mah khanna amahningah rilvol namimuhpei.
Nannih in namituurkha achena phah a inlitnoh a nannih in namiveinatu mah i kannih in kandit.
Chunna nannih in nantalnohnatu chuta malot khatkho doutrang apaalla trongchet akphah ei anhoongta amijuih.
Alamva Ringpu in Abraham kuungah trongchet amlanlai, ralla akliin tukhatva ming amnohrella, amah ataktal mingta sonna trongchet tloh a,
Ason, “Inlitnoh a keiin nangta doi kimlan uche che kamphorh uche.”
Mahche nga tloh a Abraham in doutrang trongchet aphah.
Alamva mii in tak a anmahchungah akliin tukhat chunga loonna trongchet antloh, anmahchuva trongkharh naamte trongchet in achena vei.
Nga tloh a Ringpu vaa matheihjanoh amdon trongchet akphah lalchun ankuungh ralla khalmo ammuhja hanga amahvaa trongchet in narra amjaphu veisa,

Ringpu in innihtu iluutna phahnatu akjon inih in amah kuungah am matuur khata trong phahnatu inthleng janohthlou inih ipaalla mah chuvah Ringpu in machinthi tih i veinohtrong inih tronga masoh iphahnatu.
Injaarpuun akli a iluutna nanga inihtu inlitnoh mahche incheknoh imtuur am.
Melkhijedek aknua mah khanna Jisu in akthloi thiimpu, inih turella matsah a lousehsa.
Mairella Salem vaa kurung, Akthloirem Ringpu vaa thiimpu kurungeita seh a athatche inlenga Abraham ta intuukpia doi amlan;
che Abraham in aphah anaam somsuungah inn khat akuungah amlan matsahrem amahminga arthava akchimlamsevaa kurung, mahche mah i Salem vaa kurung vei, mah chuvah leh-oi vaa kurung.
Amahvah apa nohle anu nohle anthohna amnoh, anthohna akni mathronna che achena nohle chaan achena amnoh, chuta Ringpu vaa Asa kupa nanga, amah in inpotnoh luunga ache amnohtu Thiimpu vei.
Amah i chapcha a liin tih a romve! Inthohna pa pu Abraham in kmaang kaa ralnata athlen pootnata somma inkhat amah kuungah amlan.
Thiimpu phom akphah Levi vaa asa kupa eiin trongthuun nujuih a mii ningnata, tihva Abraham nata thleng anmah unaoei tingnata somsuungah inkhat lohnatu jathang aphahpei.
Chuta anmah anthohnasoh inchunnoh anmah in Abraham nata somma inkhat aphahpei mahche trongchet ak am amahta doi amlanpei.
Achungbebna mii in athlangna miita doi malan tih i inkharhna phunoh.
Onna kthi nai mii in somma inkhat anphah; mah khanna inkhat in amahvah ringsangta sakhi amlan.
Tukhat in son aja, mah chuvah somma inkhat akphah Levital in Abraham apaalla somma inkhat amlanpei,
alamva Melkhijedek in Abraham ta anmuhpilai Levi vah poknohmang.

Ipekva Levi innsuung tingna in thiimpu anvei apaalla mapuungpha veileva (alamva anmah in thiimpu anvei athlanga mii eiin trongsuur anphah) Aaron aknu noh a, Melkhijedek vaa athlanga aktlei thiimpu inkhat anthruhnatu jangdarkaar ammangme?
Alamva thiimpu thloukha amthlenglaia, trongsuurkho inthlengtu tlasa.
Alamva mah irella aktlei jatih ah trongsa, amah jatihna akthleng tukhat inkho thiilkuunga rou tlohnohmang.
Alamva Judah jatih nata inih Akpu in thlengsa tih i taksa, che mah jatihna thiimpu eisoh jangkhatkho sonnoh.
Mah i Melkhijedek nangjim aktlei thiimpu inkhat inthruhleva onna ralla akseeng sakhi veitu,
amahva ruungtu vei trongsuur aknujuih a thiimpu veia thlengnoh chuta ache amnoh maangcheknoh chaanvaa tuui aknujuih a thiimpu hukveisa,
Alamva mah irella sakhisa, “Nangvah Melkhijedek amathanga ache amnoh thiimpu sache.”
Inkhattinga matsahna trongthuunkha marnop che kanana amnohrella amngeihpei; inkhattinga, ralla akthra matuurna inkhat amthruhpei, mahchu apaalla Ringpu ting inih in innaisame
(alamva trongsuur in jakhatkho mapung maphanoh); inkhattinga, ralla akthra matuurna inkhat amthruhpei, mahchu apaalla Ringpu ting inih in innaisame.
Che mah i trongchet injaonoh veinoh.
Amaana thiimpu eiva trongchet lounoh a thlou antloh, chuta amahva trongchet louva thlou atloh, “Akpu in trongchet alohpei, mahche aril inthlengnatu, ‘Nangva ache amnoh thiimpu khache.’ ”
Mahchu nujuih a Jisu in ralla akthra trongirhna veisa.
Matsah avah thiimpu anmasing khalmo tammei, alamva kthi in anmahsoh inngainoh a amtaningva thloutloh athing;
chuta amah thiimpu thlouta inngainoh a matuh a am, alamva amahva ache amnoh a dongnoh a am.
Chunanga amah apaalla Ringpu kuung innaia akluut eita lai amrel amah in kal achek ei, alamva anmah turella lai amrel amah in ngenna am.
Alamva oinang akseeng, amraal amnoh, atak amnoh, aleh ak amnata aje, che amahva ringram chunga liin akthloi thiimpu inih turella matikchasa.
Aktlei akthloi thiimpu nanga, anirel inthiimna pootkat, matsah anmah alehrella, aktlei mii rella; amahkuunga darkaar amnoh; amah ataktalta ankatlaia amah in miinaante turella inkatsa.
Tak a marnop mii eita trongsuur in akthloi thiimpu veia athunpei, chuta trongsuur aknu avah trongchetna trongkhanna ache amnoh mapung akpha Asa kupata akthloi thiimpu veia athunpei.
Ipek inih in isonna amuveiva oire; Ringramma amtik akliin phompiivaa akchanga inbok a am, inihtu oinang akthloi thiimpu am,
akseeng munna che mii in aseemnohpot chuta Akpuin aseempot akchim ramuk a routloh a am.
Alamva akthloi thiimputu kutthlolpoot, mahche inthiimna poot katnatu thlou athunei, chunna mah thiimpu in jangjangme ste akattu tla.
Ipek amah inta thaleichuunga amleva, trongsuur nujuih a kuttholpoot akkat thiimpu amtaningva, amah in thiimpu veinoh tupotta.

Ringram akseeng munna aniim che ahoongkhanna anmah in rou antloh; alamva Moses in ramuk mangirhtang ansuullai, Ringpu in amah kuungah matheih a ason, “Muulchunga nangta kammuhchekha mah khananga, bilam niseemnatu anro.”
Chuta mainanga Jisu in amluichung ralthloia che trongirhna ah amah in amchun veisa.
Alamva matsah trongirhna khanta insoinohle, innih tihpina i darkaar amnoh uta.

Alamva anmah in anchoihta antuukche ason, “Keiin Israel innsuung leh Judah innsuungsoh akthar trongirhna inkhat kiseemnatu aknikha thlengtu.” Akpu in ason, “Keiin akthar trongirhna kilinlai Israel mii eisoh, che Judah na mii eisoh,

Ijip iramnata keiin anmahta ankut matuh a kanthruhpi aknukhanna anmah anpa anpueisoh inruuia kiseempot trongirhna khananga veinoh usa; alamva kei trongirhnata majuihnoh ei mahche keiin anmah turel kiril maluutnohsang.”

Mah aknieichu aknua, keiin Israel mii eisoh inruuia kiseemsam trongirhnachu maire, Akpu in ason, “Kei kitrongsuur eita anmah anrilla kisihtu, mahche keiin anmah amilunga mah i kimjihtu, che keiin anmah Ringpu veitung, khatkho anmah in keimii vei tuei.
Che tukhat in anruuipi mii makheita matheihnoh usa, nohle unaopasa makheita, ‘Akpu romro’ tihnoh usa. Alamva annaam in kanrom usang, andihrem nata anrolrem phah.
Alamva anmah in anchimnohta keiin kiril invol usei, mahche anmah anlehta keiin inlenga intheihnoh usangei.”
Akthar trongirhna rella intel in Amah in matsahna khavah in huuinanoh amveipei, che huuinajanoh amluikha intha maangusa.
Ipek matsah trongirhna phaova mathruunna khatkho thaleitu vei akseengmun rella anijoom veia am.
Alamva ramuk inkhat amchaangpei, apaaltongah meitaarna akeh, tebor, mahche Katna tol am; mah ita Akseeng Amun an ong.
Innih tihpi injaarpuun aknungtonga Akseeng chungleh Akseengta an ong thiilkhat am.
Ra–ao vaa amrimtuui haalna thiilla mahche ra–ao in apumte athlom trongirhnavaa pheichep am, asuung khanna manna anthunna ra–aobel, adoonsuun Aaron vaa sungrolh, mahche trongirhnavaa lungpep am;
pheichep achunga paarthravaa mahche Cherubim innih in rilvoltheihna phomta malih a am. Mah naamte irella ipek inih in invuia trong cheknohme.
Amah i nga tloh a amchaangpei, thiimpu mahche ankatthlou tlohnatu thiil asuungah injomma luutei,
chuta innih tihpi asuungtong thiilva akthloi thiimpu khopin kumma veikhat ruta luutning, amah atak turella mahche mii in ansoi anlaalta katnatu thii masuuknoh avah luutnoh ei.
Onna Li Akseeng in amtheihnatu apaaltong ramuk injaarpuunna amsoot akseeng amunkhan luutnatu lamkha mahoong nohmang.
(Maiva ipek chuptu khudamta ammuhna.) Mah amchaangi aknujuih akutthollei mahche inthiimna pootkat in amahta amthruunmii antak achim chimnoh romna rilkha mapung mapha cheknoh,
chuta anmahva saak iintuva, aje ajea inchaamnatu mahchuva, akthranohtu hoong anthlengna lai aphahnohmiil ruungtu vei anijoomta amthlohna ningei.
Chuta Khrista in ralla liin mahche ralla mapungpha ramuk (kut a inseeemnoh, inseemche poot inoh a,) chuta akthlengsam akthra ei amaram rella akthloi thiimpu veia Khrista in andangin.
Kel khatkho siiltevaa athiinoh a, amah ataktalvaa athii in ache amnoh inthlokha iphahpei, Akseeng Amunkhanna achenatu amtu veia mii naamte turella veikhat ruta luutning.
Alamva kel khatkho siilchalvaa athii mahche siil aruul anhaalna avaanta akseengnoh ei anchunga thinna ruung maseengnatu tlohve;

ache amnoh Li vaa apaalla Ringpu kuungah maraal amnoh ataktalta inkat Khrista vaa athii khanna, akring Ringpu ta routlohnatu, akthi thlounata inihva chim chimnoh romna rilta jikcha ralla nanimseeng ume.

Alamchunna amah in akthar trongirhnava amahchusa, matsah trongirhna athlanga anmahvaa anleh eita thloknatu amah in thisa, mah i trongchetvaa ache amnoh inphahtu phuta amah in aongmii in anphahnatu relna.
Alamva trongirhnata jaole, trongirhnata akseem amahvaa amramta amthruhtu.
Alamva trongirhna akseem mii in aringsootva akanana amnoh. Athihche apangkal amning.
Oirella matsahna trongirhna khakho thii jaonoh a injana thlennoh.
Alamva trongthuunvaa trongsuur rella mii naamte kuungah asonlai, amah in siil khatkho kelvaa athii tuii khatkho samul in aang khatkho, hissopta, nirik mahche mii naamte anchunga akthinei.
Amah in ason, “Mah i Ringpu in nannih nankuungah trongthuunta nanimlan trongirhna thii khasa.”
Mahchunanga ramuk mahche mathruunna ah anhuuina beel anaamte amah in thii ah akthin.
Atak a trongsuur nujuih a bilam naamte thii in amseeng mahche thiinoh avah aleh ipcheknoh.
Nga tloh a ringramma am poot eisoh intrim eikhata maseengnatu poot inkatnoh janoh. Chuta ringramma am poottal khanna mahchunga ralla akthra inthimna vei.
Alamva akchimsoh intrim, kut a inseem akseeng amunna Khrista in luutnoh, chuta inih ingut a amah in Ringpu kuungah angirhnatu, ringramma luutsa.
Akthloi thiimpu in Akseeng Amunkhanna atak tanoh thii maruuia kumrel luut khananga ataktalta inleng inlenga akatnatu luutnoh;
chulehva tukleiram mathron lainata amah in inleng inlenga klah knang adoutu tla. Chuta oinang chupva achena invah amah ataktal inthiimna veia inkat apaalla aleh alohnatu veikhatru indangsa.
Che mii in veikhat thitu, mahche aknua pichaar thlengtu.
Chunna Khrista in mii naamte anlehta phurhnatu veikhat inkat taningvah, veinih tihpi athlenglaiva alehrella matelnohtu, chuta amahta ngaaklipnoh a angaak eita akalnatuei.

Alamva trongsuurvah akthlengsam akthra pootvaa aniim taningva, che poot khavah aksuuk tupotvaa akchim hoongvanoh, anmah in injomma kumrel ankatpoot akhanna, amah kuungah annaieita tiknikho mapung mapha cheknoh.
Mah inta chekleva anmah in inthiimna poot ankatkho inngaihnoh tueime? Ringpu amthruun eita veikhat ah masseengkhem sleva anmah in anleh kharella klukanga madonnoh tuei ta.
Chuleva inthiimna inkatpoot khan a kumrel anmah anlehta intheihtuei.
Alamva siilchal khatkho kel athii in aleh alohcheknatu veinohtu thlou.
Mairella Khrista in tukleiramma athlenglai amah in ason, “Inthiimna poot mahche inkatpoot eita nangin dinohsache, chuta kei turella nangin ruungkhat nimchaangpei;
mei inhaalla inkatpoot mahche alehrella inkatpoot ah nangin pelnohsache.
Chunna, keiin kisonpei, ‘Anve, nirik injuulkhanna kei turella injih khananga Ringpu o, nangin nimdonta kitlohnatu kei thlengsang.’ ”

Achungah mah in asonla i, “Inthiimna poot khatkho inkatpoot, mei haalla inkatpoot mahche alehrella inkatpoot nangin dinohsache che amah khanna nangin niril pelnohsache.” (Mahchu trongsuur in asonta majuih a ankatning),
chunna amah in daak a ason, “Anve, nangin nimdonta kitloknatu keiin thlengsang.” Amah in innih tihpita amthruhnatu matsah nata amdongpei.
Jisu Khrista vaa aruungta ache amnohtu veia veikhat ruta akat apaalla inihta iniimseengi amah in akdit talsa.
Mahche thiimpurel in anirel ngirra rou antloh, che intrimbeng inkat pootta inleng inlenga ankat, amah inkatpoot invah tiknikho alehta louvah cheknoh.
Chuta Khrista invah ache amnohtu veia alehrella inthiimna poot veikhat ruta inkal phah a, Ringpu akchangtonga inboksa,
chunna amah jeknaeita akehmaja a akchilnatu ngaak a am.
Alamva amah in veikhat ruta kat a amseengei khanna ache amnohtu veia mapung amphapei.
Che Akseeng Li inkho inihta sakhi inimlan; mah i asonpei,
“Mah aknieichu aknua Akpu in ason: ‘Anmahsoh kiseemsam trongirhnakha maisa, kei trongsuurta anmah amilunga mahche anrilla kimjihtu.’ ”
Chela amah in daak a ason, “Keiin anmah anleh eita mahche anmah in chimnoh antlohthlouta veikhat intheih tlohnoh usang.”
Amah inta in ip eileva, alehrella veikhat inlenga katnatu amnohsa.
Alamchunna unaoeio, Jisu vaa athii apaalla akseengmun akhanna inih in iluutna amtaningvah,
injaarpuun apaalla mah chuvah amah aruung apaalla inih turella akthar khatkho akringlam amhoongpei,
che Ringpu vaa inn achungah inihtu akthloi thiimpu doontaning meva,
inihvaa ithratnoh chim chimnoh maromna imlungta thii thinna tlen mahche inih iruungta akseeng tuiia chaam, malottrang veia ril chimsoh inruuia amahting innai reio.
Inih in amah kuungah matuura iphoongta incheknoh a chet a matuhrei, alamva trongchet inimlan amahvah malot aja;
che rilvolla mahche akthra thlou a inih in khatleh khat inthoknatu madonrei,
mii arouin anchangna khananga inih in intuukjoua inchunjouvah, thousanoh tlohnohrei, chuta Aknikha knaisa ta nannih in nanmuhnanga inih in khatleh khat iril insohjourei.
Alamva inih in akchim khiialta iphahnua rom romma aleh tlohmele, aleh turella veikhat inkattuphu amnoh.
Chuta pichaarturel intritna, mahche jeknaeita ramkhemma ahaalnatu malunghaangkha am.
Moses trongsuurta akkhoi mii in mii innih nohle inthumvaa sakhi a rilvolna phahnoh a thi.
Ringpu Asa kupata keh a chiil, amahta maseengna trongirhna thiita mabuur khatkho malungsi inimlan Li ta injak mapha miikhan khalmo salsina pichaar tandi phah i matikcha ta nannih in madonnoh choume?
Alamva ngata akson mii i inih in irom, “Athunglou keita, keiin athung kilohtu.” Che khatla ason, “Akpuin amah amiita pichaar atlohtu.”
Akring Ringpu akut a tla i trihkhop nasa.
Chuta nannihta nanimvaarche aknua nannih in nantloh matsahna aknieikha intheihve,
nannihta akaar akaara miimai kuungah injak nanimphah mahche klah knang nanimphah che akaar akaara oinanga nanichut mii eisoh nannih in chuum nanjajoula.
Alamva nannih in simma ammeita nanringvol, alamva nannih in ralla akthra amtu nanrom, che ache amnoh a incheknoh a am,
Alamchunna khalmo inroolkhaan nanphahsamkha nannih in namilotkha lonnohve.
Alamva nannih in Ringpu amdonta tloh a, trongchet khata nanphahnatu nannih in doutrangve.
“Alamva kak amche akthlengsam amah in thlengtu, che thilnohtu.
Chuta akchimmii in amilot apaalla ringtu chuta tukhat inta aknung inlengle, kei kikli in amah atakchunga pelnohtung.”
Chuta inihvah maangna ah tla iknungtingah inleng miinohme, chuta inih in imlot apaalla inkal akphah miime.
Ipek malot tih i inih in imtuurpot amramta tataksa ta lou, che imuhnohpotta chim tih a malot.
Alamva mah in aktar khunungei in Ringpu tingna akchim anphahpei.
Ringpu trongin tukleiram aseempei ta malot a inih in irom, chunna imuh poot ei i indangnoh pootnata aseem.

Abel in amlot apaalla Kain chungah ralla lou aja akthra inthiimna poot Ringpu ningah akatpei, chunna Ringpu in amah kutthol amramma sakhi malanna amah in akchim tih a ajana aphah i amahva thisa chuta malot apaalla amah in ipekphah a trongmang.

Inok in amlot apaalla kthi amuhnohnatu amahta achungah ahanpei; Ringpu in amahta achungtonga ahan taningva amahta intuuklousa. Ipek amahta achungah ahannoh i amah in Ringpu ta ampelpei tih a sakhi amsa.
Che malot injaonoh avah amahta mapelva veinoh tupothlou. Alamva Ringpu ninga annai mii in amahta amilot che amahta akjon mii eita amah in khaan amlan.

Noah in amlot apaalla amuhnohluung thlou rella Ringpu in amahta akchaak, Ringpu ta trih a cheksilsoh inruuia amah ataploikuungta kalnatu mulipii inkhat aseem; mahchu apaalla amah in tukleiramta amlaalpei, che amah in akchimlamseh lalchun veisa mahchu malotnata thleng.
Abraham in amlot apaalla amahta aonglaia aongna amunkha phah a asehnatu trongsonta amjuih, che amah in ramma seh angme tihkho rommoh a sehsa.
Amlot apaalla amah in trongchetna ramma rapkhei tlasa, miiram taang nanga intrim trongchet khanna lalchun aveinatu Isaak khatkho Jakop soh inruuia amah in thlaamma am.
Alamva amah in amun amna khuuboomta ngaak a am, mahchu akseemva Ringpu.
Sarah ataktal in amlot apaalla atak in nao anpooinatu tuui aphahpei, amah in nao ampooinatu akum athla in vanslakho, trongchetta amlan amahva malot aja tih a aloh.
Alamchunna mii khat in kthinang veia amah aningnata marvaanna arsinanga mahche teencheknoh tuiiboom apaalna sitsai nanga atu ate khalmo poksa.
Trongchet khava phah cheknoh seia anmah in malot a thisei, chuta mahkhata saraalla muh a saambaan amilan, anmah in thaleiah an amlai rapkhei khatkho miijaat tlasungta anja.
Alamva nga tloh a aktrong mii in anmah anramta anjon tih i seeng.
Alamva anmah in anthruhna ramkhata madoneile, mah khanna anmah in inlengnatu tancha anphah uta.
Chuta oinanga ralla akthra ramboom tihva ringramna khat anditpei. Churella anmah in Ringpu tih a an ongi Ringpu in injaknoh; alamva anmah turella amah in khuuboom khat amchaang.
Abraham ta chaang a anlai, malot apaalla Isaak ta akatpei, amah in trongirhnata aphah in Asa kupata akatnatu inchaangsa,
Amahrella oita ason, Isaak apaalla nang nitu nite tih a in ongtu.
Ringpu in akthi luungkho maring achek tih a amah in amdonpei; nga tloh a daang pea trong.
Isaak in amlot apaalla vaknunatu trongchet doi Jakob khatkho Isau chunga amlan.
Jakob in amlot apaalla athihtumma Joseph asaeita doi amlanei, che amah sungrolh apaara inkhup a amthruun.
Joseph in amlot apaalla amah achaan achetum, Israel inthruhnatu che amah anphuumnatu rella amtheih ei.
Moses in amlot apaalla amah in apoknua anu apa in amahta thlathum amithup, alamva amahva amel kthra nao tih a anrom; che anmah in kurungta itrihnoh ei.
Moses in amlot apaalla anrollai amahta Pharaoh asa ningolvaa asa kupa tih a an ongta indah,
kaktu veia alehta mapella tlan phahnatu ngut a, Ringpu amiieisoh inruuia klah knangah chuum jajou amah in acharpei.
Ijip na lalchung avah Khrista rella insaal klah knang phah indom ralla laitalsa tih a amah in amdonpei, alamva amah in aphahsam khaan khata a anpei.
Malot apaalla kurung amlung inhaangta trihnoh a amah in Ijip amthlahpei; alamva muh icheknoh amahta amuhnanga amah in adoupei.
Amlot apaalla amah in laalna budoon thlouta ngaak a atlohpei che thii athinpei, chunna matsah akpok eita mamaangnoh natu.
Amilot apaalla mii in akchaar tukleia sehnanga in aang tuiiboom chunga anvanpei; chuta Ijip na mii eiin mah khananga antlohnatu insuulei, anmahva inphuumsei.
Anmah in malot apaalla Jerikho palta nisirih kooi a ansehche inpilsa.
Atakjuur Rahap in trong amjuihnoh eisoh inruuia maangjounoh, alamva inruk a aksui akseh eita amah in roomthok a alousoongei,
che keiin ralla jangkison ume? Alamva Kideon, Barak, Semson, Jephthah, Devit, Samuel mahche ringraan turella ralla keiin kisonnatu amnohsa.
Anmah in amilot apaalla kurung huunnatu raal anchekpei, chimthlou antlohpei, trongchet anhpahpei, saruung bao amingeih pei,
trihkhop mei anthatpei, chemsei ahanata inlitsei, marnopnata amtrangei, raalla akchek amneh veisei, miiramna raalmii eita amilengpei.
Veikhat akringta kumei in anphahpei. Arou eiva amithlahta antak in indahseia ralla akthra ringta inlenga phahnatu anchutpei.
Aktlei eiva manuih a che khonna klah mahche thirhangkho khit a simma ansih.
Anmahta lung anden innih suuk a ankhoih ei, chemsei a anthatei; anmah in kelleh sadam avun silh a sehtlamsei, anmah in inranna, klah knang phah a, anmahta aminang.
Anmah rella tukleirammi matik chanohsa thalei akchaar ramma, che muulla, sakhur a che lungkhur ah sehtlamsei.
Anmah naamte in amilotna am amramma chim tih a amsalakho trongchet tlohna khava anmah in phahnohsei.
Chunna Ringpu in inih turella ralla akthra amuh mah chuvah inih jaonoh a anmah in mapungpha veinoh tuei.
Alamchunna vachah inrol sakhivaa sumphai in inihta inikooi taningva, inih inkho akriknata mahche inihsoh akmaar alehnata inlitrei, mahche inih in insuul tranga inih imaa a tlaan insinkhanna tlaanrei,
inih in imlotta lam amhoong che maita mapung ampha Jisu ta anna, ameel amaikuungah asih roomthok kharella thingkharhta thoa, injakta usitnoh a Ringpu vaa phompii akchangtonga inboksa.
Aleh ammei tingnata oinanga amahta andah a nannih in kmon nohle ril inlengnoh uchou.
Nannih in alehta indenpia tranga insuulpi i, nanthii tlakna phah avah nannih in indenpinoh mangchou.
Che Asa kupa ankuungah atrongnanga nankuungah bungthokna trongkha namilot peime? – “Kisakupa, Akpu in nanichaakha inleouva lounohro, che amah in nangta tandi naktloh, niril malengnohro.
Alamva Akpu in aril amvol miita amtheih, che amah in aja mii Asa kupa relta saalla akchaak.”
Nannihta matheih a nanichaakha Ringpu in amah asa kupaei nanga nanimdon relna; alamva apa in amtheihnoh tunang amme?
Nannih in amjou nanphahche, nannihta matheihnoh a nanimahle nannihva asa kupa noh sachou, slam asasachou.
Oichunga inihta inimtheih thaleitu Ipa louamei che anmahta inih in injahme, inih in ralla livaa ipaeita anthlanga ringnoh umeme?
Alamva anmah in anpelna tih a kakturel inihta inimtheih inichaak; chuta inihtu athratnatu ta amah in inimtheih, chunna inih in amah akseeng chuumma ijaonatu.
Inimtheih inichaak naamte kaktu apelnanoh ohchungut a lahna vei; aknua mah i apaalla tamma romma theih akphah ankuunga akchim lamsehevaa leh oi akrah amvei.
Alamchunna nikutkhamta domro che marnop nikutta matrangro,
Nannih nankeh turella lam intrimma seemve, chunna kehtlik in lamma ankeh threinohtuei chuta athratnatu.
Leh oi mahche akseeng turella mii naamtesoh insuulve, che akseeng injanoh tukhat inkho Akputa muhnohtu.
Tukhat inkho Ringpu vaa malungsita phahnoh aveinoh natu mah i romve; mahchuva, “Inkhah akjung” asuunnoh natu che nannihta nanivot nanohtu, mah in mii chah chahta ambuur;
tunangkhat inkho ahoong chimnoh nohle heikoh chelnoh charra inkhatru turella apoklai pipatu aphahtuphuta akjuur Esau nanga amlotnoh veinohve.
Alamva aknua nannih in nanrom amah in doipha anditta anmah in indahsa, alamva, amah in ruithli luunga jonsalakho aril thlengnatu tancha phahnohsa.
Alamva pal aja antruung mei, inthim, indum, khur, thli, inthimma indum khu thli,
ipekva ahou mahche tukhatva tronghou khata aktheih mii in ankuunga trongraannoh natu.
Alamva, “Sa luungin muulkhata palle mahkha lunga denve,” tih a jathang inpekha anmah in doucheknoh ei.
Amuhkha maichah phah intritna vei, mah chuvah Moses in ason, “Keiin trih a inchuunsang.”
Chuta nannih in Jion muulla mahche akring Ringpu vaa khuuboomma, ringramna Jerusalem, teen icheknoh ringroiei ujouhoong inboomna ah thlengsachou,
ringramma ming inthun matsah akpok annaam inboomna, che anaamteta pichaar akthloh Ringpu kuungah, mahche mapung amphache li a,
akthar trongjih nata amtuuk Jisu che Abel athiichunga thloia malungsi atrong inthinna thii thlengsa.
Romve aktrong amahta nannih in indahnohchou. Alamva ringramma inichaak amahta indah a itlaanchunga thaleia inichaak amahta indah a tlaannoh in ralla inleusa.
Amah ahouin thalei inloksa, chuta pekva amah in trongchet athlenpei, “Keiin veikhatla thalei khopta loknoh a ringramkho kiklok.”
Mahtrongin “Veikhatla” seenga amtheihnava, inlok aja aseempot naamteva alohjoktu, onna inlokcheknoh pot in incheknoh a amtu.

Alamchunna inlokcheknoh kurung huunnata inih in iphahtaningvah inih inn turella atlokhaan roomthok a mahkuungah malanrei, chunna inih in Ringpu in lou aja thloukha katrei nga tloh a injahsoh intrihsoh inruui athloua Ringpu kuung inkatrei;
Alamva inih Ringpu va matumkhem akchek intruung mei.
Unaopasa khatleh khat, inpotnohve ril involve.
Rapkheina mii eita thra rou akthloh ah thousanoh tlohnohve, alamva nga tloh a mii arouin inromloua, ringroi akthlengeita romnoh a rou anloutloh.
Simma ameita intheihve, nannih in anmahsoh simma amjounanga; nannihkho nanruung paal taningchouvah thranoh antlohmii eita intheihve.
Changvaang tih i nankaara injahna veisa maveive mahche changvaang kukthoolla buur veinohsoh; alamva ahoong chimnoh khatkho miimei miimasal aklaalta Ringpu in pichaar atlohtu.
Nannih chaanna inbaobeh diinata inlaahve, nannih in nansihpoot khanna nanpelna veiso, alamva amah in ason, “Keiin tikni akho namthlah nohtung, nohle nakloon nohtung.”
Chunna innih in iril malumma isonchek, “Akpuva keita amjoomsa, keiin intrinoh usang; mii in keita jangkantloh tungme?”
Nannihta nanichingei, Ringpu trong nankuungah aktrong eikha intheih eive; anmah chaanna aksuukeita madonve, che anmah in amilotta majuihve.
Jisu Khrista vah majaankho mi inkho che ache amnoh a intrimbenga am.
Ajejea khatkho iromnohta matheihna a naniching naniseh pinohsei; alamva imdonta saakphu veinoh a malungsi in inihta initrongpi in thra, saakphu a maara akseh mii in anmahtu anchuungna veinoh.
Inihtu ramuk inkhat am thiilta rou aktloh eiin ohkhanna saakphu ankatta saaphunoh.
Alamva alehrella katnatu akthloi thiimpu in akseeng munna sa athiita anthlen, che stakvah thlaam paalla anhaal.
Chunna Jisu inkho ataktalvah athii apaalla miita amseengnatu phalkuung apaalla klah knang athopei.
Alamchunna amahta ansaalkhanna injaknakhata inih in phurh a amahkuung thlaam paalla sehrei.
Alamva onna inihtu soot inthrungnatu khuuboom amnoh, chuta akthlengsam khuuboomta inih in ijon.
Amah apaalla Ringpu ta mapaak a kat i inpotnohrei, mah chuvah amahminga itrong inarna akrah in amahta imkaang.
Akthra tloh ah khatkho nannih in nandoonta khatleh khat chuum injajoua thou insanoh tlohnohve, alamva ohchunang kat in Ringpu ta ampel.

Nannihta nanichingin ansonta majuihve che anmah anthlanga amve; anmah in nanipeksam taningva nannih nanruung lirella anmah in nannihta naniseel naningaak a ammei. Mah i anmah in roomthok a tloh eiso, che nuurtlai tlohnoh eiso.
Kannihturel ngenve, alamva bilam inih in injahna vei i aja, akseeng chim chimnoh romna ril ammeta imlot.
Keita nankuungah intha keitirhnatu, mairella nannih in ngenveta kinoolchou.
Ipek ache amnoh trongirhna thii apaalla akthloirem sadamkem inih Akpu Jisu thinata veikhat amring leh-oi vaa Ringpu in,
amah in amdonta nantlohnatu akthra thloukha nandarkaar naamte nanimlan. Che inruruhsoh inruuia roulouve, mah khanna nanlita nanikalchek.
Unaoeio, keiin kinoolchou, bungthokna trongkha roulouve alamva keiin chomma kimjihpei.
Inih unao Timothi simnata amithlahpei romve; amah inta inthabeb a thlengleva, keiin amahsoh inruuia nannihta kantukpi uchou.
Nannihta nanichingei khatkho akseeng mii naamteta saambaan kimlannei. Itali nata akthleng mii in nankuungah saambaan nanimthlah ei.
Malungsi in nannaamteta nanimruui veiso. Amen.
Kiuh kinaoeio, nannih in alam jikcha ah chaang an nantuukpilai mahkha roomthok roomthok a madonve,
alamva nannih in namilotta chaang an khanna doutrang amsuuk tih i nannih in nanrom.
Jakhatkho nanvaat amnohnatu che nannih in mapungpha nanveinatu chet a doutranga athlou veia mamuhve.
Tukhat in lousing vaatchoule mii naamteta klok a amlantheih mahche indah tlohnoh a amlantheih Ringpu kuungah nihso, che mahchuta akuungah amlantu.
Chuta amah in aril intluunnoh tlohnoh a malot a nihso, alamva aril intluunnoh amahkhavah thli in raan riinna asehpi tuiiboom tuiisolh khanangsa.
Alamva ril intluunnoh mii in Akpu kuungnata jangmekhat kphahtuta madonnohso. Amahva aril innih suuk veinohso.
Khalmo intoolla am naota amliin in amah in akthrating in orhso,
che akdoon in miithlang an amlai anroomthokso, alamva akdoon in inlou paarnanga amahva maang umang.
Alamva kini insa in inraatkanga inthruh a che inlouta amhuui; chuche apaar tril, che mah athratkha maang. Mahchunanga akdoon miikho mah in athrul suungah triimtu.
Chaang anlai athochek miiva doiphah thrasa, alamva amahta chaang a anlai Ringpu ta rilvol am ankuungah kamlantuta trongchet atloh akring boorpii amah in aphahtu.
Amahta amdoilai tukhat inkho, “Ringpu in keita kamdoinoh” tihnohso, alamva Ringpu ta thranoh in madoi cheknoh che Ringpu in tukhatkho madoinoh;
chuta miikhatta amah in akdit khanna inluppia amahta amdoi.
Chuche amah in akditna khanna inpooia alehta apokpei; che alehkhan mapung aphalaiva kthi suuksa.
Kirilvol unaoeio, nannih in khatleh khat insimnanohve.
Akthra malan mahche mapungpha kutthol anaamte achungtingna, kvaar amlan Pa tingnata trum amah kuungah ajethrel nohle inthleng aniimtla amnoh.
Amah ataktaltu amdon nujuih a akchimtrong apaalla inihta inithlokpei chunna amah in iniseem inihta anaamte suunga matsahrem akrah inimveinatu.
Kirilvol unaoeio, mah i romve, mii in intha rungaitheih, trong inneem, malunghaangah tap veive,
alamva miivaa malunghaang in Ringpu vaa akchimlamseh thlou tlohnoh.
Alamchunna akbuur mahche thranoh ah ril maluutta che nannih nanruungvaa lita akalchek nankuunga amthlah trongkhata ril inneemsoh inruuia loulouve.
Chuta nannih in trongkhata athlou veia aktlohmii veive, nantak nanroua insimna a trongkhata arungaikhop veinohve.
Alamva tukhat in trongkhata arungai mii aveiche aktlohmii veinoh leva, amahvah patjang an anche amuhsaak ameelta ak anmii nangjimsa;
alamva amah in amelta an anche amahpei che atakva jaknang miiangme tihkha kak hanga ampolhpei.
Chuta aningtamna mapungpha trongsuur ah injomma ak am mii mahche mapolhtranga arungaikhop veinohve, athlou veia aktloh mii khavah, amah in atlohthlou adoi amlantu.
Tunangkhat in keivah heikoh ammangta amdonche; amah amleita suura sih cheknohle, mah chuvah amah arilta amsimnapei, atak in keivah heikoh ammang atihkha sul veisa.
Ringpu khatkho Pa amaikuungah akseeng che akbuur amnoh heikohvah: anu apa akdoonnoh mahche trulmeinu in anlah ansamma an, che tukleiramna thranoh nata anrouva inngaak.
Kiuh knaoeio, inih paarthravaa akpu Jisu Khrista ta malot i keimii miimii manaia malotnoh.
Alamva nannih in nanboomna ah ra–ao kutsi thunna che khalmo innaal puunrei silh mii khat thlengle, che akbuur puunrei silh a inran khatkho thlengle,
mahchu nannih in khalmo innaal puunrei aksilhta nansonnohme, “Mah akthra phom in inbokro,” che anran miikuungah, “Nangva ohkhan ngirra amro” nohle “Keiin kikchilhna a inbokro” ta sonchoule,
nankaara nanroua miisak miimai anna thlou nantlohnohme, che thranoh ril madonna pichaar aktloh veinoh choume?
Kirilvol unaoeio, rungaive, Ringpu in tukleiramma anraneita malotting amdoonnatu che anmahta arilvol ankuungah amlannatu trongchet atlohche kurung huunna ah lalchun anveinatu anmahta acharnoh eime?
Chuta nannihva inran miita injahnohchou. Akdoon in nannihta naniroii nohme mahche anmahtal in pichaar koolla thrulh thrulh a nanikainoh eime?
Nantakchungah naniongna injahna mingta anmah in manuih a trongnoh eime?
Ringjih nujuih a, “Nangin nanthringpita nitaktal nanga rilvolro,” kurungvaa trongsuurta tak a mathlung choule nannih in thra nantlohpei.
Chuta nannih inta miisak miimai manaia madangchoule, nannih in alehthlou nantlohpei, nannih in trongsuurta khoi veia trongsuur in nanimlaalpei.
Alamva tukhat in trongsuur pumte ngaak a seh ang atihche, alamkhat ah acheknohna veile, amah in anaamte alaalna veisa.
Alamva amah in ason, “Miimei miisa laalnohve,” che asonla, “Mii thatnohve.” Nangin miimei miisa laalnoh chele chuta mii thatchele, nangin trongsuurta akhoi veisache.
Chunna thlaang thlaangna trongsuur thlanga pichaar atlohsam amtaningva nannih in trongkho trongve che athloukho tlohve.
Alamva miikuungah rilvoltheih mamuhnoh amahmii khata rilvoltheih jaonoh apichaar atlohtu; rilvoltheih in pichaarta achek.
Kiuh knaoeio, tukhat in keiva malot ammang atihche athlouta jaonohle amahtu achuunga jangamme? Amah in amlot khanna amahta kal achekume?
Tunangkhat in amah uhte kupa nohle uhte kumei khat in puunrei nohle akni aknitu asaak a iintuphu amnohle,
che nankaarna mii khat in anmahningah, “Leh oia seh loonve, nantak malumve mahche nanvon mavahve” atihche anmah anruungtu akanata malannohle jangachuungna amme?
Mahchunanga malotkho athlouta jaonohle na thiuning.
Chuta mii khat in asontu, “Nangkuungah malot amkha athlou jaonoh” a keikuungah kammuhro, che keiin kamlotkha athlou veia nikuungah nanmuhtang.
Ringpu khatning tih a nangin namlot; nangin namlotkha thrasa. Khousaarluung inkho amilot che dir dirta inchuunei.
Kboih a amdon nango, athlou jaonoh a malotva akrah amnoh tih i nangin nimuhjame?
Inih Pa Abraham in asa kupa Isaak ta thiilkuungah akatlaikhan, amahta thlouin amchimnohme?
Malot khanna amah athlousoh inruuia atlohpijou ta nangin nirom, mahche thlouin malotta mapung ampha.
Ringjih in asonkha tlungsa mahchuva, “Abraham in Ringpu amlotpei, che amahta akchimlamseh ta ateenpiei.”
Mii khat in malot khop noh a amah athlouin amchim ta nannih in nanrom.
Mahchunanga aruung juura inbaobeh akthrulh Rahap in pao akphurhmii eita amah in louloua, asihche anmahta aktlei lamting matheih a amseh eikha, athlouin amahta amchimnohme.
Alamchunna li jaonoh ruung in kthinanga, athlou jaonoh malotkho mahchunanga kthining.
Kiuh kinaoeo, inih in ralla akrik pichaar iphahsam irom taningva nankaarna miitam in lulok veinoh eime.
Alamva inaamtein isoina jikcha am, tukhat in tronga asoina amnohle amahva mapungpha miisa, che amah aruung pumtekha kut inchal achekpei.

Inih in ison amijuih natu skolbao a kool ahang imluk; chunna skol in isonta amjuihnatu inih in anbaoa thir imluk a aruungpumte inih in ching ichek, chunna atak apumteta matuh a inphurhjana ah phurh ichek.
Muli eikho anve, khalmo liin seilakho aktrang thli in anmahta raanna phurh seilakho mulita machimnava mulisung apaalla akthoumii in amsehjana thloua maseh achek.
Chunanga malei i andih akholkhat, chulata khalmo liin thlou rella in orh.
Meitrek indihte in akliin kumaangta kaang achek!
Maleiva mei. Chimnoh lamma inisehpi tukleiram, mah i inih iruungsuungah akhol khattu veia meia inihaal mahche repnang in meia inithlak.
Mah chuvah alam jikchana sa va ei, anvonna intolla akseh ei mahche tuiiboom suungah akring, anmahta mii in madam ichek ei khatkho madamma thlengme,
chuta tukhat inkho maleiva madam cheknoh–amahva thranoh a amning, maleivah thihnatu tuur in sip.
Malei in inih Pa Akputa impaakna, mahche malei in ringpu ahoonga aseem miita phool itlohna.
Mapaak mahche phool tloh i nar khannata thleng. Kiuh knaoeio, mainang veinoh tupotchou.
Dop anthruhna khalek a akthlumle inkha inpoolla inthruhnoh?
Kiuh kinaoeio, thotthing akuunga chorphol inrah ajame? Nohle nanglirah aruia thotthing inrah ajame? Mahchunanga dop khatnata machihtuii mahche akthlumtuii mathruhjou cheknoh.
Nannih nankaara aksing mahche akrom tu amchoume? Amah in lousingta inruruhsoh inruuia amah athlou anaam akthra chaan aringna ah madangso.
Chuta nannih nanrilla inkhah a kallak mahche akroutukhop insuulna madonchoule, thoinohve, akchim turella chimnoh trong trongnohve.
Mainang lousingi achung tingnata thlengnoh, chuta thaleina, akseengnoh che rapputingna.
Alamva kallak am mahche akroutukhop thrulh mainang amna ah inhaltlam khatkho thranohthlou anaamte am.
Chuta achung tingnata thleng lousingvh matsah a akseeng, mahchuche leh oi, ril tap, inthup amnoh, khatleh khat inrom, rilvoltheih che akrah thra, ril intluunnoh amnoh khatkho seengnoh amnoh.
Mahche akchimlamseh akrahva leh oi amlan mii in leh oi avorh.
Raal in jangamsuukme, mahche nannih nankaara innah insuul suuk in jangamsuukme? Nannih nankaara raal suukchou i nannih in nanditta mapelnatu nansuul khannata amsuuk nohme?
Nannih in divah nandit, chuta phahnohchou; nannih in mii nanthat, miita kallakchou, chuta phahvah cheknohchou; nannih in inkhon inraanchou, chuta nannihtu amnoh, alamva nannih in nihnohchou.
Nannihche phahnohchou, alamva nannih in chimnoh a nannih, mah nannihkha nanditna lamkhanna nanhuuinatu nannih.
Malotnoh miieio! Tukleiramta inpaipi i Ringpu soh jekna vei tih i romnoh choume? Alamchunna tunangkhat in tukleiramsoh anpaijale atak anrouta Ringpu ta amah jekna amveipei.
Chunohle ringjih ah, “Inih isuunga ak am li in kallakho khalmo akdit” ta amah in asonni sulningta namidonme?
Chuta amah in ralla malungsi inimlanpei. Churella amah in ason, “Ringpu in in orhta athing, chuta inruruh miikuungah malungsi amlan.”
Alamchunna nitak pumte Ringpu kuungah masilro. Rappu ta louthingro, cheleva amah in nikuungnata tlaantu.
Ringpu kuung innaive che amah in nankuungah innaitu. Aleh am eio, nankut maseengve nanril innih amthring miieio, nanril maseengve.
Klah knang veive, marhuuive, che trapve. Nannih in nannuihkha marhuuitinga mathlengve mahche nannih in nanroomthokha klah knangting thlenve.
Akpu amaikuungah nantaksaak inruruhve, che amah in nannihta nanimliintu.

Unaoeio, nannih khat in khat chungah thranoh a trongnohve. Amah unaochungah thranoh trong mahche amah unaota pichaar tlohle, amahvah trongsuurta thranoh a trong sache trongsuurta pichaar atlohpei. Chuta nangin trongsuurta pichaar tlohchele, nangva trongsuurta amjuih miinohche chuta nangva trongsuurta pichaar aktloh mii che.
Trongsuur amlan mahche pichaar aktloh mii khat am, amahva miita kalkho achek mahche manangkho achek. Chuta nanthringpi miita pichaar aktloh nangva tucheme?
“Mi in nohle tungva ah inih in mah khuuboom khanna seh a ohkhanna kumkhat amma inbaobeh imlatche ichuungnatu ithrultu” tih a aksoneio, pek thlengve;
Tungva jangvei ume nannih in romnohchou. Nannih nanchaan i jangme nanromme? Alamva nannihvah lai kaksuunga andang che kmaang sumphai sachou.
Mahchu chunga, “Akpu in amdon veile mah i itlohtu” ta nannih in nanson tupot.
Chuta nannih in kthoi kliinna in orhchou. Mainang kthoi kliin naamte thranoh.
Tunangkhat in akchimthlou tih a aromche amah inta tlohnohleve, mahchu amah kuungava aleh veisa.
Pek thlengve, kdoon eio, nanchungah khalmo klah knang thlengsam taningva trapve che ongve.
Nandoon nankhaal kthusa mahche nanpuun nanrei veithra in asaakpei.
Khatkho nannih ra–ao mahche harngou koolhing kalsa, che mah koolhing khanna nannihta naniandahna sakhi veitu. Mah in oinanga nanruungta nanisaaktu. Nannih in acheni natu lalta nanpeipei.
Anve, nannih nanlouvah thlou tlohna kutlang aman malandah a nansihkha nannih nanlouvah ong inga kutlangman kanipeveta aanga ammeikha Akpu kuungah tlungsa.
Nannih in thaleichungah inlek inlik a che nanril mathlanna amchou; thatnatu akni athlengsam khanna nanrilta manoua amchou.
Nannih in akchimlamseh eita namilaalpei, che nanthatpei; mahkha amah in nanithingnoh.

Alamchunna unaoeio, Akpu in athlengnohmiil doutrangve. Anve, thaleichungah khalmo amanchaal chi akrahta luhnatu loutloh mii in gaak a am, amah in anrang khatkho akthil khuta athlengnohmiil doutranga ngaaklipnoh a am.
Nannihkho doutrangve, nanril chet a ngirve, alamva Akpu in athlengsamkha innaisa.
Unaoeio, nannihta pichaar nanitlohnoh natu nannih inkhat in in khat chungah in andah insihnohve; anve, pichaar Akpu in innkhaara ngirra am.
Unaoeio, Akpu ningah aktrong ringraan in anlah annangkha mahche doutranga antloh ankhal antak ah aksuukha nantak a pandam veia louve.

Anve, chet a akdouchekha mii eita inih in tlan akphahta iongei. Job in khalmo adouchek nannih in nantheihpei che Akpu in atlohsam thloukha nannmuhpei, Akpu i jikchah phah mii machaal khatkho rilvoltheih meio.
Nannih nankaara tunangkhat klah knang akphah amchouma? Amah in ngenso. Tukhat in roomthok a tlanchouma? Amah in mapaakna laa tlohso.
Nannih nankaara tunangkhat kna ksachouma? Amah in khakla anpaeita ongso, che anmah in Akpu minga thao teia amahturel ngen eiso;
malot a ngenva aknakhata akaltu, che Akpu in amahta amthrattu amah inta alehthlou tlohle amahta Akpu in a iptu.
Alamchunna kna nanimthrat natu khatleh khat nanleh inson inphoong choulaia, khat in khat turella ngenjouve. Akchimlamseh mii in angenva thlou khanna atuui trang.
Elijah kho mii inihnang inihsoh intrim, amah in khu asuur noh natu aril luut a angen; chunna kumthumle thla kuruk phah thaleichunga khu suurnoh.
Mahchuche veikhat inlenga amah in angenla ringram in khu amlan, che thalei in chi amrahpei.
Kiuh kinaeio, nankaarna tukhat in akchimnata invaia sehle, che tunangkhat in amahta veikhat inlengpile, Akpu in amah alehta a ip tih i atak in romso.
Alehchel mii khat in chimnoh lamma sehta tunangkhat in inlengpia thlenle akthlen miikhan li inkhat thita akalpei mahche aleh chachahta a iptu tih i amah in romso.
Jisu Khrista vaa raangroi Pitar in Pontas, Kalatia, Kapadikia, Asia mahche Bithinia ah inthrek invorh a roi mathlah a am nankuungah,
Pa Ringpu in mansah alourom nujuih a li in amseeng apaalla Jisu Khrista atrong majuihnatu che amah thiita thinnatu acharche ankuungah:
Malungsi mahche leh oi nankuunga maphorh veiso.
Ini Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa Apa mahche Ringpu ta mapaak veireio! Amah in inihta khalmo inirilvolla Jisu Khrista kthinata veikhat amring apaalla akringta matuura amah in veikhat inlenga inipokpei.
Mah i kmaang krel amnoh, buur amnoh, mahche intham amnoh nannih turella ringramma khaak a asihta phahna turelna,
Ringpu vaa tuui apaalla achetum laia amdangnatu amchaang chaanringta malot apaalla nannihta ngaak kemma nanisih.
Alam jikcha ah chaang anna a, nannihta lai kak klah knanga nanimphah slakho mahchunna nannih in roomthokve,
chunna meia chaang an slakho maangtupot ra–ao chung amanchaal akseeng namilotkha Jisu Khrista ta amdanglai mapaak, paarthra mahche injahna veinatu relna.
Amahta muhnoh choulakho nannih invah amahta nanrilvol; pek nannih in amahta muhnoh sachoulakho, nannih invah amahta namilot, che nar akhanna inkaanga domma nanroomthok chou.
Nannih in namilot khanna nannih nanlivaa chaanringta nanphahpei.
Nannih in nanphahtuphu malungsi irella ringraan in anphoong chaanring kharella minna amijon mahche ansui.
Khrista in klah knang athosam mahchuche aknua paarthra aphahsamkha anmah anrilsuunga am Khrista vaa Li in matsah a alousonkha jaknang miime jaknang laia vei umeta anmah in ansui.

Anmah anroutukhop relna noh a chuta nannih turel rou aktloh ankuungah amdangpei. Mah amrammi ringramnata amthlah Li Akseeng in akthra trongraan ei anpaalla nannih nankuunga ansonpei, mah irella ringroi inkho anja.
Alamchunna nannih nanril inchaakve, nanril manemve, Jisu Khrista ta amdanglai nankuungah athlengsam malungsi khanna apumte matuurve.
Sonjuih naoei nanga, nannih in nanromnoh laia nanloutloh hoongkha lounohve.
Chuta nannihta naniong amah in kseengnanga, nanhoong nanva apumtea akseeng veive;
alamva mah i injih a amsa, “Nannih in kseeng veive, alamva keiva kseeng ang.”
Che keimii miimii threknoh a mii naamteta amah amah in atlohthlou nujuih a pichaar aktloh amahta nannih in Pa tih a ongchouleva, nannih in roi mathlah a nan amsoot amahta trih a tloh khalve.
Nannih in nanrom mah chuvah nanpa nanpunata nanphah kanana amnoh ring khannata nannihta maang aja ra–ao khatkho harngou in nannihta nanithloknoh,
chuta insoi amnoh khatkho daak amnoh sadamte nanga Khrista vaa amanlu thii in nanithlokpei.
Tukleiram amthronnoh amaa nata amahta acharchepei, chuta achena lai inna nannih turella amahta naniphoongpei.
Amah apaalla nannih in Ringpu kuungah namilotna am, amahta thinata amringpei che amah paarthrata amlanpei, chunna nannih in namilot mahche namituurkha Ringpu kuungah nan amnatu.
Nannih in nan uh nannaota ril seenga rilvolla nannih in akchimma sonjuih a nannih nanlita maseenga, malungnata nannih khatleh khat ringinvolve.
Kmaang krelnoh a krel janoh chinata akring mahche lai amrel incheknoh a am Ringpu vaa trong apaalla nannihta veikhat tharra nanipokpei;
Alamva “Ruung apumte inlou nangjim, che paarthra naamte inlouin apaar nangjim. Inlouin inhuuimang mahche amah paarkho trilmang,
chuta Akpu trongva ache amnoh a am.”
Nannih nankuungah akthratrong inraankha mah khasa.
Chunna thranohta akdi naamte, mii masimna, ril seengnoh, kallak mahche mii loonna trong naamte nata insenga mahve.
Pokpek naoson nanga akseeng livaa siilchuhta diveh, mah khanna nannih in chaanringah liin uchou;
alamva Akpu vaa malungsita namitempei.
Mii invah indah a alonche, chuta Ringpu amit an avah acharche amanlu akring lung akomkhanna thlengve;
nannihkho akring lungei nanga Jisu Khrista apaalla Ringpu kuungah lou aja Li tu vei katphu katnatu akseeng thiimpu veia litu inn naniseempei.
Alamva mah i ringjh ah injh a amsa, “Anve, kicharpot amanlu akring lungta Jaion na kamthrun, amahta amlot miiva injak maphahnohtung.”
Alamchunna amahta amlot miiva amanchaal veisa, chuta amlotnoh miiei turelva, “Inntloh eiin indah a anlon lungta akiingah amuvei lung amiveipei.”
Chela “Miikeh masuihna lungkhavah mii mariilna lungpiisa.” Ankeh amisuih alamva anmah in trongsonta majuihnoh ei; mahkha asuuknata antak in amidonta anphah.
Matsah a nannihva amahmii veinohchou chuta pekva Ringpu amii veisachou, matsah avah nannih in rilvoltheih phahnohchou chuta pekva rilvoltheih nanphahpei.
Kirilvol eio, nannih nanlita andah a raal nantloh i ruung in akditnata nanloungaak natu miiramna mii mahche roi mathlahmii nanga keiin kinoolchou.

Jental ankaara nanhoong nanvaa thra a sehve, anmah in naniandah a nannihta chimnoh aktloh miichou nanitih seilakho, amah in nanian athlenglai nannih in akthra nantlohthlou anmah in muh a Ringpu ta paar mathrat eiso.
Mii in anseem aiil athlanga amve, mah i Akpu turella, kurung in akthloirem akchek amneh taningva amah athlanga ringve,
nohle chimnoh aktloh eita tandi tlohnatu mahche akchim aktloh eita mapaaknatu amah in amthlah rampuui anthlanga amve.
Alamva nannih in akthra tloh a kmongmii in kmonga antrongkha hou masuuknoh a rimta sih Ringpu in akditthlou,
Thlaang thlaang mii nanga ringve, chulata nannihtu thlaang thlaangkha thranohta abahnoh natu veia huuninave; chuta Ringpu vaa roijuih ei nanga ringve.
Mii naamteta injahve. Akpu amlot unaopasa eita rilvolve. Ringpu ta trihve. Kurungta injahve.
Naichi eio, nannih akpu eita injahsoh inruuia anmah anthlanga amve; akthra mahche ril inneem mahche mii rilvoltheih anthlanga am khop noh a nannihta ralla thranoh nanitloh ei anthlang akho amve.
Alamva nannih in Ringpu tinga nanril namiluut rella tukhat in chimnoh a nanimlah nanimnangta douchek choule doi nanphahtu.

Alamva nannih in thranoh nantloh laia khatkho mah kharella mii in nanikhon naniraan laia doutrang choule mah khanna jaknang kanana nanphahme? Chuta nannih inta akthra nantloh laia che mah kharella klah knang phah adoutrang choule Ringpu in nanijapei.
Alamva nannihta naniong peitaningva inih turella Khrista in klah athotaningva nannih in amah akehmun namijuihnatu tamna nanimveipei.
Amah in tiknikho aleh tlohnohluung; amah anarra a chinthi tiknikho intuuknoh.
Kreikanga amahta ansaallai, amah in kreikanga roumasangnoh; amah in klah knang aphahlai anmahta loumatritnoh; chuta chimma pichaar aktloh mii kuungah amlot.
Inih ileh in thia inih in akchimlamseh tinga iringnatu thingchungah amah atak aruungin inih ilehta aphurhpei; amah sungmunkhan nannih nannatna amthratpei.
Alamva nannihvah invia akseh sadam nangsachou, chuta pekva sadamkem akpu kuungah inlengsachou.
Anmah in nannih nanhoong nanvaa akseeng khata anmuhnatu.
Nannih in inseem insaam sampin, ra–aoton, mahche akthra puunrei silh a apaaltonga nannih in inliingkha veinohve,
chuta aril anthupmii in amaang amnoh, ril tap, che ril dai in inseem inliingve, mah i Ringpu amit anna khalmo amanlu.
Chunna amaa akho Ringpu ta matuura am akseeng kumei inkho amisal in anson majuih a amisal li ah amma antaktalkho inseem inliingei.
Mainanga Sarah in Abraham atrongson amjuih a, amahta akpu tih a aong. Nannih in akthra nantlohsotva mahche nannihta nanimtrit laia intrinoh choule, nannih talkho amah asasachou.
Achena a, nannaamte li ah ril inchunve, miilah miisam romve, unao pasananga ril involve, miita ringvoltheih a ril inneem veive.
Thranoh ah thranoh nohle phoolla phool maleng tlohnohve; chuta mahchungut adoi malanve, alamva nannih in doi nanphahnatu mairella naniongpei.
Alamva “Punsita ringvol mahche akthra aknita akmuhja, amah amlei i thranoh nata kemso mahche anar in masimnatheih a trongnohso;
amah in thranoh nata inheia akthra tlohso; amah leh oi jonslaia mahkhata phahnatu thrulhsoh.
Alamva Akpu amitvah akchimchungah am, che amah amkuurvah anmah in anngenna ah mahoonga asih.”
Chuta Akpu vah thranoh aktloh eita andah.
Chuta akchimlamseh rella nannih in klah knang thochoule, nannihta doi nanimlantu. Anmahta trihnoh eive, nanril insuk inhalkho tlohnohve,

chuta nannih nanrilsuungah Khrista ta Akpu tih a injahve. Nannih nantaksuungah am matuur kharella tukhat in naniongle masang nanroucheknatu lai amrella inchaanga amve, chuslakho ril tap a khatkho injahsoh tloh khalve;
che chim chimnoh romna ah seenga romve, chunna Khrista tinga akthra nanhoong nanlata usitnoh a aktrong eita antak ah injak nanpekcheknatu.
Alamva Ringpu in amdon veile, nannih in thranoh nantloh rella klah knang nanthochunga akthra nantloh rella klah knang nantho in ralla thra.
Alamva Khrista inkho alehrella miinaam turel veikhat thisa, akchim in chimnoh mii turella, amah in inihta Ringpu tingah inithlennatu, ruungkha thisa, chuta li ah amringpei;
simma am li ankuungah seh a akthratrong araan,
leithingah Noah in apaallai mulipii aseemlai Ringpu in soot thoa li in asonta anmah in majuihnoh ei, mulipii suungah mii steta mahchuvah mii kiritruta tuii apaalla akallei.
Tuii in amah ahoongta loua, mahchuvah inlup a inkalsachou, nanikalpei, ruungna akbuurta lonna turelna noh, chuta Jisu Khrista ring apaalla Ringpu tinga chim chimnohta seenga romma,
amahva ringramma kalla Ringpu akchangtonga amsa, ringroi eikho, akchek amneh eikho, mahche tuui am eikho amah athlanga asih ei.
Alamchunna Khrista in ruungta inih turella klah athotaningvah nannih nantakkho mahkhasoh intrimma nanril sihchoulaia machaangve; alamva ruungah klah aktho amah in veikhat inlenga alehnata inngaiso,
chunna akthlengsam amah chaanvaa laikha ruungah mii in anditta tloh a amnohtu, chuta Ringpu in amdonta amah in tloh a amtu.

Akcheche chaanna Jental in anditta antlohjata inih in majuih a tloh a ammekha chanasa, intirhsa hoonga akring ruung in akdit, tuiibuh inruii, derder tih, tuiibuh inruiia houtam mahche trongsuur amnoh a leili mathruunna ammei.
Kochanoh hoongah anmah in ansehna khanna nannih in nanjaunoh rella anmah in salungkhousei, che anmah in nannihta thikak a nanisaalpei;
Chuta akring mahche akthi eita pichaar tlohnatu inchaanga am amah kuungah anmah in amram amilantu tla.
Mairella akthiche ankuungphao akthratrong inraansa, alamva anmah in Ringpu nanga li ah anringnatu.
Anaamtetu achena innaisa; alamchunna nannih cheksilve mahche nanngenna turella nanrilta kemtheihve.
Anaamte chunga amuveia khat in khat turella chet a ril involve, alamva rilvol in aleh tamkhaakta abah.
Insonoh a khatleh khat ril involve, khatleh khat rou intlohve.
Mii khatkhat in amah in kutthol aphah nujuih a Ringpu vaa alam tam malungsivaa akthra aksil amreltheih nanga khatleh khat rou intlohve.

Tukhat in trongle, amah in Ringpu trongta akson mii khat nanga trongso; tunangkhat routlohle, Ringpu in amlan aktrang khanna routlohso; chunna bilam Jisu Khrista apaalla Ringpu ta paar mathratnatu tlohve. Amah kuungah paarthra mahche ache amnoh a paal veiso.
Kirilvol eio, nannihta chaang naniannatu nanchunga trihkhopna chaang an thlengsa tit a salungkhou nohve, chuta lousuuk nohkha nankuungah suuktu.
Chuta Khrista in klah knang aphahkhan chuum nanjajoupei ta roomthokve, mahchunna amah paarthrata aphoonglaia nannihkho nanroomthoknatu mahche nantlannatu.
Khrista akmingrella nannihta nanisaal eile, nannihvah doiphah veisachou, alamva paarthravaa Li in mahche Ringpu in nanchungah am.
Chuta nannihva tunangkhat inkho miithat, nohle inru, nohle chimnoh tloh, nohle mii maangnatu thlouva jao mii khat nanga klah knanga tho tlohnohve;
chuta tunangkhat Khristen khat veia klah knang thole, amah in injaknohso, chuta amahmingah Ringpu ta paar mathratso.
Alamva Ringpu vaa taploikuung nata pichaartloh mathronnatu likha thlengsa; che mah i inih tingnata mathronle, Ringpu vaa akthratrongta amjuihnoh mii eikhavah khavei tueime?
Mahche “Akchimlamseh miita khalmo chaalla inkalna suukleva, Ringpu malotnoh mahche alehchel miieiva khache useime?”
Alamchunna Ringpu in amdon nujuih a klah knang akphahmii anmah anlita malot aja akseem Akpu kuungah masilla akchimthlou tloh a amtuei.
Chuuna inihsoh inruuijou anparuul che Khrista in klah knang aphahta sakhi akvei inruuia aphoongsam paarthra khanna chuum jajou keiin nannih nankaara am anparuul eita bung kikthokei.
Ringpu vaa sadamloomta nankuungah nanimsilli thra kemve seelve, tlohnoh janohthlou tih a nannihta namma nanimtloh veinoh a chuta nantlohja hanga tlohve,
nannihta thlou nanimsilkha karaang kanga anchungah paalnanga tlohnohve chuta sadamloom anchungah akthrathlouvah tamna veia kemve.
Aklok sadamkem in andanglai nannih in ktham amnoh paarthravaa boorpii nanphahtu.

Chunanga unaoeio, anparuul in anson majuih a anthlanga paalve. Puunrei silhnanga, nannaamte in inruruhsoh inruuia khatleh khat rou intlohve, alamva “Ringpu in in orhta indah, chuta inruruh miita malungsi amlan.”
Nanril inhal inhil naamte amah kuungah masilve, alamva amah in nannihta thra nanikem nanian.
Nirilta suurro, jih trangve, alamva nangnihta naknijet rappuin naniksaaknatu saruung nanga inloia tukhatta asaaknatu jonna am.
Nannih in namilotta machet a rappu ramnaita routhingve, oinang klah knangi anphahpei ta romve.
Mahche nannih in lai kaktu klah knang nanthoche aknua malungsita inimlal Ringpu amah paarthra ah Khrista Jisu apaalla inihta iniong amahkhan, nannihta mapung nanimphaso.
Ache amnoh a paalkha amah in veiso. Amen.
Nannihsoh inruuia incharche Babilon na kumei in nannihta saambaan nanimthlah; che kei kisa Mark inkho saambaan nanimthlah.
Malungsi in inihta inirilvol veia khatleh khat saambaan inpeve.
Khrista a am nannaamte kuungah leh oi am veiso.
Jisu Khrista vaa roijuih mahche raangroi Simeon Pitar in inih Ringpu mahche inikal Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa akchimlamseh ah inihsoh inruuia malot ah intrimma akphahjou ankuunga:
Ringpu mahche Akpu Jisu vaa khiialla malungsi khatkho leh oi nankuungah maral veiso.
Amah atakvaa paarthra ah khatkho akthrarem kulvaa apaalla inihta iniong amahta irompeia ringramtingna tuuia ring mahche amahta malot a akluutsam naamte inimlanpei.

Mah naamte i apaalla amah in inihta khalmo liin mahche amanchaal trongchetta inimlanpei, mah trongchet apaalla tukleiramma thranoh nata suuk akmaangsam nata inpella, ringramting amringna khanna chuum jajourei.
Mairella nannih in namilotta seenga thra ahanralnatu, mahche akseeng khiialsoh inruuia rom,
che romsoh inruuia nantak mathrat, khiialkho ralla mathrat, nanroua kut inchalsoh inruuia chet adoutrang,
malot ah unao pasata ringvol, unaopasa ringvolla mapungpha mavei.
Alamva maita nantak ah amma hanralle, inih Akpu Jisu Khrista akhiialla anmah in kanana amnoh chunohle akrah amnohva veinohtu.
Alamva tukhat in maita vaatle amahva mitchosa mahche inlaa a muh cheknohsa, che amah amlui alehta maseengkha ampolhpei.
Alamchunna unaoeio, nannihta naniong nanicharta namichetnatu ralla nanril maluutve, alamva nannih in oita tlohchoule tiknikho inriilnoh uchou;
Chuunna inih Akpu mahche inikal Jisu Khrista vaa ache amnoh kurungkuung luutnatu nannih turel huuitanga nanimlanpei.
Alamchunna nannih in mah ita rom choulakho mahche nantak ah am akchimkhanna chet a amchoulakho, mairella nannih in nantheihnatu lai amrella nanisonna ammang.
Keiin mah i chimta madonna ruunga kiamsot nannih in injomma nantheihnatu chimta kimdon,
alamva inih Akpu Jisu Khrista in keikuungah kammuh anga, keiin intha a kiruung kmahsampei tih a kirom.
Mahche keiin kisehnua nannih in bilamma lai amrel intheih nancheknatu keiin insuultung.

Alamva inih Akpu Jisu Khrista atuui mahche amah in athlengna rella nankuungah kamiromchou i, mii in theihsinga anseem thaminta majuihnoh ung, chuta kannihvah amah amtik akliinta kanmittal in akmuh veisung.
Alamva amah in Apa Ringpu tingnata injah mahche paarthra aphahlaia, Amtik Liin Paarthra tingnata amah kuungah houkhat amthleng, “Mah i keiin kirilvol Kisakupa, mahkuungah keiin khalmo pelsang.”
Kannih in akseeng muulla amahsoh kan amlai, mahou i ringramnata thleng kantheihpei.
Ringraan in ansontrongkha seenga kankuungah am. Ram avaarnohmiil che nannih nanrilla arsi thlavaarnuin anthruh nohmiil inthimma vaar intle meiser nanga maita nanril maluut a thra nantloh.
Matsahremma maita bahab tlamanve, mahchuvah ringjh in anphoongtrong tukhat inkho akroua amah arilnata maleng cheknoh ei,
alamva trongphoongi mii in masoh a antrongnata thlengnoh, chuta Li Akseeng in anchungah chuunga Ringpu tingnata trongei.
Che mii jikcha in maangnatu kochanoh amilanchuta anjuihtu, che anmah rella akchimlamta thranoh veia trongtuei.
Anmah in salok anveirella chimnoh trongsoh inruuia nannihta anmah anchuungna thlouva nanihuuinatu; anmahvaa amlui amiraalkha ktalnanga sihnoh mahche anmahta mamaang samkha inthrolla am khonoh.
Alamva ringroiin aleh antlohlai anmahta Ringpu in kalnoh ei, chuta anmahta repnanga thlaak a pichaar atlohnohmiil adong amnoh inthimkhura anmahta sihle;
amah in leithingna tukleiramta kalnohle, chuta Akpu mathruunnoh tukleiram achungah tuiiliin amsuuklai, akchimlamseh vaa trongta akraan Noah ta aktlei mii sirihso maangnoh natu kemma sihle;
Sodom mahche Komorah na khuuboom meita meivut maol phah ah amahta amlotnoh ankuungah tamna veile,
mahche khalmo thranoh mii anlamchat intirhsa trihkhop klah amiphah akchimlamseh Lot ta kalleva,
(alamva akchimlamseh miikhan anmah ankaara amma anmah aiilta amjuihnoh thloukhata muh a che aknirel amahvaa akchim lita amilah),
Akpu amlot eita chaang an jikchanata khatloh a akalume mahche Akchimlamsehnoh eita tandi malannatu pichaar tlohnatu pichaarnikha phah a khatloh mangaak a asih tueime Akpu in arom.
Amuveia akmot kdi ruung in akdit nujuih a akseh mii mahche akchek amneh eita usitnoh a aktloh mii.
Anmah in karaang kanga, anmah in amidonta antloh, anmahva akchek amnehsei, antak ah thranoh a trong intrinoh ei.
Chulata ringroi eiin akchek amneh a mahche tuuia ralla liin seilakho, Akpu maikuunga thranoh pichaartalva trongnoh ei;
chuta mahmii ei in, suurnatu mahche mamaangnatu anpoklaia sa nanga pok ei, tuur amsa nanga suura thatna turella poksei, che antakva anmah in anromnoh khanna khatleh khat inhuui tuei.
Anmah in chimnoh antlohrella chimnoh anphah. Anmah in suunna sa iin tlan roomthokta andit. Anmah in nannihsoh tuiibuh inruia sajou iinjou nantlohlai anmah antakva chimnoh khanna hou masuuk anphah.
Anmah anmitvah miimei miimasal laal che aleh tlohjahang khanna anril sipsa, anmah in marnop eita amidoi, anmah anrilta salok anromnatu amitheih. Anmahvah phool akphah asasei!
Akchimlamta mathlah a anmah in invaia sehsei; chimnoh tlohta akdi Beor asa kupa Balaam asehnata anjuihpei,
chuta amah in chimnoh lamma asehrella insaal aphahpei; atrong suuknoh smong in miihou ah tronga ringraan anhoongta akhaarpei.
Amah miiei i tuii amnoh dopsei mahche khusuur thliraang in araan sumphai nangsei, alamva kdong amnoh inthimva khurkha anmah anta veisa.
Alamva kanana amnoh in orh trongsonna, chimnoh akringnata aktlaan mii che thranoh ruunga akdimii eita chaang doh a suurnatu amisoh.
Anmah in ankuungah ningtanmatu trongchet antloh, chuta antaktalva chimnohtu naichisei; alamva jangmekhat in miikhatta chekle, miikha mahkhavaa naichisa.

Alamva inihta inikal Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa khiialta room apaalla anmah in tukleiramna akbuur jikchanata anlitche, veikhat inlenga anmahta ansuurche chek seileva, anmah turella juktoolla aringna anhoongkha matsah anringnahoong khannata ralla thranoh eia.
Alamva anmah in akchimlamsehna lam anromche ankuungah inpe akseeng trongthuun khannata inheia ansehngut ah mahchu romma indomin anmah turella ralla thrauta.
Akchim tronglam nujuih a mah i ankuungah suuksa, uii in amluuknatal amunkhanna veikhat inleng, mahche insilche vok in philchop ah veikhat inbuul.
Kirilvol eio, pek mah i keiin nankuungah kimjih innih tihpi trongjhthuunsa, che mah trongjihthuun innih tihpi inna nannihta keiin intheihna veia nannih akseeng rilta kimthohnachou;
tihva akseeng ringraan in anrouphoong trongta mahche nannih raangroi anpaalla inikal Akpu vaa trongthuunta nannih in nantheihnatu.
Matsahremma mah i romve, mah chuvah acheni chunna mii manuih samanuih thlengtuei, anmah antaktal in anditta antlohtu
che ansonlamang, “Amah in athlengnasam trongchetchu ramnasame? Alamva ipa ipuin anthih khannata kutseem amthron lainata louampoot anaamte pekkho amning.”
Mah aksuuktak i anmah in romrerea indah ei, mah chuvah leithingnata Ringpu atrongah ringramva nga tloh a veisa, thalei i tuiinata mahche tuii apaalla vei,
mai apaalla louamche tukleiramta tuiiliin in athlumche ammangpei.
Chuta mah trongtalkhan pek am ringram mahche thaleita meiturella khaak a mahche Ringpu amlotnoh mii eita mamaangnatu pichaar aknikha aphahnohmiil asih ei.
Chuta Kirilvol unaoeio, mah aksuuk i indah tlohnohve, mah chuvah Akpu kuungah nikhat i kum akpul inkhatnang, che kum akpulkhat i nikhatnang.
