Akpu trongchetta mathlungi tapnoh, mii arouin tap tih a amidon, chuta nannih turella soot adou, tukhatkho amaangnohnatu, chuta miinaam in rilthlenga thlengta akdit.

Chuta Akpu aknikha inruin athlengnanga thlengtu, cheva mahni khanna marvaan in khalmo ahou inringsoh inruuia maangtu, che amuvei aktrang in meia innoiutuei, mahche thalei khatkho asuungah am thlou naamte meia kaangtuei,
Mah naamte i nga tloh a tumkir tupot taningva, nannih in seenga ring mahche Ringpu malot a jaknangmii veitungme madonve,
Ringpu vaa akni intha a thlengtu ta ngaakve, alamva mah aknichun ringram in meia kaangtu che amuvei aktrang poot eita meia innoikirtu!
Chuta amah atrongchet nujuih a akchimlamseh mii in an amna akthar ringram mahche akthar thaleita ingaak.
Alamchunna kirilvol eio, nannih in maita nanngaak taningva, amaraal nohle aleh a daak amnoh aleh oi veia am nanituuknatu insuulve.

Che inih Akpu in soot thoa ammi inih turella amah chaanringta mii naamte amphahnatu relna tih i nantak in romve. Nga tloh a inih in iringvol unao Paul akuungah lousing amlan nujuih a nankuung akho amjihpei,

mah trongjihthuun naamte atlohnanga amah inkho mahtrong irella ason. Mahsuunga amram steva rom klahme, mahchu theihnoh singnoh mahche chet amnoh mii in aktlei ringjihta amithlengtlam nanga antaktal in kmaang kremna phah a amiharhpei.
Alamchunna kirilvol eio, matsah a mah i romma, trongsuur jaonoh inlaal mii in nannihta naniphurh a nantak in chet a nan amnata nanmaangnoh natu cheksilve.
Chuta malungsi ah che inih Akpu chuche Jisu khrista vaa khiialla liinve. Amah kuungah peknata ache amnoh akni phah a paarthra veiso. Amen.
Chaanta amdangpei, che mahkhata inih in imuhpei, che amahkharella inih in chimta sakhi imlan, che Pasoh amjouta inihting inimdang ache amnoh chaanta nankuungah kanson peichou.
Kannih in kanmuhche khatkho kantheihcheta nankuung akho sonna kamidangchou, chunna nannih in kannihsoh nanruuijounatu; che inih in inruuijoume i Pa leh Asa kupa Jisu Khrista in ninruuipi.
Chuche inih in iroomthokta mapung imphanatu mah i nankuunga kamjihpei.
Inih in inthimkaar isehlaia amahsoh inruuijoume tihmele, inihvah imchinthime, che akchim nujuih a ringnohme;
chuta amah in kvaarah amnanga inih inkho akvaara sehmele, inih in khatleh khat inruuijoume, che amah Asa kupa Jisu athii in inih ileh naamte nata inimseeng.
Inih inta kannihvah aleh amnoh ung tihmele, inih ikroua insimna same, che akchim itak ah amnoh.
Itak in inih ilehta phoongmele, inih ilehta ipnatu mahchu chimnoh lamseh anaamte nata inimseengnatu amahva malot aja mahche akchim.
Inih inta aleh tlohnohluungang tihmele, inih in amahta machinthi imthlakpei, che amah trongta itak a amnoh.
inih ileh rella inithloknatu inkatpot veisa, inih ikroukhoptu relna noh chuta tukleiram apumtevaa anleh turelna.
Tukhat in, “Keiva amahta kirom” atihche chuta amah trongthuunta majuihnoh lehvah amahva amchinthi che akchimkha akuunga amnoh,
chuta atrongta akngaak tukhat in atak a Ringpu arilvolta amah in mapung amphapei. Onna inih in amah kuungah amme tih i seengme:
tukhat in akuungah ammang tihle amah in aseh alonnasoh intrimma amah inkho sehtutla.
Chulata veikhatla keiin nankuungah akthar trongthuunta kimjih mah i amahtingkho che nannihtingkho akchim alam inthimta amvaarpei mahche akchim kvaarkha intlesa.
Tukhat in amahvah akvaara ammang atihche amah unao pasata intirhleh amahva pekphah a inthimmah ammang.
Amah unao pasata rilvol mii khanna akvaara am, che mah khanna keh masuihnatu amnoh.
Chuta amah unao pasata intirh tukhat in inthimmah ammangche amah in inthimma sehmang, chuche amah in ramma seh angme tihkho romnoh, alamva inthim in amah amitta amchohpei.
Indih naoeio, keiin nankuungah kimjih, alamva amah alehta a ippei.

Pa eio, keiin nankuungah kimjihchou, alamva kulkung nata am amahta nannih in nanrom. Intlangeio, keiin nankuungah kimjihchou, alamva nannih in thranoh khata nanchekpei. Naoeio, keiin nankuungah kimjihchou, alamva nannih in Pa ta nanrom.

Apa eio, keiin nankuungah kimjihchou, alamva kulkung nata louam amahta nannih in nanrom. Intlangeio, keiin nankuungah kimjihchou, alamva nannihvah trongchou, mahche Ringpu trongkha nankuungah am mahche nannih in thranohta nanchekpei.
Tukleiram nohleh tukleiram asuunga am poot eita nanrilvolnohve. Tukhat in tukleiramta aril involle, Pa ta rilvolkha atak a amnoh.
Alamva tukeiramma am anaamte, ruung in akdit che mit in akdit chaanta in orh i Pa ningnanoh chuta tukleiramna.
Tukleiram mahche tukleiramta kdikha maang umang; chuta Ringpu in amdon aktlohmii in ache amnoh a ringa amtu.
Anmah in inihkuungnata inthruhsei; chuta anmahva inih itanoh ei; alamva anmah inta inih mii vei eileva, anmah in inihsoh amjou tuei; chuta annaamteva inih imiinohsei tih i aseengnatu anmahva sehsei.
Chuta nannihva Akseeng khat in thao naniteipei, che nannaamte in nanrom.
Nannih in akchimta romnohchou tihrella keiin mah i majih tanoh ang, chuta nannih in akchim nanromrella, che masimna trongi tikniakho akchimnata thlengnoh tih a romve.
Jisu vah Khrista sa ta andah mii khanoh a amchinthikha Apata mahche Asa kupata indah miikhan Khrista ta jekna vei.
Asa kupata indah miikhan Apata indahsa. Asa kupa kuungah amah alehta phoonga akluut miikhan Apakho aphah.
Nannih in kulkung nata nantheihkha nantak a amso. Nannih in kulkung nata nantheihkha nantak ata amleh, chuleva nannih inkho Asa kupa kuungah che Apakuungah incheknoh a am muchou.
Amah in inihkuungah trongchet amlanchuva maire, mah chuvah ache amnoh chaan khasa.
Nannihta nanisimnasam miiei kharella mah ita kimjihchou;

chuta akuungnata nanphah thao naniteikha nantak ah am, mahche tunangkhat in nannihta nanimtheihnatu nankuungah darkaar amnoh; amah in thao naniteikhanna bilam nannihta nanimtheih, mah i chim, mii masimnanoh, oh inna nannihta nanimtheih khananga, amah kuungah chet a amve.
Amah i akchim tih a romchoule, akchim aktloh miirel in amahkuungnata pok ta nantak a seenga nanromnatu.
Kirilvol eio, ipek inih i Ringpu asame; inih in jangvei umeme mah chuvah inihkuungah madangnohmang, chuta amah in andanglaia inih in amahnang vei umeta irom, alamva amah atakta amahnanga imuhtu.
Che amah kuungah matuur ak am mii naamte in Akpu vah akseeng taningva, ataktalkho amseeng.
Aleh aktloh miinaam in trongsuur majuihnoh rella amraal amsa; alehvah trongsuur amnoh.
Nannih in nanrom mah chuvah alehta alohnatu atak indangsa, che amahningva aleh amnoh.
Amah kuungah chet a am mii in aleh tlohnoh; aleh aktlohmii in amahta muhkho muhnoei che romkho romnoh ei.
Indih naoeio, tukhat inkho nannihta nanisimnanoh eiso. Akpu va akchim, akchim aktlohmii in akchimlamseh veitu.
Aleh aktloh miiva rapputasa; alamva rappuva kulkuung nata aleh tloh a thlengsa. Jarelna tihva rappu athloueita mamaangnatu Ringpu Asa kupata amdangpei.
Ringpu nata akpokmii in aleh tloh a amnoh; alamva Ringpu ningah louam akringkha amahningkho chet a am, che amahva aleh tlohcheknoh alamva amahva Ringpu kuungnata pok.
Onna tunang in Ringpu asanohme che tunang in rappu asame tihchu imuhnatu tukhat akchim aktlohnoh miikho nohle amah unao pasata rilvolnoh miikha Ringpu tingnanoh.
che Ken in thranohkhat veia anaokupata athat khananga veinohrei. Jarella anaota athatme? Alamva amah athloukha thranoh che anaovah chim.
Unaoeio, tukleiram in nannihta nantirh eileh salungkhou nohve.
Inih in thinata chaantingah ikvanpei tih a irom, alamva unao pasata iringvol. Tukhat in rilvolta dinohle mahmii khavah akthi veia ammang.
Tukhat in amah unao pasata intirhleh amahvah miithat mii, che miithat mii in ache amnoh chaan akuungah amnoh tih a nanrom.
Mairella innih in ringvol irom, mah chuvah inihrella amah chaan amthlahpei; che inih in unaopasa turella chaan imthlatutla.
Chuta tukhat in tukleiramna lal adoonche chuta amah unaopasa andarkaar amta amuhche ringvolril atak a amnohleh, khatloh a Ringpu rilvol akuungah ammume?
Indih naoeio, inih in trongah nohleh nar ah ril involnohrei chuta athlouin khatkho akchimmah ril involrei.
Mairella inihvah akchim atasame, che amah amaikuungah iril lumme tih a iromtutla.
Iril in inihta inimlaal laia; Ringpu in inih irilchungah ralla liin, che bilam naamte aromkir.
Unaoeio, iril inta inimlaal nohle, Ringpu amaikuungah iril lumme;
che inih in ingennaamte amahkuungnata iphahkir, alamva amah trongthuun eita inih in ingaak amahta mapelnatu itloh.
Amah trongthuunta amjuih akngaak miinaamtea che amah inkho ankuungah am. Che mairella inih in irom, amah in inimlan livaa apaalla mah in inikuungah am.
Kirilvol eio, li naamteta malotnohve, chuta li eita Ringpu atame chunoh a atanohme nanromnatu chaang anve; alamva tukleiramma chimnoh ringraan khalmo intheksei.
Ohkhanna Ringpu vaa Li li noh ta nanromtu: Jisu Khrista in ruung veia thlengsa tih a akphoong khavah Ringpu tingnasa,
Jisu vah Ringpu tingnanoh tih a akphoong li naamte khavah Ringpu tingnanoh. Mah i Khrista ta andah lisa, che ipektel tukleiramma amsa.
Indih naoeio, nannihva Ringpu tingnachou, nannih in anmahta nanchekpei; alamva tukleiramma ak am amahkhachunga nankuungah ak am amah in ralla liin.
Ringpu vaa Asa kupa Jisu khanoh a che Jisu i Ringpu vaa Asa kupa tih a amlot mii khanoh a tukleiramta akchek miikha tume?
Inihva Ringpu atasame. Ringpu akrom mii tukhat in itrongta arungeih, Ringpu tingnanoh amahkhan itrongta rungainoh; onna akchim linohme tih a irom.
Rilvol amnoh mii in Ringpu romnoh; alamva Ringpu vah rilvol arom.
Ringpu arilvolta inih ikaara inimmuh, mah chuvah Ringpu in Asa kupa khalekruta tukleiramma amthlahpei, onna inih in amah apaalla ring iphahnatu relnasa.
Amah rilvolchu oisa inih in Ringpu ta irilvol tihtanohme chuta amah in inihta inirilvol che inih ileh turella Asa kupa inkhatruta amthlahpei.
Kirilvol unaoeio, Ringpu in inihta vachah inirilvol taningvah, inih inkho khatleh khat ril involtu tlasame.
Tukhat inkho Ringpu ta roumuhnoh; inih inta khatleh khat ril involmele, Ringpu in inihkuungah am, che amah arilvolkha inihkuungah mapung phasa.
Che tukleiramta akal Akpu veia Apa in Asa kupa amthlah peita inih in imuhpei, che chim tih ta sakhi imlanpei.
Tunangkhat in Jisu i Ringpu vaa Asa kupa tih a phoongleva, Ringpu in amah kuungah am, mahche amah inkho Ringpu kuungah amsa.
Chunna Ringpu in inihta inirilvolli inih in irom che imlot. Ringpu vaa rilvoltheih che amah rilvolkhanna am mii in Ringpu kuungah am; che Ringpu inkho amah kuungah am.
Onna amah rilvolta inihkuungah mapung amphapei, chunna pichaar aknia inih in iriltuia iamnatu, alamva amahnanga inihkho tukleiramma veime.
Rilvol in intritna amnoh, chuta rilvol in intri hangta ammaang. Alamva intriva tandi phahna veitu, che intri mii in rilvolta mapung maphanoh.
Inih in irilvol, alamva amah in matsah a inihta inirilvol.
Tukhat in, “Keiva Ringpu kirilvol” atihche amah unao pasata intirhleh, amahvah chinthimii; alamva amah in amuh unaopsata rilvolnoh a amuhnoh Ringpu ta rilvolva cheknohtu.
Amah ningnata iphah trongthuun chuva maisa, Ringpu ta arilvol amahkhan amah unao pasakho arilvoltu.
Onna inih in Ringpu ta rilvolla amah trongthuun eita imjuihlai khanna Ringpu asaeikho iringvolsei tih a irommang.
Ringpu ta rilvolli maire, mah chuvah inih in amah trongthuunta ingaak. Amah trongthuunvah pootriknoh.
Alamva Ringpu nata akpokmii in tukleiramta achekpei; tukleiramta ichek i inih in imlot apaalla raal ichek.
Tukleiramta akchek chuche Jisu i Ringpu vaa Asa kupa tih a amlot miichu tunangme?
Che Li in sakhisa alamva Li vah akchimkhasa.
Sakhi inthum am, ohchuva Li, tuii, mahche thii, mah inthummi injaei.
Inih in miivaa sakhita loumele, Ringpu vaa sakhi in ralla liin; alamva Asa kupa rella amlan sakhikha Ringpu tingna sakhisa.
Ringpu Asa kupata amlot mii in ataktalla sakhikha amsa. Ringpu ta amlotnoh miikhan amahta amchinthi amthlaak, alamva Ringpu Asa kupa rella amlan sakhikhata amah in malotnohsa.
Sakhi chuva Ringpu in ache amnoh chaan inimlanpei, mah chaanni Asa kupa ah am.
Tukhat in Asa kupata amah kuungah amle akring punsikha amah kuungah amsa; tukhat in Ringpu vaa Asa kupata atak kuungah amnohleh akuungah chaankha amnoh.
Che amah kuungah iril imthrumnavah oire, mah chuvah amah in amdon nujuih a jangmekhat darkaar amchu nihmele amah in atheih.
Inih in inihkhata amah in atheih tih a inih in irom, inih in amah kuungah inihkha akuungnata iphahtuta irom.
Tukhat unaopasa in thihna vanoh tupot a aleh atlohta muhleh nangin ngenro, che Ringpu in chaan amahta amlantu, alamva anmah alehkho am; mah kharella amah in ngensota keiin tihnoh ang.
Chimnoh thlou anaam aleh, chuta athih nainoh aleh am.
Inihvah Ringpu atame mahche tukleiram apumte thranoh tuuikhat athlangah amme tih a irom.

Che Ringpu Asa kupa thlengsa, akchim amahta romma roulou itheihnatu rilta inimlanpei tih a irom; che inihvah amah Asa kupa Jisu Khrista akchimkuungah amsame. Amahvah akchim Ringpu, che ache amnoh chaan khasa.
Indih naoeio, leili mathruunnata nanroua inseel inkemve.
alamva inihting am akchim mahche inihsoh ache amnoh a amjoutupot akchim relna:
Pa Ringpu tingna mahche Pa vaa Asa kupa Jisu Khrista tingna malungsi, rilvoltheih mahche leh oi achim khatkho rilvol in inihkuungah am veiso.
Ipa in inihta initirh nanga nisa eiin akchim amijuihta kitheih in khalmo kiroomthok ang.
Mahche chonnu o, ipek keiin kinoolche keiin akthar trongthuun nikuungah kimjih apaalla inih khatleh khat ril involreio tihrella kulkung nata kankuungah amkhata kimjih.
Che mah i rilvol chusa mah chuvah inih in amah trongthuunta aknujuih a sehme; mah i trongthuunsa mahchuvah nannih in kulkung nata nantheih mahche nannih in nanjuih khatkho nanrilvolpei.
Nannih in nantloh nankhalkha amaangnohnatu chuta nannih in nantloh khaankha chek a sip a nanphahnatu nantak nanroua cheksilve.
Tukhat in akchimnata raldoia seh mahche Khrista rilla matheihna amnoh mii in atak ah Ringpu amnoh; akchimta matheihna ah incheknoh ak am amah in Pa mahche Asa kupa annih ta amah kuungah am.
Tunangkhat in nankuungah thlenga akchim matheihnatu thlennohle nan inn akho lousoong nohve nohle saambaankho malannohve;
alamva amahta saambaan amlan mii khanna akthleng miisoh thranoh thloua chuum ajajoupei.
Nang niser asa eiin nangta saambaan namlanei.
Kirilvollo, bilam thra ringdamma nitloh nikhalnatu mahche akthraruung niveinatu nang turella kingen; nang niruung akli thra tih a keiin kirom.
Alamva unaopasa arouin thlenga nang nichaan akchimta mahche nangin akchimta namjuih tih a sakhi amilan in, khalmo kiroomthoksang.
Kei kisaeiin akchim amijuih tih a kitheih in onnata ralla aktlei kiroomthokna amnohsang. Kaias ta kimpaak.
Kirilvol nangin niuh ninaoeita, amuveia rapkheina akthleng ankuungah nangin rou nitloh ei i khalmo akliinthlousa.
Khakla maikuungah nangin nirilvolrella amah in sakhi amilanpei. Nangin thratea routloh a anmahta rapkheia nimthlahpei ei.
Alamva amahrella anmah in rappu amthruunei tingnata jakhatkho lounoh a sehsei.
Chunna inih in mahchunang mii eita majoomphu mah chuvah inih in akchimthlou aktlohjou iveinatu.
Keiin khakla ah ste kimjihpei; chuta ankaara akthloirem akveija Diotrephes invah keiin tlohkichek kimneh tih a keilounoh.

Chunna keiin thleng angle, amah in jangatlohme kiksuitu, amah in keiandah a thranoh tronga amahnoh mahnoh trongtlam che mahkhankho pelnoh a, amah in unaopasa eita lousoonga roulou indah, che anmahta roulou aja luungta malotnoh a amah khakla ta amnommei.
Kirilvollo, thranoh hoonta majuihnohro chuta akthra hoongta majuihro. Akthra tlohmii in Ringpu tingna thranoh tlohmii in Ringpu ta muhnoh.
Miinaam in mahche akchimkhanna Demetrius rella aringtukna akthrata amilan; keiinkho amahrella akchim sakhi kimlan, mahche kei kiringtukna thamnin i chim tih a nannih in nanrom.
keiin nangta intha a inmuhpinatu kimtuur, mahche inih in khatleh khat intuukjoua trong umangme.
Nangkuungah leh oi am veiso. Ipai eiin nangta saambaan namlanei. Ipai naamteta keiinkho saambaan kamlanei.
Nankuungah malungsitheih, leh oi mahche rilvol in hanral veiso.

Kirilvol eio, keiin nankuungah inih inaamtu vei chaanring rella kimijihnatu kansuullai akseeng ankuungah veikhatru amlan malotkharella ril luut a thrulhnatu nannihta tak a majih i keitu veia tlohnoh janoh veisa.

Alamva mii arouta inruk a luut a malaannatu amijapei ammahturella matsah a ringjih in alouphoongchepei. Anmahvah Ringpu malot mii veisinna Ringpu vaa malungsita chimnohtingah anthlengche inihtu khalekru vei lulok mahche Akpu Jisu Khrista ta akjanohsei.
Nannih in veikhatrua anaamteta rom sachoulakho ipek nannih in veikhatla nantheihnatu keiin kikdit, mah chuvah Ijip ramna miita akkal amah in aknua amahta amlotnoh mii eita ammaangei.
Ringroiei phomta rimta sihnoh chuta anmah anphomta cheknoh a an amnata akmah ringroi eita amah in akliin pichaar aknikha aphahnohmiil thirhanga ache amnoh a khit a asihtuei;
Sodom mahche Komorah che akomma ak am khuuboomei nanga, kumei kupa ah inlaalla tlohphunoh ruung in akditta mathlungnatu aktloh mii eita ache amnoh meia tanti atlohsam khata khudam veia amtheih ei.
Mainangjimma amahmi in anrui i ruungta mabuurnatu madonna ammei, akchek amneh eita indah ei che paarthra ak ameita aminuih.
Chuta aklok Maikel in seitansoh insuulla Moses aruungrella trong inkharhlaia tronga pichaar tlohnatu amah in karaangnoh, chuta ason, “Akpu in nakalso.”
Chuta anmah invah romnoh a trongei, raprilsa in antlohnanga anmah in antrongtlam khanna antak anrouta insok a amimaang.
Anmah turelvah lahnasa a! Alamva anmah in Kain asehna ah sehsei, che Balaam in asoi khananga anmah in anchuungna jonna sehsei, che Korah invah alaal intheih a atrong majuihnoh nanga animaangpei.
Anmah ivah nannih rilvol buhdoonna ah maraal am miisei, anmah in intri intra amnoh a anroua rou intlohjousei; tuii jaonoh sumphai thli in araan akthil kumveia inrahnoh theih, akjung inlong;
antak anroua jakhatnoh thlouta apolsuuk tuiiboomvaa trihkhopna tuiiboom nangsei; aksehtlam arsisei anmah turelvah inthimma am athlangnungrem ache amnohta khaak a asihpei.
Anmahkho Adam nata ringnatluun sirih tihpina Enok in phoonga ason, “Anve, Akpu in amah akseeng mii akpulsomsoh thleng,

mii naamte chungah pichaar tlohnatu, Ringpu malotnoh mii naamte in Ringpu malotnoh thlou antloh; kanlaalpei tih a ril masuuknatu, che Ringpu malotnoh thranoh aleh am mii in amahta indangpia thranoh a trongei.”
Anmahvah inso trang, anpel amnoh miisei, antak in anditta majuih a seh, annar ah in orh a trong, anchuungna anphahnatu miita amipaaksin.
Chuta kirilvol eio, inih Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa raangroi in matsah a ansonkha intheihve:
Anmah in nanisonvah, “Achetum laia mii manuih samanuih amtu; antak a Ringpu malotnoh a ring anditta majuih a sehtuei.”
Onna inthrek baak amsuuk, tukleiramtu veimii antak a akchim amnoh.
Chuta kirilvol eio, nantak ah akseengrem malot khanna nanroua inseemve; Li Akseengah ngenve;
ache amnoh a ringnatu inih Akpu Jisu Khrista vaa rilvoltheihta nanngaaklai, Ringpu vaa rilvoltheihta nantak ah amve.
Ril inhalmii aroueita rilvol mamuhve;
anmahta meinata kaia kal eive; mahche trihsoh inruuia aroueita rilvol eive, ruung in ambuur puunreita intirhve.
Pekva inriilnata nanikalchek amah kuungah daak amnoh roomthoksoh inruuia amah paarthra amaikuungah inimngirhtu,
Ringpu, inih Akpu Jisu Khrista apaalla inihta inikal, paarthra mahche akthloi achungah akpaal khatkho akchek amneh, leithingnata ipekphah chuche ache amnoh. Amen.

Inlitnoh a intha a aksuuksam Khrista in amah roijuih ankuungah mamuhnatu Ringpu in Khrista kuungah amlan Jisu Khrista in amdangkha oire; amah roijuih John kuungah amah ringroita mathlah a mahchuta amrompei.
John in Ringpu atrongta mahche Jisu Khrista vaa sakhi khatkho amah in amuh naamteta sakhi amlan.
Mah inphoong trong ita rool inkaanga akpaa arungai mahche mah asuunga injihta ngaak a akseh ankuungah doi akphahsei; alamva lai i innaisa.
Ipek ak am, ak amche khatkho akthlengsam amah akuungnata che amah phompii amaikuungah am li sirih nata,
mahche Jisu Khrista tingna malot aja sakhi, akthi ankaar nata matsah a akpok mahche thaleichungah kurung anchungah akpu veia akpaal Jisu Khrista ningah malungsi mahche leh oi nankuungah amso.
Che amah Apa Ringpu akuungah inihtu kurung mahche thiimpu amvei amah kuungah, paarthra mahche akchek amnehveia paalkha ache amnoh veiso. Amen.

Anve, amah in sumphaisoh inruuia thlengtu. Mii naamte mit in amahta anmuhtu, amahta kusei a akkho miiluung inkho amahta anmuhtu; mahche thaleina jaat naamtein amahrella sinthruui tuei. Mahchu veitu. Amen.

Nannih nan uhnao John keiin, nannihsoh inruuia Jisu rella trihkhop klah knanga, khatkho kurung huunna ah, mahche Jisu vaa doutrangah chuum akphahjou keiin Ringpu trongta mahche Jisu vaa sakhirella Patmos antih tuiikoiramma ammang.
Akpu nia keiin Li ah ammang, mahche keikuungah pik ul ahounanga ahousuuk roolkhat keiin kitheihpei.

Mahchunna ason, “Nangin nimuhkha nirik ah majihro che mahkha Asia ah am khakla sirihtinga machuvah: Ephesia ah, Smarna ah, Perkamam ah, Thiatria ah, Sardis ah, Philadelphia ah mahche Laodisia ah mathlah eiro.”
Mahchunna keikuungah tronghou khata kiannatu inheisang, keiin kanhei in ra–ao vaa mitton akeh sirihta kimuhpei,
mitton taarna akeh sirih ankaara inluut insuul silh a mahche ra–ao inraakna ah alukhe a inkhit miivaa asa kupa nang inhat kimuhpei;
amah akang mahche asam in samul nanga inngou, huur nanga inngou; che amah amit in meibom kvaar nanga kvaar;
amah akeh majaavah meia soorra intlenche pithrainang, che amah ahouin tuiitam inborra kluung ahounang;
amah akchangkut ah arsi sirih achoih, kveichanga aha innih kngeih chemsei khat amah abaonata inthruh, che amah ameelva khalmo tranga insaa a kvaar kininang.
keiva akring khasang, keiva thisang, che anve keiva ache amnoh luungtu veia ringsang, repnang leh kthivaa chapi keikuungah am.
Ipek nangin nimuh eikha, pek akvei mahche mah i aknua akveisam kharelna majihro.
Kei kikchang kut ah nangin nimuh arsi sirih mahche ra–ao vaa mitton taarna sirihvaa anthuptrong khavah: arsi sirih in khakla sirihvaa ringroisei mahche mitton taarna sirih in khakla sirih khasa.”
Ephesia ah am khakla vaa ringroi kuungah majihro: Akchang kut ah arsi sirih akchoi, ra–ao mitton taarna akeh sirih akaara sehloon khavaa atrong mah i.

“Nang nithlou, nitloh nikhaal mahche nangin nidouchek i keiin kirom, che nangin khatloh a thranoh mii eita loutho cheknohcheme chuta antak anrouinva raangroi sungta insonsei chuta raangroivah veinoh ei, anmahta nangin chaang niannei che anmahvah chimnoh a aktrong miisei tih a niktuukpei;
nangin keiming rella klah knang nitho mahche nidou, che nitak ah kmon amnohcheta kirom.
Chuta mah ivah keiin nangta nandahsang, mahchuvah nikuungah am matsahna rilvolkha nimthlahpei.

Chunna nangin ramma khatloh a inriil angme intheihro, nangin nirilthlenga matsah nitlohthlou khata tlohro, chunohlevah, keiin nikuungah thlengtung mahche nang nirilta thlengnohchele nang mitton taarna akehkha mah amun khannata kilohtu.
Chuta mah i nang nitak a am, mah chuvah keiinkho kintirh Nikolai ah am amah in antlohthloukha nanginkho intirhche.
Li in khakla ankuungah asonkha tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso. Akchek mii khata Ringpu vaa paradais ah am akringthing asaaknatu kamlantu.”

“ ‘Nangin trihkhop a klah knang niphah mahche nang innranriing chekha keiin kirom (chuta nangvah kdoonche) che anmah antak invah Judiung antih chuta Judi vanoh ei, chuta Seitan vaa sinakok veia mii loonna antrongta keiin kirom

Nangin klah knang niphahsam kharella intrinohro. Anve, nannihta chaang naniannatu nankaarna mii steva seitan in simma nanithun sampei, che nannih in nijansom trihkhop a klah knang nanphahtu. Thinata akringvaa boorpii kamlan uchou.
Li in khakla ankuungah asonkha tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso. Akchek mii khata innih tihpi kithi in masok masik tlohnohtu.’ ”
“Perkamum ah am khakla vaa ringroi kuungah majihro: Veichanga aha innih ngeih chemsei akchoivaa atrong mah i.

“ ‘Nangin ram amcheme nanthrungna kiromche, mahkhan Seitan aphompii am; nangin keimingta chet a namtuh mahche Seitan in anthrungna nannih nankaara keiin malot aja keitu sakhi akvei Antipas ta anthatnikha phah ah keiin kamlotkha nannih in indahnohchou.

Chuta Israelsa anmaikuungah keh masuihna amvei Balaam in Balak ta leili ah ankat pootta asaaknatu mahche kumei kupa inlaalthlou tlohnatu Balaam in amtheihta chet a amtuh eikha nangkuungah ammei, mairella keiin nangkuungah kandahna ste am.
Mahchunanga Nikolai aknu akjuih in amitheihta chet a amtuh mii nankuungah ammei.
Churella nang niril thlengro, chunohleva keiin ankuungah intha thlengtung, che kibaona chemseiin anmahta raal kantlohpi tuei.

Li in khakla ankuungah asonkha tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso. Akchek khata mathup a asih matsah steta asaaknatu kimlantu, mahche achunga aktharming inijh lung inngoukhat amah kuungah kamlantu, mah mingchu akphahmii khanoh a tukhat inkho romnoh ei.’ ”
“Thatria ah am khakla vaa ringroi kuungah majihro: Meibom nanga intruung amit am, mahche meia insoorche pithrainang akeh majaa am Ringpu Asa kupa vaa atrong mah i.
“ ‘Keiin nang nithlou, nang rilvol, nangin nimlot, niroutloh, nidouchek kirom, juktoolna nithlouin matsahna nitlohchungah aral.

Chuta atak anroua keivah trongphoong kumeiangta inson Jejebel ta nangin nimjarella nangkuungah kindahna ste am. Kei roijuih eita amah kumei in kumei kupa chimnoh hoongah inchun khatkho leilia inkat inthiimna pootta ansaaknatu matheih a anmahta masimna a asehpiei.
Amah in kumei kupa chimnoh hoongnata aril thlengnatu lai kimlan chuta amah in arilthleng indah.
Anro, amahta mi innata ihnachungah kilontu, che anmah anthlounata anril thlengnoh eileva, amahsoh inruuia miimei miimasal laalthlou aktloh eita trihkhop klah kanangah kithlaaktuei;
che amah asaeita kithattuei. Mahche malungleh rilta akjonkha keisang tihkha khakla annaamte in anromtu. Che matikcha nanthlou nujuih a keiin nannihta mii khatkhat kamlan uchou.
Chuta Thatria ah am aktlei tingna mah matheihna ita chet a amtuhnoh, mahchuche Seitan rella thuuk a akromnoh, nankuungah kisonchou, keiin nanchungah aktlei pootrik nanimphurh nohtung,
Keiin kithleng nohmiil nankuungah amkha chet a matuhve.
Raal akchek mii mahche achena phah a keithlou aktloh amahninga jaatboom anchungah paalnatu amah kuungah tuui kimlantu,
che amah in mah thirsung khasoh inruuia anmah anchungah paaltu, beel anseemta koinanga, anmahta invuia kikhoihtuei, mah i keiin Pa kuungnata tuui kiphah khasa;
che keiin amah kuungah thlavaarnu kimlantu.
Li in khakla ankuungah asonkha tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso.’ ”
“Che Sardis ah am khakla vaa ringroi kuungah majihro: ‘Ringpu vaa Li sirih mahche arsi am amahvaa atrongi.
“ ‘Keiin nang nithloueita kirom; nang ring mangcheta nikmingvah am, chuta nangvah thisache.
Inthourosa, che thisamma am anmahta matrangeiro, alamva kei Ringpu amit anna nang nithloukha mapungpha veia tuuknoh ang.

Nangin jangta niphahme mahche nitheihme tihkha intheihro, mahchu ngaak a majuih a niril thlengro. Nanginta inthounoh cheleva keiin inrunanga nikuungah thlengtung, keiin jaknang pungkhanna nikuungah thlengtungme romnoh uche.
Chuta anmah anpuun anreita ambuurnoh mii steva anming Sardis nanga nang nitaveia ammei, anmahva matikcha taningeivah anmah in puunngou silh a keisoh sehjou tu ung.
Raal akchek mii kuungah keiin inngou puunrei kimsilhtu, che amah akming akring niriknata mamuhnohtung; che keiin amah akmingta pa amaikuungah khatkho amah ringroi anmaikuungah kiphoongtu.
Li in khakla ankuungah asonkha tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso.’ ”
“Che Philadelphia ah am khakla vaa ringroi kuungah majihro: ‘Akseeng khat, akchim khat, Devit vaa chapi akchoi, amhoongchek tukhat inkho mahoongnoh tupot amah in asontrong oh i.

“ ‘Keiin nithlou eikha kirom. Anro, tukhat inkho khaar acheknoh inhoonga thongkhat nang nimaikuungah kisih nang nituui steta amning tih a kirom, che nangin keitrongta ngaak a sehche mahche keimingta indahnohche.

Anro, Seitan vaa Sinakok mii eita keiin kiseemtuei, antak in Judiung antihche Judi vanoh ei, chuta amichinthi a aktrong anmahta nangkuungah kamththleng tuei, che nang nikehkuungah amithruuntu, che keiin nangta kirilvolche tihkha anmah kuungah kimromtuei.
Alamva keitrongta nangin doutranga ngaak a sehtaning cheva tukleiram apumte thaleichungah akthlengsam chaang anna pung khannata keiin nangta kikemuche.
Kei intha a thlengusang; tukhat in khonang boorpiita namma naklohnohnatu, nangin nisihkhata chet a matuhro.

Raalchek amahkhata kei Ringpu akseeng thlaamvaa kukchokhat kimveitu, che amah in tikniakho ohkhannata inthruhnohtu, mahche kei Ringpu vaa akming, kei Ringpu tingna ringramnata trum akthar Jerusalem, tihva kei Ringpu vaa khuuboom akming che kei kikming akthar amah kuungah kimjihtu.
Li in khakla ankuungah asonkha tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso.’ ”
“ ‘Keiin nang nithloueita kirom: Nangvah daikho dainohche mahche insaakho insaanohche. Nangin dai nohle insa niveinatu keiin kikditche!
Chunna, nangva lumphuunche, daikho dairemnohche insaakho insaa remnohche nangi kibaonata kamsah uche.
Alamva nangin nison, keiva doonsang, tlansang, kivaatna jakhatkho amnohsang; chuta nangvah kireipak sihsang, rilvolnasang, inransang, kimit chosang mahche athlaisang tih i nitak in romnohche.

Alamchunna nangin meia insoorche ra–ao keiningnata nikleinatu nangta kikchaakche. Mah chuvah nangin nidoonnatu kimtheihche, anngou puunrei nisilhnatu che puunrei silhnoh a niamkha indanga injak niphahnoh natu khatkho nangin nimuhnatu nimit a thao teiro.
Keiin kirilvol miita kikchaak che kiraan; chunna niril maluutro mahche niril thlengro.
Anro, thongah ngirra kichum; tukhat in kei kiroolhouta theih a inn khata mahoongle, keiin amah kuungah luuttung keiin amahsoh kisaakjoutu che amah in keisoh asaakjoutu.
Keiinkho raalchek a keipaso inruuia amah phompii ah inbokjou khnanga, tukhat raal akchek miikha keisoh inruuia kei phompii ah inbokjounatu kimjatu.
Li in khakla ankuunga asonkha tunangkhat in arungeihnatu amkuur am miikhan rungaiso.’ ”

Mah i aknua keiin kian in anro, ringraamma thong inkhat inhoonga am! Che keiin matsah kitheih roolhouvah pik ul hounanga: Keiningah keisonang, “Tiingtonga kalro, che mah i aknua aksuuksam nikuungah nammuhtang.”
Kak hang akhanna Li in kitak ah amma kamruuiang, che anro, ringramma phompii khat ngirra am, phompii chungah tumekhat inbok a am!
Che ohkhanna anbokkha kian in jaspar lung khatkho karnelian lungnang, phompii khata inhilla imerel lungnang sarbongin akhal.
Phompiita inhiilla aktlei phompii sopnihlei manli am, mahche phompii anchungah puunngou silh a mahche anmah ankangah ra–ao vaa boorpii khumma anparuul sopnihlei manli inbok a ammei.
Phompii khannata kini inthla, keklei tla mahche hou inkhat inthruh; che phompii amaikuungah meiser sirih intaara am, mah chuvah Ringpu vaa Li sirih ei;
mahche phompii maikuungah seengbenga indang tuiiboomvaa pitjang inkhat am.
Mahchu phompiita hiilla am akring phompii apangnaamte aknung amai amit sip a sa manli am.
Matsahrem akring kutseemsa in saruungnang, innih tihpi akring kutseemsa in siilchalnang, inthumtiihpi akring kutseemsa in miimainang, manli tihpi akring kutseemsa in akjuung barmunang.

Akring kutseemsa manli khannasa inkhat khat ah amthlah kuruk kuruk ammei, che anmah antak apaaltong che asuungtonga anmit in sip a ammei, mahche anmah in suun jaan tiknikho inngainoh a laa antlohchuva, “Akseeng, akseeng, akseeng, louamche, pekkho am mahche akthlengsam akho, Akchek amnehvaa Akpu Ringpu che!”
Phompiichung akhanna anbok ache amnoh a ring amah kuungah akring kutseem eiin paarthra, injah khatkho mapaakna amilan.
Anparuul sopnihlei manli in phompii chungah anbok amaikuungah intolhsei, che ache amnoh a ring amahta anmah in amithruunpei; anmah boorpiita phompii maikuungah loonna laa antloh,
“Kannivaa Akpu Ringpu nangva matikchache, paarthra, injahna che tuui naamte nangin niseempei, anaamte nangin namdon nujuih a anmahta niseempei che ringsei.”
Phompii chungah anbok amah akchangkut asuung khatkho aknungtonga injih chum sirih innam injuul nirikkhat keiin kimuh;
mahchuche akraang ringroi inkhat in roolsuukta onga asonkha keiin kimuhpei, “Injuul nirik ita amhoongchek mahche mah chum sirih ita akhoihchek matikcha tunang amme?”
Ringramma nohle thaleichungah nohle thaleinuuia ak am tukhat inkho mah injuul nirikta mahoong nohle mahchuta an cheknoh ei,
che mah injuul nirikchuta amhoong nohle mah asuungta ak anchek matikcha tukhatkho intuuknoh khanna keiin trapsang.
Cheva anparuul ankaarna khat in keita keisonang, “Trapnohro; anro, Judah jaatna saruung, Devit vaa akjungin injuul nirikta che mah chum sirihta amhoongnatu raal achekpei.”

Che phompii khatkho akring kutseemsa manli ankaara mahche anparuul kaara, aki sirih leh amit sirih am anthatchenang sadamte inkhat ngir keiin kimuh. Anmah sirih chuvah Ringpu in thalei pumtea amthlah Ringpu vaa Li sirihsei;
sadamte in phompii ah anbok amah akchangtonga injuul nirikta amah in alohpei

che amah in injuul nirikkhata alohlaia akring kutseemsa manli khatkho anparuul sopnihlei manli in sadamte amaikuungah inriilsei, anmah khatkhat in snanta mahche akseeng mii in anngenna amrimtui haalna in sip ra–ao kameita anchoih

anmah in laa akthar tloh a antih, “Injuul nirikkhata aklou che mah chumta amhoong nangvah matikchache, alamva nangta nanthatpei mahche jaat, trong, mii khatkho jaatboom annaamte nata nang nithii in Ringpu turella mii eita nithlokpei,
che anmahta kannih Ringpu turella kurung huunna mahche thiimpu kmiveiei, che anmah in thaleichunga paaltuei.”
Che keiin kimuh, mahche phompii, akring kutseem, che anparuul eita ihiilla am ringroi tam anrolhouta keiin kitheih. Anmahva teen icheknoh akpulchunga akpul che akpul reijachunga akpul reijaei,
Anmah anroolhouin inkaanga anson, “Tuui, lal, lousing, anchek amneh, injah, khatkho doi paarthra akphah inthatche sadamtekha matikcha!”

Mahche ringramma, thaleichungah, thaleinuuiah, tuiiboom asuungah, che akring kutseemrel in mah ita anson keiin kitheihpei, “Phompii achungah anbok mahche sadamte kuungah doi, injah, paarhtra che ache amnoh akchek amneh am veiso.!”
Chunna akring kutseem manli in antih “Amen!” Cheva anparuul eiin intoltlep a amithruunpei.
Ipek sadamte in chum sirih ankaar nata inkhat amhoonglaia keiin kimuhpei, che akring kutseemsa manli ankaarna inkhat in keklei tla ahounanga, “Thlengro!” tih a ason keiin kitheihpei.
Che anro, keiin skol inngoukhat kimuh, mah skol akthouin phalkhat achoih, amah kuungah boorpiikhat amlan, che amah in raalchek raalchek a che raaltloh a seh.
Sadamte khanna innih tihpi chumta amhoonglaia, innih tihpi akring kutseem khanna “Thlengro!” tih a keisonta kitheih.
Mahche aktlei intle skolkhat inthruhsa, mah skol akthou kuungah thaleichungah leh–oita alohnatu amjapei, chunna anmah in khatleh khat inthat che amah kuungah chemsei anrolkhat amlanpei.
Sadamte khanna inthumtihpi chumta amhoonglaia, inthumtihpi akring kutseem in, “Thlengro!” tih a keison kitheihpei. Cheva anro, skolvom khat kammuh ang, skol akthou akut ah choi inkhat achoih;
akring kutseem manli ankaar nata roolhou khat kitheihpei, “Nikhat kutlang manli suuk a saruk inthum, che nikhat kutlang manli suuk a niim thaoleh ngangli atuii saruk khat mamaang nohro!”
Sadamte khanna manli tihpi chumta amhoonglaia, manli tihpi akring kutseem khanna “Thlengro!” tih a keison roolhou kitheih.

Mahchu keiin kimuh, che anro, intham skol akthou akmingvah Kithi antih che Ringpu in aknuta ajuih; mahche thaleita manlisuung inkhatchunga chemseiin buhchaal in, kna ksa in, kithi in, mahche thaleina raprilsa eiin anthatnatu ankuungah tuui amlanpei.
Samdamte khanna ranga tihpi chumta amhoonglai, Ringpu trong rella mahche anmah in amilan sakhi kharella anthatpot ruungvaa li eita thiilkuung anuuia kimuhpei;
anmah in rool inkaang houa onga antih, “Akthloirem Akpu, akseeng mahche akchim, thaleichungah am anchungah nangin pichaar tloh a, jikcha soot a kannih kanthiivaa leiman thungnoh ucheme?”
Cheva anmah khatkhatta inluutngou insuul amlannei anmahsoh roijuih veijouei mahche anmah unao eita tanga that anchenohmiil anmah in lai kakva inngai umangei.
che aktrang thli in araanlai phalbina thotthei akminnoh trilnanga, marvaanna arsi in thaleichung tlasei;
injuul niriknanga marvaankho kak hanga injuulla maangsa, che muul naamte mahche tuiikoiram naamte anmah anmah anphomnata alohkirpei.
Cheva thaleina kurungin che akliin eiin, raalmii aklok eiin, akdoon eiin, aktrang eiin, miinaam naichi mahche thlaang thlaang eiin khursuungah mahche muul lungkaara inthupsei,
anmah in muullei mahche lungpii eita onga antih, “Kannih kanchungah tlavesa che phompii chungah anbok amah maikungnata, mahche sadamte in amlunghaang khannata kanimthuprosa;
alamva anmah in amilung inhaangna akliin aknikha thlengsa, che amah amaikuungah tunang in ngir achekume?”
Mah i aknua thalei akiing manlia ringroi manli in ngirra am kimuh. Thaleiah nohle tuiiboomma nohle aktlei thingkhat achungah jangkhat thli in araangnoh natu, anmah in thaleina thli manlita amituh
Ringpu vaa chum akchoi aktlei ringroi inkhat in nisuuktong nata achungtonga kal keiin kimuh, che thalei khatkho tuiiboomta masoknatu tuui amlan ringroi manlikuungah onga ason,
“Kannih in Ringpu aroieita anmah amichalla chum kansunnohmiil thaleita nohle tuiiboomta nohle thingeita masok mamaang tlohnoh eive.”
Che chum anampot amasingta keiin kitheihpei, Israel jaitihrel ansa kupata chum anam anmasingkha choi khat che akpul soplilei manli ei,
Judah jatih nata mii akpul somleinih chum anampei. Reuben jatih nata mii akpul somleinih, Kat jatih nata mii akpul somleinih,
Aser jatih nata mii akpul somleinih, Naphtali jatih nata mii akpul somleinih, Manasseh jatih nata mii akpul somleinih,
Simeon jatih nata mii akpul somleinih, Levi jatih nata mii akpul somelinih, Iskhar jatih nata mii akpul somleinih,
Jebulun jatih nata mii akpul somleinih, Joseph jatih nata mii akpul somleinih, Benjamin jatih nata mii akpul somleinih eita chum anampei.

Mah i aknua keiin kimuh, tukhat inkho teen ancheknoh miitam, jatboomnaam nata, jatihrel nata mahche trong naamte tingnata puungou insuul silh a mahche ankut ah tuum abaak choia miitamin phompii ah che sadamte amaikuungah ngirsei,
che ongsei, “Chaanringvaa phompii chungah anbok inih Ringpu mahche sadamte tingna!”
Che ringroi naamtein, phompii, anparuul, mahche akring kutseem manlita inhiilla ngirra ammei, che phompii maikuungah intolhtlep a Ringpu ta amithruunpei,
Che anson, “Amen! Doiphahthra, paarthra, lousing, mapaak, injahna, tuui mahche akchek amneh ache amnoh a inih Ringpu in paal veiso! Amen.”
Cheva anparuul suungna khat in keita keisonang, “Insuul puunngou aksilh ei i tueime? Che anmah i ramnata thleng eime?”

Keiin amah kuungah kison, “Lulok nangin nirom.” Che amah in keikuungah ason, “Anmah i trihkhop a klah knang phahna khannata inthruh ei che anmah in insuul puunrei eikha sadamte vaa athii khanna amingoupei.
Alamchunna anmah in Ringpu phompii maikuungah amma anmah in suun jaan amah mathruunna thlaamma amahta rou antloh; mahche phompii chungah anbok in anmah ankaara luuttu.
Anmah in veikhat inlenga traamnoh usei, tuiiraal tihkho amnoh usei, kini insaa inkho jaia kchaar tihkho amnoh usei.
Alamva phompii alaia akm Sadamte in anmahta aseltuei, mahche akring Ringpu vaa dopkhanna anmahta asehpi tuei; mahche Ringpu in anmah anmitnata ruithli naamtea anuultuei.”
Sadamte in sirih tihpi chum amhoonglai, pungkhaivak ringramma jakhatkho ahoula intheihloua daichritsa.
Ringpu amaikuungah akngir ringroi sirih che ankuungah pik ul sirih amlankha keiin kimuh.
Che mekruk haalna ra–ao kam akchoi aktlei ringroi khat in thlenga thiilkuunga ngirsa; che phompii amaitalla am ra–ao vaa thiilkuung achungah akseeng mii annaam in mekruk tam amlanpei,
Che ringroi akutnata Ringpu amaikuungah mekruk meikhukhan akseeng mii in anngenkhasoh kalsa.
Che ringroi in mekruk haalna kamkha alohpei, mahche thiilkuungna meita thaleichungah ahunlonpei; mah khanna khu inri, khalmo houtam, kini inthla che runaangnu thousa.
Pik ul sirih akchoi ringroi sirih in pik ul antumnatu inchaangsei.

Matsahna ringroi in amah pik ulta atumpei, cheva khurah mahche mei in thiisoh inpoolla tlasa, che mah eichuta thaleichungah tlasei; che thalei in inthum suunga khat kaangsa, thing eikho inthumsunga khat kaangsei, mahche in em inlou naamte kaangkirsei.
Innih tihpi ringroi in amah pik ulta atumpei, che muulpii meikaang nanga tuiiboomma ahunthlakpei.
Che tuiiboom inthumsunga khatva thii in olsa, tuiiboom asuungah am akring kutseem inthumsunga inkhat thisei, mulipii inthumsunga inkhat ammaangpei.
Inthumtihpi ringroi in amah pik ulta atumpei, che meiser nanga intle khalmo inrol arsi khat ringramnata tlasa, che mah khanna avaa in saruk inthumsunga khat mahche tuii dop anchungah tlasei.
Mah arsikhavaa akming “Aklungthing” antih; tui saruk inthumsunga inkhatvah aklungthing in olsa, che mii aktam tuiikhanna thisei alamva tuiikha amkhahpei.

Manli tihpi ringroi in amah pik ulta atumpei che kini in inthumsunga inkhat, thla in inthumsunga inkhat mahche arsi in inthumsunga inkhat amratpei, chunna anmah avaarkho inthumsunga inkhat inthimsa; che suun in inthumsunga inkhat vaarnohsa; mah khananga khulouh in inthumsungsa inkhat vaarnohsa.

Cheva keiin kimuh mahche ringram alaia juungnanga barmu inkhat in ahou suuk a trap a ason keiin kitheihpei, “Aktlei pik ul in ahoutrang khananga ringroi inthum inkho antumsam! Thaleiah am mii turella Lahnasa a, lahnasa a, Lahnansa a.”
Mahche ranga tihpi amah pik ulta atumpei, che ringramnata arsi inkhat thaleichungah tla a kimuh, che adongna amnoh khurbaovaa chapi amah kuungah amlanpei;
Che amah in adongna amnoh khurbaokha amhoongpei, che meipiina meikhu inthruhnanga abaonata meikhu inthruhsa; khurbao nata meikhu inthruh in kinikho marvaankho amthimpei.
Che meikhu khannata khaoruungpii thaleichungah thlengsei, thaleina aitreh atuui am khananga ankuungah tuui amlanpei,
Thaleichungah akmoong inlou nohle in em akmoong inlou nohle thingtalvah mamaangnoh natu anmah kuungah asonei, chuta tukhat amchalla Ringpu vaa chum innamnoh miikhopta mamaangnatu asonei;
anmah in anmahta thatvanoh a, chuta thla ranga malah manangnatu amjapei, anmah in anlah annangkha aitreh in miita amreia asunna amlah nangsei.
Mahni chunna mii in anthihnatu anjontu jonseilakho tiknikho anthihnatu tuuknohtuei; anmah in anthihjatu, che kthi in anmah kuungnata juunga sehtuei.
Khaoruungpii anmeelva raal turella amichaang skol khananga anmah ankangah ra–ao nanga boorpii ankhum; anmah anmaivah miimainang,
anmah ansam in kumei samnang, che anmah anha in saruungha nang;
anmah anmeelva thirpho akoornang, anmah amithla ahouvah raaltloh akseh skol kari ahounang;
Anmah in aitreh nangjimma anmeii ammei, anmeii khanna amreiikho ammei; anmah anmeii antuuivah miita thla ranga masok a amnat.
Adongna amnoh khurvah ringroi khanna anmah anchungah kurung veia paal amah akmingvah Hibru tronga Abadon che Kriik tronga Apolion tih a an ong.
Matsahna lahna khavah aralpei anro, mah i aknula ralla lahna innih thlengumang.
Cheva kuruk tihpi ringroi in amah pik ulta atumpei, che Ringpu amaikuungah am ra–ao vaa thiilkuungah aki manli nata roolhou khat keiin kitheihpei,
Pik ul akchoi kuruk tihpi ringroita ason, “Khalmo inrol avaa Euphretis ah khit a asih ringroi manlikha mathlahro.”
Chunna mahpung, akni, athla mahche akum kharella machaanga asih ringroi manlita mii inthumsunga inkhat thatnatu amthlahpei.
Che skol raalmii akpul anmasing solh sopni ei; anmah anmasing chuta keiin kitheihpei.

Kei kahamuh akhanna skolkha kimuh ei: akthou eiin mei lukhepho ansilh, meikhu saphiar, che salphar mahchu lukhepho che skol ankangah saruung ankangah che anmah anbaonata salphar meikhu che mei inthruh.
Anmah anbaonata inthruh mei, meikhu mahche mei salphar mah inthum in miita saruk inthumsunga inkhat anthatpei.
Alamva skol antuuivah anmah anbaoa mahche anmah anmeii ah am; anmah anmeiivah muruulnangei, che ankang am; che anmah ankang khanna miita amisok.

Natna rii in athatnoh mii anlei eita seitan mahche ra–ao, lupa, pithrai, lung khatkho thingah inseem leili mathruunnatu mathlah cheknoh ei, nohle anmah in mah leili ei i muhkho muhnoh ei, theihkho theihnoh ei mahche sehkho cheknoh ei.
Anmah in miithat miisunnata, pootseem nata khatkho inru inraannata anril thlengnoh ei.
Sumphai ah inlep aktlei akchek amneh ringroi khat ringramnata trum kimuh, amah akangchungah sarbong inkhang, amah akmeiivah kininang, che akeh in mei kukchonang.
Amah akut ah injuul nirik andihkhat injarh a am mahche amah akchang akeh in tuiiboom chungah asihche akveitong akeh in tukleichung asih,
Che saruung in kraanghou aksangnanga ahousuuk a inraamsa; amah in tranga onga anraam in keklei sirih in anmah anhou amithruhpei.
Keklei sirih in anhou anringlai keiin majihtangta insuullang, chuta ringramna houkhat in keikuungah nga tloh keisonang, “Khu inri sirih in asonkha chum namro, chuta mah i majihvah majihnohro.”
Tuiiboom khatkho tukleichungah ngirra am keiin kimuh ringroi khanna akchang kutta ringramting akdompei.

Che ringram khatkho mahsuungah ak am poot anaamte, thalei khatkho mah asuungah ak am poot anaamte amah in aseem ache amoh a akring amahta sonna seita antlohpei, mahchuvah “Mahkha thilsa tih a isonna amnohtu.”
Chuta sirih tihpi ringroi in amah pik ulta atumnatu onga mahnichunna Ringpu in amah roijuih ringraan ankuungah sonna amdang khananga Ringpu vaa anthup trongkha amthlung usa.
Cheva ringramtingna trongla kitheih khanna keikuungah veikhat tronga keitih ang, “Sehro, tuiiboom mahche tukleia akngir ringroi akut ah injuul nirilkha louro.”
Ohchunna keiin ringroi kuungah seh a, nirik indih injuulkha kinihpei; amah in keita keisonang, “Mah i louva saaro; mah inna nang nivonta amkhahtu, chulata nang nibaoa khuuining nanga amthlumtu.”
Mahchu kbaoa khuuining nanga thlumsa, mahchuta kisakcheva kivonchu amkhahpei.
Che ringroi in keita keitih ang, “Nangin veikhatla miiei turella, jaatboomei turella, trong chahchah irella mahche kurungei rella niphoongtu tlasa.”

Cheva keiningah ram olna sungnang inkhat keipekang che ringroi khanna ngirra keisonang, “Inthouro, che Ringpu mathruunna thlaam mahche thiilkuungkha olro che thiilkuung khanna amthruun mii eikha teenro,
Chuta mathruunna thlaampaal khavah olnoh a mahro, alamva mahkha aktlei jaatboom ankuungah kimlanpei, anmh in akseeng khuboomta thla soplilei innih ankeh ah anchilhna veitu.
Che kei sakhi akvei innihtingah tuui kimlanpei, anmah in putsi silh a nijan akpulkhat che reija innihlei sopruk trong anphoongpei.”
Anmahchuvah thaleivaa Akpu amaikuungah chorphol thing akuung innih akngir chorphol akuung innihche mitton innih taarna akeh khasa.
Tukhat in anmahta masok masik eileva, anmah anbaonata mei inthruh a anmah jeknaeita meia ahaalkhem tuei; tukhat in anmahta masok masik eile, nga tloh a anmahta athattuei.

Anmah in trong anphoonglaia khu masuurnohnatu marvaan khanna anmah ankuungah antuui am, thii ma–olnatu tuiichungah anmah antuui am, che anmah in andit antlohja laia tlohnatu natna rii jikchasoh thaleita maratnatu anmah antuui am.
antak akthi anruungta khalmo kliin khuuboom intlaap lamma intolh a tla amtuei, mah khuuboom kha anruk mingvah Sodom mahche Ijip tih a an ong, mah amunkhanna inih Akputa thingkharh ah anthat.

Alamva miiei tingnata, jatih ei tingnata, trongei tingnata, jatboomei tingnata akthlengei in anmah akthi anruungeita nijan inthum tangkhai anmit intlelit a an antu che anmah akthi anruungta rusuunna phuum indah ei,
thaleichungah am mii in anmah rella anroomthoktuei khatkho tlantuei, che anmah in khatleh khat poot inpetuei, alamva anmahta khalmo amlah amnangei.
Chuta nijanthum che tangkhai aknua Ringpu tingna akring akphukha anmah kuungah luutsa che anmah ankeh in ngirsei, khatkho anmahta akmuhmii in khalmo intritna suuksei.
Cheva “Maiphah hangve” tih a ringramtingna roolhou khat anmah kuungah thleng antheihpei. Che anmah jeknaei in anmahta anmuhpei.

Che mah pungtal chunna runaangnu tranga thousa, chunna khuboomkha somsuunga inkhat inpilsa; che runaangnu thoukhanna mii akpul sirih athatpei, thinoh a ak am in khalmo intriseia ringramma Ringpu ta paar amithratpei.
Innih tihpi lahnakha chesa; anro, inthumtihpi lahnakha intha thlengsa.

Mahche sirih tihpi ringroi in amah pik ulta atumpei, che ringramna rolhou in inkaanga onga anson, “Tukleiramma kurung huunnakha inih Akpu mahche Khrista vaa kurung huunna veisa, che amah in ache amnoh a paaltu.”
Mahche Ringpu maikuungah anmah phompii ah anbok anparuul sopnilei manli in anmai inluk a Ringpu ta mathruunna,
ansonpei, “Akchek amneh Akpu Ringpu, nangta kannih in kamipaakche, nangvah pekkho, akche akho mahche akthlengsam akho akvei nangningche mahche nangtingna aktrang tuuita loua paal namthronpei.

Jatboom in inhaangsei, chuta nangin trihkhop a nimlung inhaangkha thlengsa khatkho aktleita nangin pichaar nitlohnatu laikha thlengsa, alamva nang roijuih ringraan eita; akseengeita, nang nikmingta trih a ak ong, andih khatkho anroleita khaan namlannatu che tukleiram ammaanngei anmahta mamaangnatu laikha thlengsa.”
Ringramma trihkhopna aksuuksam daangkhat indangsa, kumei khat in kinita puun nanga asilhpei, thla in amah akehthuuia am, che arsi somlei innihvaa boorpiikhat amah akanga am;
atak in nao inpooi, amah in nao apoksam rella khalmo klah knang phah a trnga inkoua amsa.
Mahche aktlei trihkhopna daangkhat ringramma indangsa, anro, kliin in aang ruulpii munuhkhat amah akangvah sirih che aki som am, mahche amah akang sirih ah kurung boorpii sirih akhum.
Amah akmeii in marvaanna arsi eita inthumsunga inkhat akmeii ah haia thaleichunga ahunthlakpei. Kumei khanna asa apoksoh ruulpiinu manuhkhanna alousaaknatu amah amaikuungah ngirra amsa;
Jaatboom naamteta thir sungrolh in akpuihnatu kumei khanna asa kupakhat apokpei, amah asa kupata Ringpu kuungah che amah phompii kuungah ahanpei,
Che Ringpu in machaanga asih rapril khanna kumei in tlaansa, alamva amah amunkhanna mii in amahta nijan akpul khatleh reija innih alei sopruk masaak a anjoktu.
Ipek ringramma raal suuksa, Mikhael mahche amah ringroi in ruulpiinu chungah raal antlohpei; che ruulpiinu mahche amah ringroi inkho raal antlohpei,
chuta ruulpiinu in raalkha achekpei, che ringramma anmahtu an amna amun veikhat inlenga amnohsa.
Kliin ruulpiinu, leithingna muruul, akming rappu khatkho Seitan antih tukleiram pumteta masimna amahkhata manomma thaleichungah ahunthlakpei, che amahsoh inruuia amah ringroi eikho ahunthlakpei.

Cheva ringramma roolhou inkaang khat in mah ason ita kitheih, “Ipek chaanring, tuui khatkho inih Ringpu kurung huunna mahche Khrista vaa akchek amnehkha thlengsa, alamva inih unao eita Ringpu amaikuungah juktiing khulouhthlang malaalla aktrang amahkhata ahunthlakpei.
Amahta anmah in sadamte vaa athii apaalla mahche anmah anringtukna thaminta sakhi apaalla raal anchekpei, alamva anmah in anthih phah akho anchaanta anrilvolnoh.

Alamchunna ringram che mahsuungah am eio, roomthokve! Chuta thalei khatkho tuiiboomma ak am turelva lahnasa a! Alamva Seitan in amah laikha kakningsa ta arompeia, khalmo inhaanga nankuungah thlengsa!”
Ruulpiinu khanna keita thaleia keithlaakpei tih a aromlaia asa kupa akpok kumeikhata akchutpei.

Chuta kumeikuung akhanna amah in amna rapril khanna juung acheknatu kliin barmuvaa amthlah innihta amlanpei, che amahta muruul in aphahcheknoh natu amunkhanna lai kak, lai soot a, mahche lai tangkhai amsaak am iinpei;
muruul in kumeita tuiiliinchungah amthlaannatu, kumeikuunga avaananga tuiita abaonata amsahpei.
Chuta thalei in kumeikhata akalnatu ruulpiinu in abaonata amsah avaata amduulpei
Chunna ruulpiinu in kumeikuung khanna khalmo amlung inhaangsa che amah in kumeivaa atute, trongthuunta ngaak a akseh khatkho Jisu vaa ringtukna thaminta akchoi ei in raal tlohnatu inthruhsei.
Che amahvah tuiiboom sitsaichunga ngirsa.
Che keiin kimuh saraangkha jokpiinang, amah akeh majaava kuvom akeh majaanang che abaoin saruung abaonang mahche ruulpiinu khannasa kuungkhanna amah atuui, phompii che akliin akchek amnehta amlanpei.
Amah akang khatvah thi aja a asoknanga intloh, chuta amah kuungah khalmo asokna munkha thrasa, che thalei apumtein salungkhou seia saraang aknuta anjuihpei.

Mii in ruulpiinuta amithruunpei, alamva amah in saraang kuungah akchek amnehkha amlanpei, che anmah in sa ta mathruunna antih, “Saraangkha amahnang tunang amme? Amahsoh raal antlohpichek tunang amme?”
Che saraang kuungah akthloi trong atrongnatu mii manuih samanuih atrongnatu bao amlanpei, che thla soplilei innih phao akchek amnehta ahuuinatu amjapei;
saraang khanna aanga Ringpu ta manuih a amah akming, amah thiil khatkho ringramma am anmah anchungah thranoh a trongsa.
Akseeng mii eisoh raal antlohnatu che anmahta cheknatu saruung khata tuui amlanpei.
Tukleramna jaatih ei antrong che jaatboom naamte in anthat sadamte vaa akring nirik ah anming anjihnoh miinaam in sa khata amithruuntu.
Tunangkhat raalla suura ansehpi mii in roi veia sehtu; chemseiah inthat tupotle chemseiin inthattu tla. Onna akseeng mii in douchekna mahche malotna am.
Mahchuche aktlei saruung inkhat thaleinata inthruh kimuhpei; sadamte nanga aki innihche amah in ruulpiinu nanga trong.
Amah in matsahna saraangvaa achek amneh pumte sa amaikuungah aleengna, che thalei khatkho mah khanna am mii eita thi ajaphah a insokta akthra matsahkhata mathruunve tih a amithruun.
Amah in khalmo kliin daang jikcha tloh a miimai kuungah ringramnata thaleichungah mei luungkho amthlak.

Che saraang maikuungah amlan daang jikchavaa apaalla, thlou tlohnatu amjakha thaleia ameita asimna, tukleiramma am ankuungah chemseiin thihna phah a amsoh eichuta akring saraang leili khat seemnatu ason.
Saraangvaa leili khata akphuk malannatu amahchungah akchek amneh amlanpei, chunna saraangvaa leili in atrongnatu che leili khata amthruunnoh annaamteta thatnatu relnasa.
Mah in indih khatkho inrol mahche kdoon khatkho inranriing mahche thlaang thlaang khatkho naichi pumteta kveitong kut nohle anmah amichalla daak asih ei.
Chunna sa khavaa daak nohle ming nohle amah akming amasingta akphah khanoh a tunangkhat in lei nohle juur majanoh.
Manna lousing inithun: Mahkhata room acheknatu lousing am mii khanna saraangvaa amasingkha teennatu suulso alamva mah i miikhatva amasing; amah amasing khavah reija kuruk che sopruklei kuruk (666).
Mahche ringramtingna houkhat khalmo tuiitam ahounanga che aktrang khu inrinanga ktheihpei; mahche snanta aksuk eiin snantata ansuk ahou khananga kitheih.

Anmah in phompii manli anmaikuung khanna mahche anparuul anmaikuung khanna mah akthar laa ita antloh. Thaleichung nata athlokche mii choihkhat che akpul soplilei manli khanoh a aktlei tukhat inkho laakha room cheknoh ei.
Mahmii eichuvah kumeisoh inchunnoh, alamva anmahvah akseengsei anmahvah sadamte in aseh asehnata aknu akjuih miisei, anmahvah Ringpu mahche sadamte vaa akrah veia mii tingnata inthlokchesei,
anmah anbaoa mii masimna trong intuuknoh, alamva anmahvah thranoh daak amnohsei.
Che aktlei ringroi inkhat in ringram alaia juunga am keiin kimuh, thaleia am jaatboom naamte, jaat naamte, trong naamte khatkho miinaam kuungah araannatu ache amnoh akthratrong amah kuungah am;

che amah in roolhou inkaanga ason, “Ringpu ta trihve che akuungah paarthra malanve, alamva amah in pichaar atlohnatu pungkha thlengsa; ringramta, thaleita, tuiiboom che dop anaamteta akseem amahta mathruunve.”

Anmah annungtongna inthumtihpi aktlei ringroi khat in anmahta juih a ahoutranga onga ason, “Tunangkhat in sa khata che amah leili khata mathruunleva chela amah amchalla nohle akut ah daangta intuuknoh leva,

amah inkho amlung inhaang khananga kam khanna asuungpot anpoolnoh Ringpu in amlung anhaangna tuiibuhkhata a iintu; che amahta akseeng ringroi khatkho sadamte amaikuungah mei leh salphar haaalla amlahtu.
Anmah in anhaalna meikhukha ache amnoh a achungah kalla hang, saraang khata che amah leilita amthruun khatkho amah akmingvah daak antuukna mii khavah suun khulouh inngai phahnoh ei.”
Onna akseeng mii in ansingnatu lousingkhat am, onna Ringpu vaa trongthuun mahche Jisuta malot a akdouchek mii ammei.

Chela ringram tingna roolhou khatin kikuungah asonta kitheih, “Mah i majihro: Peknata Akpu tinga akthi anmah eikha doiphahsei.” Li in ason, “Tak a adoi akphahsei.” Li in anmah anthlounata inngai anphahnatu, che anthlou in amah annuta anjuih.
Mahche sumphai inngou inkhat che sumphai achung khanna asa kupa nang inbok a am ke in kimuhpei, amah akangah ra–ao boorpii che akut ah tokoi ngeih inkhat achoih.

Aktlei ringroi khatin mathruunna thlaamnata inthruhsa, amah in sumphai achungah anbok akuung khanna ahousuuk a ongsa, “Nang tokhoikha thlaak a vaatrosa, alamva chi luhnatu pungkha thlengsa, alamva thaleina chi luhna turella chikha minsa.”
Chunna sumphai chungah anbok khanna thaleiah amah tokoi athlaakpei, mahche thaleita avaatpei.
Mahche aktlei ringroi khat in ringramma mathruunna thlaamnata inthruhsa, che amahkho tokoi angeihkhat achoih.

Aktlei ringroi khat in thiilkuung nata inthruhsa, meichungah amah ringroi in tuui am, tokoi angeih akchoi akuungah roolsuuk a onga ason, “Nang tokoi angeihkha thlaakrosa, mahche thaleina nganglirah eikha matlonrosa, alamva thaleina nanglirah eikha minsei.”
Mahche ringroiin amah tokoita thaleia thlaak a, thaleina nganglirah ta amtlonpei, mahchu Ringpu in inraatkanga inhaanga nganglirah soorna amunkhanna alonpei;
anmah in nganglirah ta khuuboom apaalla anchilh, che nganglirah soorna ah thii kluungkha skolbaotal inkaanga mel reija innihvak.
Che ringramma kliin mahche salungkhouna aktlei aksuuksam daangkhat keiin kimuhpei, ringroi sirih natna rii sirih mahche achenakho veisa, alamva ohchunna Ringpu in inhaanga asaonakha achenasa.

Che meisoh inpool likli nanga intle tuiiboomnang inkhat indang kimuhpei, che tunangkhat in saruung, amah leili che amah akmingvaa amahsingta raal akchek mahkha liklinang intle tuiiboom akomma Ringpu vaa snantata ankut ah choia ngirra ammei.

Che anmah in Ringpu roijuih Moses alaa khatkho Sadamte anlaata tloh a anson, “Nang nithloua li inkho liinnei mahche salungkhou nakho veiei, Akchek amnehrem Akpu Ringpu o! Nang nilamva anaamtea seeng mahche chim, chup chuptu kurungo!
Akpu o, tunang in nangmingta paar mathratnoh mahche trihnoh tueime? Alamva nangkhopta seeng ningche. Jaatboom naamtein thlenga nangta namthruuntuei alamva nang pichaar naamteta amdangpei.”
Mah i aknua keiin kianpei ringramma sakhi veia mathruunna thlaamkha inhoongsa,
mathruunna thlaamnata natna rii sirihsoh inruuia ringroi sirih in inthruhsei, anmah in akseeng intlepuun ansilh, anlukhe a ra–ao puun inraakei.
Che akring kutseemsa manli ankaara khat ringroi sirih ankuungah ache amnoh a ring Ringpu in inhaanga asaona in sip ra–ao vaa kam sirih kha amlanpei;

mahche mathruunna thlaamkha Ringpu vaa paarthtra nata che amah tuui nata meikhuin sipsa, mahche ringroi sirihva natna rii sirih kha achenohmiil, tunangkhat inkho mathruunna thlaam asuunga luut cheknoh ei.
Chuche mathruunna thlaamnata roolhou khatin ringroi sirih ankuungah anson keiin kitheihpei, “Nannih in sehve, mahche Ringpu in inhaanga asaona kam sirih kha thaleichungah bunve.”
Chunna matsahna ringroi khanna seh a amah kamta thaleichungah abunpei, mahche saraangvaa daak am khatkho amah leilita amthruunmii anchungha thranoh intritna che intirhsa paan suuksa.
Innih tihpi ringroi in amah kamta tuiiboom suungah abunpei, cheva tuiikha akthi mii inkhatvaa athiinangasa, tuiiboom suunga ak am akringpot naamte thisei.
Inthumtihpi ringroi in amah kamta avaatingah che doptinga aleipei. Cheva mahchu thii in olsei.
Mahche avaana ringroi in ason keiin kitheihpei, “Nangva akchim pichaar aktlohche, nangva ipek akvei, akveiche khatkho akveisamkha nangche, Akseeng inkhatruningche.
Alamva mii in akseengei mahche ringraanei anthiita amithlaak khatkho nangin anmah kuungah thii an iinnatu namlannei; alamva anmah in ohkha phah a matikchaei.”
Che thiilkuung nata aktlei roolhou khat oinanga kitheih, “Oi, Akchekrem Akpu Ringpu, Nang pichaar tlohvah seeng mahche chim.”
Manli tihpi ringroi khanna amah akamta kinichungah abunpei, mah khanna mii eita kini insa in ankaangnatu kinichungah tuui amlanpei.
Aktrang kini insaa khanna mii in kaangsei, che klah knang natna rii akphah anchungah tuui am Ringpu akmingta anmah in phool antloh, anmah in anril thlengnoh ei che amahta paar mathratnoh ei.
Ranga tihpi ringroi khanna amah kamta saraangvaa phompiichung abunpei, cheva saraang kurung huunnakha inthimsa; mii in kna thonoh a anmah amileita an eipei,
anmah in annat ansatrella khatkho anpaan rella ringramna Ringpu ta phool tloh a trongsei. Che anmah anthlou khannata anril thlengnoh ei.
Kuruk tihpi ringroi khanna amah kamta Euphratis ah abunpei, che kulkung tongnata akthleng kurung turella lam thlouraang tlohnatu amah avaana tuiikha kangsa.
Cheva ruulpiinu munuh abaonata, mah sa abao khannata mahche chimnoh ringram abaonata uiitroknang chimnoh li inthum inthruhta keiin kimuh;
alamva anmahva thranoh rappu aklisei, anmah in daang jikcha amipaang, anmah in tukleiram pumtetu kurungeita Akchek amneh Ringpu vaa akliinta ralla machunnatu sehsei.
“(Anro, keiin inrunanga thlengsang! Inthranga che puunrei silh a am amahkha doiphah veisa, mahchuvah amah in athlaia sehnohtu che indangkho indangnohtu!”)
Che anmah in anmahta Hibru tronga Armakedon antih amunna anmahta annaamma amichunpei.
Sirih tihpi ringroi in amah kamta thli ah aleipei, che mathruunna thlaamnata roolhou khat phompii nata inthruh a atihpei, “Mah i chesa!”
Chunna kini inthla jikcha, ahou jikcha, khu inri jikcha che aktrang runaangnu thousa, mainang aktrang runaangnu thou i thaleichungah mi in phah anringsuunga oichah aktrang runaangnu lousuuk nohmang.
Kliin khuboomta inthum suuk a akhoihpei, che ramboomei, khuuboom eita inpilsei, che amah in inhaanga asaona tuiibuh chaplakha kliin Babilon kuungah amlannatu Ringpu in amahta intheihsa.
Tuiikoiram naamte atlaankirpei, tukhat inkho muul inkhatluungkho tuuk cheknohsei.
Ser reijavak rik khurah in marvaannata miichungah tlasei, khurah khanna miita khalmo ammaangrella mii in Ringpu ta phool antloh phah a mah klah knangkha khalmo trihkhopna vei.
18 Che kam sirih aksih ringroi sirih ankaarna khat in thlenga keikuungah ason, “Tiingvaro, tuiitam chungah inbok a am khalmo kochanoh atakjuur kumeichungah tlasam pichaarkha keiin nangta nammuhtang,
thaleina kurung jikcha in amahsoh inlaaljousei, che thaleichungna mii inkho tuiibuh an iinche inruiia amahsoh inlaaljousei.”
Che Li in keita raprilla keiphurh ang, mahche Ringpu ta manuih a aktrong mingin sip akang sirih che aki som am, an aang saraang inkatchungah kumei inkhat in inbokha keiin kmuhpei.
Kumeikhan bukal mahchuleh in aang amchu puun asilh, ra–ao, harngou, khatkho amantam lunga inliing, akut a intirhsa khatkho kumei kupa inlaalthlou akbuur in sip ra–ao kam inkhat choia am,
amah amchalla iromcheknoh inthup mingkhat injih khavah, “Kliin Babilon, antak akjuur khatkho thaleia intirhsana annu.”
Akseeng mii anthiita mahche Jisu rella anthatmii anthiita iinna inrui kumei khat keiin kimuhpei.
Keiin amahta kimuhlai asonna amnoh a salungkhousang.
Chuta ringroi in keita keisonang, “Jarella nangin salungkhou cheme? Keiin nangkuungah kumei khavaa anthuptrong che amahta akphurh akang sirih khatkho aki sirih am saraang kharella naksontang,

nangin nimuh saraangkha amta ipekva amnohsa amah in adongna amnoh khurnata inthruhtu, che amah in repnanga sehtu, ak amche, ak amnoh mahche ak amsam saraangkha anmah in anmuhlaia tukleiram mathronnoh lainata anmah anmingta akring nirik ah anjihnoh thaleichunga ak am mii in salungkhou tuei.
“Onna lousing amna turella athlou tla: Akang sirihkhavah kumei in anbokna muul sirih khasa;
anmahkhavah kurung sirih ei ankaarna rangavah inriilsei, inkhatva ammang, aktlei khava thlengnohmang, amah in athlenglai kakruta am uning.
Louamche khatkho amnoh saraang khavah kirit chuta sirih ankaarna khatva repnanga sehsa.
Che nangin nimuh aki somkha pekphah kurung veia anpaalnatu tuui akphahnoh kurung somsei, chuta anmah in kurung nanga saraang khasoh inruuia pungkhat turella akchek amnehva anphahpei.
Anmah in rilkhat veijouei, che anmah antuui khakho anchek aminehta saraang kuungah amilan.”

Anmah in sadamte chungah raal antlohtu, cheva sadamte in anmahta raal achektuei, alamva amah in Akpuei chungah akpu, che Kurungei chungah kurungsa, che amah in anruuipi mii eikhavah amah in a ongche, acharche malot aja miikhasei.
Chela amah in keita keisonnang, kumei in anbokna tuiitam nangin nimuh, miitammei, jaatboomei, che trong khalmo tammei.
Nangin nimuh aki somleh sa khanna atakjuur kumeikhata intirh tuei; che amahta amimaangtu, puunrei masilhnohtuei, amah aruungta ansaaktu, che amahta mei anhaaltu,
alamva Ringpu in asontrongta atlungnohmiil ril khlek anveinatu, che anmah kurung huunnata saraang kuungah amilannatu anmah anrilsuungah amah in amdonta antlohnatu anmah anrilla Ringpu in athunpei.
Mahche nangin nimuh kumeikha thalei kurung anchungah akpu veia akpaal kliin khuuboom khasa.
Mah i aknua aktlei ringroi khat in ringramnata trum keiin kimuhpei, amahninga akchek amneh khalmo am; amah amtik in thaleita amvaarpei.
Che amah in roolhou inkaanga onga ason, “Inriilsa, inriilsa kliin Babilon! Rappu ramnai in a amna, akseengnoh in an amna, intirhsa akvei annaam in an amna hukveisa;

alamva jatboom naamtein amah kumeivaa seengnoh tuiibuhta iinna inruiisei, thaleina kurung eiin amahsoh inlaaljousei, che thaleita aklei akjuur eiin amahvaa akseengnoh adoon akhaal khanna anmah in kdoon hukveisei.”

Chela ringramtingah aktlei roolhou khat in asonkha keiin ktheihpei, “Kei kimiieio, nannih in amah aleh khanna akhol nanveijounoh natu mahche amah in aphah klah knang khanna chuum nanphahnoh natu amah ningnata inthruhve;
alamva amah alehkha ringram phah a inpeisa, che amah achimnohkha Ringpu in intheihsa.
Amah in nannihta rou nanihtloh khananga nannih inkho amahta rou tlohve, che amah athlou nujuih a amahningakho saruk innih malanve; mah inpool kam khanna amah turella saruk innih mapoolve.

Amah akroua paar mathrat a che chimnoh thranoh lamma leeng khananga amah kuungah klah knang khatkho marhuuikha intrimma akuungah malanro. Alamva amah arilla trong, ‘Keiin kurungpii inkhatveia inboksang, keivah trulmeinu noh ang, keiin tiknikho marhuuina muhnohtung.’
Chunna nikhatvah amah kuungah natna rii, kna ksa, marhuui che buhchaal thlengtu, che meiah kaangtu; alamva amahta pichaar aktloh Akpu Ringpu vah akchek amnehsa.”
Che amahsoh kumei kupa inlaalthlou tlohjoua khatkho thranohoonga ril mathlanna amjou thaleina kurung eiin amah in mei akaangna meikhukha anmuh in, amahrella anmah in traptruuia marhuui tuei;
amah in anangkhata anmuh in intria saraalla ngirra anson, “Lahnasa a! Lahnasa a! Akchek amneh khuuboom Babilon! Pung khatsuunga nang pichaarkha thlengsa.”
Mahche thaleichungah aklei akjuur eiin amahrella trapsei che marhuuisei, alamva tukhat inkho anmah anpoot ancheita anleinoh rella,
pootchei chuvah ra–ao, harngou, amanchaal lung, doilung, puun intle, bukal amchu puun, innaal khatkho in aang puun, amrimtui thing, kusaiha, amanchaal thing, kuri, thir che innaal lungou,
charong, maroi, mekruk, amrimtui thao, amrimtui haalna, nanglituii, thao, akthra jaamleh kehu, siil, sadam, skol khatkho skol kari, naichi mahche miivaa anli.
“Nang nikli in akdit akrahkha nang nikuungnata sehsa, che nangtu aktui khatkho akthra naamte nangkuung nata maangkirsei, nangin anmahta veikhat inlenga tuuknoh usache!”
Amah apaalla doon akphah ei poot akjuur eiin, amah in alah anangkhata intirh seia saraalla ngirra che traptruui mahche marhuuia ansonpei,
“Lahnasa a, lahnasa a! Akthrapuun, mangkra amchu puun aksilh, mahche ra–ao, amanchaal lungin khatkho doilungin inliing kliin khuboomkha!
Alamva pung khatsuunga doonkhaal naamte maangsa.”
Muli akpu, muli chuunga akseh, muli akthouei che tuiiboom chungah sehloonna ringnatu akthrulh naamtein inlaa a ngirsei.
Che amahta mei in akaangna meikhu hangta anmuh in anmah in onga antihpei, “Mah kliin khuuboom i maisoh intrim khuuboom am ume?”

Che anmah in ankangah phil inbahsei, ongsei, trapsei mahche sinthruuia antihpei, “Lahnasa a! Kliin khuuboom turella mahchuvah muli akdoon eiin amah kumei in adoon apaalla kdoon anphahkha! Pung khatsuunga adoon akhaalkha maangsa.
Ah ringram, anmah turella roomthokve, raangroiei, ringraanei, ringramei, akseeng miieio, alamva Ringpu in nannih turella amahchungah pichaar atlohtu!”

Cheva akchek amneh ringroi khat in buhsukna lungnanga inrolkhat alohche tuiiboom suungah loonna ason, “Nga tloh a kalthihang housoh inruuia kliin khuuboom Babilon ta alontu che veikhat inlenga intuuknoh usa;

mahche snanta aksukei, laahoi leenga aksukei, pasi aktumei khatkho pik ul aktumei anhou nankuungah veikhat inlenga intheihnoh usei! Che thiim tlohna tupoot anaam thiimtloh mahche aktlei tukhatkho veikhat inlenga nangkuungah tuuknoh usachou, sumlung ahou veikhat inlenga nangkuungah intheinoh usa;

che nankuungah akvaar in veikhat inlenga vaarnoh usa; che changri leh thirei anhou nankuungah veikhat inlenga intheihnoh usa; alamva nangturel avah akjuur akleikha thaleia anbok miisei, che nang leiva in jaatboom naamteta nisimnapei.
“Che ringraanei, akseeng miiei, khatkho thaleichunga anthatmii annaamtevaa anthii amah kuungah antuukpei.”
Mah i aknua ringramma mii khalmo tamhou nanga kitheih, “Haliluia! Chaanring, paarthra, mahche tuui i inih Ringpu atasa;

alamva amah pichaarvah chim che kseeng, amah in kupa laalthlou a thaleita mamot akliin atakjuur kochanoh khata amah in pichaar atlohpei, che amah in amah Akpu roijuih anchungah thii amthlaakta amah in athung alohtu.”
Veikhatla amah in ongsa, “Haliluia! Amah akuungah meikhukha ache amnoh a kalsa.”
Che anparuul sopnihlei manli mahche akring kutseem manli in intolhtlep a phompii ah anbok Ringpu ta mathruunna ason, “Amen. Haliluia!”
Phompii tingnata roolhou khat in ason, “Amah roijuih nannaam, che amahta aktrih andih anrool nannaam in Ringpu ta mapaakve.”
Cheva tuiitam ahou, keklei tla ahou, mahche miitam ahounanga onga ason kitheipei, “Haliluia!” Alamva akchek amneh inihtu Akpu Ringpu in paalsa.
“Inih in tlanrei, roomthokrei che amahta paar mathratrei, alamva sadamte vaa changvaangkha thlengsa, amah changri in inchaang chesa.”
Intle akseeng, akthra puunrei silhnatu amah kumei kuungah amlanpei, alamva akthra puunrei akseeng miivaa akchim thlousa.

Chunna amahta kamthruunnatu keiin akehkungah intolhsang, chuta amah in keisonang, “Mah i tlohnoh tupotche Jisu vaa aringtukna thaminta amlan nangsoh mahche nang unao eisoh roijuih akveijoukha keisang. Ringpu ta mathruunro,” alamva ringtukna thamin phoongi Li vaa ata.
Mahche ringram inhoong keiin kimuhpei, cheva anro, skol inngou akthou amah akmingvah Malot aja khatkho Akchim tih a an ong amah akchimlamseh khanna pichaar atlohche raal atloh.
Amah amitva mei nanga intruunga seh mahche akangchungah boorpii tam am; amahnoh a tukhat inkho anromnoh villa amijihming inkhatkho am.
Thii inlup lungluut amah in asilh, che amah akmingvah Ringpu Atrong tih a an ong.
Che ringramma raalmii in akseeng akthrapuun inngouleh intle a inliingseia skol chuunga amah aknuta anjuih.
Jatboom eita atuknatu chem angeihkhat abaonata inthruh, che amah in thir sungrolh choia anchungah paaltu; amah in Akchek amnehrem Ringpu in inhaanga asaona nganglirah soorna ah akchilh ei.
Amah inluut insuulchungah che amah amtorchungah “Kurungei chunga kurung mahche Akpuei chunga Akpu” tih a villa injihming inkhat am.
Cheva ringroi khat in kini ah ngirra amkha keiin kimuhpei, amah in ringram alaia akjuung va eita rool inkaanga onnga asonei, “Thlengve, Ringpu vaa akthloirem bohdoonna khanna inboomve,

nannih in kurungei anruung, raalmii akpuui ei anruung, akchek amneh miiei anruung, skol mahche akthouei anruung mii naamte anruung, thlaang thlaang khatkho naichi, aksiin khatkho akliinvaa anruungta nansaaknatu thlengve.”
Skolchung akchuung khatkho amah raalmii eita indenpia raal intlohpinatu saraang leh thaleina kurung in anmah raalmiisoh inruuia inchaangjou keiin kimuh.

Che amah amaikuungah salungkhouna thlou aktloh saraang khatleh chimnoh ringraan ta suura simma asihpei, amah daang khanna inromna veia sa vaa daang ak am mahche sa khavaa leilita amthruun eita amah in amsimnaei. Salphar soh kaanga am meipii khanna kiringa anmah innihta alonpei.
Che skol akchuung akpu vaa abaonata anthruh chemsei khanna anlei makheita athatei; cheva annaamte in anmah anruungta ansaakche anvon invahsei.
Mahchuche adongna amnoh khurvaa chapi khatkho thirhang inrolkhat akut ah akchoi ringroi khat in ringramnata trum kimuhpei.
Che amah in ruulpiinu amchuvah leithingna muruulta suura asihpei, amahvah rappu khatkho Seitan che amahta kum akpulkhat kaanna asihpei,

amahta ache amnoh khurra athlaakpei, che kum akpulkhat achenohmiil amah in jatboom naamte veikhat inlenga amsimna nohtu amahta chapi khaara chum namma asihpei; maiche aknua amahta lai kakturel amthlahtu.

Mahchuche phompii tamkhaak keiin kimuhpei, che phompii chunga anbok ankuungah pichaar tlohnatu tuui amlanpei. Mah chuvah Jisu kuungah amah ringtukna thaminnei che Ringpu trong rella ankangta antanche leilikha keiin kimuhche saraang nohle leili khata amthruunnoh ei che anmah amichalla khatkho ankut ah daak ak amnoh eiin chaan anphahche Khrista soh inruuia kum akpulkhat paaltuei.
Aktlei akthi eikhanna kum akpulkhat achenohmiil ringnoh tuei. Mah i matsahrem veikhat ring khasa.

Matsahrem veikhat ring akjao amahvah doi akphahsei mahche akseengsei! Mainang mii anchungah innih tihpi thihna tuui amnoh, chuta anmah in Ringpu mahche Khrista vaa thiimpu vei tuei che anmah in Khrista soh kum akpulkhat paaltuei.
Che kum akpulkhat achesoh simma thunna asih Seitanta amthlahtu.
Che Seitan in inthruh a thalei akiing manli ah am jaatboom eita mahchuvah Kok leh Makok ta amsimnatu sehtu, anmahta raal amtlohtuei; anmah anmasingvah tuiiboomna sitsai nanga tammei.
Anmah in thalei intlaap akseeng mii in an amna khatkho rilvolna khuboomta ankooipei; chuta ringram tingna mei in anmahta ahaalkhem peiei.
Che amahta amsimna rappukha, saraang mahche chimnoh ringraan mii khanna salphar mahche meiboom asuungah alon, che mah khanna suun jaan ache amnoh a anmahta akchut tuei.
Mahche phompii kliin inngoukhat, che mah phompiichung anbok amahkhata keiin kimuhpei; amah amaikuung nata marvaan mahche thalei in tlaansei che anmah turella an amnatu aphom amnohsa.

Che akthiei, andih khatkho anroleiin phompii, che nirikha inhoongsei. Mahche aktlei nirikkho inhoongsa! Mahchu akring nirikkha inhoongsa. Che amah in akthi eita nirik akhan anjih ei anmah anthlou nujiuh a pichaar atloh ei.
Tuiiboom in amah asuungah am aktlei eita amthlahpei, che Kthi khatkho Repnang in anmah ankuungah am akthi eita amithlahpei, anmah annaamteta anthlou anthlou nujuih a pichaar atloh ei.
Cheva kthi mahche Repnang ta meiboom asuungah ahunthlakpei. Mah i innih tihpi kthi meiboom khasa;
Tunangkhat in akring nirik ah amah akmingta injih a intuuknoh leva, amah miikha meiboom asuungah ahunthlaktu.
Che Ringpu ningnata akseeng khuuboom, akthar Jerusalem in amsal turella inliing changri nanga ringramnata trum keiin kimuhpei:

mahche phompii tingnata roolhou in onga asonta keiin kitheihpei, “Anro, Ringpu in a amna amunkha miisoh inruuijousa. Amah in amahmii eisoh inruuia amjoutu, che anmah in amahmii vei tuei, che Ringpu ataktal in anmahsoh inruuijou tuei;
mahche amah in amah amii ruithli tlata anuultuei, kthi veikhat amnoh usa, che sinthruui nohle trap che kna a inkou veikhat inlenga amnoh usa; alamva matsahna poot anaamte aralpei.”
Phompii chungah inbok a am amah in ason, “Anro, keiin poot anaamteta akthar kimveipei.” Che amah in ason, “Mah i majihro, alamva mahtrongi akchim khatkho malotphu.”
Che amah in keita keison, “Mah i chesa! Keivah Alpha khatkho Omeka ang, kulkung khatkho kulreelsang. Tuii akraalmii kuungah akring doptuinata khangvaalla kimlantu.
Raal akchek mii khanna aphah tuphukha changtu, che keiin amah Ringpu veitung khatkho amah in kei kisakupa veitu.

Chuta intritrangei, amlotnoh miiei seengnoh miiei, miithat miisunnei, leili amthruunei, mii masimna trong aktrongei oinang mii anchuumva meiboom chungah mei leh salphar soh kaangkha; mah i innih tihpi kthi khasa.”
Achena lahna natna rii sirih in sip kam sirih akchoi ringroi sirih ankaarna khat in thlenga keikuungah tronga keitih ang, “Tiingvaro, sadamte vaa akmei thareikha keiin nammuhtang.”
Cheva amah in keita Li ah kliin khatkho inkaang muul khat amaa ah keiphurh anga akseeng khuuboom Jerusalem ta Ringpu tingnata ringramma trumta kammuh ang.
Mah khanna Ringpu vaa paarthra am, mah akvaarkha amanchaal lung, akseeng lungriilnang;
Khuuboom vaa anrol thong somleinih am mahche thong inrolrel khanna ringroi somleinih ammei mahche thong inrolrel khanna Israel jaatih somlei innihvaa anming ammei.
Khuuboom amna nisuuktonga thong inthum, akhitonga thong inthum, akhutonga thong inthum mahche nitlaktonga thong inthum ammei.
Khuuboom vaa palkhanna innmun somlenih am. Innmun achung achungah Sadamte vaa raangroi somleinih anming ammei.
Che keikuungah aktrong miikhan khuuboom mahche mah khuboomvaa thong khatkho pal olnatu ra–ao sung inrolkhat amah kuungah am.
Khuboomkha akiing manli, mah adungleh aphei inrol intrim; che amah ra–ao sungah khuboomta kilomitar akpul innihche reija manli aolpei; mah adung, aphei che ankaangvah intrim.
Amah in palta aol in mii khat in mahchuvah ringroi khat in aol chaanga kiil reija soplilei manli suuk.
Khuuboom apaalkha jaspar lungin anseem, che khuuboom asuungkho liklinang akseeng ra–ao in anseem.
Khuuboom pal amunna amanchaal lungah amiliing matsahna amun in jaspar lung, innih tihpi in saphar inthumtihpi akate lung, manli tihpi in imeral lung,

ranga tihpi in oniks lung, kuruk tihpi in karnelian lung, sirih tihpi in krisolit lung, kirit tihpi in beril lung, ku tihpi in topaj lung, som tihpi in krisophas lung, somleikhat tihpi in jasin lung, somleinih tihpi in amethis lung.
Che thong somleinihkha doilung somleinih in anseem, thongrel doilung khatkhat in anseem, mahche khuuboom lamva pitjangnang indang akseeng ra–ao in anseem.
Che khuuboom suunga mathruunna thlaam keiin muhnohsang, mahthlaam i Akchek amneh Akpu Ringpu che Sadamte in veisa.
Che khuboomkha avaarnatu kini nohle thlakho darkaar amnohsa, alamva Ringpu vaa paarhtra in mah khanna vaarsa che Sadamte khanna amahtu mitton veisa.
Mahche jaatboom anaam in amah akvaar khanna sehtuei; che thaleivaa kurungin amah paarthrata asuungah khanna athlentu,
Che mah thong eichuva tiknikho suunna inkhaarnohtu–che mah khanna khulouh khak amnohtu;
anmah in mahsuunga jatboomei paarthra khatkho injahna anthlengtu.
Chuta mahsuunga akseengnoh mii nohle intritna thlou nohle aklaalthou aktlohmii in luutnoh tuei, chuta Sadamte chaanvaa nirik ah akming injihkhop in luut uningei.
Ringpu mahche sadamte vaa phompii nata kiluung lungrilnang intle akseeng akring avaa inkhat amah in keita kammuh ang.
Mah khuuboom alaikhanna che mah avaapang innihkhanna ringna thing moonga am, mah thingin athalrel aje jea akrah inrah; mahthing anah in jatboom annat ansatta amthratei.
Mah khanna veikhat inlenga phool amnoh usa, chuta Ringpu khatkho Sadamte vaa phompiikhan mah khanna amtu, che amah roijuih eiin amahta amithruuntu.
Anmah in amah ameelta anmuhtu, che amah akmingkha anmah amichalla amtu.
Mah khanna veikhat inlenga khulouh amnoh usa; anmah turella mitton nohle kini kvaar akanana amnoh usa; alamva Akpu Ringpu in anmahtu akvaar veitu, che anmah in ache amnoh a paaltuei.
Che amah in keikuungah keisonang, “Mah ei i chim khatkho malotphu. Akpu Ringpu in intha a aksuuksam khata amah aroi ankuungah mamuhnatu akseeng ringroi eita amthlah ei.”
Anro, keiin intha a thlengtung. Mah nirik in aphoong trongta amjuih miikha doiphah veisa.
Mah ita aktheih mahche akmuhkha John keisang. Che mah ita keiin kitheihlai mahche kimuhlai, keikuungah kammuh ringroi akehkungah mathruunnatu inluksang;

Chuta amah in keikuunga keisonang, “Mah i tlohnohro! Alamva keivah nangsoh mahche nang unao ringraan eisoh khatkho mah nirik ita ngaak a majuih a akseh roijuih akveijou miisang, Ringpu ta mathruunro.”
Che amah in kikuungah keisonang, “Mah nirik ah aphoong trongi chum namnohro, alamva lai knaisa.
Thranoh aktloh amahkhan thranohta nga tloh a amso, akbuur amah khanna buura nga amso, akchimlamseh amah khanna chimma nga amso, akseeng amah khanna seenga nga amso.”
“Anro, keiin intha thlengsang, miirelta amah amah in atlohthou nujuih a keiin kamlannatu nantlohkhaan thlenna thlengsang.
Keivah Alpha khatkho Omeka, matsah khatkho achena, kulkung khatkho kulrel khasang.”
Anmah inluut insuulta aksuk eikha doiphasei, mahchuvah anmah in ringna thingkhata phahnatu mahche khuboomvaa thong eikhanna anluutnatu amitik ankuungah am.
Apaalla ak am miiei chuvah uiisei, leiva aktlohsei, kumei kupa aklaalsei, miithat miisunsei, miimei miimasal aklaalsei, leili amthruunsei. Chimnohta rilvol mahche antlohja aktloh miisei.
“Khakla ei ankuungah mah ringtukna thamin ita malannatu Jisu keiin kei ringroita nankuungah kamthlahpei. Keivah Devit vaa akjung khatkho atute, intle arsi kvaarnu khasang.”
Li in mahche thirei in ason, “Thlengro.” Maita aktheih amah in sonso “Thlengro.” Che tuii akraal amah in thlengso, akdi amah in akringvaa tuiita khangvaalla iinso.
Mah nirik in aphoong trong ita arungai miinaamta kikchaakchou tukhat in mah injih ichungah daakleva, Ringpu in achungah mah nirik asuungah injih natna rii eikha achungah adaaktu,
che tukhat in mah nirik ah aphoong trongta loujok leva, Ringpu in akring thingnata che mah nirik asuungah injih akseeng khuuboom nata amah achuumta alohtu.
Mah ringtukna thamin ita amlan amah in ason, “Ta tak a keiin intha thlengsang.”
Amen. Thlengrosa, Akpu Jisu!
